40001001	Yucu ŋalek ce kicesil ce poru aretap mpo Yesu Kristo. Yesu kunye kikeseniyantetap Tauti oŋnku nye kikeseniyantetap Apram.
40001002	Apram kunye kikwanitap Isaka; Isaka kunye kikwanitap Yakopo; Yakopo kunye kikwanitap Yuta; oko mpo mutakwam alak.
40001003	Yuta kunye kikwanitap Peres oko Sara (nye kikametimwa ku Tamar.) Peres kunye kikwanitap Keseron; Keseron kunye kikwanitap Ram;
40001004	Ram kunye kikwanitap Aminatap; Aminatap kunye kikwanitap Nasyon; Nasyon kunye kikwanitap Salmon;
40001005	Salmon kunye kikwanitap Poas (nye kicekure kamet Rakap;) Poas kunye kikwanitap Opet (nye kicekure kamet Rus); Opet kunye kikwanitap Yese;
40001006	Yese kunye kikwanitap Kinko Tauti. Tauti kunye kikwanitap Solomon (nye kikamet kunye kikorketap Uriya;)
40001007	Solomon kunye kikwanitap Reopoam; Reopoam kunye kikwanitap Apiya; Apiya kunye kikwanitap Asa;
40001008	Asa kunye kikwanitap Yesopat; Yesopat kunye kikwanitap Yoram; Yoram kunye kikwanitap Usiya;
40001009	Usiya kunye kikwanitap Yosam; Yosam kunye kikwanitap Akas, Akas kunye kikwanitap Kesekiya;
40001010	Kesekiya kunye kikwanitap Manase; Manase kunye kikwanitap Amon; Amon kunye kikwanitap Yosiya;
40001011	Yosiya kunye kikwanitap Yekoniya oko mpo mutakwam om pesyosyek cepo yo kicekwere pikap Israel kupa koretap Papulon.
40001012	Nto om letut yu kowo cekwer piko kupa Papulon, kwek Yekoniya kunye kikwanitap Syiltiyel nye kikwanitap Serupapel;
40001013	Serupapel kunye kikwanitap Apiwut; Apiwut kunye kikwanitap Eliyakim; Eliyakim kunye kikwanitap Asor;
40001014	Asor kunye kikwanitap Satok; Satok kunye kikwanitap Akim, Akim kunye kikwanitap Eliut;
40001015	Eliut kunye kikwanitap Eriesa; Eriesa kunye kikwanitap Masan; Masan kunye kikwanitap Yakopo;
40001016	Yakopo kunye kikwanitap Yosep santetap Mariyam, nto Mariyam kunye kametitap Yesu nye cekure Kristo, nye poru Ŋapanet.
40001017	Kunyo kipuntoy pinutek tokol taman ok amwan kuceke Apram okoy Tauti. Kupuntoy yec pinutek taman ok amwan kuceke Tauti okoy ye kicekwere piko kupa Papulon. Kupuntoy yec pinutek taman ok amwan kuceke ye kicekwere piko kupa Papulon okoy ye kiceye Ŋapananato.
40001018	Yunyi wule kiceyito Yesu Kristo. Nteye kimöce Yosep kule amüt Mariyam kametitap Yesu. Nto kutompo kot komütkey, yoto kutok kule koyat Mariyam lekwet om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
40001019	Yosep nye kimöce kule amüt Mariyam kunye ki cito nye kisiken koromun, kunyo kipuryo kot kumöce kule asornen Mariyam, yoto kusyem kule ayaste mamüt nye puryo kot konkete ci tokol.
40001020	Nteye kimite Yosep kusote ŋalecata tokol om moyenyi; kucontyi malayketap Mokoryontet om kirwotik kumwoci kule, “Yosep, keseniyantetap Tauti, mente anyokoritu memüt Mariyam kwek korkeŋuŋ omnye koyat neto lekwet nyepo swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
40001021	Mosukucämnkey werit nye meserut nyi kaynenyi Yesu, omnye mosukusop pikyi tokol om miyotyonikwa.’’
40001022	Kikwiyokis ŋalecu tokol sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kiŋalal Mokoryontet kupunune workoyontet nye kimwoy kule:
40001023	“Mosukukoyakay cepto nye mukul nye menket moron oŋnkuyi wero, mosicekure kaynenyi Emanuel,’’ (nye poru kaynana kule, “Cepontekey acek Yiyintet.’’)
40001024	Ntowo kuŋete Yosep rwonto; kwiy kuyu wule kukumwoci malayketap Mokoryontet. Yoto komüt neto Mariyam kwek korkenyi.
40001025	Ntene nye kipuryo kot kutuyo tukway okoy kucämnkey Mariyam werinyi. Yoto kurut Yosep cekure kaynet Yesu.
40002001	Kiceyici Yesu moŋetap Peselekem om koretap Yuteya ye ki kinko Erote. Yoto kukwane koŋasis piko alake ce muswokikap kokelik okoy kupun Yerusalem,
40002002	oŋnkwokutep kumwoy kule, “Koceyici ono Kinko nyelel nyepo Yutayek? Omnye kucekäs acek kokelyenyi nye kutok om koŋasis, kunyo kacekwa kule kwocesay.’’
40002003	Nteye kotolime Kinko Erote ŋalecato, kumuy kupotpoten wanak oko piko tokol cepo Yerusalem.
40002004	Kukur Erote yoto koruruc tisik cewoyec tokol oko konetikap ntarastinek oŋnkutepe kule, “Mosiceyici ono Kristo nye Ŋapanet?’’
40002005	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Ceyicini moŋetap Peselekem om koretap Yuteya, omnye kisil workoyontet ŋalecu kumwoy kule:
40002006	‘Nyi Peselekem om koretap Yuta, puryo kot yiku nyi miniŋ koromun om kwenutap poytoyikap Yuta, omnye mosukucone poytoyintet wule mite nyi, nye mosukupayta pikwani cepo Israel.’ ’’
40002007	Yoto kukur Erote muswokikap kokelik kukwa oŋnkurwoke wule wuŋat okoy kunket neto topon sawet nye kutoku kokelyet.
40002008	Kuyokto neto picoto kupa Peselekem, oŋnkuyomise kunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Ape waceny lekwet topon, nteye konyoru kwomwowo, saŋet awo mpo ani wasay neto.’’
40002009	Nteyu kowo kulim cek ŋalekap Kinko, kunomen kupa. Nteye kimite kupeti om aran, kukäs kokelyet nyo kiköse cek om koŋasis. Kuntoci kokelyet cekto okoy wokuyoŋe yepo parak om ye kimite lekwet.
40002010	Ntowo kukäs cek kokelyet kuŋerec ŋerekwek ce caŋ.
40002011	Kupa koto orit, yoto kukäs cek lekwet oko kamet Mariyam. Kukutuny oŋnkusay lekwet, oŋnkutyac lolonikwa oŋnkukoci lekwet kokotutek cepo sapunek oko pupaninek oko miranik.
40002012	Kusow Yiyintet cek om kirwotik kumwoci mente kuketitakey kupa wule mite Erote. Yoto kunomen kupa koremwa kupunte aret ake.
40002013	Nto om letut yu kowo kupecikey muswwokik, yoto kucontyi malayketap Mokoryontet Yosep om kirwotik kumwoci kule, “Ŋet näm lekwet oko kamet oŋnkimwey iwo Misiri, oŋnkiwepur wuloto okoy omwowuŋ ani nyi, omnye möce Erote kule aceny lekwet sapakäc kume.’’
40002014	Kuŋet Yosep oŋnkunäm lekwet oko kamet oŋnkunomen komoy kuwo Misiri,
40002015	wule kiwokopur okoy kume Erote. Kikwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kikimwoy Mokoryontet kupunune wule mite workoyontet kumwoy kule: “Kyokur ani werinyu kucone Misiri.’’
40002016	Ntowo kukäs Erote kule kweperpera muswokik, kunyer koromun. Yoto kumwayta cepakäc lekok tokol ce werin kuceke ce ponto kenyisyek oyeny okoy nye koceyi pate om Peselekem oko wule lekite wuloto. Kiyoyeke pesyosyecoto oko pesyosyek co kimwocini muswokik neto kule kicekäs kokelyet.
40002017	Om ŋalecutecu, kuye kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyontet Yeremiya kule:
40002018	“Kicelim polotet om moŋetap Rama, lokik cepo mesyet nyewo, kurire Racel lekokyi, rire neto, oŋnkupuryo kot kumöce kule ciŋereca, omnye kipok tokol.’’
40002019	Nto om letut yu kowo kume Erote, kucontyi malayketap Mokoryontet Yosep om kirwotik om Misiri,
40002020	oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋet näm lekwet oko kamet oŋnkinomen ketitekey koretap Israel, omnye kipok piko co kimöce kule cepakäc lekwet.’’
40002021	Yoto kuŋet Yosep oŋnkunäm lekwet oko kamet oŋnkunomen kuketitakey kuwo koretap Israel.
40002022	Ntowo kulim Yosep kule Arkelaus kunye kiker kwan Erote kwek Kinko nyepo Yuteya, yoto kunyokorit ye mowokumiŋis wuloto. Cetosyi yec cisow neto om kirwotik, yoto kuwo koretap Kalilaya,
40002023	oŋnkuwo kuminy moŋetap Nasaret sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kikiŋalale workoyik kumwoy kule: “Mosicekure neto citap Nasaretin.’’
40003001	Kuco Yowana potisonintet om pesyosyecoto oŋnkucec kumwaytat Lokoywek om kiteletap Yuteya kumwoy kule,
40003002	“Arenynkey, ayaste miyotyonikwok omnye kacontyok akwek poytoyisyetap torot!’’
40003003	Yowana kunye neto nyo kiŋolole workoyontet Isaya yo kimwowu kule: “Kapole citake kitela, oyiytoci Mokoryontet arenyi, asat kurotakay arenyi nye mosukupunte!’’
40003004	Kiloce Yowana yoto siret nye samput nye kicenape kororikap tyonyntake nye cekure nkamiyet oŋnkurate anwet suwenyi, kunyo kikwome talamik oko kumnyatetap samiyita.
40003005	Yoto kukwane piko Yerusalem oko ce kikwone koretap Yuteya tokol, oko ce kikwone koret nye lekite tapantap oyinetap Yortan.
40003006	Kurenynkey cek kuŋoŋ miyotyonikwa oŋnkupatisan Yowana cekto om oyinetap Yortan.
40003007	Ntowo kukäs Yowana Farasayek oko Satusayek ce caŋ ce kimite kukwoni wule mite neto kule cepatisanec, Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Akwek Erenocu! Ŋo nye kwesowok kule omweye nyerunotetap Yiyintet nye karik kuco?
40003008	Kunyo ayiy tukuk ce poru kule kwarenynkey akwek ayaste miyotyonikwok.
40003009	Ntene monte cisot omwowu kule, Ceponte Apram nye kukonyo! Omnye komwowok ani kule, muce Yiyintet kunäm rwontocu oŋnkuwec kwici Apram lekok.
40003010	Kunyo kocenömnci yawut oywet kulekite kirintonokap ketik, nto ket ake tokol nye puryo kot kwiye omik ce toponec, mosiceyep nyo kulul oŋnkyewirci mata orit.
40003011	Opotisonenok ani yawut peko kwek pelutyet nye poru kule kwarenynkey. Ntene coni om letumwani citake nye ponto swamet kupëlo nye puryo oyiku topon kot ayem anämate kweyonikyi. Neto nyoto kunye mosukupatisanenak Muyet Nyetilil oko mata.
40003012	Pontonu neto sweswenyi nye kanäme yewut nye mokusese nkanuk oŋnkururukyi cokenikyi, oŋnkupele wulo po moriryek mata nye momise.’’
40003013	Kunomene Yesu Kalilaya om pesyosyecoto kuwo okoy oyinetap Yortan kule kupatisana Yowana.
40003014	Ntene kusyem Yowana kule akerekte neto kumwoy kule, “Omöce ani kule patisana ani nyi, kunyi ye coni nyi yec wuli omite ani?’’
40003015	Ntene kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Yaste yawut kwiyokis kuyunyitenyi, omnye om aret nye yunyitenyi ye mosiciy acek ciyitite ŋalek tokol ce möce Yiyintet.’’ Yoto kucäm Yowana.
40003016	Yoto pakenke yu kowo cepatisan Yesu, kuloŋune peko orit. Kuyatakay wulin po torot kukäs neto Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nye kerkey oko swarar oko lakweyet nye kico kurekyi cokopure neto.
40003017	Kucone kutit torot kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani camanet, nye oŋerekyini ani koromun.’’
40004001	Kuntoci yoto Muyet Nyetilil Yesu kukwer okoy kitela, sokuwo wokusyem kulot Setani nyewo nyepo oyik neto.
40004002	Nteyu kowo kuwany Yesu pesyosyek artam cepo pet oko pesyosyek artam cepo komoy nye puryo kot kwomisyi, yoto kwam neto rupet.
40004003	Kuco Setaninato wule mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye yiku Weritap Yiyintet, mwoci panyi rwontocu kuweckey kwek mukatya?’’
40004004	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Puryo kot kusope cito mukatya pate nkit, ntene sope ŋolyo tokol nye cone kutitap Yiyintet.’ ’’
40004005	Yoto kukwer Setaninato Yesu okoy kupunto moŋet nyetilil, oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe kusurut nye koy nyepo kotap Yiyintet.
40004006	Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet, wirtekey panyi yu okoy wepir ŋony; omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: ‘Mosukumwoci Yiyintet malaykanikyi kukwa kwokutaciŋ nyi, mosukwokunämiŋ kutaceniŋ yewuniyekwa, sukuŋet mente kot kuryac rwontok kerenkokuk.’ ’’
40004007	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ntene mwowu mpo yec silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mente kot asyem lotu Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ.’ ’’
40004008	Yoto kukwer Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, Yesu okoy tulwet nye koy koromun, oŋnkuporci koret tokol kumukul oko woyinwek tokol ce ponto.
40004009	Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mosokoniŋ ani nyi tukucutecu tokol ye kekutumwo ani oŋnkisaya.’’
40004010	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Wete yu nyi Setani! Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Soye Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ oŋnkiyici yisyet neto nkit pate!’ ’’
40004011	Yoto kunomen Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, kukwa malaykanik kwokukalya Yesu.
40004012	Ntowo kulim Yesu kule kucenäm Yowana oŋnkyekerta mopusi, yoto kunomen kuwo okoy Kalilaya.
40004013	Kipuryo kot kuminy Nasaret ntene kuwo wokuminy moŋetap Kapernaum nye mite tapantap tampayayet nyepo Kalilaya om koretap Sapulon oko nyepo Naftali.
40004014	Kiyokis kuyunyoto sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kikimwoy workoyontet Isaya kule:
40004015	“Om koretap Sapulon oko koretap Naftali, om koret nye tokyinikey ruretyet, om oyinetap Yortan pitonin, Kalilaya nye koretap lamek!
40004016	Piko ce minye wule mite menonet, Kukäs cekto kukweny lakweyet nyewo! oko piko ce minye koret nyepo menonetap met, kokoluci cekto lakweyet!’’
40004017	Kuceke pesyonoto kucec Yesu kumwaytat lokoywekyi kumwoy kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok! Omnye kacontyok akwek poytoyisyetap torot!’’
40004018	Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kurupe tampayayetap Kalilaya tapan; yoto kukäs piko oyeny ce tupco ce kinömikap purpurunek, coto ku mpo Simon (nye kimulyi cekure kaynet ake Petero) oko mutakwam Antereya ce kimite kuwircini porok tampayayet orit kunöme purpurunek.
40004019	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwa anama cepetekey oko ani, mosanetak oyiku nömik ce okweru piko.’’
40004020	Pakenke kupakakta cek porokwa cepo purpurunek oŋnkunam kupetakey Yesu.
40004021	Kutosyikey Yesu kuwo tay kuminiŋ, kukäs yec piko alak oyeny ce tupco, coto ku mpo Yakopo oko Yowana werikap Sepetayo. Kimite cek kukepur rapemwa orit kupontokey oko kwan Sepetayo. Kimite yoto kuyiytoy kusate porokwa cepo purpurunek. Kukur Yesu cekto.
40004022	Yoto pakenke kupakakta rapet oko kwan oŋnkunomen kunam kupetakey Yesu.
40004023	Kuwo Yesu kupunte koretap Kalilaya tokol kunetisyoti om korikapkokwonikwa, oŋnkumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkusop piko tokol ce kimnyontos porwonik wok tokol.
40004024	Kutisto ŋalek ce nöme neto kupunte koretap Siriya tokol, yoto kukwer piko pikwa ce kitaŋany ce kiponto oyik ce miyotec oko ce kipoku mewuŋ, oko kipok porwonik. Kusop Yesu picoto tokol.
40004025	Kupa kunamat luket nyewo nyepo piko ce caŋ Yesu, ce kikwone Tekapoli (moŋosyek taman) oko ce kikwone Yerusalem oko Yuteya oko ce kikwone koretap oyinetap Yortan pitonin.
40005001	Ntowo kukäs Yesu luket nyepo piko ce caŋ, kulaŋnta kuwo tulwet parak oŋnkupur ŋony. Kukwa konomikyi koruruckey komut neto.
40005002	Kucec Yesu kunet piko kumwoci kule:
40005003	“Ponto kupeyoy piko ce nkete kule ce möce koromun swametap Yiyintet om mukuleywekwa, omnye nyimwa poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
40005004	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co rirtos kumesyi, omnye mosukuŋerec Yiyintet cekto!
40005005	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co toloyec, omnye mosukunyor tukuk co kikurto Yiyintet!
40005006	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co möce kule kwiyokis tukuk ce möce Yiyintet, omnye mosicipiyony cek kupiyoŋis!
40005007	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co porcini piko alak tolosyet, omnye mosukukoci Yiyintet kunyor cekto tolosyet!
40005008	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co tililec mukuleywekwa, omnye mosukukäs cek Yiyintet!
40005009	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co yiyisyi kusut kalyet om wule mite piko, omnye mosukukure Yiyintet cekto lekokyi!
40005010	“Ponto kupeyoy piko co kicitaŋany kunyalil omnye yiye ŋalek ce möce Yiyintet, omnye nyimwa poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
40005011	“Oponte akwek kupeyoy ye kocupok piko oŋnkutaŋanyak kumwowok ŋalek tokol ce miyotec omnye oyiku akwek konomikwani.
40005012	Aŋerec oŋnkopoypoyitu koromun, omnye cemosi koromun musyaremwoŋ nye kicekonorwok om wulin po torot. Omnye kikutaŋany cek workoyik kuyunyitenyi kutompo kot otoku akwek.
40005013	“Oyiku akwek misyontet nyepo koret. Ntene ye komo kunomu misyontet kupuryo aret ake yec nye cewece kot kunom. Komo kuponto nyo latik, kunyo ciswortoy pate kutyikta piko.
40005014	“Akerkeyekey akwek lakweyet nyepo koret. Puryo kot kuwuŋotos moŋet nye kicetec tulwet parak.
40005015	Puryo ci nye pele tarit oŋnkukupuye pesenit, ntene tore kito nye yoŋe tarit sukuŋet kukweny lakweyet piko tokol ce mite koto orit.
40005016	Kuyunyoto misyini kukweny lakweyet nyimwakwek piko tokol, sukuŋet kukäs cekto tukuk ce toponec ce oyiye akwek, sukukasta Papamwoŋ nye mite torot.
40005017	“Monte cisot kule kyaco ani kule cawirte ntarastinekap Moses oko ŋalekap workoyik. Puryo kot aco kule cawirte, ntene kyaco kule saŋet ayitite awaŋnte ŋalecato.
40005018	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye tokumite kuyoŋot koret wulin po torot oko koret wuli po ŋony, kupuryo kot kupote nyukutet mpo akenke nto mpo kot kupot ntarastit ake tokol nye miniŋ om ntarastinek okoy kwiyokis tukuk tokol ce cemöce kule kwiyokis.
40005019	Kunyo ci ake tokol nye yirye ntarastit mpo akenke pate nye miniŋ, oŋnkunet mpo piko alak kwiy kuyunyoto kunye cito nyoto nye mosukwek nye miniŋ om poytoyisyetap torot. Ntene ci ake tokol nye keywey kwiyisye ntarastinek oŋnkunet piko alak kwiy kuyunyoto, kunye cito nyoto nye mosukwek nyewo koromun om poytoyisyetap torot.
40005020	Kunyo komwowok ani kule, ye puryo kot oyiye akwek topon yisyonutekap Yiyintet kupël Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek, kupuryo kot owuti mpo kisic poytoyisyetap torot.
40005021	“Kyolim akwek kule kicemwoci pikap keny kule, ‘Monte ceporisye, nto ci ake tokol nye koporis cekweru nyoto kuco taytap ketintet.’
40005022	Kunyo omwowok ani akwek yawut kule, ‘Ci ake tokol nye konyerci mutakwam, mosicekwer nyoto kuco taytap ketintet.’ Nto ci ake tokol nye kocup mutakwam kumwoci kule, ‘Puryo nyi wol.’ Kumisyini cekwer cito nyoto kuco taytap Kokwet nyewo. Nto ci ake tokol nye kokur mutakwam kule, ‘Solwo nyi.’ Kuweti cito nyoto wule mite mata nye momise.
40005023	Kunyo ye karik koyite nyi kokotutyet nye kekoci Yiyintet om yepo otepto nye pele korosek, oŋnkisot om yoto kule ponteniŋ mutokwomet ŋolyo,
40005024	Kumisyini pokokyi kokotutyet yoto po taytap otepto nye pele korosek, oŋnkiwo lakwar wesat ŋalek ocömnyekey oko mutokwomet, nteye kewany weckey cekoyite kokotutyeŋuŋ nye kekoci Yiyintet.
40005025	“Nteye kowosontyiŋ citake kukweriŋ koti, kumöce kule asat ŋalek ocömnyekey lakwar oko cicoto ye tomite opeti om aran kutompo kot opunte koti, sukuŋet mente kot kukweriŋ okoy taytap ketintet, kuŋet nyo kukoytiŋ iwo wule sikorintet kukweriŋ nyo iwo mopusi.
40005026	Komwowuŋ kule, puryo kot muci nyi kot cone mopusi okoy ye kekonu pesyantet nyepo letut nyepo pesento.
40005027	“Kyolim akwek kule kicemwoy kule, ‘Mente asakwayan.’
40005028	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek yawut kule ‘Ci ake tokol nye kakäs korko oŋnkuocorokyi kule nto kwek nyenyu, kakwiy cicoto sakwayanat oko korkonoto om mukuleynyi.’
40005029	Kunyo ye koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nyepo tay kunye sokyiŋ nyi kot yiy miyotyet, lotu kulot! Oŋnkiwirte. Omnye topon om wule mite nyi ye kepot kereryantet ake nyepo porŋuŋ kusir ye kocewirci porto nyeŋuŋ tokoe wule mite mata nye momise.
40005030	Nteye yewut nye nyepo let nye sokyiŋ nyi kot yiy miyotyet; yepte kuŋet! Oŋnkiwirte! Omnye topon om wule mite nyi ye kepot kereryantet ake nyepo porŋuŋ kusir ye kotoweti porto nyeŋuŋ tokol wule mite mata nye momise.
40005031	“Kicemwoy yec mpo kule, ‘Ci ake tokol nye kakwet korkenyi, kumisyini kusilyi parwet nye kwete.’
40005032	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek yawut kule, ‘Ye kakwet cito korkenyi, tos pate om ŋalekap sakwayanatet, kuponto cicoto lelisto nye kosutyi korkonoto kusakwayan.’ Nto cito nye kemüt korkonoto kakwiy cicoto sakwayanat.
40005033	“Kyolim akwek mpo yec kule, kicemwoci pikap keny kule, ‘Puryo kot kumisyini oyirye kawalatet nye kowalkey, ntene misyini oyiye oyititoy kawalemwoŋ om taytap Mokoryontet.’
40005034	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek yawut kule, Monte ciwolikey kawalat nyepo ŋolyo ake tokol. Monte ciwoli wulin po torot, omnye ŋeceretap Yiyintet wuloto.
40005035	Monte mpo ciwolyinikey koret wuli po ŋony, omnye muŋe kerenkokyi wuloto. Nto monte mpo ciwolyinikey Yerusalem, omnye moŋetap Kinko nyewo wuloto,
40005036	Mente owolyikey mpo metiŋuŋ, omnye puryo kot muci nyi kot wec putyonteŋuŋ mpo akenke kulelit nto kutuyit.
40005037	Möce omwowu pate kule, ‘Yunyoto.’ Nto komwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot kuyunyo.’ Omnye ŋolyo ake tokol nye komwowu kukeyte cutecu kucone nyo wule mite oyinoto nye miyat.
40005038	“Kyolim akwek kule kicemwoy kule, ‘Koŋ oko koŋ, kelya oko kelya.’
40005039	Ntene komwowok ani akwek yawut kule, ‘Monte ceyokukey om wule mite citake nye kokwiwok ŋalek ce miyotec. Ye kasyeciŋ citake kwarmatut nyepo tay, wekyi kusyec mpo nyepo let.
40005040	Nteye kokweriŋ citake wokuwosontyiŋ om satiŋuŋ, yaste kusut mpo kotit.
40005041	Nteye kokerciŋ koŋ citake kule tor terekokyi kilomitet akenke, tosyikey sut wany kilomitet akenke yec.
40005042	Ye kosomiŋ citake kitake kumöce kule koci cicoto kiyoto. Nteye kepeseniŋ citake kitake kumöce kule pesentyi cicoto kiyoto.’
40005043	“Kyolim akwek kule kicemwoy kule, ‘Misyini cäm latyeŋuŋ, oŋnkisenker punikuk.’
40005044	Ntene komwowok ani akwek yawut kule, acäm punikwok, oŋnkosomnci piko co toŋonyok,
40005045	sukuŋet oyiku akwek lekokap Papamwoŋ nye mite torot. Omnye neto nye konu asisnyi kuluci piko ce miyotec oko piko ce toponec kukerkeyitu tokol, oŋnkukoci ropta piko ce yiye ce toponec oko piko ce yiye ce miyotec.
40005046	Nteye kacäm akwek pate piko co cömok akwek, asot kule mocenyoru kokotut ne? Omnye yiye mpecek korurukikap mosoret kuyunyoto!
40005047	Nteye koŋololyi akwek pate coronutekwok, kukayiy kiy ne nye pciyat nye puryo kot kupo kwak? Omnye yiye mpecek piko co puryo kot kucöme Yiyintet kuyunyoto!
40005048	Misyini oyiku pic ce tililec kuyu wulo tilil Papamwoŋ nye mite torot!
40006001	“Oripkey monte oyiye yisyet nyepo tinimwoŋ om taytap piko kule sukuŋet kukäs piko kito nye oyiye akwek. Ye kayiy tukucutecu kuköse piko, kupuryo kot cimuce cekonok kokotutyet nye cone wule mite Papamwoŋ nye mite torot.
40006002	“Kunyo ye kekoci cito nye panan kiy nye kekalya, mente osilkey okurte om taytap piko kuyu wulo yiytoy koperperotik co silekey om korikapkok oko wulo po orustunwek. Yiye cekto kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet kuyweyec piko. Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kunyor picoto musyaremwa nye yeme.
40006003	Nteye mite nyi kocini pononik tukuk ce kekalye, möce rip mekany kot kukäs yewuŋuŋ nyepo let kito nye yiye yewuŋuŋ nyepo tay.
40006004	Sukuŋet Papaŋuŋ nyo köse tukuk ce wuŋotin kukoniŋ nyi musyaret.
40006005	“Nteye mite nyi some, mente akerkeyitu oko kaperperotik co silekey! Co möce kule ciyoŋntosi om korikapkok oko sokwonutek kule sukuŋet kukäsec piko tokol. Komwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule! Kunyor picoto musyaremwa nye yeme.
40006006	Ntene ye mite some, möce iwut koŋuŋ orit oŋnkiker kurket, oŋnkisom Papaŋuŋ nye mite wule wuŋat; sukuŋet Papaŋuŋ nye köse tukuk ce wuŋotin ce yiye nyi kukoniŋ musyaret.
40006007	“Nteye osome monte aluplupan oyiyisye ŋalek ce caŋ kuyu piko co menkete Yiyintet, ce sote kule mokulimnci Yiyintet cek om sayet nyepo ŋalek ce caŋ.
40006008	Monte cekerkeyitu oko pico. Omnye nkete Papamwoŋ tukuk ce omoce kutompo kot osom akwek neto.
40006009	Möce osome kuyunyi kule: ‘Papa nyo nye mite torot, kante ciywey kutililit kayneŋuŋ,
40006010	Kante kuco poytoyisyeŋuŋ, kante kwiyokis ce möce nyi om koret kuyu wule kyiytoy om torot.
40006011	Konec omikyo cepo okokoy,
40006012	Kalyec leliswekyacek, kuyu wulo cikolyoy co lele om wule ce mite acek.
40006013	Mente aroyenec wule mite syemutok, ntene sorunenec wule mite miyotyet.’
40006014	Omnye ye kokalye akwek piko alak leliswek ce kukwiwok, mosukukalyak mpo akwek Papamwoŋ nye mite torot.
40006015	Ntene ye puryo kot omuci kot akalye piko alak leliswek ce kukwiwok akwek, mpo Papa nye mite torot kupuryo kot komuce kot kukalyak mpo akwek leliswek ce kwayiy.
40006016	“Nteye omite akwek okire omik, monte cesimiyitu kuyu wule yiytoy kaperperotik, omnye sirinye cek tokoywekwa kusoŋutitu kule sukuŋet kuporkey kutok kule mite cekto kukire omik. Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kunyor picoto musyaremwa.
40006017	Ntene ye mite nyi ikire omik, möce wun metiŋuŋ oŋnkiyile mwayta,
40006018	sukuŋet mente kot kuporkey kutok om wule mite piko kule mite nyi ikire omik, ntene konkete pate Papaŋuŋ nyo köse tukuk ce wuŋotin ce yiye nyi oŋnkukoniŋ musyaret.
40006019	“Monte cekonore mokoryontinek wuli po koret ŋony, wule muce kurwotyeci oŋnkwam solopik, oŋnkuput kucor corik.
40006020	Akonore Mokoryontinekwok wulin po torot wule memuce kot kurwotyeci nto mpo kot kwam solopik, wule memuce kot kuput oŋnkucor corik.
40006021	Omnye wule mitowune mokoryontinekwok ku wuloto wule mitowune mukuleywekwok.
40006022	“Koŋnta kunye tarit nyepo porto. Ye toponec konyek cekuk kuköstoy topon, kuponto porto nyeŋuŋ tokol lakweyet.
40006023	Ntene ye puryo kot kuköstoy topon konyek cekuk, kuponto porto nyeŋuŋ tokol menonet. Kunyo ye kaweckey lakweyinto nyo mitowune wule mite nyi kwek menonet, kutuyitu menonet nyoto koromun!
40006024	“Puryo ci nye muce kot kwek mutworintet nyepo mokorenik oyeny. Omnye muce kusenker ake oŋnkucäm ake, nto muce kuywey ake oŋnkunyil ake. Puryo kot omuci akwek kot oyici yisyet Yiyintet oko mokoryontit nyepo tukuk cepo koret.
40006025	“Yunyoto omne saŋet omwowok ani akwek kule, monte cisot tukuk ce nömok akwek, kuyu omik ce moyam sosopce, nto ce nöme sirok cepo porwonikwok kule mosicilac ne. Puryo kot kupële ne soponto omik? Puryo kot kuponto ne porto latik kupël sirok?
40006026	Akäs pa akwek toritek co terertoy, puryo kot kukolsyi oŋnkupuryo kot kukisisyi, nto korurukyi mpo omit coken, ntene oŋnkupoye Papamwoŋ cekto. Kunyo puryo kot oponte akwek ne latik kupël toritek?
40006027	Ŋo om akwek nye ye komuy oŋnkusot koromun ce nöme sopon nyi, nye muce kot kutosyi kucaŋit kenyisyek alak cepo soponto?
40006028	“Kunyo omne sasoti akwek ce nöme sirok? Akäs pa wule pititoy taptok om koret, puryo kot kwiyisyi cekto, oŋnkupuryo kot kunope sirok.
40006029	Ntene komwowok ani akwek kule, nka mpo Solomon om woyintap mokoryontit nye kiponto, kipuryo kot kulocekey neto topon kuyu akenke om taptocu.
40006030	Kunyo nteye muce Yiyintet kot kulac suswek ce mite koret pesyoni nto mite tun cewirci mata kuloy, ku aret ce tya nyun ce muce Yiyintet kulacak akwek! Oyiku akwek pic ce ponto koyenot nye miniŋ pate!
40006031	“Kunyo monte cec cisot omwowu kule, ‘Mosikyam ne acek?’ Nto kule ‘Mosicilac ne acek?’
40006032	Omnye möce mpo piko alake co monket Yiyintet tukucutecu tokol. Nkete Papamwoŋ nye mite torot kule omöce akwek tukucutecu tokol.
40006033	Onyosye onyoru kunyo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko toponiyenyi sukuŋet cetoswok akwek tukucutecu.
40006034	Kunyo monte cisot ŋalek cepo pesyetap tun, omnye pesyet nyepo tun oko ŋalek ceci nkit. Ponto pesyet ake tokol wuyinwek ceyemekey oko pesyonoto.
40007001	“Monte cemutyi piko alak musanku, sukuŋet mente kot kumütwok Yiyintet akwek koyin musanku.
40007002	Omnye mosukumutwok Yiyintet akwek musankut kuyu wulo omutyini akwek piko alak. Mosukwiyisye neto ntarastinek co oyiyisye akwek ye omutyini piko alak musankut
40007003	Kunyo omne seköse nyi pertet nye kisic nye mite koŋnta nyepo yeyaŋuŋ, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot muci käs musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nkit?
40007004	Nto muci nyi kulene mwoci yeyaŋuŋ kule, ‘Yeya, kany onumuŋ ani pertet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ oŋnkurok ponte nyi yec musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nkite?’
40007005	Ye koperperintoni! Nyosye numu kunyo musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ!
40007006	“Monte cikoci ŋokik tukuk ce tililec, mosukuwekyokey kwamak. Monte cewirci karin nye piciy taytap nkururwenik, omnye mosukutyikta ŋony pate.
40007007	“Osom mosicekonok akwek, aceny mosonyoru, okonynkony kurket mosiceyotwok.
40007008	Omnye ci ake tokol nye kosom, mosicikoci, nto ci ake tokol nye kaceny, mosukunyor, nto ci ake tokol nye kekonynkony, mosiceyotyi kurket,
40007009	Ŋo om akwek nye muci kukoci lekwenyi rwantet ye kosom mukatyantet?
40007010	Nto kukoci erenet ye kosom purpuryontet?
40007011	Kunyo nteye oŋnket akwek piko cu oyiku miyotec okoci lekokwok tukuk ce toponec, ku aret ce tya nyun ce muce kukoci Papa nyepo torot tukuk ce toponec piko co kosom cekto neto!
40007012	“Kunyo möce oyici piko alak tukuk ce toponec kuyu wulo omoktoy akwek kule ntoyiwok akwek cekto, omnye poru coto wule yunto ntarastinekap Moses oko cepo workoyik.
40007013	“Ape akwek owut orit opunte kurket nye maric, omnye para kurket oŋnkukoy nye para aret nye weti wule mite mata nye momise. Kunyo punte piko ce caŋ aret nyoto.
40007014	Ntene maric oŋnkulow oŋnkuwuy aret nye weti wule mite soponto, oŋnkuŋeri pate piko ce mokunyor aranato.
40007015	“Oripkey wule mite workoyik co mwiynot, cekwoni wule omite akwek kuyu kecirek om porto wulo po saŋ, ntene om orit kuce suyik co orontoy.
40007016	Mosonkete akwek cekto kupuswek cepo yisyet nye yiye. Muce pa kupute piko mokoyek ketik ce ponto kotok?
40007017	Yiye ketit nye topon omik ce toponec, kwiye ketit nye miyat omik ce miyotec.
40007018	Puryo kot komuce ketit nye topon kot kwiy omik ce miyotec, oŋnkupuryo kot komuce ketit nye miyat kot kwiy omik ce toponec.
40007019	Ket ake tokol nye puryo kot kwiye omik ce toponec, ceyepe nyo kulul oŋnkyewirci mata orit.
40007020	Kunyo mosonkete akwek workoyik ce mwiynot yisyet nye yiye.
40007021	“Puryo kot ku ci ake tokol nyo kuro ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet, Mokoryontet’ nye mosukowut poytoyisyetap torot, ntene nyo yiye pate ŋalek ce möce Papamwani nye mite torot.
40007022	Ye kopunto pesyonoto, mosukumwowo ani piko ce caŋ kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kicemwayte acek lokoywekap Yiyintet om kayneŋuŋ, cekwet oyik ce caŋ, oŋnkyiy tukuk cepo kakitat om kayneŋuŋ!’
40007023	Mosomwoci ani picoto kule, ‘Puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek! Aŋete taymwani cu oyiye ŋalek ce miyotec!’
40007024	“Kunyo ci ake tokol nye kalim ŋalekwani cutecu oŋnkurup kuywey, kukerkey nyo oko ci nye ŋom nye katec konyi kupolyi kuwo ŋony topon.
40007025	Kuropen ropta, kuyin mokotek oŋnkuwus yomet kuryac koyoto, ntene puryo kot kulul omnye kicetec cepolyi kuwo ŋony topon.
40007026	Nto ci ake tokol nye kalim ŋalekwani cutecu oŋnkupuryo kot kurup kuywey, kukerkey nyo oko ci nye perper nye katec konyi yepo ntapca oŋnkupuryo kot kupolyi kuwo ŋony topon.
40007027	Kuropen ropta, kuyin mokotek oŋnkuwus yomet kuryac koyoto kulul, kulul koyoto lulot nyewo koromun!’’
40007028	Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecutecu okoy kuwany, kokite luket nyepo piko ŋalek ce kinet neto.
40007029	Kinet Yesu cekto kuyu ci nye ponto kamukeywek nye puryo kot kukerkey oko konetikwa cepo ntarastinek.
40008001	Nteyu kowo kurekune Yesu tulwet, kurup luket nyepo piko ce caŋ neto.
40008002	Yoto kuco citake nye kiponto mutyenkenik okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkukutuny oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, ye kecäm nyi nkit muci sopo ani.’’
40008003	Koyito Yesu yewunyi oŋnkunäm cicoto oŋnkumwoy kule, “Omöce ani, kunyo sop nyi nyolu!’’ Yoto pakenke kusopco mutyenkenik ce kiponto cicoto.
40008004	Kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cicoto kule, “Lim pa, mente womwoci citake tokol, ntene iwo pakenke lakwar wule mite tisintet oŋnkikany kukäsiŋ, nteye kewany koyite korosyontet nyo kimwoy Moses sukuŋet porci ci ake tokol kule kwesop nyi.’’
40008005	Ntowo kupunto Yesu Kapernaum, yoto kutuye nyewo nyepo sikarekap Romek neto, kuco yepo tay oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule,
40008006	“Mokoryontet, mite mutworintemwani nye koru kwiriri om komwani nye puryo kot kuŋete, nye kasat koromun.’’
40008007	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Mosowo ani wosop kusop.’’
40008008	Ntene kuwekyi nyewo nyepo sikarek kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot kuyunyo, omnye oyiku ani ci nye puryo kot kumisyiniŋ nyi ico komwani, ntene mwowu pate ŋolyo mosukusop mutworintemwani.
40008009	Omnye oyiku mpo ani ci nye cepoyto, oŋnkoponte sikarek ce opytoy, omwocini ake kule, ‘Iwo’ kuwo, nto ake omwoci kule, ‘Co’ kuco, nto mutworintemwani omwoci nyo kule, ‘Yiy kiyi’ Kwiy kuyunyoto.’’
40008010	Nteyu kowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato kokite koromun oŋnkumwoci piko ce kirupe neto kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, nka mpo om Israel tokol kumukul, tompo kot anyoru ani ci nye ponto koyenot nyewo nye yunyi.
40008011	Komwowok yec kule, mosukukwane piko ce caŋ koŋasis oko raraktay ce mosukwokopure yepo meset wanak oko Apram oko Isaka oko Yakopo om poytoyisyetap torot.
40008012	Ntene oŋnkyewirta piko co kiceyito poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kupa saŋ wule mite menonet wule mowokurirye oŋnkunyiy kelekwa.’’
40008013	Kumwoci Yesu nyewo nyepo sikarek kule, “Nomen iwo kaŋuŋ, mosukwiyokis om wule mite nyi kuyu wulo keyen nyi nkit.’’ Yoto pakenke kusop mutworintetap nyewo nyepo sikarek.
40008014	Kuwo Yesu okoy kotap Petero, wokunyor cepyosyetap pikoy nyepo Petero kumite kukoru kumnyone yeset.
40008015	Kunäm Yesu yewutap let nyepo cepyosyanato, yoto kusop yeset, kuŋet kuyo oŋnkucec kwici cek omik.
40008016	Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, cekwer piko ce caŋ ce kiponto oyik ce miyotec kukwa wule mite Yesu. Kukwetyi Yesu picoto oyik ce miyotec kwiyisye ŋolyontenyi oŋnkusop piko tokol ce kimnyontos.
40008017	Kikwiy kuyunyitenyi sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kikimwoy workoyontet Isaya kule, “Neto nkit nye kinum kusut tonkusyonokyacek oŋnkukesen porwonikyacek.’’
40008018	Yoto kukäs Yesu luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kimite kemut neto, kumwayta kule cipe kyay tampayayet pitonin.
40008019	Kuco konetintet ake nyepo ntarastinek ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Konetintet, mosanamatiŋ ani cepetekey oko nyi om wulyo tokol wule kewo.’’
40008020	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ponto mokoyitinek mwenonik, kuponto toritek korik, ntene puryo kot kuponto Weritap cito wule mokowute metinyi.’’
40008021	Kumwoci citake nye kikonomintet Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, kany awo ani kunyo wamuy Papanyu.’’
40008022	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Nama ani nyi cepetekey tukway, yaste muswek kumuy muswekwa nkit.’’
40008023	Kulany Yesu rapet oŋnkupetakey konomikyi.
40008024	Yoto pakenke kuwus yomet nyewo koromun om tampayayet okoy kumac kolum peko rapet. Ntene kimite yoto Yesu kukoru.
40008025	Kupa cek ye kimite Yesu oŋnkuŋet kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, sorwec kocemis!’’
40008026	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Omne somuye kuyunyi? Oponte akwek koyenot nye kisic!’’ Kuŋet Yesu kuyo oŋnkupolyi yomet oko tampayayet, yoto kusis yomet oko tampayayet tokol.
40008027	Kokite ci tokol om cek oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ci ne cito nyi? Omnye limncini yomet neto oko pekap tampayayet!’’
40008028	Kuco Yesu kwoy tampayayet pitoni okoy koretap Kerasenik. Yoto kutuye piko oyenku Yesu ce kikwone kepenonik wule cemucini piko. Kiponto picoto oyik oŋnkinyekerec koromun, nye kipuryo ci mpo akenke nye kimuce kot kupunte aranato.
40008029	Yoto pakenke kupol picoto kumwoy kule, “Weritap Yiyintet, mokenec ne acek nyi? Keco nyi so kule cataŋanyec acek kutompo kot kupunto pesyet nyo kicekwey?’’
40008030	Kimite ye kilekite yoto kimite cek yeceytap nkururwenik ce caŋ ce kimite kwokete.
40008031	Kusom oyik kumwoci Yesu kule, “Ye kekwetec acek nyi, kwetec cipe wociwut yeceytap nkururwenik cut!’’
40008032	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ape.’’ Yoto kuŋetyo oyik kupa wokowut nkururwenik. Kurway kumwey yeceyta tokol nyepo nkururwenik okoy wokoŋirte lakam wokosuci tampayayet kupakäc peko tokol.
40008033	Yoto kumwey mesewek ce kyokoy nkururwenik okoy kupunto moŋet oŋnkupa wokumwaytat ŋalek tokol ce kokwiyokis om wule mite piko co kiponto oyik.
40008034	Yoto kuwo ci ake tokol nyepo moŋonoto wokukäs Yesu. Nteyu kowo kukäs, kusom cekto Yesu kuŋet kuwete koremwa.
40009001	Kulany Yesu rapet kuketitakey kway tampayayet okoy kuponto moŋenyi.
40009002	Kusutune piko alake kwiririt cito nye kipok kerenkok kuco wule mite Yesu. Ntowo kukäs neto koyenet nyewo nye kiponto picoto, kumwoci cito nye kipok kerenkok kule, “Werunyu titir! Kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk.’’
40009003	Yoto kaŋalal konetikap ntarastinek alake kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋolole cici ŋal ce nyile Yiyintet!’’
40009004	Kunket Yesu ŋalek ce kisote cek oŋnkumwoci kule, “Omne sasoti akwek ŋalek ce miyotec ceyuco om mukuleywekwok?
40009005	Oŋnkono nye lekit, cemwoy kule, ‘Kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk.’ Nto ye kocemwoy kule, ‘Ŋet wesetote’?
40009006	Kunyo mosoporwok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ponto Weritap cito kamukeywek kukalya miyotyonik om koret.’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu cicoto kipok kerenkok kule, “Ŋete ŋony, oŋnkitor kwiririŋuŋ nomen iwo ka!’’
40009007	Kuŋet cicoto kuyo oŋnkunomen kuwo ka.
40009008	Ntowo kukäs piko tokol ŋalecato, kumuyo cek oŋnkukasta Yiyintet nye kwekoci piko kamukeywek ceyucutecu.
40009009	Kunomene Yesu yoto, nteye kimite kuweti kukäs neto korurunkintetap mosoret nye cekure kaynenyi Matayo nye kimite kukepur konyi nye cekweye mosoret. Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Nama cepetekey oko ani.’’ Kuŋet Matayo oŋnkunomen kunam kupetakey Yesu.
40009010	Nteye kimite Yesu kwomisyi om kotap Matayo, yoto kukwa korurukikap mosoret ce caŋ oko piko co kicetay, kwokopur ŋony wanak oko neto oko konomikyi om yepo meset.
40009011	Kukäs Farasayek yoto ŋalecato, kumwoci cek konomikap Yesu kule, “Omne sukwomis konetintemwoŋ oko pic ce korurukot cepo mosoro oko pic ce kicetay?’’
40009012	Kulim Yesu ŋalek ce kimwowu cekto, kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot kumöce piko ce sopcotin cepsakityantet, ntene piko ce mnyontos pate ce möce.
40009013	Ntene ape wakäs poru ne silutyetap Yiyintet nyi mwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot omöce ani korosekap tyoŋik, ntene omöce poypoyet pate.’ Omnye kipuryo kot aco kule cokur kurenynkey piko co toponec, ntene kyaco kule sukuŋet kurenynkey piko co ponto miyotyonik.’’
40009014	Yoto kukwa konomikap Yowana wule mite Yesu oŋnkwokutep kumwoy kule, “Omne sicekire acek oko Farasayek omik om pesyosyek alak, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kukire omik mpo kisic konomikukyi?’’
40009015	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Osoti akwek kule muce kunerekis toyek ce coronutekap cito nyo kemütisyi ye tokupontokey cek cito nyo kemütisyi? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ntene mosukupunto pesyosyek ce mosicinumune cekto cito nyo kemütisyi, yoto ye mosukukir cekto omik.
40009016	“Puryo ci nye muce kunäm yokwontetap siret nyelel oŋnkunopci siret nye yoswak, omnye muce kupac siret nyelel nyo yoswaket kutok kuwoyit koŋnta.
40009017	Oŋnkupuryo ci nye muce kuroŋnkyi finyonik ce mwonec wonkinek ce yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, komuce kotolis wonkinek oŋnkutumntokey kupa wuy finyonik oŋnkworon wonkinek. Ntene ceroŋnkyini finyonik ce mwonec wonkinek ce lelac sukopur topon.’’
40009018	Nteye kimite Yesu kumwocini cek ŋalecutecu, kuco poytoyintet ake nyepo kotapkok ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkukutuŋe yepo taynyi oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kotokume cepnyu pantanyi, ntene co nyi oŋnkikemer yewuŋuŋ mosukusop.’’
40009019	Yoto kuŋet Yesu oŋnkurup kupetakey cicoto. Kuwetokey neto konomikyi.
40009020	Kimite yoto korket ake nye kimnyan kukwone korotik kuwany kenyisyek taman ok oyeny. Kucone korkonoto letutap Yesu oŋnkutwa kunäm tapantap siretap Yesu.
40009021	Omnye kimwoy nkit om moyenyi kule, “Ye katway ani sirenyi pate, mososop.’’
40009022	Kuweckey Yesu kukäs let, yoto kukäs korkonoto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Cepnyu titir! Kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’ Kusop korkonoto om yoto pakenke.
40009023	Kuwo Yesu okoy kotap poytoyintet. Ntowo kukäs neto piko ce kikute kurerunekap rirek oko piko tokol ce kirirtos kwome mnyat,
40009024	kumwoci kule, “Oŋetye opecikey saŋ! Puryo kot kume cepto koru pate!’’ Ntene kurorci picoto Yesu.
40009025	Nteyu kowo cekwet piko tokol kukwa saŋ, kuwo Yesu ye kimite cepoto oŋnkunäm yewut, yoto kuŋet cepoto kuyo.
40009026	Kutisto ŋalecutecu om koronoto tokol.
40009027	Kunomen Yesu kuwete yoto, nteye kimite kuweti kurup piko oyenku ce koryotin neto ce kipole kumwowu kule, “Weritap Tauti! Rirenec kalyec acek!’’
40009028	Ntowo kuwo Yesu koto orit, kukwa pikey koryotin oyenku ye kimite neto. Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Ocöme akwek kule omuci ani kot ayiy ŋolyontoni?’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, cecöme!’’
40009029	Yoto kunäm Yesu konyekwa oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kunyo kante kwiyokis om wule omite akwek kuyu wule yunto koyenemwoŋ.’’
40009030	Kusopco kuŋoŋokis konyekwa. Kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Monte cemwoci citake tokol ŋalecu!’’
40009031	Ntene kupa picoto kumwaytat kutisto ŋalek ce nöme Yesu om koronoto tokol.
40009032	Nteye kimite kunomene picoto, kukwer piko alake wule mite Yesu cito nye solwo nye puryo kot kuŋolole omnye kiponto oyinot.
40009033	Yoto pakenke yu kowo cekwetyi cicoto oyinot, kucec kuŋalal. Kokite ci ake tokol kumwoy kule, “Tompo kot cekäs kenyis ŋolyo nye yunyi om Israel!’’
40009034	Ntene kumwoy Farasayek kule, “Oyinot nyewo nyepo oyik nye kocini neto swamet sukuŋet kukwet oyik.’’
40009035	Yoto kuwo Yesu kupunte moŋosyek tokol oko soŋwek. Kunetisyote korikapkokwonikwa kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkusop piko ce caŋ ce kimnyontos porwonik wok ce caŋ oko piko ce kisyen.
40009036	Ntowo kukäs Yesu luket nyepo piko ce caŋ, kurire om mukuleynyi kukalya cek omnye kikimuyo kucoŋoŋenis pate kuyu kecir ce puryo kot kuponto mesewo.
40009037	Yoto kumwoci neto konomikyi kule, “Cemosi yisyet nyepo kisisyet, ntene ŋeri pate piko ce mokukisis.
40009038	Kunyo osom Mokoryontet citap mparet sukuŋet kuyok piko alake kukwa kwokusis.’’
40010001	Kukur Yesu konomikyi korurukyi ye kimite neto oŋnkukoci kamukeywek ce muce kukwet oyik ce miyotec oŋnkusop porwonik wok tokol oko syenunot ake tokol.
40010002	Kaynokap kiyokik tokol taman ok oyeny kucu: Nyepo tayta ku Simon nye cekure kaynet ake Petero, oko mutakwam Antereya; Yakopo oko mutakwam Yowana werikap Sepetayo tukway.
40010003	Filipo oko Paturumayo, oko Tomas oko Matayo nye kikorurukintetap mosoret, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo; oko Setayo,
40010004	Simon nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi; oko Yuta Isikaryoti nyo kiŋomntoy Yesu.
40010005	Kuyokto Yesu picutecu taman ok oyeny oŋnkuyomis kumwoci ŋalecu kule, “Monte kot ape koretap lamek, monte mpo ciwut moŋosyekap Samariyek.
40010006	Ntene ape pate wule mite kecirek cepo kotap Israel ce kipotyo.
40010007	Ape wamwaytate kule, ‘Kucontyok akwek poytoyisyetap torot!’ Wosop piko ce mnyontos, wosop kotutune met piko ce kipok.
40010008	Wosop piko ceponto mutyenkenik oŋnkakwet oyik. Kicekonok akwek puc pate nye puryo kot ayal, kunyi okoyite mpo akwek puc pate nye puryo kiy nye cekonok.
40010009	Monte cenämate sapunek nto pesan om lolonikwok.
40010010	Monte cenämate om poninekwok munyenkutap somik, nto mpo siret nyepo oyeny, nto mpo kweyonik, nto mpo korokto nye otepenoti. Omnye misyini cito nye yiyisyi kunyor musyarenyi.
40010011	“Nteye kowut moŋet ake tokol nto saŋnta ake tokol, aceŋate ci ake tokol nye topon nye muce kuŋerekyok, oŋnkopur oko cicoto okoy onomene wuloto.
40010012	Nteye kowut koto ake orit, asupay omwoci kule, ‘Purte nyi kalyet.’
40010013	Ye koŋerekyok akwek pikap koyoto, ayaste kunyor cek kasupoyisyet nyepo kalyemwoŋ. Ntene ye puryo kot kuŋerekyok picoto, oketu kuketkey kasupoyisyet nyepo kalyemwoŋ.
40010014	Nteye puryo kot kuŋerekyok akwek citake tokol nto kutay molimwok ŋalek ce komwowu, aŋete moŋonoto nto koyoto oŋnkopukyi tertitap kerenkokwok.
40010015	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, om pesyetap musankut mosukukalya Yiyintet pikap koretap Siton oko cepo Komora kusir piko cepo moŋonoto!’’
40010016	Alim pa! Koyoktok ani akwek kuyu kecir ce kapa kwenutap suyik. Kunyo roke oŋomekitu kuyu erenoy; oŋnkotoloyitu kuyu swororok.
40010017	Oripkey omnye mite piko ce mosukunämak akwek oŋnkukwerok wokuwosontyok om korikapkokwonikwa.
40010018	Mosicekwerok wocewosontyok om taytap poytoyik oko kinkonik omnye ocömo ani akwek, sukuŋet omwoci akwek cekto oko lamek lokoywek ce toponec.
40010019	Ye kocekwerok wocewosontyok, monte cisot kule moceŋalal ŋal ne, nto kule ceŋololi kulene, ye kopunto pesyonoto, mosicekonok ŋalek ce momwowu om yoto.
40010020	Omnye puryo kot kucikwakwek ŋalek ce moŋalal, ntene mosukukwane wule mite Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Papamwoŋ nye mitowune wule omite akwek nye ŋolole yoto.
40010021	“Mosukuŋomnto piko mpo mutakwam cepakäc kupok, oŋnkuŋomnto mpo kwan lekokwa cepakäc kuyunyoto. Mosukuŋetŋet lekok oŋnkuporye kamwa oŋnkuŋomnto cepakäc kupok.
40010022	Mosukusenkerak kutayak akwek piko tokol omnye kocäm ani. Ntene ci ake tokol nye kasyem kutitir okoy pesyet nyepo letut kunye mosukusop nyoto.
40010023	Nteye kacitaŋanyak akwek om moŋet ake, omwey ape moŋet ake. Komwowok ani kule, puryo kot owonyi akwek yisyonutekwok om moŋosyekap Israel tokol kutompo kot kuco Weritap cito.
40010024	“Puryo kot kupële cito nye cinete konetintenyi, oŋnkupuryo kot kupële mutworintet mokoryontenyi.
40010025	Kunyo roke kuyem cito nyo cinete kukerkeyit oko konetintenyi, oŋnkuyem mutworintet kukerkeyit oko mokoryontenyi. Nteye kocekure cito nyewo nyepo kayta kule, ‘Pelsepul’ nyewo nyepo oyik, kuporkey kule mosicetoci mpo pikap kayata kaynok ce miyotec ce pëlisyi!’’
40010026	“Kunyo monte ciywey piko. Puryo kiy nye yelat yawut nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok, oŋnkupuryo kiy nye wuŋat yawut nye puryo kot ciporu koyin kutok.
40010027	Ŋalek cu omwowok ani om wule wuŋat kuce roke wotosyikey wamwayte ŋalecato ye pet kwen. Nto ŋalek ce kwalime wule wuŋat kuce roke wamwayte okurte ŋalecato korik kisyek.
40010028	Monte ciywey piko co poköce porto pate, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot komuce kot kupakäc soponto; ntene aywey Yiyintet nye muce kupakäc tukway porto oko soponto om wule mite mata nye momise.
40010029	Puryo kot kyole cek titiyinek oyeny tampuret? Ntene oŋnkupuryo kot komuce kot kosuci mpo akenke ŋony, ye tompo kot kucämnta Papamwoŋ.
40010030	Nto wule omite akwek, nka mpo putekap metewokwok kiciyit tokol.
40010031	Kunyo monte cemuye; omnye oponte akwek latik kupël titiyinek!’’
40010032	“Kunyo ci ake tokol nye kaŋalal kutor om wule mite piko kule oyiku nyimwani, kunye mosaparte otoru ani cicoto om wule mite Papamwani om torot.
40010033	Ntene ci ake tokol nye katay meparta kutor om wule mite piko, kunye mosatay ani maparte cicoto om wule mite Papamwani om torot.’’
40010034	“Monte cisot kule kyaco ani osutu kalyet kuco koret, puryo kot osutu kalyet, ntene kyosutu rotwetap cok.
40010035	Omnye kyaco ani capciy, sukuŋet kutay werit kwan, kutay cepto kamet, kutay korketap werit kametitap santenyi.
40010036	Mosukwek pikap kayta ake punik cepo citap kayata.
40010037	“Ci ake tokol nye kacäm kwan nto kamet kupëlo ani, kunye puryo kot kuponto cito nyoto latik om wule omite ani. Ci ake tokol nye kacäm werinyi nto cepnyi kupëlo ani, kunye puryo kot kuponto cito nyoto latik om wule omite ani.
40010038	Ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kukesene murtowontenyi oŋnkuco kutyikyo ani let, kunye puryo kot kuponto nyoto latik om wule omite ani.
40010039	Ci ake tokol nye syeme kule osoru sopon nyi, mosukupot cito nyoto sopon nyi. Nto ci ake tokol nye kepot sopon nyi omnye kacäma ani, kunye mosukusor nyoto sopon nyi.’’
40010040	“Ci ake tokol nye koŋerekyok kutorocak akwek, kukoŋerekyo kutoroca ani cito nyoto, nto ci ake tokol nye koŋerekyo kutoroca ani, kukoŋerekyi kutoroc cicoto neto nyo kiyokwo ani.
40010041	Ci ake tokol nye koŋerekyi kiyokintetap Yiyintet omnye kiyokintet, mosukupcicin cicoto kokotutyet oko workoyontet. Nto ci ake tokol nye koŋerekyi kutoroc ci nye topon omnye ci nye topon, mosukunyor cicoto kokotutyetap cicoto topon.
40010042	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci ake tokol nye kekoci peko ce koyititec akenke om konomikwani ce minkec ceyucu omnye konomikwani, mosukunyor nyoto kokotutyenyi nye kocikoci.’’
40011001	Nteyu kowo kumwoci Yesu konomikyi taman ok oyeny ŋalecu okoy kuwany, kunomene yoto kuwo kunetisyot oŋnkumwaytat ŋalek om moŋosyek ce kilekite wuloto.
40011002	Kulim Yowana om mopusi yisyonutek ce kikwiye Kristo. Kuyok konomikyi alak kwokutepe Yesu kumwoci kule,
40011003	“Nyi cito nyo kimwowu Yowana kule mokuco, nto mocekany acek citake?’’
40011004	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Ape aketitekey womwoci Yowana ŋalek ce oköse oko ce olime akwek,
40011005	Kukästa piko ce kikoryo, pesetoti piko ce kimwolyos, cisope piko ce kiponto mutyenkenik, kuciŋet kotutune met piko ce kipok oŋnkyemwocini pononik lokoywek ce toponec.
40011006	Kunyo ŋerekat kuponto kupeyoy ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kunyoruneno ani konokut!’’
40011007	Nteye kiketitoykey piko co keyoku Yowana, kuŋalal Yesu ŋalek ce nöme Yowana kumwoci piko kule, “Kyopeti akwek kitela wulo kimite Yowana kule wocekäs ne? Rostit nye kitimtime yomet?
40011008	Ntene kyopeti akwek kule wocekäs ne? Kyopere wocekäs cito nye kelac sirok ce toponec ce kintus? Minye piko co loce sirok ce toponec ce kintus korikap mokorenik.
40011009	Ntene omwowo ani pa akwek, kyopeti akwek kule wocekäs ne? Kyopere wocekäs Workoyo? Komwowok ani kule, kyokäs akwek yoto ci nye pële workoyo.
40011010	Omnye Yowana kunye cito nyo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto kule, ‘Mosoyoku ani kiyokintenyu, nye mosukusatuŋ aret om tayŋuŋ.’
40011011	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, om ci ake tokol nye kiyi korko, puryo mpo akenke nyewo kupël Yowana potisonitent. Ntene yec, ci nye miniŋ om poytoyisyetap torot kunye cito nyoto nyewo kupël neto.
40011012	Kuceke pesyosyek co kimwoytoy Yowana lokoywekyi okoy pesyoni, kiceporye citaŋany poytoyisyetap torot, kunyo syeme piko co kiwuryo kule cenäm poytoyisyet.
40011013	Kiŋalal workoyik tokol oko ntarastinekap Moses ŋalek ce nöme poytoyisyet okoy pesyosyek co kitoku Yowana.
40011014	Nteye omöce akwek kule cecäm ŋalekwa, Yowana kunye Eriya nyo kicemwowu kule mosukuco.
40011015	Kunyo ye oponte akwek yitik ce olimnte roke olimnte.
40011016	“Kunyo mosoyuyite ne ani yawut piko cepo pintap pesyosyecu? Kerkey cekto oko lekoy ce mite kepur yepo motepo, sukupole alake kukurcini alak
40011017	kumwowu kule: ‘Kicekutwok acek kurerunek, ntene atay akwek motum! Kicerirye acek kyam mnyat, ntene atay akwek morirye!’
40011018	Omnye kico Yowana oŋnkuco kukir omik nye puryo kot kwomisyi oŋnkupuryo kot kuye finyonik kumwoy piko kule, ‘Ponto nyi oyinot!’
40011019	Kuco Weritap cito oŋnkuco kwomis oŋnkuyesyo, kumwoy piko kule, ‘Akäs pa cemoyetyontet yeyintetap finyonik oŋnkucorwetap piko co ruruce mosoret oko piko ce kicetay!’ Kunyo kucinket kule po manta ŋomnonetap Yiyintet om yisyonutek cepo ŋalek ce tokunotin.’’
40011020	Yoto kupolyi Yesu kulel moŋosyek ce kikwiye neto ŋalekyi ce caŋ cepo kakitat omnye kitompo kot kurenynkey kwasta miyotyonik, kumwoy kule,
40011021	“Oyey! Mite kwapi koromun nyi Korasin! Oyey! Mite kwapi koromun mpenyi Pesusayita! Omnye nto kitukuk ce kipo kakitat co kiciye wule mite nyi kuce kiciye coto Tiro oko Siton, nto kirenynkey keny piko cepo wuloto kulac sirok sarkatinek oŋnkuwastekey arek kupor kule kacerenynkey om miyotyonikwa.
40011022	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, mosukukaykay Yiyintet toŋoŋutek cepo pikap Tiro oko Siton om pesyetap musankut kupëlok akwek.
40011023	Nto mpenyi Kapernaum! Kimöce nyi kule alaŋntekey osutkey torot? Mosicewirciŋ ŋony wule mite manta nye momise! Omnye nto kitukuk cepo kakitat co kiciwuŋ nyi kuce kicici coto Siton nto mite kutoku okoy pesyoni!
40011024	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, mosukukaykay Yiyintet toŋoŋutek cepo pikap Sotom om pesyetap musankut kupëliŋ nyi.’’
40011025	Yoto kuŋalal Yesu kumwoy kule, “Okostiŋ ani nyi Papa, Mokoryontet nyepo torot oko ŋony, omnye kweporci nyi ŋalecu piko ce puryo kot kuŋomec ce kanetan.
40011026	Yunyoto Papa, omnye kiyiy nyi kwey nkit kuyunyoto om cömisyeŋuŋ.
40011027	“Kikono Papamwani tukuk tokol. Puryo ci nye nkete kule werit ku ŋo, tos Papa pate nkit nye nkete, oŋnkupuryo ci nye nkete kule Papa ku ŋo, tos werit pate nkit nye nkete oko piko ce kacäm werit kule oŋoŋu oporci Papa.
40011028	“Akwa wule mite ani akwek piko tokol co kyocosye kunyikisyok terekok, mosomuŋwok ani.
40011029	Onumu mucokimwani oŋnkuwutekey oŋnkanetkey arupa ani, omnye oyiku ani tala, oŋnkutopon mukuleyto, mosonyoru kamuŋnto.
40011030	Omnye Kuskus mucokit nye mokonok ani oŋnkukuskusec terekok ce motorwok ani.’’
40012001	Kuwo Yesu om pesyosyecoto kupunte mparosyekap nkanuk ye kipesyetap Sapat. Yoto kwam konomikyi rupet, kucec cekto kuput nkanuk oŋnkwam.
40012002	Nteye kotoköse Farasayek kuyunyoto, kumwoci cek Yesu kule, “Käs pa, yiye konomikuk yisyet nye yirye ntarastinek cepo pesyetap Sapat!’’
40012003	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic ŋalek ce kikwiy Tauti yo kipontokey oko pikyi yo kyome rupet?
40012004	Kiwo neto kotap Yiyintet orit oŋnkunum mukatyantet nye kicesoci kupoyit Yiyintet oŋnkwam oko pikyi, nka kot kipuryo kot kucömncini ntarastinek neto oko picoto kwam, ntene tisik pate ce kicecömncini.
40012005	Nto tompo kot asuman akwek om ntarastinekap Moses kule tisik kuce yirye okokoy ntarastinek cepo Sapat om kotap Yiyintet oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto cek lelis?
40012006	Komwowok ani kule, mite yuteyu citake nye pële kotap Yiyintet.
40012007	Nto yunye kwonket akwek kupoyit manta kule poru ne silutekap Yiyintet cu mwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot omoce ani korosek cepo tyoŋik, ntene omoce tolosyet.’ Nto puryo kot omutyini akwek musanku piko alak co puryo kot kuponto lelis.
40012008	Omnye Weritap cito kunye Mokoryontet nyewo nyepo pesyetap Sapat.’’
40012009	Kunomen Yesu kuwete yoto okoy kupunto kotapkokwemwacek ake.
40012010	Kimite citake yoto nye kime yewut. Kimite yoto piko alake ce kimöce kule cewosontyi Yesu om ŋalek ce kalel kumwoy. Kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Cöme ra ntarastinekyo cisopsi ye pesyetap Sapat?’’
40012011	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Nteye ponto citake om akwek keciryet nye kesuci mwenet ye pesyetap Sapat, puryo kot konumu kocut kucone mwenet?
40012012	Kunyo ponto cito latik ce caŋ kupël keciryet! Kunyo comwec acek ntarastinekyo ce yiy yisyet nye topon ye pesyetap Sapat!’’
40012013	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Yite yewuŋuŋ.’’ Kuyito cicoto yewunyi, kusop yewut kunyol kukerkeyit oko yewut nyin ake.
40012014	Kumiŋnto Farasayek kupa saŋ wokurwoc aret nye mosukupakäce cek Yesu kume.
40012015	Ntowo Kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kunomen kuwete yoto. Kupa piko ce caŋ kurup neto. Kusop Yesu piko tokol ce kimnyontos,
40012016	oŋnkumwoci kunkolontyi kule monte cemwoci piko alak ŋalek ce nöme neto.
40012017	Sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyontet Isaya kule:
40012018	“Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, Okäs oŋyi mutworintemwani nye kwakwey, nye akenke pate nye cämanemwani nye ŋerekyini soponmwani, mosokoci ani neto Muyemwani Nyetilil, mosukumwoy musankunek om wule mite piko cepo yemosyek tokol,
40012019	Ntene puryo kot kutintene, nto mpo kupol. oŋnkupuryo kot kuŋolole kupol om orustunwek cepo moŋet,
40012020	Puryo kot kwirye tekantet nye muryony, nto mpo kot komis mata nye ŋwenyŋwenye. Mosukutitir okoy kupëlis mutisyet nyepo musankunek cepo manta.
40012021	Mosukukenekey piko cepo yemosyek tokol neto.’’
40012022	Yoto kukwer piko alake citake nye korat nye kipuryo kot kuŋolole omnye kiponto oyik kuco wule mite Yesu. Kusop Yesu cicoto okoy komuc kot kuŋalal oŋnkukästa.
40012023	Kokite piko tokol koromun, oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Ara Weritap Tauti cici!’’
40012024	Ntowo kulim Farasayek ŋalecato, kuwec kumwoy kule, “Yiyisye cici pate swametap Pelsepul nyewo nyepo oyik sukuŋet kukwet oyik.’’
40012025	Konket Yesu ŋalek ce kisote cekto, yoto kumwoci kule, “Poytoyisyo ake tokol nye kapciykey kwek oyeny oŋnkuporyekey nkit kupote kwaran. Nteye kapciykey moŋet nto pikap koto ake kwek oyeny oŋnkuporyekey nkit, kupote nyo kwaran.
40012026	Kunyo nteye poryekey Setani om poytoyisyenyi, kuporkey kule pciyat Setaninato, kunyo muce kulene kuyo poytoyisyenyi!
40012027	Nteye oyiyisye ani Pelsepul ye saŋet akwet oyik, kwiyisye ŋo konomik cikwakwek ye kwete oyik? Kunyo konomik cikwakwek nkit ce nkete ŋalek cepo manta kule puryo kot opoye akwek manta!
40012028	Ntene ye Muyetap Yiyintet nye kono ani swamet ye saŋet akwet oyik, kuporukey kupoyit manta kule kucontyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
40012029	“Muce kulene cito kot kuput kowut kotap cito nye nyikan nye ponto swama oŋnkunyapan tukukyi, tos pate ye kanyosyo kurat cicoto sukuŋet kunyapan tukuk cepo kanyi.
40012030	“Ci ake tokol nye puryo kot ku nyimwani kunye toyo ani cicoto, nto ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kukolyo cirurukisye kecirekwani tukway, kunye cito nyoto nye serete kuseret.
40012031	Om ŋolyontoni, omwowok ani kule, mosicikalya piko miyotyonik alak tokol oko ŋalek ce miyotec ce kaŋalal; ntene puryo kot cimuce kot cikalya ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Muyet Nyetilil.
40012032	Mosicikalya ci ake tokol nye kaŋalal ŋolyo nye miyat om wule mite Weritap cito. Ntene puryo kot cimuce mpo kisic kot cikalya ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Muyet Nyetilil om pesyosyecu nto om kenyisyek ce mokukwa.’’
40012033	“Ye senyoru omik ce toponec, kumöce ponte ketit nye topon, nteye ponte ketit nye miyat mesenyoru omik ce miyotec, omnye cinkete ket ake tokol omikyi ce yiye.
40012034	Akwek Erenocu! Omuce akwek kulene kot aŋalal ŋalek ce toponec oŋnkurok yec oyiku akwek miyotec. Omnye ŋolole kutit ŋalek ce nyitotin mukuleyto orit.
40012035	Konu cito nye topon ŋalek ce toponec cekwone konorutyenyi nye topon nye mitowune wule mite neto orit, kukonu cito nye miyat ŋalek ce miyotec cekwone konorutyenyi nye miyat nye mitowune wule mite neto orit.
40012036	“Kunyo komwowok ani kule, om pesyetap musankut mosukuŋalal ci ake tokol ŋolyo ake tokol nye miyat nye kiŋalal.
40012037	Omnye mosiciyisye ŋalekuk nkit cemutuŋ musankut kule ponte lelis nto meponte lelis.’’
40012038	Yoto kuŋalal konetikap ntarastinek alake Farasayek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, ce möce acek kule cekäsiŋ ye yiye pelutyet nyepo kakitat.’’
40012039	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Pic ce miyotec ce menket Yiyintet piko cepo pintap pesyosyecu! Tepeno cekto pelutyet nyepo kakitat? Ntene pelutyet nyepo kakitat nye mocikoci pate ku pelutyet nyepo kakitat nyepo Workoyontet Yona.
40012040	Kuyu wulo kipur Yona moyetap tyonyntap ruretyet kuwany pesyosyek somok cepo pet oko pesyosyek somok cepo komoy, kuyunyoto mosukopur Weritap cito mwenet kuwany pesyosyek somok cepo pet oko pesyosyek somok cepo komoy.
40012041	Mosukuyoŋ koyin pikap Nenefi om pesyetap musankut oŋnkuwosontyok akwek piko cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu, omnye kirenynkey cek kulim ŋalek ce kimwoci Yona. Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, mite yuteyu kitake nyewo kupël Yona!
40012042	Mosukuyo koyin korko nye Kinko nyepo makentany om pesyetap musankut oŋnkuwosontyok kumutwok musankut akwek piko cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu, omnye kicone neto wule low oŋnkuco cokulim ŋomnonetap Solomon. Kunyo mite yuteyu kitake nyewo kupël Solomon!’’
40012043	“Ye kowete oyinoto nye miyat cito, mosukuwesetot kupunte koret wule puryo peko kuceŋoti wule möce kule komuŋe, nteye mnonyor,
40012044	Mosukuketkey kuco, nteye kaco cokunyor puryo ci nye minye, oŋnkicipuc oŋnkyesat topon.
40012045	Yoto mosukuwo wokukwer oyik alak tisap ce miyotec kupël neto, kukwa yoto oŋnkwokowut orit kumiŋis wuloto. Mosukuwur yoto kopurtap cicoto kupël wule kiyunto kopurnyi nye kipo kunyo. Kunyo mosukuyuyit nyoto om wule mite piko ce miyotec cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu.’’
40012046	Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋololyini piko, yoto kupun kamet oko mpo mutakwam kwokuyoŋe saŋ oŋnkutep kule ceŋololyi neto.
40012047	Kumwoci citake nye kimite yoto Yesu kule, “Käs pa, mite komet oko mpo mutokwomet keyoŋ saŋ kumöce kule ceŋololuŋ.’’
40012048	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cicoto kule, “Ŋo nye yeyomwani ŋo ce mpo yeyamwani?’’ Oŋnkumwoy kule, “Käs pa! Okyu mpo yeyomwani oko mpo yeyamwani!’’
40012049	Yoto kumwelyel Yesu konomikyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Käs pa! Okyu mpo yeyomwani oko mpo yeyamwani!
40012050	Omnye piko tokol ce yiye ŋalek ce möce Papamwani om torot kuce mpo yeyamwani oŋnku mpo yeyomwani coto.’’
40013001	Om pesyonoto akenke kunomene Yesu koyoto oŋnkuwo okoy kupunto tampayayet tapan. Wokopur kunetis.
40013002	Yoto korurukyikey luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ye kimite neto okoy kulany Yesu rapet oŋnkopure. Kuyoŋe piko tokol tampayayet tapan.
40013003	Kwiyisye Yesu tyonkocok kumwoci piko ŋalek ce caŋ. Kumwoy kule, “Kiwo citake wokukolsyo,
40013004	Nteye kimite kukolsyi, kusuci kupuswek alake aret tapan, yoto kuterer toritek oŋnkwam.
40013005	Kosuci kupuswek alake yepo kitawet parak ye kimite teŋek ce ŋeri, kutur lakwar omnye kipuryo kot kumite teŋek ce kipa ŋony.
40013006	Nteye ketelucini asista kupël kuyom kupotyo omnye kipuryo kot kuponto tikityek ce kipa ŋony.
40013007	Kosuci kupuswek alake yepo kotok orit, kupityo kotok oŋnkwam kupotyo.
40013008	Ntene kosuci kupuswek alake yepo teŋek ce toponec, kupityo okoy kwiy kupuswontet akenke kupuswek pokol, nto ake kwiy kupuswek tomonwokik lö, nto ake kwiy kupuswek sosom.’’
40013009	Oŋnkumwoy Yesu kule, “Kunyo, ye oponte yitik ce olimnte, roke olimnte!’’
40013010	Yoto kukwa konomik ye kimite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Omnye seyiyisye nyi tyonkocok ye ŋololyini piko?’’
40013011	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kicekonok akwek oŋnket ŋomnonet nye wuŋat nyepo poytoyisyetap torot, ntene puryo kot cikoci cekto.
40013012	Omnye ci nye ponto kitake, mosicetosyi cikoci kucaŋit sukuŋet kunyor ce caŋ, ntene cito nyo puryo kot kuponto kiy, mosicinumune mpo tukusic ce ponto.
40013013	Kuyunyoto omne soyiyisye ani tyonkocok ye oŋololyini cekto, omnye köstoy cek oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot kuköse kiy, oŋnkulimntoy, oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot kusowu kunket kiy.’’
40013014	Omnye mite kwititoy kupoyitu manta om wule mite cekto ŋolyontetap Isaya nye kiŋor kumwoy kule: “Mosolimnte akwek oŋnkolimnte, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot osowu oŋnket, mosokäste oŋnkokäste, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot oŋnketi,
40013015	Omnye koliliyotin kasoteywekap picu; kiker cek yitikwa, oŋnkomis konyekwa. Nto kopuryo kot kumite cekto kuyunyoto, nto kwemuce kukäste cek konyekwa, oŋnkulimnte yitikwa, oŋnkusowu kunket kasoteywekwa, sukuŋet kuweckey kukwa wule omite ani. Mwowu Yiyintet kuyunyoto. Saŋet ani osop cekto kusopco.’’
40013016	“Ntene oponte akwek kupeyoy koromun omnye kostoy konyekwok, oŋnkulimntoy yitikwok!
40013017	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, caŋ workoyik oko pikap Yiyintet ce kimöce kule nto cekäs tukuk cu oköse akwek, ntene kipuryo kot komuc kot kukäs, oŋnkimöce kule nto celim ŋalecu olime akwek, ntene kipuryo kot kulim cekto.’’
40013018	“Kunyo alimnte oŋnkonket kule poru ne tyonkocetap kolintet.
40013019	Piko co kalim lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkupuryo kot kunkete topon, kukerkey piko co oko kupuswek co kisuci aret tapan, omnye mosukuco Setani nye miyat oŋnkuŋey kunum ŋalek co kicekol mukuleywekwa.
40013020	Kupuswek co kisuci kitawet parak, kukerkey co oko piko co lime lokoywek oŋnkuŋerekyi kucäm lakwar.
40013021	Ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kowute mukuleywekwa orit, kunyo puryo kot kopure kuloyit nteye kaco wuyinto nto toŋoŋutek ce nöme lokoywek, mosukutoyis cek lakwar.
40013022	Nto kupuswek co kisuci kotok orit, kukerkey co oko piko co kalim lokoywek, ntene kwam kowurta lokoywecoto kasoteywekap pesyosyecu oko cömisyet nyepo mokoryontit, kupuryo kot kwiye kupuswek.
40013023	Nto kupuswek co kisuci teŋek ce toponec kukerkey co oko piko co kalim lokoywek oŋnkunket topon, oŋnkwiy kupuswontet akenke kupuswek alak pokol, kwiy ake kupuswek tomonwokik lö, kwiy ake kupuswek sosom.’’
40013024	Kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkocet ake kule; “Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko cito nye kikol mparenyi kupuswek ce toponec.
40013025	Nto mite pesyet ake komoy ye kimite kukoruy piko tokol; kuco puniyontet oŋnkuco kukol wancet wule mite nkanuk oŋnkunomen kuwecikey.
40013026	Nteyu kowo kupityo nkanuk oŋnkucec kwiy omik, yoto kutok mpo wancet.
40013027	Kukwa mutworik wule mite cicoto oŋnkwokumwoci kule, ‘Mokoryontet, nteyu kikol nyi mpareŋuŋ kupuswek ce toponec! Kicone ono wancet?’
40013028	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci cek kule, ‘Puniyontet nye kikwiy kuyunyi.’ Kuwekyi mutworik kumwoci kule, ‘Möce nyi kule cipe acek woceŋey wancet?’
40013029	Kuwec cicoto kule, ‘Puryo!’ Omnye ye kaŋey akwek wancet omuci waŋeyte mpo nkanuk.
40013030	Ayaste kupityo tokol okoy cekäs, nteye pesyet nyo cekisisyi mosomwoci ani piko co kisisyi kule, ‘Anyosye kunyo oruruc wancet oŋnkorat oŋnkopël kuloy, oŋnkoruruc nkanuk oŋnkokoci cokenikwani.’ ’’
40013031	Kumwoci Yesu yec cek tyonkocet ake kule, “Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko kupuswontet nyepo ketit nye cekure kalitarit, nye kisic kusir kupuswek alak tokol,
40013032	nye kinäm citake oŋnkukol mparenyi, nteye kotopite kuwoyit kweku ket nyewo kupël ketik alak tokol, sukuŋet kukwa toritek kwokutec korikwa sarisyekap ketoto.’’
40013033	Kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkocet ake yec kule, “Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko mumarek ce nöme korket ake oŋnkutankwar oko pusyekap nkanuk cepo tepenik somok, kukut kuwoyit.’’
40013034	Kwiyisye Yesu tyonkocok kumwoci piko ŋalecutecu tokol. Kipuryo ŋolyo mpo akenke nye kimwoci neto cekto nye puryo kot kwiyisye tyonkocok.
40013035	Kikwiy kuyunyoto sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyontet kule, “Mosoyiyisye ani tyonkocok ye oŋololyini cek, mosomwoci ŋalek ce kiwuŋotin kuceke ye kicitany koret.’’
40013036	Kunomen Yesu kupakakta piko oŋnkuwo koto orit. Kukwa konomikyi ye kimite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mwowec acek, poru ne tyonkocetap samiyitap mparen?’’
40013037	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Cito nyo kole kupuswontet ku Weritap cito nyoto,
40013038	nto mparet ku koret, nto kupuswek co toponec kukerkey co oko piko cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, nto wancet kukerkey co oko piko cepo Setani nye miyat.
40013039	Nto puniyontet nyo kikole wancet ku Setani nyewo nyepo oyik nyo nkit. Nto pesyet nye cekisisyi pesyet nyoto nyepo ye ŋete koret. Nto piko co kisisyi ku Malaykanik coto.
40013040	Kuyu wulo ciruruktoy samiyita nyepo wancet oŋnkyepël kuloy, mosukukerkeyit nyoto om pesyet nyo ŋete koret.
40013041	Mosukuyok Weritap cito Malaykanikyi, kunyo mosukoruruc konum kukwane poytoyisyenyi piko tokol co nete piko kwiy miyotyet, oko piko tokol co yiye miyotyonik,
40013042	oŋnkuwirci wule mite oŋoŋtit nyepo mata nye loye, wule mowokuriryo om wuloto oŋnkunyiy kelekwa.
40013043	Yoto kuye mosukuporkey pikap Yiyintet ce kelackey kulekececis topon kuyu asista om poytoyisyetap Papamwa. Kunyo olimnte ye oponte yitik ce olimnte, roke olimnte.’’
40013044	“Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko mokoryonti nye kicewuŋe mparen, nye kinyor citake, nteyu kowo kunyor kuwuny yec topon, Kuwo om ŋerekwek ce kiponto wokwalya tukuk tokol ce kiponto oŋnkwale mparanato.’’
40013045	“Kerkey mpo yec poytoyisyetap torot oko ci nye kamonkesintet nye ceŋoti karin nye piciy koromun.
40013046	Nteye koto wokunyoru akenke nye piciy kusir karik alak cepo kwak, kuwo wokwalya tukuk tokol ce kiponto oŋnkwale karnanato piciy.’’
40013047	“Kerkey mpo yec poytoyisyetap torot oko porok ce cenöme purpurunek ce kocewirci tampayayet orit oŋnkunäm purpurunek wok tokol.
40013048	Nteyu kowo kunyiw, kocut piko co nöme purpurunek kuco tampayayet tapan oŋnkopur ŋony kulekwel ce toponec oŋnkukoci ntepenikwa oŋnkuwirta co moponto latik.
40013049	Kunyo mosukuyuyit nyoto om pesyet nyo ŋete koret. Mosukupa Malaykanik saŋ oŋnkoruruc piko ce miyotec kulekwene kwenutap piko ce toponec,
40013050	oŋnkuwirci piko ce miyotec wule mite oŋoŋtit nyepo mata nye loye, wule mosukuriryo cek om wuloto oŋnkunyiy kelekwa.’’
40013051	Kutepe Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Konket akwek ra ŋalecutecu tokol?’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Ee, Kacinket.’’
40013052	Kuwec Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kunyo poru ŋalecu kule, konetintetap ntarastinek ake tokol nye koweckey kwek konomintet nyepo poytoyisyetap torot kunye kerkey oko ci nyepo kanyi nye kewut konyi nyo konore tukukyi oŋnkunum kukwa saŋ tukuk ce lelac oko ce yoswakik.’’
40013053	Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu tyonkococutecu okoy kuwany, kunomene wuloto,
40013054	kuketitakey kuwo okoy kupunto moŋetap korenyi. Kunetisye kotapkokwemwa okoy kukite piko koromun ce kilim ŋelekyi, kutep cek kumwoy kule, “Kinyorta ono cici ŋomnononi? Nto mpo ŋalecu po kakitat?
40013055	Puryo kot ku weritap koswetintetap pawunek ne nyitenyi? Puryo kot ku weritap Mariyam ne nyitenyi? Nto mpo mutakwam ku mpo Yakopo oko Yosep oko Simon oko Yuta?
40013056	Puryo kot cepontekey acek ce minye tokol oko mpo cekwam? Kinyorta ono ne ŋalecu?’’
40013057	Yoto kutay cekto Yesu. Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ciyweye workoyo om wulyo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ciyweye korenyi, oŋnkupuryo kot kuyweye piko cepo kamwa.’’
40013058	Kipuryo kot kwiy Yesu om wuloto pelutok cepo kakitat ce caŋ, omnye kipuryo kuponto piko cepo wuloto koyenotet.
40014001	Pesyosyecoto kuye kilime Erote poytoyintetap Kalilaya ŋalek ce kicemwowu ce nöme Yesu.
40014002	Kumwoci neto mokorenikyi kule, “Yowana potisonintet nyitenyi kupoyit manta nye kuŋet kotutune met, kunyi mite yawut kwiyisyi swamet nye ponto kwiye ŋalecu.’’
40014003	Omnye Erote kunye kimwoytoy cenäm Yowana oŋnkyerate nyororonik oŋnkyekerta mopusi, omnye kisac Erotiya korketap mutakwam Filipo.
40014004	Kunyo kimwocini Yowana Erote kuwany pesyos ce caŋ kule, “Puryo kot kucöme ntarastinek kot müt nyi neto!’’
40014005	Kimöce Erote kule apakäc Yowana kume, ntene kuywey piko omnye kicöme piko kule workoyo Yowana.
40014006	Nteye kipesyet nyewo nye kiceye Erote, kutum ceptap Erotiya om taytap toyek tokol. Yoto kuŋerec Erote koromun.
40014007	Kuwalkey kukurtoci cepoto kumwoy kule, “Kawalkey kule mosokoniŋ ani nyi kiy ake tokol nye kesomo.’’
40014008	Om ŋomnonet nye kikoci kamet, yoto kusom cepoto kumwoy kule, “Kono ani om yuteyu pakenke metitap Yowana potisonintet nye mite sanit!’’
40014009	Kunerec kinko koromun yu kowo kulim ŋalecato, ntene om kawalet nye kokomwoy om taytap toyekyi, yoto kumwayta kule roke ceyiytoci ŋalekyi.
40014010	Kumwayta ceyep metitap Yowana om mopusi.
40014011	Cesut metit nye mite sanit oŋnkwocikoci cepoto, kunäm nyo oŋnkusutyi kamet.
40014012	Kukwa konomikap Yowana oŋnkwokusut musyontet wokumuy; nto kapok kupa cekto wokumwoci Yesu.
40014013	Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kulany rapet oŋnkuwo okoy surukwenet kwine nkit. Yoto kulim piko, kunomene moŋosyekwa kupete kerenkok kurup cekto neto.
40014014	Kurekune Yesu rapet om tampayayet tapan, ntowo kukäs neto luket nyepo piko ce caŋ, kurire kukalya om mukuleynyi, oŋnkusop pikwa ce kimnyontos.
40014015	Ntowo kuponto pesyonoto kosoleny, kukwa konomik ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nteyu kokwimen koret, kunyi surukwen wuli ce mite, kunyo yomis piko kupecikey wule mite kestonik sukuŋet wokwalat nkit omik ce mokwam.’’
40014016	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot kuroke kot kupa, okoci akwek nkit kiye mokwam.’’
40014017	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Ceponte acek om yu mukatinek mut oko purpurunek oyeny pate.’’
40014018	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Osutu pa akwek kukwa yu omite ani.’’
40014019	Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko kupor ŋony om yepo suswek, oŋnkunäm mukatinekey mut oko purpurunek oyeny oŋnkunyal torot oŋnkukasta kusomnci Yiyintet oŋnkupetec mukatinekey oŋnkukoci konomik, kunäm co oŋnkupcici piko.
40014020	Kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis. Yoto koruruc konomik omik ce kakyam kot kuŋet kunyiw kisok taman ok oyeny.
40014021	Nto piko ce kikwomis kuce kirice kupunto moronik elifunek mut nye mneyitite koruk oko lekok.
40014022	Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomik kulany rapet kupa kuntowonu kway tampayayet pitonin ye kimite neto tokuyomise piko kupecikey.
40014023	Nteyu kowo kuyomis piko okoy kupa, kunomen kwine nkit kuwo lakam wokusom. Ntowo kupunto kosoleny kimite neto yoto wuloto kwine nkit.
40014024	Kimite rapet yoto kukopunto wule low kuceke koret. Kimite yoto rapet kuwulye peko ce kiwosekey omnye kiwuse yomet kuketu kuco let.
40014025	Ntowo kupunto komoy karik kuyec koret, kuco Yesu wule mite cekto kutyikonu peko parak.
40014026	Nteye kotoköse konomik neto kuconi kutyikonu peko parak, kumuyo koromun oŋnkupol kumwoy kule, “Oyinot nyi!’’
40014027	Yoto pakenke kuŋololyi Yesu cek kumwoci kule, “Otitir! Ani nyo, monte cemuye!’’
40014028	Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, ye nyi nyo, mwowo ani aco wuloto atyikanu peko parak.’’
40014029	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Co!’’ Yoto kurekto Petero om rapet oŋnkucec kutyikat peko parak kuwo wule mite Yesu.
40014030	Nteye kotoköse Petero yomet kumuy oŋnkucec kolum peko neto. Yoto kukursyo kupol kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, Sorwo!’’
40014031	Yoto pakenke kuyokoyto Yesu yewunyi oŋnkunäm, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ponte nyi koyenot nye kisic! Omne semun nyi?’’
40014032	Nteyu kowo kulany cek tukway rapet orit, yoto kusis yomet.
40014033	Kukutuny konomik yoto om rapet oŋnkusay Yesu kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi manta Weritap Yiyintet!’’
40014034	Kway cekto tampayayet okoy kupunto koretap Kenesaret.
40014035	Kunket piko cepo wuloto Yesu. Yoto kuyokto cek cekwer piko ce kimnyontos ce kilekite koronoto kukwa wule mite Yesu.
40014036	Kusom picoto Yesu kule kucömnci piko ce mnyontos kutwa mpo pate kototyetap sirenyi. Yoto kusopco piko tokol ce kimnyontos ce kitwa sirenyi.
40015001	Yoto kukwa Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone Yerusalem okoy wule mite Yesu oŋnkwokutepe kule,
40015002	“Omne sukwirye konomikuk ntarastinek ce kikonec acek mpo kukonyo, omnye puryo kot kowune yewuniyek ye mokwomis?’’
40015003	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Omne soyirye mpo akwek ntarastinekap Yiyintet aŋnkawoke arup ntarastinekwok cepo keny?
40015004	Omnye mwowu Yiyintet kule, ‘Misyini ywey kon oko komet, nto ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi kwan nto kamet, kumisyini cepakäc cicoto kume.’
40015005	Ntene onetisyi akwek omwowu kule, ye komwoci citake kwan nto kamet kule, ‘Kwokoyte ani kwek kokotutek cepo Yiyintet pesanik tokol ce kotoyiyisye akalyak akwek.’
40015006	Kupuryo kot kurok kuywey cicoto kwan. Ŋalek ceyucutecu ce oyirye akwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet saŋet arup ntarastinekwok cepo keny.
40015007	Oyiku kaperperot! Po manta Isaya yo kiŋore ŋalek ce nömok akwek kumwoy kule:
40015008	‘Mwowu Yiyintet kule, Yweyo ani picu om kutuwakwa pate, ntene mitowune mukuleywekwa wule low om wule omite ani.
40015009	Puryo kot kuponto cek latik kusaya ani, omnye nete cekto ntarastinek ce kikwiye piko kuyunye po ntarastinek coto Yiyintet!’ ’’
40015010	Yoto kukur Yesu piko tokol kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Olimnte, oŋnkonket!
40015011	Puryo kot ku kito nyo wute kutitap cito nye wurtoy cito kumiyatit; ntene kito nye cone kutinyi orit nye wurtoy cito kumiyatit.’’
40015012	Yoto kukwa konomik ye kimite oŋnkumwoci kule, “Puryo kot nket nyi kule konyer Farasayek om ŋalek co kemwowu nyi?’’
40015013	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mosicikor ket ake tokol nye kipuryo kot kutor Papamwani nyepo torot.
40015014	Ayaste kwiyat nkit! Kantoyik cekto ce koryotin ce ntocini piko ce koryotin. Nteye kentoci cito nye korat citake nye korat, mosukosuci tukway mwenet.’’
40015015	Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowec acek, poru ne tyonkoconi?’’
40015016	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Tompo kot osowu mpo akwek opël piko alak?
40015017	Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule kiy ake tokol nye kewut kutitap cito kunye weti moyet orit oŋnkupunte porto kupa saŋ?
40015018	Ntene tukuk ce kwone kutit kukwa saŋ kuce kwone coto mukuleyto orit. Tukuk ceyucoto kuce wurtoy cito kumiyatit.
40015019	Omnye kwone mukuleytap cito orit kasoteywek ce miyotec sukuŋet kuporis, kwiy sakwayanat, oŋnkwiy ŋalek alak tokol ce miyotec, kuyu nyoponisyet, oko mwiynanet, oko ŋomset.
40015020	Tukuk ceyucutecu ce wurtoy cito kumiyatit, ntene puryo kot kowurtoy cito ye komisye yewuniyek ce puryo kot ciwun.’’
40015021	Kunomene Yesu wuloto oŋnkuwo okoy kupunto koret nye lekite moŋosyekap Tiro oko Siton.
40015022	Yoto kuco korko nyepo koretap Kanan nye kiminye wuloto wule mite Yesu, oŋnkupol kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, Weritap Tauti! Kalya rirena ani! Ponto cepnyu oyinot nye kinäm, kunyo mite kwapi koromun.’’
40015023	Ntene kusis Yesu nye monowekyi ŋolyo. Kukwa konomikyi ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kwet korkoni kuwecikey, omnye kenamatec oŋnkupolcec kuyunyi!’’
40015024	Yoto kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kiciyokwo ani aco pate wule mite kecirek cepo kotap Israel ce kipotyo.’’
40015025	Yoto pakenke kuco korkonoto oŋnkukutuŋe yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, kalya ani!’’
40015026	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kutopon ye kacenäm omikap lekok oŋnkyewirci ŋokik.’’
40015027	Kuwec korkonoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, yunyoto manta, ntene nka mpo ŋokik kwome omik ce koŋet ce lelektoy om mesetap mokoryontemwa.’’
40015028	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci korkonoto kule, “Cepyosyani ponte nyi koyenot nyewo koromun! Kunyo mokwiyokis kuyu wulo moktoy nyi.’’ Kusop cepnyi yoto pakenke.
40015029	Kunomene Yesu wuloto oŋnkuwo kurup tampayayet Kalilaya tapan. Yoto kulany lakamet parak oŋnkupur ŋony.
40015030	Kukwa luket nyepo piko ce caŋ wule kimite neto ce kikweru piko ce mwolyos, oko ce kikoryo, oko ce kipok kerenkok, oko ce kimiŋitu, oko piko alak ce caŋ ce kimnyontos, oŋnkwokutore yepo kerenkokap Yesu. Kusop Yesu picoto tokol.
40015031	Kokite piko koromun yu kowo kukäs kuŋolole piko ce kimiŋitu, oŋnkusopco piko ce kikipok kerenkok. Kupesetoti piko ce kimwolyos, oŋnkukästa piko ce kikikoryo konyek. Yoto kukasta cek Yiyintetap Israel.
40015032	Kukur Yesu konomik kukwa ye kimite neto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Orire ani akalye picu tokol, omnye pesyet nyepo somok nyi opontekey oko cekto, kunyo puryo kot kuponto omik ce mokwam. Puryo kot omöce kule omwoci kupecikey kuponto rupet, omnye muce kumistot om aran ye mite kupeti.’’
40015033	Kutepe konomik Yesu kule, “Mocenyorte acek ono omik ce mocepaye picu tecu tokol om surukwenoni?’’
40015034	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Oponte akwek mukatinek ata?’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Ceponte mukatinek tisap oko purpurunek tukusic ce minkec.’’
40015035	Kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kopur ŋony,
40015036	oŋnkunäm mukatinekey tisap oko purpurunekey, oŋnkuosomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci konomik, kunäm co oŋnkupcici piko.
40015037	Kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis. Yoto kururuc konomik omik ce koŋet okoy konyit kisok tisap.
40015038	Nto coŋintap piko ce kyomis kuce piko moronik elifunek amwan nye mneyitite koruk oko lekok.
40015039	Ntowo kupok, kuyomis Yesu piko kupecikey, oŋnkulany rapet kunomen okoy koretap Makatan.
40016001	Kukwa Farasayek oko Satusayek wule mite Yesu ce kimöce kule cesyem celotu Yesu. Yoto kusom cekto neto kwici cekto pelutyet nyepo kakitat nye cone torot nye poru swametap Yiyintet.
40016002	Ntene kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Ye roroktoy asista, omwowu akwek kule, ‘Mosukunyol koret omnye kararnit koret.’
40016003	Nteye kayec korir koret, omwowu akwek kule, ‘Mosukuropen koret omnye katuyit oŋnkumite polyet nyewo, koret.’ Oŋnket akwek aŋor tukuk ce mokwiyokis ye kokäs koret parak, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot omuci kot aŋor pelutok ce yiyoktos om pesyosyecu.’’
40016004	Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Piko cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu kuce piko ce miyotec, oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto koyenot! Osomo ani akwek pelutyet nyepo kakitat? Ntene puryo pelutyet ake nyepo kakitat nye mociporci tos pate pelutyet nyepo kakitat nyepo Yona.’’ Yoto kupakakta Yesu cekto oŋnkunomen kuwecikey.
40016005	Kukwa konomik okoy kwoy tampayayet pitoni. Yoto kuyutye cek manamat mukatya mpo akenke.
40016006	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Oripkey wule mite mumarekap Farasayek oko mumarek cepo Satusayek.’’
40016007	Yoto kucec konomik kurwoc kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Komwoy kuyunyi so, omnye mnacekwante acek mukatinek?’’
40016008	Konket Yesu ŋalek ce kiŋolole cek. Yoto kutepe kule, “Omne sorwoc akwek nkit omwowu kule moceponte mukatinek? Oponte akwek so koyenet nye miniŋ!
40016009	Tompo kot osowu akwek okoy kunyi oŋnket? Puryo kot osoti akwek yo kyopeteci ani mukatinek mut oŋnkopcici akwek piko elifunek mut. Kyoruruc yoto kunyiw kisok ata?
40016010	Nto mpo mukatinek tisap co kyopcicini akwek piko elifunek amwan? Kyoruruc akwek yoto kunyiw kisok ata?
40016011	Omne sumosowu oŋnket kule kopuryo kot oŋololwok ani ŋalek ce nöme mukatinek? Oripkey wule mite mumarekap Farasayek oko mumarek cepo Satusayek!’’
40016012	Kusow konomik yoto kunket kule kopuryo kot kumwocini Yesu cekto kuripkey om wule mite mumarek co cetonkwortoy mukatinek, ntene komwocini kuripkey cek wule mite konetisyetap Farasayek oko Satusayek.
40016013	Yoto kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto koret nye lekite moŋetap Kaysariya nyepo Filipi, kutepe neto konomikyi om wuloto kule, “Mwowu piko kule Weritap cito ku ŋo?’’
40016014	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Mwowu piko alak kule, ‘Yiku nyi Yowana potisonintet,’ kumwowu alake kule, ‘Yiku nyi Eriya.’ Nto alak kumwowu kule, ‘Yiku nyi Yeremiya’ nto workoyontet ake.’’
40016015	Kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Nto akwek, omwowu akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’
40016016	Kuwec Simon Petero kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Ŋapanet Weritap Yiyintet nye sopot.’’
40016017	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ponte nyi kupeyok Simon weritap Yona! Omnye puryo kot ku ci nye koŋoŋuŋ nyi ŋaleca, ntene Papamwani nye mite torot nye koŋoŋuŋ.
40016018	Komwowuŋ ani kule, yiku nyi Petero (nye poru kule kitawet) kunyo mosatec ani kitawani komwani, coto kuce pikap Yiyintet, nye puryo kot komuce met kenyis.
40016019	Mosokoniŋ ani nyi funkuwonok cepo poytoyisyetap torot, kunyo kiy ake tokol nye kerat nyi tay om wuli po koret ŋony, mosicetay kuratakay kiyoto om wulin po torot, nto kiy ake tokol nye ketyac nyi om wuli po koret ŋony, mosicityac kiyoto om wulin po torot.’’
40016020	Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomik kunkolontyi kule puryo kot kuroke kumwoci citake tokol kule neto kunye Ŋapanet.
40016021	Kuceke pesyonoto kuwo tay, kucec Yesu kumwoci kutorci konomik kule, “Misyino ani awo Yerusalem oŋnkuwataŋany toŋoŋutek ce caŋ om wule mite poyik oko tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosicepakäca, nto ye pesyet nyepo somok, mosiciŋeta otutune met.’’
40016022	Kukwer Petero Yesu kuwo tapan oŋnkupolyi kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, yaste, puryo kot kuroke kwiyokis ŋolyo nye yunyo om wule mite nyi mpo kisic!’’
40016023	Kuwekyikey Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Wete yu omite ani Setani! Yiku konokut nye kerektoy aremwani, omnye puryo kot kupo kasoteywek cekuk Yiyintet, ntene po piko!’’
40016024	Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ye möce citake tokol kule cepetekey oko ani, kumöce kunyilkey cicoto nkit, oŋnkunäm kutor murtowontenyi oŋnkuco cokunama cepetekey oko ani.
40016025	Omnye ci ake tokol nye möce kule osoru sopon nyi, mosukupot cito nyoto sopon nyi, ntene ci ake tokol nye kepot soponnyi omnye kacäma ani, mosukusor cito nyoto sopon nyi.
40016026	Muce ra kunyor cito latik ne ye keyum koret tokol kumukul, ntene oŋnkupot sopon nyi. Nto muce cito kwalya kiy ne sukuŋet kwale soponto.
