40016027	Omnye mosukuco Weritap cito kucontoy woyintap Papanyi oko nyepo malaykanikyi, oŋnkuco cokuyokyi citake tokol kuyu wule yunto yisyonutekyi ce kikwiy!
40016028	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite piko ce keyoŋ yuteyu ce puryo kot kupoku kutompo kot kukäs cekto Weritap cito kuconi om poytoyisyenyi.’’
40017001	Nto om letut nyepo pesyosyek lö, kukwer Yesu Petero oko Yakopo oko mutakwam Yowana kupa tulwet nye koy kwicek nkit.
40017002	Nteye kimite cek kuköse om konyekwa, kuwälkey tontap Yesu om taymwacek, kulekecec tokoyta nyenyi kukerkeyit asista, oŋnkulekececis sirokyi koromun.
40017003	Yoto kukäs konomik coto somoku kuŋolole Yesu oko Eriya.
40017004	Kuŋalal Petero kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, kiy nye topon omnye ce mite acek yuteyu, ye kecäm nyi, mosatec ani kisarinek somok, mokwek ake nyeŋuŋ, kupoyit ake Moses, kupoyit ake Eriya.’’
40017005	Nteye kimite Petero tokuŋolole, kuco polyet nyelel koromun oŋnkulum cek, yoto kucone kutit polyet orit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani nkit Camanet nye oŋerekyini ani koromun, olimnci neto!’’
40017006	Ntowo kulim konomik kutit, kumuyo koromun okoy koputyi ŋony kukutuny kuwec metewokwa kukäs ŋony.
40017007	Kuco Yesu okoy ye kimite cekto oŋnkunäm kumwoci kule, “Oŋetye, monte cemuye!’’
40017008	Yoto kukästa cek ntene kipuryo kot kukäs citake tokol, wokwek Yesu nkit pate nye kikäs cekto.
40017009	Nteye kimite kukwoni kurekune tulwet; kumwoci Yesu kunkolontyi cek kule, “Monte cemwoci citake tokol ŋolyontoni kokäs akwek okoy ye kaciŋet Weritap cito kotutune met.’’
40017010	Kutepe konomik Yesu kule, “Omne sukumwowu konetikap ntarastinek kule, Eriya nye mosukunyosyo kuco kunyo?’’
40017011	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Manta, Eriya kunye mosukunyosyo kuco kunyo cokusat tukuk tokol kunyol topon.
40017012	Ntene komwowok ani akwek kule, kico Eriya keny, ntene kipuryo kot kusow piko konket neto, ntene kwici cek neto ŋalek pate kuyu wule kimoktoy.’’
40017013	Kusow konomik yoto konket kule ŋololyini Yesu ŋalek ce nöme Yowana potisonintet.
40017014	Ntowo kukwa cek okoy kupun ye kimite piko ce caŋ, yoto kuco citake ye kimite Yesu oŋnkukutuŋe yepo taynyi,
40017015	oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet rire kalye werimwani nye me mewuŋ, nye kikotaŋany koromun, wircini mata okokoy oko peko orit.
40017016	Kokweru mpo kuco wule mite konomikuk, ntene puryo kot komuc cek kot kusop.’’
40017017	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Oyiku akwek pic ce puryo kot kucömisyi oŋnkoyiku mosotin, mosamuyte ani opur okoy pesyo ne? Kweru werit kuco yu omite ani!’’
40017018	Kupolyi Yesu oyinot, yoto kuŋet kuwo, kusop weroto om yoto pakenke.
40017019	Yoto kukwa konomik ye kimite Yesu om wule wuŋat oŋnkutepe kule, “Omne simo cimuc acek kot cekwet oyinot kuwo?’’
40017020	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Omnye puryo kot oponte akwek koyenot nye yeme. Komwowok ani akwek kule, nto kwoponte akwek koyenotet nyewo nye kerkey oko kupuswontetap ketit nye cekure Kalitarit, nto omuci kot omwoci tulwoni kule, ‘Ŋeyakisye oŋnkiwo wulin! Mosukuŋet kuwo wuloto! Kunyo nto omuci akwek kot ayiy kiy ake tokol.’
40017021	[Puryo aret ake tokol nye cimuce cekwete oyinot nye yunyi, ntene om somet oko kirisyetap omik pate nye muce.] ’’
40017022	Nteyu kowo kutuyo konomik tokol om Kalilaya, kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Karik cenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoci kunäm piko.
40017023	Mosicepakäc kume, nteye pesyet nyepo somok ciŋet kotutune met.’’ Kunyer konomik koromun.
40017024	Ntowo kuco Yesu oko konomikyi okoy kupun Kapernaum, kukwa piko co ruruce mosoret nyepo kotap Yiyintet ye kimite Petero oŋnkutepe kule, “Kweye ra konetintemwoŋ mosoret nyepo kotap Yiyintet?’’
40017025	Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci cek kule, “Kweye’’. Nteyu kowo kuwo Petero koto orit, kunyosye Yesu kuŋololyi neto kumwoci kule, “Simon, soti kulene? Piko oŋnkoco ce kwecini mosoret kinkonik cepo koret? Pikap koret nto piko co toyek?’’
40017026	Ntowo kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Toyek’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kunyo porukey kule puryo kot kukweye pikap koret mosoret.
40017027	Ntene puryo kot ce möce acek kule kunyer picu, kunyo näm rapanet oŋnkiwo tampayayet wenömisye, nto purpuryontet nye kenyosye näm kuco saŋ, ŋany kutit, mesenyorte pesyantet nye yeme mosoret nyimwani nyepo kotap Yiyintet oko nyeŋuŋ. Sutyi cek wekwewec mosorenyo.’’
40018001	Yoto pakenke kukwa konomik ye mite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Ŋo nyewo kupëlis om poytoyisyetap torot?’’
40018002	Kukur Yesu lekwa nye miniŋ oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe taymwacek oŋnkumwoy kule,
40018003	“Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye puryo kot aweckey akwek akerkeyitu oko lekoy, kupuryo kot omuci mpo kisic kot owut poytoyisyetap torot.
40018004	Cito nyewo kupëlis om poytoyisyetap torot kunye cito nye sutekey nkit ŋony kukerkeyit oko lekwani.
40018005	Nto cito nye katoroc kuŋerekyi lekwa akenke nye yunyi om kaynemwani kukatoroca kuŋerekyo ani cito nyoto.’’
40018006	“Nteye kamas kuwec ci ake tokol lekoy ce minkec ce yucu yeno ani kot kwiy lelisto, kuroke cerotyi katitap cicoto rwantetap paka nyewo oŋnkyewirci ruretyet orit kusir ye ketewurtoy lekocu.
40018007	Mite kwapi koret nyi mite tukuk ce wece piko kwiy miyotyet! Mosukwiyokis tukuk ceyucoto, ntene mite kwapi cito nyo sutu kwiyokis tukucoto!
40018008	“Ye yewuŋuŋ nto kerenkeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, yepte kulot oŋnkiwirte! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi wule mite soponto nye meponte yewut ake nto kerenket ake kusir ye kerip yewuniyek tukway oko kerenkok tukway oŋnkyewirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise.
40018009	Nteye koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, lotu kulot oŋnkiwirte! Omnye kaykay om wule mite nyi ye kewut wule mite soponto ponte koŋnta akenke pate kusir ye ponte konyek tukway oŋnkyewirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise.’’
40018010	“Möce okäs kule monte cenyil mpo akenke om lekok ce minkec ceyucu, omnye komwowok ani akwek kule, mite malaykanikwa om torot cepure okokoy taytap Papamwani.
40018011	[Omnye kico Weritap cito kule cosoru osop piko ce kipotyo.]
40018012	“Osoti akwek kulene? Mosukwiy kulene citake nye ponto kecirek pokol akenke oŋnkupot akenke om coto? Puryo kot kupokoktoy neto cut tomonwokik sokol ok sokol kupokokyi lakamet komos oŋnkuwo kuceŋat nyoto akenke nye potot?
40018013	Komwowok ani akwek kule, nteye kanyor kuŋerekyini keciryet nyoto akenke kupël cut tomonwokik sokol ok sokol co puryo kupotyo.
40018014	Kunyo om aret nye yunyoto kunye poru kule puryo kot kucöme Papamwoŋ nye mite torot kule kupot mpo akenke om lekok ce minkec ceyucu.
40018015	“Ye kokwiwuŋ yeyaŋuŋ miyotyet, roke iwo wule mite neto oŋnkiporci lelisnyi, ntene ayiy kuyunyoto om wule wuŋat ye akwek nkit. Nteye kolimuŋ ŋalek kukewec yoto yeyaŋuŋ.
40018016	Ntene ye katay molimuŋ, roke kwer opetekey citake nto piko alak oyeny sukuŋet kuporkey kutok ŋolyo ake tokol nyepo manta cepo piko muncururwanik oyeny nto somok, kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet.
40018017	Ntene nteye katay neto molimnci picoto ŋalek, roke mwoci ŋalecato tokol pikap Yiyintet. Nteye kotepe kot kutay molimnci mpo ŋalek pikap Yiyintet, roke sut nyi neto kwek ci nye lomin, nto kwek ci nye korurukintetap mosoret nye kicetay.
40018018	“Kunyo komwowok ani akwek tokol kule, ŋalek tokol ce korat akwek om wuli po koret ŋony, mosicerat ŋalek coto om wulin po torot. Nto ŋalek tokol ce kotyac akwek om wuli po koret ŋony, mosicityac coto om wulin po torot.
40018019	“Komwowok ani akwek yec kule, ye kocömncine piko oyenku om ŋolyo ake tokol nye kosom om wuli po koret, mosukwiwok Papamwani om torot.
40018020	Omnye om wulyo ake tokol wule keyomekey piko oyenku nto somok om kaynemwani omite ani yoto po kwenumwa.’’
40018021	Yoto kuco Petero ye kimite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Mokoryontet, omuci akalye yeyamwani aret cetya ye kalel om wule omite ani? Omuci akalye aret tisap?’’
40018022	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot omwowuŋ kule aret tisap, omwowuŋ kule aret tomonwokik tisap aret tisap.
40018023	Omnye kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko kinko nye kamac kule oyit pesenutekyi ce ponto mutworikyi.
40018024	Nteye kimite kuyitisyi, cekwerci neto cito akenke om picoto nye kiponto pesento nyepo pesanik ce caŋ koromun.
40018025	Kipuryo kot kuponto cicoto pesanik ce yeme ce mokuyokune pesento. Kumwayta yoto mokoryontenyi kule kyalya cicoto kwek mutworin oko korkenyi oko lekokyi oko tukuk tokol ce kiponto sukuŋet kuyok pesento.
40018026	Kukutuny mutworintonoto om taytap mokoryontenyi oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule, ‘Muytowo ani kuminiŋ, mosoyokuŋ tukuk tokol!’
40018027	Yoto kurire Mokoryontet cicoto okoy kukalya pesento, oŋnkwasta kuwecikey.
40018028	“Kuwo mutworintonoto okoy wokunyor mutworintet ake nye kiyoce neto pesan ce ŋeri pate. Kurotyi kunäm nyin katit oŋnkuket oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Yokwo ani pesennyu nye ponte!’
40018029	Kukutuny mutworintet nyin oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule, ‘Muytowo ani kuminiŋ, mosoyokuŋ pesenŋuŋ!’
40018030	Ntene kutoyis nyin, kunäm nyin oŋnkukoyito cekwer wecerotyi mopusi kule okoy kuyok pesento.
40018031	Ntowo kukäs mutworik cut alake ŋalek ce kokwiyokis, kunerekis kunyer koromun oŋnkupa wokumwoci mokoryontemwa ŋalek tokol.
40018032	Yoto kukur mokoryontet mutworintonoto oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Yiku nyi mutworin nye miyat! Kyakalyiŋ pesentye tokol yo kisoysoyo ani nyi.
40018033	Kunyo puryo kot kurokeniŋ rire kalye mutworintet nyin kuyu wulo kyokolyiŋ ani nyi?’
40018034	Kunyer mokoryontenyi yoto, kunäm oŋnkukoyito mutworintonoto wocerat citaŋany okoy kuyok pesento tokol.’’
40018035	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kunyo yunyoto wule mosukwiytak akwek Papamwani nyepo torot, ye puryo kot kukolyoy ci ake tokol om akwek yeyanyi om mukuleynyi.’’
40019001	Yoto ntowo kuŋalal Yesu okoy kuwany ŋalecato, kunomene Kalilaya oŋnkuwo kuketitakey okoy kupunto koretap Yuteya om oyinetap Yortan pitonin.
40019002	Kurup luket nyepo piko ce caŋ neto. Kusop Yesu cekto om wuloto.
40019003	Kukwa Farasayek alake wule mite Yesu oŋnkwokusyem kulot kutepe kule, “Cömncini ra ntarastinekyo cito kukwet korkenyi om ŋolyo ake tokol?’’
40019004	Kuwec Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek silutekap Yiyintet co mwowu kule: ‘Kitany Yiyintet om towunot moron oko korko?’
40019005	Oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Om ŋolyontoni, kuye sukuŋet kupakakta cito kwan oko kamet oŋnkuyomokey oko korkenyi, kwek picoto oyenku porto akenke.’
40019006	Kunyo komo ku pic oyeny, ntene kokwek porto akenke. Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini kupciy cito piko ce kikoyomo Yiyintet.’’
40019007	Kutepe Farasayek neto kule, “Kunyo omne sukukon Moses ntarastit nye muce kusil cito parwet nye kwetisye oŋnkukwet korket kuwecikey?’’
40019008	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kicömwok Moses akwet korukwok omnye oyiku wuyec koromun ye mocinetak. Ntene kipuryo kot kuyunyo ikye kunyo ye kicitonye koret.
40019009	Kunyo komwowok kule, ye kakwet citake tokol korkenyi, tos pate ye kasakwayan, oŋnkomüt ake kakwiy cicoto sakwayanat.’’
40019010	Kumwoci konomikyi neto kule, “Kunyo ye yunyo kopurto nyepo moron oko korkenyi, kupuryo kot kumisyini cekesyi koruk!’’
40019011	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kunöme ŋolyontoni ci tokol, ntene po piko pate co kikokoci Yiyintet.
40019012	Omnye mite ŋalek wok ce caŋ omne simokesyi ci tokol. Mite piko alake ce kiceyi kuyunyoto, kumite piko alake ce kikwiy piko sukuŋet kopur kuyunyoto, kumite piko alake ce puryo kot kukesyi omnye kicäm nkit om toponiyet nyepo poytoyisyetap torot. Kunyo möce kucäm ŋolyontoni cito nye cöme nkit.’’
40019013	Kukwer piko alake lekok kukwa wule mite Yesu kule sukuŋet kukemer neto yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto oŋnkusomnci, ntene kupolyi konomik kukerekta picoto.
40019014	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ayaste lekok kukwa wule omite ani, monte cekerekte omnye po poytoyisyetap torot lekok ceyucutecu.’’
40019015	Kukemer Yesu yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto, oŋnkunomen kuwecikey.
40019016	Yoto kuco citake oŋnkutepe kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, mosayiy ne ani ye sanyoru soponto nye mopoku?’’
40019017	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Omne setepena ani nyi ŋolyo nye nöme toponiyet? Mite cito akenke pate nye topon. Rip ntarastinek ye möce kule sonyoru soponto nye mopoku.’’
40019018	Kutepe cicoto Yesu kule, “Ntarastinek oŋnkoco?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kule, “Mente oporisye, mente asakwayan, mente acorsye, mente operperisye,
40019019	ywey kon oko komet, oŋnkicäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
40019020	Kuwekyi oyiperyontonoto kumwoci neto kule, “Kyorip ntarastinek coto tokol, kiy ne ake yec nye potwo ani?’’
40019021	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Ye möce kule onyolu, iwo weyalye tukuk tokol ce ponte oŋnkikoci pesanik pononik; mesenyoru mokoryontit om torot, oŋnkico cenäma cepetekey oko ani.’’
40019022	Ntowo kulim oyiperyontonoto ŋalecato, kunomen kunerekat kuwecikey omnye kimokoryo nye kiponto tukuk ce caŋ.
40019023	Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuwuyit koromun yemo kowut cito nye mokoryo poytoyisyetap torot.
40019024	Komwowok ani akwek yec kule, lekit kupunte nkamiyet koŋntap sintanit kusir ye mokowut cito nye mokoryo nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
40019025	Nteye kotolime konomik ŋalecato, kokite koromun oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Ku ŋo nyun cito nye cimuce kot cisop?’’
40019026	Kurotot Yesu cek, oŋnkuwec kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot komukoktos om wule mite piko, ntene mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
40019027	Yoto kuwekyi Petero kumwoci neto kule, “Käs pa, kicepakakte acek tukuk tokol oŋnkyinamiŋ nyi. Mosicenyoru acek ne?’’
40019028	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, om pesyosyek cepo kenyit nyelel, ye mosukopure Weritap cito ŋecerenyi nyewo nyepo woyinto, yoto ye mosopure mpo akwek konomikwani cu taman ok oyeny ŋecerok oŋnkomutyi musankunek arosyek taman ok oyeny cepo pikap Israel.
40019029	Nto om wule citake tokol nye kapakakta korik, nto mpo mutakwam, nto mpo cekwam, nto mpo kwan nto kamet, nto lekok, nto mosonok, omnye kacäm kaynemwani, mosukunyor cito nyoto cetosyi aret pokolwokik ce caŋ, oŋnkyikoci soponto nye mopoku.
40019030	Ntene piko ce caŋ ce mite yawut tayta, kuce mosukwokupoyit coto letut, nto piko ce mite yewut letut, kuce mosukwokupoyit coto tayta.’’
40020001	“Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko citap mparet nyepo ketik ce cekure sapipunek, nye kimusta kororn kuwo wokusil kopotik ce kepat mparenyi nyepo sapipunek.
40020002	Yoto kucömncin cicoto oko kopoticoto kule kukoci neto cekto silinkit akenke om yisyet nyepo pesyet akenke, oŋnkumwoci picoto kupa wokopotis mparetap sapipunek.
40020003	Kuwo cicoto yec motepo ye kimite sawet somok nyepo kororn, wokunyor piko alak ce kimite keyoŋ pate nye puryo yisyo nye yiye.
40020004	Kumwoci coto kule, ‘Ape mpo akwek woyiyisye mparetap sapipunek, mosokonok ani pesanik ce yeme.’
40020005	Yoto kupa cek. Kwiy cicoto kuyunyoto kuwo saŋ ye kimite sawet pet kwen, oko yec ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny.
40020006	Nteye kimite sawet karik kupunto taman ok akenke nyepo kosoleny kuwo cicoto motepo wokunyor yec piko alak ce kimite keyoŋ pate, kutepe kule, ‘Omne sawurte akwek pesyet opurene yu nye puryo yisyo nye oyiye!’
40020007	Kuwekyi picoto kumwoci neto kule, ‘Omnye puryo ci nye kokonec acek yisyo nye mokyiy.’ Kumwoci cicoto cek kule, ‘Kunyo, ape mpo akwek woyiyisye mparetap sapipunek.’
40020008	“Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kumwoci citap mparet cinyi nyewo kule, ‘Kur kopotik kukwa oŋnkipcici musyaremwa cece piko co kopo letut oŋnkuwewaŋnte piko co kopo tay co konyosyi kwiyis.’
40020009	Kukwa piko co kocec yisyet ye kimite sawet taman ok akenke, cikoci ci tokol silinkit akenke.
40020010	Yoto ntowo kukwa piko co konyosyi kwiyis yisyet kule cekonec pesanik, kusot co kule toskoy mocenyoru ce caŋ, ntene cikoci mpecek ci tokol silinkit akenke.
40020011	Ntowo kunäm cek pesanikwa, kuŋunyŋunyis om wule mite citap mparet,
40020012	kumwoy kule, ‘Kokwiyis piko cu kokwoni letut kuwany sawet akenke pate, kunyi keyoyekenec acek koci pesanik cete cicacek oŋnkurok kokyiyisye acek kupelec asis kwimen!’
40020013	Kuwekyi citap mparet kumwoci cito akenke om picoto kule, ‘Corwenyu, puryo kot kukolotuŋ ani, kopuryo kot cecömncine kunyo kule yiy nyi yisyet nyepo silinkit akenke?
40020014	Kunyo näm silinkit nyeŋuŋ oŋnkiwecikey kaŋuŋ, omöce ani kule akoci cito nyi kocece yisyet letut pesanik cete co kokoniŋ nyi.
40020015	Puryo kot oponte ani ne kamukeywek ce oyiyisye pesanikwani kuyu wule omoktoy? Nto kecoroku nyi so pate omnye kokolyoyisye ani.’ ’’
40020016	Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kunyo mosukwokupoyit piko co mite letut tayta, kupoyit piko co mite tayta letut.’’
40020017	Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kuloŋntoy Yerusalem, yoto kukwer konomikyi taman ok oyeny kupa tapan, oŋnkuŋololyi cek nkit möt kupeti om aran.
40020018	Kumwoci kule, “Cemite cepeti celoŋntoy Yerusalem wule mowocenäme Weritap cito oŋnkyekwer kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosukuwosontyi co oŋnkumutyi musankut cepakäc kume,
40020019	oŋnkyikoyito kuwo wule mite lamek ce mokucup, oŋnkupas oŋnkuwuytoci murtowontet, nteye pesyet nyepo somok ciŋet kotutune met kusop yec.’’
40020020	Yoto kuco kametitap werikap Sepetayo oko werikyi okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkukutuŋnkyi kusom kule cecäma.
40020021	Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Möce nyi ne?’’ Kumwoy kule, “Kurtoci mwowu kule, mosukopure werikwani cutecu oyenku ake yewuŋuŋ nyepo tay nto ake kopurune yewuŋuŋ nyepo let om poytoyisyeŋuŋ.’’
40020022	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot oŋnketi akwek kito nye osome. Omuci akwek kot opunte toŋoŋutek ce karik opunte ani?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Cimuci’’.
40020023	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Manta mosopunte toŋoŋutekwani, ntene puryo kot oponte ani kamukeywek akwey cito nye mokopurune yewumwani nyepo tay oko yewumwani nyepo let, po pate oteputek co piko co kikwiytoci Papamwani.’’
40020024	Ntowo kulim konomik cut tamanu ŋalecato, kunyerci picoto oyeny ce kitupco.
40020025	Yoto kukur Yesu cek tokol kukwa ye kimite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Oŋnket akwek kule, poytoyik cepo Lamek kuce ponto kamukeywek kupayta piko, kunyo poytoy cek piko.
40020026	Ntene puryo kot kuroke kuyuyit nyo om wule omite akwek. Ntene ye möce citake tokol om akwek kule oyiku nyewo, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintetap piko tokol.
40020027	Nteye möce citake tokol om akwek kule oyiku nyepo tayta, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintemwoŋ.
40020028	Kuyu Weritap cito nye kipuryo kot kuco kule cokwiwo piko yisyet, ntene kico cokwiyis oŋnkukoyito sopon nyi kwolis kusop piko ce caŋ.’’
40020029	Nteye kimite cek kunomene Yeriko. Kupa piko ce caŋ kurup Yesu let.
40020030	Yoto kulim piko oyeny ce kikoryo ce kimite kepur aret tapan kule Yesu nyitenyi nye mite kutile aran. Yoto kupol picoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, Weritap Tauti! Rirenec kalyec acek!’’
40020031	Kupolyi piko picoto kule kusisio, ntene kutosyikey kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, Weritap Tauti! Rirenec kalyec acek!’’
40020032	Kuyo Yesu oŋnkukur picoto oŋnkutepe kule, “Omöce akwek kule oyiwok ani ne?’’
40020033	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, ce möce kule ŋoŋwec konyekyo!’’
40020034	Kurire Yesu kukalya cekto oŋnkunäm konyekwacek. Yoto pakenke kukästa cek oŋnkurup kupetakey Yesu.
40021001	Nteyu kowo kurik cek Yerusalem, kukwa okoy kupun Pesepake om tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek. Yoto kuyokto Yesu konomikyi oyeny kupa tay
40021002	oŋnkumwoci ŋalecu kule, “Ape okoy opunte kayin nyin mite taymwoŋ, mosonyoru pakenke sikiryet nye ratat nye pontokey oko moyinyi. Atyac oŋnkokweru okoy yu omite ani.
40021003	Nteye katepenak citake ŋolyo, omwoci kule, ‘Möce Mokoryontet,’ mosukuketwok lakwar.’’
40021004	Kikwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyontet kule:
40021005	“Omwoci pikap Siyon, käs coni yawut kinko nyeŋuŋ wule mite nyi, nye tala nye kalany sikiryet, cone moytap sikiryet, nkaryantet nye kotoceye.’’
40021006	Yoto kupa konomik kuntoye oŋnkuwokwiy kuyu wulo kokomwoci Yesu.
40021007	Kukwer cek sikiryet oko moyita oŋnkuyitoci sirokwa potoyikap sikirok, oŋnkukoci Yesu kulany parak.
40021008	Kuyitoci luket nyepo piko ce caŋ sirokwa aran.
40021009	Kucec luket nyepo piko ce kipeti om taytap Yesu oko ce kikwone letut kupol kumwoy kule, “Cikaste Weritap Tauti; Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto nyi coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet! Cikaste Yiyintet!’’
40021010	Ntowo kupunto Yesu Yerusalem orit, kunäm polotet moŋet tokol kumukul, Kutep piko kumwoy kule, “Ŋo cici?’’ Kuwec luket nyepo piko kumwoy kule,
40021011	“Workoyontet Yesu nyi nyepo Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya.’’
40021012	Kowut Yesu kotap Yiyintet oŋnkukwetune orit piko ce kyolyoyisyi oko ce kyolisyi; kumil mesanikap piko co wöle pesanik, oko ŋecerok cepo piko co olyoy swororok,
40021013	oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosicekure komwani koto nye cesome.’ Ntene kunyi kwawec akwek kwek kepenet nye wuŋeke corik!’’
40021014	Kukwa piko ce kikoryo oko ce kikomwolis okoy ye mite Yesu om kotap Yiyintet. Kusop Yesu cekto kusopco.
40021015	Yoto kunyer tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek ye kotoköse tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto oko lekok ce kipole oŋnkurirtos om kotap Yiyintet kumwowu kule, “Cikasta Weritap Tauti.’’
40021016	Kumwoci cek Yesu kule, “Lime nyi ŋalek cu mwowu lekocu?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Olime manta, ntene tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, ‘Kyonet akwek lekok ce minkec oko ce rerye kukon kakastayeŋuŋ nye yeme!’ ’’
40021017	Kuwo yoto kupakakta cek oŋnkuwete moŋet okoy kupunto Pesaniya wule kiwo kuru.
40021018	Ntowo kuyekune kororn ye kimite Yesu kuweti moŋet, kwam neto rupet.
40021019	Yoto kukäs mokoywet nye kimite aret tapan, kuwo yepo ketoto ntene puryo kot wokunyorta kiy; sokek pate ce kimite. Kumwoci Yesu ketoto kule, “Kime yiye nyi kenyis omit!’’ Kuyam mokoywet yoto pakenke.
40021020	Kukäs konomik ŋalecato, kukite cek koromun oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Kayam mokoywet pakenke lakwar kulene?’’
40021021	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye oponte akwek koyenet nye puryo kot oponte yec kasoteywek alak, nto omuci kot omwoci tulwoni kule, ‘Ŋeyakisye oŋnkiwircikey ruretyet,’ Kwiyakay kuyunyoto.
40021022	Ye koyen akwek mosonyoru kiy ake tokol nye kosom om somsemwoŋ.’’
40021023	Ntowo kuco Yesu okoy kotap Yiyintet, nteye kimite kunetisyi, kukwa tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek ye kimite neto oŋnkutepe kule, “Po ŋo kamukeywek cu yiye nyi tukucu? Ŋo nyi kikoniŋ kamukeywecu?’’
40021024	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosatepenak ani akwek teputyet akenke, nteye kowekwo ani akwek nyitenyi, mpo ani mosowekwok omwowok wule onyortoy ani kamukeywek ce oyiye tukucu.
40021025	Kicone potisonisyetap Yowana wulin po torot nto kicone wule mite piko?’’ Yoto kurwoke cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Mocemwowu kulene? Ye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone torot,’ Mosukuwekwec kumwoy kule, omne satay akwek moyen ŋalekyi?
40021026	Nteye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone wule mite piko,’ Ciku acek yec nyokorec ŋalek ce muce kwiy piko, omnye cöme piko tokol kule kiworkoyo Yowana manta.’’
40021027	Yoto kuwekyi cek Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot cinket.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mpo ani puryo kot omuci kot omwowok akwek wule onyortoy ani kamukeywek ce oyiye tukucu.’’
40021028	“Kunyo osoti akwek kulene? Kimite citake nye kiponto werik oyeny. Kuweci kwan werit nyewo oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Wenyo, iwo pesyoni weyiyisye mparetap ketik ce cekure Sapipunek.’
40021029	Kuwekyi weroto kumwoci kwan kule, ‘Puryo kot oweti.’ Ntene om letut kuwec kasoteywekyi oŋnkunomen wokwiyis mparetap Sapipunek.
40021030	Yoto kuweci kwan werit nyin ake oŋnkumwoci kuyunyoto. Kuwec nyo kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet kacäm.’ Ntene oŋnkutay mowo.
40021031	Kunyo oŋnkono om wericoto oyeny nye kikwiy kito nye kimöce kwan?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Werit nyewo.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite yawut korurukikap mosoret oko koruk cemoronisyek kupeti kunyosyenok akwek kupa wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
40021032	Omnye kico Yowana potisonintet cokuporwok akwek aret nyepo manta nye misyini arup, ntene otay moyen ŋalekyi. Ntene kucäm korurukikap mosoret oko koruk cemoronisyek ŋalekyi. Nka mpo yu kowokäs akwek ŋalecato, kipuryo kot awec kasoteywekwok om letut oŋnkocäm ŋalekyi.’’
40021033	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Alimnte pa tyonkocet ake. Kimite citake nye kiponto mparenyi nye kiwu ketik ce cekure sapipunek, oŋnkuker tuyita komut, oŋnkupal mwenet nye cirurunye matuntanik, oŋnkutec kitarit nye ceripse. Yoto kukoci kopotik kukotesan mparanato, oŋnkunomen kuwo toyek.
40021034	Nteyu kowo kupunto pesyosyek ce rurye omikap sapipunek, kuyok cicoto mutworikyi kukwa wule mite kopotik kule sukuŋet kukoci sapipunek kererya ce kiciyoyekyin.
40021035	Yoto kunäm kopoticoto mutworikap cicoto, kupir ake, kupakäc ake kume, oŋnkuwire ake rwontok.
40021036	Kuyok cicoto mutworik alak ce caŋ kusir ce kipo tay. Kutaŋany yec kopoticoto mutworik coto kuyu ce kipo tay.
40021037	Nto om letut kuyokto cicoto werinyi nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Mosukuywey cekto werimwani kupoyit manta!’
40021038	Nteye kotoköse kopotik werit, kurwoc cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nyitenyi kunye kontiyintet, akany cepakäc kume, sukuŋet kwek nyinyacek kontiyisyet!’
40021039	Yoto kunäm cek neto oŋnkuwunuk kucone mparetap sapipunek oŋnkupakäc kume.’’
40021040	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo ye kaco citap mparet, mosukwiye ne kapoticoto?’’
40021041	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Mosukupakäc kopoticoto miyotec, oŋnkukoci kopotik alak kukotesan mparetap sapipunek, ce mosukukoci neto sapipunek kererya ye koruryo.’’
40021042	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic silutekap Yiyintet co mwowu kule, ‘Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule puryo kot kuponto latik. kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan. Mokoryontet nye kikwiye cutecu, kunyo po kakitat om konyekyacek!’ ’’
40021043	Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kunyo komwowok ani kule, mosicinumunenok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkyikoci piko ce muce kwiy yisyet nyepo poytoyisyonoto.
40021044	[Ci ake tokol nye kowircikey rwantanato kutirtiroktos cito nyoto, nteye kowircikey rwantanato citake, kunyirnyire cicoto.]’’
40021045	Yoto kulim tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek tyonkocokap Yesu oŋnkunket kule koŋolole neto ŋalek ce nöme cekto.
40021046	Kusyem yoto kule cenäm neto. Ntene kuywey piko ce caŋ ce kinkete kule workoyo Yesu.
40022001	Kuŋololyi Yesu yec piko kwiyisye tyonkocok kumwoy kule,
40022002	“Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko kinko nye kikwici werinyi sakwet nye kemütisye.
40022003	Yoto kuyokto mutworikyi kupa wokukur toyek ce kucekur kukwa sakwet, ntene kutoyis makwa.
40022004	Yoto kuyokto mutworik alak kumwoci kule, ‘Womwoci toyek kule, akäs pa kayiyte ani yawut sakwemwani, kaceyeny yeyikwani oko tuka ce yokwoyec kunyo keceyiyta tukuk tokol, akwa sakwet.’
40022005	Ntene kukwes pate piko co kucekure oŋnkunomen kupa yisyonutekwa, kuwo ake kamonkesyantinyi.
40022006	Kunäm ce kiŋetune yoto mutworikap cicoto kokursyi, oŋnkupir kupakäc kupok.
40022007	Yoto kunyer Kinko koromun, kuyokto sikarekyi kupa wokupar kupok poricoto oŋnkupel moŋemwa.
40022008	Nto kopok kukur mutworikyi oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Kaceyiyta sakwemwani, ntene puryo kot kucäm kukwa piko co kwokur ani.
40022009	Kunyo ape yawut wulo po orustunwekap moŋet, oŋnkokur piko tokol ce komuc kot onyoru kukwa sakwet.’
40022010	Kunomen mutworik kupa orustunwekap moŋet, wokoruruc piko tokol ce kimuc cekto kot kunyor; ce miyotec oko ce toponec, yoto kunyiw piko koto nyepo sakwetap komütisyet.
40022011	Kuwo kinko koto orit wokukäs toyek, yoto kukäs cito nye kipuryo kot kuloce sirok cepo sakwetap kamütisyet.
40022012	Kutepe kinko cicoto kule, ‘Corwenyu, kewut nyi koyi kulene yu meponte sirok cepo sakwetap komütisyet?’ Ntene kusis cicoto nye puryo kot kuwec ŋolyo.
40022013	Kumwoci kinko mutworik kule, ‘Arat cici yewuniyek oko kerenkok oŋnkuwunukte kuwo saŋ wule mite menonet, wule mowokurire oŋnkunyiy kelakyi.’ ’’
40022014	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Omnye caŋ piko ce cekure, ntene ŋeri pate piko ce cekweye.’’
40022015	Kupa Farasayek oŋnkuwokurwoc ŋomnonet wule muce cekto kot kulot Yesu om tintenotet kutepe teputek.
40022016	Kuyokto cek konomikwa alak oko piko alak cepo luketap Erote kupa wule mite Yesu. Kumwoy picoto kule, “Konetintet, cinket acek kule yiku nyi ci nyepo manta, oŋnkineti ŋalekap Yiyintet nyepo manta om wule mite piko tokol, nye puryo kot soti wule yunto piko wulo po porto saŋ.
40022017	Kunyo, mwowec acek, soti nyi kulene? Comwec acek ra ntarastinekyo cekweci mosoret Kinko nyewo nto puryo?’’
40022018	Yoto kunket Yesu kasoteywekwa ce miyotec kumwoy kule, “Akwek kaperperoticu! Omne sasyem akwek kule celotwo ceteca ani?
40022019	Oporwo pa pesyantet nye cekweye mosoret?’’ Kusutyi cek neto yoto silinkit.
40022020	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Po ŋo metit nyi oko kaynet nyi silot silinkit?’’
40022021	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Po Kinko nyewo.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo okocini kinko tukuk cepo Kinko, okocini Yiyintet tukuk cepo Yiyintet.’’
40022022	Ntowo kulim cek ŋalecato, kokite koromun oŋnkunomen kupecikey kupakakta neto.
40022023	Om pesyonoto akenke, kukwa Satusayek wule mite Yesu. (Coto ku piko co mwowu kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko ce kipok.)
40022024	Kumwoy cek kule, “Konetintet, kimwoy Moses kule, ‘Ye kame citake nye puryo kot kuyi lekok, kumisyini konti mutakwam korket nyo musuk, sukuŋet kuyici mutakwam nyo kime lekok.’
40022025	Kunyo kimite piko alake tisapu ce kitupco ce kiceminye acek tokol. Kukesyo nyewo komüt korket, kume nye puryo kot kuyi lekok. Yoto kupakakta korket nye kimüt mutakwam.
40022026	Kuyuyit nyoto kume mpo mutakwam nyepo oyeny, oko nyepo somok, okoy kuwoŋnkey kupok picoto tokol ku tisap.
40022027	Nto om letut kume mpene korket.
40022028	Kunyo om pesyet nyo citutune met, mosukupoyit ŋo korket? Omnye kikikomüt picoto tokol ku tisap!’’
40022029	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oyiku akwek mosotin koromun! Omnye puryo kot oŋnket silutekap Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnket swametap Yiyintet.
40022030	Omnye pesyet nyo ciŋete kotutune met piko kuye mosukukerkeyitu cek oko Malaykanik ce mite torot, nye puryo kot komütisyi moronik oŋnkupuryo kot cimüte koruk.
40022031	Nto ŋalek ce nöme kotutunetap met, tompo so kot asuman akwek mpo kisic ŋalek ce kimwowok akwek Yiyintet? Omnye kimwoy kule,
40022032	‘Oyiku ani Yiyintetap Apram, oŋnku Yiyintet Isaka, oŋnku Yiyintetap Yakopo.’ Poru ŋalecu kule neto kunye Yiyintet nyepo ce soptos, ntene puryo kot ku Yiyintet nyepo piko ce kipok.’’
40022033	Ntowo kulim piko ŋalecato, kokite koromun konetisyenyi.
40022034	Ntowo kulim Farasayek kule koŋololyi Yesu Satusayek okoy komukta kusisio, yoto koruruckey mpecek.
40022035	Kusyem akenke om cekto nye konetintetap ntarastinek kule olotu Yesu om teputyoni kule,
40022036	“Konetintet, ntarastit oŋnkono nyewo nye pëlisyi?’’
40022037	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Misyini cäm Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol, oko soponŋuŋ tokol, oko kasoteywekuk tokol.
40022038	Ntarastit nyitenyi kunye po tayta nye pëlisyi.
40022039	Nto nyepo oyeny nye kerkey nyitenyi kunyi kule, ‘Misyini cäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’
40022040	Yoŋune ntarastinekap Moses tokol oko konetisyetap workoyik ntarastinecutecu oyeny.’’
40022041	Nteyu kowo koruruckey Farasayek, kutepe Yesu cek kule,
40022042	“Osoti akwek kulene ce nöme Kristo nye Ŋapanet? Mosukwek keseniyantetap ŋo?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Yiku keseniyantetap Tauti.’’
40022043	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo omne sukuŋoŋnkyi Muyet Nyetilil Tauti kukure neto Mokoryontet?’’ Omnye kimwoy Tauti kule:
40022044	“Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryontenyu kule, pure yu po yewumwani nyepo tay okoy okoci ani punikuk kwek ŋecerok cepo kerenkokuk.
40022045	“Kunyo ye kure Tauti neto, ‘Mokoryontet’, komuce kulene yec Ŋapanet kwek keseniyantetap Tauti?’’
40022046	Kipuryo yoto ci nye kitokomuc kot kuwekyi Yesu ŋolyo mpo akenke. Nto kuceke pesyonoto kuwo tay, kipuryo yec mpo ci nye kitokusyem kule atepe neto teputek alak.
40023001	Yoto kuŋololyi Yesu luket nyepo piko ce caŋ wanak oko konomikyi,
40023002	kumwoci kule, “Konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek kuce kicikoci kamukeywek kunet piko topon wule yunto ntarastinekap Moses.
40023003	Kunyo misyini oywey oŋnkorup ŋalek tokol ce komwowok akwek kule ayiy, ntene monte ceyiye kuyu wulo yiytoy cek, omnye ŋolole pate ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kwiye ŋalek co nete cekto.
40023004	Rote terekok ce nyikisec oŋnkutorci metewokap piko, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kutwoye terekocoto mornet.
40023005	Yiye cekto kiy ake tokol kule sukuŋet kukäsec piko. Akäs pa lolonik cewoyec cepo silutekap Yiyintet ce nömote tokoywekwa oko yewuniyek! Akäs pa koyinto nyepo kototokap sirokwa ce loce!
40023006	Cöme oteputek ce toponec ce toku om sokwonutek oko ŋecerok ce kweyotin om korikapkok.
40023007	Cöme kule ciyweyec cisupayec topon om moteponik oŋnkucäm kule kukurec piko kule, ‘Konetin.’
40023008	Ntene puryo kot kumisyini cekurok akwek kule, ‘Konetin.’ Omnye oponte akwek konetintet akenke, oŋnkotupce akwek tokol.
40023009	Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini kot okure akwek citake nye mite koret kule, ‘Papa,’ omnye oponte akwek Papa akenke pate nye mite torot.
40023010	Puryo kot kumisyini kot cekurenok akwek kule, ‘Kantoyin,’ omnye akenke pate kantoyintet nyimwoŋ, nyoto ku Kristo nye Ŋapanet.
40023011	Ci nyewo kupëlis om wule omite akwek kunye roke kwek nyoto mutworintemwoŋ.
40023012	Ci ake tokol nye sutekey parak, mosicirekune nyoto, nto ci ake tokol nye sutekey ŋony, mosicilaŋnta nyoto kwek nyewo nye mokupëlis.’’
40023013	“Omite kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Okere akwek kurket nyepo poytoyisyetap torot sukuŋet mente kowut piko, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot owuti akwek nkit orit, oŋnkoyete mpo piko alak ce syeme kule ciwut orit!
40023014	[“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku koperperot! Onyoponi korikap musukik, oŋnkosilkey osome sayutek ce caŋ. Mosicemutwok akwek musankut nyewo om ŋalecutecu!]
40023015	“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Opesetoti ayay omutu ruretyet oŋnkopunte koret tokol omöce kule cewec cito akenke, nteye kowec cito nyoto, awurte yec kuwur cicoto kumiyatit aret oyeny kupëlok akwek, oŋnkuwo wule mite mata nye momise kuyu wule oyunte akwek nkit!
40023016	“Omite akwek kwapi koromun kantoyik ce koryotin! Onetisyi omwowu kule, ‘Ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap kotap Yiyintet, kupuryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo koromun kawalenyi, ntene ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap saput nye mite kotap Yiyintet kupoyitu kawalenyi manta.’
40023017	Oyiku akwek pkoratis ce solontoy! Oŋnkono kito nyewo nyepo manta? Saput nto kotap Yiyintet nye wece saput kutililit?
40023018	Onetisyi akwek yec omwowu kule, ‘Ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap otepto nye cepele korosek om kotap Yiyintet, kupuryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo koromun kawalenyi, ntene nteye kewalkey cito om kaynetap kokotutyet nye mite otepto nye cepele korosek om kotap Yiyintet, kupoyitu kawalenyi manta.’
40023019	Oyiku akwek pkoratis koromun! Oŋnkono kito nyewo nyepo manta, kokotutyet nto otepto nye pele korosek nye wece kokotutyet kutililit?
40023020	Kunyo ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap otepto nye cepele korosek, kukewalkey neto om kaynetap otepto nye cepele korosek wanak oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit.
40023021	Nteye kewalkey cito om kuynetap kotap Yiyintet kukewalkey om kaynetap Yiyintet nye minye koyoto.
40023022	Nteye kewalkey cito om kaynetap torot, kukewalkey neto om kaynet nyepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet oko neto nyo pure ŋeceranato.
40023023	“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Okocini Yiyintet akenke nyepo taman cepo nkuyek alak tokol kuyu cepsoconik, oko lapotik, oko mutunkurunek, oŋnkotay moywey ntarastinek ce pëlisyi, kuyu amut musankunek om aret nyepo manta oko tolosyet oko koyenet. Möce kule oyiye cutecu, ntene nye puryo kot oyostoy cut alak.
40023024	Akwek kaperperotik ce koryotin! Onumu akwek kolyomwet nye mite tukuk ce omöce kule ceye, ntene oŋnkolukuy Nkamiyet!
40023025	“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Osite cikompet oko sanit saŋ oŋnkurok kumite kinyiy orit tukuk ce kyonyapan oko soynonet.
40023026	Nyi Farasoyintet nye korat! Nyosye sit kunyo cikompet orit sukuŋet kunyol mpo wulo po saŋ.
40023027	“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Akerkeyekey mwenon ce kicetupci piko ce kiciyil kulelakitu ce toku topon wulo po saŋ oŋnkurok kinyiy orit koyekap piko ce kipok oko tukuk tokol ce kinun.
40023028	Kunyo oporukey akwek wulo po saŋ kuyu pic ce toponec oŋnkurok kukinyiy montuwokwok orit mwiynanet oko miyotyonik.
40023029	“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Otece akwek topon mwenonik co kicetupci workoyik oŋnkosat okararan mwenonik cepo piko ce tililec ce kipur kopurto nye topon,
40023030	oŋnkomwowu kule, ‘Nto kiceyiyec acek om kenyisyek co kipo mpo kukonyo, nto kipuryo kot kyiy acek ŋalek ce kikwiy cekto kupakäc workoyik.’
40023031	Kunyo ocöme akwek nkit kule ciku kesenisyekap piko co kipakäc workoyik!
40023032	Otosyikey nyun ape tay awaŋnte ayiy miyotyet nye kicece mpo kukomwoŋ.
40023033	Akwek erenoy! Lekokap erenoy! Osoti akwek kule cimuci kot cecilile mata nye momise?
40023034	Kunyo komwowok kule, mosoyoku ani kukwa wule omite akwek workoyik oko piko ce ŋomec oko konetik, mosopar akwek kupok alak, owuyitoci alak murtowontet, oŋnkopas alak om korikapkokwonikwok, okwet alak kupete moŋet ake okoy moŋet ake.
40023035	Kunyo om ŋalecutecu kuce mosonyoru akwek musankut nyepo piko co kicepar kupok ce kimoponto lelis, kuceke korotikap Apel nye kimoponto lelis nye kicepar kume, okoy porisyet nyo kicepore Sakariya weritap Parakiya nyo kyoporci akwek kwenutap otepto nye cepele korosek oko meset.
40023036	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukunyor piko cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu toŋoŋutek om ŋalecoto.’’
40023037	“Opo! Yerusalem! Yerusalem! Nyi nyo poköci workoyik, oŋnkiwire rwontok piko ce kiciyok kukwa wule mite nyi! Aret cetya ye kyamac ani kule oruruc lekokuk kukwa wule omite ani kuyu wulo ruruktoy nkokyet lekokyi koruruky kopopokyi orit, ntene toyisye nyi!
40023038	Akäs pa, mocepokokwok komwoŋ kwek kiratya.
40023039	Komwowuŋ kule, kuceke yawut kuwo tay, kemetekoso ani yec okoy ye mocemwowu kule, ‘Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet.’ ’’
40024001	Kunomen Yesu kumiŋnte kotap Yiyintet, nteye kiweti kukwa konomik kwokuporci neto wule kicetekta kotap Yiyintet.
40024002	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani kule, kokäs akwek rwontocu tokol cu mite yu, puryo rwantet mpo akenke nye mokuŋetune yu mite yawut, mosiciturpup tokol oŋnkyewirci ŋony.’’
40024003	Nteye kimite Yesu kukepur ŋony om tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek, kukwa konomik ye kimite neto oŋnkutepe möt kumwoci kule, “Mwowec acek, mosukwiyokis ŋalecutecu pesyo ne? Oŋnkukiy ne pelutyet nye yiyoktos sukupor kule kopunto pesyet nyo cone nyi oko ye ŋete koret.’’
40024004	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oripkey koromun, monte kot kuperperak kumasak citake.
40024005	Omnye mosukukwa piko ce caŋ om kaynemwani oŋnkwokumwoy kule, ‘Oyiku ani Kristo nye Ŋapanet.’ Mosukuperperis kumas piko ce caŋ.
40024006	Mosolim akwek kancoyto nyepo poryosyek ce lekitec oko ce mite wule low; ntene monte cemuye, mosukwiyokis tukuk ceyucoto, ntene kupuryo kot kuporu kule kopunto pesyet nyepo letut.
40024007	Omnye mosukusetyi kuporye koret ake koret ake, kuporye poytoyisyet ake poytoyisyet ake; mosukuco rupet, oŋnkuriŋriŋ koret wulyo tokol.
40024008	Ntene poru ŋalecutecu yoto kule kacec mwonintap toŋoŋutek kuyu korko nye kaŋet moyet.
40024009	“Yoto kuye mosukunämak akwek piko oŋnkukoytok wocitaŋanyak, mosiceparak opoku. Mosukusenkerak piko cepo koret tokol omnye kocäm kaynemwani.
40024010	Pesyosyecoto kuye mosukutay piko ce caŋ koyenet nye kweyene. Mosukuŋomntokey cek nkit oŋnkusenkerkey kwicek nkit.
40024011	Mosukutok yoto workoyik cepo mwiynanet oŋnkuperper kumas piko ce caŋ.
40024012	Kutosyikey yoto kuwoyit miyotyet oŋnkuminiŋit koyenet nyepo piko ce caŋ.
40024013	Ntene ci ake tokol nye kotitir kuyo okoy pesyet nyepo letut kunye mosicesor kusop nyoto.
40024014	Mocemwayta lokoywecutecu toponec ce nöme poytoyisyetap torot kupunto koret tokol kumukul sukwek kasowunot om wule mite piko cepo koret tokol. Nteye kapok, kuye kupunto pesyet nyepo letut.’’
40024015	“Kunyo ye kokäs akwek, ‘Kiy nye miyat nyo kiŋolole Taniel kumite keyoŋe otepto nyetilil.’ (Möce kunket cito nye sumone kule mwowu ne ŋalecu!)
40024016	Misyini yoto kumwey piko ce mite Yuteya kupa lakomosyek.
40024017	Ye mite cito konyi kisyek, kupuryo kot kumisyini kurek oŋnkuwo wokunum tukukyi ce mite koto orit.
40024018	Nteye mite cito mparen, kupuryo kot kumisyini kuweckey wokunum sirenyi nye mite koto orit.
40024019	Mite kwapi koromun pesyosyecoto koruk ce koyotin oko ce rerisyi lekok!
40024020	Osom akwek Yiyintet sukuŋet mente kot kupoyit mweyotemwoŋ ye pesyosyek cepo peŋat ye kayitit koret, nto ye pesyetap Sapat!
40024021	Omnye mosukutok yoto toŋoŋutek cewoyec kupël alak tokol ce kikikwiyokis kuceke ye kicitany koret okoy pesyoni, oŋnkupuryo kot kwiyoktos yec kenyis kitake nye yunyoto.
40024022	Ntomo nye kikwiri Yiyintet kuŋerinitu pesyosyecoto, nto puryo ci mpo akenke nye cimuce kot cesor cisop, ntene kikwiri Yiyintet kuŋerinitu pesyosyecoto om toponiyetap pikyi ce kweyotin.
40024023	“Kunyo ye komwowok akwek citake pesyosyecoto kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi Kristo nye Ŋapanet’, nto, ‘Oŋyin mite yun’, monte ciyen ŋalekyi.
40024024	Omnye mosukutok piko ce kurekey kule ciku ŋapanik, oko piko ce kurekey kule ciku workoyik. Mosukwiy picoto pelutok cewoyec oko tukuk cepo kakitat kule ye kemukakay ciperper cemas piko cepo Yiyintet ce kicekwey.
40024025	Kunyo alimnte omnye komwowok ani kutompo kot kupunto pesyonoto.
40024026	“Nto mpo ye komwowok akwek piko kule, ‘Akäs, oŋyin mite kitela!’ Monte cipe wuloto; nto mpo ye komwowok kule, ‘Oŋyi kewuŋekey yu!’ Monte ciyen.
40024027	Omnye mosukuco Weritap cito kuyu kaweket nyepo ilat nyo wece kupunte koret parak kuceke koŋasis okoy raraktay.
40024028	“Wule mitowune musto ku wuloto wule rurukyinikey motomwek.’’
40024029	“Yoto pakenke om letutap toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyecoto, mosukuweckey asista kutuyit, kutay arawet meluwu, mosukosuwune kokelik torot, oŋnkutimtimnkey swamet nyepo torot.
40024030	Mosukuporkey yoto pelutyet nyepo Weritap cito om torot, kuriryo kusyekey montuwek piko cepo koret tokol kumukul oŋnkukäs cekto Weritap cito kucone polyet nyepo torot kuponto swamet oko woyinto nyewo.
40024031	Mosukuciy kontit nyewo, mosukuyokto neto malaykanikyi kupa okoy toponutek amwan cepo koret. Mosukoruruc cek pikyi ce kweyanik kuceke koret tapanta ake okoy tapanta ake.’’
40024032	“Roke okäse akwek ketit mokoywet. Ye keŋot sokek ceci ce ŋorŋor, oŋnket yoto kule karik kuŋotyen kuropen koret.
40024033	Kuyunyoto ye kokäs akwek kwiyoktos ŋalecutecu kuye oŋnket kule karik kurkat poytoyisyetap Weritap cito.
40024034	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukwiyokis ŋalecutecu tokol kutompo kot kupok kuwoŋnkey piko tokol cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu ce soptos yawut.
40024035	Poku wulin po torot oko koret ŋony, ntene puryo kot kupoku ŋalekwani mpo kisic.’’
40024036	“Ntene puryo ci mpo akenke nye nkete kule coni pesyo ne pesyonoto, nto mpo kule sawet oŋnkono. Nka mpo Malaykanik om torot, nka mpo Werit. Papa nkit pate nye nkete.
40024037	Omnye kuyu wulo kiyunto tukuk ce kikwiyoktos om pesyosyek co kipo Nuwa, kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyet nyo coni Weritap cito.
40024038	Omnye om pesyosyecoto, ye kitompo kot kolum peko koret, kikwomisyi piko oŋnkuyesyi, komütisyi moronik, oŋnkyimüte koruk okoy pesyet nyo kilonye Nuwa kowute rapet.
40024039	Ntene kipuryo kot konkete piko kito nye kikwiyoktos okoy kunyiw peko koret oŋnkolum piko tokol. Kunyo yunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyet nye cone Weritap cito.
40024040	Om pesyosyecoto, ye mite piko oyenku kwiyisyi om mparen, mosicesut ake cepakakta ake.
40024041	Ye mite koruk oyenku kuŋosye rwantetap paka akenke, mosicesut ake cepakakta ake.
40024042	Kunyo oripkey, omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek kule pesyo ne nye coni Mokoryontemwoŋ.
40024043	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, nto yunye nkete citap koto sawet nye cone corintet, nto kösu nye puryo kot kurwe kot kwosyi corintet kuput konyi.
40024044	Kunyo misyini oyiytekey mpo akwek okoŋisye okokoy, omnye musukuco Weritap cito om sawet nye puryo kot oyityini kule coni neto.’’
40024045	“Kunyo omwowo ani pa akwek, ŋo mutworin nye cikenekey oŋnkuŋom? Nyoto kunye ye kokukoci mokoryontenyi kupayta mutworik alak, kupcicini cut omik om sawet nye cemokyini.
40024046	Ŋerekat koromun mutworintonoto nye ye kaco mokoryontenyi cokunyoru neto kwiyisyi kuyunyoto.
40024047	Komwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukukoci mokoryontet mutworintonoto kupayta tukukyi tokol.
40024048	Ntene ye mutworin nye miyat, mosukuŋalal kwine nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Tokulow ye mosukuco mokoryontemwani.’
40024049	Oŋnkucec kupir mutworik cut alak, oŋnkwomis oŋnkuyesyo oko pokitisyek.
40024050	Mosukuweckey kuco yoto mokoryontetap mutworintonoto om pesyet ake nye puryo kot koyityini kule coni oko om sawet nyo puryo kot kunkete.
40024051	Mosukuyepayep mokoryontet neto oŋnkukoyito kupot wanak oko koperperotik om wule mite rirek oŋnkyenyiy kelak.’’
40025001	“Om pesyonoto, mosukukerkeyit poytoyisyetap torot oko tipik taman ce mwenik ce kinäm tarinekwa oŋnkupa kutorokta cito nye kemütis.
40025002	Tipicoto taman, kiperper mutu kuŋomec mutu.
40025003	Kunämat co perper tarinekwa pate nye puryo kot kunämat mwaninek alak.
40025004	Ntene kunämat ce ŋomec tarinekwa oko mwaninek alak ce kimite cupanik.
40025005	Yoto kulilennkey cito nye kemütisyi okoy kunukis tipicoto kot kuruy.
40025006	“Ntowo kupunto komoy kwen, yoto kusesew polotet cemwoy kule, ‘Oŋyin kaco cito nyo kemütisyi! Ape atorokte!’
40025007	Kuŋetyo tipikey mwenik tokol oŋnkusat tarinekwa.
40025008	Yoto kumwoci tipik ce perper ce ŋomec kule, ‘Okonec mpo acek mwaninek cikwok omnye kapekune mwayta tarinek cico.’
40025009	Ntene kuwekyi ce ŋomec kumwoci cut kule, ‘Yunye puryo kot kuyemec cepcicine oko akwek, kunyo ape pate wule kyole wayal cikwok nkit.’
40025010	Kunomen yoto tipik mutu ce perper wokwolis, nteye kimite cek aran kupeti, kupun cito nyo kemütisyi. Yoto kupetakey tipik mwenik co kakayiytakey cito nyo kemütisyi wokwam sakwet, ceker kurket.
40025011	“Nto om letut kupun mpecek tipik cokey oŋnkwokukursyo kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, Mokoryontet, yotwec mpöcek kurket!’
40025012	Kuwekyi cito nyo kemütisyi kumwoci cek kule, ‘Komwowok ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek!’
40025013	Kuwaŋnta Yesu kumwoy kule, möce oripkey omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek pesyet nto sawet.
40025014	“Mosukukerkeyit poytoyisyetap torot oko ci nye karik kunomen kuwo toyek koret ake. Yoto kukur mutworikyi oŋnkukoci kupayta tukukyi.
40025015	Kukoci ci ake tokol om picoto kuyu wule kimuktoy yisyet. Kukoci ake silinkinek elifunek mut, nto ake kukoci nyo silinkinek elifunek oyeny, oŋnkukoci ake silinkinek elifut akenke, oŋnkunomen kuwo toyek koret ake.
40025016	Yoto pakenke kuwo mutworintet nyo kicikoci silinkinek elifunek mut oŋnkuwokwiyisye kamonkesyantit okoy kunyor latik silinkinek alak elifunek mut.
40025017	Kuyunyoto kwiyisye mutworintet nyo kicikoci silinkinek elifunek oyeny okoy kunyor latik silinkinek alak elifunek oyeny.
40025018	Ntene kuwo mutworintet nyo kicikoci silinkinek elifut akenke oŋnkupal mwenet oŋnkutupci kuwuny pesanikap mokoryontenyi.
40025019	“Nto om letut nyepo pesyosyek ce caŋ, kuweckey mokoryontetap mutworicoto oŋnkucokoyitis kusat pesanik oko picoto.
40025020	Kuco yoto mutworintet nyo kicikocini silinkinek elifunek mut oŋnkuco kukon oko latik silinkinek alak elifunek mut oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kikono ani nyi silinkinek elifunek mut, kunyo käs pa, kyoyiyisye kot onyoru silinkinek alak elifunek mut.’
40025021	Kumwoy mokoryontenyi kule, ‘Kiyiy topon, yiku nyi mutworin nye topon nye cikenekey! Omnye cikeneninkey nyi om tukuk ce tukusic, kunyo mokoniŋ ani payte tukuk ce caŋ, co ceyemnte ŋerekwekwani tukway oko nyi.’
40025022	Kuco mpene mutworintet nyo kicikocini silinkinek elifunek oyeny, oŋnkuco kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kikono ani nyi silinkinek elifunek oyeny, kunyo käs pa, kyoyiyisye kot anyoru latik silinkinek alak elifunek oyeny.’
40025023	Kumwoci mokoryontenyi neto nyoto kule, ‘Kiyiy topon, yiku nyi mutworin nye topon nye cikeneninkey! Omnye cikeneninkey nyi om tukuk ce tukusic, kunyo mosokoniŋ ani nyi payte tukuk ce caŋ, co ceyemnte ŋerekwekwani tukway oko nyi!’
40025024	Ntene kuco mpene mutworintet nyo kicikocini silinkinek elifut akenke, oŋnkuco kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kyonket ani kule yiku nyi ci nye wuy; kise nyi mpo mparet nye kipuryo kot kol, oŋnkiruruce omik wule kipuryo kot kol nyi kupuswek.
40025025	Kyanyokoritu ani, kunyo kyowo wopolyi pesanikuk ŋony. Käs okyu pesanikuk.’
40025026	Kumwoy mokoryontenyi kule, ‘Yiku nyi mutworin nye puren! Ye kinket nyi kule okise ani omik wule kipuryo kot akol, oŋnkoruruce omik wule kipuryo kot akol kupuswek.
40025027	Kunyo ye yunyo, kimisyiniŋ nyi konore pesanikwani Penki. Nto kwaconi kwocekono tokol oko latik.
40025028	Kunyo onumune neto silinkinek co ponto oŋnkokoci cito nyo ponto silinkinek elifunek mut.
40025029	Omnye ci ake tokol nye ponto tukuk, mosicetosyi kutosyikey tukukyi, nto cito nyo puryo kot kuponto tukuk, mosicinumune neto nyoto mpo tukusic co ponto.
40025030	Nto mutworintoni nyi moponto latik, owunukte kuwo saŋ wule mite menonet, wule mite rirek oŋnkyenyiy kelak.’ ’’
40025031	“Pesyet nye coni Weritap cito om woyinto kuyu Kinko, kupontonukey oko malaykanik tokol, mosucokopure yoto ŋecerenyi nyepo woyinto.
40025032	Mosiciruruc kukwa taynyi piko cepo koret tokol kumukul. Mosukukwey neto yoto cekto kupciwune oyeny kuyu wulo kweytoy mesewontet warek oko kecirek.
40025033	Mosukukoci kopurune kecirek yewunyi nyepo tay, oŋnkukoci kopurune warek yewunyi nyepo let.
40025034	Mosukumwoci Kinko yoto piko ce mitowune yewunyi nyepo tay kule, ‘Akwa! Kikonok akwek Papamwani kupeyok, akwa kwonyoru poytoyisyet nye kiceyiytowok keny kuceke ye kicitany koret.
40025035	Omnye kyoponte ani rupet, apaya akwek, kyoponte melelya, okono akwek peko, kyoyiku to, ntene atoroca ani akwek okwero korikwok.
40025036	Kyoweti pöc nye moponte sira, alaca ani akwek. Kyomnyoni, anyaya ani akwek, ye kyomite mopusi, akwa akwek kwakäsa ani.’
40025037	Mosukuwekyi yoto piko ce toponec kumwoci neto kule, ‘Mokoryontet, pesyo ne ye kicekösiŋ acek kwomiŋ rupet cepayiŋ, nto ye kyomiŋ melelya cekoniŋ peko iye?
40025038	Pesyo ne ye kicekösiŋ acek yiku to, cetorociŋ acek cekweriŋ korikyo, nto ye kimite pöc nye meponte sira cilaciŋ acek nyi?
40025039	Pesyo ne ye kicekosiŋ acek nyi mnyoni, nto ye kimite mopusi cekwa kwocekäsiŋ?’
40025040	Mosukuwekyi Kinko kumwoci picoto kule, ‘Kiy ake tokol nye kyoyici akwek akenke om mpo yeyamwani cutecu minkec kupëlis, kuce kyoyiwo ani akwek!’
40025041	“Mosukumwoci Kinko yoto mpo piko co mitowune yewutap let kule, ‘Aŋete yu omite ani akwek cu kicupok Yiyintet! Ape wule mite mata nye momise nye kiceyiytoci Setani nyewo nyepo oyik oko malaykanikyi!
40025042	Omnye kyoponte rupet, ntene otay akwek mopaya ani, kyoponte melelya, ntene oyetena mokono peko;
40025043	kyoyiku to; ntene otay akwek motoroca okwero ani korikwok, kyoweti ani pöc nye moponte sira, ntene otay akwek molaca ani; kyomnyoni ani, oko ye kyomite mopusi, ntene otay akwek monyaya ani.’
40025044	Mosukuwekyi mpecek picoto kumwoci neto kule, ‘Mokoryontet, pesyo ne ye kicekösiŋ acek nyi ponte rupet oŋnkyetay mocepayiŋ, nto ye kikwomiŋ melelya, nto ye kiyiku to, nto ye kiweti pöc nye meponte sira, nto ye kimnyoni, nto ye kimite mopusi oŋnkyetay acek mocikalyiŋ nyi?’
40025045	Mosukuwekyi Kinko kumwoci picoto kule, ‘Kiy ake tokol nye kyotay akwek mokalye akenke om piko ce minkec ceyucu, kunye kipuryo kot oyiwo ani akwek yoto yisyet.’
40025046	Mosukupa picoto wule mite toŋoŋutek cepo kenyis nye mopoku, ntene kupa piko ce toponec wule mite soponto nye mopoku.’’
40026001	Nteyu kowo kunetis Yesu okoy kuwany ŋalecutecu tokol, kumwoci konomikyi kule,
40026002	“Oŋnket akwek kule om pesyosyek oyeny ce kwoni, mosukwek sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet. Kunyo mosicenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito wocewuyitoci murtowontet.’’
40026003	Yoto kutuyo tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek korurukyikey kaytap Tisintet nyewo nye cekure Kayafa,
40026004	oŋnkurwoc ŋomnonet kule cenäm Yesu nye puryo konkete ci oŋnkyepakäc kume.
40026005	Kumwoy cek kule, “Puryo kot kurok cenäm acek neto ye pesyet nyepo sakwet, omnye muce kwiy piko pararet.’’
40026006	Nteye kimite Yesu kotap Simon citap mutyenkenik om Pesaniya.
40026007	Yoto kuco korket ake wule mite neto nye kipontonu mwayta nye poŋu topon nye nyitat cupet nye kyole mwayata pesan ce caŋ. Kunäm mwayata oŋnkuroŋnkyi metitap Yesu ye kimite kukepur kwomisyi.
40026008	Nteye kotoköse konomik kuyunyo, kunyer cek kutep kumwoy kule, “Kociwurtoci ne mwayi tokol?
40026009	Omnye kocimuce kyalya mwayi oŋnkyenyor pesan oŋnkyikoci pononik!’’
40026010	Kunket Yesu ŋalecato kimwowu cekto, kumwoci kule, “Omne sayim akwek Cepyosyani? Kokwiwo ani neto ŋolyo nye nyolunot koromun.
40026011	Omnye opontekey okokoy oko pononik, ntene puryo kot opuri ani okokoy oko akwek.
40026012	Kito nye kakwiy neto kunyi koroŋnkyi pormwani mwayi poŋu topon kuyiytowo ani muyisyet.
40026013	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule! Om wulyo tokol wule mocemwayte lokoywecu toponec, mosiceŋolole mpo ŋolyontoni kokwiwo ani cepyosyani cisote neto.’’
40026014	Yoto kuwo akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny nye cekure Yuta Isikaryoti wule mite tisik cewoyec,
40026015	oŋnkuwo kumwoci kule; “Mosokono ani akwek ne ye kakonok ani Yesu okoy onäm?’’ Yoto kuyit tisik silinkinek sosom oŋnkukoci neto.
40026016	Kuceke yoto, kuceny Yuta poroyinto nye topon nye mokuŋomnte Yesu.
40026017	Nteye pesyet nyepo tayta nyepo sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, kukwa konomik ye kimite Yesu oŋnkutepe kumwoci kule, “Ono wule möce nyi kule woceyiytowuŋ acek wule meyomisye omikap kosoleny cepo sakwetap Keytayet?’’
40026018	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ape wule mite citake nye minye moŋet, womwoci kule, ‘Komwoy konetintet kule, kakwitita pesyemwani nye kicekwey. Kunyo mosoyomisye ani kaŋuŋyi oko konomikwani sekwetap Keytayet.’ ’’
40026019	Yoto kuyiyta konomik omik cepo kosoleny cepo sakwetap Keytayet kuyu wulo komwocini Yesu.
40026020	Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kopur Yesu kwomis oko konomikyi taman ok oyeny.
40026021	Nteye kimite kwomisyi, kumwoy kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, mosukuŋomnto ani akenke om akwek.’’
40026022	Yoto kunerekis konomik oŋnkucec kutep ci ake tokol om cek kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, ani nyoto?’’
40026023	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Akenke om akwek nye mite kunoknoktoy mukatyantet nyenyi sanit akenke oko ani kunye mosukuŋomnto.
40026024	Mosukume Weritap cito kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto, ntene mite kwapi koromun cito nyo mosukuŋomnto Weritap cito! Kitopon nto kipuryo kot ceyi cico mpo kisic!’’
40026025	Yoto kuŋalal ŋomntoyintet Yuta kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, ani nyoto mwowu nyi?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Kemwowu nyi nkit.’’
40026026	Nteye kimite cek tokwomisyi, kunäm Yesu mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci konomikyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Onäm oyam, nyitenyi kunye pormwani.’’
40026027	Oŋnkunäm cikompet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci cek oŋnkumwoy kule,
40026028	“Oye akwek tokol cutecu, omnye korotikwani cutecu cepo kirotyet nyelel, ce citotocini piko ce caŋ sukuŋet kunum miyotyonik.
40026029	Komwowok ani kule, komo toye ani nfinyonicu okoy pesyet nye mosaye nfinyonik ce lelac oko akwek om wulin po poytoyisyetap Papamwani.’’
40026030	Yoto kutum cek tumnto oŋnkunomen kupa okoy tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek.
40026031	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mosomwey akwek tokol om kwomuwutap pesyoni oŋnkopakakta ani nkit, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukupar Yiyintet mesewontet, yoto kuseret kecirek.’
40026032	Ntene om letut ye kaciŋeta ani atutune met, mosontowok anyosye awo Kalilaya.’’
40026033	Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci Yesu kule, “Nka kot komwey piko alak tokol, puryo kot oyostiŋ ani nyi mpo kisic!’’
40026034	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Oŋnkisot ŋalecu! Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret somok om kwomowutap pesyoni, mesetuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule monketo ani.’’
40026035	Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot omuci ani mpo kisic kot atuckey omwowu kule monketiŋ nyi, nka kot koyek met cepoku mpo tukway.’’ Kumwoy konomik cut alake tokol kuyunyoto.
40026036	Yoto kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi okoy kupunto mparet ake nye cekure Kesesemane oŋnkumwoci konomikyi kule, “Opur yuteyu awo ani wosom om yun.’’
40026037	Kuwetokey neto Petero oko werikap Sepetayo oyeny. Yoto kucec Yesu kunerec kumuy oŋnkusot koromun.
40026038	Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Oponte nerekwek ce caŋ koromun om mukuleymwani kot karik kupakäca. Opur yuteyu, oŋnkokany cekösu oko ani monte ceruye.’’
40026039	Kuwo neto kunata tay kuminiŋ oŋnkuyim kukutuny, oŋnkusom kumwoy kule, “Papanyu, numuneno ani toŋoŋutecu ye mukoktos, ntene puryo kot kuyu wule omoktoy ani, ntene kuyu wulo moktoy nyi!’’
40026040	Yoto kuweckey kuco ye kimite konomik somoku, cokunyor kumite kukoruy. Kumwoci neto Petero kule, “Puryo so kot omuc akwek kot okösu oko ani awany mpo sawet akenke?
40026041	Kunyo okösu, oŋnkosom sukuŋet monte osuci syemutok. Cöme mukuleyto, ntene puren porto.’’
40026042	Kuwo Yesu yec nyepo oyeny oŋnkuwo kusom kumwoy kule, “Papanyu, ye puryo kot komukoktos kukeytena ani toŋoŋutecu, ntene möce nyi kule opunte ani, kante kwiyokis ce möce nyi.’’
40026043	Kuweckey yec kuco cokunyor konomik kumite kukoruy omnye kikinäm rwonto nyewo.
40026044	Kuwo Yesu yec kupakakta cek oŋnkuwo wokusom aret nyepo somok kumwoy ŋalek ce kerkey cokey co komwowu om panta nyepo tay.
40026045	Oŋnkuweckey kuco ye kimite konomik oŋnkuco kumwoci cek kule, “Tomite akwek oruytosi omunyi? Akäs! Karik sawet nye ce nöme Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm piko co ponto miyotyonik.
40026046	Oŋetye cipe! Akäs oŋyi cito nyo ŋomnto ani!’’
40026047	Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kupun Yuta akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny kupontonukey oko luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kiponto rotokap cok oko korokonik. Picoto kuce kiyoku tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek.
40026048	Kikikoporci Yuta picoto pelutyet kumwoci kule, “Cito nye katoroc ani aŋatut kunye cito nyoto, anäm nyoto!’’
40026049	Ntowo kupun Yuta, yoto kuwo pakenke okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkusupay kule, “Konetintet, purte nyi kalyet.’’ Oŋnkuŋatut.
40026050	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Corwenyu! Sorci lakwar yiy kito nye möce kule ayiy.’’ Yoto kukwa piko cut kwokunäm Yesu oŋnkurat topon.
40026051	Kocut cito akenke nye kipontokey Yesu rotwetap cok oŋnkuyep kulot yitit nyepo mutworintetap tisintet nyewo.
40026052	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ketyi cokiŋuŋ ye komite! Omnye piko ce yiyisye rotokap cok kuce pore picoto rotokap cok.
40026053	Puryo kot nket nyi kule omuci ani kot okur kokolyoyisyet kucone wule mite Papamwani oŋnkuyokwo ani lakwar sikarek cepo Malaykanik ce keyite lukosyek taman ok oyeny?
40026054	Ntene ye yunyo, komuce kulene kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet co mwowu kule, musukwitita ŋalecutecu om aret nye yunyitenyi?’’
40026055	Yoto kuŋololyi Yesu luket nyepo piko kumwoci kule, “Kakwa akwek kuyunye omöce kule cenäm corin? Omnye kakwante rotokap cok oko runkunek. Nteyu kwopuri ani pesyosyek tokol onetisyi om kotap Yiyintet, ntene puryo kot anäma ani akwek yoto.
40026056	Ntene kokwiyokis ŋalecutecu tokol sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek co kisil workoyik om silutekap Yiyintet.’’ Yoto kumwey konomik tokol kupakakta Yesu.
40026057	Kunäm cek Yesu oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto kaytap Kayafa Tisintet nyewo, wule kikikorurukyikey konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik.
40026058	Kurup Petero cekto let kuloyityi kuminiŋ okoy kupunto saŋntap kaytap Tisintet nyewo. Yoto kuwo Petero kayta orit oŋnkopur ŋony wanak oko sikarek ce kiripsi kule sakas wule mukupeta ŋalek tokol.
40026059	Yoto kusyem yoto tisik cewoyec poyik oko piko cepo kokwet kule ceceny piko muncururwanik ce komwoy lelisto nye nöme Yesu kule sukuŋet cepakäc kume,
40026060	Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor ŋolyo nyepo lelis mpo akenke, nka kot kiyoŋ piko alake ce caŋ oŋnkumwoy ŋalek cepo mwiynan ce nöme neto. Nto om letut kukwa piko alake oyenku oŋnkwokuyoŋ tay,
40026061	oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kumwoy cici kule, ‘Omuci oturpup kotap Yiyintet oŋnkatec yec om pesyos somok pate.’ ’’
40026062	Kuyo Tisintet nyewo oŋnkumwoci Yesu kule, “Puryo kot ŋololi wec ŋalekyu cewosontyiŋ nyi?’’
40026063	Ntene kusis Yesu tokol. Kuŋalal Tisintet nyewo yec kumwoci kule, “Omöce ani kule walkey nyi yawut om kaynetap Yiyintet nye sopot! Mwowec acek, yiku nyi Ŋapanet Weritap Yiyintet?’’
40026064	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kemwowu nyi, Ntene komwowok ani akwek tokol kule kuceke yawut kuwo tay, mosokäs Weritap cito kumite kepure komostap yewut nyepo tay nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, oŋnkucone polik cepo torot!’’
40026065	Om ŋalecato, kuye kupac Tisintet nyewo sirokyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kanyil Yiyintet? Komo cemöce acek yec piko muncururwanik alak! Kunyo kalim akwek om yuteyu ŋalekyi ce miyotec.
40026066	Osoti akwek kulene?’’ Kuwec piko kumwoy kule, “Lelat, kunyo misyini cepakäc kume.’’
40026067	Yoto kuŋutyi cek neto oŋnkutuluc, oŋnkusyec alake,
40026068	Kumwowu kule, “Nyi Ŋapanet, ŋor mwowec acek ŋo nyi kopiriŋ nyi!’’
40026069	Kimite Petero yoto kukepur yepo kayta saŋ, yoto kuco korko nye mutworin nyepo Tisintet nyewo ye kimite neto oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kepontekey mpenyi Yesu nyepo Kalilaya.’’
40026070	Ntene kutuckey kutoyis Petero om taytap piko tokol kuwec kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani ŋalek ce mwowu nyi.’’
40026071	Kunomen Petero kuwo yepo kurket nyepo kayta saŋ. Yoto kukäs cepto ake nye mutworin Petero, kumwoci cepto piko ce kimite yoto kule, “Kopontokey cici oko Yesu nyepo Nasaret.’’
40026072	Kutuckey Petero yec kuwalkey kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani cico.’’
40026073	Nto om letut yec kuminiŋ kukwa piko ce kimite keyoŋ om yoto kimite Petero oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yiku nyi manta akenke om cekto, omnye poru ŋalaleŋuŋ.’’
40026074	Yoto kuwalkey Petero kucupkey kumwoy kule, “Kupar asis! Puryo kot oŋnket ani cico.’’ Yoto pakenke koncur kurkonkit,
40026075	kusot Petero ŋalek co kumwowu Yesu, “Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret somok, mesetuckey nyi taya ani aret somok mwowu kule monketo ani.’’ Yoto kuwo saŋ oŋnkurir lokik ce caŋ koromun.
40027001	Ntowo kuyec koret pate, kurwoc tisik cewoyec tokol oko poyikap Yutayek aret wule sukuŋet kupakäc Yesu kume.
40027002	Kurate cek neto nyororonik oŋnkukwer kuwo wule mite poytoyintet Pilato.
40027003	Nteyu kowo kukäs Yuta ŋomntoyintet kule kocemutyi Yesu musankut cepakäc kume, yoto kurenynkey oŋnkunäm silinkinekye sosom oŋnkusutyi tisik cewoyec oko poyik.
40027004	Kumwoy kule, “Kwalel ani ayiy miyotyet aŋomnte korotikap ci nye moponto lelis!’’ Ntene kuwec cekto kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kunömec acek lelisto nyepo ŋalekyo, nyeŋuŋ lelisto nkit!’’
40027005	Kuwirci Yuta pesanik kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkunomen kuwo wokuketkey nkit.
40027006	Kukwey tisik cewoyec pesanik oŋnkumwoy kule, “Pesanicu kuce kucale koroti, kunyo puryo kot kucöme ntarastinekyacek cekonore wule mite pesanikap kotap Yiyintet.’’
40027007	Nteyu kowo kucömncin cek kwale pesanicato mparetap cito nye yiye terenik sukwek mparanato mparet nye cemucini toyek ce kopok.
40027008	Kunyo sukuŋet cekure maswanato, “Maswetap koroti’’, okoy kunyi.
40027009	Yoto kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kiŋalal workoyontet Yeremiya kumwoy kule, “Kinäm cek silinkinek sosom pesanik ce kikicäm pikap Israel kule kyale neto
40027010	oŋnkwiyisye cekto pesanicato kwale mparetap cito nye yiye terenik, kuyu wulo kikimwowo ani Mokoryontet.’’
40027011	Kuyoŋe Yesu taytap poytoyintet, kutepe poytoyintet neto kule, “Yiku nyi kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kemwowu nyi.’’
40027012	Kuwosontyi tisik cewoyec oko poyik Yesu, ntene kusis Yesu nye puryo kot kuwec ŋolyo.
40027013	Kumwoci Pilato neto kule, “Puryo kot lime ŋalek tokol cu wosontyiŋ nyi cek?’’
40027014	Yoto kutay Yesu mawec ŋolyo mpo akenke okoy kukite poytoyintet koromun.
40027015	Kwak okokoy ye pesyetap sakwet nyepo Keytayet, kiponto poytoyintet kopurto nye tyoktoy mopusyontet ake tokol nye kosom piko neto.
40027016	Kimite yoto mopusi mopusyontet ake nye sokoran nye cekure Parapa.
40027017	Nteyu kowo koruruckey piko kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Oŋnkono nye omöce akwek kule otyokwok ani, Parapa nto Yesu nye cekure Ŋapanet?’’
40027018	Omnye kinket Pilato kule kokwer cek Yesu kwokuwosontyine wule mite neto om corokyinot pate.
40027019	Nteye kimite Pilato kukepure ŋeceret nye mute musankunek, kuyok korkenyi ŋolyontet kumwoci kule, “Mente kot ayiye kiy cico moponto lelis, omnye kwetaŋanya ani koromun kirwotik cepo ŋalek ce nöme neto.’’
40027020	Ntene kowurur tisik cewoyec oko poyik luket nyepo piko kumwoci kusom Pilato kutyac Parapa oŋnkupakäc Yesu kume.
40027021	Ntene kutepe poytoyintet cek kule, “Oŋnkono om picutecu oyeny nye omöce kule otyokwok ani akwek?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Cemöce Parapa!’’
40027022	Kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Kunyo omöce akwek kule ayiye ani ne Yesu nye cekure Ŋapanet!’’ Kuwec piko tokol kumwoy kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
40027023	Ntene kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Omne, kukwiy lelis ne?’’ Yoto kutosyikey piko kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
40027024	Ntowo kukäs Pilato kule komomuci kot akalye mpo kisic, oko yec kule muce kucec pararet, yoto kunäm peko oŋnkowun yewuniyekyi om taytap piko tokol, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oponte ani lelis om korotikap Cici! Nömok akwek nkit lelisto!’’
40027025	Kuwec piko tokol kumwoy kule, “Kunämec acek lelisto nyepo korotikyi oko lekokyacek!’’
40027026	Yoto kutyokyi Pilato cekto Parapa, oŋnkumwayta cepas Yesu oŋnkukoyito cekwer wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
40027027	Kukwer sikarekap Pilato Yesu kuwo kaytap Poytoyintet orit, oŋnkorurukyikey luket nyepo sikarek tokol komut Yesu.
40027028	Konumune sirokyi oŋnkulokyi siret nye mur kwarra,
40027029	oŋnkuta nkwatyet nyepo kotok oŋnkukoci metinyi, oŋnkukoci kunäme korokto yewutap tay, oŋnkukutuŋe yepo taynyi, oŋnkucasekey kumwoy kule, “Cisupoyiŋ kinko nyepo Yutayek! Ilaŋnte!’’
40027030	Kuŋutyi cek neto oŋnkunumune korokto kupire metit.
40027031	Nteyu kowo kucasekey cek okoy kupok, kunumune siret nye mur kwarra oŋnkuketyi kulokyi sirokyi oŋnkukwer kuwo wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
40027032	Nteye kimite cek kupeti, kutuye citake nyepo koretap Kurene nye cekure Simon, yoto kukerci cek neto koŋ kukonop murtowontetap Yesu.
40027033	Kupa cek okoy ye cekure, “Kolokosa’’ nye poru kule “Rokyetap Metit.’’
40027034	Kukoci cek neto kuye nfinyonik ce mwonec ce kacetase akatanet. Ntowo kucemcem Yesu, kutay maye.
40027035	Kuwuyitoci cekto neto murtowontet oŋnkupcicin sirokyi kuporci kirot.
40027036	Nto kapok, kopur cek ŋony oŋnkurip kukäs Yesu.
40027037	Kutore yepo metinyi parak ŋalek cepo musankunyi ce kicesil kule, “Nyi ku Yesu Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’’
40027038	Cewuyitoci corik oyeny murtowonik oko Yesu, kopurune ake yewunyi nyepo tay, nto ake kopurune yewunyi nyepo let.
40027039	Kulelec metewokwa piko ce kimite kupeti kutile om aran oŋnkucup cek neto kumwoy kule,
40027040	“Nyi nyo kwemöce kule aturpup kotap Yiyintet oŋnkitec yec om pesyosyek somok! Sopkey ra nkit rekune murtowontet ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet. ’’
40027041	Koncurururis kuyunyoto mpecek tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik kumwoy kule,
40027042	“Kwesope neto piko alak, ntene kunyo puryo kot komuce kusopkey neto nkit. Puryo kot ku Kinko neto nyepo Israel? Ye korekune neto yawut murtowontet, mosiciyen acek ŋalekyi.
40027043	Kwenekey neto Yiyintet, kumwowu kule oyiku Weritap Yiyintet, kunyo cemöce cekäs oŋnkomuce cokusop Yiyintet neto yawut!’’
40027044	Kucup mpo corik ce kicewuyitoy oko neto kumwoci ŋalek ceyucoto.
40027045	Ntowo kupunto sawet pet kwen, kunäm menonet kutuyit koret tokol nye kipur kuwany sawanik somok.
40027046	Ntowo kurik kupunto sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny kuŋalal Yesu kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Eli, Eli, lema sapaksani.’’ Ce mwowu ŋaleca kule, “Yiyintenyu, Yiyintenyu, omne seyasta ani nyi?’’
40027047	Nteye kotolime piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto ŋalekyi, kumwoy cek kule, “Mite kukure Eriya!’’
40027048	Kulapat lakwar akenke om picoto oŋnkunum cankut oŋnkolumnta wule mite nfinyonik oŋnkurutyi tekantet oŋnkusyem kule cikoci kuye.
40027049	Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Tekany pa, cekäs oŋnkuconi Eriya cokusop neto!’’
40027050	Kuŋalal Yesu yec om kutit nyewo, oŋnkomuny komuŋnto nyepo letut.
40027051	Yoto kukerer siret nye cepciye kotap Yiyintet kuceke met okoy kel, oŋnkuriŋriŋ koret, kutesis rwontok,
40027052	kuyotokis mwenonik ce kicetupci muswek, kuŋetye kotutune met piko cepo Yiyintet ce kipok.
40027053	Kuŋetye picoto mwenonik, nto om letut yu kowo kotutune met Yesu, kupa picoto okoy moŋet Nyetilil wule kiwo kukäse piko ce caŋ cek picoto.
40027054	Yoto kukäs nyewo nyepo sikarek oko sikarek ce kipontokey ce kiripe Yesu koriŋriŋetap koret oko tukuk tokol ce keyokis, kumuyo cek koromun kumwoy kule, “Koko Weritap Yiyintet cici manta!’’
40027055	Kimite yoto koruk ce caŋ ce kimite ye low kuminiŋ ce kimite kuköse Yesu. Korucoto kuce kikwoni kurupu Yesu kuceke Kalilaya sukukolyoy yisyet.
40027056	Om cek coto ku Mariyam nyepo Maktala, oko Mariyam Kametitap Yakopo oko Yosep, oko kametitap werikap Sepetayo.
40027057	Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kuco citake nye mokoryo nyepo koretap Arimaseya nye cekure Yosep nye kikikwek konomintetap Yesu.
40027058	Yoto kuwo neto wule mite Pilato oŋnkusom cikoci portap Yesu. Kumwayta Pilato cikoci neto musto.
40027059	Kunumune Yosep porto murtowontet oŋnkurate suket nyelel,
40027060	oŋnkukoci mwenenyi nkit nye kutokupole yepo rwantet nye kepenet, oŋnkunäm rwantet nyewo kukere kurketap mwenet oŋnkunomen kuwecikey.
40027061	Kimite yoto kukepur kutokyikey mwenet Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam nyin ake.
40027062	Nteye kipesyet nyepo oyeny, nyoto ku pesyet nye rupe pesyet nyo ceyiytoykey. Kutuyo tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek oko Pilato,
40027063	oŋnkumwoci cek Pilato kule, “Mokoryontet, kacisot acek ŋalek ce kimwoy mwintoni ye kitokusope kule, ‘Mosotutune met om letutap pesyosyek somok’.
40027064	Kunyo mwayte cerip mwenet topon okoy kupok pesyosyek somoku, sukuŋet mente kupa konomikyi wokucor musto oŋnkumwoci piko kule, ‘Kokotutune met.’ Mosukuwoyit koperperisyet nyepo letut kusir nye kipo tay kunyo.’’
40027065	Kumwoci Pilato cekto kule, “Oponte akwek sikarek ce ripsi, ape worip topon koromun kuyu wule omuktoy.’’
40027066	Kunomen cek kupa oŋnkuwokuker mwenet topon kukoci pelutyet nye poru oŋnkukoci sikarek kurip.
40028001	Ntowo kupok pesyetap Sapat, nye kerir koret pate ye pesyetap Santey, kuwo Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam nyin ake wokukäs mwenet.
40028002	Yoto koriŋriŋ koret koromun, kucone malayketap Mokoryontet torot cokuwunukto rwantet oŋnkopure parak.
40028003	Kikerkey tonto nyenyi oko kaweket nyepo ilat, oŋnkulelac sirokyi piw kuyu plelityet nyepo koyantet.
40028004	Kumuyo kupoton sikarek ce kiripsi koromun kukerkeyitu pic ce kapok.
40028005	Kuŋololyi malayket korucoto kumwoci kule, “Monte cemuye, oŋnket ani kule ocenye akwek Yesu nyo kucewuyitocini murtowontet.
40028006	Puryo kot kumite yu, kokotutune met kuyu wulo kimwayta neto. Akwa pa yu kwakäs ye kucemuci.
40028007	Kunyo ape yawut asartekey lakwar womwoci konomikyi kule, ‘Kokotutune met’, kunyo mite yawut kontowok akwek kuweti Kalilaya wule mawanyorte! Kunyo möce asot ŋalek ce komwowok ani akwek.’’
40028008	Yoto kusartakey cek kupete yepo mwenet kukomuyo oŋnkuŋerekotin. Kurway cek wokumwoci konomikyi.
40028009	Yoto pakenke kutuye Yesu cek oŋnkutakwes kule, “Takwenyo.’’ Kukwa cek kuric Yesu oŋnkukutuny kunäm kerenkokyi kusay.
40028010	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Monte cemuye, ape womwoci mpo yeyamwani konomik kupa Kalilaya wule mosukukäsena ani cekto.’’
40028011	Nteye kimite koruk aran kupeti, yoto kupa sikarek alake co kiripe mwenet okoy kupunto moŋet oŋnkuwo kumwoci tisik cewoyec ŋalek tokol ce kokwiyokis.
40028012	Koruruckey tisik cewoyec oko poyik oŋnkurwoc ŋomnonet. Kukoci cek sikarek pesanik ce caŋ,
40028013	oŋnkumwoci kule, “Möce omwowu kule, kukwa konomikyi komoy cemite acek koceruye oŋnkwokucor musnyi.
40028014	Nteye kalim poytoyintet ŋalecutecu, mosiceŋololyi acek neto okoy cimukte nye komo oponte akwek ŋolyo ake tokol nye omuye.’’
40028015	Kunäm sikarek co kiripsi pesanik, oŋnkwiy kuyu wulo kocemwoci cekto. Kutisto ŋolyontono om wule mite Yutayek tokol okoy pesyoni.
40028016	Kupa konomik tamanu ok akenke okoy tulwet ake om Kalilaya wule kikimwoci Yesu cek kupa wuloto.
40028017	Nteye kotoköse cek neto kukutuŋe yepo taynyi kusay nka kot kipuryo kot kucömis alake om cekto.
40028018	Kunokyi Yesu ye mite cekto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kacekono ani kamukeywek tokol om torot oko koret ŋony.
40028019	Kunyo ape wule mite piko cepo koret tokol kumukul, wanet kwek konomik, wapatisan om kaynet nyepo Papa, oko nyepo Werit, oko nyepo Muyet Nyetilil,
40028020	oŋnkonet kuywey ŋalek tokol co kyomwowok ani akwek. Kunyo möce oŋnket kule opontekey ani oko akwek okokoy pesyet nyepo letut.’’
41001001	Yunyi wule yunto lokoywek ce toponec ce nöme Yesu Kristo, nye Weritap Yiyintet.
41001002	Kicec kuyu wulo kisil workoyontet Isaya kule: “Mwowu Yiyintet kule: Akäs pa, oyoku ani kiyokintenyu kuntowuŋ nyi; nye mosukutemuŋ areŋuŋ.
41001003	Kapole citake kitela; ayiytoci Mokoryontet arenyi, asat kurotakay arenyi nye mosukupunte!’’
41001004	Yoto koporkey Yowana om koretap kitela, oŋnkupatisan piko oŋnkumwoci lokoywekyi kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok oŋnkyepatisanak sukuŋet kukalyak Yiyintet miyotyonikwok.’’
41001005	Yoto kupa piko tokol cepo koretap Yuteya oko cepo moŋetap Yerusalem wule mite Yowana wokulimnta ŋalekyi. Kurenynkey cek kuŋoŋ kupor miyotyonikwa oŋnkupatisan Yowana cek om oyinetap Yortan.
41001006	Kiloce Yowana yoto siret nye kicenape kororikap tyonyntake nye cekure nkamiyet oŋnkurate anwet suwenyi. Kikwome talamik oko kumnyatetap samiyita.
41001007	Kumwoci Yowana piko ŋalek kule, “Coni om letumwani citake nyewo nye ponto swamet kupëlo ani, nye puryo kot kuyemo oyimnci aŋnkatyac porokap kweyonikyi.
41001008	Opotisonenok ani yawut peko, ntene mosukupatisanenak Muyet Nyetilil.’’
41001009	Om pesyosyecoto, kucone Yesu moŋetap Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya, yoto kupatisan Yowana Yesu om oyinetap Yortan.
41001010	Nteye kimite neto kuloŋune peko, kukäs pakenke kuyatakay wulin po torot oŋnkuco kurekyi Muyet Nyetilil neto nye kerkey swarar.
41001011	Yoto kucone kutit torot kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Werimwani camanet, oŋerekyiŋ ani nyi koromun.’’
41001012	Yoto pakenke kukwer Muyet Nyetilil Yesu kuwo okoy kitela.
41001013	Kopur Yesu wuloto po kitela kuwany pesyosyek artam; kusyem Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, kule olotu Yesu. Kipontokey neto om wuloto tyoŋikap kitela pate. Ntene kukwa Malaykanik kwokukalya neto.
41001014	Nto om letut yu kowo cenäm Yowana cekerta mopusi, yoto kuwo Yesu okoy Kalilaya kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet.
41001015	Kumwoy kule, “Kacontyok akwek pesyet nyo kicekwey, kunyo karik poytoyisyetap Yiyintet! Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok oŋnkocäm lokoywek ce toponec.’’
41001016	Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kurupe tapantap tampayayetap Kalilaya, yoto kukäs Yesu Simon oko mutakwam Antereya ce kimite kuwircini porok tampayayet omnye kinömik ce nöme purpurunek.
41001017	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwa arupa cepetekey ani, mosokonok yisyet nye okweru piko.’’
41001018	Yoto pakenke kupakakta cek porokwa oŋnkurup kupetakey Yesu.
41001019	Yoto kuwo tay kuminiŋ, kukäs Yesu Yakopo oko Yowana werikap Sepetayo ce tupco ce kimite rapemwa kuyiytoy porokwa.
41001020	Yoto pakenke ntowo kukäs Yesu cek, yoto kukur cekto. Yoto kupakakta kwan Sepetayo kumite kupontokey oko piko ce kikwiyisyi oŋnkupetakey cek Yesu.
41001021	Kukwa cek okoy kupun moŋetap Kapernaum. Nteye kipesyetap Sapat nye kirupe, kuwo Yesu kotapkok oŋnkucec kunetis.
41001022	Kukite piko ŋalek ce kinet omnye kinet ŋalek ce nyikisec ce ponto kamukeywek ce puryo kot kukerkey oko wule netitoy konetikap ntarastinek.
41001023	Yoto pakenke kuco kotapkokwonoto citake nye kiponto oyinot nye miyat oŋnkupol kumwoy kule,
41001024	“Mokenec ne acek nyi Yesu nyepo Nasaret? Keco kule kyarantec acek? Oŋnketiŋ ani kule yiku nyi Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet!’’
41001025	Yoto kupolyi Yesu oyinot nye miyat kumwoci kule, “Sis! Ŋete cito!’’
41001026	Kunäm oyinoto nye miyat cicoto kupotan kwapi oŋnkupol om kutit nyewo oŋnkuŋet kuwecikey.
41001027	Kukite piko tokol koromun okoy kucec kutepekey nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋolyo ne nyi? Konetisyet nyi nyelel? Ponto cici kamukeywek ce muce mpo kot kupayta kupolyi oyik ce miyotec oŋnkulimnci.’’
41001028	Yoto kutisto lokoywekap Yesu kupunte wulyo tokol om Kalilaya.
41001029	Kunomen cek kupete kotapkok okoy kupunto kotap mpo Simon oko Antereya; kupetakey Yakopo oko Yowana.
41001030	Kimite yoto kukoru kwiriri kumnyone yeset cepyosyetap pikoy nyepo Simon. Kumwoci piko Yesu portap cepyosyanato.
41001031	Kuwo Yesu okoy ye kimite neto, oŋnkunäm yewut kukalya kuŋet, yoto pakenke kusope cepyosyanato yeset oŋnkucec kukalya cek kwici yisyonutek.
41001032	Ntowo kwimen koret pesyonoto kacumukta asista, kukwer piko piko tokol ce kimnyontos oko ce kiponto oyik kukwa wule mite Yesu.
41001033	Yoto korurukyikey piko tokol cepo moŋet ye kipo kurketap koto nye kimite Yesu.
41001034	Kusop Yesu om yoto piko ce caŋ ce kimnyontos porwonik wok tokol, oŋnkukwet oyik ce caŋ. Kuyete Yesu oyik moŋalal ŋolyo, omnye kinkete oyik kule neto ku ŋo.
41001035	Nto kerir koret pate nye tokutuy; kuŋet Yesu kunomene moŋet kuwo okoy kupunto koret surukwenet wokusom om wuloto kwine nkit.
41001036	Ntene kupa mpo Simon oko piko ce kipontokey okoy surukwenet kuceŋoti neto.
41001037	Ntowo kunyor kumwoci kule, “Mite piko tokol kuceŋatiŋ nyi.’’
41001038	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Okany cipe cetosyikey okoy cepunte soŋwek alak ce lekitec saŋet wamwayte wuloto ŋalek; omnye kyocontyi ani ŋalek coto.’’
41001039	Kuwesetot Yesu yoto komut koretap Kalilaya tokol kumwoytoti ŋalekap Yiyintet om korikapkokwonik oŋnkukwet oyik.
41001040	Kuco citake nye kinäm mutyenkenik okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkukutuny kusom kakalyayet kumwoci kule, “Ye kecäm nyi nkit muci sopo ani!’’
41001041	Yoto kurotot Yesu cicoto okoy kurire kukalya, kuyito yewunyi oŋnkunäm cicoto kumwoy kule, “Omoce ani, kunyo sop nyolu!’’
41001042	Kusopco om yoto pakenke mutyenkenik ce kiponto cicoto.
41001043	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kunomen kuwecikey oŋnkunkolontyi kumwoci kule,
41001044	“Lim pa, mente womwoci citake tokol ŋalecu, ntene iwo lakwar wule mite tisintet oŋnkikany kukäsiŋ, nteye kapok koyte kokotutyet nyo kimwoy Moses, sukuŋet porci kunket ci tokol kule kwesop nyi.’’
41001045	Ntene kunomen cicoto kuwo wokumwaytat ŋalecato om wulyo tokol. Kumwaytat kutisto ŋalek okoy komokomukoktos kot kuwo Yesu kowut moŋet koporukey, ntene kopurune neto surukwenet. Yoto kukwane piko koret wulyo tokol kukwa wule mite Yesu.
41002001	Om letutap pesyosyek ce ŋeri, kuweckey Yesu kuco okoy Kapernaum, yoto celim kule kaco neto kamwa.
41002002	Kukwa koruruckey piko ce caŋ okoy kupot poroyinto wule mokopure, nka mpo yepo kurket saŋ. Kimwocini Yesu cek yoto lokoywek cepo Yiyintet.
41002003	Yoto kukwa piko alake amwanu wule mite Yesu ce kitoronu citake nye kipok kerenkok.
41002004	Omnye kicaŋit piko nye kipuryo wule kimuce cek kopunte cicoto okoy wule mite Yesu. Kulany cek koto kisyek oŋnkuput kisyekut ye kimite Yesu. Nteyu kowo kuyatakay yosico, kopunte cicoto yoto kumite kwiririt nye korwoye.
41002005	Ntowo kukäs Yesu koyenet nye kiponto picoto, kumwoci cicoto kipok kerenkok kule, “Werinyu, kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk.’’
41002006	Kusot konetikap ntarastinek alake ce kimite yoto kukepur oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule,
41002007	“Ŋo cici ŋolole ŋal ce nyile Yiyintet? Ŋo nye muce kukalya miyotyonik nye puryo kot ku Yiyintet nkit!’’
41002008	Yoto pakenke konket Yesu ŋalek ce kimite cek kusote om montuwokwa, kumwoci neto cek kule, “Omne sasot akwek ŋal ceyuco oŋnkotintentyine om kasoteywekwok?
41002009	Oŋnkono nye lekit, cemwoci cito nyi kipok kerenkok kule, ‘Kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk!’ Nto ye kocemwoci kule, ‘Ŋet yony, oŋnkinäm tor kwiririŋuŋ wesetote?’
41002010	Kunyo mosoporwok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule ponto Weritap cito kamukeywek om koret kukalya miyotyonik.’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu cito nye kipok kerenkok kule,
41002011	“Komwowuŋ kule, ŋet yony, oŋnkinäm tor kwiririŋuŋ nomen iwo ka.’’
41002012	Kuŋet cicoto kuyunyoto oŋnkunäm kotor kwiririnyi oŋnkunomen kuwo kusartakey kuköse piko tokol. Kokite piko tokol koromun oŋnkukasta woyintap Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Tompo kot cekäs kenyis ŋolyo nye yunyi.’’
