41002013	Kuketitakey Yesu yec kuwo okoy kupunto tapantap Tampayayetap Kalilaya. Yoto kukwa luket nyepo piko ce caŋ wule mite neto, kucec kunet cekto.
41002014	Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti, yoto kukäs Lefi weritap Alufayo kukepur konyi nye cekweye mosoret. Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rupa cepetekey oko ani.’’ Kuŋët Lefi oŋnkunomen kupetakey Yesu.
41002015	Nto om letut ye kimite Yesu kwomisyi om kotap Lefi. Kimite yoto kukepur wanak oko neto piko co ruruce mosoret oko piko co kicetay, omnye kicaŋ piko ce kipetoykey Yesu.
41002016	Yoto kukäs konetikap ntarastinek alak ce Farasayek kwomisyi Yesu oko piko co kicetay oko piko co ruruce mosoret. Kutepe cek konomikap Yesu kule, “Omne sukwomisyi neto oko pic ce ruruce mosoro oko pic ce kicetay?’’
41002017	Kulim Yesu ŋalek ce kimwowu cekto, kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot kumöce piko ce sopcotin cepsakityantet, ntene piko ce mnyontos ce möce. Kipuryo kot aco ani kule cokur piko ce toponec, ntene kyaco kule sukuŋet kurenynkey piko ce ponto miyotyonik.’’
41002018	Kimite pesyet ake kukire omik konomikap Yowana oko konomik cepo Farasayek. Yoto kukwa piko alake wule mite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Omne sukukire omik konomikap Yowana oko konomik cepo Farasayek, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kukire omik konomikukyi?’’
41002019	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Muce ra coronutekap cito nyo kemütis kukir omik ye tokupontokey cek cito nyo kemütisyi? Puryo komuce cek kot kukir omik ye tokupontokey cito nyo kemütisyi.
41002020	Ntene Mosukupunto pesyet nye mosicinumune cekto cito nyo kemütisyi, pesyoyecoto ye mosukukir cek omik.
41002021	“Puryo ci nye muce kwiyisye yokwontet kisic nyelel kunopci siret nye yoswaket, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, komuce yokwontet nyelel kupac siret nyo yoswaket kutok kuwoyit koŋnta.
41002022	Oŋnkupuryo mpo ci nye muce kuroŋnkyi finyonik ce mwonec wonkinek ce yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, komuce finyonik ce mwonec kuyeyi wonkinek co yoswak, kworon wonkinek oŋnkupa wuy finyonik. Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ceroŋnkyini komek ce mwonec wonkinek ce lelac!’’
41002023	Nteye kipesyetap Sapat, kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi kupunte mparosyekap nkanuk. Kucec konomikyi kuputot nkanuk.
41002024	Kumwoci Farasayek Yesu kule, “Käs pa! Omne sukwiri konomikuk ntarastinekap pesyetap Sapat?’’
41002025	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic kito nye kikwiy Tauti oko piko ce kipontokey om pesyet nye kipuryo kiy nye mokwam okoy kwam cek rupet?
41002026	Kiwo neto kowut kotap Yiyintet oŋnkunum kwam mukatyantet nyo kisoci kupoyit Yiyintet. Kikwiy neto kuyunyoto ye ki tisintet nyewo Apiyasar. Kunyo kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekyo, kipuryo ci nye kicecömncini kwam mukatyantanato, ntene tisintet nkit nye kyome. Ntene kwam Tauti yoto oŋnkukoci mpo pikyi ce kipontokey.’’
41002027	Yoto kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kicekon pesyetap Sapat sukuŋet kukalya cito, ntene kipuryo kot citany cito kupoyit Sapat.
41002028	Kunyo Weritap cito nye Mokoryontet nye poytoy mpo Sapat.’’
41003001	Yoto kuwo Yesu yec pesyet ake kotapkok. Kimite koyoto cito nye kime yewut.
41003002	Kurip piko alake ce kimite yoto kukäs topon Yesu kule sicekäs oŋnkomuce kusop cicoto ye pesyetap Sapat sukuŋet cewosontyi.
41003003	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kime yewut kule, “Co ceyoŋe yu po tay.’’
41003004	Oŋnkuwekyikey piko kutepe kule. “Cömwec acek ntarastinekyo kyiy ne ye pesyetap Sapat? Cikalya nto ciwurta? Cisop sopontap cito nto cepakäc cipot?’’ Ntene kusisio cekto.
41003005	Kukäskästa Yesu kurotot cek tokol nye konyer, oŋnkukalya wuyinto oko solwontit nye kiponto. Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Yite yewuŋuŋ.’’ Kuyito yewunyi, yoto kusop yewunyi.
41003006	Kuŋetyo Farasayek kumiŋnto kupa saŋ oŋnkurwoc oko pikap Erote wule muktoy kunämnta Yesu oŋnkupakäc kume.
41003007	Kunomen Yesu oko konomikyi kupa okoy kupunto tapantap Tampayayetap Kalilaya. Kurup luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kikwone Kalilaya oko ce kikwone koretap Yuteya,
41003008	oko ce kikwone moŋetap Yerusalem, oko ce kikwone koretap Itumeya, oko ce kikwone koretap oyinetap Yortan pitonin, oko ce kikwone korosyekap moŋosyekap Tiro oko Siton. Kikwa picoto tokol wule mite Yesu omnye kikilim tukuk ce kikwiye.
41003009	Kucaŋit piko yoto koromun okoy kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule kuyiytoci rapet nye kepure sukuŋet mente kot kuwunukto oŋnkukic piko neto.
41003010	Omnye kikikusop piko ce caŋ, kunyo kimite yoto piko ce kimnyontos kuwunuktotikey kule cepunte ye mite Yesu sukuŋet cenäm cetway.
41003011	Nteye kutoköse piko ce kiponto oyik Yesu, koputyi kukutuŋe yepo taynyi oŋnkuriryo kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet!’’
41003012	Kuyete Yesu kumwoci konkolontyi oyik ce miyotec kule mente kot kumwayta kule neto kuŋo.
41003013	Kunomen Yesu kuwo kulaŋnta lakamet parak oŋnkukur kupetakey piko ce kimöce neto.
41003014	Yoto kukwey Yesu piko taman ok oyeny oŋnkutoci kaynet kukure kiyokik. Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kakweyak akwek sukuŋet opur oko ani, kunyo mosoyoktok ape wamwaytate lokoywek,
41003015	mosonyoru kamukeywek ce okwete oyik.’’
41003016	Kaynokap kiyokik taman ok oyeny ce kikwey Yesu kucu; Simon nye kimulyi kaynet nyepo oyeny kukure Petero,
41003017	Yakopo oko mutakwam Yowana werikap Sepetayo (ce kimulyi kukure Poanerke nye poru kule, “Werikap ilat.’’)
41003018	Antereya oko Filipo, oko Paturumayo, oko Matayo, oko Tomas, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo, oko Tatayo, oko Simon nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi,
41003019	oko Yuta Isikaryoti nye kiweckey kwek ŋomntoyin.
41003020	Yoto kunomen Yesu kuwo okoy ka. Koruruckey yec piko ce cäŋ okoy kupotyi ye mokwomis oko konomikyi.
41003021	Ntowo kulim pikap kamwa ŋalecato, kupa kule wocerip, omnye kimwowu piko kule, “Kopun met.’’
41003022	Kumwoy konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone Yerusalem kule, “Ponto neto Pelsepul! Kunyo Pelsepul nye, Oyinot nyewo nyepo oyik nye kocini neto swamet sukuŋet kukwet oyik.’’
41003023	Yoto kukur Yesu piko kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkunet kumwoci tyonkocok kule, “Muce kulene Setani kukwetkey nkit?
41003024	Ye kapciwunekey oyeny poytoyisyet nyepo koret ake oŋnkuporyekey nkit kupote koronoto.
41003025	Nteye kapciwunekey oyeny piko cepo kayta ake oŋnkuporyekey kwicek nkit kupote kayata.
41003026	Kunyo ye kaŋet poytoyisyetap Setani kupciykey oŋnkuporyekey nkit, kupuryo kot komuce kot kuyo, ntene pote nyo kupok.
41003027	“Om ŋolyontet ake yec, puryo ci nye muce kot kowut kotap cito nye ponto swamet oŋnkunum tukukyi, tos pate ye kanyosyo kurat cito nyo ponto swamet sukuŋet komuc kowut kotap cicoto oŋnkunyapan tukukyi.
41003028	“Kumwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, cimuce cikalya piko miyotyonik tokol oko ŋalek alak tokol ce miyotec ce kaŋalal, nka kot kaŋalal aret cetya.
41003029	Ntene puryo kot cikolyoy mpo kisic ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Muyet Nyetilil, omnye kakwiy cicoto miyotyonik cepo kenyis ce mopoku.’’
41003030	(Kimwoy Yesu kuyunyoto omnye kimwoy piko alake kule, “Ponto neto oyik ce miyotec.’’)
41003031	Yoto kupun kametitap Yesu oko mpo mutakwam, kwokuyoŋe saŋ oŋnkuyokto kukur kule kuco saŋ.
41003032	Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce kepur komut Yesu. Kumwoci cek neto kule, “Lim pa, mite komet oko mpo mutokwomet saŋ ce mociŋ.’’
41003033	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Ŋo nye yeyomwani? Nto ŋo ce mpo yeyamwani?’’
41003034	Kukäsakästa Yesu kukäs piko ce kimite kepur komut neto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Akäs pa, piko cu ce mpo yeyomwani oko mpo yeyamwani.
41003035	Omnye ci nye yiye ŋalek möce Yiyintet kule kwiy neto kunye yeyamwani nyoto oŋnku yeyomwani.’’
41004001	Kunetisye Yesu yec pesyet ake tampayayet tapan, yoto kukwa piko ce caŋ korurukyikey ye kimite okoy kulany Yesu rapet nye kimite tampayayet. Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce kepur yepo tampayayet tapan om koret okoy kupun tapantap peko, kumite rapet peko orit.
41004002	Kunet Yesu piko ŋalek ce caŋ kwiyisye tyonkocok, nteye kinetisyi kumwoci piko kule,
41004003	“Akäs pa! Kiwo citake wokukolsyo.
41004004	Nteye kimite kukolsyi, kusuci kupuswek alake aret tapan, kuterer toritek kwokwam.
41004005	Kusuci kupuswek alake kitawet ye kipuryo kot kumite teŋek ce yeme, yoto kutur kupityo lakwar omnye kipuryo kot kuponto tikityek ce kipa ŋony.
41004006	Ntono kumwok asista kupel kuyom kupotyo.
41004007	Kusuci kupuswek alake ye kimite kotok orit, kupityo kotok kwam kowurta kupotyo nye puryo kot kwiy kupuswek.
41004008	Ntene kusuci kupuswek alak ye kimite teŋek ce toponec, kutur kupityo oŋnkwiy ketit akenke kupuswek sosom; nto ake kwiy kupuswek tomonwokik lö, nto ake kwiy kupuswek pokol akenke.’’
41004009	Yoto kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ci nye ponto yitik ce limntoy, roke kulimnte.’’
41004010	Nteye kimite Yesu kwine nkit, kukwa ye kimite neto piko alake ce kilimntoy ŋalekyi oko kiyokikyi taman ok oyeny oŋnkutepe kule mwowu ne tyonkocok.
41004011	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kicekonok akwek oŋnket ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Ntene om wule mite piko alak ce mite saŋ kuce mosukulim cekto ŋalek om tyonkocok,
41004012	sukuŋet, Kukästa oŋnkukästa, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kuköse, kulimnta oŋnkulimnta, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kusowu kunket, Nto kukostoy oŋnkunket, kuye kuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet, sukukalya neto cekto.’’
41004013	Yoto kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Tompo kot oŋnket akwek ŋalek ce mwowu tyonkoconi? Kunyo omuci kot oŋnket kulene ŋalek ce mwowu tyonkocok alake?
41004014	Kole kolintet lokoywekap Yiyintet.
41004015	Muce pesyet ake kusuci lokoywek aret tapan kulim picoto lokoywek, nteye kalim; yoto kuco lakwar Setani oŋnkunum ŋolyontet nye kacekol mukuleywekwa.
41004016	Kerkey piko alake oko kupuswek co kicekol teŋek cepo kitawet, coto kuce ye kotolime lokoywek kucäm lakwar om ŋerekwek
41004017	ntene nye puryo kot kowute mukuleywekwa orit, kunyo puryo kot kopure kuloyit, nteye kaco wuyinto nto toŋoŋutek kupo lokoywek kwasta lakwar.
41004018	Kerkey piko alake oko kupuswek co kicekol kotok orit, coto kuce piko co lime lokoywek,
41004019	ntene om kasoteywekap soponto nyepo pesyosyecu, oko corokyinotet nyepo mokoryontit oko tukuk alak cepo koret, kucut kunum lokoywek nye puryo kot kwiye kupuswek.
41004020	Ntene kerkey piko alake oko kupuswek co kicekol teŋek ce toponec, lime piko coto lokoywek, oŋnkucäm oŋnkwiy kupuswontet akenke kupuswek alak sosom, oŋnkwiy kupuswontet ake kupuswek alak tomonwokik lö oŋnkwiy ake kupuswek alak pokol akenke.’’
41004021	Kutosyikey Yesu kutepe cekto kule, “Sutu ra cito kenyis tarit oŋnkunäm pesenit kokupuye, nto mpo kotore tarit kwiririt ŋony? Puryo kot kusutu neto oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe meset nye yoŋe tarit parak?
41004022	Omnye puryo ŋolyo nye kicewuny nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok, oŋnkupuryo kiy nye kicetup cewuny nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok.
41004023	Kunyo, ci nye ponto yitik ce limnte, roke kulimnte!’’
41004024	Kumwoci Yesu yec cekto kule, “Olimnte topon ŋalek ce olime! Omnye koyoyeket nye oyoyekyini akwek piko alak kunye koyoyeket nye yunyoto nye mociyoyekwok mpo akwek, oŋnkyetoswok mpo kucaŋit.
41004025	Omnye cito nye ponto kunye mosicetosyi nyoto kucaŋit, nto cito nye puryo kot kuponto, nka mpo ce tukusic ce ponto mosicinumune.’’
41004026	Kutosyikey yec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kerkey poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko ci nye kole kupuswek mparen,
41004027	kurucikey ye komoy oŋnkukös ye koyek pet, kumite yoto kupuswek kuturu kupitos, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kunkete neto kule yiyoktos kulene.
41004028	Teŋek nkit kuce kocini kupityo okoy kwek omik. Nyosyi kupityo kunyo sokek ceŋorŋor, ntekere kuyiy taptet, nto om letut kuwoŋnkyi kwiy kupuswek.
41004029	Nteye koruryo omik, kunäm cito rotwet oŋnkuwo wokusis omnye kopunto kisisyet.’’
41004030	Kutosyikey yec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mocemwowu kule kerkey poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko kiy ne? Tyonkocet oŋnkono nye mocemwowu sukuŋet ceroru cikerkeye?
41004031	Kerkey oko kupuswontetap ketit ake nye cekure kalitarit nye kisic kupël kupuswek alak tokol ce mite koret
41004032	nteye kocewu kupite kuwoyit kwek cemosi kupël ketik alak tokol, oŋnkupityo sarisyek ce woyec oŋnkukwa toritek kwokutec korikwa wuronokap ketoto.’’
41004033	Kumwoci Yesu piko lokoywekyi ce caŋ kwiyisye tyonkocok ce kerkey cutecu ce kimuc cekto kot konket ŋalek.
41004034	Kipuryo kot kumwoci neto piko ŋalek ye mnokwiyisye tyonkocok, ntene nteye kimite kwine nkit oko konomikyi kuye sukumwoci co ŋalek tokol ce mwowu tyonkocok.
41004035	Ntowo kupunto pesyonoto kosoleny, kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Onte cipe kyay tampayayet pitonin.’’
41004036	Yoto kunomen kupa oŋnkupakakta piko tokol. Kulany konomik rapet nye kimite Yesu kunyosyo kopure orit, kupetakey cekto yoto raposyek alak.
41004037	Ntene kuwus yomet nyewo koromun okoy kuwosyikey peko rapet kot kumac kunyiy peko.
41004038	Kimite Yesu yoto kukoru rapet let oŋnkutiye metinyi kito nyo cetiye metit. Kuŋet konomik kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot köse nyi kule karik cepoku?’’
41004039	Kuŋet Yesu Kukos, oŋnkupolyi yomet kumwoci kule, “Sis yomet! Oŋnkitempes tampayayet!’’ Yoto kusis yomet oŋnkutempes tampayayet.
41004040	Kumwoci Yesu konomik kule, “Omne somuye? Tompo kot onyoru akwek koyenot?’’
41004041	Ntene kumuyo konomik koromun oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nyun cici, nyi limncini yomet oko tampayayet?’’
41005001	Yoto kupa cek kway tampayayet pitonin okoy koretap Kerasenik.
41005002	Yoto pakenke ntowo kurekune Yesu rapet, kutuye cito nye kicone wule cemucini piko.
41005003	Kiponto cicoto oyik ce miyotec kunyo kiminye wule cemucini piko. Kipuryo kot kumite ci nye kimuce kot kurat cicoto, nka mpo ye kacerate nyororonik.
41005004	Omnye kikicerate nyororonik oko pinkonok aret ce caŋ ntene kuŋetye nyororonik oŋnkupirto kwiri pinkonok. Kunyo kipuryo kot kumite ci yec nye kiponto swamet kupël cicoto.
41005005	Kipurune cicoto komoy oko pet wule cemucini piko oko lakomosyek, sukuncoyoti oŋnkupakeke rwontok.
41005006	Nteye kimite cicoto kutokulow kisic, kukäs neto Yesu, yoto kulapat oŋnkoputyi yepo kerenkokyi kukutuŋnkyi;
41005007	oŋnkupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Penteno ani ne nyi Yesu Weritap Yiyintet nyepo torot! Owolikey om kaynetap Yiyintet osomiŋ kule, mente kot ataŋanya!’’
41005008	Kimwoy kuyunyoto omnye kikimwoci Yesu neto kule, “Oyinot nye miyat, cone wule mite cici!’’
41005009	Yoto kutepe Yesu kule, “Cekure ne kayneŋuŋ.’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Cekure kaynemwani, ‘Luket’ omnye ciku caŋ!’’
41005010	Yoto kusom cicoto kusaysay Yesu kumwoci kule mente kukwet oyik kupete koronoto.
41005011	Kimite ye kilekite yoto yeceytap nkururwenik ce kimite kwokete lakamet komos.
41005012	Kusom oyik ce miyotec kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kwetec cipe wociwut nkururwenik orit.’’
41005013	Kucömnci Yesu oyik kupa. Yoto kuŋete oyik ce miyotec cicoto oŋnkupa wokowut yeceytap nkururwenik ce kirice kupunto tokol elifunek oyeny. Kumwey kurway tokol wokoŋirte lakam wokosuci tampayayet, kupakäc peko kupok tokol.
41005014	Yoto kumwey kurway mesewek ce kyokisyi oŋnkupa wokumwaytat ŋalecato kumwoci piko cepo moŋet oko piko cepo soŋwek. Kukwa piko kwokukäs ŋalecato kakwiyokis.
41005015	Kukwa picoto okoy ye kimite Yesu, kwokunyor cicoto kiponto oyik ce caŋ kukepur ŋony kulakat nye kanyol kuŋomit topon. Yoto kumuyo piko tokol.
41005016	Kumwoci piko co koköse om konyekwa piko co kokwoni ŋalek ce kokwiyokis om wule mite cito nyo kiponto oyik oko ŋalek cepo nkururwenik.
41005017	Yoto kucec piko kusom kumwoci Yesu kuŋet kuwete koremwa.
41005018	Nteye kimite Yesu kulonye rapet kule onomen owecikey, kusom cicoto kiponto oyik kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kany cepetekey tukway!’’
41005019	Ntene kuyete kumwoci kule, “Iwo kaŋuŋ wule mite pikwok wemwoci ŋalek ce woyec ce kakwiwuŋ nyi Mokoryontet, oko kuyu wule karireniŋ kukalyiŋ.’’
41005020	Yoto kunomen cicoto kuwo wokupunte Tekapoli (moŋosyek taman) oŋnkuwo wokumwaytat ŋalek ce kokwici Yesu neto. Kukite koromun piko tokol ce kilim ŋalecato.
41005021	Kulany Yesu rapet kuco kwoy okoy kupun tampayayet pitoni. Yoto kukwa piko ce caŋ kwokorurukyikey ye kimite neto om yepo tampayayet tapan.
41005022	Kuco citake nye kipoytoy kotapkok nye kicekure Yairo. Nteye kotoköse cicoto Yesu, kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokyi,
41005023	oŋnkusom kusaysay kumwoci kule, “Mite cepnyu nye mnyone kasat karik kume; co cekemer yewuniyekuk sukuŋet kusop mente kume!’’
41005024	Yoto kunomen Yesu kupetakey cicoto. Kurup piko ce caŋ Yesu ce kikicoti neto om komoswokik tokol.
41005025	Kimite yoto korket ake nye kimnyan kusyen koromun kukwone korotik kuwany kenyisyek taman ok oyeny;
41005026	nye kikikuwoŋnkyi tukukyi tokol ce kiponto kukocini cepsakitisyek kule kunyaya; ntene puryo mpo akenke nye kimuc kot kukalya, ntene kutosyinikey pate porto okokoy.
41005027	Kikilim korkonoto yoto ŋalek ce nöme Yesu. Yoto kurup letutap Yesu,
41005028	oŋnkumwoy om moyenyi nkit kule, “Mpo ye katwaya ani pate sirenyi, mososop.’’
41005029	Yoto kunäm kutwa siretap Yesu. Kusop pakenke kusisio nye komokukwoni korotik, okoy kukäs neto nkit kule kosope porto nyo kwomnyoni.
41005030	Kunket Yesu pakenke om pornyi nkit kule kaweteno swamet. Kuwekyikey kukäs piko oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ŋo nyi kanäma kutwa siremwani?’’
41005031	Kumwoci konomikyi kule, “Puryo kot köse nyi piko cu kekiciŋ, kunyi mite yec tepe kule, ‘Ŋo nyi kanama kutwaya ani?’ ’’
41005032	Ntene kutosyikey Yesu kukäsakästa kule akäs ŋo nyi kakwiy ŋolyontoni.
41005033	Kunket yoto korkonoto ŋolyontet nye kakwiyakay om wule mite neto, kuco tay kupotanan nye komuy oŋnkoputyi kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkumwoci ŋalek tokol cepo manta.
41005034	Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Cepnyu, kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ; kunyo wecikey om kalya oŋnkuwesop okokoy.’’
41005035	Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kukwa piko alake ce kikwone kotap poytoyintet nyepo kotapkok oŋnkwokumwoci cicoto kule, “Kame cepŋuŋ Kunyo mente tayim yec konetintet.’’
41005036	Ntene kukwes Yesu ŋalecato komwowu picoto, oŋnkumwoci Yairo kule, “Mente omuy, yen pate.’’
41005037	Yoto kuyete Yesu piko alak tokol mapetakey neto, ntene kupetakey pate Petero oko Yakopo oko mutakwam Yowana.
41005038	Kupunto cekto kotap cicoto kinyewo nyepo kotapkok. Yoto kukäs Yesu rirek cepo piko ce kincoytos kwome mnyat koromun.
41005039	Kuwo Yesu koto orit oŋnkumwoci piko kule, “Omne soselelen kuyunyi? Omne sorirye! Puryo kot kume lekwet koru, pate!’’
41005040	Kurori piko tokol kurorci neto. Kukwet Yesu piko tokol ce kimite koto orit kupa saŋ, oŋnkukwer kwanitap lekwet oko kamet oko konomikyi somok okoy koto nye kimite lekwet.
41005041	Kunäm Yesu yewutap lekwet oŋnkumwoci kule, “Talisa kaum.’’ Nye mwowu kule, “Cepi miniŋ, kumwowuŋ ani kule ŋet yony.’’
41005042	Yoto pakenke kuŋet cepoto kuyo oŋnkuwesetot. (Kiponto cepoto kenyisyek taman ok oyeny.) Ntowo kwiyakay ŋolyontonoto; kukite piko koromun.
41005043	Ntene kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule puryo kot kuroke kunket citake tokol ŋalecu, oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Okoci cepoto kito nye mokwam.’’
41006001	Kunomene Yesu wuloto kuwo kuketitakey okoy kupunto moŋetap koremwa Nasaret, kurup konomikyi neto.
41006002	Nteye kipesyetap Sapat kucec Yesu kunetis om kotapkok. Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ, ntowo kulim cekto ŋalek ce kimwowu; kukite tokol oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Kinyorta ono cici ŋalecu? Kinyor ŋomnononi kulene? Oŋnkwiye kulene ŋalecu po kakitat?
41006003	Puryo kot ku koswetintetap pawunek neto nyitenyi nye weritap Mariyam, nto mpo mutakwam ku Yakopo oko Yose oko Yuta oko Simon? Puryo kot ku mpo cekwam cek cu cepontekey acek ceminye tokol?’’ Yoto kutay cek Yesu.
41006004	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ciyweye workoyo om wulyo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ciyweye om moŋenyi, oŋnkupuryo kot kuyweye pikap arenyi oko cepo kamwa.’’
41006005	Kipuryo yoto kot kwiy Yesu tukuk cepo kakitat om wuloto, ntene kukemer yewuniyekyi piko ce ŋeri ce kimnyontos kusop kusopco.
41006006	Kokite Yesu koromun, omnye kipuryo kot kuponto cek koyenotet. Yoto kuwo Yesu kunetat piko kupunte kestonik tokol ce kilekite wuloto.
41006007	Kukur Yesu konomik taman ok oyeny kukwa koruruckey wanak, oŋnkuyokto cek kupa saŋ kupetate oyeny oyeny. Kukoci kamukeywek kupayta oyik ce miyotec,
41006008	Oŋnkumwoci kunkolontyi kule, “Monte cenäm mukatya, nto mpo lolonik cepo pesanik.
41006009	Alac kweyonik ntene monte cilac sirok oyeny.’’
41006010	Kumwoci yec kule, “Ye kowut kotake kuyu tö, opurune koyoto pate okoy onomene moŋonoto.
41006011	Nteye kopunte wule puryo kot kuŋerekyok nto kutay molimwok pikap wuloto ŋalek, onomen apete moŋonoto oŋnkupukyi tertit nyepo kerenkokwok, sukuŋet kwek kasowunot om wule mite picoto.’’
41006012	Yoto kunomen cekto kupa wokwomnci piko lokoywek kule, misyini kurenynkey piko kwasta miyotyonikwa.
41006013	Kukwet cek oyik oŋnkuŋape mwayta piko ce caŋ ce kimnyontos kusop kusopco.
41006014	Yoto kilim kinko Erote ŋalecato tokol, omnye kitok kaynetap Yesu ceŋalale om koret wulyo tokol. Kumwoy piko alak kule, “Kuŋet kotutune met Yowana potisonintet kunyi mite kwiyiyis swamet nye ponto kwiye ŋalecu.’’
41006015	Kumwoy mpo piko alake kule, “Eriya nyitenyi.’’ Kumwoy alake kule, “Workoyo nyi nye kerkey oko workoyikap keny.’’
41006016	Nteye kotolime Erote ŋalecato, kumwoy kule, “Yowana Potisonintet nyitenyi nyo kyomwoytoy ani ceyep katit nye kokotutune met yec!’’
41006017	Omnye Erote nyitenyi kunyo kimwoytoy cenäm Yowana oŋnkyerat cekerta mopusi. Kikwiy Erote kuyunyoto omnye kisac ŋalekap Erotiya nye kikorketap mutakwam Filipo nye kimut neto kwek korkenyi.
41006018	Kunyo kimwocini Yowana Erote kwak okokoy kule, “Puryo kot kumisyini kot müt nyi korketap mutokwomet!’’
41006019	Kunyo kisenkere Erotiya Yowana koromun, kusyeme kule apar neto kume, ntene kipuryo kot komuce.
41006020	Omnye kiyweye Erote Yowana omnye kinkete kule neto kunye ci nye topon nyepo manta nyetilil, kunyo kiripe topon koromun, kilimntoy Erote ŋalekap Yowana ce kimwowu nka kot kimuye ye kalim ŋalekyi.
41006021	Nto mite pesyet ake, kunyor Erotiya poroyinto. Omnye kikwiy Erote sakwet nyepo pesyenyi nye kiceye kwici pikyi poytoyik ce woyec oko sikarek ce woyec cepo poryet oko piko ce woyec kantoyik cepo Kalilaya.
41006022	Yoto kuco ceptap Erotiya koto orit oŋnkutum, okoy kuŋerec Erote oko toyekyi ce kimite kukepur tokol. Kumwoci kinko Erote cepoto kule, “Möce kule akoniŋ ani kiy ne?
41006023	Mosokoniŋ kiy ake tokol nye kesomo ani.’’ Kuwalkey aret ce caŋ kumwoci cepoto kule, “Kokurtowuŋ kule mosokoniŋ kiy ake tokol nye kesomo nka mpo kwenutap kereryantetap koret nye opoytoy ani.’’
41006024	Yoto kumiŋnto cepoto kuwo wokutepe kamet kule, “Mosom kiy ne?’’ Kuwekyi kamet kumwoci kule, “Som cekoniŋ metitap Yowana Potisonintet.’’
41006025	Kuwo cepoto kusartakey lakwar okoy wule mite kinko oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, “Omöce kono ani nyi yawut pakenke om yuteyu sanit nye mite orit metit nyepo Yowana potisonintet!’’
41006026	Kunyer kinko kumwontyi ŋalecato korumun, ntene kipuryo kot komuce kot kuyete cepoto, omnye kikikowalkey om konyekap toyekyi tokol.
41006027	Kuyokto yoto pakenke Erote sikorintet nye ripsi kuwo wokusut metitap Yowana. Kuwo sikorintet okoy mopusi oŋnkuwo kuyep metitap Yowana,
41006028	oŋnkusut metit nye mite sanit oŋnkuco kukoci cepoto, kunäm nyo oŋnkukoci kamet.
41006029	Ntowo kulim konomikap Yowana ŋalecato, kukwa kwokusut musyontetap Yowana wokumuci mwenet.
41006030	Kuweckey kiyokik okoy kwokutuyo oko Yesu, oŋnkwokumwoci tukuk tokol ce kukwiy oko ŋalek ce kukunet cekto.
41006031	Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce kikwoni cut kupeti cut okoy kupotyi Yesu oko konomikyi poroyinto ye mokwomis. Kumwoci Yesu konomik kule, “Akany cipe acek nkit wule po surukwenet sukuŋet womuny akwek kuminiŋ.’’
41006032	Kulany cekto rapet kwicek nkit oŋnkupa okoy surukwenet.
41006033	Ntene kukäs piko ce caŋ ye kipeti cek oŋnkunket wule kotokyikey. Yoto kupete piko kerenkok, ce kikwone moŋosyek tokol kusartakey okoy wokunyosyo kupunto kutompo kot kupunto Yesu oko konomik.
41006034	Ntowo kurekune Yesu rapet, yoto kukäs neto luket nyepo piko ce caŋ, nteye kotoköse kurire kukalya omnye kikerkey picoto kecir ce puryo kot kuponto mesewo. Yoto kucec Yesu kunet cek kumwoci ŋalek ce caŋ.
41006035	Nteyu kowo kwimen koret, kukwa konomik ye mite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nteyu kokwimen koret, kunyi surukwen wuli ce mite.
41006036	Yomis mwoci piko kupecikey, kupa kestonik oko soŋwek ce lekitec sukuŋet wokuceŋat kwalat nkit omik ce mosukwam.’’
41006037	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Okoci akwek nkit kiye mokwam.’’ Kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Moce nyi kule cipe acek wokyal mukatinek ce muce kyale silinkinek pokolwokik amwan oŋnkyepaye picu?’’
41006038	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Oponte akwek mukatinek ata? Ape ra wakäs.’’ Nteyu kowo kunket wule tento, kumwoy kule, “Ceponte mukatinek mut oko purpurunek oyeny.’’
41006039	Kumwoci Yesu konomik kuyiyta koruruckey piko tokol oŋnkopure suswek nye nyolilec.
41006040	Yoto kopur piko kutetkey kupetate alake pokol nto alak konom.
41006041	Kunäm Yesu mukatinekey mut oko purpurunek oyeny oŋnkunyal torot oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec mukatinek oŋnkukoci konomikyi kupcici piko. Yoto kupciyta neto purpurunek kuyem piko tokol.
41006042	Kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis.
41006043	Yoto koruruc konomik mukatinek oko purpurunek ce koŋet okoy kunyiy kisok taman ok oyeny.
41006044	Nto coŋinto nyepo piko ce kikwam mukatinek oko purpurunek kuce piko moronik ce kipuntoy elifunek mut.
41006045	Yoto pakenke kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kulany rapet kway tampayayet pitonin kontowonu kupa okoy moŋetap Pesusayita ye tokumite neto kuyomise piko kupecikey.
41006046	Nteyu kowo kuyomis konomik, kunomen kwine nkit kuwo kulaŋnta lakam wokusom.
41006047	Ntowo kupunto komoy, kimite yoto rapet kukopunto kwenutap tampayayet, kumite Yesu kwine nkit wule po koret.
41006048	Yoto kukäs neto kule mite konomikyi kataŋany kuwulye kukwonye rapet omnye kiwuse yomet kuketu cekto kukwa let. Ntowo kupunto komoy karik kuyec koret, kuco Yesu wule mite cek kutyikonu peko parak, yoto kutil kukeyte cekto.
41006049	Ntene kukäs cek kutyikoti peko parak, kusot oŋnkupol kuncoy kule, “Oyinot nyi!’’
41006050	Omnye kimuyo cek tokol yu kowo kukäs Yesu. Kuŋololyi Yesu pakenke cek kumwoci kule, “Otitir! Ani nyo, monte cemuye!’’
41006051	Kulany Yesu rapet nye kimite cekto; yoto pakenke kusis yomet. Kokite konomik oŋnkumuyo koromun kupotpotenis.
41006052	Kipuryo kot kusow cek konket ŋalek ce nöme ŋalekap mukatinek kule poru ne. Kipuryo kot konket mpo kisic kule poru ne.
41006053	Kupete cek rapet kway tampayayet okoy kupunto koretap Kenesaret wule kiwo kurotyi rapet.
41006054	Nteye kimite kurekune rapet, yoto pakenke kunket piko Yesu.
41006055	Kurway piko kupunte koronoto tokol kupa wokukonopune kwiririnek piko ce mnyontos okoy kupun wule mite Yesu om wulyo tokol wule kalim cek kule mite Yesu wuloto.
41006056	Nto om wulyo tokol wule kiwo Yesu, soŋwek oko moŋosyek oko kestonik. Yoto kukwer piko pikwa ce mnyontos okoy motaponik oŋnkusom cekto Yesu kule kucömnci piko ce mnyontos kunäm mpo pate kototyetap sirenyi. Kusopco piko tokol ce kinäm kutwa sirenyi.
41007001	Korurukyikey ye kimite Yesu Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone Yerusalem.
41007002	Yoto kukäs cek kule omisye konomikyi yewuniyek ce murwonec, coto kuce yewuniyek ce puryo kot ciwun.
41007003	Omnye kirupe Farasayek oko Yutayek tokol ntarastinek ce kinet cek mpo kukomwa nye puryo kot kwomisyi okoy ye kakowun topon yewuniyek om aret nye roke.
41007004	Oŋnkupuryo kot kwome kiy nye kocesutune motepo okoy ye keciwon kunyo. Kirupe cek mpo ntarastinek alak ce caŋ ce kicinet. Kuyu, ciwun topon cikomponik oko terenik oko sapuryanikap tayok oko kwiririnek.
41007005	Yoto kutepe Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek Yesu kule, “Omne yu puryo kot kurupe konomikuk ntarastinekap keny ce kikonec mpo kukonyo, omnye omisye yewuniyek ce murwonec ce puryo kot ciwun?’’
41007006	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Po manta ŋalek ce kiŋor Isaya ce nömok akwek! Oyiku kaperperot, kuyu wulo kisilyo kumwoy kule, ‘Mwowu Yiyintet kule, Yweyo ani picu om kutuwakwa pate, ntene mitowune mukuleywekwa wule low om wule omite ani.
41007007	Puryo kot kuponto cek latik kusaya ani, omnye nete cek ntarastinek ce kikwiye piko kuyunye po ntarastinekyoto Yiyintet!’ ’’
41007008	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Otoye akwek mayiy ntarastinekap Yiyintet, oŋnkorup oywey ntarastinek cepo pikap keny.’’
41007009	Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oponte akwek ŋomnonet nyewo om wule otoytoy ntarastinekap Yiyintet, kule siceŋet cerup ŋalekwok cepo keny!
41007010	Omnye kimwoy Moses kule, ‘Ywey kon oko komet. Nto ci nye cupe kwan oko kamet, kumisyini nyoto kume.’
41007011	Ntene onetisyi akwek omwowu kule, ye ponto cito kito nye muce kwiyisye kukalya kwan oko kamet, ntene oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Karupon nyi’ (nye poru kule po Yiyintet nyi).
41007012	Kunye cikolyoy cicoto mente kukalya kwan oko kamet.
41007013	Om ŋalek ceyucoto kuye owurtoy akwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om ŋalekwok cepo keny ce oneti piko alak. Oŋnkumite mpo ŋalek alake ce caŋ ceyucutecu ce oyiye akwek.’’
41007014	Kukur Yesu yec piko kukwa ye mite neto, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Olimwo ani pa akwek piko tokol oŋnkonäme ŋalecu mukuleywekwok.
41007015	Puryo kot ku kito nye cone saŋ nye kam cito nye muce kot kowurta cito kumiyatit. Ntene kito nye cone mukuleyto orit kunye wurtoy cicoto kumiyatit.
41007016	[Kunyo roke olimnte ye oponte yitik ce olimnte!]’’
41007017	Nteyu kowo kuwete Yesu ye kimite piko oŋnkuwo okoy koto orit, kutepe konomikyi neto ŋalek ce poru tyonkoconoto.
41007018	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Tompo kot osowu mpo akwek okoy kunyi kuyu piko alak? Kule puryo kot ku kito nyo cone saŋ kwam cito nye muce kot kowurta cito kumiyatit.
41007019	Omnye puryo kot kowute mukuleynyi orit, ntene wute moyenyi oŋnkupa kumiŋnto saŋ.’’ (Yoto kumwoy Yesu kule toponec omik tokol.)
41007020	Kutosyikey Yesu yec kumwoy kule, “Ŋolyo nye cone mukuleytap cito nye wurtoy cito kumiyatit,
41007021	omnye kwone kasoteywek ce miyotec mukuleytap cito orit, kuyu corokyinotetap koruk, corsyet, porisyet, sakwayanat,
41007022	corokyinot, ŋomset, kaperperisyo, makatet nye miyat, koŋ nye miyat, ŋalek ce miyotec, menon, silotet, perperyet.
41007023	Ŋalecutecu tokol miyotec kuce kwone mukuleytap cito orit oŋnkowurtoy cito.’’
41007024	Yoto kunomen Yesu om wuloto okoy kupunto koret nye lekite moŋetap Tiro. Kuwo koto ake orit, nye kipuryo kot kumöce kule konket citake tokol kule mite neto wuloto, ntene kipuryo komuc kot kuwunynkey.
41007025	Yoto pakenke kulim korket ake nye kiponto cepnyi nye kiponto oyinot nye miyat kule mite neto wuloto. Kuco pakenke oŋnkoputyi kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokap Yesu.
41007026	Korkonoto kunye Kirikin nyepo Foyinisiya om koretap Siriya. Kusom korkonoto Yesu kule kukwetyi cepnyi oyinot nye kiponto.
41007027	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kany cenyosye cepay kupiyoŋ lekok kunyo, omnye puryo kot kuroke cinum omikap lekok oŋnkyewirci ŋokik.’’
41007028	Kuwec korkonoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, yunyoto, ntene nka mpo ŋokik ce mite meset ŋony kwome omikap lekok ce lelektoy!’’
41007029	Yoto kumwoci Yesu kule, “Om ŋolyontoni kewec nyi mwowu, nomen iwo koŋuŋ, kaŋet oyinoto kuwete cepŋuŋ’’
41007030	Kunomen korkonoto kuwo ka, wokunyor lekwet kumite koru kwiriri kukosop kuwete oyinoto cepoto.
41007031	Kunomene Yesu koretap Tiro oŋnkuwo kupunte Siton okoy kupunto tampayayetap Kalilaya oŋnkuwo kupunte aretap kwenutap Tekapoli (moŋosyek taman).
41007032	Yoto kusut piko alake wule mite Yesu citake nye kiminy kunämakay kutit nye puryo kot komuce kuŋalal, kusaysay picoto kusom neto kule kukemer yewuniyekyi cicoto.
41007033	Kunäm Yesu cicoto oŋnkukwer tapan kwine nkit, oŋnkowute mornenyi yititap cicoto kuŋutyi oŋnkutwa ŋelyepta.
41007034	Kunyal Yesu torot oŋnkumuny komuŋnto nyewo, oŋnkumwoci cicoto kule, “Epapata.’’ (Nye mwowu kule, “Kuyotokis yitik.’’)
41007035	Yoto pakenke kuyotokis yitikap cicoto, oŋnkutyak ŋelyepnyi kucec kuŋalal topon.
41007036	Kumwoci Yesu kunkolontyi cek tokol mente kumwoci citake tokol ŋolyontoni. Nteyu kowo kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci kunkolontyi kuket cekto, mpecek kutosyikey kumwaytat.
41007037	Kukite koromun piko tokol ce kilime oŋnkuŋalale kumwoy kule, “Kakwiy tukuk ce toponec, kokusop kot kulimnta piko ce kimiŋitu, oŋnkuŋalal piko ce kinomokis kutuwak.’’
41008001	Nto om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, koruruckey yec piko alake ce caŋ koromun okoy komokuponto omik ce mokwam. Kukur Yesu konomikyi oŋnkumwoci kule,
41008002	“Orire ani okolyoy picu, omnye pesyosyek somok yawut opontekey oko cekto kunyo puryo kot kuponto omik ce mokwam.
41008003	Kunyi ye komwoci kupecikey nye puryo kot apay, mosukumistot ye peti om aran, omnye kwone alake wule low.’’
41008004	Kuwekyi konomikyi kumwoci kule, “Nyortoy ono citake omit ce muce kot kupaye picu tokol om surukwenoni?’’
41008005	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Oponte akwek mukatinek ata?’’ Kuwec konomik kumwoy kule, “Ceponte mukatinek tisap.’’
41008006	Kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kopur ŋony, oŋnkunäm, mukatinekey tisap, oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci konomikyi kupcici piko, kunäm co oŋnkupcici piko tokol.
41008007	Kiponto cek mpo purpurunek tukusic ce minkec. Yoto kusomnci Yesu mpo purpurunekey kukasta Yiyintet oŋnkumwoci konomik kupcici piko purpurunek.
41008008	Yoto kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis. Ntowo kupok koruruc cek kisok cewoyec tisap ce nyitotin omik ce koŋet.
41008009	Kipuntoy piko tokol ce kyomis ce kirice elifunek amwan. Ntowo kupok, kuyomis Yesu piko kupecikey.
41008010	Yoto pakenke kulany Yesu rapet oko konomikyi oŋnkupa okoy koretap Talmanusa.
41008011	Yoto kukwa Farasayek alake, oŋnkucec kutintentyin oko Yesu. Kusyem cek kule celotu neto kumwoci kule kwiy pelutyet nyepo kakitat nye cone torot nye poru swametap Yiyintet.
41008012	Komuny Yesu komuŋnto nyewo, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Omne sukumoce piko cepo pintap pesyosyecu pelutyet nyepo kakitat? Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo pelut nyepo kakitat nye cimuce kot ciporci piko cepo pintap pesyosyecu.’’
41008013	Yoto kulany Yesu yec rapet kuwo kway tampayayet pitonin oŋnkupokokyi cek yoto.
41008014	Kuyutye konomik manäm mukatinek, ntene kiponto mukatyantet akenke pate om rapet.
41008015	Yoto kucec Yesu kusow cek kumwoci kule, “Oripkey akwek mumarekap Farasayek oko mumarekap Erote.’’
41008016	Kucec konomik kurwoc kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Komwoy kuyunyi so omnye moceponte acek mukatya?’’
41008017	Kunket Yesu ŋalek ce kiŋolole cekto, yoto kutepe kule, “Omne saŋalal akwek nkit omwowu kule moceponte mukatya? Tompo so kot osowu akwek okoy kunyi? Kerotiŋ kasoteywekwok?
41008018	Oponte akwek konyek ntene puryo kot oköste? Oponte yitik ntene puryo kot olimnte? Ntene puryo kot osoti akwek,
41008019	yo kyopeteci ani mukatinek mut aŋnkapaye piko elifunek mut? Kyoruruc akwek yoto kisok ata ce nyitotin omik ce koŋet?’’ Kuwec konomik kumwoy kule, “Kiciruruc kisok taman ok oyeny.’’
41008020	“Nteyo kyopeteci ani mukatinek tisap aŋnkapaye piko elifunek amwan? Kyoruruc akwek yoto kisok ata cewoyec cepo omik ce koŋet?’’ Kuwec konomik kumwoci kule, “Kiciruruc kisok tisap?’’
41008021	Kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Kunyo tompo kot osowu akwek so okoy kunyi?’’
41008022	Yoto kuwo Yesu oko konomik okoy kupunto Pesusayita. Kureton piko alake cito nye korat okoy ye kimite neto; oŋnkusom picoto neto kunäm kutwa cicoto.
41008023	Kunäm Yesu cicoto yewut oŋnkukwer kuwo moŋet saŋ. Nteyu kowo kuŋutyi neto konyekap cicoto, kunam konyek oŋnkutepe kule, “Kekäs nyi kitake?’’
41008024	Kukästa cicoto kunyal parak oŋnkumwoy kule, “Oköse piko ce pesetoti ce kerkey oko ketik.’’
41008025	Yoto kunäme Yesu yec yewuniyekyi konyekap cicoto, kutitir cicoto kuŋany konyekyi, yoto kusopco konyekyi kukästa topon okoy kukäs mpo kiy nye mite wule low.
41008026	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kuwo ka oŋnkunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Mente kot aketitekey awo moŋet yec.’’
41008027	Yoto kunomen Yesu oko konomikyi kupa kupunte soŋwek ce kimut koretap Kayisariya nyepo Filipi. Nteye kimite cekto kupeti om aran, kutepe Yesu konomik kumwoci kule, “Mwowu piko kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’
41008028	Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci kule, “Mwowu piko alake kule yiku nyi Yowana potisonintet. Kumwowu piko alake kule, yiku nyi Eriya. Nto alak kumwowu kule yiku nyi akenke om workoyikap keny nye kokotutune met!’’
41008029	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Nto akwek, omwowu akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’ Kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Kristo nye ŋapanet.’’
41008030	Yoto kumwoci Yesu kunkolontyi cek kule, “Monte cemwoci citake tokol kule neto ku ŋo.’’
41008031	Kucec Yesu kunet konomik kumwoci kule, “Mosukutaŋany weritap cito toŋoŋutek ce caŋ koromun, oŋnkutay poyik oko tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosicepakäc kume, nteye pesyet nyepo somok ciŋet kotutune met.’’
41008032	Kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato kutor kulim cek tokol. Yoto kunäm Petero Yesu yewut oŋnkukwer tapan oŋnkusow kupolyi kumwoci kule, “Mente taŋalale ŋalecu.’’
41008033	Ntene kuwekyikey Yesu kukäs konomikyi; oŋnkupolyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Wete yu omite ani nyi Setani: Puryo kot kupo kasoteywek cekuk Yiyintet, ntene po piko!’’
41008034	Yoto kukur Yesu piko tokol wanak oko konomikyi kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye möce citake tokol kule anama cepetekey ani, kumisyini kunyilkey nkit oŋnkutor murtowontenyi oŋnkuco cokunama cepetekey ani.
41008035	Omnye ci ake tokol nye möce kule osop soponnyi, kupote cito nyoto soponnyi, nto ci ake tokol nye kepot soponnyi omnye kacäm ani oŋnkucäm lokoywek ce toponec, kunye mosukusop cito nyoto soponnyi.
41008036	Nyoru ra cito latik ne ye keyum tukuk ce mite koret tokol kumukul oŋnkwarantakey nkit? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic!
41008037	Puryo kot kumite kiy nye muce kukon cito kwale soponnyi.
41008038	Kunyo ye kelilan ci ake tokol om wule omite ani oŋnkulilontyi ŋalekwani om pesyosyecu po piko cepo pinta nye puryo kot kuponto koyenot oŋnkupic ce ponto miyotyonik, mosukulilontyi mpo Weritap cito cicoto ye kaco om woyintap Papanyi, ye contoykey malaykanik ce tililec.’’
41009001	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite yuteyu piko alake ce keyoŋ ce puryo kot kupoku okoy ye kakäs cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kuconi om kamukeywek.’’
41009002	Nto om letutap pesyosyek lö, kukwer Yesu Petero oko Yakopo oko Yowana kupa tulwet parak kwicek nkit. Nteye kimite cekto kuköse om konyekwa, kuwäl Yesu tonnyi om taymwacek.
41009003	Yoto kuweckey sirokyi kulekececis kulelakitu koromun, nye puryo ci nye kowunin koret tokol nye muce kowun kulelakitu kuyunyoto.
41009004	Yoto kukäs konomik coto somoku Moses oko Eriya kuŋolole oko Yesu.
41009005	Kuŋalal Petero komwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet kiy nye topon omnye cemite acek yuteyu, kunyo kany cetec acek kisarinek somok, mokwek ake nyeŋuŋ, kupoyit ake Moses, kupoyit ake Eriya.’’
41009006	Kiŋalal Petero kumwoy ŋalecato omnye kipuryo kot kunkete ŋalek ce kimwowu, omnye kimuyo cek koromun.
41009007	Yoto kuco polyet oŋnkulum cekto rurwet, yoto kucone kutit polyet orit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani camanet, olimnci neto!’’
41009008	Kumolmolen pakenke kukäsakästa konomik, ntene kipuryo kot kukäs citake tokol wokwek Yesu nkit nye kipontokey oko cekto.
41009009	Nteye kimite cek tokol kurekune tulwet, kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Monte cemwoci citake kito nye kokäs akwek okoy ye kaciŋet kotutune met weritap cito.’’
41009010	Kucäm cek kurip ŋalek ce kumwoci Yesu. Ntene nteye kimite cek kwicek nkit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Mwowu ne ŋolyontoni kumwoy kule, ‘Citutune met’ ’’
41009011	Yoto kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Omne sukunete kumwowu konetikap ntarastinek kule, Eriya nye nyosyi kuco?’’
41009012	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Manta, Eriya nye nyosyi kuco cokusat kwitita kunyol tukuk tokol. Ntene omne sukumwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule mosukutaŋany Weritap cito koromun oŋnkyetay?
41009013	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule kico Eriya keny, kunyo kikwici piko neto tukuk ce möce cek kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto.’’
41009014	Ntowo kukwa cekto okoy kupun wule kimite konomik cut, kwokunyor kupontokey co piko ce caŋ oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kimite kutintentyintos oko konomik.
41009015	Yoto pakenke ye kotoköse piko Yesu kukite koromun oŋnkurway kupa ye mite neto wokusupay.
41009016	Kutepe Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ŋal ne cu kotintentyintosi akwek oko cekto?’’
41009017	Kuwec cito akenke nye kimite kwenutap piko kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, kokweru ani werinyu kuco wule mite nyi, omnye ponto oyinot nye miyat nye kinäm nye puryo kot komuce kot kuŋalal.
41009018	Ye kanäm kumilyini ŋony oŋnkukapus pukantet, oŋnkunyiy kelak, oŋnkuyam porto tokol. Kunyo kosom ani konomikuk kule kukwetyi oyik, ntene puryo kot komuc kot kukwet.’’
41009019	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Opo! Akwek pikap pinta nyepo pesyosyecu ce puryo kot kuponto koyenot! Mosopur ani oko akwek okoy oyu? Sutu werit kuco yu omite ani!’’
41009020	Yoto kusut cek lekwanato kuco ye kimite Yesu. Nteye kotoköse oyinotonoto Yesu, kunäm weroto kumilyi ŋony kumilmil oŋnkukapus pukantet.
41009021	Kutepe Yesu kwan kule, “Kikowany pesyos ce tya kunöme kuyunyitenyi?’’ Kuwec kwan kumwoy kule, “Kuceke ku lekwa nye miniŋ.
41009022	Kunyo kisyem porto aret ce caŋ kule apakäc, omnye wircini wule mite mata, oko peko orit. Ntene ye muci nyi yici kitake rirenec kalyec acek.’’
41009023	Kuwec Yesu kumwoci kule, “Omne semwowu kule, ‘Ye muci nyi?’ Mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite ci nye keyen.’’
41009024	Yoto pakenke kuŋalal kupol kwanitap lekwet kumwoy kule, “Oyeni ani! Kalya ye moponte koyenot nye yeme.’’
41009025	Yoto kukäs Yesu kule mite kukwoni kotosyinikey piko ce caŋ, kupolyi neto oyinot nye miyat kumwoci kule, “Komwowuŋ ani nyi oyinot nye nöme cito kumiŋit kunämakay kutit kule, ŋete lekwani, ntene mente toketyikey yec!’’
41009026	Kunäm oyinoto lekwet kupol oŋnkupirto kumisto oŋnkuŋete kuwo. Yoto kwiyiytakey lekwet musyo nye kame, okoy kumwoy ci ake tokol om yoto kule, “Kame’’.
41009027	Kunäm Yesu yewutap lekwet kukalya kuŋet kuyo, yoto kuŋet kuyo.
41009028	Nto om letut yu kowo kuwo Yesu koto orit, kutepe konomik neto kule, “Omne yu kopuryo kot cimuc acek kot cekwet oyinot?’’
41009029	Kuwekyi neto kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo cimuce kot cekwet oyinot nye yunyi om aret ake tokol, somset pate nye muce.’’
41009030	Kunomene cekto wuloto kupa kupunte koretap Kalilaya nye kipuryo kot kumöce Yesu kule konketo piko wule omite.
41009031	Omnye kinete neto konomikyi kumwocini kule, “Mosicenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito cekwer kuwo wule mite piko ce mosukupar kume, ntene mosiciŋet kotutune met om letutap pesyosyek somok.’’
41009032	Kipuryo kot kusow yoto konomik konket kule poru ne ŋalecato, ntene kumuyo cek yec yemo kutepe Yesu.
41009033	Kukwa cekto okoy kupun Kapernaum. Ntowo kupa koto orit, kutepe Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ŋal ne co korwoke akwek otintentyintosi om aran?’’
41009034	Yoto kusisio konomik, omnye kiŋololonu kutintentyintos kwicek nkit om aran kule ŋo nyewo kupëlis om cekto.
41009035	Kopur Yesu ŋony oŋnkukur konomik taman ok oyeny kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye möce ci ake tokol kule oyiku kantoyintet nyepo piko, kuroke cicoto kwek cito nyepo letut om wule mite piko alak tokol kwek mutworintetap piko.’’
41009036	Yoto kunäm Yesu lekwa nye miniŋ kuyoŋe taymwacek oŋnkunäm kumot kopure kupesokyi, oŋnkumwoci cekto kule,
41009037	“Ci ake tokol nye katoroc kuŋerekyi lekwa akenke om lekocu minkec nyi yunyi om kaynemwani, kunye katoroca kuŋerekyo ani cicoto; nto ci tokol nye katoroca kuŋerekyo, kunye puryo kot kukatoroca kuŋerekyo ani nkit, ntene kukatoroc kuŋerekyi mpo neto nyo kiyokwo ani.’’
41009038	Kumwoci Yowana Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kucekäs acek citake nye kukwete oyik om kayneŋuŋ ceyete acek cekerekte cicoto omnye puryo kot cepesetoti cepontotikey oko neto.’’
41009039	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Monte ceyete cekerekte cico, omnye puryo kot kumite ci nye muce kot kwiy ŋalek cepo kakitat om swametap kaynemwani nye muce yec kot kuweckey om letut oŋnkuŋalalena ani kwapi.
41009040	Ci tokol nye puryo kot kutoyec acek kunye nyinyo cicoto.
41009041	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci tokol nye kokonok akwek peko ce koye omnye oyiku piko cepo Kristo nye Ŋapanet, kunye mosukunyor cicoto kokotutyet nyenyi nye kocikoci.’’
41009042	“Nteye kamas kuwec ci ake tokol lekoy ce minkec ce yucu ce cömo ani kot kwiy miyotyet, kuroke cerotyi katitap cicoto rwantetap paka nyewo oŋnkyewirci ruretyet orit.
41009043	Kunyo ye yewuŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, yep kuŋet! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi torot wule mite soponto nye topon nye moponte yewut ake kusir ye ponte yewuniyek tukway oŋnkiwo wule mite mata nye momise.
41009044	[Wule wokwome om wuloto porwonikwa mokik ce mopoku oko mata nye momise.]
41009045	Nteye kerenkeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, yepta kuŋet! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi torot wule mite soponto nye topon nye meponte kerenket ake, kusir ye ponte kerenkok tukway oŋnkiwo wule mite mata nye momise.
41009046	[Wule wokwome om wuloto porwonikwa mokik ce mopoku oko mata nye momise.]
41009047	Nteye koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, lotu kulot! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet ponte koŋnta akenke kusir ye ponte konyek tukway oŋnkyewirciŋ wule mita mata nye momise.
41009048	Wule wokwome paronkikwa mokik ce mopoku oko mata nye momise.
41009049	“Omnye mosicitoye ci ake tokol mata kuyu wulo citoye nkuyek misyontet.
41009050	Topon misyontet, ntene ye komokunomu, omuci akwek kulene kot awec yec kot kunom? Roke oponte akwek misyontet, oŋnkocämnkey opurte kalyet akwek kwakwek nkit.’’
41010001	Yoto kunomene Yesu wuloto kuwo okoy koretap Yuteya oŋnkway oyinetap Yortan. Korurukyikey yec piko ce caŋ wule mite neto. Kunet neto cekto kuyu wule yunto kopurnyi.
41010002	Kukwa Farasayek ye mite Yesu oŋnkulot kutepe kule, “Mwowec acek, cömwec ra ntarastinekyo kukwet cito korkenyi?’’
41010003	Kuwekyi Yesu kutepe cekto kule, “Kikonok akwek Moses ntarastit oŋnkono?’’
41010004	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Kicäm Moses kule muce kusil cito parwet nye kakwete korket.’’
41010005	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kisilwok Moses akwek ntarastini omnye wuyec mukuleywekwok ye mocinetak.
41010006	Ntene kuceke ye kicece citany koret, kicemwoy kule, ‘Kitany Yiyintet moron oko korko.
41010007	Kunyo om ŋolyontoni kuye sukuŋet kupakakta cito kwan oko kamet oŋnkuyomokey oko korkenyi,
41010008	kwek picoto oyenku akenke nye komo ku pic oyeny yec, ntene kokwek ci akenke.’
41010009	Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini kot kupciy cito piko ce kokuyomo Yiyintet.’’
41010010	Nteye kimite cekto koto orit, kutepe konomik Yesu ŋalek ce nöme ŋolyontoni.
41010011	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ci ake tokol nye kakwet korkenyi oŋnkömüt ake, kakwiy cito nyoto sakwayanat om wule mite korkenyi.
41010012	Nto korko nye katay santenyi oŋnkuwo wokomüt citake, kakwiy korkonoto sakwayanat.’’
41010013	Kukwer piko lekok kukwa wule mite Yesu kule sukuŋet kunäm neto lekocoto ntene kupolyi konomik kukerekta picoto.
41010014	Nteye kotoköse Yesu kunyer oŋnkumwoci konomikyi kule, “Ayaste lekok kukwa wule omite ani! Monte ceyete, omnye po poytoyisyetap Yiyintet cekto ceyucutecu.
41010015	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kunome poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kuyu lekwa, kunye puryo kot komuce cito nyoto kot kowut mpo kisic.’’
41010016	Yoto kunäm Yesu lekocoto kopure kupesokyi oŋnkukemer yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto kusomnci kupeyok.
41010017	Nteye kimite Yesu kunomene poninekyi, kulapat citake kuwo tay nyi oŋnkukutuŋnkyi kutepe kule, “Konetintet nye topon, mosayiy ne ani ye sonyoru soponto nye mopoku?’’
41010018	Kutepe Yesu cicoto kule, “Omne sekureno ani nyi nye topon? Puryo ci nye topon, ntene Yiyintet pate nkit nye topon.
41010019	Nketi nyi ntarastinek, mwowu kule, ‘Mente oporisye, mente operperisye, mente asakwayan, mente acorsye, mente oŋomu ci, ywey kon oko komet!’ ’’
41010020	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kyorip ani ntarastinecutecu tokol kuceke oyiku lekwa.’’
41010021	Yoto kurotot Yesu cicoto topon kuŋerekyi moyenyi, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mite kito akenke nye tokupotuŋ nyi, iwo weyalye tukuk tokol ce ponte oŋnkikoci pesanik pononik mesenyoru mokoryontit om torot, oŋnkico cepetekey oko ani.’’
41010022	Nteye kotolime cicoto ŋalecato; kunyer kusiriny tokoynyi oŋnkunomen kuwecikey kunerekat omnye kimokoryo nye kiponto tukuk ce caŋ.
41010023	Yoto kukäsakästa Yesu oŋnkumwoci konomikyi kule, “Mokuwuyit koromun om wule mite piko co mokoren ce ponto tukuk ce caŋ ye mokowut cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’’
41010024	Kukite konomik ŋalecato koromun, ntene kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Lekocu, mokuwuy koromun ye mociwut poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
41010025	Lekit kupunte nkamiyet koŋntap sintanit kupël ye mokowut cito nye mokoryo nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
41010026	Yoto kukite konomik koromun oŋnkutepekey kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kunyo ŋo nyun cito nye cimuce cisop.’’
41010027	Kurotot Yesu cek topon, oŋnkuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot komukoktos ŋalecu om wule mite piko, ntene mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
41010028	Kumwoci Petero Yesu kule, “Nto acek? Käs pa, kicepakakte acek tukuk tokol oŋnkyinämiŋ cepetekey oko nyi.’’
41010029	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Kumwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo ci nye ye kapakakta kanyi; oko mpo mutakwam, nto mpo cekwam, nto kamet, nto mpo lekok, nto mosonok oŋnkucäm ani oko lokoywek ce toponec,
41010030	nye puryo kot kunyoru om pesyosyecutecu korik pokolwokik ce caŋ, oŋnkunyor mpo cekwam oko mpo kamet, oko mpo kwan oko mpo lekok, oko mpo mosonok, oŋnkunyor mpo toŋoŋutek, oŋnkunyor yec soponto nye mopoku om kenyisyek co kwoni.
41010031	Ntene piko ce mite yawut tayta kuce mosukwokupoyit coto letut, nto piko ce caŋ ce mite yawut letut kuce mosukwokupoyit coto tayta.’’
41010032	Nteye kimite cekto kupeti om aran kuloŋntoy Yerusalem, yoto kuwo Yesu tay kuntoci konomik ce kanyokoritu kumuyo oko piko ce kirupe cekto ce komuyo mpecek. Yoto kukwer Yesu konomik taman ok oyeny kupa tapan, oŋnkumwoci kito nye mosukwiyakay om wule mite neto.
41010033	Kumwoci kule, “Alim pa, ce mite yawut cepeti celoŋntoy Yerusalem, wule mowocenäm Weritap cito, oŋnkyekwer kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek, mosicewosontyi oŋnkyemutyi musankut cepakäc oŋnkyikoyito kuwo wule mite lamek.
41010034	Mosukurorici kucur co neto, oŋnkuŋutyi, oŋnkupas, oŋnkupakäc kume, ntene mosukotutune met om letutap pesyosyek somok.’’
41010035	Yoto kukwa ye kimite Yesu werikap Sepetayo oyenku Yakopo oko Yowana, oŋnkumwoci cekto Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mite ŋolyontet akenke nye ce möce acek kule yiwec nyi.’’
41010036	Kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Ŋolyo ne nye omöce kule oyiwok ani?’’
41010037	Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Comwec kule, ye kepure nyi ŋeceret nyepo woyinŋuŋ, comwec acek yoto cipur oko nyi, kopurune ake yewuŋuŋ nyepo tay kopurune ake yewuŋuŋ nyepo let.’’
41010038	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kito nye osome. Omuci akwek ra kot opunte toŋoŋutek ce mataŋany ani?’’
41010039	Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Cimuci.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Po manta kule omuci akwek opunte toŋoŋutek ce mataŋany ani, oŋnkyepatisanak mpo patisanet kuyu wulo mocepatisana.
41010040	Ntene puryo kot oponte kamukeywek akwey kule ŋo nye mosukopure yewumwani nyepo tay nto nyepo let. Yiyintet nkit nye mosukukoci oteputek coto piko ce kiyiytoci neto.’’
41010041	Ntowo kulim konomik cut tamanu ŋalecato, kunyerci cekto Yakopo oko Yowana.
41010042	Yoto kukur Yesu konomik kuyomo wanak, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Oŋnket akwek kule piko ce ciyite kule poytoyik cepo lamek kuce ponto kamukeywek kupayta piko, kunyo yiyisye pikwa cewoyec kamukeywek kupayta cekto.
41010043	Puryo kot kuroke kuyuyit nyo om wule omite akwek. Ye möce citake om akwek kule oyiku nyewo, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintet nyepo piko.
41010044	Nteye möce citake om akwek kule oyiku kantoyin, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintet nyepo piko tokol.
41010045	Omnye kipuryo kot kuco Weritap cito kule kwokyiwo yisyet, ntene kico kule coyiyisye oŋnkume kukoyto soponto nyenyi kwolis sukusop piko ce caŋ.’’
41010046	Kukwa cekto okoy, Yeriko. Nteye kimite Yesu kunomone oko konomikyi Wanak oko piko ce caŋ, kimite yoto citake nye korat nye kipure aret tapan sukusomsi; nye kicekure Partimayo weritap Tamayo.
41010047	Ntowo kulim cicoto korat kule Yesu nyepo Nasaret nyitenyi, kucec kupol kumwoy kule, “Yesu! Weritap Tauti! Rirena kalya ani!’’
41010048	Yoto kupolyi piko ce caŋ cicoto kumwoci kusis, ntene kutosyikey kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Weritap Tauti! Rirena kalya ani!’’
41010049	Kuyo Yesu oŋnkumwayta kule, “Okur kuco yu.’’ Yoto kukur piko cicoto korat kumwoci kule, “Titir ŋete ŋony! Kuriŋ Yesu.’’
41010050	Yoto kuwirci cicoto sirenyi tapan, oŋnkuŋet kuyo oŋnkuco ye kimite Yesu.
41010051	Kutepe Yesu cicoto kule, “Möce nyi kule oyiwuŋ ne?’’ Kumwoci cicoto Yesu kule, “Konetintet, omöce kule akäste yec.’’
41010052	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Wecikey kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’ Yoto kusopco konyekyi kukästa oŋnkuwo kunäm kupetakey Yesu om aran.
41011001	Nteyu kowo kurik cek kupun Yerusalem om ye lekite moŋetap Pesapake oko moŋetap Pesaniya om komosta nyepo tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek. Yoto kuyokto Yesu konomikyi oyeny.
41011002	Kumwoci kule, “Ape okoy opunte kayta nyin mite taymwoŋ. Nteye kopunte kayata orit, mosonyoru moyitap sikiryet nyeratat nye tompo kot kulany kuwete ci mpo akenke, atyac oŋnkokweru kuco yu.
41011003	Nteye katepenak citake kule omne satyac akwek moyitap sikiryet? Omwoci kule möce mokoryontet, kunyo mosukukwer kuket lakwar okoy yu!’’
41011004	Kunomen cek kupa okoy wokunyor moyitap sikiryet nye kocerotyi kurkat om yepo aret nyepo kayta.
41011005	Nteye kimite cek kutyoce, kutepe piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kule, “Omne sayiy kuyunyi atyac moyitap sikiryet?’’
41011006	Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci picoto ŋalek co komwowu Yesu. Yoto kwasta picoto konomik kukwer moyitap sikiryet.
41011007	Kukwer cek moyitap sikiryet okoy kupun ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkuyitoci sirokwa pataytap moyitap sikiryet oŋnkulany kukonopci Yesu kopure parak.
41011008	Kuyito piko ce caŋ sirokwa aret nye wete Yesu, kuput piko alake ketik ce ponto sokek oŋnkoyito aran.
41011009	Yoto kucec piko ce kimite let oko ce kimite tay kupol kutum kule: “Akaste Yiyintet! Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok kinko nyi coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet!
41011010	Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok poytoyisyet nyi coni nyepo kukonyo Tauti! Cikaste Yiyintet!’’
41011011	Yoto kupunto Yesu Yerusalem, oŋnkuwo okoy kotap Yiyintet orit, nteyu kowo kukäs tukuk tokol ce kimite orit okoy kuwany, kunomen oko konomikyi taman ok oyeny okoy kupunto Pesaniya, omnye kikwimen koret.
41011012	Ntowo kuyekune ye kimite cekto kukwone Pesaniya, kwam Yesu rupet, yoto kukäs neto mokoywet nye ponto sokek nye kimite ye low.
41011013	Kuwo kule wakäs nto manyorte mokoyek ketoto. Ntowo kupunto yeto, wokunyor kuponto sokek pate, omnye kipuryo kot ku pesyosyek coto ce rurye mokoyek.
41011014	Yoto kumwoci Yesu mokoywet kule, “Mente kot tokwameniŋ nyi ci yec mokoyek kenyis.’’ Kulim konomik ŋalek ce kimwoy neto.
41011015	Ntowo kupun cek Yerusalem, kowut kotap Yiyintet orit, oŋnkucec kukwetune orit piko ce kyolisyi oko ce kyolyoyisyi, oŋnkumil mesanikap piko co wöle pesanik oko ŋecerokap piko ce kyolyoy swororok,
41011016	oŋnkuyete piko tokol manamat kusut kiy kuweto saŋ.
41011017	Kunet Yesu piko yoto kumwoci kule, “Kicesil silutekap Yiyintet kule kimwoy Yiyintet kule ‘Mosukwek komwani koto nye some pikap koret tokol,’ kunyi kwawec akwek kwek kepenet nye wuŋekey corik?’’
41011018	Yoto kulim tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek ŋalecato, kucec cek kuceny aret nye mokupakäce Yesu. Ntene kunyokoritu kuywey neto omnye kikite piko ce caŋ konetisyenyi.
41011019	Ntowo kwimen koret, kunomen Yesu oko konomikyi kupete moŋet.
41011020	Ntowo kuyekune kororn ye kimite cekto kupeti om aran kukäs mokoywetwe nye kuyam kuceke met okoy tikityek.
41011021	Yoto kusot Petero kito nye kukwiyakay, kumwoci neto Yesu kule, “Konetintet, käs pa kuyam mokoywetwe kwecupe nyi!’’
41011022	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye koyen okenekey Yiyintet,
41011023	omuci omwoci tulwoni kule, ‘Ŋayekisye oŋnkiwo wewircikey ruretyet orit.’ Oŋnkupuryo kot oponte mukuleywek oyeny, ntene oyeni kule mokwiyokis ŋalek ce kemwowu, kwiyiyoktos kupoyit manta ŋalecato kemwowu nyi.
41011024	Kunyo omwowok ani akwek kule, ye kosom kule cekonok kitake kumöce kule oyeni kule kacenyoru, mosicekonok kiy ake tokol.
41011025	Nteye koŋetye osom, roke okalye ci ake tokol ŋolyo ye kwopontekey, sukuŋet kukalyak akwek Papamwoŋ nye mite torot miyotyonikwok.
41011026	[Ntene ye puryo kot omuci akwek kot akalye piko alak; kupuryo komuce mpo kot kukalyak Papamwoŋ nye mite torot miyotyonikwok.]’’
41011027	Yoto kukwa cekto okoy kupun Yerusalem. Nteye kimite Yesu kuwesetoti om kotap Yiyintet orit, yoto kukwa tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik ye kimite neto,
41011028	oŋnkutepe kumwoci kule, “Poŋo kamukeywek cu yiye nyi tukucu? Ŋo nyi kikoniŋ kamukeywek iyiy tukucu?’’
41011029	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosatepenak ani akwek teputyet akenke pate, nteye kowekwo, mpo ani mosowekwok wule onyortoy kamukeywek ce oyiye tukucu.
41011030	Kicone potisonisyetap Yowana torot, nto kicone wule mite piko? Owekwo ani pa akwek?’’
41011031	Yoto kurwoc cekto kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone torot,’ mosukuwekwec neto kule, ‘Omne satay akwek moyen ŋalekyi?’
41011032	Nteye kucemwowu kule, ‘Kicone wule mite piko.’ ’’ (Kuywey cek piko, omnye kicöme ci ake tokol kule kiworkoyo Yowana manta.)
41011033	Kuwekyi cekto Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot cinket acek.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mpo ani puryo kot omuci kot omwowok akwek wule onyortoy kamukeywek cu oyiye tukucu.’’
41012001	Yoto kuŋololyi Yesu cekto om tyonkocok kumwoy kule, “Kimite citake nye kiwu ketik ce cekure Sapipunek oŋnkuker tuyita komut, oŋnkupal kutec mwenet nye cirurunye matuntanikap Sapipunek, oŋnkutec kitarit nye ceripse oŋnkukoci kopotik kukotesan, oŋnkunomen kuwo toyek.
41012002	Ntowo kupunto pesyosyek ce rurye omikap sapipunek, kuyok cicoto mutworintenyi kuco wule mite kopotik co kikotesonisyi, kule sukuŋet co kukoci mutworintonoto omik alak cepo sapipunek ce kiciyoyekyin.
41012003	Kunäm kopoticoto mutworintonoto oŋnkupir oŋnkukwet kuweto yewuniyek pate.
41012004	Kuyok cicoto mutworintet ake yec, kupir kopoticoto yec mutworintet nyoto metit kukoten, oŋnkunyalil kutaŋany.
41012005	Kuyokto cicoto mutworintet ake yec, kupakäc kopoticoto mutworintet nyoto kume, oŋnkutaŋany mpo alak ce caŋ, kupir alak, oŋnkupakäc alak kupok.
41012006	Cito nye kikiŋet kuyokto cicoto ku weritap cicoto akenke pate cämanet. Nto om letut kuyokto cicoto werinyi nkit kuwo wule mite kopotik, kumwoy kule, ‘Mosukuywey cek werimwani.’
41012007	Ntene kurwoc kopotik kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nyitenyi kunye kotiyintet, akwa cenäm cepakäc kume, sukuŋet kwek nyinyacek kontisyet!’
41012008	Yoto kunäm cekto werit oŋnkupakäc kume, oŋnkocut kucone mparetap sapipunek.’’
41012009	Kutep Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mosukwiy kulene citap mparetap sapipunek? Mosukuco neto nkit, oŋnkupakäc kupok kopoticoto oŋnkukoci kopotik alak kukotesan mparetap sapipunek.’’
41012010	Porukey kule tompo kot asuman akwek silutyoni po Yiyintet nyi mwowu kule: “Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule puryo kot kuponto latik, kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.
41012011	Mokoryontet nye kikwiye, kunyo po kakitat koromun wule yunto!’’
41012012	Yoto kusyem kantoyikap Farasayek kule cenäm Yesu, omnye kinket kule kaŋalale neto tyonkocet nye nöme cekto, ntene kuywey luket nyepo piko ce caŋ. Yoto kunomen cekto kupecikey kupapakta neto.
41012013	Ciyok Farasayek alak oko piko cepo luketap Erote alak kukwa wule mite Yesu kule sukuŋet kwokulot cek neto om ŋalek ce mosukumwoy om tintenotet.
41012014	Kukwa picoto oŋnkwokutepe Yesu kule, “Konetintet, cinket kule yiku nyi ci nyepo manta, oŋnkupuryo kot soti ŋalek ce sote piko, omnye puryo kot soti wule yunto piko, ntene neti pate ŋalek cepo manta cepo Yiyintet, kunyo mwowec acek, cömwec ra ntarastinekyo cekweci mosoret Kinko Nyewo nto puryo? Roko cekweci nto puryo kot kuroke cekweci?’’
41012015	Ntene kunket Yesu tekutek ce kiponto cek, kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Omne sasyem akwek kule ceteca ani? Osutwo pa silinkit akäs?’’
41012016	Yoto kusutyi cek neto silinkit akenke, kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Po ŋo metit nyi oko kaynet nyi silot?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Po Kinko. Nyewo.’’
41012017	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Kunyo okocini kinko tukuk cepo kinko, okocini Yiyintet tuku cepo Yiyintet.’’ Kukite cekto yoto koromun ŋalekyi.
41012018	Kukwa Satusayek alake wule mite Yesu. (Coto ku piko co mwowu kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko ce kipok.) Kutepe cekto Yesu kule,
41012019	“Konetintet, kisilwec acek Moses ntarastini kule, ‘Ye kame citake oŋnkupakakta korket nye puryo kot kuyici lekok, kuroke konti komüt mutakwam korkonoto musuk, sukuŋet kuyici mutakwam nyo kime lekok.’
41012020	Kunyo kimite piko tisapu ce kitupco, kukesyo nyewo komüt korket, ntene kume nye kipuryo kot kuyi lekoy.
41012021	Komüt mutakwam nyepo oyeny konti korkonoto musuk, kume mpo nyoto nye kipuryo kot kupakakta lekoy, kuyunyoto mpo nyepo somok.
41012022	Komüt picoto ku tisap korkonoto oŋnkupok picoto tokol nye kipuryo kot kuyi lekwa mpo akenke. Nto om letut kume mpene korkonoto.
41012023	Kunyo om pesyet nyo ceŋetos citutune met piko tokol, poyitu ŋo korkonoto? Omnye kikomüt cekto picoto tokol ku tisap?’’
41012024	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Yunyoto ye somosokisye akwek, ntene oŋnketi akwek omne? Omnye puryo kot oŋnketi silutekap Yiyintet oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnket swametap Yiyintet.
41012025	Omnye piko co mokotutune met, kuce puryo kot komütisyi moronik nto cimüt mpo koruk, omnye mosukukerkeyitu cekto oko Malaykanik ce mite torot.
41012026	Kunyo nto ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme kotutunetap met kucu: tompo kot asuman akwek om kitaputap Moses ŋalek cepo rukututwet nyo kiloye? Omnye kicesil ŋalecato kule kimwoci Yiyintet Moses kule, ‘Oyiku ani yiyintetap Apram, Yiyintetap Isaka, yiyintetap Yakopo.’
41012027	Poru ŋaleca kule, Yiyintet kunye Yiyintet nyepo piko ce soptos ntene puryo ku yiyintetap piko ce kipok. Oyiku akwek mosotin koromun.’’
41012028	Kimite yoto konetintetap ntarastinek akenke nye kilime ŋalecato. Yoto kukäs neto kule kowekyi Yesu Satusayek ŋalek topon, kuco ye mite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Ntarastit oŋnkono nyepo tayta nye pële tokol.’’
41012029	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Ntarastit nyepo tayta nye pële tokol kunyi mwowu kule, ‘Alim pa pikap Israel! Mokoryontet yiyintenyo kunye Mokoryontet akenke nkit pate.
41012030	Misyini cäm Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋunŋ om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol, oko soponŋuŋ tokol, oko kasoteywekuk tokol, oko swameŋuŋ tokol.’
41012031	Nto nyepo oyeny nye pëlisyi kunyi kule, ‘Misyini cäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’ Puryo ntarastinek alak cewoyec kupël cutecu oyeny.’’
41012032	Kumwoci konetintetap ntarastinek Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kemwowu ŋalek cepo manta kule, ‘Mokoryontet kunye Yiyintet akenke nkit pate, puryo kot kumite yiyik alak ntene neto nkit pate.
41012033	Kunyo misyini kucäm cito Yiyintet om mukuleynyi tokol, oko kasoteywekyi tokol, oko swamenyi tokol, oŋnkucäm latyenyi kuyu wulo cömntoykey neto nkit.’ Topon koromun kupëlis ye kocerip ntarastinecutecu oyeny kupël ye kocesut tyoŋik oŋnkyepele meset nyetilil kwek korosek cepo Yiyintet.’’
41012034	Yoto kukäs Yesu kule kawec cicoto ŋalek cepo ŋomnon, kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot mitowune nyi wule low om wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’ Kipuryo yoto ci nye kitokomuc kot kusyem kule atepe Yesu ŋolyo mpo akenke.
41012035	Nteye kimite Yesu kunetisyi om kotap Yiyintet, yoto kutep kumwoy kule, “Muce kulene kumwoy konetikap ntarastinek kule, mosukwek Kristo keseniyantetap Tauti?
41012036	Omnye kintoci Muyet Nyetilil Tauti kumwoy kule ‘Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryontenyu kule, Pure yu po yewumwani nyepo tay, okoy okoci ani punikuk kwek ŋacerok cepo kerenkokuk!’
41012037	Kunyo nteye kure Tauti nkit kule, ‘Mokoryontet.’ Komuce kulene yec Kristo kwek keseniyantetap Tauti?’’ Kulimnta piko ce caŋ om yoto ŋalekyi om ŋerekwek.
41012038	Nteye kimite Yesu kunete cek, yoto kumwoy kule, “Oripkey koromun wule Konetikap ntarastinek, ce möce kule cepesetoti kukelac sirok ce koyec, oŋnkucäm kule ciyweyec cisupayec topon om wulo po moteponik.
41012039	Ce kweye ŋacerok co kweyotin om korikapkok oko oteputek cepo tay om sokwonutek,
41012040	ce nyopone korikap musukik, oŋnkusilkey kusome kwiyisye ŋalek ce caŋ, cekto ce mosukunyor toŋoŋutek ce caŋ ce pëlisyi.’’
41012041	Nteye kimite Yesu kukepur ye kilekite sontukut nye cekonore pesanikap kotap Yiyintet, kukäs neto piko ce kikocini pesanik sontukut orit. Kukoci piko ce mokoren pesanik ce caŋ.
41012042	Ntene kuco korko nye panan nye musuk oŋnkukoci kafunek oyeny.
41012043	Yoto kukur Yesu konomikyi kukwa yeto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Omwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kekoci panani musuk kokotutek ce caŋ kusir ce kekoci piko alake tokol.
41012044	Omnye kakon piko alake kokotutekwa ce koŋetune ce caŋ cepo mokoryontimwa. Ntene om wule mite korkoni panan kuyu wule yunto, kokukoci neto kiy ake tokol nye koponto, coto kuce tokol ce kuponto ce kwenekey om sopon nyi.’’
41013001	Nteye kimite Yesu kunomene kotap Yiyintet, kumwoy akenke om konomikyi kule, “Konetintet, käs pa, rwontok cewoyec oko tekset nyepo korik cewoyec.’’
41013002	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kekäs nyi koricu woyec cu kicetec kuyunyi, puryo rwantet mpo akenke nye ŋetune ye mite yawut, mosiciturpup tokol oŋnkyewirci ŋony.’’
41013003	Nteye kimite Yesu kukepur tulwetap mokoyek kutokyikey kotap Yiyintet. Yoto kukwa ye kimite neto mpo Petero oko Yowana oko Antereya oŋnkumwoci möt kule,
41013004	“Mwowec acek, mosukwiyokis pesyo ne ŋalecutecu?’’
41013005	Kucec Yesu kunet cekto kumwoci kule, “Akäste monte kot kuperperak kumasak citake tokol.
41013006	Mosukukwa piko ce caŋ om kaynemwani oŋnkwokumwoy kule, ‘Ani kunye nyoto!’ Oŋnkuperper piko ce caŋ.
41013007	Monte cemuye ye kolim polotetap poryet nye lekit, nto poryet nye mite wule low, monte cemuye, mosukwiyokis tukucoto, ntene kupuryo kot kuporu kule kopunto pesyetap letut.
41013008	Omnye mosukusetyi koret ake kuporye koret ake, kusetyi poytoyisyet ake kuporye poytoyisyet ake, mosukoriŋriŋ koret wulyo tokol oŋnkunäm rupet koret tokol. Tukucutecu kuce poru kule kacec mwoninto nyepo toŋoŋutek.
41013009	“Ntene misyinok oripkey akwek nkit. Omnye mosukunämak piko oŋnkukwerok ape koti, mosicepasenak korikapkok, mosoyoŋe taytap poytoyik cewoyec oko taytap kinkonik omnye kacäm akwek kaynemwani sukuŋet omwoci akwek cekto lokoywek ce toponec.
41013010	Ntene misyini ce nyosye ce mwoci lokoywek ce toponec piko cepo koret tokol.
41013011	Nteye kacenämak akwek oŋnkyekwerok ape koti, monte ce nyosye cemuye kule mosicemwowu ne, ye kopunto pesyonoto, aŋalal omwowu pate ŋalek ce kacekonok kule omwowu om yoto. Omnye puryo kot kucikwakwek ŋalek ce moŋalal, mosukukwane wule mite Muyet Nyetilil.
41013012	Mosukukoyito piko nkit mpo yeyamwa cenäm oŋnkyepakäc, mosukwiy mpo kwan lekokwa kuyunyoto. Mosukuweckey lekok kunäm mpo kwan oŋnkukoyito cepakäc.
41013013	Mosukusenkerak akwek piko tokol omnye kocäma ani. Ntene mosicisop cesor ci ake tokol nye kotitir okoy kupunto pesyet nyepo letut.’’
41013014	“Ntene ye kokäs akwek, ‘Kiy nye miyat nye cetoye,’ kumite keyoŋe otepto nye puryo kot kuroke kuyoŋe. (Moce kunket cito nyo sumone kule mwowu ne ŋalecu!) Misyini kumwey yoto piko ce mite Yuteya kupa lokomosyek.
41013015	Oŋnkupuryo kot kumisyini cito nye mite konyi kisyek kurek kuwo koto orit wokonum kiy ake tokol nye möce kule owete,
41013016	Puryo kot kuroke cito nye mite mparen kuwo konyi kule wonumu siret.
41013017	Mite kwapi koromun om pesyosyecoto koruk ce koyotin oko koruk ce rerisyi lekok!
41013018	Osom Yiyintet sukuŋet mente kwiyokis ŋalecutecu om pesyosyek cepo peŋat ye katit koret.
41013019	Omnye mosukupëlis toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyecoto kupël toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyek alak tokol ce kikwiyokis om koret kuceke ye kitany Yiyintet koret okoy kupunto pesyosyecoto. Ntene komokwiyoktos yec taŋanyanta ake nye kerkey nyoto.
41013020	Ntomo nye kikoŋerin Mokoryontet Yiyintet kuŋerinitu pesyosyecoto, nto puryo ci mpo akenke nye ŋetu nye cimuce cisop. Ntene kikoŋerin Mokoryontet pesyosyecoto om toponiyetap pikyi co kweyanik.
41013021	“Kunyo, ye komwowok akwek citake om pesyosyecoto kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi Kristo nye Ŋapanet!’ nto ‘Oŋyin mite yun!’ Monte ciyen ŋalekyi.
41013022	Omnye mosukutok piko ce mwiynec ce perperisyi kule ciku Ŋapanet oko piko cemwowu kule ciku workoyik. Mosukwiy picoto pelutok cepo kakitat kule siceŋet cemas ciwurte piko ce kweyanikap Yiyintet ye kemukakay.
41013023	Akäste akwek! Omnye komwowok ani akwek ŋalek tokol kutompo kot kupunto pesyonoto.’’
41013024	“Om letutap pesyosyekap toŋoŋutek; mosukolumakay kutuyit asista,
41013025	oŋnkutay arawet me luwu. Mosukosuwune kokelik torot. Mosukotimtimkey swamet nyepo torot.
41013026	“Yoto ye mosokäs Weritap cito kucone polyet kuponto swamet nyewo oko woyinto.
41013027	Mosukuyokto neto malaykanik kupa taponutek amwan cepo koret, oŋnkoruruc pikap Yiyintet ce kweyanik kukwane wule kiŋete koret tokol kuceke tapan okoy tapan.’’
41013028	“Roke anetekey akäse ketit mokoywet. Ye kokäs akwek kwak kule kokuŋot sokek ce ŋorŋor; oŋnket yoto kule karik pesyosyekap peŋatut.
41013029	Kuyunyoto, ye kokäs akwek kwiyoktos tukuk ceyucutecu, kuye mosonket kule karik kucec pesyosyekap Weritap cito.
41013030	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule! Mosukwitita ŋalecutecu tokol kutompo kot kupok piko tokol cepo pini soptos yawut.
41013031	Poku wulin po torot, oŋnkupok wuli po ŋony, ntene puryo kot kupoku ŋalekwani mpo kisic.’’
41013032	“Puryo ci mpo akenke nye nkete pesyonoto nto sawet, nka mpo Malaykanik om torot, nka mpo Werit. Papa nkit pate nye nkete.
41013033	Akäste, oripkey okoŋisye, omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek kule pesyo ne ye puntoy pesyonoto.
41013034	Mosukukerkeyit oko ci nye konomen kuwo toyek oŋnkupakakta mutworikyi kumite kwiyisyi, oŋnkukoci ci ake tokol yisyenyi nye yiye, oŋnkumwoci cito nye ripe kurket kukös kuripso topon.
41013035	Kunyo oripsye, omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek pesyet nye cone citap koto. Muce pesyet ake kupun kosoleny, nto ye komoy kwen, nto ye kerir koret, nto ye komwok asista.
41013036	Nteye kotepe kot kuco lakwar, kupuryo kot kuroke cokunyorwok akwek omite koruye rwonto!
41013037	Kunyo ŋalek ce omwowok ani akwek kuce omwocini mpo piko alak tokol kule, okösu oripkey.’’
41014001	Nteyu kowo kuŋet pesyosyek oyeny kupunto pesyet nyepo sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure keytayet oko sakwet nyepo mukatyantet nyemo kutunat. Kimite yoto tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek kucenye aret nye mokunäme Yesu om wule wuŋat oŋnkupakäc kume.
41014002	Kumwoy cekto yoto kule, “Puryo kot kurok kwiy ŋolyontoni ye pesyetap sakwet, omnye muce kiy piko pararet.’’
41014003	Kimite Yesu pesyet ake kotap Simon citap mutyenkenik om Pesaniya, nteye kimite kwomisyi, kuco korket ake nye kiponto cupet nye nyitat mwaytap ketit nye cekure narat nye poŋu topon nye kyole pesan ce caŋ. Kuyat kuyeyi cupet oŋnkuroŋnkyi mwayta metitap Yesu.
41014004	Kunyer yoto piko alake ce kimite yoto kuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Omne siciwurta mwayi poŋu topon kuyunyi?
41014005	Kopuryo kot kuroke kyalya sicenyor silinkinek ce keyitye pokolwokik lö oŋnkyikoci pesanik pononik?’’ Kunyerci cekto korkonoto koromun.
41014006	Ntene kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ayaste! Omne sayim akwek neto? Kokwiwo ani ŋolyo nye topon nye nyolunot koromun.
41014007	Omnye opontekey akwek oko pononik okokoy, nteye omöce kule cikalye cek omuci oyici tukuk ce toponec om pesyo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot opuri ani oko akwek okokoy.
41014008	Kakwiy korkoni ŋalek ce muce, omnye kaŋape mwayta pormwani kutompo kot kupunto muyisyet.
41014009	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, om koret tokol wule mocemwaytye lokoywek ce toponec, mosicemwowu mpo ŋalek cu kokwiwo ani korkoni cisote neto.’’
41014010	Kunomen yoto Yuta Isikaryoti nye ki akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny, kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec wokuŋomnto Yesu kukoci cekto.
41014011	Kuŋerec tisik koromun yu kowo kulim ŋalek ce komwoy Yuta. Kukurtoci cek neto kule mosicekoniŋ pesanik. Yoto pakenke kucec Yuta kuceny poroyinto nye topon nye mokuŋomnte Yesu.
41014012	Nteye ki pesyet nyepo tayta nyepo sakwet nyo kyome mukatyantet nye mokutunat, pesyet nye ceyenye kecirekap omikap Keytayet, kutepe konomik Yesu kule, “Ono wule möce nyi kule cipe acek woceyiytowuŋ wule meyomisye omik cepo pesyetap keytayet?’’
41014013	Yoto kuyokto Yesu konomik oyeny kumwoci kule “Ape okoy moŋet orit, mosukutuyenok akwek citake nye toronu teretap peko, arup cicoto,
41014014	okoy koto nye kewut, oŋnkomwoci citap koto kule, ‘Komwowuŋ nyi konetintet kule, ono kotap toyek nye moyomisye ani oko konomikyu omikap pesyetap Keytayet?’
41014015	Mosukuporwok cicoto koto nyewo nye satat topon nye mite koto parak, wayiyte kiy ake tokol om wuloto.’’
41014016	Kunomen konomik kupa okoy kupunto moŋet, wokunyor kiy ake tokol kumite kuyu wulo kakamwayta Yesu. Kuyiyta cekto omikap pesyetap Keytayet.
41014017	Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kuco Yesu oko konomikyi taman ok oyeny.
41014018	Nteye kimite cek kukepur kwomisyi, kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuŋomnto ani akenke om akwek nye mite yuteyu kwomisyi oko ani.’’
41014019	Yoto kocoŋoŋonis konomik oŋnkucec ci ake tokol om cekto kutepe Yesu kule, “Ani nyoto?’’
41014020	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Akenke om akwek taman ok oyeny nye noknoktoy mukatyantet nyenyi sanit akenke oko ani.
41014021	Omnye mosukume Weritap cito kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule mosukume, ntene mite kwapi koromun cito nyo mosukuŋomnto neto! Kitopon nto kipuryo kot ceyi cicoto mpo kisic!’’
41014022	Nteye kimite kwomisyi, kunäm Yesu mukatyantet, oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci konomikyi, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Onäm oyam, pormwani nyitenyi.’’
41014023	Kunäm yec cikompet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci kuyesyo cek tokol.
41014024	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Korotikwani cutecu cepo kirotyetap Yiyintet nyelel ce citotocini piko ce caŋ.
41014025	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule komo toye ani yec mpo tukusic pekap omikap sapipunek okoy pesyet nye mosaye ce lelac om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
41014026	Ntowo kupok, kutum tumnto oŋnkuŋetyo kupa okoy kupunto tulwetap sapipunek.
41014027	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mosomwey arway akwek tokol oŋnkopakakta ani, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukupar Yiyintet mesewontet kume, yoto kuseret kecirek.’
41014028	Ntene om letut ye kaciŋeta otutune met, mosontowok awo anyosye Kalilaya.’’
41014029	Kumwoy Petero kule, “Nka kot kamwey kurway cut alake tokol, puryo kot oyostiŋ ani nyi mpo kisic.’’
41014030	Kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Oŋnkisot ŋolyontoni! Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret oyeny om kwomowutap pesyoni, mesetuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule puryo oŋnketo ani.’’
41014031	Kuwec Petero yec om swamet kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot omuci ani kot atuckey omwowu kule monketiŋ nyi, nka kot koyek met cepoku mpo tukway!’’ Kumwoy mpo konomik cut tokol kuyunyoto.
41014032	Kupa cek okoy kupunto mparet nye cekure kesesemane. Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Opur yuteyu ye omite ani osome.’’
41014033	Kukwer neto kupetakey Petero oko Yakopo oko Yowana. Kupotpoten Yesu kumuy oŋnkusot koromun om yoto,
41014034	oŋnkumwoci neto cekto kule, “Oponte nerekwek ce caŋ koromun om mukuleymwani kot karik kupakäca, opur yuteyu oŋnkosom.’’
41014035	Kuwo neto kunata tay kisic, oŋnkuyim kukutuny oŋnkusom kule nto kemukoktos kukeytena sawet nyepo toŋoŋutek.
41014036	Kusom kumwoy kule, “Papa! Papanyu! Mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite nyi. Nemuneno ani toŋoŋutecu, puryo kot kuyu wulo omoktoy ani, ntene kwiyokis kuyu wule moktoy nyi.’’
41014037	Yoto kuweckey kuco okoy cokunyor konomik co kosomok kumite koruy. Kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Simon, keru nyi? Puryo kot muc kot kösu wany mpo sawet akenke?’’
41014038	Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Okösu sukuŋet mente kot osuci syemutok. Cöme mukuleyto, ntene puren porto.’’
41014039	Kuwo Yesu yec wokusom kumwoy ŋalek ce kerkey oko co kumwowu yo kusome om panta nyepo tay.
41014040	Ntowo kuweckey kuco, cokunyor cekto kumite koruy yec, omnye kikinäm rwonto nyewo konyekwa. Yoto kupotyi cek ŋolyontet nye mokuwec kumwoci Yesu.
41014041	Kuco Yesu yec aret nyepo somok oŋnkucokomwoci cek kule, “Tomite akwek oruytosi omunyi? Kayem! Kapunto sawet! Kacenäm yawut Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm piko ce ponto miyotyonik.
41014042	Oŋetye cipe! Akäs karik cito nye ŋomnto ani!’’
41014043	Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kupun Yuta akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny kupontonukey oko luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kiponto ponkok oko runkunek, kiyoku picoto tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik.
41014044	Kikimwoci ŋomntoyintet Yuta picoto pelutyet, kumwoci kule, “Cito nyo katoroc aŋatut ani kunye cito nyoto, anäm nyoto okwer oŋnkorip topon koromun.’’
41014045	Ntowo kupun Yuta kuwo okoy ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoy kusupay kule, “Konetintet.’’ Oŋnkutoroc kuŋatut.
41014046	Yoto kunäm cekto Yesu oŋnkurat.
41014047	Ntene kocut cito akenke nye kimite keyoŋe yoto rotwetap cok, oŋnkuyep kulot yititap mutworintetap tisintet nyewo.
41014048	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Kakwa kule kwocenama kuyu nye omöce kule cenäm corin? Omnye kakwante ponkok oko runkunek.
41014049	Nteyu kucepontekey oko akwek kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ om kotap Yiyintet onetisyi ani, ntene puryo kot onäma ani akwek yoto. Ntene misyini kwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita ŋalak co kicemwoy om silutekap Yiyintet.’’
41014050	Yoto kumwey konomik tokol kupakakta Yesu.
41014051	Yoto kurup oyiperyontet ake Yesu let, nye kikilac suket pate. Kusyem piko alak kule cenäm oyiperyontonoto
41014052	ntene kuciwit kumwey kupokokyi cek suket oŋnkulopotyikey puc pate nye puryo sira.
41014053	Kukwer cek Yesu okoy kupunto kaytap Tisintet nyewo, wule kimite kukokorurukyikey tisik cewoyec tokol oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek.
41014054	Yoto kurup Petero cekto letut kuloyityi kisic okoy kupunto saŋntap kaytap Tisintet nyewo. Kopur Petero ŋony kuyu mata wanak oko sikarek ce ripsi.
41014055	Kusyem tisik cewoyec oko piko cepo kokwet tokol kule ceceny piko muncururwanik ce komwoy lelisto nye nöme Yesu sukuŋet kupakäc kume, ntene kipuryo kot kunyor ŋolyo nyepo lelis.
41014056	Kumwoy piko muncururwanik ce caŋ ŋalek cepo mwiynan pate kule kikwiy Yesu. Ntene kutoytocin ŋalekwa nye puryo kot kunömekey.
41014057	Kuyoŋ alake oŋnkuwosontyi Yesu kumwoy ŋalek cepo mwiynan pate, kumwoy picoto kule,
41014058	“Kucelim acek nkit kumwowu cici kule, ‘Mosoturpup ani kotap Yiyintet nyi kitece piko yewuniyek, nto om letutap pesyosyek somok, atec ani ake nye puryo kot kutec piko yewuniyek!’ ’’
41014059	Kutoytocin mpo ŋalek ce kimwoy picoto nye puryo kot kunömekey.
41014060	Yoto kuŋet Tisintet nyewo kuyoŋe taytap kokwet, oŋkutepe Yesu kule, “Puryo kot ŋololi nyi wec ŋalekyu cewosontyiŋ nyi picu?’’
41014061	Ntene kusis Yesu nye mnawec ŋolyo. Kutepe yec Tisintet nyewo Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi Ŋapanet nye Weritap Yiyintet Nyetilil nye cikostoy?’’
41014062	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ani nyoto! Kunyo mosakäs akwek tokol Weritap cito kukokopure komostap yewut nyepo tay nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, oŋnkucontoykey polik cepo torot.’’
41014063	Yoto kupac Tisintet nyewo sirokyi, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Tocemocene acek yec piko muncururwanik alak!
41014064	Kalim akwek ŋalekyi nkit ce miyotec, omute akwek musankut kulene?’’ Yoto kumüt piko tokol musankut kulot Yesu kule misyini cepakäc kume.
41014065	Kucec piko alake kuŋutyi Yesu ŋulek, oŋnkuyen konyekyi, oŋnkutuluc, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋor ŋo nye kopiriŋ nyi!’’ Kunäm sikarek Yesu oŋnkusyec.
41014066	Nteye kitokumite Petero kukepur ŋony om saŋntap kayta, kuco cepto mutworintet akenke nyepo Tisintet nyewo.
41014067	Nteye kotoköse cepoto Petero kumite kuyuye mata, kurotot komil topon, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kepontekey mpenyi Yesu nyepo Nasaret?’’
41014068	Ntene kutuckey Petero kutoyis kumwoy kule, “Puryo monket, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnket ani ŋalek ce mwowu nyi.’’ Kumiŋnto Petero kuwo aret nyepo kayta saŋ. Yoto koncur kurkonkit.
41014069	Kukosyi yec cepkey Petero kumite wuloto, kumwoci cepoto piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kule, “Oŋyi cito akenke nye kopontokey picut.’’
41014070	Kutuckey yec Petero kutoyis. Nto om letut kuminiŋ, kumwoci piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto Petero kule, “Yiku nyi manta akenke om picut, omnye yiku citap Kalilaya.’’
41014071	Kutuckey Petero yec kuwälkey kucupkey kumwoy kule, “Kupara asis, monket ani cici oŋolole akwek!’’
41014072	Yoto pakenke koncur kurkonkit nyepo oyeny. Yoto kusot Petero ŋalek co komwocini Yesu neto kule, “Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret oyeny mesetuckey toyisye aret somok kule monketo ani.’’ Yoto kucec Petero kurir.
41015001	Ntowo kuyec koret pate, koruruckey lakwar pakenke tisik cewoyec oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek oko piko tokol cepo kokwet nyewo oŋnkurwoc. Ntokopok kurat cekto Yesu oŋnkukwer okoy wule mite Pilato.
41015002	Kutepe Pilato Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kemwowu nyi.’’
