41015003	Yoto kuwosontyi tisik cewoyec Yesu kumwoy ŋalek ce caŋ.
41015004	Kutepe yec Pilato Yesu kule, “Puryo kot wece nyi ŋolyo? Kaspa ŋalek ce caŋ ce cewosontyiŋ !’’
41015005	Yoto kutay Yesu yec mawec ŋolyo okoy kukite Pilato koromun.
41015006	Kityoktoy Pilato mopusyontet akenke nye kosom piko om pesyosyek cepo sakwetap keytayet.
41015007	Kimite pesyosyecoto citake nye cekure Parapa nye ki akenke om piko alak ce kirototin om mopusi ce kiporis oko pararet nye kikwiy.
41015008	Yoto kukwa piko tokol kwokusom Pilato kwici cek kuyu wulo yiytoy kwak ye pesyetap sakwet.
41015009	Kutepe Pilato cekto kule, “Omöce akwek kule otyokwok ani Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’
41015010	Kinket Pilato topon kule kowosontyi tisik cewoyec Yesu om corokyinot pate.
41015011	Ntene kowurur tisik cewoyec piko kumwoci kule kusom Pilato kutyokyi cekto Parapa.
41015012	Kuŋololyi Pilato piko kutepe yec kule, “Kunyo omöce akwek kule ayiye ne ani cici okure akwek Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’
41015013	Kupol piko kumwoci Pilato kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
41015014	Kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Omne, kukwiy lelis ne nye miyat?’’ Kutosyikey piko kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
41015015	Omnye kimöce Pilato kule aŋerec piko, yoto kutyokyi cekto Parapa, oŋnkukoyito Yesu wokupas sikarek, oŋnkyekwer wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
41015016	Yoto kukwer sikarek Yesu kuwo kaytap Poytoyintet, ye cekure Pretoriyom, oŋnkukur koruruc sikarek tokol kukwa koyoto.
41015017	Kulokyi cekto Yesu siret nye mur kwarar, oŋnkuta kutwet nyepo kotok oŋnkukoci metinyi,
41015018	oŋnkucec kusupay kumwoci kule, “Cisupoyiŋ kinko nyepo Yutayek! Ilaŋnte!’’
41015019	Kupire cekto Yesu korokto metit, oŋnkuŋutyi oŋnkukutuŋnkyi kuyu nye keywey.
41015020	Nteyu kowo koncurur cekto Yesu okoy kuwany, konomune siretkey mur kwarar; oŋnkulokyi sirokyi nkit, oŋnkukwer kuwo wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
41015021	Nteye kimite kupeti om aran, cetuye citake nye cekure Simon nye kicone koret saŋ kuconi moŋet, kunäm cekto neto kukerci koŋ kukonopat murtowontetap Yesu. Cicitenyi ku Simon nyepo koretap Kurene nye kikwanitap Alekisanta oko Rupo.
41015022	Yoto cekwer Yesu okoy kupunto ye cekure Kolokosa nye mwowu kule “Rokyetap Metit.’’
41015023	Kusyem cek kule cikoci Yesu kuye nfinonyik ce kacetase sakityek alak ce mwonec ce cekure mira, ntene kutay Yesu kuye.
41015024	Yoto kuwuyitoci cek Yesu murtowontet, oŋnkupcicin sirokyi kuporci kirotyet sukuŋet kukäs kule mosukupoyit ŋo siret oŋnkono.
41015025	Kimite yoto sawet somok nyepo kororn ye kiwuyitocini cekto Yesu murtowontet.
41015026	Cecil ŋalek cepo musankunyi kule, “Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’’
41015027	Cewuyitoci murtowonik mpo piko corik alak oyeny oko Yesu, kopurune ake yewunyi nyepo tay, koporune ake yewunyi nyepo let.
41015028	[Yoto kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, “Kicituyo neto oko piko ce yirye ntarastinek.’’]
41015029	Kulelec metewokwa piko ce kipeti kutile aran, oŋnkucup cekto Yesu kumwoy kule, “Ye! Nyi nyo mwowu kule omuci oturpup kotap Yiyintet aŋnkatec ake om pesyosyek somok.
41015030	Kunyo rekune pa nyi yawut murtowontet co ŋony sopkey nkit.’’
41015031	Kuŋalal kwicek nkit mpo tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek koncurur kucup Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kwesope neto piko alak, ntene puryo kot komuce kot kusopkey nkit!
41015032	Ce möce acek yawut cekäs Ŋapanet Kinko nyepo Israel kurekune Murtowontet kuco ŋony, sukuŋet ciyen acek neto.’’ Mpo piko oyeny ce kicewuyitoy oko Yesu kucupis mpecek kucup Yesu.
41015033	Ntowo kupunto asista pet kwen, kunäm menonet koret tokol okoy kupunto asista sokol nyepo kosoleny.
41015034	Ntowo kupunto asista sokol kupol Yesu om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Eloy, Eloy, lema sapaksani?’’ Nye mwowu ŋaleca kule, “Yiyintenyu, Yiyintenyu, omne seyasta ani nyi?’’
41015035	Nteye kotolime piko alake ce kimite keyoŋ yoto, kumwoy kule, “Alim pa, mite kukure Eriya!’’
41015036	Yoto kulapat citake nye kiponto siponcit nye kerkey cankut nye kakolumnta nfinyonik ce mintililec; oŋnkurutyi tekantet oŋnkunömnci kutitap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Akany pa cekäs oŋnkuconi Eriya cokurek neto kucone murtowontet kuco ŋony!’’
41015037	Kunco Yesu om kutit nyewo oŋnkume.
41015038	Yoto kukerer kupciwunekey oyeny kuceke met okoy kel siret nyo cepciye otepto nye tilil om kotap Yiyintet.
41015039	Ntowo kukäs nyewo nyepo sikarek nye kimite keyoŋe taytap murtowontet wule kencoyto Yesu oŋnkume, kumwoy kule, “Weritap Yiyintet cici manta!’’
41015040	Kimite yoto koruk alake ce kimite kuköse ce kimite ye low kuminiŋ. Om cekto korucoto, kimite mpo Solome oko Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam kametitap Yakopo nye miniŋ oko Yose.
41015041	Korucoto kuce kipontokey Yesu ye kimite Kalilaya ce kikwici neto yisyet. Kimite yoto mpo koruk alake ce caŋ ce kikwontoykey Yesu okoy kupun Yerusalem.
41015042	Nteye kimite kwimene koret, yoto kuco Yosep nyepo moŋetap Arimaseya,
41015043	Cito nye kisikenet nye kiciyweye nye kipo kokwetap Yutayek. Ki cito neto nye kimite kukene pesyet nye cone poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Pesyonoto kunye kipesyet nye kiceyiytoykey sukuŋet ye koyekune kwek pesyetap Sapat. Yoto kuwo Yosep nye kipuryo kot kumuy okoy taytap Pilato oŋnkusom portap Yesu.
41015044	Kukite Pilato kulim kule kame Yesu. Yoto kukur neto nyewo nyepo sikarek oŋnkutepe kule kame Yesu kuloyit.
41015045	Ntowo kulim ŋalekap nyewo nyepo sikarek, kucomnci Pilato Yosep wokusut porto.
41015046	Kwal Yosep suket nyelel, oŋnkurek musto, oŋnkurate suket oŋnkumuci mwenet nye mite kepenet nye kicepal rwantet. Ntowo kupok, kutor rwantet nyewo kukere kurket nyepo mwenetap kepenet.
41015047	Kimite yoto Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam kametitap Yose. Yoto kukäs cekto topon ye kocemuci Yesu.
41016001	Ntowo kupok Sapat, yoto kwal Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam kametitap Yakopo oko Solome mwaninek ce poŋu topon sukuŋet kusut wokoyile mustap Yesu.
41016002	Nteye kipesyetap Santey kukayec koret komwok asista, kupa cek okoy ye kimite mwenet.
41016003	Nteye kimite kupeti om aran kuŋalalat kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nye sukuwunuktowec rwantet nyo mite kurketap mwenet?’’
41016004	Yoto ntopere cekäs kacewunukto rwantet kucone kurket nyepo mwenet.
41016005	Ntowo kupa cekto mwenet orit, yoto kukäs oyiperyo nye kelac siret nyelel nye koy nye kepur yepo yewutap tay. Kukite koromun.
41016006	Kumwoci cicoto korucoto kule, “Monte cikite, ocenye akwek so Yesu nyepo Nasaret nyo kucewuyitocini murtowontet? Puryo kot kumite yu; Kokotutune met! Akäs pa yeto ye kucemuci.
41016007	Kunyo ape yawut womwoci ŋalecu konomik wanak oko Petero, kule mite neto kuntowok akwek kuweti Kalilaya, wuloto wule mowokäse kuyu wulo kikimwowok akwek.’’
41016008	Kumiŋ cekto kukwa saŋ oŋnkurway kupete yepo mwenet, omnye kinäm muyotet oŋnkokite koromun. Ntene kipuryo kot kumwoci cekto citake tokol ŋolyo, omnye kinyokoritu.
41016009	[Nteyu kowo kotutune met Yesu kororn ye kipesyetap Santey, kunyosyo kuporcikey Mariyam nyepo Maktala nyo kikwetyini Yesu neto oyik tisap.
41016010	Kuwo Mariyam wokumwoci piko co kipontotikey oko neto ce kimite kurirtos kumesyi.
41016011	Ntowo kulim cut kumwowu Mariyam kule sope Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule käkäs neto nkit, kutay cut macäm kule po manta ŋalekyi.
41016012	Yoto om letut kuporcikey Yesu kuponto tonto ake konomik alak oyeny. Kimite konomik coto kupeti panwa nye kipeti koret saŋ.
41016013	Yoto kuweckey konomik coto kupa wokumwoci konomik cut ŋalecato, ntene kutoyis cut macäm ŋalekwa.
41016014	Nto om panta nyepo letut; kuporcikey Yesu konomik taman ok akenke ye kimite kukepur kwomisyi. Kuŋololyi Yesu cekto kupolyi omnye kitoyis meyen kuwuyekitu mukuleywekwa oko omnye kinyekeritu mecäm ŋalek cepo piko co kikäs Yesu kukotutune met.
41016015	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Ape koret tokol kumukul, womwoci piko tokol lokoywek ce toponec.
41016016	Mosukusop ci ake tokol nye keyen kucäm lokoywek ce toponec oŋnkyepatisan, nto ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kucömis, mosicemutyi nyo musankut.
41016017	Mosicikoci piko tokol ce kocömis kuyen pelutocu: Mosukukwet oyik cekwol yitik om kaynemwani, mosukuŋalal ŋelyepik alak.
41016018	Nka mpo ye kanäm Erenoy, nto ye kaye mwonet, kupuryo kot kupoköce. Mosukukemer cek yewuniyekwa piko ce mnyontos kusopco picoto.’’
41016019	Nto om letut yu kowo kuŋalal Mokoryontet Yesu oko cekto, cesut neto kuwo torot wokopure Yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
41016020	Yoto Kunomen konomik kupa wokumwaytat lokoywek om koret tokol. Kwiyis Mokoryontet om wule mite cek, kupor kule po manta lokoywek ce mwoytoy. Omnye kikoci neto cekto kamukeywek kwiy pelutok ce poru kamukeywek.]
42001001	Mokoryontet nye cekonyite Teyopilo, Kuyu wulo kusyem piko ce caŋ kusil ŋalek ce kikwiyokis om kwenunyacek.
42001002	Kisil cekto ŋalek co kimwowec acek piko muncururwanik kosik co kiköse ŋalecutecu kuceke ye kicece, oŋnkumwaytat lokoywecutecu.
42001003	Kunyo Mokoryontet nye cekonyite, omnye kwokir ani topon oŋnkasuman topon wule kicekta ŋalecutecu, asot mpo ani kule misyini asat topon oŋnkosiluŋ nyi.
42001004	Sukuŋet nket mpenyi kule po manta ŋalek tokol co kicinetiŋ.
42001005	Om kenyisyek ce kipoytoy Kinko Erote koretap Yuteya, kimite tisintet nye kicekure Sakariya nye kipo neto luketap Apiya. Kicekure kaynetap korkenyi Elisapet nye kipo aretap mpo Aron.
42001006	Ki pic cek tukway ce kikwiye ŋalek ce toponec om taytap Yiyintet oŋnkurupe kuyweye ntarastinek oko ŋalek tokol ce möce Mokoryontet; nye kipuryo kot kowurtoy mpo kisic.
42001007	Ntene kipuryo kot kuponto lekoy omnye kison Elisapet oŋnkukikiyosekitu tukway.
42001008	Om pesyet ake ye kimite Sakariya kwiyisyi yisyenyi nyepo tisyontit kuyu kwak om taytap Yiyintet, omnye kinyenyi pesyet kwiyis,
42001009	kuyu wule yunto yisyonutekap tisik, kikicekwey neto om kirotyet kupel korosek ce poŋu om otepto Nyetilil. Yoto kuwo neto kotap Mokoryontet.
42001010	Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ kusome om saŋ om sawet nyo cepele korosek ce poŋu.
42001011	Kuporcikey malayketap Mokoryontet Sakariya. Kimite malayket kukeyoŋe yewutap tay om otepto nye nyo cepele korosek ce poŋu.
42001012	Nteye kotoköse Sakariya malayket, kulipil oŋnkumuy koromun.
42001013	Ntene kumwoci malayket neto kule, “Sakariya! Mente omuy. Omnye kucelim somseŋuŋ, kunyo mosukuyiwuŋ nyi korkeŋuŋ Elisapet werit, oŋnkirut cekure kaynenyi Yowana;
42001014	meseŋerec nyi koromun, oŋnkuŋerec mpo piko alake om pesyonoto koceye neto.
42001015	Omnye mosukwek ci nyewo koromun om taytap Mokoryontet. Puryo kot kuroke kuye finyonik nto tukun alak tokol ce cepokite. Mosicikoci neto kunyor swametap Muyet Nyetilil kuceke pesyonoto koceye.
42001016	Mosukuwec pikap Israel ce caŋ kuwekyikey wule mite Mokoryontet Yiyintemwa.
42001017	Mosukuwesetot kwek kiyokintetap Mokoryontet kuponto nyikanatet oko swamet kuyu workoyontet Eriya. Mosukuwec poyik oŋnkotuyo kuyomokey wanak oko lekokwa, oŋnkuwec ŋomnonetap piko co kitoyis kumosokis kurup aret nye sote ŋalek ce toponec, oŋnkusat kopur topon kukenisyi pikap Mokoryontet.’’
42001018	Kumwoci Sakariya malayket kule, “Mosonkete ne kule po manta ŋalecutecu? Omnye oyiku ci nye kyayositu; nto mpo korkemwani kiyosit mpene kutil kenyisyek!’’
42001019	Kuwekyi malayket kumwoci neto kule, “Oyiku ani Kapuryel nye oyoŋe taytap Yiyintet; kunyo kociyokwani coŋololuŋ osutuŋ nyi ŋalecutecu toponec.
42001020	Ntene omnye ketay meyen ŋalekwani ce mosukupoyit manta om pesyet nye kicekwey, kunyo mesesis nye puryo kot ŋololi okoy kupunto pesyet nye yiyoktos ŋalecu komwowuŋ ani nyi.’’
42001021	Kimite piko yoto kukonye Sakariya ntene kukite kumwoy kule, “Omne sukulilennkey nye tenyi om koto orit?’’
42001022	Nteyu kowo kumiŋ saŋ, kipuryo kot komuc yoto Sakariya kot kuŋololyi piko ŋolyo, ntene kuŋololyi cek kwiyisye yewuniyek pate omnye kanamakay kutit. Yoto kusowu piko kunket kule kakäs neto ŋoŋutyet om kotap Yiyintet.
42001023	Ntowo kupok pesyosyekyi cepo yisyet om kotap Yiyintet, kuwecikey Sakariya kanyi.
42001024	Yoto om pesyos ce ŋeri, kukoyakay Elisapet oŋnkuwunyenkey koto orit kuwany orok mut kumwoy kule,
42001025	“Kunyo om yawut letut kakukalya ani Mokoryontet kuyunyi, omnye kokunumuneno nyilatet nyo kunyilo piko!’’
42001026	Om arawetap lö kuceke kakoyakay Elisapet, kuyokto Yiyintet malayket Kapuryel kuwo moŋet nye cekure Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya,
42001027	wule kimite cepto ake nye kimukul nye kitompo kot kunket moron nye kimöce komüt citake nye cekure Yosep nye kipo aretap mpo Tauti. Cekure kaynetap cepoto Mariyam.
42001028	Yoto kucontyi malayket Mariyam oŋnkumwoci kule, “Takwenyo! Ponte nyi kupeyok koromun; pontekey nyi Mokoryontet.’’
42001029	Nteye kotolime mariyam ŋalekap malayket, kulipil oŋnkumuy, oŋnkusot kumwoy kule, “Mwowu ne katakwesani.’’
42001030	Kumwoci malayket neto kule, “Mariyam, mente omuy, omnye kwenyoru nyi kupeyok om wule mite Yiyintet.
42001031	Mesesic lekwet oŋnkiyi werit oŋnkirut cekure kaynet Yesu.
42001032	Mosukwek nyewo koromun, oŋnkyekure Weritap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun. Mosukukoci Mokoryontet Yiyintet neto kopure ŋeceretap kukonyi Tauti.
42001033	Mosukwek Kinko nye mosukupayta aretap Yakopo okokoy, nto poytoyisyenyi kunye puryo kot kuponto ye ŋete!’’
42001034	Yoto kumwoci Mariyam malayket kule, “Muce kwiyakay ŋolyontoni kulene? Omnye oyiku mukul nye puryo kot öŋnket moron.’’
42001035	Kuwekyi malayket kumwoci neto kule, “Mosukucontyiŋ nyi swametap Muyet Nyetilil, oŋnkuyeneniŋ atotoytap swametap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun. Kunyo mosiceyi lekwet nye mosicekure Nyetilil Weritap Yiyintet.
42001036	Käs pa Elisapet cekwomet nye kicekure kule kisonen oŋnkukiyosit, kunyo ponto yawut orok lö kukoyat lekwa nye wero.
42001037	Omnye puryo kiy ake tokol nye purune Yiyintet nye memuce kot kwiy.’’
42001038	Kumwoy Mariyam kule, “Oyiku ani mutworintetap Mokoryontet, kunyo kany kwiyokis ŋalek co kemwowu om wule omite kuyu wule kemwayte nyi.’’ Yoto kunomen malayket kuwecikey.
42001039	Om pesyosyecoto, kuyiytakey Mariyam oŋnkunomen kusartakey om ŋerekwek kuwo moŋet nye mite lakomosyekap koretap Yuta.
42001040	Yoto kuwo okoy wokumiŋnto kotap Sakariya oŋnkutakwes Elisapet.
42001041	Nteye kotolime Elisapet katakwesetap Mariyam, kuwecweckey lekwet om moyenyi, yoto kunyor Elisapet swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
42001042	Kuŋalal kupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ponte nyi kupeyoy om wule mite koruk! Oŋnkuponto kupeyoy mpo lekwet nye mite moyeŋuŋ nyo meyiy nyi!
42001043	Omne sukwiyakay kiy nye yunyi om wule omite ani, akäs kule muce kuco wule omite kametitap Mokoryontenyu?
42001044	Omnye yu kowo alim ani katakweseŋuŋ, kuwecweckey lekwet om moyemwani om ŋerekwek.
42001045	Ponte nyi kupeyoy yen oŋnkiyen ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet kule mosukupoyit manta om wule mite nyi!’’
42001046	Kumwoy Mariyam kule, “Kostoy mukuleymwani Mokoryontet,
42001047	oŋnkuŋerekat soponmwani om wule mite Yiyintet kosopintenyu.
42001048	omnye kukusot topon wule ayunte ani mutworintenyi nye miniŋ! Kuceke yawut pesyoni. Okokoy mosukukureno ani piko cepo pinutek tokol nye ponto kupeyoy.
42001049	Omnye kokwiwo ani Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol tukuk cewoyec. Kunyo Tilil kaynenyi.
42001050	Porcini tolosyet pikyi tokol co yweye neto, kuceke piko cepo pinta ake okokoy cepo pinta ake.
42001051	Kokuyito yewunyi nye ponto swamet; Oŋnkuseret piko co silekey om kasoteywekwa.
42001052	Kokonumune poytoyik cewoyec ŋecerokwa; oŋnkutoror piko co cenyile kupa torot.
42001053	Kapaye piko ce ponto rupet tukuk ce toponec, oŋnkukwet mokorenik kupeta yewuniyek pate.
42001054	Kirip kirotyet nyo kikurtoci neto mpo kukonyo, kunyo kaco cokukalya mutworintenyi Israel;
42001055	Oŋnkusot kule oporci tolosyet mutworintenyi Apram oko wule mite mucokoronikyi tokol okokoy!’’
42001056	Kopur Mariyam oko Elisapet kuwany kurikta orok somok, ntowecekey kuwo konyi.
42001057	Yoto kuponto pesyosyekap Elisapet ce cömekey lekwet, kucämnkey werit.
42001058	Kulim latosyekyi oko tilyonutekyi kule kakukalya kukoci Mokoryontet Elisapet kupeyok, yoto kuŋerec cekto tokol wanak oko neto.
42001059	Ntowo kupunto pesyetap sisit cewon lekwet, kumac piko kule cerut kaynet cekure Sakariya kaynetap kwan.
42001060	Ntene kumwoy kamet kule, “Puryo kot kuyunyo! Mocekure kaynenyi Yowana.’’
42001061	Kumwoci piko Elisapet kule, “Puryo ci mpo akenke nyepo aremwoŋ nye cekure kaynanato.’’
42001062	Yoto kuŋololyi piko kwanitap lekwet kwiyisye yewuniyek kutepe kaynetap lekwet.
42001063	Kusom kwan rwantet nye cesile oŋnkusil kule, “Kaynenyi Yowana.’’
42001064	Om yoto pakenke kuyatakay kutitap Sakariya, oŋnkucec kuŋalal topon kukasta Yiyintet,
42001065	Kumuyo latosyek koromun, yoto kuseret ceŋalalate lokoywek ce nöme ŋalecutecu tokol okoy kupunte lakomosyekap Yuta tokol.
42001066	Nto piko tokol ce kilim ŋalecutecu, kuripe montuwokwa oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Mosukwek ne lekwani?’’ Omnye porukey kupoyit manta kule ponto lekwani swametap Mokoryontet.
42001067	Yoto kunyor kwan Sakariya swametap Muyet Nyetilil, kuŋalal kuŋorsyo kumwoy kule:
42001068	“Akany cikaste Mokoryontet nye Yiyintetap Israel! Omnye kaco korutoci cokukalya kutyac pikyi.
42001069	Kakutororwec acek kosopintet nyepo swama, Nyoto ku nyepo aretap mutworintenyi Tauti.
42001070	Kuyu wulo kikurtoci keny kupunune wule mite workoyikyi ce tililec,
42001071	kikurtoci kule mososorwec acek om wule mite punikyo oko wule swametap yewuniyekap piko tokol co senkerec acek.
42001072	Kimwoy kule mosoporci poypoyet mpo kukonyo, aŋnkusot kirotyenyi nye tilil.
42001073	Kirotyet nye kiwolcikey kukonyo Apram,
42001074	kuwalkey kule mososorwec acek om wule mite swametap yewuniyekap punikyo, oŋnkukonec acek ceyici Neto yisyet nye puryo kot ceponte muyot,
42001075	om tililinto oko toponiyet om pesyosyek tokol cepo soponwekyacek.
42001076	Ntenyi lekwenyu, mosicekureniŋ workoyontetap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun; omnye mesentoci nyi Mokoryontet yiyitoci neto arenyi.
42001077	Meseporci mwoci pikyi kunket kule mocisop cikalya cekto miyotyonikwa.
42001078	Omnye kokolyoyin oŋnkutala Yiyintenyo. Mosukukon kuyec kolucec acek lakweyet nyepo soponto,
42001079	nye luwu kucone torot cokoluwuci piko tokol ce mite menonetap met, oŋnkuketwec acek cerup aret nyepo kalyet.’’
42001080	Yoto kuner lekwet Yowana kunyor swamet om porto oko ŋomnonet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil, kuminy koretap kitela okoy kupunto pesyet nyo porcinekey neto pikap Israel.
42002001	Yoto om pesyosyecoto kucone ntarastit wule mite Kinko Akusto kule, cemöce ciyitis cesil kaynokap piko tokol cepo korenyi.
42002002	Koyitisyet nyoto kunye kinyosyo ciyitis cesil kaynokap piko ye kipoytoy Kureniyo koretap Siriya.
42002003	Yoto kuwo ci tokol wokusilyokey om moŋenyi.
42002004	Kunomene Yosep moŋetap Nasaret om Koretap Kalilaya kuwo kulaŋnta Yuteya okoy wokupunto moŋetap Tauti nye cekure Peselekem, omnye kipo Yosep aretap mpo Tauti.
42002005	Kuwo Yosep wokusilyokey oko Mariyam nye kimöce neto kule amüt, kikoyat Mariyam yoto.
42002006	Nteye kimite cekto wuloto, kupunto pesyosyek ce cömekey Mariyam.
42002007	Yoto kucämnkey Mariyam werit poretyet, kunäm oŋnkulokyi sirok oŋnkömukontyi rapet nye omisye toka, omnye kipuryo kot kumite poroyinto koto nye mokuruy cekto om kotap toyek.
42002008	Kimite mesewek alake koronoto ce kikwokisyi komoy kuripe kecirekwa.
42002009	Kuco malayketap Mokoryontet ye kimite cekto; oŋnkukoci kukweny cekto komut woyintap lakweyetap Mokoryontet, yoto kumuyo koromun.
42002010	Ntene komwoci malayket cek kule, “Monte cemuye! Omnye osutwok ani lokoywek ce toponec cepo ŋerekwek ce mosukupoyit piko tokol.
42002011	Omnye kaceyiwok akwek yawut pesyoni Mokoryontet om moŋetap Tauti nye Kosopintet Kristo Yesu!
42002012	Kito nyi nye mosokäse akwek, mosonyoru lekwa nye rweru nye kocilokyi sirok; oŋnkyimukontyi rapet nye omisye toka.’’
42002013	Om yoto pakenke mosolim akwek luket nyewo nyepo malaykanik om torot kukostoy Yiyintet kumwowu kule,
42002014	“Kupoyit woyinto Yiyintet nye mite torot, oŋnkupoyit kalyet koret oko piko ce ŋerekyini cekto Yiyintet!’’
42002015	Nteyu kowo kunomen Malaykanik kupakakta cek kupecikey torot, kuŋalal Mesewek kumwocin nkit kule, “Akany cipe okoy cepunte Peselekem, wocekäs kiyitenyi kakwiyakay nyi kokuporwec Mokoryontet.’’
42002016	Yoto kunomen mesewek kusartakey lakwar okoy wokunyor Mariyam oko Yosep oko lekwet nye kocimukontyi rapet nye omisye toka.
42002017	Nteye kotoköse mesewek lekwet, kumwoci kutorci piko ŋalek tokol co kukumwoy Malayket ce nöme lekwanato.
42002018	Kukite piko tokol ŋalek ce kumwoci mesewek.
42002019	Ntene kusot Mariyam ŋalecato oŋnkuripe moyenyi.
42002020	Yoto kuweckey mesewek kupecikey kutumoti kukostoy Yiyintet om ŋalek tokol ce kilim oŋnkukäs cekto, omnye kiyu tukuk ce kikäs wule kikimwoytoci malayket.
42002021	Yoto ntowo kupunto pesyetap sisit, nye cewone lekwet cikoci cekure kaynet Yesu, kaynet nyo kikonu kumwoy malayket kutompo kot cesic neto.
42002022	Ntowo kupunto pesyosyekap Yosep oko Mariyam kwiy ntasimnyet nyo kimwowu Moses, oŋnkwiyita sakwet nye kiceŋetune asis korketap tomono, yoto kusut cek lekwet kuwo Yerusalem wocikoci Mokoryontet.
42002023	Kuyu wulo kicesilyo om ntarastinekap Mokoryontet kule, “Lekwa tokol nye poret oŋnkuwero nye kanyosyo kuyat moyetap kamet, misyini cikoci neto nyoto Mokoryontet.’’
42002024	Yoto kupa Yosep oko Mariyam wokukoyito mpo korosekwa kuyu wule cemoktoy om ntarastinekap Mokoryontet kule, “Cikoytoy swororok oyeny nto lekokap swororok oyeny.’’
42002025	Kimite citake nye kiminye Yerusalem nye kicekure kaynenyi Simiyon nye ki cito nye topon koromun nye kiyweye Yiyintet. Kimite neto kukonye pesyet nye cisope pikap Israel, oŋnkiponto Muyet Nyetilil.
42002026	Kikikoporci Muyet Nyetilil neto kule puryo kot kume kutompo kot kukäs Ŋapanet Mokoryontet nyo kicekurto.
42002027	Yoto kuntoci Muyet Nyetilil Simiyon kuco okoy kupun kotap Yiyintet orit, nteyu kowo kusut kwan oko kamet lekwet Yesu kuco kotap Yiyintet; sukuŋet ceyici ntasimnyet kuyu wulo moktoy ntarastinek.
42002028	Kunäm Simiyon lekwet kunäme yewuniyekyi oŋnkukasta Yiyintet kumwoy kule:
42002029	“Mokoryontet, yaste yawut mutworinteŋuŋ, kuwecikey om kalya, kuyu wulo kikurte nyi om ŋolyonteŋuŋ.
42002030	Omnye kakäs konyekwani nkit kosopoteŋuŋ,
42002031	kuyu wulo kiyiytoci taytap piko tokol,
42002032	oŋnkwek lakweyet nye kweŋnkyini lamek areŋuŋ, oŋnkwek woyinto nyepo pikuk pikap Israel.’’
42002033	Kukite kwan oko kamet ŋalek ce komwoy Simiyon ce nömekey oko lekwanato.
42002034	Yoto kusomnci Simiyon cekto kupeyok, oŋnkumwoci Mariyam kamet kule, “Kikwey Yiyintet lekwani kwek nyemo kwaranta, oŋnkusop piko ce caŋ om Israel, oŋnkwek neto pelutyet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet nye toye piko ce caŋ,
42002035	sukuŋet kuŋoŋ kuparta kasoteywekwa ce wuŋotin. Nto om wule mite nyi, mosukurut mukuleyŋuŋ rotwet nye ŋatip.’’
42002036	Kimite mpo korko nye workoyo nye cekure kaynenyi Anna, ceptap Panuel nyepo aretap mpo Aser nye kicimüt ye kikokoniyo kuwany kenyisyek tisap kume santenyi.
42002037	Yoto kopur nkit kumusuk okoy kwek cepyosya nye kiyosit koromun kuwany kenyisyek tomonwokik sisit ok amwan nye kipuryo kot kuŋete kupakakta kotap Yiyintet. Ntene kikwiyisyi yisyetap Yiyintet komoy oko pet; kikostoy oŋnkusome oŋnkukire omik.
42002038	Om yoto pakenke kuco tay oŋnkucec kukasta Yiyintet kuŋalal ŋalek ce nömekey oko lekwanato kumwoci piko tokol ce kikonye pesyet nye mokusope Yiyintet Yerusalem.
42002039	Nteyu kowo kuwany cekto kwiy tukuk tokol ce mwowu ntarastinekap Mokoryontet, kuweckey cek kupa moŋemwa Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya.
42002040	Kuner lekwet Yesu kunyor swamet oko ŋomnonet oŋnkukoci Yiyintet neto kupeyok.
42002041	Kipeti kwan oko kamet om kenyit ake tokol Yerusalem ye pesyetap sakwetap Keytayet.
42002042	Nteye kiponto Yesu kenyisyek taman ok oyeny, kupa cek tokol oko kamwa sakwet Yerusalem kuyu wule yunto sakwanato.
42002043	Nteyu kowo kupok pesyosyekap sakwet, kunomen cekto kupa ka, ntene kuŋetune werit Yesu Yerusalem nye kipuryo kot kunkete kwan oko kamet.
42002044	Kisote cekto kule tos mite Yesu luketap piko alak om panta. Kupa cekto pesyonoto kwimen; ntowo kwimen koret kucec cekto kucenye wule mite tilyonutekwa oko wule mite coronutekwa.
42002045	Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor. Yoto kuweckey kwan oko kamet kupa Yerusalem wokuceŋat Yesu.
42002046	Nteye kipesyetap somok kunyor cek Yesu kumite kotap Yiyintet, kukepur kwenutap konetikap Yutayek kulimntoy ŋalek cemwowu konetik, oŋnkutepe Yesu cekto teputek.
42002047	Kukite piko tokol ce kilime ŋomnonenyi oko wule kiwektoy ŋalek.
42002048	Nteye kotoköse kwan oko kamet Yesu kukite koromun, kumwoci kamet neto kule, “Yeyonyu! Omne seyiyec acek nyi kuyu nyi? Kucisot cemuye acek oko kon, oŋnkyecenyiŋ koromun.’’
42002049	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Omne sacenya ani akwek? Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule misyino ani opur kotap Papamwani?’’
42002050	Ntene kipuryo, kot kusik kunket kwan oko kamet kule komwoy Yesu ŋolyo ne.
42002051	Yoto kunomen neto oko kamwa kuketitakey okoy kupunto Nasaret, oŋnkuwo wokuywey kamwa. Kunäme kamet ŋalecato moyenyi.
42002052	Kutosyikey Yesu kuner oŋnkuŋomit, oŋnkunyor cömisyet om wule mite Yiyintet oko wule mite piko.
42003001	Nto om kenyitap taman ok mut ye kipoytoyisyi Kinko Nyewo Taperiyo, kupoytoy Pontio Pilato koretap Yuteya, kupoytoy Erote koretap Kalilaya, kupoytoy mutakwam Filipo koretap Itureya oko koretap Tirakoniti, kupoytoy Lusaniya koretap Apilene.
42003002	Nto tisik cewoyec ku Anas oko Kayafa. Om pesyosyecoto kucontyi ŋolyontetap Yiyintet Yowana weritap Sakariya kumite kitela.
42003003	Yoto kuwesetote Yowana koret tokol nye lekite tapantap oyinetap Yortan, kumwoytoti kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok, oŋnkyepatisanak, sukuŋet kukalyak Yiyintet miyotyonikwok.’’
42003004	Kuyu wulo kisilyo workoyontet Isaya om kitapunyi kule: “Kapole citake kitela, ‘Oyiytoci Mokoryontet arenyi, asat kurotakay arenyi nye mosukupunte!
42003005	Misyini alakan wulyo tokol wule mite roroŋisyek; oŋnkyicat lakomosyek oko tulonok tokol. Cecul kuculokis orustunwek tokol co musotin.
42003006	Mosukukäs pikap koret tokol kosopotetap Yiyintet.’ ’’
42003007	Yoto kukwa piko ce caŋ wule mite Yowana kule kupatisanec, kumwoci neto cek kule, “Akwek erenocu! Ŋo nye kwesowok kule omweye nyerunotetap Yiyintet nye karik kuco?
42003008	Kunyo ayiy tukuk ce sukupor kule kwarenynkey akwek ayaste miyotyonikwok, ntene monte cecec ceŋalal omwowu kule, ‘Ceponte Apram nye kukonyo!’ Omnye komwowok ani kule, muce Yiyintet kunäm rwontocu oŋnkuwec kwici Apram lekok.
42003009	Kunyo kocenömnci oywet kulekite kirintonokap ketik; nto ket ake tokol nyo puryo kot kwiye omik ce toponec mosiceyep nyo kulul oŋnkyewirci mata orit.’’
42003010	Kutepe piko Yowana kule, “Kunyo mokyiy ne acek yawut?’’
42003011	Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Ci tokol nye ponto sirok oyeny, misyini kukoci cito nyo puryo kot kuponto, mpo cito nyo ponto omik misyini kupciyta kuyunyoto.’’
42003012	Yoto kukwa mpo piko alak co ruruce mosoret kwocepatisan, oŋnkutepe cek Yowana kule, “Konetintet mokyiy ne acek?’’
42003013	Kumwoci Yowana cekto kule, “Monte ciruruc mosoret kutil co kiciyoyec.’’
42003014	Kutepe sikarek alak neto kule, “Nto acek, mokyiy ne?’’ Kumwoci co kule, “Monte cinumune citake tokol pesan om swama, nto om aret nyepo mwiynan; roke kuyemak musyaremwoŋ.’’
42003015	Nteyu kimite piko tokol kukonye ŋalek ce mokwiyokis kutintentos om kasoteywekwa om ŋalekap Yowana, kule pesyet ake neto kunye Ŋapanet.
42003016	Yoto kumwoci Yowana piko tokol kule, “Opotisonenok ani peko, ntene coni om letumwani citake nyewo nye ponto swamet kupëlo ani, nye puryo kot kumisyino ani atyac porokap kweyonikyi. Neto nyoto nye mosukupatisanenak akwek Muyet Nyetilil oko mata.
42003017	Pontonu neto sweswet nye kanäme yewuniyekyi; nye mokusese nkanuk oŋnkururukyi nkanuk cokenikyi nto moriryek kupele co mata nye momise!’’
42003018	Wanak oko ŋalecutecu, kumwoy Yowana ŋalek alak ce caŋ kurorci piko lokoywek ce toponec.
42003019	Yoto kupolyi Yowana potisonintet poytoyintet Erote om ŋalek ce nömekey oko Erotiya korketap mutakwam nye kimüt Erote, oko om ŋalek alak ce caŋ cepo ŋokis ce kikwiy Erote.
42003020	Yoto kutosyi Erote miyotyet ake omnye kinäm Yowana oŋnkukerta mopusi.
42003021	Nteyu kowo cepatisan piko tokol, yoto cepatisan mpo Yesu. Nteye kimite Yesu kusome, kuyatakay wulin po torot,
42003022	kuco kurekyi neto Muyet Nyetilil nye kerkey porto kuyu swarar. Kucone kurset torot kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye yiku Werimwani camanet, nye oŋerekyiŋ ani nyi koromun.’’
42003023	Kucec Yesu kwiyis yisyenyi kuponto kenyisyek ce puntoy sosom; Cisote kule neto kunye weritap Yosep nye ki weritap Eri,
42003024	weritap Matati, weritap Lefi, weritap Merek, weritap Yanai, weritap Yosep,
42003025	weritap Matatiya, weritap Amos, weritap Naum, weritap Esil, weritap Nakay,
42003026	weritap Masati, weritap Matatiya, weritap Semeyin, weritap Yosek, weritap Yota,
42003027	weritap Yowanan, weritap Resa, weritap Serupapel, weritap Salatiyeta, weritap Neri,
42003028	weritap Meleci, weritap Atti, weritap Kosma, weritap Elmatam, weritap Eri,
42003029	weritap Yoswa, weritap Eriesa, weritap Yorim, weritap Mata, weritap Lefi,
42003030	weritap Simiyon, weritap Yuta, weritap Yosep, weritap Yonam, weritap Eliyakim,
42003031	weritap Meleya, weritap Menna, weritap Matasa, weritap Nasan, weritap Tauti,
42003032	weritap Yese, weritap Opet, weritap Poas, weritap Solomon, weritap Nasyon,
42003033	weritap Aminatap, weritap Atamin, weritap Arin, weritap Eseron, weritap Peres, weritap Yuta,
42003034	weritap Yakopo, weritap Isaka, weritap Apram, weritap Tera, weritap Nakor,
42003035	weritap Seruk, weritap Reyu, weritap Pelek, weritap Eper, weritap Syella,
42003036	weritap Kanan, weritap Arapasat, weritap Syem, weritap Nuwa, weritap Lamek,
42003037	weritap Misusera, weritap Enok, weritap Yaret, weritap Makalalel, weritap Kanan,
42003038	weritap Enos, weritap Sesi, weritap Atam, weritap Yiyintet.
42004001	Kuwecekey Yesu oyinetap Yortan kukonyor swametap Muyet Nyetilil, nye kisut neto okoy kupunto kitela.
42004002	Kuwany om wuloto pesyosyek artam, nteye kimite wuloto kusyem kulot Setani nyewo nyepo oyik neto. Kipuryo kiy nye kyome kuwany pesyosyecoto tokol, nteyu kowo kuwany kwam neto rupet.
42004003	Yoto kumwoci Setaninato neto kule, “Ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet, mwoci panyi rwontocu kuweckey kwek mukatya.’’
42004004	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Puryo kot kusope cito mukatya pate nkit!’ ’’
42004005	Yoto kusut Setaninato Yesu kuwo parak, oŋnkuporci lakwar poytoyisyonikap koret tokol kumukul,
42004006	oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mosokoniŋ ani nyi woyinto nyi oko kamukeywek payte tukucu tokol, omnye kicekono ani tokol kunyo omuci okoci ci nye kacäm ani;
42004007	Kunyo ye kekutumwo ani nyi mosukwek cekuk cutecu tokol.’’
42004008	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Misyini kutuŋnkyi say Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ oŋnkiyici neto yisyet nkit pate!’ ’’
42004009	Kusut yec oyinoto cekwol yitik Yesu okoy Yerusalem, oŋnkumwoci kuyoŋe kusurutap kotap Yiyintet ye koy koromun, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet, wirtekey panyi kuceke yu okoy wepir ŋony;
42004010	omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukumwoci Yiyintet malaykanikyi kukwa kwokutaciŋ nyi.’
42004011	Oko yec kule, ‘Mosukutaciŋ om yewuniyekwa mente kot kuryac kerenkokuk rwantet.’ ’’
42004012	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mente kot asyem alotu Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ’ ’’
42004013	Nteyu kowo kusyem kulot Setani nyewo nyepo oyik Yesu okoy kuwany; kwasta okoy pesyet ake.
42004014	Yoto kuweckey Yesu kuco Kalilaya kuponto swametap Muyet Nyetilil. Kupunte lokoywek ce nöme neto koronoto tokol.
42004015	Kunetisye Yesu korikapkokwonikwa om wuloto, kucämnta piko tokol ŋalekap Yesu.
42004016	Kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto Nasaret wule kinere, nto kuyu wule kiyunto kopur nyi, kuwo ye kipesyetap Sapat okoy kotapkok. Nteye kimite orit, kuŋet kuyo kule asuman silutekap Yiyintet.
42004017	Yoto cikoci kitaputap workoyontet Isaya, kuŋany kitaput okoy kunyor ye kicesil kule:
42004018	“Oponte ani Muyetap Mokoryontet, omnye kaŋape ani mwayita saŋet omwoci pononik lokoywek ce toponec. Kweyokwo ani saŋet omwoci piko co rototin pesyet nye cityoktoy cekto, oko ye mosukukäste piko co koryotin, oŋnkyityakta piko co kicinyalil kupecikey,
42004019	oŋnkomwowu oporu kenyit nye mosukusope Mokoryontet pikyi.’’
42004020	Yoto kuker Yesu kitaput oŋnkuketyi cito nye ripe, oŋnkupur ŋony; kuwec konyekwa piko tokol ce kimite kotapkok oŋnkukäs Yesu topon.
42004021	Yoto kuwec Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Pesyoni ye kakwitita kupoyit manta ŋalecu silotin cu kalim akwek om yitikwok.’’
42004022	Kucämnta oŋnkukite piko tokol ŋalekyi ce toponec ce toloyec ce kiŋalale kutinyi. Kumwoy picoto kule, “Puryo kot ku weritap Yosep nyitenyi?’’
42004023	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Oŋnket kule mosomwowo ani akwek tyonkoconi kule, ‘Cepsakityantet, sopkey nyi nkit!’ Oŋnkomwowu yec kule, ‘Yiy nyi yec om wuli po koreŋuŋ tukuk co kicelim acek kule kiyokis om Kapernaum.’
42004024	Kumwoy Yesu kule, komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ‘Puryo workoyo nye cecöme om korenyi.
42004025	Cinket kule po manta ŋalek kule kimite musukik ce caŋ om Israel om pesyosyekap Eriya, yo kipuryo kot kumite ropta koret tokol kuwany kenyisyek somok ok orok lö, yoto kunäm rupet koret tokol.
42004026	Ntene kipuryo kot ciyokto Eriya om pesyosyecoto kuwo wule mite akenke om musukik coto, ntene kiciyokto kuwo pate wule mite musuk akenke nyepo Sarepta om koretap Siton.
42004027	Kimite mpo yec pikap mutyenkenik ce caŋ Israel om pesyosyek ce kipo workoyontet Elisya, ntene puryo mpo akenke nye kicisop, tos pate Naman nyepo koretap Siriya.’ ’’
42004028	Yoto kunyer koromun piko tokol ce kimite kotapkok orit yu kowo kulim ŋalecato komwoy Yesu.
42004029	Kuŋetyo cekto oŋnkunäm Yesu kocut kuŋete moŋonoto oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto tulwet parak nye kicetec moŋonoto kule wocitulye kuŋirte lakam.
42004030	Ntene kupunte neto yewuniyekwa oŋnkuwecikey arenyi ake.
42004031	Kurekto Yesu kuwo okoy kupunto Kapernaum moŋet nyepo Kalilaya, yoto kunet piko ye kipesyetap Sapat.
42004032	Ntene kukite piko konetisyenyi, omnye kinet kumwoy ŋalek ce kinyikisec koromun, oŋnku ŋalek ceponto kamukeywek.
42004033	Kimite yoto po kotapkok orit citake nye kiponto oyik ce miyotec, yoto kupol cicoto koromun om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule,
42004034	“Ye! Mokenec acek ne nyi Yesu nyepo Nasaret? Keco nyi kule cayarantec acek? Oŋnketiŋ ani nyi kule yiku nyi ŋo: Yiku Nyi Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.’’
42004035	Kupolyi Yesu oyinot kumwoci kule, “Sis! Ŋete cito.’’ Yoto kumilyi oyinoto cicoto ŋony om taytap piko tokol, oŋnkuŋet kuwete cicoto nye kipuryo kot kwiye kiy mpo kisic.
42004036	Kukite piko tokol koromun, oŋnkutepekey cekto nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋolyo ne nyi mwowu cici? Omnye polyini oyik ce miyotec om kamukeywek oko swamet okoy kumwey oyik. ’’
42004037	Yoto kutisto ŋalekap Yesu kupunte koret tokol nye lekite koronoto.
42004038	Kuŋete Yesu kotapkok oŋnkuwo okoy kupunto kotap Simiyon. Wokunyor cepyosyetap pikoy nyepo Simon kumnyone yeset nyewo koromun. Kusom piko Yesu kule kukalya neto.
42004039	Kuwo Yesu oŋnkuyoŋe yepo komostap cepyosyanato, oŋnkukwet yeset, yoto kuwo yeset, kuŋet neto lakwar oŋnkucec kwici cekto yisyonutek.
42004040	Nteye kimite kurortoy asista, kusut piko pikwa ce kimnyontos porwonik wok tokol kukwa wule mite Yesu, kukemer Yesu yewuniyekyi metitap ci tokol nye kimnyone; kusopco cekto tokol.
42004041	Kuŋetye oyik piko alak ce caŋ, kupoloti kumwowu kule, “Yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet!’’ Kupolyi Yesu oyicoto oŋnkuyete mente kuŋalal, omnye kinkete oyik kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet.
42004042	Nto kayec koret pate, kunomen Yesu kuwo surukwenet wule momite piko, ntene kucec piko ce caŋ kuceŋat neto okoy wokunyor, nteye kotonyoru, kusyem kule ceyete neto mente kot kuwo wulyo ake kupakakta cekto.
42004043	Ntene kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Misyino ani awo wamwayte lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet mpo moŋosyek alak, omnye kiyokwani Yiyintet comwowu ŋalecutecu.’’
42004044	Yoto kumwayte Yesu ŋalek korikapkok cepo Yuteya.
42005001	Nteyu kimite piko ce caŋ kukicekey kumut Yesu kule celim ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, kimite yoto Yesu kukeyoŋe tapantap tampayayetap Kenesaret.
42005002	Kukäs Yesu om yoto rapanik oyeny ce kimite tampayayet tapan ce kapakakta piko co nöme purpurunek oŋnkupa wokusit porokap purpurunek co cenömisye.
42005003	Kulany Yesu rapet akenke nyepo Simon, oŋnkusom kumwoci Simon kutorta rapet kunata kusic kuwo tampayayet. Yoto kupure Yesu rapanato oŋnkunet piko.
42005004	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal kot kuwany, kumwoci Yesu Simon kule, “Torte rapet kuwo peko kwen, oŋnkikoci nyi oko piko co konömisyi tokol porokwok peko orit onömisye.’’
42005005	Kuwekyi Simon kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, kukyiyisye om swama komowut tokol; ntene puryo kot cimuc kot cenäm kiy, ntene om ŋolyonteŋuŋ nye kemwowu, mosokoci porok peko orit.’’
42005006	Yoto kwiy cek kuyunyoto kukoci porok peko orit; kunäm yoto purpurunek ce caŋ koromun okoy kumac kuŋetyo porok.
42005007	Yoto kukur cekto kuwus nömik alak ce kinömisyi tokol ce kimite rapet ake kule kukwa kwokukalya, kukwa cut, kwokonum cek purpurunek ce caŋ koromun kunyit raposyek tukway kot kumac kotompultokey kowut peko orit.
42005008	Nteye kotoköse Simon Petero ŋalek coto keyokis, koputyi kukutuŋe kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet wecikey, omnye oyiku ani ci nye miyat.’’
42005009	Omnye kikite Simon oko piko co kipontokey coŋintap purpurunek ce caŋ ce kicenäm.
42005010	Kuyuyit nyoto kukite mpecek Yakopo oko Yowana werikap Sepetayo ce kinömikap purpurunek ce kipontokey oko Simon. Kumwoci Yesu Simon kule, “Mente omuy; kuceke yawut pesyoni meseyeku nyi roponintet nye kweru piko.’’
42005011	Yoto kusut cekto raposyekwa okoy kupunto tampayayet tapan, oŋnkupakakta tukuk tokol, oŋnkunomen kunam kupetakey Yesu.
42005012	Nteye kimite Yesu pesyet ake moŋet ake, kimite moŋonoto citake nye kunäm mutyenkenik koromun, nteye kotoköse cicoto Yesu, kuputyi ŋony kukutuŋnkyi oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, ye kecäm nyi nkit, muci sopo ani!’’
42005013	Kuyito Yesu yewunyi oŋnkunäm cicoto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Omöce ani; kunyo sop nyolu.’’ Kusopco om yoto pakenke mutyenkenik ce kiponto cicoto.
42005014	Kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cicoto kule, “Mente kot omwoci citake tokol ŋalecu, ntene iwo weporcikey tisintet, nto kuyu ŋalek ce nöme kosopeŋuŋ, iwo wekoyite korosyontet kuyu wule kimwayta Moses, sukuŋet porci ci tokol kule kwesop nyi.’’
42005015	Ntene kutosyikey kutisto lokoywecoto po Yesu, koruruckey piko ce caŋ oŋnkukwa kwokulimnta ŋalekyi oŋnkyisopci cekto porwonikwa.
42005016	Ntene kikweyekey Yesu kwine nkit om pesyosyek alak oŋnkuwo surukwenet wokusom.
42005017	Kimite Yesu kunetisyi pesyet ake, nto om yoto kimite kukepur Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone moŋosyekap Kalilaya oko Yuteya oko Yerusalem. Kiponto Yesu yoto swametap Mokoryontet nye kisopse.
42005018	Yoto kusutune piko alake kwiririt citake nye kipok kerenkok. Kusyem picoto kule cekonop cicoto kuwo okoy kupunto taytap Yesu.
42005019	Ntowo kupotyi cek aret nye kepunte omnye kicaŋ piko, kunäm kulaŋnte okoy koto kisyek, oŋnkuput kisyekutap koto onŋkopunte cicoto kumite kwiririt okoy kupunto kwenutap piko om yepo taytap Yesu.
42005020	Ntowo kukäs Yesu koyenetap picoto, kumwoy kule, “Corwenyu, kacikalyiŋ nyi miyotyonikuk.’’
42005021	Yoto kucec kuŋalal kwicek nkit konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek kumwoy kule, “Ŋo cici ŋolole ŋal ce nyile Yiyintet kuyu nyi! Ŋo yec nye muce kukalya miyotyonik nye puryo kot ku Yiyintet nkit!’’
42005022	Kunket Yesu kasoteywek ce kimite cekto kusote; kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Omne sasot akwek ŋalek ceyuco otintentyine om kasoteywekwok?
42005023	Oŋnkono nye lekite, cemwoy kule, ‘Kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk’. Nto ye kocemwoy kule, ‘Ŋet wesetote?’
42005024	Kunyo moporwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule ponto Weritap cito kamukeywek om koret kukalya miyotyonik.’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ŋet yony, oŋnkitor kwiririŋuŋ nomen iwo ka!’’
42005025	Om yoto pakenke kuŋet cicoto kuyo om konyekap piko tokol, oŋnkutor kinyi nyo korwoye oŋnkuwecikey ka; kukostoti Yiyintet.
42005026	Kukite piko tokol ce kimite yoto koromun! Oŋnkumuyo kukasta cek Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kacekäs pesyoni ŋalek cepo kakitat!’’
42005027	Om letutap coto, kunomen Yesu kuwo okoy wokunyor korurukintetap mosoret nye cekure Lefi kukepur konyi nye cekweye mosoret, kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Nama cepetekey oko ani.’’
42005028	Yoto kuŋet Lefi kupakakta tukuk tokol oŋnkunomen kunam kupetakey Yesu.
42005029	Yoto kwici Lefi Yesu sakwet nyewo koromun om kanyi, kimite yoto piko ce caŋ co ruruce mosoret oko piko alak kukepur tokol wanak.
42005030	Kuŋunyŋuny Farasayek oko konetikwa cepo ntarastinek om wule mite konomikap Yesu kumwoy kule, “Omne soyomisye oŋnkoyesye akwek oko pic ce ruruce musoro, oko pic ce kicetay?’’
42005031	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Puryo kot kumöce piko ce sopcotin cepsakityantet, ntene piko ce mnyontos ce möce.
42005032	Kipuryo kot aco ani kule cokur piko ce toponec, ntene kyaco kule sukuŋet kurenynkey piko co ponto miyotyonik.’’
42005033	Kumwoci piko alake Yesu kule, “Kire omik om pesyosyek alak oŋnkusome konomikap Yowana, mpo konomik cepo Farasayek kwiye kuyunyoto, ntene omne sukwomisyi oŋnkuyesyo konomikukyi?’’
42005034	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Omuci akwek omwoci pikap sakwet kule kukir omik ye tokupontokey cek cito nyo kemütisyi? Puryo kot kuyunyo!
42005035	Mosukupunto pesyet nye mocipesyo cek oko cito nyo kemütisyi, kunyo om pesyosyecoto ye mosukukiris cekto omik.’’
42005036	Kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconi kule, “Puryo ci nye poce yokwontet kisic kopukune siret nyelel oŋnkunopci siret nye yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy neto kuyunyoto, mosukupac siret nyelel kunyor koŋnta, nto siret nyelel nyo kocenopci kupuryo kot kunyolcintos oko siret nyo yoswaket.
42005037	Puryo mpo ci nye roŋnkyini komek ce mwonec wonkinek ce yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, kumuce finyonik ce mwonec kuyeyi wonkinek ce yoswak, kutumntokey finyonik kupa wuy oŋnkuyeyo kworon wonkinek.
42005038	Möce finyonik ce mwonec ceroŋnkyi wonkinek ce lelac.
42005039	Puryo mpo ci nye ye kiye finyonik ce rucwok nye möce kule nto aye finyonik ce mwonec ce kururyo, omnye mwowu kule toponec finyonik co rucwok.’’
42006001	Nteye kipesyetap Sapat kuwo Yesu kupunte mparosyekap nkanuk, yoto kuputot konomikyi nkanuk oŋnkupirir kwam.
42006002	Kumwoci Farasayek alake konomik kule, “Omne sayiy akwek om pesyetap Sapat yisyet nye puryo kot kucöme ntarastinekyo?’’
42006003	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek ŋalek cek kikwiy Tauti oko pikyi yo kikwome cek rupet?
42006004	Kiwut neto kotap Yiyintet oŋnkunum mukatyantet nye kicesoci kupoyit Yiyintet, oŋnkwam oko pikyi co kipontokey, ntene kipuryo kot kucömncini ntarastit ci ake tokol kwam, tisik pate nkit ce kicecömncini.’’
42006005	Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Weritap cito kunye Mokoryontetap Sapat.’’
42006006	Nteye kipesyetap Sapatit ake, kuwo Yesu okoy kotapkok oŋnkunetis, kimite koyoto orit citake nye kime yewutap tay.
42006007	Yoto kurip Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek kule cekäs oŋnkusopsi Yesu ye pesyetap Sapat, sukuŋet cekto kuwosontyi.
42006008	Ntene kunket Yesu kasoteywekwa, kumwoci cicoto kime yewut kule, “Ŋet yony oŋnkico ceyoŋe yu potay’’ Kuŋet cicoto oŋnkuyoŋe yoto.
42006009	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Otepenok akwek kule, cömwec acek ntarastinekyo kyiy ne ye pesyetap Sapat? Cikalya nto ciwurta? Cisop sopontap cito nto cipot?’’
42006010	Kukäskästa Yesu kukäs cekto tokol, oŋnkumwoci cicoto kime yewut kule, “Yite yewuŋuŋ.’’ Kwiy cicoto kuyunyoto, kusop yewunyi kuyu wule kiyunto kunyo.
42006011	Ntene kunerekis cek koromun, oŋnkucec kuŋalale nkit kito nye mokwiye Yesu.
42006012	Om pesyosyecoto kuwo Yesu kulaŋnta lakamet parak wokusom; kuwany kwomowunoto tokol kusome Yiyintet.
42006013	Nteyu kowo kuyec koret, kukur konomikyi kukwa ye kimite neto, oŋnkukwey taman ok oyeny om coto oŋnkutoci kaynet kukure kiyokik.
42006014	Simon nye kimulyi cekure Petero, oko mutakwam Antereya, oko Yakopo, oko Yowana, oko Filipo, oko Paturumayo,
42006015	oko Matayo oko Tomas, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo, oko Simon nye kicekure nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi,
42006016	Yuta weritap Yakopo, oko Yuta Isikaryoti nyo kiweckey kwek ŋomntoyin.
42006017	Kurekune Yesu lakam wanak oko konomikyi, kuco okoy cokuyoŋe yepo kewet nye topon. Kimite yoto konomik ce caŋ oko piko ce caŋ koromun ce kikwone koretap Yuteya tokol oko Yerusalem, oko ce kikwone tapantap ruretyet om Tiro oko Siton.
42006018	Cekikwa kule kwocelimnte ŋalekyi oŋnkyisopci porwonikwa. Kukwa mpecek piko ce kikikutaŋany oyik ce miyotec, cisop cek tokol.
42006019	Kusyem piko tokol kule cetiny Yesu, omnye kicone swamet wule mite neto oŋnkusop cekto tokol.
42006020	Kukäs Yesu konomikyi oŋnkumwoci kule: “Oponte akwek pononik kupeyoy, omnye nyimwoŋ poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
42006021	Oponte akwek kupeyoy co omok yawut rupet: omnye koyin cipiyonyok! Oponte akwek kupeyoy co orirtosi yawut: omnye mosorori koyin!
42006022	“Oponte akwek kupeyoy ye kasenkerak piko oŋnkukwetak, oŋnkucupok kumwowok kule, oyiku oyi, omnye kocäm Weritap Cito!
42006023	Aŋerec om pesyonoto, oŋnkotum om ŋerekwek omnye komwowok ani akwek kule coŋec kupeyokwok om wulin po torot. Omnye kikwicini mpo kukomwa workoyik ŋalek ceyucoto.
42006024	“Ntene Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co oyiku mokoren yawut, omnye kiyemak ŋerekwek!
42006025	“Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co oyiku piyoŋotin yawut, omnye mosukwamak rupet! Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co ororye yawut, Omnye mosomesye oŋnkorirye.
42006026	“Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co ŋololenok piko topon. Omnye kikwici mpo kukomwa ŋalek ceyucutecu workoyik co kimwiynot.
42006027	“Ntene komwowok ani akwek cu olime ŋalekwani yawut kule, ocäm punikwok, oŋnkoyici tukuk ce toponec piko tokol co senkerok.
42006028	Osomnci kupeyok piko co cupok kurumncok akwek, oŋnkosomnci piko co toŋonyok akwek.
42006029	Ye kasyeciŋ citake kwarmatut ake wekyi kusyec mpo kwarmatut ake. Ye kosut citake kotiŋun koci kusut mpo satit.
42006030	Koci ci tokol kiy nye kosomiŋ, ntene mente atepe cicoto kuketuŋ tukuk coto kosut.
42006031	Oyici piko tokol kuyu wule omoktoy akwek kule ntoyiwok akwek picoto.
42006032	“Nteye kocäm akwek pate piko co cömok akwek, asot akwek kule ceponte kupeyoy ne? Omnye mpo piko co ponto miyotyonik kucöme mpecek piko co cöme cekto!
42006033	Nteye koyici akwek tukuk ce toponec piko co yiwok akwek tukuk ce toponec, asot akwek kule ceponte kupeyoy ne? Omnye mpo piko co ponto miyotyonik kwiye mpecek kuyunyoto.
42006034	Nteye kopesentyi akwek pate piko co oŋnketi kule mosukuketwec kuyokwec tukukyo, asot akwek kule ceponte kupeyoy ne? Omnye mpo piko co miyotec kupesentyini piko co miyotec kunkete kule ceketwec ceyokwec tukukyo!
42006035	Ntene ocäm punikwok, oyici tukuk ce toponec; opesente ntene monte osotyi kule ceyokwec om letut, omnye mosonyoru kupeyok ce cäŋ oŋnkoyiku lekokap Yiyintet nyewo nyepo torot koromun, Omnye tala Yiyintet om wule mite piko tokol co puryo kot kukostoyisyi oko piko co miyotec.
42006036	Oyiku pic ce ponto poypoyet kuyu Papamwoŋ nye ponto poypoyet.’’
42006037	“Monte cemutyi piko alak musanku, mpo akwek kupuryo kot kumutwok Yiyintet koyin musanku. Monte cemutyi piko alak kulot musanku, mpo akwek kupuryo kot cemutwok koyin kulotak musanku. Okalye sukuŋet koyin kukalyak mpo akwek Yiyintet.
42006038	Okoyite sukuŋet koyin cekonok mpo akwek, mosonyoru akwek koyoyeketap sweswet nye topon nye kiciruruŋnkyi okoy kuwastakey; omnye koyoyeket nyo oyoyekyini akwek piko alak, kunyoto koyoyeket nye koyin ciyoyekwok mpo akwek.’’
42006039	Kumwoci Yesu cekto yec tyonkoconi kule, “Muce pa cito nye korat kuretot citake nye korat? Puryo kot kosucini tukway mwenet?
42006040	Puryo kot kupële cito nyo cinete cito nyo netisyi, ntene ci tokol nyo cinete ye kacinet okoy kunket mosukukerkeyit neto oko konetintenyi.
42006041	“Kunyo omne seköse nyi pertet nye kisic nye mite koŋntap yeyaŋuŋ, oŋnkupuryo kot muci kot käs musukyet nye mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nkit?
42006042	Muci nyi kulene mwoci yeyaŋuŋ kule, ‘Yeya, kany onumuŋ ani pertet nye mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ oŋnkurok kupuryo muci nyi kot käs musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋun nkit? Ye, koperperintoni! Nyosye numu kunyo musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nkit, siŋet käste topon semuc numu pertet nyo mite koŋntap yeyaŋuŋ.’ ’’
42006043	“Omnye puryo ket nye topon nye muce kot kwiy omik ce miyotec, oŋnkupuryo yec mpo ket nye miyat nye muce kot kwiy omik ce toponec.
42006044	Cinkete ket ake tokol omikyi ce yiye; omnye puryo kot komuce piko kupute mokoyek ketik ce ponto kotok, nto muce ra kupute komolik ketik ce ponto kotok?
42006045	Numu cito nye topon toponiyet kucone konorutyenyi nye nye topon nye mite mukuleynyi, nto cito nye miyat kunum miyotyet kucone konorutyenyi nye miyat nye mite mukuleynyi, omnye ŋolole kutitap cito ŋalek tokol ce nyitotin mukuleynyi.’’
42006046	“Omne sokureno ani akwek, ‘Mokoryontet, Mokoryontet,’ oŋnkurok kupuryo kot oyiye ŋalek ce omwowok ani akwek?
42006047	Mosoporwok ani wule yunto cito nye coni wule omite oŋnkulim ŋalekwani oŋnkwiy kurup.
42006048	Kerkey nyo oko ci nye tece koto kupal kuwo ŋony koromun oŋnkutuci topon, nteye keyin mokotekap oyinet oŋnkurotyi koyoto om swama kupuryo kot kumuce kutyem omnye kicetec topon.
42006049	Nto ci nye kalim ŋalekwani oŋnkupuryo kot kwiy kiy, kukerkey nyo oko ci nye tece koto yepo ntapca oŋnkupuryo kot kutec topon kupal kuwo ŋony, kurotyi oyinet koyoto om swama kulul lakwar, nto luletap koyoto kululot nyewo koromun.’’
42007001	Nteyu kowo kuwany Yesu kumwoci piko ŋalecutecu tokol, kunomen kuwo Kapernaum.
42007002	Kimite wuloto citake nyewo nyepo sikarek nye kiponto mutworintenyi nye kicöme koromun. Kimnyone nye kikasat koromun nye karik kume mutworintonoto.
42007003	Ntowo kulim cicoto kinyewo nyepo sikarek ŋalek ce nöme Yesu, kuyokto poyikap Yutayek alak kupa wokumwoci Yesu kuco cokusop mutworintenyi.
42007004	Yoto kukwa poyikap Yutayek okoy kupun wule mite Yesu, oŋnkusaysay koromun kumwoci kule, “Misyini yici neto kuyunyoto, roke neto kunyor,
42007005	omnye cöme pikyacek, oŋnku neto nye kitekwec acek kotapkok.’’
42007006	Yoto kunomen Yesu kupetakey wanak oko cekto, ntowo kurikta koyoto, kuyok nyewo nyepo sikarek coronutekyi kwokumwoci Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, mente ayimnkey omnye oyiku ani ci nye puryo kot kumisyiniŋ nyi ico cewut komwani.
42007007	Kunyo puryo kot kumisyo ani aco wule mite nyi; mwowu pate ŋolyo mosukusop mutworintemwani.
42007008	Omnye oyiku mpo ani ci nye cepoytoy, oŋnkoponte sikarek ce opoytoy ani, omwocini ake kule, ‘Iwo’, kuwo, nto ake omwoci kule, ‘Co’, kuco, nto mutworintemwani omwoci kule, ‘Yiy kiyi’, kwiye kuyunyoto.’’
42007009	Nteyu kowo kulim Yesu coto, kukite ŋalekap cicoto koromun, oŋnkumwoci piko ce kirupe neto kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, nka mpo om Israel tokol kumukul; tompo kot anyoru ani ci nye ponto koyenot nyewo kuyunyi.’’
42007010	Ntowo kuweckey piko co kociyoku kupa okoy koyoto, wokunyor kosop mutworintetkey.
42007011	Nto om letut kuminiŋ, kunomen Yesu kuwo okoy kupunto moŋet nye cekure Nain. Kiwetoykey neto yoto konomikyi oko piko ce caŋ.
42007012	Nteyu kowo kupunto kurketap moŋet kutuye piko ce sutu cito nye kame, nyoto kunye kiwero akenke pate nyepo korko nye musuk. Kipontokey korkonoto piko ce ce caŋ cepo moŋonoto.
42007013	Ntowo kukäs Mokoryontet korkonoto, kurire oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mente tarir.’’
42007014	Yoto kunokyi Yesu kulekityi oŋnkunäm kito nye kicesute cito, yoto kuyoŋ piko ce kisute, kumwoy Yesu kule, “Oyiperyontoni! Komwowuŋ kule, Ŋet yony!’’
42007015	Kuŋet cicoto kikime kopur ŋony oŋnkucec kuŋalal, kunäm Yesu oŋnkukoci kamet lekwenyi.
42007016	Yoto kokite oŋnkumuyo piko tokol, oŋnkukasta cekto Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kotokune kwenunyo workoyonto nyewo koromun!’’
42007017	Kutisto lokoywecutecu po Yesu om koretap Yuteya tokol oko korosyek ce lekite wuloto.
42007018	Kumwoci konomikyi Yowana ŋalecutecu tokol. Yoto kukur Yowana konomikyi oyeny,
42007019	oŋnkuyokto kupa wule mite Mokoryontet wokutepe kule, “Nyi neto cito mosukuco nto cekany acek citake?’’
42007020	Nteyu kowo kukwa picoto okoy kupun wule mite Yesu; kwokumwoy kule “Keyokwec acek Yowana potisonintet wule mite nyi kutep kule, ‘Nyi neto cito nyo mosukuco nto cekany acek citake.’ ’’
42007021	Yoto pakenke kusop Yesu piko ce caŋ ce kiponto porwonik, ce kisyen, oko ce kiponto oyik ce miyotec, oŋnkuŋany konyek kukästa piko ce caŋ ce kikoryo.
42007022	Kuwekyikey Yesu pikap Yowana oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ape womwoci Yowana ŋalek tokol ce kokäs oŋnkolim akwek: Akäs pa, köstoy piko ce kikoryo, pesetoti piko ce kimwolyos, kocisop piko ce kuponto mutyenkenik, limntoy piko ce kikimiŋitu, kokotutune met piko ce kikipok, oŋnkyemwocini pononik lokoywek ce toponec.
42007023	Ntene ŋerekat kuponto kupeyoy ci tokol nye puryo kot kunyoruneno ani kanokut.’’
42007024	Nto om letut yu kowo kupecikey piko co kiyoku Yowana, kumwoci Yesu piko ŋalek ce nömekey oko Yowana kule, “Kyopeti akwek Kitela kule wocekäs ne? Rostit nye kitimtime yomet? Puryo kot kuyunyo!
42007025	Ntene kyopeti akwek kule wocekäs ne? Ci nye kelac sirok ce toponec ce kintus? Cinkete kule piko co loce sirok ce toponec ce cikite oŋnkuponto soponto nyepo ŋerekwek kuminye piko coto korikap mokorenik!
42007026	Ntene omwowo ani pa, kyopeti akwek kule wocekäs ne? Workoyo? Yunyoto manta, komwowok ani kule kyokäs akwek yoto ci nye pële workoyo.
42007027	Omnye neto nyoto nyo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto kule: ‘Akäs pa, oyoku ani kiyokitemwani kuntowuŋ nyi, Nye mosukusat areŋuŋ om tayŋuŋyi.’ ’’
42007028	Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Komwowok ani kule, om piko tokol ce kiyi koruk, puryo mpo akenke nyewo kupël Yowana. Ntene nye miniŋ om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kunye nyewo nyoto kupël neto.’’
42007029	Nteyu kowo kulim ŋalecato piko tokol oko korurukikap mosoret, kukasta cekto kucämnta toponiyetap Yiyintet, omnye kikicäm oŋnkyepatisan cek om potisonisyetap Yowana.
42007030	Ntene kutay Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ŋalek ce möce Yiyintet om wule mite cek, omnye kipuryo kot kucäm kupatisan Yowana cekto.
42007031	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Moyuyite ne ani yawut pikap pesyosyecu? Kerkey oko kiy ne?
42007032	Kerkey oko lekoy ce kepure yepo motepet sukupole kukurcinikey kumwowu kule: ‘Kicekutwok akwek kurerunek, ntene atay akwek motum! Kicerirye acek kyam mnyat, ntene atay akwek morirye omesye!’
42007033	Omnye kico Yowana potisonintet, oŋnkukir omik nye puryo kot kwomisyi oŋnkupuryo kot kuye finyonik, omwowu akwek kule, ‘Ponto oyinot!’
42007034	Kunyo kuco Weritap cito oŋnkwomis, oŋnkuyesyo, omwowu akwek kule, ‘Akäs pa cici! Nye cemoyetyontet oŋnkuyeyin nyepo pokitet, oŋnkucorwetap korurukikap mosoret oko piko co kicetay!’
42007035	Ntene kunyo kicinket kule po manta ŋomnonetap Yiyintet om wule mite piko tokol ce lekokyi.’’
42007036	Kukur Farasoyintet ake Yesu cokwomis kanyi, kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto kotap Farasoyintonoto oŋnkupur ŋony kwomis.
42007037	Kimite korket ake moŋonoto nye kiponto kopurto nyepo soponto nye miyat, nteyu kowo kunket korkonoto kule mite Yesu kwomisyi om kotap Farasoyintet, yoto kusut cupet nye nyitat mwayita nye poŋu topon.
42007038	Kuco oŋnkuyoŋe patay om yepo kerenkokap Yesu, kuyile mwayikey poŋu topon.
42007039	Nteye kotoköse Farasoyintet nyo kukure Yesu ŋalecato, kumwowune moyenyi kule, “Nto koworkoyo cici, nto kokonket kule, ŋo, oŋnkuyu ne korkoni kanäm neto, oŋnkunket kule, ponto korkoni miyotyo.’’
42007040	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule “Simon, oponte ani ŋolyo nye omöce kule omwowuŋ nyi.’’ Kumwoy Simon kule, “Mokoryontet, mwowu.’’ Kuporci Yesu kumwoci neto kule.
42007041	“Kiponto piko alak oyeny pesenutekap citake nye pesentoy pesan. Kiceyoce ake silinkinek pokolwokik mut, nto ake kiceyoce silinkinek konom.
42007042	Omnye kipuryo kot kuponto picoto oyenku tukuk ce mokuyokune, cikalya tukway pesenutekwa. Kunyo oŋnkono om picoto oyeny nye mosukucäm koromun cito nyo kikolyoyisyi?’’
42007043	Kuwec Simon kumwoci Yesu kule, “Asoti ani kule cito nyo kicikalya pesento nyewo.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kerwoc topon.’’
42007044	Kuwekyikey Yesu korketkey oŋnkumwoci Simon kule, “Kekäs nyi korkoni? Kaco ani koŋuŋyi, ntene puryo kot kono pekap kerenkok, kunyo korkoni kunye kenyinye lokikyi kerenkokwani, oŋnkupuke putekap metinyi.
42007045	Kopuryo mpo kot ŋerekyo ŋatuta ani nyi, ntene kuceke ye kaco ani koŋŋyi, puryo kot kwasta korkoni nye moŋotute kerenkokwani.
42007046	Kopuryo mpo kot iyile nyi mwayita metimwani, ntene kakuyile korkoni kerenkokwani mwayita nye poŋu.
42007047	Kunyo cömisyenyi nyewo nye kokupor kunye poru kule kacikalya neto miyotyonikyi ce caŋ. Ci tokol nye kacikalya ce tukusic kuporu nyoto cömisyet nye miniŋ.’’
42007048	Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Kacikalyiŋ nyi miyotyonikuk tokol.’’
42007049	Yoto kucec kuŋalal piko co kyomisyi wanak om montuwokwa kumwoy kule, “Ŋo yec nyi kolyoy miyotyonik?’’
42007050	Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Kakusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ wecikey om kalya.’’
42008001	Om letut kunomen Yesu kuwo kupunte soŋwek oko moŋosyek kuceke ake okoy ake kumwoytoti lokoywek ce nöme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Kipontotikey neto yoto konomikyi taman ok oyeny,
42008002	oko koruk alak ce kikicisopci oyik ce miyotec oko porwonikwa. Coto ku mpo Mariyam nyepo maktala nye kikicekwetyi oyik tisap,
42008003	oko Yoana korketap Yusa cito nyewo nye kipoytoy kaytap Erote, oko Susana, oko koruk alak ce caŋ ce kikolyoy korucoto Yesu oko konomikyi tukuk ce kimöce.
42008004	Ntowo koruruckey piko ce caŋ, oŋnkumite alake kutosyinikey kukwone moŋosyek alak tokol, kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconi kule,
42008005	“Kiwo kolintet ake wokukol kupuswekyi, nteye kimite kukolsyi kupuswekyi, kusuci kupuswek alake aret tapan, cetyikta ŋony, kuterer toritek oŋnkwokwam.
42008006	Kusuci alake yepo kitawet parak, kutur oŋnkuyom omnye kipuryo kot kunyor peko.
42008007	Kusuci kupuswek alake yepo kotok orit, kupityo wanak oko kotok kwam kotok.
42008008	Kusuci alake yepo teŋek ce toponec, kupityo oŋnkwiy kupuswontet akenke kupuswek pokol akenke’’. Nteye kimwowu Yesu ŋalecutecu kukurto kupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ci nye ponto yitik ce limnte, roke kulimnte!’’
42008009	Kutepe konomikyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mwowu ne tyonkoconi?’’
42008010	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Om wule omite akwek, kicekonok oŋnket ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, ntene om wule mite piko alak kicikoci co kunket om tyonkocoy pate, sukuŋet cek kukäs ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kunkete, kulim ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kusowu kunket.’’
42008011	“Poru tyonkoconi kule, kupuswontet kunye ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
42008012	Kupuswek co kisuci aret tapan; kukerkey oko piko co kalim ŋolyontet, ntene kuco Setani nyewo nyepo oyik oŋnkucokunumune ŋolyontet mukuleywekwa kule mente kuyen ŋolyontet oŋnkyisop.
42008013	Nto kupuswek co kisuci kitawet parak, kukerkey oko piko co ye kalim ŋolyontet kuŋerekyi koromun, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kowute mukuleywekwa orit, kuyen pate pesyos tukusic, nteye kacesyem cekto kumwey.
42008014	Nto kupuswek co kisuci kotok orit, kukerkey oko piko co ye kalim ŋolyontet nteye tokumite kurupe, kowurta cekto kasoteywek oko mokoryontit oko ŋerekwekap koret. Kunyo puryo kot kwiye cek omik kot kururyo.
42008015	Kupuswek co kisuci teŋek ce toponec, kukerkey oko piko co ye kalim ŋolyontet, kunäm oŋnkurip topon om mukuleywekwa ce toponec ce muytocini oŋnkukwilokis okoy kwiy omik.’’
42008016	“Puryo ci nye pele tarit oŋnkukupuye pesenit, nto kukoci kwiririt ŋony, ntene tore meset parak sukuŋet kukäs piko co miŋu koto orit lakweyet.
42008017	Omnye puryo ŋolyo nye kicewuny nye puryo kot ciporu koyin kutok. Oŋnkupuryo kiy nye kicetup cewuny nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok.
42008018	Oripkey yawut wule olimntoy; omnye ci tokol nye ponto kiy mosicetosyi kucaŋit, nto ci tokol nye puryo kot kuponto nka mpo tukusic co sote kule oponte, mosicinumune.’’
42008019	Yoto kukwa mpo mutakwam oko kamet wule mite Yesu, ntene kipuryo kot komuc cek kot kupunto wule mite Yesu omnye kicaŋ piko koromun.
42008020	Kumwoci citake Yesu kule, “Mite komet oko mpo mutokwomet keyoŋe saŋ kumöce kule cekäsiŋ nyi.’’
42008021	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek tokol kule, “Yeyomwani oko mpo yeyamwani ku piko co lime ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkurup kwiy.’’
42008022	Nteye kipesyet ake, kulany Yesu rapet oko konomikyi oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Onte cipe kyay tampayayet pitonin.’’ Yoto kunomen cek kway.
42008023	Nteye kimite kwoye, kunuc Yesu kunäm rwonto; yoto kuwus yomet nyepo swama om tampayayet okoy kumac kunyiy peko rapet, kukäs konomik kule cemite ye miyat.
42008024	Kukwa cek ye kimite Yesu oŋnkuŋet kumwoci kule, “Konetintet, Konetintet! Kocemis!’’ Kuŋet Yesu oŋnkupolyi yomet oko peko ce kiwosekey, yoto kusis yomet oko tampayayet tokol.
42008025	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mite ono koyenemwoŋ?’’ Kumuyo cekto oŋnkukite, oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo yec cici? Nyi polyini mpo yomat oko peko kulimnci neto!’’
42008026	Yoto kway cek kupete rapet okoy kupunto pitonin om koretap Kerasenik nye tokyintos oko koretap Kalilaya.
42008027	Nteyu kowo kupunto cek tapantap tampayayet, kutuye Yesu citake nye kiponto oyik nye kicone moŋet, kikukuwany cicoto pesyosyek ce caŋ nye puryo kot kuloce siroy, oŋnkupuryo kot kuminye ko, ntene kiminye pate wule cemucini piko.
42008028	Nteye kotoköse cicoto Yesu, kurir kupol om kutit nyewo koromun oŋnkuputyi ŋony kukutuŋe taytap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ponteno ne ani nyi Yesu Weritap Yiyintet nyepo torot koromun? Osomiŋ kule mente ataŋanya ani!’’
42008029	Kimwoy cicoto kuyunyoto omnye kikipolyi Yesu oyinot nye miyat kuwete neto. Kikinäm oyik cicoto aret ce caŋ, kunyo kiceripe cerate nyororonik oko pinkonok, ntene kimuce cicoto kuŋeti oŋnkusut oyik neto okoy kupunto surukwenet.
42008030	Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Cekure ne kayneŋuŋ?’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Cekure kaynemwani, ‘Luket’, ’’ omnye kikikowut cicoto oyik ce caŋ.
42008031	Kusaysay oyik Yesu kumwoci kule, kukwet cek kupa wokowut kapkompic.
42008032	Kimite ye kilekite yoto yeceytap nkururwenik ce kimite kwokete tulwet komos. Kumwoci oyik Yesu kule kucömnci cek kupa wokowut nkururwenicoto. Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kupa kuyunyoto.
42008033	Yoto kuŋete oyik cicoto oŋnkupa wokowut nkururwenicoto kumwey kurway yeceyta tokol okoy wokoŋirte lakam wokosuci tampayayet kupakäc peko kupok tokol.
42008034	Nteyu kowo kukäs mesewek ce kyokisyi ŋalecato keyokis kumwey kurway kupa wokumwaytat kupunte lokoywek moŋosyek oko koret tokol.
42008035	Kukwa piko kwokukäs ŋalecato kokwiyokis, ntowo kupun yoto; kwokunyor Yesu kupontokey cicoto kopete oyik kukepur yepo kerenkokap Yesu kulakat oŋnkuponto ŋomnonet. Yoto kumuyo piko tokol.
42008036	Kuporci piko co komite yeto kumwoci piko co kokwoni wule kocisopto cicoto kiponto oyik.
42008037	Yoto kusom piko tokol ce kiminye koretap Kerasenik oko ce lekite koronoto kumwoci Yesu kule kuŋet kuwete koremwa, omnye kinäm cek tokol muyotet nyewo koromun. Yoto kulany Yesu rapet oŋnkunomen kuweckey.
42008038	Kusom cicoto kipete oyik kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kany cepetekey tukway.’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule,
42008039	“Nomen wecikey kaŋuŋ oŋnkuwemwayte ŋalek ce kokwiwuŋ nyi Yiyintet.’’ Kunomen cicoto kuwecikey oŋnkuwokumwaytat kupunte moŋosyek tokol ŋalek ce kokwici Yesu neto.
42008040	Ntowo kuweckey Yesu kwoy pitoni, kutoroc kuŋerekyi piko ce caŋ, Omnye kimite picoto kukonye neto.
42008041	Yoto kuco citake nye cekure Yairo nye kipoytoyintetap kotapkok, oŋnkuputyi yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, cipe kanyu,
42008042	omnye kiponto Yairo lekwenyi akenke nye tye nye kiponto kenyisyek taman ok oyeny, nye kikirik kume. Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kukic piko neto om komoswokik tokol.
42008043	Kimite yoto korket ake nye kimnyan kutaŋany kukwone korotik kuwany kenyisyek taman ok oyeny. Kikikuwoŋnkyi korkonoto tukukyi tokol ce kiponto cepsakitisyek, ntene puryo mpo akenke nye kimuc kot kusop neto.
42008044	Kucone korkonoto letutap Yesu oŋnkutwa kunäm tapantap siretap Yesu, yoto pakenke kusisio korotik ce kikwone neto.
42008045	Kutep Yesu kule, “Ŋo nyi kanäma kutwaya ani?’’ Nteyu kowo kutinton piko tokol, kumwoy Petero kule, “Konetintet, piko cu kuwunuktiŋ kukiciŋ nyi!’’
42008046	Ntene kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kutwaya kunäma ani citake; omnye kakäs kule kaweteno swamet.’’
42008047	Ntowo kukäs korkonoto kule komowuŋoktosi, kupotanan kuco tay, oŋnkuputyi taytap Yesu oŋnkumwoci om taytap piko tokol omne sukutwa kunäm neto Yesu, oŋnkumwoy kutor wule kosopto neto yoto pakenke.
42008048	Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Cepnyu, kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ, kunyo wecikey om kalya.’’
42008049	Nteyu kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kucone citake kotap poytoyintetap kotapkok, oŋnkucokumwoci poytoyintet kule, “Kame cepŋuŋ kunyo mente tayim yec Konetintet.’’
42008050	Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kumwoci Yairo kule, “Mente omuy, iyen pate, mosukusop cepŋuŋ.’’
42008051	Ntowo kupunto Yesu koyoto, kuyete piko tokol mewut koto orit, oŋnkucömnci pate Petero oko Yowana oko Yakopo, oko kwanitap lekwet oko kamet.
42008052	Kimite yoto piko kurire kwome mnyat cepoto. Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Monte cerirye, omnye puryo kot kume, koru pate.’’
42008053	Kurorici picoto Yesu omnye kinkete cek kule kame lekwet.
42008054	Kunäm Yesu yewutap cepoto oŋnkukur kupol kumwoy kule, “Lekwani ŋet!’’
42008055	Kuweckey sopon nyi, oŋnkuŋet lakwar kuyo. Yoto kumwayta Yesu cikoci omik ce kam.
42008056	Kukite kwan oko kamet, ntene kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule mente kot kumwoci citake tokol ŋalecu keyokis.
42009001	Yoto kukur Yesu koruruc wanak kiyokikyi taman ok oyeny, oŋnkukoci cek swamet oko kamukeywek ce kwete oyik oko swamet nye sope porwonik,
42009002	oŋnkuyokto kupa wokumwaytat lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkusop piko tokol ce mnyontos.
42009003	Kumwoci kule, “Monte cenämate kiy om poninekwok, nka mpo korok nye otepenoti, nka mpo lol nyepo omit, nka mpo omnyo, nka mpo pesan, monte mpo cenämate sirok oyeny.
42009004	Nto koto ake tokol nye kowut; opur koyoto okoy onomene moŋonoto.
42009005	Nto wulyo ake tokol wule puryo kot kutorocak kuŋerekyok akwek piko, aŋete apete moŋonoto oŋnkopukyi tertitap kerenkokwok sukuŋet kwek kosowunot om wule mite pikap moŋonoto.’’
42009006	Yoto kunomen kiyokik kupa kupunte moŋosyek tokol kumwaytat lokoywek ce toponec oŋnkusop piko om wulyo tokol wule kipa cekto.
42009007	Yoto kulim Erote poytoyintetap Kalilaya tukuk tokol ce kiyoktos, kusot kupotpoten koromun, omnye kimwowu piko alake kule, “Kokututune met Yowana Potisonintet.’’
42009008	Kumwowu alake kule, “Kukuporkey Eriya.’’ Kumwowu alake kule, “Kokotutune met yec akenke om workoyikap keny.’’
42009009	Kumwoy Erote kule, “Nteyu kyayep ani metitap Yowana, ŋo yec cici olimncini ani ŋalecu yucu?’’ Kumac Erote kule ntakäs Yesu.
42009010	Kuweckey kiyokik oŋnkwokumwoci Yesu tukuk tokol ce kukwiy cekto. Yoto kukwer Yesu cek kwicek nkit kuwuŋat okoy kupunto moŋet nye cekure Pesasayita.
42009011	Ntowo kunket piko kupa kurup neto. Nteye kotoköse Yesu piko, kuŋerekyi oŋnkuŋololyi kumwoci ŋalek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkusop piko ce kimöce kule cisopec.
42009012	Ntowo kupunto kosoleny karik kurarakta asista, kukwa kiyokik co tamanu ok oyeny ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yomis mwoci piko kupecikey, kupa moŋosyek oko soŋwek ce lekitec wokuceŋat wule mokuruy oko wule mokunyorta omik, omnye cemite acek wuli po surukwenoni,’’
42009013	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Okoci akwek nkit kiye mokwam.’’ Kuwekyi kiyokik kumwoci neto kule, “Ceponte acek pate mukatinek mut oko purpurunek oyeny, möce nyi kule cipe acek nkit wokyal omik cepo picu tokol?’’
42009014	Omnye kimite yoto piko ce kirice elifunek mut. Kumwoci Yesu kiyokikyi kule, “Oyiyte piko tokol kopur ŋony, korurukotekey, piko ce puntoy konom.’’
42009015	Kwiy kiyokik kuyunyoto kuyiyta piko tokol kopur ŋony.
42009016	Kunäm Yesu mukatinekey mut oko purpurunek oyeny oŋnkunyal torot, oŋnkukasta Yiyintet kusomnci oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci kiyokikyi kupcici piko.
42009017	Yoto kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis, yoto koruruc kiyokik omik ce kam piko kot kuŋet kunyiy kisok taman ok oyeny.
42009018	Nteye kimite Yesu kusome kwine nkit pesyet ake, yoto kukwa konomik ye kimite neto, Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Mwowu piko kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’
42009019	Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci kule, “Mwowu piko alake kule, yiku nyi Yowana potisonintet, kumwowu alak kule yiku nyi Eriya, nto alak kumwowu kule yiku nyi akenke om workoyikap keny nye kokotutune met.’’
42009020	Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Nto akwek, omwowu akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’ Kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Ŋapanet nyepo Yiyintet!’’
42009021	Yoto kunkolontyi Yesu koromun cekto kumwoci kule, “Monte kot omwoci citake tokol ŋolyontoni.’’
42009022	Kutosyi Yesu yec kumwoy kule, “Misyini citaŋany Weritap cito om tukuk ce caŋ; mosukutay poyik oko tisik cewoyec, oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosicepakäc kume, nteye pesyetap somok ciŋet kotutune met.’’
42009023	Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kule, “Ye möce citake tokol kule anama cepetekey ani, kumisyini kunyilkey nkit, oŋnkutor murtowontenyi pesyosyek tokol oŋnkuco cokunama cepetekey ani.
42009024	Omnye ci nye möce kule osop sopon nyi kupote neto nyoto sopon nyi, nto ci nye kepot sopon nyi omnye kacäma ani, mosukusop neto nyoto sopon nyi.
42009025	Muce ra kunyor cito latik oŋnkocu ye ponto tukuk ce mite koret kumukul oŋnkwarantakey neto nkit?
42009026	Omnye ci tokol nye kelilan om wule omite ani oko ŋalekwani, mosukulilontyi Weritap cito neto nyoto om pesyet nye contoy woyin nyi, oko woyintap Papa oko nyepo malaykanik ce tililec.
42009027	Ntene komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite yuteyu piko alake ce keyoŋ ce puryo kot kucemcem met okoy ye kakäs cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
42009028	Ntowo kupok pesyosyek cerice sisit, kuceke ye kiŋalale Yesu ŋalecato, kukwer Yesu Petero oko Yowana oko Yakopo kupa tulwet parak, kupa cek wokusom.
42009029	Nteyu kimite Yesu kusome kuwälkey tokoynyi, oŋnkuweckey sirokyi kulelakitu kulekececis.
42009030	Yoto pakenke kuporkey neto kuŋolole oko piko alak oyeny, coto ku Moses oko Eriya,
42009031	ce kiporkey om woyinto, oŋnkuŋolole oko Yesu ŋalek ce nöme yisyetap Yiyintet nye mosukuyitita Yesu om Yerusalem.
42009032	Kikiruy kunäm rwonto om yoto Petero oko piko co kipontokey neto, nteye kotowokukösu cekto topon; yoto kukäs woyintap Yesu oko picoto oyeny kukeyoŋ oko neto.
42009033	Nteye kimite Moses oko Eriya kupciykey oko Yesu, kumwoci Petero Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kiy nye topon omnye cemite acek yuteyu, kunyo kany cetec acek kisarinek somok, mokwek akenke nyeŋuŋ, nto ake kupoyit Moses, nto ake kupoyit Eriya.’’ Kiŋalal Petero kumwoy ŋalecato nye kipuryo kot kunkete ŋalek ce mwowu.
42009034	Nteyu kimite Petero tokuŋolole kuco polyet oŋnkulum cek rurwet, kumuyo konomik yukowo kulum polyet.
42009035	Yoto kucone kurset polyet orit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani camanet, nye kweyanemwani olimnci neto.’’
42009036	Ntowo kusis kursonoto, kutok Yesu kumite kwine nkit. Yoto kusisio konomik pesyonoto nye kipuryo kot kumwoci citake tokol kito nye kikäs cekto.
42009037	Nto om pesyetap koyekune, kurekune cek tulwet, yoto kutuye piko ce caŋ Yesu.
42009038	Kukursyo citake nye kimite kwenutap piko kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, osomiŋ ani nyi kule koswo werinyu, omnye lekwemwani nye akenke pate,
42009039	nye nöme oyinoto kunco, oŋnkupirtopirto okoy kukapus pukantet, kunyo kikotaŋany koromun oŋnkukorom kot ye mokwasta lakwar.
42009040	Kyosom mpo kiyokikuk kule kukwetyi neto oyinot, ntene puryo kot komuc kot kukwet.’’
42009041	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Opo! Akwek pikap pintap pesyosyecu ce puryo kot kuponto koyenot! Mosopur ani oko akwek okoy pesyo ne? Mosomuytyocok ani akwek okoy oyu!’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu citap lekwet kule, “Sutu weriŋuŋ kuco yu.’’
42009042	Nteye kimite lekwanato kuconi kunäm oyinoto oŋnkumilci ŋony, oŋnkupirtopirto. Yoto kupolyi Yesu oyinot nye miyat; kusop lekwanato, oŋnkunäm neto kuketyi kwan.
42009043	Kukite Piko tokol woyinto nyepo swametap Yiyintet. Nteye kimite piko tokokite tukuk ce kimite kwiye Yesu, yoto kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule,
42009044	“Alimnte topon ŋalecu, cikwakwek ŋalecutecu monte ceyutye! Mosicenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm swametap piko.’’
42009045	Ntene kipuryo kot kusow yoto konomik kunket ŋalecato, omnye kicewuŋe mente kot konket kule mwowu ne ŋalecato, yoto kunyokoritu cekto ye mokutepe Yesu kule poru ne ŋalecato.
42009046	Yoto kucec konomik kutintentyin kutepekey kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nyewo kupëlis om cekto.’’
42009047	Kunket Yesu ŋalek ce kitintentyini cek om kasoteywekwa. Kunäm lekwa nye miniŋ oŋnkukoci kopure komosnyi.
42009048	Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ci tokol nye katoroc kuŋerekyi lekwani om kaynemwani ku katoroca kuŋerekyo ani neto cicoto; nto ci tokol nye koŋerekyo ani ku koŋerekyi neto nyoto neto nyo kiyokwani, omnye ci nye miniŋ kupëlis om kwenumwakwek ku cito nyoto nyewo.’’
42009049	Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kucekäs acek citake nye kukwete oyik om kayneŋuŋyi, ceyete acek cekerekte cicoto, omnye puryo kot cepontotikey acek oko neto.’’
42009050	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Monte ceyete cekerekte cicoto, omnye ci nye puryo kot kutoyok akwek kunye nyimwoŋ cicoto.’’
42009051	Nteyu kowo kurikta kupunto pesyosyek ce cesute Yesu kuwo torot. Kusot kuwoŋnkyi oŋnkunomen kutokyikey Yerusalem.
42009052	Yoto kuyokto piko alak kupa kuntoye. Kupa picoto okoy wokupunto saŋntap Samariyek kule woceyiytoci Yesu otepto.
42009053	Ntene kutay pikap saŋata moŋerekyi Yesu omnye kiweti kutokyinikey Yerusalem.
42009054	Nteye kotoköse kiyokikyi Yowana oko Yakopo kuyunyoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, mokyec acek nyi kule cekur mata kucone torot cokupel cekto?’’
42009055	Kuwekyikey Yesu cek oŋnkupolyi.
42009056	Yoto kunomen cek kupa okoy saŋnta ake.
42009057	Nteye kimite cek kupeti om aran, kumwoci citake Yesu kule, “Mosanamiŋ ani cepetekey oko nyi om wulyo tokol wule mewo nyi!’’
42009058	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ponto mokoyitinek mwenonik, kuponto toritek co terertoy korikwa wule minye, ntene puryo kot kupunto Weritap cito wule mokowute metinyi.’’
42009059	Kumwoci Yesu citake kule, “Nama nyi cepetekey oko ani.’’ Ntene kumwoy cicoto kule, “Mokoryontet, kany awo kunyo wamuy papanyu.’’
42009060	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Yaste muswek cokipok kumuy muswekwa, ntene nomen nyi iwo wemwaytate lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
42009061	Kumwoy yec citake kule, “Mokoryontet, mosanamiŋ ani cepetekey oko nyi, ntene kany awo kunyo womwoci cemutakwey piko co mite ka.’’
42009062	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Puryo ci nye ye kanäme yewunyi mukonketap yeyik kupotis, oŋnkukäs yec let nye yeme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
42010001	Yoto om letutap ŋaleca, kukwey Mokoryontet Yesu piko alak tomonwokik tisap ok oyeny oŋnkuyokto kuntoye kupetate oyeny oyeny kupa moŋosyek tokol oko komoswokik tokol om wule kimöce Yesu kule sawo om letut.
42010002	Kumwoci Yesu picoto kule, “Wo koromun yisyetap kisisyet, ntene ŋeri pate piko co kisisyi, kunyo osom Mokoryontetap kisisyet sukuŋet kuyokto kisik alak kupa kisisyenyi.
42010003	Ape, koyoktok ani kuyu lekokap kecirek ce kapa kwenutap suyik.
42010004	Monte cenamate munyenku nyepo pesan, nto lol nyepo omit, nto kweyonik, ntene monte cisupay citake tokol om aran.
42010005	Nto koto ake tokol nye konyosye owut orit, omwowu kule, ‘Kopur kalyet koyi!’
42010006	Nteye mite yoto citake nye ponto kalyet, mosukunyor cicoto kalyemwoŋ, nteye puryo kot kumite yoto, mosukukketkey kalyet wule omit akwek.
42010007	Opurene koyoto, oŋnkoyomisye oŋnkoye kiy ake tokol nye kacekonok, omnye misyini ci nye yiyisyi kunyor musyarenyi. Monte ceŋete koyoto oŋnkape yec wowut koto ake.
42010008	Nteye kopunte moŋet ake tokol oŋnkuŋerekyok piko, oyam kiy ake tokol nye kacekonok.
42010009	Osop piko tokol ce cemnyontos om wuloto; oŋnkumwoci piko kule, ‘Korikyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’
42010010	Nteye kupunte moŋet ake tokol, oŋnkutay moŋerekyok piko, ape opunte orustunwek ce punte moŋonoto, oŋnkumwowu kule, ‘Puryo kiy nye mokyiwok acek akwek.
42010011	Kunyo mocipukwok tertit nyi kanäm kerenkokyacek om moŋemwoŋ, ntene möce oŋnket ŋolyontoni kule, korikyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’
42010012	Komwowok ani akwek kule, om pesyet nye cemute musankut, mosukukaykay Yiyintet musankut nyepo Sotom kupël moŋonoto!’’
42010013	“Oyey! Mesepur kwapi nyi Korasin! Oyey! Mesepur kwapi mpenyi Pesasayita! Omnye nto kitukuk cepo kakitat co kiciwuŋ nyi kuce kicici coto Tiro oko Siton nto kikopur keny pikap wuloto ŋony, oŋnkulac sirok sarkatinek oŋnkuwastekey arek kupor kule karenynkey cek om miyotyonikwa.
42010014	Mosukukaykay Yiyintet musankut nyepo Tiro oko Siton om pesyetap Musankut kupëlok akwek.
42010015	Nto mpenyi Kapernaum! Kimöce nyi kule osutkey awo torot? Mosicewirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise!’’
42010016	Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ci tokol nye kolimwok akwek konomikwani; kulimwo ani cicoto, nto ci tokol nye katayak akwek, kutoyo mpo ani cicoto, nto ci nye toyo, kukatay cicoto neto nyo kiyokwo ani.’’
42010017	Yoto kuweckey piko co kitomonwokik tisap ok oyeny kuponto ŋerekwek ce caŋ, oŋnkwokumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, kulimwec mpo acek oyik ye kucepolyi om Kayneŋuŋ!’’
42010018	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kyakäs ani Setani kosuwune torot kuyu ilet.
42010019	Olim pa! Kwokonok ani ani kamukeywek ce omuci atyic erenoy, oko keneyisyek; oŋnkotirtir swamet tokol nyepo puniyontet, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot komuce kot kunyerenak akwek.
42010020	Ntene monte ceŋerec omnye kolimwok akwek oyik, ntene aŋerec pate omnye silotin kaynokwok om wulin po torot.’’
42010021	Om yoto pakenke kunyor Yesu ŋerekwekap swametap Muyet Nyetilil kumwoy kule, “Ayi Papa, okostiŋ ani nyi Mokoryontetap torot oko koret, omnye kiwuŋe nyi tukucu piko ce ŋomec oko ce sumonotin, oŋnkiporci piko ce minkec. Yunyoto Papa, kiyiy kuyunyoto omnye kikwey ŋerekyi nyi nkit.
42010022	Kikono Papa tukuk tokol, kunyo puryo ci nye nkete kule Werit ku ŋo, toskoy pate Papa nye nkete, oŋnkupuryo mpo ci nye nkete kule Papa ku ŋo, toskoy pate Werit nye nkete oko ci nyo kakwey Werit kule aparte.’’
42010023	Yoto kuwekyikey Yesu konomik; oŋnkuŋololyi möt kumwoci kule, “Ponto kupeyoy konyek ceköse tukuk ceyucu oköse akwek.
42010024	Komwowok ani akwek kule, caŋ workoyik oko kinkonik ce kimöce kule nto cekäs tukuk ceyucutecu oköse akwek, ntene kipuryo kot komuc cek kot kukäs, nto kule celim ceyucutecu olim akwek, ntene kipuryo kot kulim.’’
42010025	Yoto kuŋet kuyo konetintet ake nyepo ntarastinek, oŋnkulot kutepe Yesu kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, mosayiy ne ani ye saŋet anyoru soponto nyemo poku?’’
42010026	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Kicesil kulene om ntarastinek? Sumoni nyi mwowu kulene?’’
42010027	Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Misyini cäm Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol, oko soponŋuŋ tokol oko swameŋuŋ tokol, oko kasoteywekuk tokol, oŋnkicäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
42010028	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Kewec topon, iwo weyiy kuyunyoto mesenyoru soponto.’’
42010029	Omnye kimöce cicoto kule ayetkey onyolu kutepe neto Yesu kule, “Latyemwani ku ŋo?’’
42010030	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule. “Kinomene citake Yerusalem kurekto kuwo Yeriko, kunyor corik om aran ce kiporye kunumene sirok, onŋkupir neto koromun, oŋnkupakakta kumilekey karik kume.
42010031	Kuwete kurekte aranato mpo yec tisintet ake, nteye kotoköse cicoto kumur aret tapan.
42010032	Kuco yec Lefintet om aranato okoy kupun yoto kimite cicoto, nteye kotoköse kumur mpene aret tapan.
42010033	Ntene kuco Samariyantet ake nye kiweti pan nyi om aranato okoy kupun yoto kimite cicoto, nteye kotoköse kurire kukalya koromun.
42010034	Kuwo okoy ye kimite cicoto, oŋnkunäm oŋnkuyile mwayita oko finyonik oŋnkurotyi mwoyokyi, oŋnkunäm kulany sikiryenyi oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto kotap toyek wokunyaye wuloto.
42010035	Ntowo kuyec koret om pesyetap oyeny, kunum silinkinek oyeny oŋnkukoci cito nye ripe kotap toyek oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Nyay cici, nteye kenyaye kot kutil tukuk cu kokoniŋ ani, mosucoyokuŋ ye kaweckey.’ ’’
42010036	Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Ŋo om picoto somok nye soti kule kilatyetap cicoto kipire corik?’’
42010037	Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Neto cito nyo kikwici cicoto tukuk ce toponec.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Mpenyi iwo weyiy kuyunyoto.’’
42010038	Nteye kimite Yesu oko konomikyi kupeti panmwa, yoto kukwa okoy kupun kayta ake, kuŋerekyi korket ake nye cekure Marisa neto oŋnkupay.
42010039	Kiponto korkonoto cekwam nye cekure Mariyam nye kipure yepo kerenkokap Mokoryontet Yesu kulimntoy ŋalek ce kimwowu.
42010040	Yoto kutaŋany Marisa yisyonutek ce kimite kwiye, kuco ye mite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot köse nyi kule kokwoso ani yeyamwani ayiy yisyonutek nkit? Mwoci kuco cokukalya ani!’’
42010041	Kuwekyi Mokoryontet kumwoci kule, “Marisa, Marisa! Soti nyi koromun, oŋnkitaŋänkey om tukuk ce caŋ,
42010042	ntene ce möce kiy akenke pate. Kunyo kakwey Mariyam kiyoto topon nye komocimuce kot cinumune neto.’’
