42011001	Kimite Yesu pesyet ake kusome om yeto ake, nteyu kowo kusom kot kuwany; kumwoci konomintenyi ake neto kule, “Mokoryontet, netec acek wule cesomntoy kuyu wulo kinetitoy Yowana konomikyi.’’
42011002	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ye some, omwowu kule: ‘Papa, kante-ciywey kutililit kayneŋuŋ, kante kuco poytoyisyeŋuŋ.
42011003	konec acek omikyo ce cemöce pesyosyek tokol.
42011004	kalyec acek miyotyonikyo, kuyu wulo cikolyoy acek co lele om wule ce mite acek, ntene mesutec royenec wule mite syemutok.’ ’’
42011005	Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ŋo om akwek nye ye ponto corwenyi, oŋnkuweci ye kopunto komoy kwen wokumwoci kule, ‘Corwenyu, peseno mukatinek somok.
42011006	Omnye kacontyo tontet nye corwenyu ntene moponte kiy nye mokoci kwam.’
42011007	Kuwec nyin om koto orit kumwoy kule, ‘Mente ataŋany ani! Omnye kaceker kurket, kunyi kaceruye acek tokol oko lekok om kwiririt, puryo kot tomuci aŋet cokoniŋ kiy.’
42011008	Komwowok ani kule, nka kot kupuryo kot kuŋet cicoto cokukoci nyin tukuk ce komöce omnye corwenyi, ntene ye kosomso cicoto nye puryo kot kulilone kupunto muyot, mosukuŋet nyin kuco cokukoci kiy ake tokol nye kosome.
42011009	Kunyo komwowok ani kule: Osom mosicekonok, aceny, mosonyoru, okonykony, mosiceyotwok kurket.
42011010	Omnye ci tokol nye some, mosicikoci, nto ci nye cenye, mosukunyor; mpene neto cito nyo konykonye mosiceyotyi,
42011011	Ci ŋo om akwek nye ye papa nyepo lekoy nye ye kosom lekwenyi purpuryo kukoci erenet ye ketekocini purpuryontet?
42011012	Nto kukoci lekwenyi keneyontet ye kosom mekeyontet?
42011013	Kunyo nteye oŋnket akwek piko cu oyiku miyotec okoci lekokwok tukuk ce toponec, ku aret cetya nyun ce muce kukoci Papa nyepo torot Muyet Nyetilil piko ce kosom!’’
42011014	Kukwet Yesu om yoto oyinot nye kiponto cito nye kinämakay kutit, nteye kowo kuwecikey oyinoto, kucec kuŋalal cicoto, yoto kukite piko koromun.
42011015	Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Yiyisye neto Pelsepul nyewo nyepo oyik sukuŋet kukwet oyik.’’
42011016	Yoto kusyem piko alake kumac kule kokonec Yesu pelutyet nye cone torot.
42011017	Ntene kunket Yesu kasoteywekwa, kumwoci cek kule: “Poytoyisyo ake tokol nye pciykey oŋnkuporyekey nkit komuce nyo kupot, nto koto ake tokol nye pciyekey oŋnkuporyekey nkit kulule koyoto.
42011018	Kunyo nteye pciyat Setani onkuporyekey nkit, kuyonye kulene poytoyisyenyi? Omnye omwowu akwek kule oyiyisye ani Pelsepul saŋet amuc akwet oyik.
42011019	Nteye oyiyisye ani Pelsepul saŋet amuc akwet oyik, kunyo yiyisye ŋo pikwakwek sukuŋet kukwet oyik? Kunyo cekto ce mosukomutwok akwek musankut.
42011020	Nteye oyiyisye ani swametap Yiyintet saŋet akwek oyik, kuporkey manta kule kucontyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
42011021	Ye Ponto cito swama oko karik ce ripe kanyi, kuripotin oŋnkukonorotin tukukyi topon.
42011022	Ntene ye kaco citake nye ponto swamet kupël nyenyi oŋnkuporye kot kupël cicoto, mosukunumune karik co kekenekey oŋnkusut kupör tukukap cicoto.
42011023	Ci tokol nye puryo kot cepontekey oko ani, ku cito nyoto nye toyo ani, nto mpo cito nye puryo kot cirurukisyi tukway oko ani, ku cito nyoto nye serete.’’
42011024	“Ye kowete oyinoto nye miyat cito, mosukuwesetot kupunte koret wule puryo peko kuceŋoti wule möce kule komuŋe, nteye puryo kot kunyor, mosukumwoy nkit kule, ‘Mosaketitekey ani awo konyu nyo kyocone.’
42011025	Mosukuketkey kuco, nteye kocokunyor kicipuc oŋnkyesat topon.
42011026	Yoto mosukuwo wokukwer oyik alak tisap ce miyotec kupël neto, kukwa oŋnkwokowut orit oŋnkumiŋis wuloto; mosukuwur yoto kopurtap cicoto nyepo letut kupël wule kiyunto kopurnyi nyo kipo kunyo.’’
42011027	Nteye kimite Yesu kumwowu ŋalecato, kukurune korket ake kwenutap piko kumwoci Yesu kule, “Ŋerekat nye ponto kupeyoy moyet nye kiyiŋ nyi, oko kitik ce kireri nyi!’’
42011028	Ntene kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Topon ye kocemwoy kule, Ŋerekotin kuponto kupeyok piko co lime ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkurip!’’
42011029	Nteye kimite piko korurucekey wanak, kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Pikap pini kuce piko cepo pinta nye miyat! Omnye tepe cek pelutyet, ntene puryo pelutyet nye mocikoci, tos pate palutyetap Yona.
42011030	Kuyu Yona nye kikwek pelutyetap pikap Nenefi, Kuyunyoto musokwek Weritap cito pelutyetap pikap pini.
42011031	Om pesyetap musankut, mosukuyo korko nye Kinko nye cone koretap tö oŋnkuwosontyi pikap pini, oŋnkomutyi musankut kulot cekto, omnye kicone korkono tapantap koret kule cakäs ŋomnonetap Solomon; kunyo möce akäs akwek kule mite yu nyewo nye pële Solomon.
42011032	Om pesyetap musankut, mosukuyoŋ pikap Nenefi, oŋnkumutyi musankut pikap pini, omnye kirenynkey cek pikap Nenefi kwasta miyotyonikwa om ŋalek ce kimwoci Yona. Kunyo möce akäs akwek kule, mite yu nyewo nye pële Yona!’’
42011033	“Puryo ci nye pele tarit oŋnkutore wule wuŋat, nto kukupuye pesenit, ntene tore kito nye yoŋe tarit, sukuŋet piko co kwoni ko kukäs lakweyet.
42011034	Koŋnta nyeŋuŋ kunye taritap porto nyeŋuŋ. Ye topon koŋnta nyeŋuŋ, mpo porto nyeŋuŋ tokol kuponto lakweyet, ntene ye miyat koŋnta nyeŋuŋ, mpo porto nyeŋuŋ tokol kuponto menonet.
42011035	Möce ripkey oŋnkikäs kule lakweyinto nyo ponte nyi kunye puryo kot ku menonet.
42011036	Kunyo ye ponto porto nyeŋuŋ tokol lakweyet nye puryo kot kuponto kereryantet ake menonet, mosukwek porto nyeŋuŋ tokol nye ponto lakweyet kuyu wule loytoy tarit nye loye topon kukwenyiŋ nyi lakweyet.’’
42011037	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Yesu okoy kuwany. Kukur Farasoyintet ake Yesu wokwomis tukway om kanyi. Kuwo Yesu oŋnkuwokopur ŋony kwomis.
42011038	Kukite Farasoyintonoto yu kowo kukäs kule komis Yesu nye puryo kot kowun yewuniyekyi.
42011039	Yoto kumwoci Mokoryontet Yesu neto kule, “Po manta kule akwek Farasayek! Osite topon cikomponik oko saninek saŋ, ntene om montuwokwok orit kunyitotin nyapanatet oko miyotyet.
42011040	Akwek solonocu! Yiyintet nyo kikwiye saŋ kupuryo kot ku neto nye kikwiye mpo orit?
42011041	Ntene okoyite akwek kokotutek cepo tukuk ce kwone montuwokwok orit, sukuŋet kutililitu mpo tukuk tokol om wule omite akwek.
42011042	“Ntene omite kwapi akwek Farasayek! Omnye okocini Yiyintet akenke nyepo taman cepo nkuyek alak tokol, kuyu munyanyinek oko mutunkurunek, ntene oŋnkoyaste morwoc topon, oŋnkotay mocäm Yiyintet. Roke oyiye coto, ntene monte kot ayaste tukuk alak.
42011043	“Omite kwapi akwek Farasayek! Omnye ocöme ŋecerok ce kweyotin ce mite kotapkok, oŋnkyiyweyak cisupayak topon om moteponik.
42011044	Omite akwek kwapi, omnye okerkeyekey mwenonik ce kicetupci piko ce puryo kot kutoku ce tyikoti piko nye menkete.’’
42011045	Kuwekyi konetintet ake nyepo ntarastinek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, ye kemwowu nyi ŋaleca kukecupec mpo acek.’’
42011046	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Omite kwapi mpo akwek konetikap ntarastinek! Omnye otorcini piko terekok ce nyikisec ce puryo kot komuce kot kutor, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot onöme akwek morin terkocoto!
42011047	Omite akwek kwapi! Omnye kipakäc mpo kukomwoŋ workoyik; atec akwek kunyol mwenonik co kicetupci cekto.
42011048	Oyiku akwek muncururwanikap ŋalecutecu, omnye ocöme akwek nkit ŋalecato kikwiye mpo kukomwoŋ, kipakäc cek workoyik, atec akwek mwenonik co kicetupci.
42011049	Kunyo om ŋelecutecu, kumwoy ŋomnonetap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosoyokte ani workoyik oko kiyokik alak kupa wule mite cekto, mosukupar cek alak om picoto, oŋnkutaŋany alak.’
42011050	Kunyo mosicitaŋany pikap pintap pesyosyecu kuyok korotikap workoyik co kicepakäc kupok kuceke ye kicitany koret.
42011051	Kuceke korotikap Apel okoy korotikap Sakariya nyo kiceporci kwenutap otepto nye cepele korosek oko otepto nyetilil. Komwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosicitaŋany pikap pintap pesyosyecu om ŋalecato tokol!
42011052	“Omite akwek kwapi konetikap ntarastinek! Omnye kyokonor akwek funkuwet nyo yote kotap ŋomnonet; oŋnkupuryo kot awut akwek orit, ntene oŋnkokerekte piko alak ce syeme kule ciwut orit!’’
42011053	Nteye kinomene Yesu om wuloto, kunyer koromun Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek, kutepe cek Yesu om swama ŋalek ce caŋ;
42011054	kusyem kule cetec neto sukuŋet cenäm om ŋolyo ake tokol nye cone kutinyi nye miyat nye mosukumwoy.
42012001	Koruruckey om yoto piko elifunek ce caŋ koromun, okoy kutyickey cek nkit. Kunyosyo Yesu kuŋololyi kumwoci kule, “Oripkey mumarekap Farasayek ce kaperperot cekto.
42012002	Omnye puryo kiy nye yelat yawut nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok, oŋnkupuryo kiy nye wuŋat yawut nyemo ciporu koyin kutok.
42012003	Kunyo nka mpo ŋalek ce kyoŋolole wule wuŋat, mosicelim coto ye pet kwen; mpo ŋalek co kyocome korik orit, mosicemwayta cekurte korik kisyek.’’
42012004	“Komwowok ani akwek coronutekwani kule, monte ciywey piko co poköce porto nkit, nto om letut kupuryo kot komuce kwiy kito ake tokol nye miyat.
42012005	Kunyo mosoporwok ani cito nye roke aywey akwek. Aywey Yiyintet nyo ye kapakäc kuponto kamukeywek kuwirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise. Kunyoto nye omwowok ani akwek kule aywey neto.
42012006	Puryo kot kyole cek titiyinek mut tampuranik oyeny? Nto om konyekap Yiyintet kupuryo kot ceyutye cek mpo akenke?
42012007	Nka mpo putekap metewokwok kiciyit tokol. Kunyo monte cemuye, omnye oponte akwek latik ce caŋ koromun kupël titiyinek ce caŋ.’’
42012008	“Komwowok ani akwek kule, ci tokol nye kaŋalal kutor om wule mite piko kule oyiku nyimwani, mosukuparta kutor Weritap cito neto nyoto koyin om taytap malaykanikap Yiyintet.
42012009	Ntene ci tokol nye katay maŋalal kuparta ani Weritap cito om wule mite piko, mosicetay mociparta neto nyoto koyin om konyekap malaykanikap Yiyintet.
42012010	“Mosicikalya ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Weritap cito ntene puryo kot cimuce kot cikalya mpo kisic ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Muyet Nyetilil.
42012011	Nteye kocekwerok akwek wocewosontyok om korikapkok nto om taytap piko co ponto kamukeywek, nto om taytap poyik, monte cisot kule mosiceŋalal kulene, nto kule mosicemwowu ne ye ceyetekey.
42012012	Omnye mosukunetak akwek Muyet Nyetilil om yoto ŋalek ce mosomwowu.’’
42012013	Kuŋalal citake om kwenutap piko kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mwoci yeyamwani cepcicine oko ani tukuk ce kipokokwec acek Papanyo.’’
42012014	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Corwenyu, ŋo nye kikono ani oyiku ketintemwoŋ nto pciyintemwoŋ?’’
42012015	Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kule, “Akäste, oripkey akwek wule mite corokyinot ake tokol, omnye nka kot kuponto cito mokoryonti nye tya, kupuryo kot kumuce kokoci cicoto tukucoto ponto soponto.’’
42012016	Kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconi kule, “Kiponto mokoryontet ake mparenyi nye kiyiwu kurur topon koromun,
42012017	kusot om moyenyi nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Mosayiy ne ani? Omnye puryo kot oponte wule mokisyi omikyu cu tokol.’
42012018	Kumwoy nkit kule mosayiy kule, ‘Mosoput cokenikwani aŋnkatec alak cewoyec, saŋet akonore wuloto omikwani tokol oko tukukwani alak;
42012019	nto kapok omwowu nkit om moyenyu kule, ponte nyi tukuk ce caŋ ce konorotin ce mosukuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ, kunyo muny, yesye, yomisye, oŋnkiŋerec.’
42012020	Ntene kumwoci Yiyintet cicoto kule, ‘Nyi perperyani! Om kwomwowuni po yawut, mosicinumuneniŋ soponŋuŋ, kunyo mosukupoyit ŋo tukuk coto kikonor nyi?’
42012021	Kuyunyoto wule yunto om wule mite cito nye konorkyinikey mokoryonti, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot ku mokoryo om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
42012022	Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Yunyoto omne saŋet ani omwowok akwek kule, monte cisot soponwekwok kule mosikyam ne, nto kule mosicilac ne.
42012023	Omnye pële soponto omik, oŋnkupële porto sirok.
42012024	Akäs pa pkukinek ce puryo kot kukolsyi nto kukisis, ce puryo kot kuponto wule konore omik nto mpo cokenik, ntene oŋnkupoye Yiyintet cekto! Oponte akwek latik ce caŋ kupël toritek!
42012025	Ŋo om akwek nye ye komuy oŋnkusot koromun ce nöme sopon nyi; nye muce kot kutosyi kucaŋit kenyisyek alak cepo sopon nyi?
42012026	Kunyo nteye puryo kot omuci akwek kot ayiy kiy nye kisic nye yunyo; omne sasoti akwek ce nöme tukuk alak?
42012027	Akäs pa kuyu wule pititoy taptok om koret, puryo kot kwiyisyi oŋnkupuryo kot kunope sirok ce loce. Ntene komwowok ani akwek kule, nka mpo Solomon om woyintap mokoryontit nye kiponto, kipuryo kot kulocekey neto topon kuyu akenke om toptocu.
42012028	Kunyo, nteye muce Yiyintet kot kulac suswek ce mite koret pesyoni nto mite tun cewirci mata kuloy, ku aret ce tya nyun ce muce kulacak akwek Yiyintet? Oyiku akwek pic ce ponto koyenet nye kisic pate!
42012029	Kunyo monte ceceny kiye mosoyam nto ce mosoye, monte cisot.
42012030	Omnye cenye mpo pikap koret tokol tukucutecu: ntene om wule omite akwek, nkete Papamwoŋ kule omöce akwek tukucutecu.
42012031	Kunyo onyosye aceny oŋnkokoci kunyor soponwekwok poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, sukuŋet cetoswok akwek tukucutecu.’’
42012032	“Monte cemuye akwek luket nyi miniŋ! Omnye ŋerekat Papamwoŋ kokonok akwek poytoyisyet.
42012033	Oyalye tukukwok oŋnkokoci pononik pesanik, oŋnkokonorkyikey akwek munyenkutap pesanik nye puryo kot kuyositu kupunto, okonore mokoryontinekwok torot wule puryo kot kurice corik oŋnkupuryo kot kwome solopik.
42012034	Omnye wule mitowune mokoryontinekwok ku wuloto wule mitowune mukuleywekwok.’’
42012035	“Omotyi sirokwok suwe, oŋnkoyaste tarinekwok kuloytos;
42012036	akerkeyitu pic ce mite kukonye mokoryontemwa nye mosukuwecekey kucone sakwetap komütisyet, nteye kaweckey neto oŋnkukonykony kurket kuyotyini lakwar.
42012037	Ponto kupeyoy mutworik co ye kaco mokoryontemwa cokunyor cekto kumite kukösu kukenisyi! Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuco cicoto wo; oŋnkucokulackey oŋnkusat cek kopur ŋony topon oŋnkupoyis.
42012038	Ponto kupeyoy mutworik ce ye kaco nyewo panta nyepo oyeny ye komoy kwen oko panta nyepo somok ye kerir koret cokunyor cekto kumite kuyunyoto.
42012039	Möce oŋnket akwek topon kule, ntenkete citap koto sawet nye cone corintet nto puryo kot komuce cicoto kupapakta konyi kuput oŋnkowut orit corintet.
42012040	Kunyo mpo akwek misyini oyiytekey, omnye mosukuco Weritap cito om sawet nyo puryo kot osotyini akwek kule muce kucone.’’
42012041	Kumwoy Petero kule, “Mokoryontet, mwowec acek nkit tyonkoconi nto mwocini mpo piko tokol?’’
42012042	Kuwekyi Mokoryontet Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mwowo ani pa, ŋo mutworin nye cikenekey oŋnkuŋom? Nyoto kunye ye kokukoci mokoryontenyi kurip yisyonutekap kanyi tokol, kupcicini pikap yisyet omikwa om pesyet nyo cemokyini.
42012043	Ponto kupeyoy mutworintonoto nye ye kaco mokoryontenyi cokunyor neto kwiye yisyenyi kuyunyoto.
42012044	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuco mokoryontet oŋnkukoci mutworintonoto kupayta tukukyi tokol.
42012045	Ntene ye kumwoy mutworintet om moyenyi kule, tokulow ye mosukuco mokoryontenyu, oŋnkucec kupir piko moronik oko koruk co yiyisyi, oŋnkwomis oŋnkuyesyo kupokit,
42012046	mosukupun mokoryontenyi om pesyet nyo puryo kot kusotyini, oŋnku om sawet nye puryo kot kunket neto, oŋnkunäm mutworintonoto kuyepune oyeny, oŋnkuwunukyi kunyor taŋanynta wanak oko piko co puryo kot kucömisyi.
42012047	“Nto mutworin nye nkete ce möce mokoryontenyi kule kwiy neto; oŋnkupuryo kot kusat nto kwiy kuyu wule moktoy mokoryontet, mosicepas neto nyoto korokonik ce caŋ.
42012048	Ntene mutworin nyo puryo kot kunket ce moce mokoryontenyi oŋnkwiy ce roke ce pase, mosicepas neto nyoto korokonik ce ŋeri. Nto ci tokol nyo kicikoci ce caŋ, mosicemake neto nyoto koyin ce caŋ, nto cito nyo kicikoci kurip tukuk ce caŋ, mosicemake neto nyoto koyin ce caŋ kutil coto.’’
42012049	“Kyaco ani cowirci mata koret, kunyo nto nkonkuyunyi kumite kuloye!
42012050	Oponte patisanet nye mosicepatisana, kunyo mataŋany okoy koyin awany!
42012051	Komwowok ani akwek kule, osoti kule kyaco asutu kalyet? Puryo kot kuyunyo, ntene kyosutu pate pciyatet!
42012052	Kuceke yawut mosukupciykey piko mutu cepo koto akenke, kutay piko co somok piko co oyeny, kutay piko co oyeny piko co somok.
42012053	Mosukupciykey kwan oko werit, kupciykey werit oko kwan. Kupciykey kamet oko cepto, kupciykey cepto oko kamet, kupciykey kametitap werit oko korketap werinyi, kupciykey korketap werit oko kametitap santenyi.’’
42012054	Kuwekyikey Yesu piko oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye kokäs akwek polik kumite raraktay, yoto omwowu akwek lakwar kule mosukuropen koret, kuyuyit nyoto kuropen koret.
42012055	Nteye kokäs kuwuse yomet nye cone tö, omwowu kule, mosukulay asista, kuyuyit nyoto kulay asista.
42012056	Akwek koperperoticu! Yu oŋnket akwek okäs wule yunto tukuk ce mokwiyokis om koret parak, omne yu puryo kot omuci kot oŋnket ŋalek ce yiyoktos om pesyosyecu?’’
42012057	“Kunyo omne yu puryo kot omuci akwek kot orwoc nkit okoy oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta ce roke oyiy?
42012058	Ye kowosontyiŋ citake kukweriŋ koti, syem koromun aŋalal olimncine oko cicoto ye tomite opeti om aran, oŋnkowany ŋalekwok, mente kot kukweriŋ okoy wule mite ketintet, kuŋet nyo kuratiŋ kukoytiŋ iwo wule mite sikarek, kuŋet co kukertiŋ mopusi.
42012059	Komwowuŋ kule puryo kot muci nyi cone mopusi mpo kisic okoy konu pesanik tokol.’’
42013001	Kimite pesyosyecoto piko alak ce kimwoci cek Yesu ŋalek ce nöme pikap Kalilaya, ce kipar Pilato kupok oŋnkulinyo korotikwa oko korosekwa ye kimite cek kukoyitoy korosekwa.
42013002	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Osoti akwek kule kiponto picoto miyotyonik kusir piko alak tokol ce kimite Kalilaya omnye kicitaŋany kuyunyoto?
42013003	Puryo kot kuyunyo! Komwowok ani akwek kule, ye puryo kot arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok, mosoyaran opoku mpo akwek tokol kuyu wule kyaranta kupok picoto.
42013004	Nto osoti akwek kule piko co ki taman ok sisit co kilulyi koto om Siloam kupakäc kupok kuce piko ce kilelotin kusir piko alak tokol ce kiminye Yerusalem?
42013005	Puryo kot kuyunyo! Komwowok ani akwek kule ye puryo kot arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok, mosoyaran opoku mpo akwek kuyu wule kyaranta kupok picoto.’’
42013006	Kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkoconi kule, “Kiponto citake mokoywenyi nye kiwu rotinyi, kuco pesyet ake kule cakäs nto kukwiy omik, yoto puryo kot cokunyorta kiy.
42013007	Kumwoci cicoto kopotintet kule, ‘Kenyitap somok nyi aconi ani kule cekäs omikap mokoywoni, ntene puryo kot onyortoy kiy; kunyo yep kulul! Omne sokowurta kwam teŋek pate?’
42013008	Kuwekyi kopotintet kumwoci cicoto kule, ‘Mokoryontet, yaste kopur kenyini pate okoy opotyi ani omutu oŋnkokoci puresik.
42013009	Nteye kayiy omik om pesyosyek co kwoni; kunyol kutoponit nteye puryo, yep yoto kulul.’ ’’
42013010	Kimite Yesu kunetisyi ye kipesyetap Sapat om kotapkokwet ake.
42013011	Kimite yoto korket ake nye kinäm oyinoto kumnyan kusyen kuwany kenyisyek taman ok sisit nye kiyim pate nye puryo kot komuce kot kuculkey mpo kisic.
42013012	Ntowo kukäs Yesu korkonoto, kukur kuco ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Cepyosyani, kacityaceniŋ nyi rewonoteŋuŋ!’’
42013013	Kukemer Yesu yewuniyekyi korkonoto, yoto pakenke kuŋet kuyo oŋnkuculkey oŋnkucec kukasta Yiyintet.
42013014	Yoto kunerec nyewo nye poytoy kotapkok, omnye kisopis Yesu om pesyetap Sapat. Kumwoci cicoto piko kule, “Mite pesyosyek co lö co misyini ciyisye yisyonutek, kunyo okwoni kwocisopok om pesyosyecoto. Ntene monte cekwoni ye pesyetap Sapat.’’
42013015	Kuwekyi Mokoryontet kumwoci cicoto kule, “Akwek koperperoticu! Puryo kot kutyoce citake tokol om akwek yeyinyi nto sikiryenyi kutyace pewut ye pesyetap Sapat oŋnkukwer kuwo wokuye peko?
42013016	Kunyo akäs pa korkoni nye mucokoretap Apram, nye kirat Setani neto kuwany kenyisyek taman ok sisit, kupuryo kot kumisyini cityokyi neto porokyi ye pesyetap Sapat?’’
42013017	Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato, kulilonis punikyi, ntene kuŋerec piko alake tokol om tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto.
42013018	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kerkey poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko kiy ne? Mosoyuyite ani kiy ne?
42013019	Kerkey oko kupuswontetap ketit nye cekure kalitarit nye kinäm citake oŋnkukol mparenyi, kupit okoy kuwoyit kwek ket nyewo, kukwa toritek kwokutec korikwa sarisyekap ketoto.’’
42013020	Kumwoy Yesu yec kule, “Mosoyuyite ani ne poytoyisyetap Yiyintet?
42013021	Kerkey oko mumarek ce kinäm korket ake oŋnkutankwar oko pusyekap nkanuk cepo tepenik somok kukut kunyiy tokol.’’
42013022	Kunomen Yesu kuwo kupunte moŋosyek oko soŋwek kunetisyoti om pan nyi ye kiweti Yerusalem.
42013023	Kutepe citake neto kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋeri so pate piko ce mocisop?’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule,
42013024	“Otitir osyem koromun opunte kurket nye maric; omnye komwowok ani kule, caŋ piko ce mosukusyem kule ciwut orit, ntene puryo kot komuce cekto kot kowut.
42013025	Ye kotepe kot kuŋet citap koto oŋnkuker kurkenyi, oŋnkoyoŋe akwek saŋ oŋnkokonykony kurket omwowu kule, ‘Mokoryontet, yotwec acek kurket!’ Mosukuwekwok kumwoy kule, ‘Puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek, okwone ono?’
42013026	Yoto mosowec akwek omwowu kule, ‘Kikyomisyi acek wanak oko nyi, oŋnkinetisye nyi soŋwekyacek.’
42013027	Mosukuwekwok yec cicoto kumwowok kule, ‘Puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek, okwone ono? Aŋete taymwani akwek cu oyiye ŋalek ce miyotec!’
42013028	Tya yoto nyun rirek oko nyiyetap kelak ye kokäs akwek Apram oko Isaka oko Yakopo oko workoyik kumite cek wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec omite akwek kacekwetyok saŋ!
42013029	Mosukukwane piko koŋasis oko raraktay oko makentany oko tö oŋnkwokopure yepo meset om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
42013030	Kunyo möce okäs kule piko co mite yawut letut kuce mosukwokupoyit tayta, nto piko co mite yawut tayta kuce mosukwokupoyit letut.’’
42013031	Yoto pakenke kukwa Farasayek alake wule kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋet wete wuli, nomen wecikey poninekuk, omnye möce Erote kule apakäciŋ nyi.’’
42013032	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ape womwoci mokoytina kule, ‘Mosakwet ani oyik oŋnkosop porwonik pesyoni oko pesyetap tun, nteye pesyetap somok awany yisyemwani.’
42013033	Ntene misyino awo poninekwani pesyoni oko pesyetap tun oko pesyetap koyin, omnye puryo kot komukoktos cepar kumeci workoyonto saŋ, nye puryo kot ku Yerusalem orit.
42013034	Opo! Yerusalem! Yerusalem! Nyi nyi poköci workoyik, oŋnkiwire rwontok piko co kiciyok kukwa wule mite nyi, om aret ce tya ye kyamac ani kule oruruc lekokuk kukwa wule omite ani, kuyu wulo ruruktoy nkokyet lekokyi korurukyi kepepokyi orit, ntene toyisye nyi.
42013035	Käs pa kacepokokwok komwoŋ kwek kiratya. Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, puryo kot toköso ani akwek okoy pesyet nye mosomwowu kule, ‘Ponto kupeyoy neto nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet.’ ’’
42014001	Nteye kipesyetap Sapat, kuwo Yesu wokwomis omik om kotap Farasoyintet ake nye kipoytoyin. Yoto kurip piko kukäs Yesu topon koromun.
42014002	Kimite yoto po taytap Yesu citake nye kikokwa porto tokol.
42014003	Yoto kuwekyikey Yesu Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek oŋnkutepe cek kule, “Cöme ra ntarastinek cisop cito ye pesyetap Sapat nto puryo?’’
42014004	Kusisio cek. Kunäm Yesu cicoto oŋnkusop oŋnkumwoci kuwecikey.
42014005	Oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Ye ponto citake om akwek werinyi nto yeyinyi oŋnkusuci kurumnco ye pesyetap Sapat, kupuryo kot kuweti lakwar wokocut ye pesyetap Sapat?’’
42014006	Yoto kupurune cekto kuwec ŋalecato.
42014007	Nteyu kowo kukäs Yesu toyek ce kikweye oteputek ce tokunotin cepo tay, kumwoci neto piko tokol tyonkoconi kule,
42014008	“Ye kokuriŋ citake sakwetap komütisyet, mente wopure otepto nye tokunot nyepo tay, omnye pesyet ake kokokukur cicoto kokuriŋ nyi citake nyewo kupëliŋ nyi kuco sakwanato.
42014009	Mosukuco cicoto kokurok akwek tukway oŋnkucokumwowuŋ nyi kule, ‘Ŋetyi otepto cito nyi!’ Mosecurokisye nyi oŋnkiwo yec wepure otepto nyepo let!
42014010	Ntene ye kocekuriŋ sakwet, iwo wepure otepto nye mite let, nteye kaco cito nyo kokuriŋ nyi, cokuŋetiŋ kumwowuŋ kule, ‘Corwenyu, co nyi yu po tay.’ Yoto nyoru nyi om yoto kayweyatet om wule mite piko co kopur tokol.
42014011	Omnye ci tokol nye silekey kusutkey parak nkit, mosicirekune nyoto, nto ci tokol nyo yweyisyi kurektokey nkit, mosicilaŋnta nyoto.’’
42014012	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cicoto kokure neto cokwomis kanyi kule, “Ye kekur piko kukwa kwokwomis kaŋuŋ omikap pet, nto sakwa, mente okur pate mpo yeyaŋuŋ nto tilyonutekuk, nto latosyekuk ce mokoren, omnye mosukukuriŋ nyi cek sakwet ake kuyokuŋ.
42014013	Mente ayiy kuyunyo, ye keyiy sakwet, kur pononik oko piko co kipok kerenkok, oko co mwolyos oko piko co koryotin;
42014014	mesenyoru nyi kupeyok, omnye puryo kot kuponto cek picoto tukuk ce mokuyokuneniŋ nyi, ntene kuyokuŋ Yiyintet nyi om pesyet nyo ciŋete kotutune met piko ce toponec.’’
42014015	Nteyu kowo kulim ŋalecato citake nye kipontokey Yesu kwomisyi tokol om meset, kumwoci cicoto neto kule, “Ponto kupeyoy neto cito nyo mosukopur ŋony kwomis om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’’
42014016	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Kimite citake nye kikwiyta sakwet, oŋnkukur toyek ce caŋ.
42014017	Ntowo kupunto pesyetap sakwet, kuyokto cicoto mutworintenyi kuwo wokumwoci piko co kucekur kule, ‘Akwa, omnye kaceyiyta kiy ake tokol!’
42014018	Yoto kucec ci tokol om picoto kicekure kuŋalal kumwoy kito nye kakerekta neto maco. Kumwoy nyepo tayta kule, ‘Kwayal mparet kunyo misyini awo wakäs, kunyo osomiŋ kule kalya puryo kot aconi ani.’
42014019	Kumwoy ake kule, ‘Kwayal yeyik taman ce potisyi, kunyo omite oweti kule wasyemnte yeyicato, kunyo somiŋ kule kalya puryo kot aconi ani.’
42014020	Kumwoy ake kule, ‘Kutomütisyi korket, kunyo om ŋolyontonoto puryo kot aconi ani.’
42014021	Yoto kuwo mutworintet wokumwoci mokoryontenyi ŋalecato tokol, kunyer citap kayta, oŋnkumwoci mutworintenyi kule, ‘Iwo sartekey lakwar wulo po orustunwek kacatanik oko arosyek ce minkec cepo moŋet, oŋnkikweru kukwa yu piko co pononik oko co kipok kerenkok, oko co kikoryo, oko co mwolyos!’
42014022	Yoto lakwar kumwoy mutworintet kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kaceyiyta tokol co kemwowu nyi, ntene oŋnkutokupara koto.’
42014023	Yoto kumwoci mokoryontet mutworintet kule, ‘Iwo arosyek co mite koret saŋ oko kacatanik wekur piko kukwa, sukuŋet kunyiy piko komwani.’
42014024	Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, puryo mpo akenke om picoto kicekure nye muce kot kucemcem sakwemwani!’’
42014025	Nteye kimite piko ce caŋ kupeti kurupe Yesu, yoto kuwekyikey neto piko oŋnkumwoci kule,
42014026	“Ye kaco citake tokol wule omite ani oŋnkupuryo kot kupciykey oko kwan oko kamet, oko korkenyi, oko lekokyi, oko mpo mutakwam, oko mpo cekwam, oŋnkutaykey kunyilkey neto nkit kupuryo kot komuce nyoto kwek konomintemwani.
42014027	Nto citake tokol nye puryo kot komuce kukesen murtowontenyi oŋnkunama cepetekey oko ani kupuryo kot komuce nyoto kwek konomintemwani.
42014028	Omnye ŋo om akwek nye ye möce kule atec koto nyewo koromun, nye puryo kot kunyosyi kopur ŋony oŋnkuyitis kule oponte pesanik ce ceyeme otekse kuwany koto.
42014029	Nteye puryo kot kwiy kuyunyoto, muce kucec kutekso; nteye puryo kot kuwany koyoto, mosukurorici neto piko alak co kiköse cicoto ye kicec kuteksi.
42014030	Muce kuŋalal piko cut kunyil cicoto kumwoy kule, ‘Kicec cici kutekso ntene puryo kot komuc kuwany konyi’
42014031	Nto Kinko ŋo nye ye möce kule woporye Kinket ake, nye puryo kot kunyosyi kupur ŋony oŋnkusot kule omuci ra woporye Kinket nyin om sikarekap poryet elifunek taman ce oponte oŋnkuponto nyin sikarekap poryet elifunek tiptem?
42014032	Ye kakäs kule puryo kot omuci poryet, mosukuyokto piko kutorokta nyin tokumite wule low, oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, cesat kalyet pate.
42014033	Kuyunyoto om wule omite akwek, puryo kot kumuce akenke om akwek akwek konomintemwani ye puryo kot kupakakta kwasta tukuk ce ponto.’’
42014034	“Topon misyontet, ntene ye komo kunomu, kupuryo kot kumite aret ake yec nye cimuce cewec kot kunom.
42014035	Ye puryo kot konomu misyontet kupuryo kot kuroke cinure teŋek nto cekonor kwek nye cinure teŋek, ciswortoy pate. Kunyo ci nye ponto yitik ce limnte, roke kulimnta!’’
42015001	Nto mite pesyet ake, kukwa korurukikap mosoret ce caŋ oko piko co kicetay kwokorurukyikey ye kimite Yesu kulimnta ŋalekyi.
42015002	Yoto kucec koŋunyŋuny Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek kumwoy kule, “Ŋerekyini cici piko ce kicetay oŋnkwomis wanak oko cekto!’’
42015003	Ntene kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkoconi kule,
42015004	“Nteye ponto citake om akwek kecirekyi pokol akenke, oŋnkupot akenke om coto, puryo kot kupokokyini neto surukwenet cut tomonwokik sokol ok sokol oŋnkuwo kuceŋat nyo potot okoy kunyor?
42015005	Nteye kanyor kuŋerec oŋnkunäm kukemer kat;
42015006	ntowo kupun kanyi kukur coronutekyi oko latosyekyi, oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Onte ceŋerec tokol wanak oko ani, omnye kwonyoru keciryenyu nye kukupot!’
42015007	Komwowok ani akwek kule, kuyunyoto mosiceŋerec om torot ye karenynkey cito akenke nye ponto miyotyo kupël piko ce toponec tomonwokik sokol ok sokol ce puryo kot kuroke kurenynkey.’’
42015008	Nto yec kule, “Ye ponto korket ake silinkinek taman, oŋnkupot akenke, kupuryo kot kupele tarit, oŋnkopuc koto, oŋnkuceny topon kot tokol okoy kunyor.
42015009	Nteye kanyor, kukur kukwa wanak coronutekyi oko latosyekyi, oŋnkumwoci cek kule, ‘Onte ceŋerec tokol wanak oko ani, omnye kwonyoru silinkit nye kukupot!’
42015010	Komwowok ani akwek kule, kuyu nyoto mosukuŋerec malaykanikap Yiyintet ye karenynkey cito akenke nye ponto miyotyo.’’
42015011	Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kimite citake nye kiponto werikyi oyeny.
42015012	Kumwoci werit nye miniŋ kwan kule, ‘Papa, ropkwo ani tukuk cecu.’ Yoto kupcici kwan werikyi tukway tukukwa.
42015013	Nto om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, koruruc werit nye miniŋ tukukyi oŋnkunomen kuwu koret ake nye low.
42015014	Nteye kimite wuloto kuseret kowurta om aret nye miyat tukuk tokol. Nteyu kowo kwam kuwany tukuk tokol kunäm rupet nyewo koronoto, yoto kunäm pananiyantit lekwanato.
42015015	Kuwo wokwiyis yisyet kaytap citap koronoto, kukoci nyo kuwo wokwokis nkururwenik om kanyi.
42015016	Yoto kumac lekwanato kule ntayam sopiyoŋe perikap poroyonik ce kyome nkururwenik, ntene kupuryo ci nye kikoci neto kiy.
42015017	Om letut kusot nkit om kasoteywekyi okoy kumwoy kule, ‘Ponto Papamwani pakasinek ce omisyi okoy kupiyoŋ oŋnkuŋet omik, kunyi karik kupokokyo ani rupet wuli!
42015018	Kunyo mosaŋet oŋnkunomen awo wule mite Papamwani, oŋnkuwomwoci kule, Papa, kyawurte om wule mite Yiyintet oko om wule mite nyi.
42015019	Kunyo puryo kot tokumisyino cekureno ani weriŋuŋ; yiya ani pate oyiku akenke om pakasinekuk!’
42015020	Yoto kuŋet kunomen kuwo kaytap Papanyi. Nteyu kito kumite wule low karik kupunto kaytap kwan, yoto kukäs kwan neto, nteye kotoköse kwan kurire oŋnkulapat kutoroc oŋnkuŋatut.
42015021	Kumwoci weroto kwan kule, ‘Papa, kyawurte ani om wule mite Yiyintet oko om wule mite nyi, kunyo puryo kot tokumisyino ani cekureno weriŋuŋ.’
42015022	Kumwoci kwan mutworintenyi kule, ‘Osutu lakwar siret nye topon koromun oŋnkolokyi, oŋnkokoci komolilyet mornenyi, oŋnkolokyi, kweyonik kerenkokyi,
42015023	oŋnkokweru yeyito nye yakway kwayeny kyam ceŋerec acek.
42015024	Omnye kaco kusopot werimwani nye kikime, kikipot kunyi kotok.’ Yoto kucec kuŋerec cek tokol kwam sakwet.
42015025	“Ntene kimite yoto werit nyewo mparen, nteye kimite kuconi karik kupun ka, kulim polotet oko tumnto.
42015026	Yoto kukur mutworintet akenke oŋnkutepe kule, ‘Ŋal ne cu?’
42015027	Kumwoci mutworintet kule, ‘Kaco yeyaŋuŋ, kunyo kayeny Papaŋuŋ yeyito nye yakway omnye kaco yeyaŋuŋ kusopot.’
42015028	Ntene kunyer werit nyewo okoy kutay nye mowo koto orit. Kumiŋ kwan kuco saŋ oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule, ‘Co ko orit!’
42015029	Kuwekyi werit nyewo kumwoci kwan kule, ‘Om kenyisyek tokol kyoyiwuŋ ani mutworyontit nye puryo kot otowuŋ ŋolyo mpo akenke, ntene puryo kot kono ani nyi mpo kucontet nye kayam aŋerec wanak oko coronutekwani.
42015030	Kunyi kaco yawut weriŋuŋyi nye kikuseret tukukukyi kowurte koruk cemoronisyek kunyi keyeŋnkyi nyi neto yeyito nye yakway!’
42015031	Kuwekyi kwan kumwoci neto kule, ‘Wenyo, cepontekey acek oko nyi okokoy, kunyo cekukyi tukuk tokol ce oponte ani.
42015032	Kunyo nyolyini ceŋerec acek wanak tokol, omnye kaco yeyaŋuŋ nyitenyi kikime kusopot, kikipot ntene kacenyoru neto yawut’.’’
42016001	Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Kimite citake nye mokoryo nye kiponto ripintet nye kipoytoy tukukap cicoto mokoryo, yoto cemwoci piko alake cicoto mokoryo kule, ‘Wurtoy ripinteŋuŋ tukukuk.’
42016002	Kukur cicoto ripintenyi oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Ŋal ne cu olimnciŋ ani nyi? Yitwo ani tukuk tokol co kweripe nyi! Omnye kemeyiku nyi yec ripin.’
42016003	Kumwoy ripintonoto nkit om moyenyi kule, ‘Mosayiy ne ani? Omnye kokunumuneno mokoryontenyu yisyetap ripset, kunyo puryo kot oponte swamet nye opotisye, oŋnkoliloni ye mosomote.
42016004	Kumwoy kule, oŋnket kito nye mosayiy, sukuŋet ye kacinumuneno yisyetap ripset kuŋerekyo ani piko ye kowo korikwa.’
42016005	Yoto kukur ripintonoto ci ake tokol nye kiponto pesentap mokoryontenyi, oŋnkumwoci nyepo tayta kule, ‘Yociŋ nyi mokoryontemwani ata?’
42016006	Kumwoy nyo kule, ‘Ntepenik pokolwokik oyeny cepo mwayitap uto.’ Kumwoci nyo kule, ‘Oŋyi kartasiŋuŋ, pur ŋony lakwar oŋnkisil pokol pate.’
42016007	Nto ake kutepe kule, ‘Ntenyi ceyociŋ ata?’ Kumwoy nyo kule, ‘Kuniyanik cepo nkanuk sosom.’ Kumwoci nyo kule, ‘Oŋyi kartasiŋuŋ, sil tiptem oko mut pate.’
42016008	Kukasta mokoryontenyi ripintonoto puryo kot kupo manta omnye kikwiy kiy nyepo ŋomnon; omnye ŋomec pikap koroni om wule yiytoy tukuk ce nöme cekto kupël piko cepo lakweyet.’’
42016009	Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kunyo omwowok ani akwek kule, anäm coronutek om mokoryontitap tukuk ce miyotec cepo koret, nteye kapok coto, ceŋerekyok akwek akwa kayita nye ominye okokoy.
42016010	Ci tokol nye cikenekey om tukuk ce tukusic, kunye cikenekey mpene nyoto om tukuk ce caŋ; nto ci nye puryo kot kwiye cepo manta om tukuk ce tukusic, kupuryo kot kwiye neto nyoto cepo manta om tukuk ce caŋ.
42016011	Kunyo nteye puryo kot cimuce cikenenokey akwek ye morip mokoryontitap tukukap koret, ku ŋo nye muce kukenenokey akwek kukonok orip mokoryontit nyepo manta?
42016012	Nteye puryo kot cikenenokey akwek om tukuk cepo citake, ku ŋo nye muce kukonok akwek tukuk ce cikwakwek nkit?
42016013	“Puryo mutworin nye muce kwek mutworintetap mokorenik oyeny, omnye muce kusenker ake oŋnkucäm ake; nto muce kuywey ake oŋkunyil ake. Puryo koto muci akwek oyici yisyet Yiyintet oko mokoryontitap koret.’’
42016014	Yoto kulim Farasayek ŋalecato tokol, kucasekey cek Yesu omnye kicöme cek mokoryontit koromun.
42016015	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwek kuce oportoykey om konyekap piko kule oyiye ce toponec, ntene nkete Yiyintet mukuleywekwok orit, omnye tukuk co kostoy piko kule ponto latik, kuce tukuk ce puryo kot kuponto latik coto mpo kisic om konyekap Yiyintet.
42016016	“Okoy kupun pesyosyekap Yowana, kimite yoto kwiyisyi ntarastinekap Moses oko ŋalekap workoyik, ntene kuceke yoto okoy pesyosyecu; cemite yawut cemwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Kunyo mite ci tokol kutitire kule owut orit.
42016017	Muce kupok wulin po torot oko ŋony, ntene puryo kot komukoktos mpo kisic kot cinum nyukutet akenke nyepo ntarastinek.
42016018	“Ci nye kakwet korkenyi, oŋnkomüt ake kakwiy cito nyoto sakwayanat, nto ci nye kemüt korko nye kikwet santenyi, kakwiy mpo cito nyoto sakwayanat.’’
42016019	Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kimite citake nye kimokoryo; nye kiloce sirok ce toponec corornec oko celelac, nye kiŋerekyinikey pesyosyek tokol om mokoryontinyi.
42016020	Kimite mpo yec pananet ake nye cekure Lasaro, nye kiponto serkecok ce kinäm porto tokol, nye kicesutu kuco cokopure yepo kurketap mokoryontet.
42016021	Kimöce Lasaro kule ntoyome sipiyoŋe omik ce kileleku kosuwune mesetap mokoryontonoto. Kikwoni mpo ŋokik yoto kwokumele serkecokyi.
42016022	Yoto kume pananetkey, kusut malaykanik neto okoy kupunto komostap Apram om torot wule kimite sakwet. Yoto kume mpene mokoryontet, cemuy.
42016023	Nteye kimite mokoryontet kapkompic kunyor taŋanyntap mwoninto, yoto kunyal torot okoy kukäs Apram kumite wule low, oko Lasaro nye kimite kepure yepo komosnyi.
42016024	Yoto kukursyo kumwoy kule, ‘Papa, Apram kalya rirena ani, yoku Lasaro kuco cokowute walyitap mornenyi peko oŋnkutise ŋelyepmwani, omnye omite taŋanynta om wuli mite mayi loye!’
42016025	Ntene kumwoy Apram kule, ‘Wenyo, möce sot oŋnkinket kule, kinyoru nyi tukuk cepo soponto nye topon om soponŋuŋ tokol, kuyu wulo kinyor Lasaro tukuk cepo soponto nye miyat, ntene kunyo mite Lasaro yawut om wuli soponto nye topon, kunyo mite nyi taŋanynta.
42016026	Kunyo kumite ŋalekyo yo, kunyi mite mwenet nye kiwo ŋony koromun nye mite kwenunyacek oko akwek, nye puryo kot kumuce kwoy kukwa wulo piko cekwone wuli ce mite acek, oŋnkupuryo kot kumuce kwoy kukwa wuli piko cekwone wulo omite akwek.’
42016027	Kumwoy cicoto kimokoryo kule, ‘Kunyo osomiŋ ani nyi Papa Apram kule, yokte Lasaro kuwo kaytap papamwani,
42016028	omnye oponte ani mpo yeyamwani mut, kunyo kuwo neto oŋnkuwokusowu cek koromun mente kot kukwa mpecek wuli mite taŋanyntap mata!’
42016029	Kumwoy Apram kule, ‘Puryo kot kuyunyo, omnye ponto mpo yeyaŋuŋ Moses oko workoyik ce muce kumwoci ŋalek, kunyo misyini kulimnci cekto coto ŋalek.’
42016030	Ntene kumwoy cicoto kule, ‘Puryo kot kuyunyo, Papa Apram; omnye ye ketutune met citake oŋnkuwo wule mite cekto; mosukurenynkey.’
42016031	Ntene kumwoci Apram neto kule ‘Ye puryo kot komuce cek kot kulimnci Moses oko workoyik, kupuryo kot komuce mpo kucäm nka kot ketutune met citake.’ ’’
42017001	Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Mosukutok tukuk ce noce kuwec piko kwiy miyotyet, ntene mite kwapi cito nyo sutu kwiyokis tukucoto!
42017002	Roke cerotyi katitap cicoto rwantetap paka oŋnkyewirci ruretyet orit, kusir ye kotokyostoy cicoto kuwurta piko ce tinimnkec ceyucu kwiy miyotyo.
42017003	Oripkey! Ye koyiwuŋ yeyaŋuŋ miyotyonik, polyi neto, nteye karenynkey kalye.
42017004	Nteye koyiwuŋ nyi neto miyotyet aret tisap om pesyet akenke, oŋnkuco wule mite nyi aret tisap cokumwowu kule karenynkey, misyini kalye.’’
42017005	Kumwoci kiyokik Mokoryontet Yesu kule, “Toswec acek koyenet.’’
42017006	Kuwec Mokoryontet kumwoy kule, “Nto yunye oponte akwek koyenet nyewo kuyu kupuswontetap ketit nye cekure kalitarit, nto muci kot omwoci ketit mokoywet kule, ŋeyakisye kirinta nkit, oŋnkiwo wepite ruretyet, kulimwok akwek.’’
42017007	“Nteye ponto citake om akwek mutworintet nye potisyi nto nye okisyi kecirek, ye kacone mparen nto yecey, muci nyi pa mwoci kule, ‘Sorukey lakwar cepur ŋony oŋnkiyomisye?’
42017008	Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ntene mwocini nyi kule, ‘Yosye omikwani kiny kunyo, oŋnkipaya kot oyomisye oŋnkoyesye ani, nteye kawany, yomisye oŋnkiyesye nyi om letut!’
42017009	Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini cikasta mutworintonoto omnye kakwiy yisyet nye cemokyini kwiy? Puryo kot kuyunyoto?
42017010	Kuyunyoto mpo akwek; ye kawany oyiy yisyet nye kucemokwok kule oyiy, omwowu kule, ‘Ciku acek mutwor ce puryo kot kuponto latik, omnye kukyiy yisyet nye kucemwowec kule ayiy.’ ’’
42017011	Nteye kiweti Yesu Yerusalem, kuwo kupunte kwenutap koretap Samariya oko Kalilaya.
42017012	Ntowo kupun moŋet ake, kutuye neto piko taman ce kiponto mutyenkenik. Kuyoŋe picoto wule low,
42017013	oŋnkukursyo kupol kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet Yesu, rirenec acek!’’
42017014	Nteye kotoköse Yesu picoto kumwoci cek kule, “Ape woporcikey tisik.’’ Nteye kimite picoto kupeti om aran kusopco tokol.
42017015	Ntowo kukäs akenke om picoto kule kosop, kuweckey kuco kutumon om kutit nyewo kukostoy Yiyintet.
42017016	Kuco okoy cokoputyi yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkukasta kumwoci kule, keyiy topon. Cicoto kunye ki Samariyantet.
42017017	Yoto kuŋalal Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot cisop piko tokol ku taman, onto cut sokol?
42017018	Puryo mpo akenke nye kaweckey kuco cokukasta Yiyintet, tos pate tontoni?’’
42017019	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ŋete yony, oŋnkiwecikey kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’
42017020	Kutepe Farasayek alake Yesu kule, “Coni pesyo ne poytoyisyetap Yiyintet?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kuconi poytoyisyetap Yiyintet cekosonu ye coni.
42017021	Puryo kot cimuce cemwoy kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi mite yu! Nto oŋyin mite yun!’ Omnye ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, mitowune poytoyisyetap Yiyintet wule omite akwek.’’
42017022	Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomik kule, “Mosukuponto pesyet nye mosomac akwek kule nto cekäs akenke om pesyosyekap Weritap cito, ntene puryo kot omuci yoto kot okäs.
42017023	Mosukumwowok akwek piko alake kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi mite yu! Nto akäs oŋyin mite yun!’ Monte cirway arup picoto.
42017024	Kuyu wulo kweŋntoy kaweketap ilet koret parak kuceke tapan okoy tapan; kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey pesyetap Weritap cito.
42017025	Ntene mosukunyosyo kutaŋany koromun, oŋnkutay neto pikap pintap pesyosyecu.
42017026	Kuyu wule kiyunto om pesyosyekap Nuwa, kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyosyekap Weritap cito.
42017027	Omnye kimite piko om pesyosyecoto kipo Nuwa, kwomisyi oŋnkuyesyi, kukesyi komüte moronik koruk oŋnkyimüte koruk okoy pesyet nyo kiwute Nuwa rapet, yoto kutumnkey peko oŋnkupakäc piko tokol.
42017028	Mosukwiytakey mpo wule kiyunto koret om pesyosyekap Lot, ye kimite piko tokol kwomisyi, oŋnkukesyi komüte moronik koruk oŋnkuteksi korik.
42017029	Nto om pesyet nye kiŋete Lot kuwete Sotom; kuropen mata oko rwontok ce loyotin om torot oŋnkupel kupakäc kwaranta piko tokol.
42017030	Kunyo mosukwiytakey nyoto om pesyet nye ciŋoŋu cipor Weritap cito.
42017031	“Om pesyosyecoto, ye mite citake konyi kisyek oŋnkumite tukukyi koto orit, kupuryo kot kuroke kurek oŋnkuwokunum tukucoto, kuyunyoto mpo om wule mite cito nye mite mparen, puryo kot kuroke kuweckey neto kuwo kanyi.
42017032	Asot pa korketap Lot!
42017033	Ci tokol nye möce kule osoru osop sopon nyi, kupote nyoto sopon nyi, nto ci tokol nyo kepot sopon nyi, mosukusor kusop nyoto sopon nyi.
42017034	Om kwomowutap pesyonoto, mosicenyor piko oyeny ce koruy kwiririt akenke, cesut ake cepakakta ake,
42017035	cenyor koruk oyeny ce ŋosye rwantet akenke, cesut ake cepakakta ake.
42017036	[Cenyor piko alak oyeny kumite mparen, cesut akenke oŋnkyepakakta ake.]’’
42017037	Kutepe konomik Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, om ono?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Wule mite musto ku wuloto wule rurukyinikey motomwek.’’
42018001	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkocet sukuŋet kunet kule misyini kusome cek okokoy nye puryo kot kucostos.
42018002	Kumwoy kule, “Kimite Ketintet ake nye kimite moŋet ake, nye kipuryo kot kuyweye Yiyintet oŋnkupuryo kot kuyweye ci tokol.
42018003	Kumite mpo korket ake nye musuk moŋonoto nye kiconi wule mite ketintonoto pesyosyek tokol cokumwocini kule, ‘Müt musankut nyepo manta kulot cito nyo owosontyini ani.’
42018004	Kutoyis ketintet kunyo, ntene om letut kusot nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nka kot puryo kot oyweyi ani Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo kot oyweyi ci tokol,
42018005	ntene om kayimatetap musukuni yimani okokoy, mosamüt musankut, sukuŋet komokuconi cokutaŋanya kwimen.’ ’’
42018006	Kumwoy Mokoryontet Yesu kule, “Olim pa wule mwoytoy ketintet nye puryo kot kwiye ŋalek cepo manta,
42018007	kunyo puryo kot komuce ra Yiyintet komüt musankut kukalya pikyi co rircini neto kusome kakalyantet komoy oko pet? Muce pa neto kulileyankey nye puryo kot kukolyoy cekto?
42018008	Komwowok ani akwek kule, mosukumüt Yiyintet musankut lakwar kuyunyoto kukalya cekto. Ntene yec, ye kaweckey pa Weritap cito, muce cokunyor koyenotet om koret?’’
42018009	Kumwoci Yesu tyonkoconi piko ce kisilekey cek nkit kule ciku toponec oŋnkunyil piko alak tokol.
42018010	Kumwoci kule, “Kinomen piko oyeny kupa wokusom om kotap Yiyintet, akenke om picoto kunye Farasoyintet nto ake kunye korurukintetap mosoret.
42018011	Kuyo Farasoyintet oŋnkusom nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Okostiŋ ani nyi, Ayi Yiyintet omnye puryo kot akerkeyekey ani oko piko alak tokol, ce cor, oŋnkuporisyi, oko co sakwayot, kuyu mpo korurukintoni po mosoret nyi mite yu.
42018012	Opuri ani okire omik aret oyeny om sopitit akenke, oŋnkokoniŋ ani nyi akenke om taman cepo tukuk tokol ce onyoru!’
42018013	Ntene kuyoŋe korurukintetap mosoret ye low, nye kipuryo mpo kot kunyal torot, ntene kusyeckey teket oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Ayi Yiyintet, kalya ani ci nye oponte miyotyo!’ ’’
42018014	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, kiweckey kuwo kanyi cicitenyi korurukintetap mosoret kukakikalya neto miyotyonikyi ntene puryo kot kunyin ake Farasoyintet; omnye ci tokol nye sutekey kulaŋntankey nkit parak, mosicirekune neto nyoto, ntene ci tokol nye sutekey kurektokey nkit ŋony, mosicilaŋnta neto nyoto kuwoyit.’’
42018015	Kukwer piko alake lekokwa kukwa wule mite Yesu, kule sukuŋet kukemer neto yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto, nteye kotoköse konomik picoto kikweru lekokwa, kuyete kukerekta cek.
42018016	Ntene kukur Yesu lekok kukwa wule mite neto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ayaste lekok kukwa wule omite ani! Monte ceyete, omnye po poytoyisyetap Yiyintet cekto ceyucutecu.
42018017	Komwowok ani akwek kule, ci tokol nye puryo kot kunöme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kuyu lekwa, kupuryo kot kumuce neto nyoto kot kowut orit.’’
42018018	Kutepe poytoyintet ake Yesu kule, “Konetintet nye topon, mosayiy ne ani ye sonyoru soponto nye mopoku?’’ Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule,
42018019	“Omne sekureno ani nyi nye topon? Puryo ci nye topon, ntene Yiyintet pate nkit nye topon.
42018020	Nketi nyi ntarastinek mwowu kule, ‘Mente kot ayiy sakwayanat, mente kot apakäc ci. Mente kot acorsye, mente kot aŋalal mwiynan perperisye, ywey kon oko komet!’ ’’
42018021	Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Kyorip ani ntarastinecutecu tokol kuceke oyiku lekwa.’’
42018022	Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kumwoci cicoto kule, “Mite kito akenke nye tokupotuŋ nyi, iwo weyalye tukuk tokol ce ponte oŋnkikoci pesanik pononik, mesenyoru mokoryontit om torot; oŋnkico ce nama cepetekey oko ani.’’
42018023	Nteye kotolime cicoto ŋalecato kunerec koromun, omnye kimokoryo nye kiponto tukuk ce caŋ.
42018024	Yoto kukäs Yesu wule kanerekta cicoto, kumwoy kule, “Mokuwuy koromun om wule mite piko co mokoren ce ponto tukuk ce caŋ ye mokowut cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
42018025	Lekit mpo kupunte Nkamiyet koŋntap sintanit kupël ye mokowut ci nye mokoryo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
42018026	Kutepe piko ce kilime ŋalecato Yesu kule, “Ŋo nyun cito nye muce cisop?’’
42018027	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Tukuk ce puryo kot komukoktos om wule mite piko, komukoktos coto om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
42018028	Kumwoy Petero kule, “Käs pa! Kicepakakte acek korikyo oŋnkyekwa kwocinamiŋ cepetekey nyi.’’
42018029	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo ci nye ye kupakakta kanyi oko korket oko lekok, oko mpo yeyanyi, oko kamwa tokol, omnye karup neto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet,
42018030	nye puryo kot kunyor ce caŋ kupëlis om pesyosyecu, oŋnkunyor soponto nye mopoku om pesyosyek co kwoni.’’
42018031	Kukwer Yesu tapan kiyokik taman ok oyeny, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Olim pa, cemite yawut cepeti celoŋntoy Yerusalem, wule mosukwitita ŋalek tokol cepo manta co kisile workoyik ce nöme Weritap cito.
42018032	Mosicenäm neto oŋnkyikoci kunäm lamek ce mosukutaŋany, oŋnkucup, oŋnkuŋutyi;
42018033	mosukupas oŋnkupar kume, ntene om letutap pesyosyek somok mosukotutune met.’’
42018034	Ntene kipuryo kot kusow konomik kunket om yoto ŋalecata, kiwuŋotin ŋaleca om wule mite cekto, kipuryo kot kusow kunket kule komwoy Yesu ŋal ne.
42018035	Nteyu kowo kurikta Yesu Yeriko, kimite citake nye korat nye kipure aret tapan sukusomsi.
42018036	Nteye kotolime cicoto korat piko ce kimite kupeti kutile om aran, kutep kule, “Key kulene?’’
42018037	Kumwoci piko neto kule, “Yesu nyo nyepo Nasaret nye mite kukeytoy.’’
42018038	Yoto kupol kukurto cicoto kumwoy kule, “Yesu Weritap Tauti! Rirena ani!’’
42018039	Kupolyi piko ce kimite kupeti om tay kumwoci cicoto kule kusis. Ntene kutosyikey kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Weritap Tauti! Rirena ani!’’
42018040	Yoto kuyo Yesu oŋnkumwyta cekwer cicoto korat kuco ye mite neto. Nteyu kowo kuco kurik, kutepe Yesu neto kule,
42018041	“Möce nyi kule oyiwuŋ ani ne?’’ Kumwoy cicoto kule, “Konetintet, omöce kule akäste yec.’’
42018042	Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Käste! Kakusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’
42018043	Om yoto pakenke kusopco kukästa konyekyi. Kunamat cicoto kupetekey Yesu kukostoti Yiyintet. Nteye kotoköse piko tokol tukuk ce keyokis, kokasta tokol Yiyintet.
42019001	Kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto Yeriko, nteye kimite kupunte kwenutap moŋet,
42019002	kimite yoto citake nye cekure Sakayo nye kikorurukintetap mosoret nyewo, nye kimokoryo nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ.
42019003	Yoto kusyem Sakayo kule akäs oŋnkono nye Yesu, ntene kipuryo komuc kot kukäs omnye kicaŋ piko oko yec nye kinwac neto.
42019004	Yoto kulapat Sakayo kuwo taytap piko oŋnkuwokulany ketit mokoywet kule saŋet akäs, omnye kiweti Yesu wokupunte aranato.
42019005	Ntowo kuco Yesu okoy ketit ŋony, kunyal parak oŋnkumwoci Sakayo kule, “Sakayo, reku co ŋony lakwar; omnye omöce ani woru kaŋuŋ pesyoni.’’
42019006	Kurek Sakayo kuco ŋony lakwar, oŋnkuŋerekyi Yesu koromun.
42019007	Ntowo kukäs piko tokol kuyunyoto kucec koŋunyŋunyis kumwoy kule, “Kowo cici wokwek tontetap ci nye ponto miyotyo!’’
42019008	Kuyo Sakayo oŋnkuŋalal kumwoci Mokoryontet Yesu kule, “Om yuteyu yawut pakenke, mosopcici ani tukukwani pononik, nteye kyaperper olotu citake tokol oŋnkonumune kinyi, mosoyokyi aret amwan kucaŋit.’’
42019009	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kaco yawut pesyoni kosopet kayi. Omnye mpeneto cicitenyi kunye mucokoretap Apram.
42019010	Omnye kico Weritap cito cokuceny oŋnkusop ce kipotyo.’’
42019011	Nteye kimite kulimntoy piko ŋalecato, kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci cek tyonkocet, omnye kikirikta neto yoto kupunto Yerusalem, oko omnye kisote piko kule mosukuco lakwar poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
42019012	Yoto kumwoy kule, “Kinomen mokoryontet ake kuwo koret ake nye low, sukuŋet wocikocine neto wuloto kamukeywek kwek Kinko oŋnkuweckey kuco ka.
42019013	Nteyu mokunomen, kukur mutworikyi taman oŋnkukoci ci ake tokol om cekto silinkinek pokol, oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Oyiyisye kamonkesyantit okoy aweckey ani.’
42019014	Ntene kitoye pikap korenyi cicoto, yoto kuyokto piko alak kupa kunam let wokumwayta kule, ‘Puryo kot ce cöme acek cico kwek Kinko nyinyacek!’
42019015	“Ntowo kuweckey cicoto kukocikoci neto kamukeywek kwek Kinko, kumwayta cekwer kukwa ye mite neto mutworik co kikocini neto pesanik, kule sukuŋet oŋnket latikap pesanik ce kinyor cekto om kamonkesyantit.
42019016	Kuco nyepo tayta oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kiyi silinkinekyekuk pokolu silinkinek alak elifut akenke.’
42019017	Kumwoci cicoto nyoto kule, ‘Kiyiy topon, yiku nyi mutworin nye topon! Kunyo omnye cikeneninkey om pesan ce tukusic, kunyo nyoru yawut kamukeywek ce mepayte moŋosyek taman.’
42019018	Kuco nyepo oyeny oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kiyi silinkinekyekuk pokolu silinkinek alak pokolwokik mut.’
42019019	Kumwoci cicoto nyoto kule, ‘Mpenyi mepayte moŋosyek mut.’
42019020	Kuco ake oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, okyu silinkinekuk pokol ce kyakonor ani oyukyi siret.
42019021	Omnye kyanyokoritu om wule mite nyi, omnye yiku nyi ci nye wuy, sute kiy nye puryo kot ku nyeŋuŋ, oŋnkikise mpo ce puryo kot kol nyi.’
42019022	Kumwoci cicoto nyoto kule, ‘Yiku nyi mutworin nye miyat! Mosoyiyisye ani ŋalekuk ce kwone kutiŋuŋ nkit oŋnkomütuŋ musankut! Ye kinket nyi kule, oyiku ani ci nye wuy, omnye osute kiy nye puryo kot ku nyenyu, oŋnkokise mpo ce kipuryo kot akol ani.
42019023	Kunyo ye yunyo, omne simekonore nyi pesanikwani Penki? Omnye nto kwowecekey ani kwoceketwo kuponto latik.’
42019024	Kumwoci cicoto mokoryo piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kule, ‘Onumune cici silinkinek co pokol oŋnkokoci mutworintet nyo ponto silinkinek elifut akenke.’
42019025	Kumwoci picoto mokoryontemwa kule, ‘Mokoryontet, ponto cicitenyi silinkinek elifut akenke!’
42019026	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, ‘Komwowok ani akwek kule, ci tokol nye ponto, mosicikoci neto nyoto kucaŋit, nto ci tokol nyo puryo kot kuponto, nka mpo co ponto, mocinumune neto coto.
42019027	Nto wule mite punikwani cutecu kipuryo kot kucäm kule oyiku ani Kinko nyimwa, okweru kukwa yu oŋnkotil kupok om yu po taymwani!’ ’’
42019028	Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato okoy kuwany, kunomen kuntoci cekto kuwo Yerusalem.
42019029	Ntowo kurikta Pesapake oko Pesaniya om tulwetap ketik ce cekure seituninek, kuyokto konomik oyeny,
42019030	kumwoci kule, “Ape okoy opunte kayta nye mite taymwoŋ, nteye kowut kayata mosonyoru moyitap sikiryet nye ratat nye tompo kot kulany kuwete ci mpo akenke, atyac oŋnkokweru kuco yu.
42019031	Nteye katepenak citake kule, ‘Omne satyac akwek sikiryoni?’ Omwoci kule, ‘Möce Mokoryontet.’ ’’
42019032	Kunomen picoto kociyoktoy kupa okoy wokunyor kiy ake tokol kumite kuyu wulo kokomwoci Yesu cekto.
42019033	Nteye kimite kutyoce moyitap sikiryet, kutepe pikap sikiryet kule, “Omne satyac akwek moyitap sikiryet?’’
42019034	Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Möce Mokoryontet.’’
42019035	Yoto kukwer cek moytap sikiryet okoy wule mite Yesu oŋnkuyitoci sirokwa patayitap moyitap sikiryet, oŋnkulany kukonopci Yesu kopure parak.
42019036	Nteye kimite neto kuweti koyito cek sirokwa aret.
42019037	Ntowo kurikta Yesu Yerusalem, om aret nye rekune tulwetap ketik ce cekure seituninek, yoto kucec luketap konomik kukasta Yiyintet om ŋerekwek om polotetap tumnto nyewo om tukuk tokol cewoyec ce kikäs cek, kumwoy kule:
42019038	“Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto Kinko nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet! Kopur kalyet torot, oŋnkupur woyinto wule mite Yiyintet!’’
42019039	Yoto kumwoci Farasayek alake ce kipontokey piko Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mwoci konomikuk kusisio!’’
42019040	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, ye kisisio cekto; mosukupol mpo rwontok.’’
42019041	Nteyu kowo kuco Yesu okoy kurik moŋet nyewo Yerusalem, nteye kutoköse kutopen, kurir kukalya kumwoy kule,
42019042	“Nto kesowu nyi nket pesyoni pate kito nye sutu kalyet! Ntene puryo kot muci yawut kot käs omnye wuŋat om konyekuk!
42019043	Omnye mosukupunto pesyosyek ce mosukutec punikuk totet komutuŋ nyi om komoswokik tokol.
42019044	Mosukopuryetiŋ poku kule toŋ oko piko ce minyiŋ nyi orit, nye puryo kot kupokoktoy cek om wule mite nyi rwantet ake kumite rwantet ake parak. Omnye kipuryo kot sowu nyi oŋnkinket pesyet nye cone Yiyintet cokusopiŋ kosoruŋ nyi!’’
42019045	Yoto kowut Yesu kotap Yiyintet orit, oŋnkucec kukwet piko ce kimite kwolyoyisyi om orit,
42019046	kumwoci cek kule, “Kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukwek komwani koto nye cesome.’ Kunyi kwawec akwek kwek kepenet nye wuŋekey corik!’’
42019047	Yoto kunetisye Yesu kotap Yiyintet pesyosyek tokol. Ntene kumac tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyikap piko kule cepakäc neto.
42019048	Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor cek wule mokwiyta, omnye kimite piko tokol kulimntoy ŋalekyi topon nye kipuryo kot kumöce kule nto cemuyte ŋolyo mpo akenke.
42020001	Nteye kipesyet ake, ye kimite Yesu kunete piko komwocini lokoywek ce toponec om kotap Yiyintet, yoto kukwa tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik,
42020002	oŋnkwokutepe cek Yesu kule, “Mwowec acek, po ŋo kamukeywek cu yiye nyi tukucu? Ŋo nyi kikoniŋ nyi kamukeywecu?’’
42020003	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mpo ani mosatepenak akwek teputyoni kule, omwowo ani pa akwek,
42020004	kicone potisonisyetap Yowana wulin po torot nto kicone wule mite piko?’’
42020005	Yoto kurwoc cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone torot,’ mosukumwowec acek neto kule, ‘Omne satay akwek moyen ŋalekyi?’
42020006	Nteye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone wule mite piko,’ mosukuwirenec piko rwontok; omnye cöme piko kule workoyo Yowana manta.’’
42020007	Yoto kuwekyi cek Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot cinket wule kicone.’’
42020008	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mpo ani puryo kot omuci kot omwowok akwek wule anyortoy ani kamukeywek cu oyiye tukucu.’’
42020009	Kumwoci Yesu piko tyonkoconi kule, “Kiwu citake mparenyi nyepo ketik ce cekure sapipunek, oŋnkukoci kopotik ce kekotesan oŋnkunomen kuwo koret ake nye low wokuwany wuloto pesyosyek ce caŋ.
42020010	Nteyu kowo kupunto pesyosyek ce rurye omikap ketik ce cekure sapipunek, kuyok mutworintenyi kuco wule mite kopotik co kikotesonisyi, kule sukuŋet co kukoci mutworintonoto omik alak cepo mparetap ketik ce cekure sapipunek ce kikiciyoyekyin; ntene kunäm kopoticoto mutworintonoto oŋnkupir oŋnkukwet kuweto yewuniyek pate.
42020011	Kuyokto yec cicoto mutworintet ake, ntene kupir kopotik oŋnkunyalil mutworintonoto oŋnkukwet kuweto yewuniyek pate.
42020012	Kuyokto yec cicoto mutworintet nyepo somok, kupir kopotik mpo nyoto kukoten oŋnkukwetyi saŋ.
42020013	Yoto kumwoy citap mparetap ketik ce cekure sapipunek kule, ‘Mosayiy ne ani? Mosoyokte werimwani nyi akenke pate, pesyet ake muce cek kuywey neto!’
42020014	Nteye kotoköse kopotik weroto, kurwoc nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nyitenyi kunye kontiyintet; akany cepakäc kume, sukuŋet kwek nyinyacek kontiyisyet!’
42020015	Kunäm kopotik weroto oŋnkucutune mparen oŋnkupakäc kume.’’ Kutep Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mosukwiye kiy ne citap mparanato kopoticoto?
42020016	Mosukuco nkit citap mparet oŋnkupar kupok kopoticoto oŋnkukoci kopotik alak ce kekotesan mparetap ketik ce cekure sapipunek.’’ Nteye kotolime piko ŋalecato, kumwoy cek kule, “Puryo kot kurok kwiyokis kuyunyo!’’
42020017	Kukäs Yesu kurotot cek topon, oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Mwowu ne nyun ŋalecu kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule: ‘Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule, puryo kot kuponto latik, Kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.’
42020018	Ci tokol nye kowircikey rwantanato kutirtiroktos neto nyoto, nteye kowircikey rwantanato citake kunyirnyire cicoto.’’
42020019	Kusyem om yoto konetikap ntarastinek oko tisik cewoyec kule cenäm Yesu, omnye kinket kule komwoy Yesu tyonkocet nyepo ŋalek ce nöme cekto. Ntene kuywey piko.
42020020	Yoto kuceny cek pesyet nye topon. Kwal piko alak ce kosutkey picoto kuyu pic ce toponec, oŋnkuyokto cek picoto kupa wokulot kutepe Yesu ŋalek ce mosukumwoy, sukuŋet kunäm oŋnkukwer wokuwosontyine taytap poytoyintet nyewo nye ponto kamukeywek.
42020021	Kupa picoto oŋnkuwokutepe cek Yesu kule, “Konetintet, cinket kule, ŋalek ce mwowu nyi oko ce netinyi kuce ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkyinket kule, puryo kot cöme nyi ŋalek cepo citake oŋnkitay cepo ake, ntene netinyi ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta.
42020022	Kunyo, mwowec acek, cömwec pa ntarastinekyo cekweci mosoret Kinko Nyewo nto puryo?’’
42020023	Ntene kunket Yesu tekutekwa. Kumwoci kule,
42020024	“Oporwo ani pa akwek silinkit? Po ŋo metit oko kaynet nyi silot silinkini?’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Po Kinko Nyewo.’’
42020025	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo okocini Kinko Nyewo tukuk cepo Kinko Nyewo, okocini Yiyintet tukuk cepo Yiyintet.’’
42020026	Yoto kipuryo komuc cek kot kunyor lelis om ŋalekyi ce kimwoy om taytap piko, ntene kusisio, omnye kikite koromun wule kawekta ŋalekyi.
42020027	Kukwa Satusayek alake wule mite Yesu. Coto ku piko co mwowu kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko co kipok. Kutepe cek neto kule,
42020028	“Konetintet, kisilwec acek Moses ntarastini kule, ‘Ye kame citake, oŋnkupakakta korket nye puryo kot kuyici lekok, roke komüt mutakwam korkonoto musuk, sukuŋet kuyici mutakwam nye kime lekok.’
42020029	Kunyo kimite piko alake tisapu ce kitupco. Kukesyo nyewo komüt korket, ntene kume nye kipuryo kot kuyi lekoy.
42020030	Kunti komüt mutakwam nyepo oyeny korkonoto musuk,
42020031	oko nyepo somok, kuyunyoto kupok tokol picoto ku tisap nye kipuryo kot kuyi mpo akenke lekwa,
42020032	nto om letut kume mpene korket.
42020033	Kunyo om pesyet nyo citutune met, poyitu ŋo korket? Omnye kikikomüt picoto tokol ku tisap!’’
42020034	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mütisyi moronik, oŋnkyimüte koruk cepo pesyosyecu,
42020035	ntene om wule mite piko co kipok co kicecäm om konyekap Yiyintet kule yeme kotutune met oŋnkumiŋis koret nyin ake, kupuryo kot komütisyi nto cimüte cekto coto.
42020036	Omnye puryo kot tokomuce cek yec kupok, kerkey picoto oko malaykanik, oŋnkukikwek lekokap Yiyintet omnye kikotutune met.
42020037	Kunyo kipor Moses ŋalek cepo manta kule, tutune met piko co kipok kunyor yec soponto. Kimwoy coto om ŋalekyi ce kisil co nömekey oko rukututwet nyo kiloye, kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet kunye Yiyintetap Apram, Yiyintetap Isaka, Yiyintetap Yakopo.’
42020038	Kunyo poru ŋaleca kule, puryo kot ku Yiyintetap piko ce kipok; ntene Yiyintetap piko ce soptos; omnye sopcotin piko tokol om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
42020039	Yoto kuwekyi konetikap ntarastinek alake kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kewec topon!’’
42020040	Omnye kipuryo kot tokukany cek yec kot kutepe Yesu ŋalek alak.
42020041	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Omne sukuŋalole piko kumwowu kule, mosukwek Ŋapanet keseniyantetap Tauti?
42020042	Omnye mwowu Tauti nkit om kitaputap tumwonikap kakastayet kule: ‘Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryontenyu kule, Pure yu po yewumwani nyepo tay,
42020043	okoy okoci ani punikuk kwek ŋecerokap kerenkokuk.’
42020044	Kunyo nteye kure Tauti nkit neto kule, ‘Mokoryontet.’ Komuce kulene yec Ŋapanet kwek keseniyantetap Tauti?’’
42020045	Yoto kumite kulime piko tokol, kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule,
42020046	“Oripkey koromun wule mite konetikap ntarastinek, ce möce kule cepesetoti kukelac sirok ce koyec, oŋnkucöme kule ciyweyec cisupayec topon om wulo po moteponik, ce kweye ŋecerok co kweyotin om korikapkok,
42020047	oko oteputek cepo tay om sokwonutek; ce nyopone korikap musukik; oŋnkusilkey kusome somutek ce caŋ, cek ce mosukunyor toŋoŋutek ce pëlisyi.’’
42021001	Yoto kukäs Yesu piko ce mokoren ce kikocini kokotutekwa sontukut nye cekonore pesanikap kotap Yiyintet.
42021002	Yoto kukäs om yoto korko panan nye musuk kukocini mpene orit kafunek oyeny;
42021003	kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kekoci panani musuk ce caŋ kusir ce kekoci piko alake tokol,
42021004	omnye kokon piko alake tokol kokotutekwa om ce koŋetune ce caŋ cepo mokoryontimwa. Ntene om wule mite korkoni panan kuyu wule yunto neto kokukoci tokol ce kuponto ce kwekolyekey om sopon nyi.’’
42021005	Kimite kuŋolole piko alake om yoto ŋalek ce nöme toponiyetap kotap Yiyintet, oko rwontok ce toponec ce kicetece oko kokotutek ce kicikase. Kumwoy Yesu kule,
42021006	“Tukucu tokol cu oköse akwek yawut, mosukupunto pesyet nye puryo kot kuŋetune rwontocu yu mite yawut, mosicipuryet tokol oŋnkyewirci ŋony.’’
42021007	Kutepe piko Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mosukupunto ŋalecutecu pesyo ne? Oŋnkukiy ne nye pelutyet nye poru kule kopunto pesyet kwiyokis ŋaleca?’’
42021008	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Akäste koromun, mente kot ciperperak cëmasak akwek, omnye mosukukwa piko ce caŋ om kaynemwani, oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Ani kunye neto!’ Oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Karik pesyet nyo kicekwey!’ Monte kot arup akwek picoto.
42021009	Monte cemuye ye kolim poryosyek oko kwankwaŋatet ye puryo kot kumite kalyet koret. Omnye mosukunyosyo kutok kunyo tukuk ceyucoto, ntene kutompo yoto kot kurik pesyetap letut.’’
42021010	Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosukusetyi koret ake kuporye koret ake, kusetyi poytoyisyet ake kuporye poytoyisyet ake;
42021011	mosukuriŋiŋ koret koromun oŋnkunäm rupet oko porwonik korosyek ce caŋ, mosukutok tukuk ce muye piko oko pelutok cekwone parak.
42021012	“Kutompo kot kwiyokis tukucutecu tokol, mosukunämak akwek piko oŋnkutaŋanyak oŋnkyewosontyinenok korikapkok oŋnkyekertak mopusi, mosicekwerok ape taytap kinkonik oko taytap poytoyik cewoyec, omnye kacäm akwek kaynemwani.
42021013	Yoto ye mosonyoru akwek poroyinto nye kamwayte ŋalek ce toponec.
42021014	Kunyo asot aŋnkawany om mukuleywekwok kutompo kot kupunto pesyet, monte cisot kule, mosiceyetkey acek kulene;
42021015	omnye mosokonok ani akwek ŋalek oko ŋomnonet nye puryo kot komuce punikwok kutay nto kutintentyi kot komuc.
42021016	Mosukuŋomntok akwek mpo Papamwoŋ oko mpo komet, oko mpo yeyamwoŋ, oko mpo tilyonutekwok, oko mpo coronutekwok, mosicepakäc kupok alake om akwek.
42021017	Mosukusenkerak akwek piko tokol omnye kocäm kaynemwani.
42021018	Ntene puryo kot kupote putyontet mpo akenke nyepo metewokwok.
42021019	Otitir okwilokisye koromun, omnye yunyoto wule mososorukey osopkey akwek nkit.’’
42021020	“Ye kokäs kule kakomut pikap luketap poryet Yerusalem, yoto ye mosonket kule karik citurpup lakwar.
42021021	Roke yoto kumwey kupa lakomosyek piko ce mite Yuteya; nto piko co mite Yerusalem orit; roke kumwey co kupa saŋ, oŋnkupuryo kot kumisyini piko co mite koret saŋ kukwa oŋnkwokowut moŋet orit.
42021022	Omnye pesyosyekap toŋoŋutek coto; kunyo kopunto pesyosyecoto sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek cepo silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule:
42021023	Mite kwapi kulene om pesyosyecoto koruk ce koyotin nto ce rerisyi! Mosukucontyi koroni taŋanynta; oŋnkunyor cek picu nerekwekap Yiyintet.
42021024	Mosicepare piko ŋotit, oŋnkyenäm cekwer ku mopusin kupa korosyek tokol; oŋnkukwa lamek kwokutyikta Yerusalem, okoy kupunto pesyosyekwa ce kiceyiytoci.’’
42021025	“Mosukuporkey pelutok cepo kakitat om wule mite asista oko arawet oko kokelik, nto om koret kumuyo piko tokol kucoŋoŋenis cek om karumntap ruretyet oko peko ce tultoykey.
42021026	Mosukumisto piko om muyotet ye mite cek kukene tukuk ce mo kukwontyi koret tokol; omnye mosukutimtimnkey swametap torot.
42021027	Yoto ye mosukukäs cek Weritap cito kucone polyet kuponto kamukeywek oko woyinto nyewo koromun.
42021028	Ye kacec kutok tukuk ceyucoto, oyoŋnkye onyal parak omnye karik yoto pesyet nye ce sorunenok akwek.’’
42021029	Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko tyonkoconi kule, “Akäs ketit mokoywet oko ketik alak tokol.
42021030	Ye kokäs akwek nye puryo kot ce mwowok kule kokuŋot sokek, yoto oŋnket kule karik pesyosyekap peŋatut.
42021031	Kunyo ye kokäs akwek tukuk ceyucoto kwiyoktos möce onŋket kule karik poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
42021032	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukwiyokis tukucu tokol kutompo kot kupok piko cepo pini ce soptos yawut.
42021033	Poku wulin po torot oko wuli po ŋony, ntene puryo kot kupoku ŋalekwani mpo kisic.’’
42021034	“Oripkey akwek nkit! Monte kot kowurtak sokwonutek oko pokitetap komek, oko kasoteywekap sopontap pesyosyecu, omnye muce kucontyok akwek pesyonoto lakwar nye puryo kot oŋnket kuyu musat;
42021035	omnye mosukucontyi piko tokol ce mite koret tokol kumukul.
42021036	Kunyo oripkey pesyosyek tokol, oŋnkosome sukuŋet onyoru swamet nye omuci omweye acilile tukucutecu tokol ce mokwiyokis, saŋet oyoŋe akwek taytap Weritap cito.’’
42021037	Kunetisye Yesu pesyosyecoto kotap Yiyintet, nteye kemen koret kuweti wokurwe tulwet nye cekure tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek.
42021038	Yoto kupeti piko tokol kororn okoy kotap Yiyintet wule kinetisye Yesu wokulimntoy ŋalekyi.
42022001	Nteyu kowo kurikta kupunto pesyetap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, nyoto kunye sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet.
42022002	Kimite yoto tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek kucenye aret nye muce kupakäce Yesu kume, omnye kiywey cekto piko.
42022003	Yoto kowut Setanit Yuta nye cekure Isikaryoti nye ki akenke om kiyokikap Yesu taman ok oyeny.
42022004	Kunomen Yuta kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec oko piko cewoyec ce ripe kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkuwokuŋololyin oko cek wule muktoy neto kuŋomnto Yesu oŋnkukoci cek kunäm.
42022005	Kuŋerec cek koromun oŋnkumwoci cek Yuta kule mocekoniŋ pesanik.
42022006	Kucäm Yuta kuyunyoto oŋnkucec kuceny poroyinto nye topon nye muce neto kuŋomnte Yesu kunäm cek nye puryo kot kunkete piko.
42022007	Yoto kupunto pesyetap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, ye ceyenye keciryetap Keytayet kwek korosyo oŋnkyam.
42022008	Yoto kuyokto Yesu Petero oko Yowana oŋnkunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Ape woyiytowec kyam omikap pesyetap Keytayet.’’ Kutepe cek Yesu kule,
42022009	“Ono wule möce nyi kule woceyiyte acek?’’
42022010	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Alim pa, ape nteye kopunte moŋet mosukutuyenok akwek citake nye toronu teretap peko, arup cicoto okoy koto nye kewut.
42022011	Omwoci citap koto kule, ‘Komwowuŋ konetintet kule, ono kotap toyek nye moyomisye ani oko konomikwani omikap Keytayet?’
42022012	Mosukuporwok cicoto koto nyewo nye satat topon nye mite koto parak; wayiyte akwek kiy ake tokol om wuloto.’’
42022013	Kupa cek okoy wokunyor kiy ake tokol kumite kuyu wulo kakamwayta Yesu. Kuyiyta cek omikap Keytayet.
42022014	Ntowo kupunto ye kyomisyi, kopur Yesu ŋony wanak oko Kiyokik.
42022015	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kwomöce ani koromun kule kyomisye wanak oko akwek omicu po pesyetap Keytayet kutompo kot ataŋany ani!
42022016	Omnye komwowok ani akwek kule, puryo kot toyome ani yec mpo kisic okokoy cikoci wule cemoktoy om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
42022017	Yoto kunäm Yesu cikompet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, kumwoy kule, “Onäm oŋnkoye opcicine akwek nkit,
42022018	omnye komwowok ani akwek kule, kuceke pesyoni, komo toye ani pekap omikap ketik ce cekure sapipunek okoy ye kaco poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
42022019	Kuyunyoto kunäm mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci cek, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye pormwani, [nye kacekon kupo akwek, oyiye kuyunyitenyi ye asoteno ani akwek.’’
42022020	Kuyunyoto yec yu kowo kupok omikap kosoleny, kunam Yesu cikompet, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Cikomponi kunye Kirotyet nyelel nyepo korotikwani ce kicitotowok akwek.’’]
42022021	“Ntene akäs pa, yewutap neto cito nye ŋomnto ani, nye mite cepontekey kyomisye meset akenke oko ani!
42022022	Omnye ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, weti Weritap cito kuyu wule kiceyiytoci, ntene mite kwapi neto cito nyo ŋomntoy!’’
42022023	Yoto kucec konomik kutepekey cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo om cekto nye wokwiye ŋolyontoni?’’
42022024	Yoto kuco tintenotet om kwenutap kiyokik kule ŋo om cekto nye cinket kule nyewo kupëlis.
42022025	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ponto Kinkonikap lamek kamukeywek kupayta piko, oŋnkyekure poytoyik kule, ‘Coronutekap piko.’
42022026	Ntene puryo kot kuyunyo om wule omite akwek, misyini nyewo om wule omite akwek kusutkey kwek nye miniŋ, nto nye kantoyin kunye yiyisyi kukolyoyisyi.
42022027	Omnye ŋo nyewo kupëlis, cito nyo pure meset kwomis nto cito nyo yosyi oŋnkusut? Cepo manta ku kule neto nyoto ku cito nyo pure meset. Ntene amite ani kwenumwakwek kuyu ci nye oyiwok akwek yisyet.
42022028	“Kwopur ani oko akwek, kunyo kwopunte syemutok kwani tokol.
42022029	Kunyo kuyu wulo kikono ani Papamwani Poytoyisyet, kunyo kakonok mpo ani akwek kamukeywek.
42022030	Sukuŋet oyomisye oŋnkoyesye mesemwani om poytoyisyemwani, oŋnkopure ŋecerok cewoyec omutyi musankut aretap pikap Israel co taman ok oyeny.’’
42022031	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Simon! Simon! Käs pa, kamac Setanit kule asesak akwek tokol kuyu wulo sestoy cito nkanuk oŋnkupciy nkanuk oko moriryek.
42022032	Ntene kosomuŋ ani nyi Simon, kule sukuŋet mente kot kupok koyeneŋuŋ, ntene om wule mite nyi nkit, ye keweckey nyi kwilakisye om wule omite ani, kumisyini kwil mpo yeyaŋuŋ.’’
42022033	Kumwoy Petero kule, “Mokoryontet, oyiku ani yiytat cerotyo mopusi oko nyi oŋnkyepoku mpo tukway!’’
42022034	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani nyi Petero kule, puryo kot koncure kurkonkit om kwomowutap pesyoni okoy tuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule puryo kot oŋnketo ani?’’
42022035	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Yo kyoyoktok ani akwek pesyet itye nye kipuryo kot anämate munyenkutap pesanik oko lolonik oko kweyonik, mite ra kiy nye kipotwok akwek yoto?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Puryo kiy nye kipotwec.’’
42022036	Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo kunäm yawut ci tokol nye puryo kot kuponto munyenkutap pesanik oko lolet, nto ci tokol nye puryo kot kuponto rotwetap cok, misyini nyoto kwalya sirenyi oŋnkwale rotwet.
42022037	Omnye komwowok ani kule, misyini kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet om wule omite ani co mwowu kule, ‘Kiciyitito neto piko ce miyotec co yirye ntarastinek.’ Omnye mite kwititoy ŋalek co kicesil ce nömo ani.’’
42022038	Kumwoy cekto kule, “Mokoryontet, käs pa, okyu rotok.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kayem.’’
42022039	Kunomen Yesu kuyu wulo yunto kopur nyi nyepo kwak, kuwo okoy kupunto tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek, yoto kupetakey neto kiyokikyi.
42022040	Nteyu kowo kupunto yoto, kumwoci cek kule, “Osom sukuŋet mente kot osuci onyoru akwek syemutok.’’
42022041	Yoto kunata Yesu kuwete ye kimite cek kuwo ye low kisic ye muce kutic rwantet ye kacewirta, oŋnkukutuny kusom kumwoy kule,
42022042	“Papa, ye cöme nyi numuneno ani cikomponi, ntene puryo kot kuyu wulo omoktoy ani, ntene kwiyokis kuyu wulo moktoy nyi.’’
42022043	[Yoto kuporkey malayket nye cone torot oŋnkutitir neto kukoci swamet.
42022044	Kusot oŋnkutaŋany koromun, ntene kutosyikey kusom koromun, okoy kurotune kiyotik ce kerkey korotik ce kitecini ŋony.]
42022045	Kuŋete Yesu ŋony om ye kimite kusome, oŋnkuwo kuketitakey ye kimite konomik, wokunyor kumite koruy om nyalilya.
42022046	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Omne soruye akwek? Oŋetye oŋnkosom sukuŋet monte osuci onyoru syemutok.’’
42022047	Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kupun luketap piko ce kintocini Yuta nye ki akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny. Kuco Yuta okoy ye mite Yesu oŋnkutoroc kuŋatut.
42022048	Ntene kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Ŋatutani kunye ŋomnte nyi Weritap cito?’’
42022049	Nteye kotoköse konomikyi kito nye mosukwiyakay kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, ceyepe acek rotok?’’
42022050	Yoto kuyepis akenke om cek kuyep mutworintetap tisintet nyewo kulot yititap tay.
42022051	Kumwoy Yesu om yoto kule, “Ayaste kayem nyoto!’’ Kunäm Yesu yititap cicoto oŋnkusop kusop.
42022052	Yoto kumwoci Yesu tisik cewoyec oko kantoyik cewoyec ce ripe kotap Yiyintet, oko poyik ce kikwa kwokunäm neto, kumwoci kule, “Kakwa akwek kuyu nye omöce kule cenam corin? Omnye kakwante rotokap cok oko runkunek?
42022053	Nteyu kwopontokey ani oko akwek pesyosyek tokol om kotap Yiyintet, ntene puryo kot asyem akwek kule cenäma ani yoto. Ntene nyimwoŋ sawet nyi, nye poytoyisyi menonet.’’
42022054	Yoto kunäm cek Yesu oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto kaytap Tisintet Nyewo. Kunam kurup Petero letut kuloyityi kuminiŋ.
42022055	Nteyu kowo cila mata yepo kwenutap saŋntap kayta, kopur piko kuyuye mata, yoto kuco mpene Petero oŋnkupur otepto nyenyi om ye kimite cekto.
42022056	Nteye kotoköse korko nye mutworin kukekweny mata Petero, kukäs topon; oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kopontokey cici Yesu!’’
42022057	Ntene kutuckey kutoyis Petero kumwoci korkonoto kule, “Cepyosyani, puryo kot oŋnket ani cico!’’
42022058	Om letut yec kuminiŋ, kukäs citake Petero, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mpenyi yiku akenke nye kepontekey oko Yesu!’’ Ntene kumwoy Petero kule, “Puryo kot ku ani!’’
42022059	Om letut yec kukopok sawet akenke, kumwoy citake yec om swamet kule, “Manta nye puryo kot kumite tintenot, kopontokey cici oko Yesu, omnye po mpene cici koretap Kalilaya.’’
42022060	Ntene kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani kito nye mwowu nyi.’’ Yoto pakenke kumite Petero kutokuŋolole, koncur kurkonkit.
42022061	Kuweckey Mokoryontet Yesu kukäs Petero. Yoto kusot Petero ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet nyo kumwocini neto kule, “Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit om kwomowutap pesyoni, mesetoyisye nyi tuckey aret somok mwowu kule puryo kot oŋnketo ani.’’
42022062	Kumiŋnto Petero kuwo saŋ, oŋnkurir lokik koromun.
42022063	Kurorici kucup piko ce kiripe Yesu, oŋnkupir neto.
42022064	Kurat konyekyi oŋnkutepe kule, “Ŋor, ŋo nyi kasyeciŋ nyi!’’
42022065	Oŋnkuŋalal cek kucup kumwoci Yesu ŋalek ce caŋ ce miyotec ce kincurure.
42022066	Nteyu kowo kuyec koret, kutuyo wanak poyikap Yutayek oko tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek, yoto kukwer cek Yesu kuco kokwemwa.
42022067	Kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Mwowec acek, yiku nyi Ŋapanet?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Nka kot komwowok ani akwek kupuryo kot oyeni;
42022068	kunyo nka kot katepenak ani akwek teput kupuryo kot owekwo.
42022069	Ntene kuceke yawut oŋnkutosyikey kuwo tay mosukopurune Weritap cito yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol.’’
42022070	Kumwoy cek kule, “Kunyo yiku nyi so Weritap Yiyintet?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Akwek ce omwowu kule oyiku ani.’’
42022071	Yoto kumwoy cek kule, “Komo cemöce acek muncururwanik alak omnye kacelim acek nkit ŋalek ce kwone kutinyi nkit!’’
42023001	Yoto kuŋetyo luketap piko tokol oŋnkukwer Yesu okoy kupunto taytap Pilato.
42023002	Oŋnkucec cek kuwosontyi neto kumwoy kule, “Kucenyoru acek cici kumite kumose pikap korenyacek, oŋnkuyete kukerekta piko mente kukweci mosoret Kinko Nyewo, oŋnkukurkey kule oyiku Ŋapanet!’’
42023003	Kutepe Pilato kumwoci Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Nyi nye mwowu.’’
42023004	Yoto kumwoci Pilato tisik cewoyec oko luketap piko tokol kule, “Mnanyorte ani cici lelis nye miyat.’’
42023005	Ntene kutosyikey cek kumwoy om swamet kule, “Kwonykwonye kumose neto piko, kunet om koretap Yuteya tokol; kiceke Kalilaya okoy kunyi mite yawut wuli.’’
42023006	Ntowo kulim Pilato kuyunyoto, kutep kule, “Po cicitenyi Kalilaya?’’
42023007	Nteyu kowo kunket kule cepoytowune Yesu koretap Erote, kukoyito Yesu cekwer kuwo wule mite Erote, omnye kimite nyo pesyosyecoto Yerusalem.
42023008	Nteye kotoköse Erote Yesu, kuŋerec koromun, omnye kikilim neto ŋalek ce nöme Yesu, kunyo kisotyini kule mosukukäs kwiye pelutok cepo kakitat.
42023009	Kutepe Erote Yesu teputek ce caŋ, ntene kusis Yesu nye kipuryo kot kuwekyi neto ŋolyo mpo akenke.
42023010	Yoto kuyoŋ tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oŋnkuwosontyi Yesu kumwoy ŋalek cepo swama.
42023011	Kunyil oŋnkurorci Erote oko sikarekyi Yesu, oŋnkulokyi siret nye topon; oŋnkuketita cekwer kuwo wule mite Pilato.
42023012	Kuceke pesyonoto kucomnyo kwek coronut yec Erote oko Pilato, omnye kisenkerekey cek kunyo.
42023013	Kukur Pilato kukwa kopur wanak tisik cewoyec oko poytoyik oko piko,
42023014	oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Kokweru akwek cici kuco wule omite ani oŋnkwowosontyi omwowu kule, mose piko kutay kurup ntarastinek. Kunyo kokir ŋalekyi om yu po taymwakwek, ntene puryo kot onyoru ani lelis nye miyat nye ponto kuyu wulo omwoytoy akwek.
42023015	Kunyo mpo Erote puryo kot kunyorta neto lelis, omnye koketwec acek. Kunyo puryo kot kwiy neto ŋolyo nye miyat nye misyini cepakäce.
42023016	Mosokoyite ani wocepas korokonik, nteye kapok atyakte.’’
42023017	[Om pesyetap sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet kimuce Pilato kutyokyi piko mopusyontet akenke.]
42023018	Yoto kupol piko tokol koromun kumwoy kule, “Pakäc cici! Oŋnkityokwec acek Parapa!’’
42023019	(Kicerat cekerta Parapa mopusi om ŋalek ce kikwonykwonyokis om moŋet oko omnye kiporis neto.)
42023020	Kuŋololyi Pilato yec piko, omnye kimöce kule atyakte Yesu.
42023021	Ntene kutosyikey piko tokol kupol kumwoy kule, “Wuyite! Wuyite! Wuyitoci neto murtowontet!’’
42023022	Kumwoci Pilato yec piko aret nyepo somok kule, “Omne! Lelis ne nye kukwiy? Puryo kot anyoru ani lelis nye miyat nye misyini cepakäce! Kunyo mokoyite ani wocepas aŋnkatyakte.’’
42023023	Ntene kutosyikey piko tokol kupol koromun kumwoy om swamet kule, “Misyini cewuyitoci murtowontet.’’ Nto om letut kupëlis polotetap piko.
42023024	Yoto kumutyi Pilato musankut Yesu kuyu wulo komoktoy cekto.
42023025	Kutyakta Pilato cito nyo komöce cekto, nyoto kunye kiratat om mopusi om ŋalekap kwankwaŋatet oko porisyet, oŋnkukoyito Yesu kuyiyta kuyu wulo komoktoy cek.
42023026	Nteye kimite cikwer Yesu, cetuye om aran Simon nyepo koretap Kurene nye kicone koret saŋ kuconi moŋet, kunäm cek neto oŋnkyikoci kukonopat murtowontet oŋnkunam letutap Yesu.
42023027	Kupa piko ce caŋ kurup Yesu let oko koruk ce kiriroti kusyekotikey montuwu kurire Yesu.
42023028	Kuwekyikey Yesu korucoto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Tipikap Yerusalem, monte cerirena ani, arirekey akwek nkit pate oko lekokwok.
42023029	Omnye mosukupunto pesyosyek ce kwoni ce mosicemwoy piko kule, ‘Ŋerekotin koruk co kisonon, oko montuwok ce puryo kot kuyiy oko kitinak ce puryo kot kureris.’
42023030	Om pesyosyecoto ye mosukumwoci piko tulonok kule, ‘Olulyec acek!’ Oŋnkumwoci lakemosyek kule, ‘Awunyec acek!’
42023031	Omnye ye yicini piko ŋalek ceyucu ketit nye ata, mosukwiy kulene nye yamat?’’
42023032	Yoto cekwer piko alak oyeny ce kikowurta wocepakäc oko Yesu.
42023033	Nteyu kowo ciyitita cek ye cekure kule, “Rokyetap Metit.’’ Cekwertoci Yesu murtowontet om yoto, neto oko pikey oyeny, kopurune ake yewutap tay, kopurune ake yewutap let.
42023034	Kuŋalal Yesu kumwoy kule, “Papa, kalye nyi cek! Omnye puryo kot kunkete kito nye yiye.’’ Kupcicin sikarek sirokyi kuporci kirotyet.
42023035	Kuyoŋ yoto piko ce kimite kuköse ye kimite kuroricini koncurure poytoyik Yesu kumwowu kule, “Kisope neto piko alak; kunyo kusopkey pa neto nkit ye cici kunye Ŋapanet nye kikwey Yiyintet!’’
42023036	Kurorici mpo sikarek Yesu, oŋnkukwa ye kimite neto oŋnkukoci finyonik ce mintililec koromun.
42023037	Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye yiku nyi Kinko nyepo Yutayek, sopkey pa nyi nkit.’’
42023038	Cesil murtowontet parak ŋalecu kule, “NYI KU KINKO NYEPO YUTAYEK.’’
42023039	Yoto kuŋalal cito akenke om pikey oyeny nye kiwuyitot kucup Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot yiku nyi ne Ŋapanet? Kunyo sopkey pa nyi nkit oŋnkisopec mpo acek.’’
42023040	Ntene kuwekyi kupolyi cito nyin ake kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot yweyi nyi Yiyintet? Omnye ceponte musankut nye kerkey oko nyenyi.
42023041	Ntene po musankut nyinyo manta, omnye kocenyoru acek ce rokenec om tukuk ce kiciy. Ntene puryo kot kwiy cici lelis nye miyat.’’
42023042	Kumwoci cicoto Yesu kule, “Yesu oŋnkisota ani om pesyet nye coni om poytoyisyeŋuŋ.’’
