42023043	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cicoto kule, “Komwowuŋ ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, om pesyoni mosicipur wanak oko ani om koretap Yiyintet wule topon.’’
42023044	Ntowo kupunto sawet lö nyepo pet, kunäm menonet koret tokol okoy kupunto sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny.
42023045	Yoto kutay asista nye meluwu, kukerer kupciwunekey oyeny siret nye cepciye otepto nye Nyetilil om kotap Yiyintet.
42023046	Kokurto Yesu om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Papa, okocini ani soponmwani yewuniyekuk.’’ Nteyu kowo kuwany kumwoy kuyunyoto, kume.
42023047	Nteye kotoköse nyewo nyepo sikarek tukuk ce keyokis, kukasta Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot kupunto cici lelis manta.’’
42023048	Nteyu kowo kukäs piko ce kikerurukyikey yoto kwokukasta, tukuk ce keyokis, kunomen cek kuweckey kupa kestonikwa kusyekotikey montuwu.
42023049	Ntene kuyoŋ ye low kuminiŋ piko co kinkete Yesu, oko koruk co kikwontoykey neto kuceke Kalilaya. Kukäs cek tokol ŋalecutecu.
42023050	-
42023051	Kimite citake nye cekure Yosep, nye kirwokin, nyepo kokwetap Yutayek oŋnku ci nye ki siken koromun. Kipuryo kot kucäm neto kirwoketap cut oko tukuk ce kikwiy. Kipo neto moŋetap Yutayek nye cekure Arimaseya. Kimite neto kukene poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
42023052	Kuwo cicoto wule kimite Pilato oŋnkusom cikoci neto portap Yesu.
42023053	Kunum kurekune musto kucone murtowontet, oŋnkurate suket nyelel, oŋnkukoci mwenet nye kicepäl rwantet kwek kepen, nye kipuryo kot cetupci citake tokol.
42023054	Kipesyet nyoto nye kiceyiytoykey omnye kikirik kwek pesyetap Sapat.
42023055	Kuwetokey Yosep koruk co kinomu Yesu kuceke Kalilaya okoy wokukäs cek topon mwenet oko wule kacemuyta portap Yesu.
42023056	Oŋnkunomen cek kuweckey kupa ka wokuyiyta mwaninek co poŋu sukuŋet kusut kwokuyile musto. Yoto komuny cekto om pesyetap Sapat kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek.
42024001	Nto kerir koret pate ye kipesyetap Santey, kupa koruk okoy kupunto ye kimite mwenet, kusute cek mwaninek co poŋu ce kikikwiyta.
42024002	Ntene wokunyor kucewunukto rwantet nye kicekere mwenet.
42024003	Ntowo kowut orit, yoto kipuryo kot kunyor portap Mokoryontet Yesu.
42024004	Nteye kimite korucoto kokite, yoto pakenke kukwa piko oyeny ce kelac sirok ce lelac ce lekecectos onŋkuyoŋe komos om ye kimite cekto.
42024005	Kumuyo korucoto koromun, oŋnkuwec metewokwa kukäs ŋony, kumwoci picoto cek kule, “Omne socenye akwek, wule mite muswek ce kipok neto cito nye sopot?
42024006	Puryo kot kumite yu; kokotutune met. Asot pa ŋalek co kimwowok akwek neto ye kimite Kalilaya kule,
42024007	‘Mosicenäm weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm yewuniyekap piko ce miyotec; oŋnkuwo cewuyitoci murtowontet, nteye pesyetap somok ciŋet kotutune met.’ ’’
42024008	Yoto kusot korucoto ŋalekap Yesu.
42024009	Kunomene cek wuloto kimite mwenet; oŋnkupa wokumwoci ŋalek tokol kiyokik taman ok akenke oko piko alak tokol.
42024010	Korucoto ku mpo, Mariyam nyepo moŋetap Maktala, oko Yoan, oko Mariyam kametitap Yakopo; cekto coto wanak oko koruk alak. Kumwoci cek Kiyokik ŋalek tokol.
42024011	Ntene kusot Kiyokik yoto kule, perperyo pate ŋalek ce komwoy koruk, yoto kutay macäm ŋalekwa.
42024012	Ntene kuŋet Petero oŋnkulapat okoy ye kimite mwenet, ntowo kupunto; kuyim kukoyito; yoto kukäs pate sirok co cemuytoy musto, ntene kipuryo kiy ake tokol. Kunomen kuweckey kuwo ka kokitote tukuk ce kukwiyokis.
42024013	Om pesyonoto akenke, ye kimite kupeti konomik oyeny kaytake nye cekure Emawus nye kimite kilomitanik taman kuceke Yerusalem.
42024014	Nteye kimite cek kupeti om aran kuŋololoti kurwoke tukuk ce kukwiyokis,
42024015	yoto kuco Yesu ye kimite cek oŋnkupetakey wanak tokol.
42024016	Kukäs cek neto, ntene kipuryo kot konket kule neto ku ŋo.
42024017	Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Ŋal ne cu oŋololoti akwek yu omite opeti?’’ Kuyoŋ cek om yoto konyer kusiriny tokoywekwa.
42024018	Kuwekyi akenke om cekto nye cekure Kliopa kumwoci kule, “Nyi nkit pate tontet nye mite Yerusalem nye puryo kot konkete tukuk ce kukwiyokis om wuloto?’’
42024019	Kutepe neto cek kule, “Kiy nye kukwiyakay?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoci kule, “Ŋalekap Yesu nyepo Nasaret, cito nye ku workoyo nyepo swamet om ŋalek ce kukwiye om wule mite Yiyintet oko wule mite piko tokol.
42024020	Ntene kunyo kunäm tisik kyacek cewoyec oko poytoyik oŋnkuwosontyi kumutyi musankut cepakäc kume cewuyitoci murtowontet.
42024021	Kunyo kucisot acek kule neto nye mokusop kusor pikap Israel! Kunyo kutokumite ŋalekyo tokol yo, pesyetap somok yawut nyi kuceke kweyokis ŋalecato.
42024022	Kunyi kucikite acek koromun koruk alak ce kucepontekey tokol ce kamusta pesyoni kerir koret pate kupa wule mite mwenet,
42024023	ntene puryo kot wokunyor pornyi, kuweckey cek oŋnkukwa kwokumwoy kule keporcikey kuŋoŋnkyi malaykanik ce komwoci cek kule, sopot neto.
42024024	Kapa mpo pesyoni piko alake ce kucepontekey acek tokol okoy wule mite mwenet, wokunyor mpecek manta kuyu wulo komwoytoy koruk, ntene puryo kot kukäs cekto neto.’’
42024025	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oyiku akwek pic ce perper, ce oponte mukuleywek ce wuyec ye mocäm ŋalek tokol ce kimwoy workoyik!
42024026	Kipuryo kot kumisyini kutaŋany Ŋapanet om tukucutecu sukowut woyin nyi?’’
42024027	Yoto kuporci kumwoci neto cek ŋalek tokol ce kicemwoy ce nöme neto om silutekap Yiyintet, kuceke kitaputap Moses oko silutek tokol cepo workoyik.
42024028	Nteyu kowo kukwa cek okoy kurikta kayta nye kipeti, yoto kuyiytakey neto nye möce kule atil akeyte cek kuwo tay;
42024029	ntene kurany cekto neto kumwoci kule, “Cipur oko acek, omnye kokwimen, kunyo mite kurotorote koret.’’ Kuwo neto koto orit wokopur oko cekto.
42024030	Nteyu kowo kopur neto oko cek kwomis, kunäm neto mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci cek.
42024031	Yoto kuŋoŋokis konyekwa kusow konket neto, oŋnkupote konyekwa.
42024032	Kuŋalal konomikey oyeny kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot kwamec acek montuwok yo koŋololwec neto om aran kuŋoŋwec ŋalek ce mite silutekap Yiyintet.’’
42024033	Yoto pakenke kuŋetyo cek lakwar, oŋnkunomen kupa Yerusalem; wokunyor kiyokik cut taman ok akenke ok piko alak kumite keruruckey wanak. Kimite yoto cut kuŋolole kumwowu kule,
42024034	“Kokotutune met mokoryontet manta! Omnye kokuporcikey Simon!’’
42024035	Yoto kuporci kumwoci konomik co koyeny cut ŋalek tokol ce keyokis om aran oko ye kosowu kunket cek Mokoryontet ye kopetece mukatyantet.
42024036	Nteye kitokumite cek kuporcini kumwocini cut ŋalecato, kuco pakenke lakwar Mokoryontet nkit oŋnkuyoŋe kwenumwa, oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Opurte kalyet.’’
42024037	Kumuyo cek koromun; kusote kule toskoy ceköse atotoy.
42024038	Ntene kumwoci neto cek kule, “Omne somuye kuyunyi aŋnkasot om kasoteywekwok ŋal ceyucu?
42024039	Akäs pa akwek yewuniyekwani oko kerenkokwani. Ani nyitenyi. Anäma ani pa akwek oŋnkokäs; omnye puryo kot kuponto atotoy panyek oko koyek kuyu cu oponte ani.’’
42024040	Kumwoy ŋalecato kuyunyoto oŋnkuporci cek yewuniyekyi oko kerenkokyi.
42024041	Nteye kimite cek kutompo kot kuyen kucäm kule manta ŋalecata om ŋerekwek ce kiponto oko kakitatet; yoto kutepe neto cek kule, “Oponte akwek om yu kiy nye moyam?’’
42024042	Kukoci cek neto purpuryontet nye kaciyo kurur.
42024043	Kunäm neto oŋnkwam kuköse cek om konyekwa.
42024044	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ŋalecutecu kuco kyomwowo akwek ye kitocepontekey, yo kyomwowok kule, mosukwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek tokol ce kicesil ce nömo ani om ntarastinekap Moses oko silutekap workoyik oko cepo tumwonikap kakastayet.’’
42024045	Yoto kuŋany neto kasoteywekwa kunket silutekap Yiyintet,
42024046	oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Ŋalecutecu kuco kicesil kule, ‘Misyini kutaŋany Ŋapanet; oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met ye pesyetap somok.
42024047	Oko kule; om kaynenyi mosicemwoci pikap koret tokol lokoywek cepo reŋetapkey oko kakalyayetap miyotyonik; kuceke ŋalecato Yerusalem.’
42024048	Kunyo oyiku akwek muncururwanikwani cepo ŋalecutecu.
42024049	Kunyo mosoyoku ani nkit kuco wule omite akwek neto nyo kikurto Papamwani. Ntene opur moŋonitenyi okoy ye kocilokwok akwek swamet nye cone torot.’’
42024050	Yoto kuntoci Yesu cek kukwer kuŋete moŋet kupa okoy kupunto Pesaniya, ntowo kupunto yoto kunömnci Yesu yewuniyekyi torot kusomnci cekto.
42024051	Nteye kimite kusomncini cekto kupeyok kupciykey om wule mite cek, cesut neto kuwo torot.
42024052	Yoto kukutuny cek kusay Yesu, oŋnkuweckey tokol kupa Yerusalem kuponto ŋerekwek ce caŋ.
42024053	Yoto kopurune cek pesyosyek tokol kotap Yiyintet orit kukostoy Yiyintet.
43001001	Kimite ŋolyontet kuceke towunot. Kipontokey ŋolyontet Yiyintet, ŋolyontet kunye Yiyintet.
43001002	Kipontokey ŋolyontet Yiyintet kuceke towunot.
43001003	Kicitany tukuk tokol kupunte wule mite neto, puryo kiy mpo akenke nye mite koret nye kipuryo kot citany kupunune wule mite neto.
43001004	Kinyorta tukuk tokol soponto wule mite neto, kwek soponto lakweyetap piko, soponto nyenyi kunye kisut lakweyet kuco wule mite piko.
43001005	Lucini lakweyet menonet, oŋnku puryo komuce menonet kenyis kot komis lakweyet.
43001006	Kiyok Yiyintet kiyokintenyi, citake nye cekure Yowana,
43001007	nye kico cokwek muncururwet nye kiporci piko lakweyet, sukuŋet kulim piko tokol lokoywek oŋnkuyen kupunte wule mite neto.
43001008	Kipuryo ku neto nye lakweyet, ntene kico cokupor ŋalek ce nöme lakweyet.
43001009	Lakweyet nyitenyi nyepo manta nye coni koret oŋnkukweny piko tokol.
43001010	Kunyo kimite neto koret, kitany Yiyintet koret kupunte wule mite neto, oŋnkurok kipuryo kot kunket koret kule neto ku ŋo.
43001011	Kico neto korenyi ntene kutay pikyi matoroc kuŋerekyi.
43001012	Ntene kuŋerekyi kutoroc piko alake oŋnkuyen ŋalekyi. Yoto kukoci neto picoto kamukeywek kwek lekokap Yiyintet.
43001013	Ntene kipuryo kot kwek cek lekokap Yiyintet om aret kuyu wulo ceyitoyi piko, nto om corokyinot nyepo piko, ntene Yiyintet nkit kunye Papamwa.
43001014	Kuweckey ŋolyontet kwek ci oŋnkopurune wule ce mite. Kicekäs acek woyinto nyenyi nye ponto poypoyet nyewo oko ŋalek cepo manta. Woyinto nyitenyi kunye kinyor neto kuyu weritap Papa nye akenke pate.
43001015	Kiŋalale Yowana ŋalek ce nöme neto kumwoy kule, “Oŋyi cito nyo kyoŋolole ani omwowu ŋalek ce nöme neto kule, cito nye coni om letumwani kunye nyewo kupëlo, omnye kimite neto om towunot kutompo kot otuku ani.’’
43001016	Om poypoyenyi nyewo koromun kunye kucenyoru acek tokol kupeyok ce caŋ cerupkey kuceke ake okoy ake.
43001017	Kikon Yiyintet ntarastinek kupunune wule mite Moses, ntene kico poypoyenyi oko ŋalek ce po manta kopunune wule mite Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Puryo ci mpo akenke nye kikäs Yiyintet, Ntene Werit akenke pate, nye kerkey oko Yiyintet oŋnkopurune komostap Papa kunye kiporwec acek Yiyintet.
43001019	Ŋalek cu ce kimwoy Yowana ye kiyoku Yutayek om Yerusalem tisik oko lefik kwokutepe neto kule, “Nyi kuŋo?’’
43001020	Kipuryo kot kutay Yowana mowekyi cekto. Ntene kitorci kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot oyiku ani Ŋapanet.’’
43001021	Kutepe cek Yowana kule, “Kunyo yiku nyi ŋo? Yiku nyi Eriya?’’ Kumwoci Yowana cekto kule, “Puryo kot kwani nyo!’’ Kutepe cek neto kule, “Yiku nyi workoyontet?’’ Kuwec Yowana kule, “Puryo kot kwani nyo.’’
43001022	Kumwoy cek kule “Mwowec acek ŋolyontet nye wocemwocini piko co kweyokwec. Kurekey nyi kule oyiku ŋo?’’
43001023	Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci cek kule, “Oyiku ani polotetap cito nye pole kitela kule, ‘Asat kurotakey aret nye wete Mokoryontet!’ ’’ Kimwowu workoyontet Isaya ŋalecutecu.
43001024	Yoto piko co kiyoku Farasayek.
43001025	Kutepe cek Yowana kule, “Ye puryo kot yiku nyi ŋapanet, oŋnkupuryo kot yiku Eriya nto workoyontet, kunyo omne sepotisonisyi nyi?’’
43001026	Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci kule, “Opotisonisye ani peko, ntene mite citake nye keyoŋe kwenumwakwek nye puryo kot oŋnketi.
43001027	Cito nyoto coni om letumwani kunye puryo kot oyeme ani kot atyac porokap kweyonikyi.’’
43001028	Kikwiyokisye ŋalecutecu tokol Pesaniya om oyinetap Yortan pitonin wule kipotisonisye Yowana.
43001029	Ntowo kuyekune, kukäs Yowana Yesu kuconi wule mite neto, yoto kumwoy kule, “Akäs pa, keciryetap Yiyintet nye numu miyotyetap Koret!
43001030	Cito nyitenyi nyo kwoŋolole yo kwomwowu kule, ‘Coni om letumwani cito nyewo kupëlo, omnye kimite neto om towunot kutompo kot otoku ani.’
43001031	Kipuryo kot oŋnket kule neto ku ŋo. Ntene kyaco ani copotisonisye peko sukuŋet aparte cinket neto om Israel.’’
43001032	Ŋalek cu kuce kitor Yowana kumwoy kule, “Kyakäs ani Muyet Nyetilil kurekune torot kuconi ŋony kuyu swarar oŋnkopure metinyi.
43001033	Oŋnkurok yoto kipuryo kot oŋnket ani neto. Ntene Yiyintet nyo kiyokwo copotisonisye peko nye kimwowo kule, ‘Cito nyo kekäs kurekyi Muyet Nyetilil oŋkopure metinyi kunye cito nyoto nye potisonisye Muyet Nyetilil.’ ’’
43001034	Kumwoy Yowana kule, “Kwakäs ani neto kunyo omwowok kule neto kunye Weritap Yiyintet.’’
43001035	Ntowo kuyekune kimite Yowana wuloto yec kupontokey konomikyi oyeny.
43001036	Yoto kukäs Yowana kuweti Yesu kupunte ye kilekite cekto, kumwoy kule, “Akäs pa oŋyi keciryetap Yiyintet.’’
43001037	Yoto kulim konomikyi cokey oyenku kumwowu neto ŋalecato, kupa kupetakey Yesu.
43001038	Kuweckey Yesu kukäs let, nteye katoköse kurupe cek neto kutepe kule, “Ocenye ne akwek?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Rapi! Poru kaynana kule ‘Konetintet’ Minye nyi ono?’’
43001039	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwakäs.’’ Yoto kupa cekto oko neto okoy wokukäs wule minye; oŋnkupur cek tokol pesyonoto kwimen, kikipunto sawet yoto taman nyepo kosoleny.
43001040	Cito akenke om picoto oyeny nye kilim ŋalekap Yowana oŋnkuwo kunäm Yesu ku Antereya mutakwametitap Simon Petero.
43001041	Yoto pakenke kunyor Antereya mutakwam Simon oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kacenyoru Kristo.’’ (Poru kaynana kule Ŋapanet.)
43001042	Kukwer Antereya Simon okoy wule mite Yesu. Kukäs Yesu Petero oŋnkumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi so Simon weritap Yowana, kunyo mosicekureniŋ kayneŋuŋ Kefa (nye poru kaynana kule Petero, nto Kitawet.) ’’
43001043	Ntowo kuyekune kumäc Yesu kule awo Kalilaya, yoto kunyor Filipo kumwoci nyo kule, “Nama cepetekey ani.’’
43001044	Filipo ku cito nye kipo Pesasayita moŋet nye kiminye Antereya oko Petero.
43001045	Yoto kunyor Filipo Nasanael oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kacenyoru acek neto cito nyo kisil Moses ŋalek ce nöme neto. Yesu nyitenyi weritap Yosep nye cone Nasaret.’’
43001046	Kutep Nasanael kumwoy kule, “Muce ra kotokune kitake nye topon Nasaret?’’ Kuwekyi Filipo kumwoci neto kule, “Co cekäs pa.’’
43001047	Nteye kotoköse Yesu Nasanael kuconi wule mite neto, kuŋalal ŋalek ce nöme neto kumwoy kule, “Käs pa oŋyi Isroloyintet sikwo nye moponto lelis!’’
43001048	Kutepe Nasanael Yesu kule, “Kenketeno ani ne nyi,’’ kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kwakäsiŋ yo kwemite mokoyontet ŋony kutompo kot kukuriŋ nyi Filipo.’’
43001049	Kuwekyi Nasanael kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet; yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet. Yiku kinko nyepo Israel!’’
43001050	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Keyen nyi so omnye komwowuŋ kule, kwakäsiŋ ye kwemite mokoyontet ŋony? Mesekäs cewoyec ce pële coto.’’
43001051	Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Komwowok ŋalek cepo manta kule mosakäs kuyatakay wulin po torot oŋnkokäs malaykanikap Yiyintet ce loŋntoy oŋnkureku kurekyini Weritap cito!’’
43002001	Nto om letutap pesyosyek oyeny, kimite sakwetap komütisyet nye kimite Kana om koretap Kalilaya. Kimite kametitap Yesu wuloto.
43002002	Kikicekur Yesu oko konomikyi kupa sakwet.
43002003	Nteyu kowo ceye Finyonik tokol kupok, kumwoci kamet Yesu kule, “Kororci piko Finyonik.’’
43002004	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Cepyos! Mokeno ne kutompo kot kupunto pesyosyekwani!’’
43002005	Kumwoci Kametitap Yesu mutworik kule, “Aŋnkayiy kiy ake tokol nye komwowok.’’
43002006	Kimite yoto terenik cepo peko cepo rwontok ce kiyite lö, kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekap tinitap Yutayek om kowunet. Kimuce kunyiy teret akenke om coto peko cepo litanik pokol akenke.
43002007	Kumwoci Yesu mutworik kule, “Anyit peko terenicu.’’ Yoto kunyit cek kunyiy peko kule pak.
43002008	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Oromu yawut peko oŋnkusutyi cito nyo poytoy sakwet.’’ Yoto kusutyi cek neto.
43002009	Kucemcem cito nye poytoy sakwet peko ce kaweckey kwek Finyonik, nye kipuryo kot kunkete wule kukwone ntene kunkete mutworik ce koromu wule kokwone. Yoto kukur cicoto cito nye kemütisyi,
43002010	oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nyosyi piko tokol kukoci piko Finyonik ce toponec nteye koyesyo piko kot kuyem kukon om letut Finyonik ce toytoy, ntene kunyo kekonor nyi Finyonik ce toponec okoy kunyi!’’
43002011	Kinyosyo Yesu kwiye ŋolyontoni po kakitat Kana om koretap Kalilaya. Kupor neto woyinnyi om wuloto, yoto kuyen konomikyi ŋalekyi.
43002012	Nto om letutap ŋalecato, kunomen Yesu oko kamet oko mpo mutakwam oko konomikyi kuwo okoy Kapernaum, wokopur wuloto pesyos ce ŋeri.
43002013	Kikirik yoto kupunto sakwetap Yutayek nyepo Keytayet. Kuwo Yesu yoto kulaŋnta Yerusalem.
43002014	Wokunyorta Kotap Yiyintet orit piko ce kimite kepur ce kyolyoy tuka oko swororok oko piko co wöle pesanik ce kepur cekto yepo mesanikwa.
43002015	Yoto kwiy Yesu porok kwek kipoket oŋnkukwet tokol kupete kotap Yiyintet, kecirek oko tuka, oŋnkumil mesanikap piko co wölisyi oŋnkuseret pesanikwa.
43002016	Kumwoci neto piko co kolyoy swororok kule, “Osut tukucu kupete yu. Monte ceyiy Kotap Papamwani kwek matepo!’’
43002017	Yoto kusot konomik kule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ayi Yiyintet ŋerekwekwani ce cöme koŋuŋ kuce loytos kuyo mata.’’
43002018	Kuwekyikey Yutayek neto oŋnkutepe kule, “Kiy ne nyepo kakitat nye muci nye yiy sukuŋet porwec acek kule ponte kamukeywek ce yiye tukucu?’’
43002019	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Oturpup pa akwek koyi po Yiyintet, mosatec ani kuyo om pesyosyek somok pate.’’
43002020	Kutepe cek neto kule, “Metece nyi pesyos somok pate kuyo koyi kicetece kenyisyek artam oko lö?’’
43002021	Ntene kotap Yiyintet nye kiŋolole Yesu ku porto nyenyi nkit.
43002022	Nteyu kowo ciŋet neto kotutune met, kusot kusow konomikyi kule kimwoy neto ŋalecutecu, kuyen cekto ŋalek cepo silutekap Yiyintet oko ŋolyontet nye kimwoy Yesu.
43002023	Nteye kimite Yesu Yerusalem ye ki pesyetap sakwetap Keytayet kuyen piko ce caŋ ŋalekyi yu kowo kukäs tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto.
43002024	Ntene kipuryo kot kukenekey Yesu cekto, omnye kinkete neto topon wule yunto piko tokol.
43002025	Kipuryo kot komöce neto citake nye komwoci wule yunto piko omnye kinkete tokol ce mite mukuleywekwa.
43003001	Kimite citake nye cekure Nikontemo nye ki poytoyintet nyepo Yutayek, nye kipo neto luket nyepo Farasayek.
43003002	Kuco pesyet ake komoy wule mite Yesu oŋnkucokumwoci kule, “Konetintet, cinket acek kule yiku nyi konetintet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, omnye puryo ci nye muce kot kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat cu yiye nyi, tos pate ye pontokey cicoto Yiyintet.’’
43003003	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Komwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye tompo kot ceyi cito aret oyeny kupuryo kot kuköse cito nyoto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’’
43003004	Kutepe Nikontemo neto kule, “Muce kulene cito nye kiwoyit ceyi aret yec oyeny? Muce pa kowut yec moyetap kamet oŋnkyeyi aret oyeny?’’
43003005	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Komwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo ci nye muce kowut poytoyisyetap Yiyintet ye tompo kot ceyi cito nyoto om peko oko Muyet Nyetilil.
43003006	Yiye porto porto, kuyi Muyet Nyetilil Muyet Nyetilil.
43003007	Mente kot akite omnye komwowuŋ kule misyini ceyiyok aret oyeny.
43003008	Wuse yomet kutokyinikey wule möce, lime nyi karumnta ntene puryo kot nketi wule cone nto wule weti. Kuyunyoto wule yunto om wule mite cito nye koceyi om Muyet Nyetilil.’’
43003009	Kutepe Nikontemo neto kule, “Muce ŋalecu kwiyokis kulene?’’
43003010	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Yiku nyi konetintet nyewo nyepo Israel oŋnkurok kupuryo kot nketi ŋalecu?
43003011	Komwowuŋ ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, ceŋololi acek ŋalek ce cinketi oŋnkyemwowu ŋalek ce kicekäs oŋnkurok yec kupuryo ci mpo akenke om akwek nye möce kule oyen ŋalekyacek.
43003012	Puryo kot oyeni akwek ŋalekwani ye komwowok ŋalek nöme ŋalek cepo koroni, kunyo omuci akwek kulene kot oyen kenyis ŋalekwani ye komwowok ŋalek ce nöme wulin po torot?
43003013	Kunyo puryo ci mpo akenke nye kilaŋnta kuwo torot tos pate Weritap cito nyo kireku kucone torot!’’
43003014	Kuyu wulo kinomncini Moses erenet parak om kitela, kunyo mosicenomnci parak weritap cito kuyunyoto,
43003015	sukuŋet kunyor soponto nye mopoku ci tokol nye kacäm koyen neto.
43003016	Omnye kicäm Yiyintet koret koromun okoy kukon Werinyi akenke pate sukuŋet mente kot kupot ci tokol nye kacäm koyen neto, ntene kule sukunyor soponto nye mopuku.
43003017	Omnye kipuryo kot kuyok Yiyintet Werinyi cokwek kontiyintetap koret, ntene kiyok cokwek kosopintetap koret kupunte wule mite neto.
43003018	Ci ake tokol nye keyen Werit, kunye puryo kot cemutyini cicoto musankut, nto ci ake tokol nye katay meyen kukocemutyi keny cicoto musankut omnye katay meyen Weritap Yiyintet nye akenke pate.
43003019	Musankut kunyi kule, kico lakweyet koret ntene kucäm piko menonet kupël lakweyet, omnye yiye cek tukuk ce miyotec.
43003020	Senkere ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek miyotec lakweyet omnye puryo kot kucöme kule aparte kutok ŋalek ce miyotec ce yiye neto.
43003021	Ntene ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek cepo manta ce toponec kuconi cicoto wule mite lakweyet sukuŋet kupor lakweyet kule kikwiy neto yisyenyi om koyweyisyet nye yweye Yiyintet.
43003022	Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi okoy koretap Yuteya, wokopur wuloto oko cekto kuwany pesyos oŋnkupotisonis.
43003023	Kimite yoto Yowana kupotisonisyi om Ayinon ye kilekite Salem, omnye kimite peko ce caŋ wuloto. Kipeti piko wule mite neto, kunyo kipotisone neto cekto,
43003024	omnye kitompo yoto kot cekerta Yowana mopusi.
43003025	Kucec konomik alake cepo Yowana kutintentyin oko Yutoyintet ake om ŋalek ce nöme kowunetapkey nyepo tinit.
43003026	Yoto kupa cek wule mite Yowana oŋnkumwoci kule, “Konetintet tesoti nyi cito nyo kwopontekey akwek tukway om oyinetap Yortan pitonin, cito nyo kiŋolole nyi? Mite yawut neto kupotisonisyi, kunyo peti piko tokol wule mite neto!’’
43003027	Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo ci nye muce kiy kenyis, tos pate okoy ye kokukoci Yiyintet cicoto.
43003028	Kunyo oyiku akwek muncururwanikwani ce oŋnketi kule kyomwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot oyiku ani Ŋapanet, ntene kiciyokwani cantoci neto.’
43003029	Cito nye kemütis kunye citap korket, kuyoŋntos tapan coronutekap cito nyo kemütisyi sukulimntoy kuŋerekyini koromun kutitap cito nyo kemütisyi ye kaŋalal.
43003030	Kunyo kapok yawut ŋerekwekwani; misyini kuner neto aŋnkacucukte ani.’’
43003031	Cito nyo cone wulin po torot kunye nyewo kupël piko tokol, nto cito nyo cone koret kunye po cito nyoto koret oŋnkuŋolole ŋalek ce nöme koret. Cito nyo cone torot kunye nyewo nyepo tukuk tokol.
43003032	Mwowu neto kupor ŋalek ce kikäs oŋnkulim, ntene puryo ci nye cöme lokoywekyi.
43003033	Ci tokol nye kacäm kuyen lokoywekyi kunye kakuwalkey kule Yiyintet kunye po manta.
43003034	Neto cito nyo kiyok Yiyintet kunye ŋolole ŋalek cepo Yiyintet, omnye kikoci Yiyintet neto Muyenyi Nyetilil nye yeme.
43003035	Cöme Papa werinyi, kunyo kikoci tukuk tokol kopurune yewuniyekap Werinyi.
43003036	Ci ake tokol nye katay macäm kuyen werit kupuryo kot kunyoru cicoto soponto ntene kopurtoy pate nerekwekap Yiyintet cepo kenyis.
43004001	Yoto kulim Farasayek kule kokocut Yesu piko oŋnkumite kupotisone konomik ce caŋ kupël Yowana.
43004002	(Ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule kipuryo kot kupotisone neto pic, ntene konomikyi pate ce kipotisonisyi.)
43004003	Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalek ce kicemwowu, kunomene Yuteya kuketitakey kuwo Samariya.
43004004	Nteye kimite kuweti poninekyi om wuloto, kuwo kupunte koretap Samariyek.
43004005	Kuco Yesu okoy kupun moŋetap Samariya nye cekure Sikari nye kilekite mparet nyo kikocini Yakopo werinyi Yosep.
43004006	Kimite wuloto mwenetap peko nye cekure pekap Yakopo. Omnye kikicas Yesu om poninekyi, yoto kopur yepo mwenetap peko tapan. Kimite yoto sawet karik kupunto pet kwen.
43004007	Yoto kuco korket ake nyepo samariyek cokuram peko. Kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kono peko aye.’’
43004008	(Kikipa konomikyi yoto wule po moŋet wokwolis omik.)
43004009	Kuwekyi korketap Samariyek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi Yutoyintet, oyiku ani cepsamariyantet, kunyo muci nyi kulene somo kule kono peko aye, omnye puryo kot kuyemntoy tukuk ce kyomisye Yutayek oko Samariyek.’’
43004010	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Nto yunye kukwenket nyi kokotutyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkinket kule ŋo cici somiŋ nyi kule, ‘Kono peko aye,’ nto kenyi nye kesome neto kukoniŋ peko ce ponto soponto.’’
43004011	Kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Nyewo, nteyu meponte nyi teret, kunyi kiwo oyinet ŋony koromun, menyorte nyi ono peko ce ponto soponto,
43004012	Yiku nyi nyewo kupël kukonyacek Yakopo nye kikonec acek pecu ce kiye neto oko lekokyi oko tuka ceci pekap oyinoni?’’
43004013	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mosukwam melelya ci ake tokol nye kaye pecu.
43004014	Ntene komo kwome melelya mpo kisic ci ake tokol nye kaye peko ce mokoci ani. Omnye mosokoci ani neto peko cepo soponto ce kosune wule mite neto nyepo soponto nye mopoku.’’
43004015	Kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Mokoryontet kono mpo ani pecoto! Sukuŋet komo kwomo melelya mpo kisic, nto komoconi yec mpo wuli caram peko.’’
43004016	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Nomen iwo wekur santeŋuŋ oŋnkiketukey okoy yuteyu.’’
43004017	Kuwekyi korkonoto kumwoci kule, “Moponte ani saniya.’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Poye manta mwowu kule, ‘Moponte saniya!’
43004018	Omnye kikomütiŋ nyi sanik mutu, nto cito nye pontekey nyi yawut kunye puryo kot ku santeŋuŋ nyepo manta. Kunyo kemwowu ŋalek cepo manta.’’
43004019	Kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Mokoryontet, kakäs kule yiku nyi workoyo.
43004020	Kisoye mpo kukonyacek Yiyintet om tulwoni, ntene omwowu akwek Yutayek kule, ‘Yerusalem pate ku wule misyini cesoye Yiyintet!’ ’’
43004021	Kumwoci Yesu kule, “Cepyosyani, yen ŋalekwani, mosukupunto pesyosyek ce puryo kot kusoye piko Yiyintet Papa om tulwoni nto mpo om Yerusalem.
43004022	Puryo oŋnketi akwek Samariyak cito nye osoye, cinket acek Yutayek cito nye cesoye, omnye cone kosopotet wule mite Yutatek.
43004023	Ntene mosukupunto pesyet, kunyo mite yawut yuteyu nye toku piko cepo manta ce soye Yiyintet om Muyet oko om ŋalek cepo manta. Piko cesoye kuyunyoto kuce möce Papa cekto.
43004024	Yiyintet kunye Muyet nye moponto porto, nto piko ce soye neto kuce möce kusoye om Muyet oko ŋalek cepo manta.’’
43004025	Kumwoci korkonoto Yesu kule, “Oŋnket ani kule mosukuco Kristo nye poru kaynana kule Ŋapanet. Ye kaco neto mosukuco oŋnkumwowec acek ŋalek tokol.’’
43004026	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ani nyoto nyi oŋololuŋ nyi.’’
43004027	Yoto pakenke kupun konomikyi. Kukite cek koromun kwokunyor kuŋolole neto oko korkonoto. Ntene kipuryo mpo akenke om cek nye kitep kule, “Möce ne nyi?’’ Nto mpo kutep yec kule, “Omne seŋololyi korkoni.’’
43004028	Yoto kupakakta korkonoto terenyi nyepo peko oŋnkuwo okoy moŋet wokumwoci piko kule.
43004029	“Akwa kwakäs citake nye komwowo ani ŋalek tokol ce kyayiy ikye keny! Puryo kot ku Ŋapanet ne nyitenyi?’’
43004030	Yoto kunomen piko om moŋet kupa wule mite Yesu.
43004031	Kimite yoto konomik kusoysoye Yesu kumwoci kule, “Konetintet, yomisye!’’
43004032	Ntene kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oponte omik ce oyome ce monket akwek!’’
43004033	Yoto kucec konomik kutepekey kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kokosutyi so citake omik?’’
43004034	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Omikwani ku kule ayiy cömisyetap neto nyo kiyokwo ani aŋnkayiy awaŋnte yisyenyi nye kikono.
43004035	Puryo kot omwowu akwek ne kule, ‘Koŋet orok amwanu kupunto pesyosyekap kisisyet!’ Komwowok ani kule, akäs pa mparenik koruryo yawut omik kunyo kopunto kisisyet!
43004036	Kunyo mite yawut cikocini musyaret cito nyo kisisyi oŋnkoruruce omik kupa wule mite soponto nye mopoku, sukuŋet kuŋereke wanak cito nyo kikolsyi oko cito nyo rurukisyi.
43004037	Kunyo po manta ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, ‘Kolsyi cito ake, kukisis cito ake.’
43004038	Koyoktok ani ape wokisisye omik om mparosyek wule kipuryo kot oyoyisye akwek, kitantane piko alake wuloto, kunyo mosonyoru akwek latik cepo yisyet nye kikwiy cekto.’’
43004039	Kuyen Samariyek ce caŋ cepo moŋonoto ŋalekap Yesu, omnye kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Komwowo ani ŋalek tokol ce kyayiy ikye keny.’’
43004040	Yoto ntowo kukwa Samariyek okoy ye kimite Yesu, kusom cekto neto kopur oko cekto. Kopur Yesu wuloto kuwany pesyos oyeny.
43004041	Kutosyikey yec piko alake ce caŋ kuyen om ŋalekyi ce kimwoy.
43004042	Kumwoci piko korkonoto kule, “Kociyen acek yawut, ntene nye puryo kot ku om ŋalek co kwemwowu nyi, ntene omnye kucelim acek nkit ŋalekyi, kunyo kucinket kule neto kunye kosopintet nyepo manta nyepo koret kumukul.’’
43004043	Nteyu kowo kopur Yesu wuloto kuwany pesyosyek oyeny, kunomen kuwo okoy Kalilaya.
43004044	Omnye kikimwoy Yesu nkit kule, “Puryo kot ciyweye workoyo om korenyi.’’
43004045	Ntowo kupun Yesu Kalilaya, kutoroc kuŋerekyi piko cepo wuloto neto omnye kikikäs cekto tukuk tokol ce kikwiy Yesu om Yerusalem ye kipesyet nyepo sakwetap Keytayet, omnye kikipa mpecek sakwet.
43004046	Yoto kuwo Yesu kuketitakey okoy Kana nyepo Kalilaya wulo kiwece peko kwek Finyonik. Kimite wuloto poytoyintet ake nyewo nye kimnyone werinyi om Kapernaum.
43004047	Ntowo kulim cicoto kule kucone Yesu Yuteya kuco Kalilaya, kuwo wule mite oŋnkusom kule kowo Kapernaum wokusop werinyi nye kikirik kume.
43004048	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce kot koyen mpo kisic okoy ye kakäs tukuk cewoyec cepo kakitat.’’
43004049	Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet kany cipe kutompo kot kume lekwemwani.’’
43004050	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Nomen iwo mokusop weriŋuŋ!’’ Kuyen cicoto ŋalekap Yesu, kunomen kuwo.
43004051	Nteye kimite neto kuweti om aran kutuye mutworikyi ce kimwoci neto kule, “Mokusop weriŋuŋ!’’
43004052	Kutepe cicoto cek kule kukoykoyitu werinyi kumite sawet kutya? Kumwoy cek kule, “Kumite sawet tisap nyepo pet omutun ye kusope kwostoy yeset neto.’’
43004053	Yoto kusot kwan okoy kunket kule kumite sawet kuteyoto ye kumwocini Yesu neto kule, “Musokusop weriŋuŋ.’’ Yoto kuyen neto oko piko cepo kanyi tokol.
43004054	Kunyo ŋolyontet nyitenyi kunye po oyeny nyepo kakitat nye kikwiy Yesu letut yu kowo kucone Yuteya kuco Kalilaya.
43005001	Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, yoto kupunto pesyet nyepo sakwetap Yutayek nyepo tini. Kulaŋnta Yesu kuwo Yerusalem.
43005002	Kimite wuloto om yepo kurketap Kecirek tolilet nye cekure om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek “Petisata,’’ nye kiponto tekewunek mut.
43005003	Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce mnyontos ce koruy tekewunecoto, ce kikoryo oko ce kimwolyos oko ce kinäm mokonkisyek. (Kimite picoto kukonye kule kuwaskey peko.
43005004	Omnye kirekyini om pesyosyek alak malayketap Mokoryontet tolilonoto oŋnkuwas peko, nto cito nye mnyone nye konyosyo kowut orit ye kacewas peko kusope porto ake tokol nye kiponto.)
43005005	Kimite yoto citake nye kimnyan kuwany kenyisyek sosom ok sisit.
43005006	Kukäs Yesu cicoto kumite yoto omnye kinkete kule kimnyan cicoto kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ. Yoto kumwoci kule, “Möce nyi kule osop?’’
43005007	Kuwekyi cicoto kimnyone kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, moponte ani ci om yu nye muce kowuteno tolilet ye kawaskey peko, ye omite ani osyeme kule owut orit kukokunyosyo citake.’’
43005008	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Ŋet yony, oŋnkinäm kwiririŋuŋ oŋnkiwesetote.’’
43005009	Yoto pakenke kusop cicoto, kunäm, kwiririnyi oŋnkuwesetot. Kikwiyokis ŋalecato ye kipesyetap Sapat.
43005010	Yoto kumwoci Yutayek cicoto kicisope kule, “Pesyetap Sapat pesyoni kunyo puryo kot kucöme ntarastinekyo kot torate kwiririŋuŋ.’’
43005011	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowo ani cito nyo kesopo kule, ‘Näm kwiririŋuŋ oŋnkiwesetote.’ ’’
43005012	Kutepe cek kule, “Ŋo cici komwowuŋ kule, Näm kwiririŋuŋ oŋnkiwesetote?’’
43005013	Ntene kipuryo kot konket cicoto kicisope kule ŋo nyoto, omnye kikiwete Yesu yoto oko omnye kimite yoto luket nyepo piko ce caŋ.
43005014	Nto om letut kunyor Yesu cicoto kumite kotap Yiyintet kumwoci kule, “Käs pa kwesop so yawut! Kunyo mente tayiy miyotyonik ye möce kule simesuci yec miyotyet nye pëlisyi.’’
43005015	Yoto kuwo cicoto oŋnkuwo kumwoci Yutayek kule Yesu nye kwesope neto.
43005016	Om ŋalecato, kucec Yutayek kutaŋany Yesu omnye kikwiyis kusopis ye pesyet Sapat.
43005017	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Yiyisyi Papamwani okokoy, kunyo omite mpo ani oyiyisyi.’’
43005018	Kutosyi ŋalecutecu Yutayek swamet kumäc kule cepakäc Yesu kume, nye kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kikwiri ntarastinekap Sapat, ntene oko omnye kimwoy kule Yiyintet kunye Papanyi, kuweckey neto kuyoyeckey oko Yiyintet.
43005019	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo kot kwiye Werit kiy nye nyenyi nkit, yiye pate kito nye köse neto kwiye Papanyi. Kito nye yiye Papa kunye yiye mpo Werit kiyoto.
43005020	Omnye cöme Papa Werit oŋnkuporcini tukuk ce yiye neto. Mosukuporci mpo kwiy tukuk ce woyec kupël cutecu, Sukuŋet akite akwek tokol.
43005021	Kuyu wulo soptoy Papa piko kotutune met kusopco kunyor soponto, kuyunyoto mosukusop Werit kututune met piko co kikwey neto.
43005022	Puryo kot kumutyini Papa nkit ci musanku, ntene kikoci neto Werit kamukeywek tokol cepo musankunek,
43005023	sukuŋet kuywey piko tokol Werit kuyu wulo yweye cek Papa. Ci tokol nye puryo kot kuyweye Werit, kupuryo kot kuyweye cito nyoto Papa nyo kiyoku Werit.
43005024	“Kumwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci tokol nye kalim ŋalekwani oŋnkucäm kuyen neto nyo kiyokwani, kuponto cito nyoto soponto nye mopoku. Puryo kot cemutyini cito nyoto musankut, ntene kopunte met kuwo wule mite soponto.
43005025	“Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kwoni pesyosyek, kunyo kopun yawut yuteyu ye mosukilim piko ce kipok kutit nyepo Weritap Yiyintet, mosukusopsco piko ce kalim ŋalekyi.
43005026	Omnye kuyu wulo cone soponto wule mite Papa nkit, kuyunyoto kikoci Papa Werit kwek nye ponto soponto.
43005027	Kunyo kikoci Papa Werit kamukeywek ce mute musankunek. Omnye Weritap cito neto.
43005028	Monte cikite ŋalecu omnye mite kuconi pesyet ye mosokulim piko ce kipok ce mite mwenonik kursyenyi.
43005029	Yoto kuŋetyo cek kuloŋune mwenonikwa. Mosiŋet kotutune met piko co kikwiye tukuk ce toponec oŋnkyikoci kusopco, ciŋet kotutune met piko co kikwiye tukuk ce miyotec oŋnkyewosontyi kulot musankut.’’
43005030	“Puryo kot oyiye ani kiy tokol om kamukeywekwani nkit, omute pate musankut kuyu wulo kimwowo Yiyintet, kunyo po manta wule omutitoy musankut, omnye puryo kot osyeme kule ayiy kuyu wule omoktoy, ntene kuyu wulo moktoy neto nyo kiyokwo ani.
43005031	“Ye koporkey kule omwowu ce cikwani nkit, kupuryo kot kupo manta ŋalek ce omwowu ani.
43005032	Ntene mite citake nye poru kumwoy ŋalek ce nömo ani om kaynemwani. Kunyo oŋnket kule po manta ŋalek ce mwowu neto ce nömo ani.
43005033	Kyoyokte akwek kiyokik kupa wule mite Yowana, kunyo kiŋalal neto kupor ŋalek cepo manta.
43005034	Puryo kot omöce ani kule misyini oponte cito muncururwet nye nkete ŋalecu. Komwowok ani ŋalecu pate kule sukuŋet osopce akwek.
43005035	Kikerkey Yowana oko tarit nye loye kukweny kulakwayit. Kunyo kyomuc akwek oŋerekyi lakweyinto nyenyi om pesyos ce ŋeri.
43005036	Ntene oponte muncururwanik cikwani cewoyec ce porto ce pële cepo Yowana. Muncururwanik cutecu ku yisyonutek ce kikono Papamwani kule ayiy. Porto yisyonocutecu kule Papamwani kunye kiyokwani.
43005037	Kunyo Papa nyo kiyokwani kunye ŋololtowo. Tompo kot olim akwek kutinyi mpo kisic oŋnkutompo kot okäs mpo kisic wule yunto tokoyta nyenyi.
43005038	Kunyo puryo kot kumitowune ŋalekyi mukuleywekwok orit, omnye puryo kot oyen akwek cito nyo kiyoku neto.
43005039	Osumoni ocenye silutekap Yiyintet omnye osoti kule mocenyorte orit wuloto soponto nye mopoku, oŋnkurok yec ŋalecato kuce poru ŋalek ce nömo ani.
43005040	Kunyo puryo kot ocöme akwek kule cekwa wule omite ani sukuŋet onyoru soponto.
43005041	“Puryo kot acenye ani kule amöce onyoru kakastayet om wule mite piko.
43005042	Ntene oŋnketok akwek, kule moponte cömisyet nye oyeni Yiyintet om mukuleywekwok orit.
43005043	Kyaconte kamukeywek cepo Papamwani, ntene puryo kot oŋerekyo ani akwek, kunyo ye kaco citake om kamukeywekyi nkit, mosoŋerekyi akwek cicoto.
43005044	Omuci akwek kulene kot oyen, ye omöce kule cikostoykey akwek kwakwek nkit, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot osyeme kule cenyoru kakastayet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet nye akenke pate?
43005045	Kunyo monte cisot kule mosowosontyok ani akwek om wule mite Papa. Moses kunye mosukuwosontyok. Moses nyoto kunyo omite akwek okenekey neto.
43005046	Nto yunye kikyoyen akwek ŋalekap Moses kupoyit manta, nto kwocömo mpo ani, omnye kisil neto ŋalek ce nöme ani.
43005047	Ntene omnye puryo kot oyeni akwek ŋalek ce kisil neto, kunyo omuci akwek kulene kot ocäm ŋalekwani?’’
43006001	Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, kunomen Yesu kuwo kway tampayayetap Kalilaya (Nye cekure yec tampayayetap Tiperia)
43006002	Yoto kurup luket nyepo piko ce caŋ neto, omnye kikikäs yisyonutek cepo kakitat ye kisope piko ce kimnyontos.
43006003	Kulany Yesu tulwet parak oŋnkopur ŋony oko konomikyi.
43006004	Kikirik yoto sakwetap Keytayet nyepo Yutayek.
43006005	Ntowo kukäsakäskta Yesu, yoto kukäs neto luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kitosyinikey kukwoni wule mite neto. Yoto kumwoci neto Filipo kule, “Mokyale ano omik ce mokwam picu tecu tokol?’’
43006006	(Kuwekyi Yesu kuyunyoto kusyem Filipo, ntene kinkete kito nye mokwiy.)
43006007	Kuwekyi Filipo kumwoci neto kule, “Ye sukwomis picu kunyor ci kisic kisic pate, kumöce mukatinek ce kakyale silinkinek ce keytye pokolwokik amwan.’’
43006008	Kumwoci Antereya mutakwametitap Simon Petero nye akenke om konomikyi neto kule,
43006009	“Mite yu wero nye miniŋ nye ponto mukatinek mut cepo nkanuk oko purpurunek oyeny ntene yeme ne coto om picu tecu tokol?’’
43006010	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ayiyte piko kopur ŋony,’’ (kimite yoto suswek ce caŋ). Yoto kopur ŋony piko tokol, kipuntoy piko tokol moronik ce kirice elifunek mut.
43006011	Kunäm Yesu mukatinekey, oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupcici piko ce kokopur ŋony, kwiy mpo purpurunek kuyunyoto. Kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis.
43006012	Nteyu kowo kupiyoŋis piko tokol, kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, oruruc omik ce koŋet, monte ce pakakte mpo kisic.
43006013	Yoto koruruc cek omik mukatinek cepo nkanuk co kome piko kuleleku okoy kunyit kisok taman ok oyeny.
43006014	Ntowo kukäs piko om wuloto tukuk cepo kakitat ce kokwiy Yesu, kumwoy kule, “Workoyontet nyitenyi manta nyo kumöce sukuco koret!’’
43006015	Konket Yesu kule karik kunäme cekto neto swama oŋnkukoci woyinto kwek kinko. Yoto kuweckey Yesu yec kulaŋnta kuwo lakam kwine nkit.
43006016	Ntowo kupunto kosoleny kurekto konomikyi kupa okoy tampayayet,
43006017	oŋnkulany rapet kupa kway tampayayet kutokyikey Kapernaum. Kikikwimen kutuyit koret yoto ntene kitompo kot kuco Yesu wule mite cekto.
43006018	Kikicec kuwus yomet nyewo nyepo swama nye kiwose peko.
43006019	Nteyu kowo kukwany konomik rapet okoy kuwany koyinto nyepo kilomitanik mut nto lö, yoto kukäs cek Yesu nye kityikonu peko parak kuconi ye kimite rapet, kumuyo koromun.
43006020	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ani nyo, monte cemuye!’’
43006021	Kumac cek kule cenäm neto kulany rapet, ntene yoto pakenke kupunto rapet koret tapan wule kitokyinikey cekto.
43006022	Ntowo kuyec koret om pesyet nyepo oyeny, kukäs luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kiŋetune tampayayet pitonin kule rapet akenke pate nye kikicepokokyi yoto, yoto konket cek kule kopuryo kot kulany Yesu rapet kuwetokey konomikyi, ntene konomik kwicek nkit pate ce kupa kupuryo neto.
43006023	Kukwene raposyek alake Tiperia okoy kurik tampayayet tapan om yo kisomncine Mokoryontet mukatinek kupeyok.
43006024	Nteye kotoköse luket nyepo piko ce caŋ kule puryo kot kumite Yesu wuloto nto mpo konomikyi, Yoto kulany cek raposyek oŋnkupa Kapernaum wokuceŋat Yesu.
43006025	Ntowo kunyor piko Yesu kumite tampayayet pitonin, kumwoci kule, “Konetintet, kweconi nyi oyu wuli?’’
43006026	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kumwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo kot oceŋoto omnye kyokäs tukuk cepo kakitat cepo swamemwani, ntene oceŋoto omnye kyoyam mukatinekye okoy opiyonkye tokol.
43006027	Monte kyiyisye kule cenyoru omit ce wurtos, ntene oyiyisye sonyoru omik cepo okokoy cepo soponto nye mopoku. Mosukukonok Weritap cito omicoto, omnye kikokoci Yiyintet Papa neto pelutyet nyepo kamukeywek.’’
43006028	Yoto kutepe cek kumwoci neto kule, “Mokyiy acek ne ye sukuŋet kyiy yisyonutek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet?’’
43006029	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Yisyet nye möce kule ayiy akwek kunyi kule, oyen akwek cito nyo kiyoku neto.’’
43006030	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kunyo pelutyet nye yune nyepo swamet nye meyiy nyi sukuŋet cekäs acek oŋnkyiyen ŋalekuk! Meyiy kiy ne?
43006031	Kikwam mpo kukonyacek omik ce cekure Mana ye kimite koretap kitela, kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Kikoci neto cekto kwam mukatyantet nye cone torot.’ ’’
43006032	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kipuryo kot kukonok akwek Moses mukatyantet nye cone torot, ntene papamwani nye konok akwek mukatyantet nyepo manta nye cone torot.
43006033	Omnye mukatyantet nye konu Yiyintet ku cito nye kirekune torot oŋnkukoci soponto piko cepo koret tokol.’’
43006034	Kusom cek neto kule, “Mokoryontet, konec mpo acek okokoy mukatyantanato po soponto.’’
43006035	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Oyiku ani mukatyantet nyepo soponto, puryo kot kwome rupet ci tokol nye kaco wule omite ani, oŋnkupuryo kot kwome melelya mpo kisic ci tokol keyeno ani.
43006036	Kunyo kwomwowok kule kwakäsa ani akwek, ntene puryo kot oyeni.
43006037	Mosukuco wule amite ani ci tokol nye kakono Papamwani, puryo kot okwete ani mpo kisic ci tokol nye kaco wule amite.
43006038	Omnye kyaco ani arekune torot kule cayiy ce möce Neto nyo kiyokwo, ntene puryo kot ku kule ayiy ce amöce nkit.
43006039	Yisyet nye mokyani neto nyo kiyokwani kunyi kule, puryo kot opoti ani ci ake tokol om piko co kikono neto. Ntene misyini aŋet kotutune met kusopco tokol om pesyet nyepo letut.
43006040	Omnye kito nye möce Papamwani kunyi kule, mosukunyor soponto nye mopoku piko tokol ce kakäs cekto Werit oŋnkuyen ŋalekyi. Kunyo mosaŋet kotutune met kusopco picoto om pesyet nyepo letut.’’
43006041	Yoto kucec Yutayek koŋunyŋunyis om wule mite Yesu omnye kumwoy kule, “Oyiku ani mukatyantet nye cone torot.’’
43006042	Kumwoy cek yoto kule, “Puryo kot ku Yesu cicitenyi Weritap Yosep, ce cinket kwan oko kamet? Muce kulene kumwoy kule, kyocone arekune torot?’’
43006043	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Ayaste monte ciŋunyŋuny akwek kukwek nkit,
43006044	puryo ci nye muce kot kuco wule amite ani okoy ye kokwer Papamwani nyo kiyokwani cicoto kuco wule amite, mosaŋet ani kotutune met cicoto om pesyet nyepo letut.
43006045	Kisil workoyik kule, ‘Mosukuŋet Yiyintet piko tokol.’ Ci tokol nye kolimnci Papa oŋnkunetkey ŋalek kukwane wule mite neto, kuconi cicoto wule amite ani.
43006046	Puryo kot kuporu ŋalecu kule kikäs ci tokol Papa. Neto nkit pate nyo kicone wule mite Yiyintet kunye kikäs Papa.
43006047	“Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci nye kocömis kuyen kuponto nyoto soponto nye mopoku.
43006048	Oyiku ani mukatyantet nyepo soponto.
43006049	Kikwam mpo kukomwoŋ mukatyantet nye cekure Mana om koretap kitela, kunyo kipok cekto.
43006050	Ntene ye kam ci ake tokol mukatyantet nye cone torot kupuryo kot kume cicoto.
43006051	Oyiku ani mukatyantet nye sopot nye cone torot. Ye kakwam citake tokol mukatyantani mosukusop kenyis okoy kenyis. Nto Mukatyantet nye mokoci ani neto kupormwani nye mokonu sukuŋet kusop piko cepo koret tokol.’’
43006052	Yoto kusut ŋalecutecu tintenotet nyewo koromun om wule mite Yutayek nkit. Kutep cek kumwoy kule, “Muce cici kulene kukonec acek kyam pornyi?’’
43006053	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye puryo kot ayam akwek portap Weritap cito, oŋnkoye korotikyi kupuryo kot oponte soponto om akwek orit.
43006054	Ci ake tokol nye kam pormwani oŋnkuye korotikwani kunye ponto cito nyoto soponto nye mopoku. Masaŋet ani kotutune met cicoto om pesyet nyepo letut.
43006055	Omnye pormwani kunye omik cepo manta, nto korotikwani kuce yesyet cepo manta.
43006056	Ci ake tokol nye kam pormwani oŋnkuye korotikwani kumitowune cicoto wule omite ani, oŋnkomitowune ani wule mite neto.
43006057	Kiyokwani Papa nye sopot, kunyo onyoru ani soponto kucone wule mite neto, kuyunyoto om wule mite ci ake tokol nye kama ani, musukunyor cicoto soponto kucone wule amite ani.
43006058	Kunyo mukatyantet nyitenyi nye cone torot kunye puryo kukerkey oko mukatyantet nyo kikwome mpo kukomwoŋ oŋnkupok cekto. Mosukusop kenyis okoy kenyis ci tokol nye kam mukatyantani.’’
43006059	Kimwowu Yesu ŋalecutecu ye kimite kunetisyi om kotapkok om Kapernaum.
43006060	Ntowo kulim konomikyi alake ce caŋ ŋalecutecu, kumwoy kule, “Wuy koromun ŋolyontoni, ŋo nye muce kulim ŋal ceyuco?’’
43006061	Yoto kunket Yesu nkit kule ŋunyŋunye konomikyi om ŋolyontoni. Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Kemuyok akwek ŋolyontoni?
43006062	Kunyo kucäm ne nyun ye kokäs akwek Weritap cito kuloŋntoy wule kimitowune kunyo?
43006063	Muyet Nyetilil kunye konu soponto, kunyo puryo kot kopunto porto latik mpo kisic. Ŋalek co komwowok ani kuce Muyet oko soponto.
43006064	Oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kuyene piko alake om akwek.’’ (Omnye kinkete Yesu kuceke tayta kule piko oŋnkuco om cekto ce puryo kot kucömis oŋnku cito oŋnkono nye musukuŋomnto neto.)
43006065	Yoto kutosyikey kumwoy kule, “Kuyu nyitenyi somwowok ani akwek kule, puryo ci nye muce kot kuco wule amite okoy pate ye kokukoci Papa cicoto kwiy kuyunyoto.’’
43006066	Kuceke yoto kukweykey konomikyi ce caŋ kutay nye komo kupesetoti yec oko Yesu.
43006067	Yoto kumwoci Yesu kiyokik taman ok oyeny kule, “Omöce mpo akwek kule, cepecikey?’’
43006068	Kuwekyi Simon Petero kumwoci neto kule, “Mokoryontet, mocipe acek wule mite ŋo? Ponte nyi ŋalek ce konu soponto nye mopoku,
43006069	kunyi kociyen oŋnkyinket acek kule yiku nyi Nyetilil nye cone wule mite Yiyintet.’’
43006070	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kipuryo kot akweyak ani akwek cu oyiku taman ok oyeny? Oŋnkurok akenke om akwek kunye Setani nyewo nyepo oyik.’’
43006071	Kiŋolole Yesu yoto Yuta weritap Simon Isikaryoti, omnye nka kot ki akenke Yuta om konomik taman ok oyeny, ntene neto kunye kiwo kuŋomnto Yesu.
43007001	Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, kuwesetote Yesu Kalilaya, nye kipuryo kot kumöce kule owesotote Yuteya omnye kimite Yutayek cepo woloto kucenye kule cepakäc neto.
43007002	Kikirik yoto pesyetap sakwet nyepo Yutayek nye cekure sakwetap kisarinek.
43007003	Yoto kumwoci mpo mutakwam Yesu kule, “Ŋete wuli oŋnkiwo Yuteya, sukuŋet kukäs konomikuk yisyet nye yiye nyi.
43007004	Omnye puryo ci nye muce kuwuŋat yisyenyi nye yiye ye möce kule soyeku konketon. Ye yiye nyi ŋalecutecu kupoyit manta, kumöce kule partekey konketiŋ piko tokol.’’
43007005	Kipuryo kot kuyen mpo mutakwam ŋalekyi.
43007006	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Tompo kot kupunto pesyemwani nye topon. Ntene oponte pesyosyek ce caŋ ce toponec.
43007007	Puryo kot komuce koret kot kusenkerak akwek, ntene senkero ani, omnye omwocini ani okokoy kule miyotec yisyonutekyi.
43007008	Ape akwek sakwet, ntene moweti ani sakwani, omnye tompo kot kupunto pesyemwani nye topon.’’
43007009	Kumwoci neto cekto ŋalecato onŋkopur kuŋutune Kalilaya.
43007010	Nteyu kowo kupa mpo mutakwam sakwet, kuwo mpene Yesu nye kiwuŋotikey nye moköse ci.
43007011	Kuceny Yutayek neto om sakwet, kutepe kule, “Mite ono neto?’’
43007012	Kimite yoto comset nyewo koromun om wule mite luket nyepo piko om ŋalek ce nöme neto, kumwowu piko alake kule, “Topon cito nyin!’’ Kumwowu alake kule, “Puryo, pepere kumose piko.’’
43007013	Ntene puryo ci nye kiŋalale kutok omnye kiyweye piko Yutayek.
43007014	Nteyu kowo kupunto kwenutap pesyosyek cepo sakwet, kuwo Yesu kotap Yiyintet orit oŋnkucec kunetis.
43007015	Yoto kukite Yutayek koromun kumwoy kule, “Muce kulene cici kunket ŋalek ce caŋ oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot ku ci nye sumanat.’’
43007016	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot kucikwani ŋalekyu oneti, ntene kwone wule mite Yiyintet nyo kiyokwo ani.
43007017	Ye kecäm ci ake tokol kule ayiy ŋalek ce möce Yiyintet kunye mosukunket cito nyoto kule po manta ŋalek ce oneti ani, nto oŋololi ŋalek cepo kamukeywekwani nkit.
43007018	Ci nye ŋolole ŋalek cepo kamukeywekyi nkit, kunye syeme cito nyo kule onyoru woyinto nye nyenyi nkit; nto cito nyo cenye woyinto nyepo neto nyo kiyoku ani kunye nyepo manta cito nyo, oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto ŋolyo nyepo mwiynan.
43007019	Kikonok akwek Moses ntarastinek nto puryo? Ntene puryo mpo akenke om akwek nye yweye ntarastinek. Omne yu osyeme akwek kule cepakäc ani?’’
43007020	Kuwekyi luket nyepo piko kumwoci neto kule, “Ponte nyi oyinot! Ŋo nye syeme kule apakäciŋ nyi?’’
43007021	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kyayiy ani ŋolyo akenke nyewo koromun ye ki sapat, okite akwek tokol yoto koromun ŋolyontonoto.
43007022	Kikonok akwek Moses ntarastit nyepo wonset nka kot kipuryo kot kicece neto ntene mpo kukomwoŋ ce kicece, kunyo owonsi akwek ye Sapat.
43007023	Nteye cewone cito ye Sapat sukuŋet mente kyiri ntarastinekap Moses. Kunyo omne sonyerco ani akwek omnye kyosop portap cito kunyol topon ye kipesyetap Sapat?
43007024	Ayaste monte cemute musankut ye kokäs wule yunto tonto wulo po saŋ, ntene omute musankunek cepo manta.’’
43007025	Kumwoy piko alake cepo Yerusalem kule, “Puryo kot ku cicitenyi nyo cesyeme kule cepakäc?
43007026	Akäs pa! Oŋyi mite kuŋolole nye mowunyekey oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kumwocini cekto ŋolyo! Konket so poytoyikyacek kupoyit manta kule Ŋapanet neto.
43007027	Kunyo cinket acek tokol wule cone cici, ntene puryo ci nye muce kunket ye kaco Ŋapanet kule mokucone ono.’’
43007028	Nteye kimite Yesu kunetisyi om kotap Yiyintet kuŋalal kupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Oŋnketo ani akwek manta? Oŋnket pa wule acone? Ntene kipuryo kot aco om kamukeywekwani nkit. Neto nyo kiyokwo kunye nyepo manta.
43007029	Ntene oŋnketi ani neto; omnye acone wule mite neto, oŋnku neto kunye kiyokwo ani.’’
43007030	Yoto kusyem cek kule cenäm Yesu, ntene puryo ci nye kimuc kot kunäm omnye kitompo kot kupunto pesyenyi.
43007031	Ntene kuyen ŋalekyi piko ce caŋ ce kimite luket nyepo piko, kumwoy cek kule, “Ye kaco Ŋapanet muce kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat kupël cu kukwiy cici?’’
43007032	Yoto kulim Farasayek kucomoti luket nyepo piko ŋalek ce nöme Yesu. Kuyokto yoto tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek sikarek wokunäm Yesu.
43007033	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Mosopur ani oko akwek kuloyit kuminiŋ nto kopok onomen awo wule mite neto nyo kiyokwo ani.
43007034	Mosacenya ani akwek, ntene puryo kot onyorwo, omnye puryo opeti akwek kot opunte wule oweti ani.’’
43007035	Kuŋalal Yutayek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Karik kuwo cici ono wule mocenyoru acek? Möce so kule sawo moŋosyekap lamek wule kiwuci kupuntyi Yutayek wokumiŋis oŋnkunet Kirikik om wuloto?
43007036	Poru ne ŋolyontoni komwoy kule, mosocenya ani akwek, ntene monyorwo, oŋnku puryo kot opeti akwek kot opunte wule oweti ani.’’
43007037	Kipesyet nyepo letut nyepo sakwet kunye kipesyet nyoto nyewo koromun. Kuyo Yesu pesyonoto oŋnkuŋalal kupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ye ponto ci ake tokol melelya kumisyini kuco wule omite ani co kuyesyo.
43007038	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukosune peko cepo soponto mukuleytap ci ake tokol nye keyeno ani.’ ’’
43007039	Kimwoy Yesu kuyunyoto ŋalek ce nöme Muyet Nyetilil nye kikirik wokunyor piko ce keyen ŋalekyi. Kitompo kot cekon yoto Muyet Nyetilil omnye kitompo kot ciŋet Yesu kotutune met kunyor woyinto.
43007040	Ntowo kulim piko ce caŋ om kwenutap piko ŋalecutecu kimwoy Yesu, kumwoy kule, “Workoyontet nyitenyi manta!’’
43007041	Kumwoy alake kule, “Ŋapanet nyitenyi!’’ Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Puryo kot komuce kucone Ŋapanet Kalilaya!’’
43007042	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ŋapanet kunye keseniyantetap Tauti, kunyo mosiceyici neto Peselekem moŋet nyepo Tauti.’’
43007043	Yoto kupciykey luket nyepo piko om ŋalek ce nöme Yesu.
43007044	Yoto kumäc piko alak kule cenäm ntene puryo ci mpo akenke nye kimuc kunäm neto.
43007045	Kuketitakey sikarek kupa wule mite cewoyec oko Farasayek. Kutepe cek sikarek kule, “Omne yu mnokweru kuco yu?’’
43007046	Kuwekyi sikarek kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo ci kenyis nye kiŋalal kuyu wule ŋololyoy cici!’’
43007047	Kutepe Farasayek cek kule, “Kukuperperak neto kumasak so mpo akwek?
43007048	Kwokäs akwek pa akenke om kantoyik nto mpo Farasayek nye yene ŋalekyi?
43007049	Lukoni kunye luket nyepo piko co menket ntarastinekap Moses, kunyo kicup Yiyintet cekto!’’
43007050	Akenke om cekto ku Nikontemo nyo kikinyosyo kuwo wokukäs Yesu. Kutepe nyo cekto kule.
43007051	“Cömwec acek pa ntarastinek cemutyi cito musanku kutompo kot celimnci ŋalekyi oŋnkyinket ŋolyontet nye kulel.’’
43007052	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci neto kule, “Yiku mpenyi so citap Kalilaya? Suman pa silutekap Yiyintet, mesenket kule puryo workoyo kenyis nye muce kucone koretap Kalilaya.’’
43008001	[Yoto kunomen ci ake tokol kuwo kanyi. Ntene kuwo Yesu okoy tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek.
43008002	Ntowo kuyec kororn kuketitakey Yesu yec kowo okoy kotap Yiyintet. Koruruckey luket nyepo piko ce caŋ komut neto. Yoto kopur ŋony oŋnkucec kunet cekto.
43008003	Kukwer konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek korket ake nye kicenäm kusekweyene oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe taytap piko tokol.
43008004	Kumwoci cek Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kucenäm korkoni kumite kusekweyene.
43008005	Om ntarastinekyacek, kikon Moses kule cewire rwontok korko nye yunyi kume. Kunyo mwowu ne nyi yawut?’’
43008006	Kimwoy cek kuyunyoto kule celotu neto sukuŋet cenyoru ŋolyontet nye kocewosontyine. Ntene kuyim Yesu kukäs ŋony oŋnkusile mornenyi ŋony.
43008007	Nteyu kimite cek keyoŋ kutepe teputek, kuculkey Yesu oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Ci ake tokol om akwek nye tompo kot kwiy miyotyo, kunyosyo nyoto kuwire neto rwantet?’’
43008008	Oŋnkuyim yec kusil ŋony
43008009	Nteye kotolime cek ŋalecato, kupete akenke akenke, kunyosyo piko ceyec kunyo, okoy wokuŋet Yesu nkit oko korkonoto nye kimite kukeyoŋe yoto.
43008010	Kuculkey Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule. “Cepyosyani, onto cekto? Puryo ci mpo akenke nye koŋet nye mokumutuŋ musankut?’’
43008011	Kuwekyi korkonoto kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo ci.’’ Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kunyo mpo ani puryo omutuŋ musanku, wecikey ntene mente towayiy yec miyotyo.’’]
43008012	Kuŋololyi Yesu yec kumwoci cekto kule, “Oyiku ani lakweyet nyepo koret. Ci ake tokol nye karupa ani, mosukunyor lakweyet nyepo soponto nye komo kuwesetote menonet mpo kisic.’’
43008013	Kumwoci Farasayek neto kule, “Kemwowu nyi nyun yawut ŋalek ce cekuk nkit, kunyo puryo kot kupo manta ŋalekuk ce mwowu.’’
43008014	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot kuyunyo, nka kot omwowu ani ŋalek ce cikwani nkit ntene kupo ŋalekwani manta, omnye oŋnketi wule kyocone oko wule oweti, ntene puryo kot oŋnket akwek wule kyocone nto mpo wule oweti ani.
43008015	Omüte akwek pate musanku om kasoteywek cepo pic, ntene puryo koto omutyini ani ci ake tokol musanku.
43008016	Ntene nka kot mpo ye kamüt ani musanku, kupoyitu ŋalek cikwani manta, omnye puryo kot omite ani kwani nkit, mitowune Papamwani nye kiyokwo wule amite ani.
43008017	Kicesil ntarastinek kwakwek kule ye kocömncin piko muncururwanik kosik oyeny kupoyitu manta ŋalekwa ce komwoy.
43008018	Kunyo oporu ani ŋalek ce cikwani nkit, kuporu mpo yec Papamwani nyo kiyokwo ŋalekwani.
43008019	Kutepe cek Yesu kule, Mite Papaŋuŋ ono?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot oŋnketo ani akwek oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnketi Papamwani. Nto kwonketo ani akwek nto kwonketi Papamwani.’’
43008020	Kimwowu Yesu ŋalecutecu tokol ye kimite kunetisyi om kotap Yiyintet om yepo koto nye citore sontukunek pesanik cepo kokotutek. Kipuryo ci nye kinäm neto om yoto, omnye kipuryo kot kwitita pesyenyi.
43008021	Kumwoci Yesu cek yec kule, “Mosowecikey ani, kunyo mosoceŋata ani akwek, ntene mosopoku oponte miyotyemwoŋ. Puryo kot omuci akwek kot ape wule oweti ani.’’
43008022	Kumwoy Yutayek kule, “Poru ŋalecu so kule, mosukuketkey neto nkit kume, omnye komwoy kule, ‘Puryo kot okwoni akwek wule oweti ani’ ’’
43008023	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Okwone akwek koret wuli po ŋony, ntene acone ani torot. Opoye akwek koroni, ntene mopoye ani koroni.
43008024	Kuyu nyitenyi omne somwowok ani akwek kule, mosopoku oponte miyotyemwoŋ, kunyo mosopoku om miyotyemwoŋ ye puryo kot oyen akwek kule, ‘AYUYE ANI NYI’ ’’
43008025	Kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Nyi ku ŋo?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kyomwowok ani kuceke keny.
43008026	Mite ŋalek ce caŋ ce nömok akwek ce misyini omwowok oŋnkamüt musankut. Po manta neto nyo kiyokwo ani, kunyo omwocini koret ŋalek ce kyalim kukwane wule mite neto.’’
43008027	Kipuryo kot kusow cek kunket ŋalek ce kimwocini neto cekto ce nöme Papa.
43008028	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ye konömnci akwek parak Weritap cito, yoto ye mosonket kule, ‘AYUYE ANI NYI’; oŋnku yoto ye mosonket kule puryo kot oyiye ani kiy om kamukeywekwani nkit, ntene omwowu pate ŋalek ce kikoneta ani Papa.
43008029	Kunyo mitowune Neto nyo kiyokwo wule amite ani, puryo kwasta kwani nkit. Omnye oyiye ani pesyosyek tokol ŋalek ce ŋerece neto.’’
43008030	Kuyen piko ce caŋ ce kilim kumwowu Yesu ŋalecutecu.
43008031	Yoto kumwoci Yesu Yutayek ce kacäm ŋalekyi kule, “Mosoyiku akwek konomikwani cepo manta ye koyen konetisyemwani,
43008032	kunyo mosonket ŋalek cepo manta, mosukutyacak ŋalek cepo manta.’’
43008033	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci nto kule, “Ciku acek kesenisyekap Apram, tompo kot ciku acek kenyis mutwor cepo citake tokol, kunyo poru ne ŋalecu mwowu nyi kule, ‘Mosicityacak?’ ’’
43008034	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci tokol ye yiye miyotyo kunye mutworintetap miyotyet nyoto.
43008035	Puryo kot kupoytoy mutworintonoto kayato okokoy, ntene poyitu werit kayato okokoy.
43008036	Omnye ye muce Werit kutyacak, kumuce kutyacak akwek kupoyit manta.
43008037	Oŋnket kule oyiku akwek kesenisyekap Apram, oŋnkurok yec osyeme kule cepakäca ani, omnye puryo kot ocöme ŋalekwani.
43008038	Oŋololi ŋalek ce kikoporwo Papamwani, ntene oyiye akwek ŋalek ce kimwowok papamwoŋ.’’
43008039	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Apram kunye Papanyacek.’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Nto yunye oyiku akwek lekokap Apram cepo manta nto oyiye yisyet nye kerkey nye kikwiy neto.
43008040	Ntene omwowok ani okokoy ŋalek cepo manta ce kyalim kukwane wule mite Yiyintet, oŋnkurok omöce akwek kule cepakäca. Kipuryo kot kwiy Apram ŋolyo nye yunyi!
43008041	Oyiye akwek ŋalek ce kikwiy mpo papamwoŋ.’’ Kuwekyi cekto neto kule, “Puryo kot ciku acek pantayek. Ceponte acek Papanyo akenke nyoto ku Yiyintet nkit.’’
43008042	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Nto yunye Papamwakwek Yiyintet kupoyit manta, nto ocömo, omnye acone wule mite Yiyintet kunyo mite yawut yu. Omnye kipuryo kot aco om kamukeywekwani nkit, ntene kiyokwo ani Yiyintet.
43008043	Omne sumosowu akwek oŋnket ŋalek ce omwowu ani? Omnye puryo kot omuytoy oŋnkolimnte lokoywekwani.
43008044	Oyiku akwek lekokap papamwoŋ Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, kunyo omöce kule cerup corokyinotet nyepo papamwoŋ nyoto. Kiporin neto kuceke keny. Puryo kot kucöme neto kenyis ŋalek cepo komosta nyepo manta, omnye puryo kot kuponto ŋalek cepo manta. Ye kaŋalal, kumwowu pate ŋalek cepo mwiynan ce nöme neto nkit, omnye mwiynonin oŋnkukwanitap mwiynanet tokol.
43008045	Ntene oŋololi ani omwowu ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo puryo kot oyeni akwek ŋalekwani.
43008046	Ŋo om akwek nye muce kumwoy kutor kule oponte ani miyotyo? Omne sotay akwek moyen ŋalekwani ye komwowu ŋalek cepo manta?
43008047	Ci nye cone wule mite Yiyintet kunye limntoy nyoto ŋalekap Yiyintet. Omnye puryo kot okwone akwek wule mite Yiyintet. Kunyo puryo kot olimntoy.’’
43008048	Kuwekyi Yutayek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Puryo kot cepoye acek ne manta cemwowu kule, yiku nyi Samariyoyin; oŋnkiponte oyinot!’’
43008049	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo, kot oponte ani oyinot, ntene oyweyi Papamwani, ntene puryo kot oyweyo akwek.
43008050	Puryo kot acenye ani woyinto nye nyimwani nkit. Mite ake nye cenye woyinmwani nye mute musankut kucämnta ani.
43008051	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo kot kume kenyis citake tokol nye kacäm kuyen lokoywekwani.’’
43008052	Kumwoci Yutayek neto kule, “Kocinket acek yawut kupoyit manta kule ponte nyi oyinot!
43008053	Kime Apram, oŋnkupok workoyik, kunyi mwowu nyi yec kule, ‘Puryo kot kume kenyis citake tokol nye kacäm kuyen lokoywekwani.’ Yiku nyi so nyewo kupël papanyacek Apram? Soti nyi kule oyiku ŋo?’’
43008054	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Ye kosutkey owoyitkey ani nkit, kupuryo kot kuponto woyinmwani latik, Papamwani nye kono woyinto, nyoto kunyo okure akwek Yiyintenyo,
43008055	oŋnkurok yec kutompo kot oŋnket akwek neto, oŋnketi ani neto. Ye kotepe kot omwowu ani kule puryo oŋnket ani neto, mosoyeku mwiyn kuyu akwek. Kunyo oŋnket ani oŋnkoyweyi ŋolyontenyi.
43008056	Kiŋerec papamwoŋ Apram kule mosakäs pesyemwani, kunyo kikäs oŋnkuŋerec.’’
43008057	Kumwoci Yutayek neto kule, “Tompo mpo kot punte nyi kenyisyek konom, kunyo kikäs nyi pa Apram?’’
43008058	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kutompo kot ceyi Apram oyuye ani nyi.’’
43008059	Yoto kukwey cek rwontok kule cewire neto, ntene kuwunynkey Yesu oŋnkunomen kuwete kotap Yiyintet
43009001	Nteye kimite Yesu kutile kukäs citake nye kiceyi kukorat.
43009002	Kutepe konomikyi neto kule, “Konetintet, ŋo nyepo miyotyet, cici nkit nto piko ce kiye sukuŋet ceyi kukorat?’’
43009003	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kunömekey koratenyi oko miyotyenyi nto miyotyetap piko ce kiye. Kikor neto sukuŋet ciyiyisye cipor swametap Yiyintet.
43009004	Misyini cetosyikey acek ceyiy yisyonutekap neto nyo kiyokwo ani ye tokupet koret, mosukuco menonet nye puryo kot komuce ci ake tokol kot kwiy yisyo.
43009005	Ye tomite koret, oyiku ani lakweyetap koret.’’
43009006	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Yesu ŋalecato kuŋutyi ŋony oŋnkutankware teŋek ŋulek oŋnkunyinye konyekap cicoto.
43009007	Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Iwo wewune konyekuk tolilet Siloam’’ (nye poru kaynani kule, “Kiciyokto.’’) Yoto kuwo cicoto wokowunnkey oŋnkuketkey kuco nye kakästa.
43009008	Yoto kutepe latosyekyi oko piko ce kikäs neto ikye kusomsi kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ku cicitenyi nyo kwepure ŋony sukusomsi?’’
43009009	Kumwoy piko alake kule, “Cito nyitenyi.’’ Ntene kumwoy cicoto nkit kule, “Ani nyoto.’’
43009010	Kutepe cek kumwoci neto kule, “Kuŋoŋokis kusopco konyekuk kulene?’’
43009011	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci cek kule, “Kutankware teŋek ŋulek cico cekure Yesu oŋnkonyinye konyekwani oŋnkumwowo kule, ‘Iwo wewune konyekuk toliletap Siloam’ Yoto awo ani, nteyu kowo awunekey akäste pakenke.’’
43009012	Kutepe cek kule, “Ono cicoto?’’ Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket.’’
43009013	Yoto kukwer cek cicoto kikorat okoy wule mite Farasayek.
43009014	Kipesyetap Sapat pesyet nye kitonkwore Yesu teŋek ŋulek oŋnkuŋany kusopco konyekap cicoto.
43009015	Yoto kutepe yec Farasayek cicoto kule kuŋoŋokis kusopo konyekuk kulene? Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Kwenyinye neto sakatyet konyekwani oŋnkowunnkey ani, kunyo oköstoy yawut.’’
43009016	Kumwoy Farasayek alake kule, “Puryo kucone cici kukwiye kuyunyi wule mite Yiyintet, omnye puryo kot kuyweye ntarastinekap Sapat.’’ Ntene kumwoy alake kule, “Muce kulene cito nye ponto miyotyet kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat ceyucu?’’ Yoto kutoytocin cek kwicek nkit kupciwunekey oyeny.
43009017	Kutepe Farasayek yec cicoto kule, “Kemwowu nyi kule kuŋany cico kusopco konyekuk, kunyo mwowu nyi kule, ci ne, cicitenyi?’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Workoyo.’’
43009018	Ntene kutoyis Farasayek meyen kule kikorat cicoto nye puryo kuköstoy. Okoy kukur cek kwan oko kamet,
43009019	oŋnkutepe kule, “Werimwakwek so nyitenyi? Omwowu akwek so kule kiceyi kukorat? Kunyo omne sukuköstoy yawut?’’
43009020	Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Cinket acek kule werinyacek nyitenyi, oŋnkyinket kule kiceyi kukorat.
43009021	Ntene puryo kot cinket omne sukuŋet kukästa yawut, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot cinket cito nye kuŋonye kusopco konyekyi. Atepe akwek neto nkit; omnye ci nye kuwoyit nye muce kuŋalal kuwec nkit!’’
43009022	Kimwoy kuyunyoto omnye kiyweye cek Yutayek, omnye kikicömncin Yutayek kunyo kule ye kacäm citake tokol kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet, mosicekerekta cicoto nye komo kuweti kotapkok.
43009023	Sukuŋet kumwoy kwan oko komet kule, “Atepe akwek neto nkit, omnye ci nye kiwoyit.’’
43009024	Kukur cek cicoto kiceyi kukorat aret nyepo oyeny oŋnkumwoci kule, “Walkey pa nyi om taytap Yiyintet kule momwowu ŋalek cepo manta! Cinket acek kule ponto cico miyotyet.’’
43009025	Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani kule ponto cico miyotyo nto moponto, oŋnket pate ŋolyo akenke kule kyoyiku ani ikye korat, kunyo oköstoy yawut.’’
43009026	Kutepe cek cicoto kule, “Kukwiŋ ne nyi neto? Kiŋany kusopco konyekukyi kulene?’’
43009027	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci cekto kule, “Kumwowok ani itwe, ntene puryo kot alim akwek. Omne somac kule celim yec, toskoy omöce mpo akwek kule ciku konomikyi?’’
43009028	Kucup cek cicoto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yiku nyi konomintetap cicoto. Ciku acek konomikap Moses.
43009029	Cinket acek kule kiŋololyi Yiyintet Moses, kunyo mocinket wule cone cico!’’
43009030	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci cek kule, “Ŋolyo nyi nye cikite! Puryo kot oŋnketi akwek wule kicone cico! Ntene kuŋany konyekwani!
43009031	Cinket kule, puryo kot kulimncini Yiyintet piko ce ponto miyotyet; ntene muce kulimnci pate piko co yweye neto oŋnkwiye ŋalek ce möce neto kule kwiy.
43009032	Ntene kuceke kicitany koret tompo kot celim kenyis kule kiŋany citake konyekap cito nye kiceyi kukorat.
43009033	Nto yunye kupuryo kot kucone cici wule mite Yiyintet, nto kupuryo kot komuce kwiy ŋolyo.’’
43009034	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci cicoto kule, “Mpenyi nyi kiceyitiŋ miyotyet, kunyi syeme kule anetec acek?’’ Yoto kukwete cek cicoto kotapkok.
43009035	Kulim Yesu kule kukwet cek cicoto. Ntene kunyor neto cicoto kutepe kule, “Yeni nyi ŋalekap Weritap cito?’’
43009036	Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, mwowo ŋo cicoto saŋet oyen ani ŋalekyi!’’
43009037	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kwekäs nyi neto, kunyo neto nyitenyi ŋololuŋ nyi yawut.’’
43009038	Kumwoy cicoto kule, “Mokoryontet, koyen ani!’’ Oŋnkukutuŋe taytap Yesu.
43009039	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kyaco ani koroni camüt musankut kule sukuŋet kukästa piko ce kikoryo oŋnkucömis piko co köstoy.’’
43009040	Kulim Farasayek alake ce kimite yoto kumwowu Yesu ŋalecato, kutepe cek neto kule, “Soti nyi so kule kicekorye mpo acek?’’
43009041	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Nto kwoyiku akwek koryotin, nto puryo kot oyiku lelotin, ntene omnye omwowu kule, ‘Ceköstoy acek.’ Koporkey kule toyiku akwek lelotin.’’
43010001	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, “Cito nye puryo kot kupunte kurket ye weti kotap kecirek, ntene kulaŋnta kupunte wulyo ake, kunye corin cito nyoto.
43010002	Nto cito nye punte kurket kunye mesewontet nyepo kecirek nyoto.
43010003	Kuyotyini cito nyo ripe kurket mesewontet. Mosukulim kecirek kutinyi ye kokur kaynokap kecirekyi, oŋnkuntoci kukwer kupa saŋ.
43010004	Nteye kokwer ceci tokol kukwa saŋ; kuwo kuntoci om tay, yoto kurup kecirek neto omnye nkete kutinyi.
43010005	Puryo kot komuce kurup citake pate nye to, muce kumwey omnye menkete kutit nyepo cito nyoto.’’
43010006	Kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconitenyi ntene kipuryo kot kunket ŋalek ce kimwocini neto cekto.
43010007	Kumwoci Yesu cek yec kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, oyiku ani kurket nyepo kecirek.
43010008	Piko alak tokol ce kikwa kunyosyeno ani kuce kicorik oŋnkumwoŋot, ntene kipuryo kot kulimnci kecirek cekto.
43010009	Oyiku ani kurket, ci ake tokol nye kaco cokupurune wule omite ani mosukusop, mosukuco orit oŋnkumiŋnto saŋ oŋŋkunyor suswek.
43010010	Coni corintet corsyet pate oŋnkupakäc, oŋnkwaranta. Kyaco ani kule sukuŋet kunyor piko soponto nye yeme topon.
43010011	“Oyiku ani mesewontet nye topon, cöme mesewontet nye topon kule okoyte soponnyi kumeci kecirek.
43010012	Cito nye pokosin kunye puryo kot ku mesewontet oŋnkupuryo kot kuceci kecirek, pokoktoy nyo kecirek oŋnkumwey ye kakäs suyontet, yoto kusar suyontet oŋnkuseret cut alak.
43010013	Mweye cito nye pokosin nyepo musyara omnye puryo kot kusote kecirek.
43010014	Oyiku ani Mesewontet nye topon, oŋnket kecirek ce cikwani oŋnkunketo kecirekwani,
43010015	kuyu wule oŋnketi ani Papamwani oŋnkunketo Papa. Kunyo oyiku ani yiytat okoyte soponmwani omeci kecirek.
43010016	Oponte mpo kecirek alak ce puryo kot kumite yeceyi, misyini okweru mpecek coto, mosukulim mpecek kutimwani kukwa kwek yeceyta akenke nyepo mesewontet akenke.
43010017	“Cömo ani Papa, omnye oyiku yiytat okoyte saponmwani sukuŋet ceketwo yec.
43010018	Puryo ci nye muce kot konomuneno soponmwani, ntene okoytoy om cömisyemwani nkit. Oponte kamukeywek okoyite, oŋnkoponte kamukeywek ce oketune kuketkey. Kiyitenyi nye kimwowo ani Papamwani kule ayiy.’’
43010019	Yoto kupciykey yec Yutayek om ŋalecutecu.
43010020	Kumwowu ce caŋ om cek kule, “Ponto nyi oyinot! Kipun met nyi! Omne solimnci akwek ŋalekyi?’’
43010021	Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Puryo kot kuŋolole kuyunyi cito nye ponto oyinot! Muce oyinoto cekwol yitik kuŋany konyekap piko ce kikoryo?’’
43010022	Yoto kupunto pesyet nye kyome sakwet nye citilile kotap Yiyintet om Yerusalem. Kikaytit koret pesyosyecoto.
43010023	Nteye kimite Yesu kuwesetote tekewutap Solomon om kotap Yiyintet.
43010024	Yoto korurukyikey Yutayek komut neto oŋnkutepe kule, “Ŋomwec acek nyi okoy oyu? Mwowec ŋalek kutok cepo manta, yiku nyi Ŋapanet?’’
43010025	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kwomwowok ani, ntene puryo kot oyen akwek ŋalekwani. Yisyonutek ce oyiye om kamukeywekap Papamwani kuce ŋolole kuporto ani.
43010026	Ntene puryo kot oyeni akwek omnye puryo kot oyiku akwek kecirekwani.
43010027	Lime kecirekwani kutit nyimwani, oŋnket ani cekto, kunyo nomoto ani cekto.
43010028	Okocini soponto nye mopoku, puryo kot kupoku mpo kisic, oŋnkupuryo mpo ci nye muce kot kusar kukwane yewuniyekwani.
43010029	Ce kikono ani Papa kuce cewoyec kupël tukuk tokol, oŋnkupuryo citake tokol nye muce kot kusar kunum kukwane wule mite Papa.
43010030	Oyiku ani oko Papa akenke.’’
43010031	Yoto kukwey yec Yutayek rwontok kule cewire neto.
43010032	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kyoporwok ani yisyonutek ce caŋ ce toponec ce kikono Papa ayiy; oŋnkono om coto nye omöce akwek kule cewirco ani?’’
43010033	Kuwekyi Yutayek kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot ce möce acek kule ceweriŋ nyi om yisyo ake tokol nye topon, ntene om nyilsyet nye nyile nyi Yiyintet! Ntene oko omnye yiku nyi ci pate, oŋnkurok yec sutkey nkit kule oyiku Yiyintet!’’
43010034	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot cesil ne om ntarastinekwakwek nkit kule, kimwoy Yiyintet kule, ‘Oyiku akwek Yiyinwek!’
43010035	Cinket kule po manta okokoy ŋalek ce mwowu silutekap Yiyintet; kure Yiyintet piko co kicikoci lokoywekyi kule, ‘Yiyinwek.’
43010036	Nto ani kunyo kikweya Yiyintet oŋnkuyokwo aco koret. Kunyo omuci akwek kulene omwowu kule, ‘Nyile nyi Yiyintet,’ Omnye komwowu kule, Oyiku Weritap Yiyintet?
43010037	Kunyo monte ciyen yisyemwani ye puryo kot oyiye yisyet nyepo Papamwani.
43010038	Ntene ye oyiyisyi ani, nka mpo ye mnoyen akwek ŋalekwani, kuroke oyen yisyonutekwani sukuŋet oŋnket okokoy kule mitowune Papa wule omite ani oŋnkomitowune ani wule mite Papa.’’
43010039	Yoto kusyem cek yec kule cenäm Yesu, ntene kuwecikey kuciwit.
43010040	Kuwo Yesu kway yec oyinetap Yortan okoy kupunto yo kipotisonisye Yowana kunyo, oŋnkuwo kopurune wuloto.
43010041	Kukwa piko ce caŋ wule mite neto oŋnkwokumwoy kule, “Kipuryo kot kwiy Yowana yisyonut nyepo kakitat, ntene po manta ŋalek tokol ce kimwoy ce nöme cici.’’
43010042	Kuyen piko ce caŋ ŋälekyi om wuloto.
43011001	Kumnyan citake nye cekure Lasaro nye kiminye Pesaniya. Pesaniya kunye moŋet wule kiminye Mariyam oko cekwam Marisa.
43011002	(Mariyam nyitenyi kunyo kuŋope mwayta kerenkokap Mokoryontet oŋnkopuke putekyi. Kunyo kimnyone mutakwam Lasaro.)
43011003	Kuyokto mpo cekwam ŋolyontet kuwo wule mite Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, mnyone corweŋuŋ nyo cöme nyi’’
43011004	Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kusutu porto nyepo Lasaro met, kwiyakay sukuŋet kupor woyintap Yiyintet, oŋnkyilaŋnta Weritap cito kupunte met.’’
43011005	Kicöme Yesu Marisa oko cekwam Mariyam oko Lasaro.
43011006	Nteyu kowo kulim Yesu kule mnyone Lasaro; kopur wule kimite kuwany pesyosyek alak oyeny.
43011007	Nto om letut kumwoci neto konomik kule, “Akany ceketitekey cipe Yuteya.’’
43011008	Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci neto kule, “Konetintet, kumöce Yutayek oyin lekito kule cewireniŋ rwontok kunyi yiytoykey yec kule aketitekey wuloto?’’
43011009	Kuwekyi Yesu cek kule, “Puryo kot kuponto ne pesyet akenke sawanik taman ok oyeny? Kunyo puryo kot cinoce cito ye wesetoti ye pet, omnye köse neto lakweyet nyepo koroni.
43011010	Ntene mosicinoc cito ye kowesetot ye komoy, omnye puryo kot kuponto lakweyet.’’
43011011	Kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato oŋnkutosyi kumwoy kule, “Koru corwenyo Lasaro, ntene mosowo ani waŋet neto.’’
43011012	Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, ye koru neto, mosukusop.’’
43011013	Ntene kimwowu Yesu kuporu kule, kume Lasaro, kusote cek kule toskoy ŋolole rwonto nyepo kwak.
43011014	Kuporci Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Kume Lasaro,
43011015	ntene oyiku ani ŋerekat om wule omite akwek omnye kupuryo kot opontekey ani neto sukuŋet oyen akwek. Kunyo akany cipe.’’
43011016	Yoto kumwoci Tomas (nye soromin) konomik cut kule, “Akany cipe mpo acek tokol oko konetintet sukuŋet wocepoku tokol oko neto!’’
43011017	Ntowo kupunto Yesu, wokunyor kucemuy Lasaro nye kukuwany mwenet pesyosyek amwan.
43011018	Kilekite Pesaniya Yerusalem nye kikeytye kilomitanik somok.
43011019	Kikwa yoto Yutayek ce caŋ kwokuŋololyi Marisa oko Mariyam om metap mutakwam Lasaro.
43011020	Ntowo kulim Marisa kule mite Yesu kuconi, kuwo kutorokta aran, ntene kopurcikey Mariyam ko.
43011021	Kumwoci Marisa Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, nto kwemite nyi wuli, nto puryo kot kume yeyamwani!
43011022	Ntene oŋnket ani mpo yawut kule, muce Yiyintet kukoniŋ kiy ake tokol nye kesom nyi neto.’’
43011023	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Mosiciŋet yeyaŋuŋ kotutune met.’’
43011024	Kuwec Marisa kumwoy kule, “Oŋnketi kule mosukotutune met om pesyet nyepo letut.’’
43011025	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Oyiku ani kotutunetap met oko soponto. Mosukusop ci ake tokol nye yene ŋalekwani oŋnkuyen nka kot kame.
43011026	Nto ci ake tokol nye sopot nye keyeno ani kupuryo kot kume kenyis okoy kenyis. Kunyo yeni nyi ŋalecu?’’
43011027	Kuwekyi Marisa kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, oyeni ani kule, yiku nyi Ŋapanet Weritap Yiyintet, nyo mosukuco koret.’’
43011028	Nto om letut yu kowo kumwoy Marisa ŋalecato, kuwo kuketitakey wokukur cekwam Marisa oŋnkuŋololyi kucomnci kule, “Kaco yu Konetintet, kunyo tepiŋ nyi.’’
43011029	Ntowo kulim Mariyam, kuŋet lakwar kusartakey kuwo wule mite Yesu.
43011030	[Kitompo yoto kot kupun Yesu kayata, ntene kitokumite yo kituytos oko Marisa.]
43011031	Yoto ntowo kukäs Yutayek ce kiŋololyini Mariyam om ko kule kaŋet kusartakey kuwo saŋ. Kupa mpecek kurup let, kusote kule toskoy kowo wokurire yepo mwenet.
43011032	Ntowo kuwo Mariyam okoy kupunto ye mite Yesu, nteye kotoköse kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, nto kwemite nyi wuli, nto puryo kot kume yeyamwani!’’
43011033	Kukäs Yesu neto kurire oko Yutayek ce kimite kurirtos mpecek! Yoto kuloŋ mukuleynyi oŋnkusot koromun.
43011034	Kutep kule, “Kwomuci akwek ono?’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, co cekäs yeto.’’
43011035	Kurir Yesu lokik.
43011036	Kumwoy Yutayek kule, “Akäs pa wule kucömntoy cito nyin!’’
43011037	Ntene kumwoy alake om picoto kule, “Puryo kot cici ne nyo kiŋonye konyekap cito nye kikorat? Kopuryo kot komuce neto kot kukerekta Lasaro mame?’’
43011038	Kuloŋ yec mukuleytap Yesu kutok oŋnkuwo okoy yepo mwenet nye kepenet nye kimite rwantet nye kaceker kurket.
43011039	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Owunukte rwantet!’’ Kuwec Marisa cekwametitap cito nyo kume kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, mosukupoŋ somisyet, omnye kupeni mwenet kuwany pesyosyek amwan!’’
43011040	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kopuryo kot omwowuŋ ani nyi kule, (ye keyen mesekäs woyinto nyepo Yiyintet?)’’
43011041	Yoto kuwunukto cek rwantet. Kunyal Yesu torot oŋnkumwoy kule, “Okostiŋ ani nyi Papa; omnye limwo.
43011042	Oŋnketi kule limwo okokoy, ntene komwowu ŋalecu sukukäs picu mite yu, sukuŋet cekto kuyen kule nyi kunye kiyokwo ani.’’
43011043	Nteyu kowo kumwoy kuyunyoto, kupol kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Lasaro! Miŋu co saŋ!’’
43011044	Kumiŋ kuco saŋ cito nye kukume kupontonu sirok co kucemuytoy kurototin yewuniyek oko kerenkok oko siret nyo kicerate komut metit. Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Otyokyi sirok, oŋnkayaste kuwo.’’
43011045	Yoto kukäs Yutayek ce caŋ ce kikikwa kwokukäs Mariyam ŋalek ce kikwiy Yesu okoy kuyen cek ŋalekyi.
43011046	Ntene kuweckey alake om cekto kupa wule mite Farasayek oŋnkuwokumwoci ŋalek ce kukwiy Yesu.
43011047	Kukur tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek kokwet nyewo oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokyiy kulene? Yiye cici tukuk ce caŋ cepo kakitat!
43011048	Ye kakyaste kutosyikey kwiye kuyunyi, mosukuyen ci tokol ŋalekyi, kunyo mosukukwa poytoyik cepo Romek kwokwaranta kotap Yiyintet oko piko cepo yemenyo tokol!’’
43011049	Kumwoci Kayafa akenke nye ki tisintet nyewo om kenyinoto cek kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kiy.
43011050	Puryo kot osowu akwek kule misyini cepakäc kume cito akenke om wule omite, ye koto kyorontoy piko cepo yemet tokol?’’
43011051	Ntene kipuryo kot kumwoy neto kuyunyoto kwine nkit, ntene omnye neto kunye ki tisintet nyewo om kenyinoto, kunyo kiŋor kule karik cepakäc Yesu kumeci piko cepo yemonoto.
43011052	Ntene nye kipuryo kot ku kule kumeci piko cepo yemonoto nkit pate, ntene kule sukuŋet koruruc kwek akenke lekokap Yiyintet ce kiseret.
43011053	Kuceke pesyonoto kwiyita Yutayek rurumut kule cepakäc Yesu kume.
43011054	Yoto kuwesetot Yesu om Yuteya nye komokuporkey kutok, ntene kunomen kuwo koret nye lekite kitela, om moŋet nye cekure Efrayim wule kiwo kopur oko konomik.
43011055	Kikirik yoto kupunto sakwet nyepo Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet. Kupete piko koret kupa Yerusalem wokwiy ntasimnyet nye cipukte miyotyet kutompo kot kupunto sakwet.
43011056	Kimite cek yoto kucenye Yesu. Kururukyikey cekto kotap Yiyintet sukuŋolole kwicek nkit kutepekey kule, “Osoti akwek kulene? Muce pa kuco sakwani, nto puryo?’’
43011057	Kikimwayta Tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek kule ye nkete citake tokol wule mite Yesu kumisyini kumwoy sukuŋet cekto wokanäm.
43012001	Yoto om pesyosyek lö kutompo sakwet nyepo Keytayet, kuwo Yesu okoy Pesaniya wule kiminye Lasaro cito nyo kiŋete neto kotutune met.
43012002	Kyici Yesu omik om wuloto. Marisa nye kikwiyisyi kupciwu omik, kumite Lasaro kukepur yepo meset kwomisyi oko Yesu.
43012003	Kunäm Mariyam cupet nye nyitat mwayta nye cekure naratus nye poŋu topon koromun nye kyole pesan ce caŋ oŋnkuroŋnkyi kuŋape kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkupuke putekap metinyi. Kupoŋ mwayta kunäm koto tokol.
43012004	Kumwoy Yuta akenke om konomikyi nye kiwokuŋomntoy Yesu kule,
43012005	“Omne mokyalya yikwe mwayi kyale silinkinek pokolwokik lö, oŋnkyikoci pesanik pononik?’’
43012006	Kimwoy Yuta kuyunyoto, ntene kipuryo kot omnye kisote kurire pononik, ntene omnye ki corin, kinomoti neto lolet nye cekonore pesanik.
43012007	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ayaste neto kukonor co koŋet okoy pesyet nye cemuyeno ani.
43012008	Opontekey akwek oko pononik okokoy, ntene puryo kot opuri ani oko akwek okokoy.’’
43012009	Yoto kulim luket nyepo Yutayek ce caŋ kule mite Yesu Pesaniya, kupa wuloto, ntene kipuryo kot komöce kule cekäs Lasaro nyo kiŋet Yesu kotutune met.
43012010	Yoto kwiyta tisik cewoyec kule cepakäc mpo Lasaro.
43012011	Omnye neto nye kwesac sukutay Yutayek ce caŋ kantoyikwa oŋnkuyen ŋalek cepo Yesu.
43012012	Ntowo kuyekune pesyet nyepo oyeny kulim luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kikwa sakwetap Keytayet kule mite Yesu kuconi Yerusalem.
43012013	Yoto kuput cekto sosik oŋnkupa kutorokta kupolot; kumwowu kule, “Akaste Yiyintet! Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet! Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok Kinko nyepo Israel!’’
43012014	Kunyor Yesu sikiryet, yoto kulany kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule,
43012015	“Monte cemuye pikap Siyon; Akäs mite kuconi Kinko nyemwoŋ wule omite akwek nye kalany moytap sikiryet.’’
43012016	Kipuryo kot kusowu kunyo konomikyi kunket ŋalecu. Ntene om letut yu kowo cilaŋnta Yesu kotutune met, kusot cek kule kimwoy silutekap Yiyintet ŋalecutecu, oko kule kikwici piko neto ŋalek ce yucutecu.
43012017	Luketap piko ce caŋ co kipontotikey Yesu, oŋnkukäs cekto nkit ye kikure neto Lasaro kucone mwenet oŋnkusop kotutune met; kuce kimwayta ŋalek ce kikwiyokis.
43012018	Kunyo sukuŋet kupa luket nyepo piko ce caŋ kutorokta Yesu omnye kikilim kule kikwiy neto ŋolyontoni pa kakitat.
