43012019	Yoto kuŋalal Farasayek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kokäs so? Komo cimuci acek kiy! Akäs pa, karup piko tokol neto!’’
43012020	Kimite Kirikik alake ce kikwontoykey oko piko ce kikwoni Yerusalem kwokusay ye pesyetap sakwet.
43012021	Kukwa cek ye kimite Filipo nyepo Pesaniya om koretap Kalilaya oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, cemöce acek kule cekäs Yesu.’’
43012022	Kuwo Filipo wokumwoci Antereya, yoto kupa tukway wukumwoci Yesu.
43012023	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kuponto yawut nyun sawet cilaŋnta Weritap Cito kunyor woyinto nyewo.
43012024	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye puryo kot kosuci ŋony kupuswontet akenke nyepo nkanuk oŋnkume, kweku nyo kopuswontet akenke pate okokoy ntene ye kusuci ŋony kume, mosukuyi kupuswek ce caŋ.
43012025	Ci ake tokol nye kacäm sopon nyi, kupote cicoto sopon nyi, nto ci ake tokol nye kasenker sopon nyi om koroni mosukurip cicoto sopon nyi oŋnkunyor soponto nye mopoku.
43012026	Ye möce ci ake tokol kule kuyiwo ani yisyet, kumisyini kurupa ani cicoto, sukuŋet kopurune mutworintemwani wuloto amite ani. Mosukulaŋnta Papa cicoto yiwo ani yisyet.
43012027	“Kapotpoten yawut mukuleymwani, kunyo momwowu kulene? Momwowu ra kule ‘Papa mente kucontyo ani sawet nyitenyi?’ Ntene kucoto yec ce kyacontyi ani saŋet opunte sawet nyitenyi po toŋoŋutek.
43012028	Ayi Papa, koci kulaŋnta kuwoyit kayneŋuŋ!’’ Yoto kucone kutit torot kumwoy kule, “Kokoci ani kaynemwani Woyinto. Kunyo mosayiy kuyunyoto yec.’’
43012029	Kulim luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kutit, kumwoy cek kule, “Kotul ilat!’’ Kumwoy alake kule, “Koŋololyi malayket neto!’’
43012030	Ntene kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Kopuryo kot kuŋololwo ani kutina kunömo ani ŋalek, kuŋolole ku nömok akwek.
43012031	Kopunto yawut pesyet cewosontyi koret; kunyo mosicekwet yawut poytoyintet nyepo koroni.
43012032	Pesyet nye ye kacilaŋnta ani owete koret awo torot, yoto ye mosoruruc piko tokol kukwa wule amite ani.’’
43012033	(Kimwoy neto ŋalecutecu kupor aret wule mosukumeta.)
43012034	Kuwekyi luket nyepo piko kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mwowec acek ntarastinekyo kule, mosukusop Ŋapanet okokoy nye puryo kot kume, kunyo muci nyi kulene mwowu kule, Mosicilaŋnta Weritap cito kuwo torot? Weritap Cito ku ŋo?’’
43012035	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosukupor lakweyet kuminiŋ wule omite akwek, kunyo apesetate ye toponte lakweyet, sukuŋet mente kot kunamäk menonet, omnye puryo kot kunket wule weti ci tokol nye mite menonet.
43012036	Oyen lakweyet ye topontekey, sukuŋet oyiku piko cepo lakweyet.’’ Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato okoy kuwany, kuwo wokuwunynkey mente kot kukäs cek neto.
43012037	Nka kot kikwiy Yesu ŋalek cepo kakitat kuköse om konyekwa, ntene kipuryo kot kuyen ŋalekyi.
43012038	Sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyontet Isaya kule: “Mokoryontet, ŋo nye kiyen lokoywek ce kicemwowu acek? Ci ŋo nye kiporci Mokoryontet swamenyi?’’
43012039	Kutoyis cekto meyen om ŋalecutecu omnye kikimwoy yec Isaya kule:
43012040	“Kikokor Yiyintet konyekwa, oŋnkiker kasoteywek cikwa, sukuŋet mente kot kukästa konyekwa kunyo puryo kot kuwecekey kukwa wule amite ani saŋet ani osop cekto.’’
43012041	Kimwoy Isaya ŋalecutecu omnye kikikäs woyintap Yesu, kunyo kiŋolole ŋalek ce nöme neto.
43012042	Kuyen om yoto mpo kantoyikap Yutayek ce caŋ kucäm ŋalek cepo Yesu. Ntene omnye kiyweye Farasayek kipuryo kuŋalale kupor sukuŋet mente kot ceyete cek komo kupeti kotapkok.
43012043	Omnye kicöme cek kule kukastec piko kusir kakastayet nyepo Yiyintet.
43012044	Yoto kuŋalal Yesu kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ci ake tokol nye kacäm kuyen ŋalekwani kunye puryo kot kukacäma kuyeno ani nkit pate, ntene kukacäm kuyen neto nyo kiyokwo ani.
43012045	Ci ake tokol nye kakäsa ani, kukäs cicoto Yiyintet nye kiyokwo ani.
43012046	Kyaco ani koret kuyu lakweyet kule sukuŋet mente kot kopurune menonet ci ake tokol nye kacäma kuyeno ani.
43012047	Ci ake tokol nye kalim lokoywekwani oŋnkutay meyen, kupuryo kot amutyini musanku. Kipuryo kot aco kule comutyi koret musankut, ntene kyaco kule cosop koret.
43012048	Ci ake tokol nye katay meyen lokoywekwani, kuponto cito nyo nye mosukusutyi neto musankut. Ŋolyontemwani nye komwowu kunye mosukumutyi cicoto musankut om pesyet nyepo letut!
43012049	Omnye puryo kot aŋalal ani ŋalek om kamukeywekwani nkit, ntene Papamwani nyo kiyokwo nye kimwowo ŋalek ce maŋalal.
43012050	Kunyo oŋnket ani kule konu soponto nye mopoku ntarastinekyi, Kunyo ŋalek ce omwowu ani kuce kimwowo Papa kule mwowu.’’
43013001	Nteye kitompo kot kupunto pesyet nyepo sakwetap Keytayet. Yoto kunket Yesu kule kakwitita pesyenyi nye ŋete koroni kuwo wule mite Papa. Kicöme neto pikyi ce kipontokey om koret, kunyo kicäm cekto koromun okoy pesyet nyepo letut.
43013002	Nteyu kimite Yesu oko konomikyi kwomisyi omikap kosoleny. Kikikowut yoto Setani nyewo nyepo oyik moyetap Yuta weritap Simon Isikaryoti kule neto nye mosukuŋomnto Yesu.
43013003	Kinket Yesu yoto kule kakono ani Papa swamet nyepo tukuk tokol. Kinket kule kyacone wule mite Yiyintet kunyo mosowo wule mite Yiyintet.
43013004	Yoto kuŋete yepo meset ye kyomisye oŋnkurek sirenyi kutore tapan, oŋnkunäm towulet komotyi suwenyi.
43013005	Kuroŋnkyi peko pesenit oŋnkucec kowun kerenkokap konomik oŋnkupuke towulet nye kamotyi suwenyi.
43013006	Yoto kupun ye mite Simon Petero. Kumwoci nyo neto kule, “Mokoryontet, möce nyi iwun kerenkokwani?’’
43013007	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Puryo kot nketi nyi kito nye oyiye ani om yawut panta nyi, ntene mesenket om letut!’’
43013008	Kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Puryo muci nyi kot iwun kerenkokwani mpo kisic!’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Ye puryo kot owun ani kerenkokuk, kemeyiku nyi konomintemwani.’’
43013009	Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, kunyo mente owun kerenkokwani pate, wun mpo yewuniyek oko metit!’’
43013010	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Puryo kot kuroke ciwun porto nyepo ci ake tokol nye kakowunkey, omnye tilil, ntene ce möce ciwun kerenkok pate. Oyiku akwek tokol tililec toskoy cito akenke pate.’’
43013011	(Omnye kinkete Yesu cito nye wokuŋomntoy neto, sukumwoy kule, “Oyiku akwek tokol tililec toskoy cito akenke pate.’’)
43013012	Nteyu kowo kowun Yesu kerenkokwa okoy kuwany, kulac sirenyi oŋnkopur ŋony oŋnkutepe kule, “Konket akwek pa kito nye koyiwok ani?
43013013	Okuro ani akwek kule konetintet oko kule Mokoryontet. Po manta okuro kuyunyoto, omnye oyiku ani nyoto.
43013014	Kunyo ye oyiku ani Mokoryontemwoŋ oŋnkoyiku konetintemwoŋ, kunyi kowun ani yawut kerenkokwakwek, misyinok mpo akwek owuntyinikey kerenkokwok.
43013015	Koporwok kito nye kokäse, sukuŋet ayiy mpo akwek kuyu wulo koyiwok ani.
43013016	Komwowok ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo mutworin nyewo kupël Mokoryontenyi, oŋnkupuryo kiyokin nyewo kupël cito nyo keyoku neto.
43013017	Kunyo ye konket ŋalecu, oponte akwek kupeyoy ye koyiyisye ŋalecutecu!
43013018	“Puryo kot oŋololwok ani akwek tokol, oŋnketi piko ce kyakwey, ntene misyini kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, ‘Cito nye kwome omikwani, kunye kiwekyokey.’
43013019	Komwowok ani ŋalecu kutompo kot kwiyokis, sukuŋet ye kokwiyokis oyen kule ani nye comwowu.
43013020	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci ake tokol nye katoroc citake tokol nye koyokte ani, kukatoroca mpo ani cicoto, nto ci ake tokol nye katoroca kukatoroc cicoto Yiyintet nyo kiyokwo ani.’’
43013021	Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecu kuŋerec mukuleynyi, oŋnkutor kumwoy kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuŋomnto ani cito akenke om akwek.’’
43013022	Yoto kukäskey konomik kwicek nkit, kukite koromun kule ŋolole Yesu ŋo.
43013023	Kimite yoto konomintet akenke nye kicöme Yesu kukepur kitiŋntokey.
43013024	Kuwus Petero konomintonoto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Tepe pa nyi, ŋo cito nyi ŋolole neto.’’
43013025	Kuwekyikey konomintonoto Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋo nyoto?’’
43013026	Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Cito nyo mosokoci ani mukatyantani ye kanonoke nkuyek, kunye cito nyoto.’’ Yoto kunonoke Yesu mukatyantet nkuyek oŋnkukoci Yuta weritap Isikaryoti.
43013027	Yoto pakenke yu kowo kwam Yuta mukatyantet, kowut Setani moyetap Yuta. Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Teyiye ne! Sorci lakwar weyiy kiye möce kule ayiy!’’
43013028	Kipuryo mpo akenke om piko ce kipur meset nye kinket kule komwoci Yesu Yuta ŋolyo ne.
43013029	Omnye kiripe Yuta lolet nyepo pesanik, kusot konomik alak kule toskoy keyokto Yesu neto wokwal omik ce cemöce om sakwet, nto komwoci kusutyi pesanik pononik.
43013030	Yoto kunäm Yuta Mukatyantet oŋnkumiŋnto kuwo saŋ, kikikwek yoto komoy.
43013031	Nto om letut yu kowo kuwo Yuta, kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kociŋoŋ cipor yawut woyinto nyepo Weritap cito, kocipor woyinto, nyepo Yiyintet kupunte wule mite neto.
43013032	Kunyo ye kociŋoŋ cipor woyinto nyepo Yiyintet kupunte wule mite neto, kunyo Yiyintet nkit nye mosukuŋoŋ kupor woyinto nyepo Weritap cito. Mosukwiy kuyunyoto lakwar.
43013033	Lekokwani, komo opuri oko akwek kuloyit, mosecenya ani akwek, ntene omwowok ani akwek ŋalek co kyomwocini Yutayek kule, ‘Puryo okwoni akwek wule oweti ani.’
43013034	Kakonok ntarastit nyelel kule, acämnkey akwek nkit, Misyini acämnkey kwakwek nkit kuyu wule ocömok ani.
43013035	Ye kacämnkey akwek kwakwek nkit, mosukunket ci tokol kule oyiku akwek konomikwani.’’
43013036	Kutepe Petero Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, Mesewo nyi ono?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot muci nyi yawut kot rupa wule oweti ani. Ntene meserupa om letut.’’
43013037	Kutepe Petero neto kule, “Mokoryontet, omne sumarupiŋ ani nyi yawut? Oyiku ani yiytat omeciŋ.’’
43013038	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Yiku nyi ne yiytat manta kule omeco ani? Kumwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit mesetuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule monketo ani.’’
43014001	Kumwoci Yesu acek kule, “Monte cemuye oŋnkonyeru om mukuleywekwok, oyen akwek Yiyintet, oŋnkoyeno mpo ani.
43014002	Mite korik ce caŋ ce mite kotap Papamwani, kunyo kowo woyiytowok otepto, nto yunye kopuryo kot kumite nto komwowok ani akwek.
43014003	Nteye kowo ani woyiytowok akwek otepto, moseweckey ani nkit oŋnkyokwerok, sukuŋet opurune akwek wule amite ani.
43014004	Oŋnket akwek aret nye weti wule oweti ani.’’
43014005	Kumwoci Tomas neto kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot cinket acek wule weti nyi, kunyo cimuci kulene cinket aret nye weti wuloto.’’
43014006	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Oyiku aret, oyiku ani nyepo manta, oyiku soponto, puryo ci nye muce kuwo wule mite Papa ye manopunte wule omite ani.
43014007	Nto yunye kokwonketo ani akwek, nto kwonket mpo Papa, kunyo kuceke yawut kwonketo akwek, kunyo kwakäs mpo neto.’’
43014008	Kumwoci Filipo Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, porwec acek Papa, kito nyo nye ce möce acek pate.’’
43014009	Kuwekyi Yesu kule, “Filipo, kwopur ani oko akwek tokol kuloyit oŋnkurok tompo kot nketo ani nyi? Ci ake nye kikäs ani, kukikäs cicoto Papa. Kunyo omne semwowu nyi kule ‘Porwec Papa?’
43014010	Puryo kot ku cikwani nkit cepo kamukeywekweni ŋalek ce omwowok ani. Papa nkit nye mitowune wule amite ani nye yiyisyi yisyenyi.
43014011	Roke oyen akwek kule omitowune ani wule mite Papa oŋnkumitowune Papa wule amite ani. Nteye puryo kot kuyunyo, kuroke oyen om yisyonutek cu porukey nkit.
43014012	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci ake tokol nye keyeno ani, mosukwiy cicoto yisyonutek cu oyiye ani, mosukwiy mpo yisyonutek ce woyec kupëlis omnye oweti ani wule mite Papa.
43014013	Mosayiy ani kiy ake tokol nye kosom akwek om kaynemwani, sukuŋet cipor woyinto nyepo Papa kupunte wule mite Werit.
43014014	Ye kosomo ani akwek kiy ake tokol om kaynemwani; mosayiy kiyoto.’’
43014015	“Ye kocäma ani akwek, mosorup aywey ntarastinekwani.
43014016	Mososom Papa kukonok kokolyoyintet ake, nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil nyepo manta nye mosukopurune wule omite akwek okokoy.
43014017	Puryo kot komuce koret kutoroc neto, omnye puryo kot komuce koret kukäs oŋnkonket, ntene oŋnketi omnye purune oŋnkuminye wule omite akwek.
43014018	“Puryo kot opokoktok ani kwakwek nkit; mosoketukey yec wule omite akwek.
43014019	Komo kuköse ani koret kuwany poroyinto nye miniŋ, ntene mosakäsa ani akwek, omnye osope, kunyo mosopce mpo akwek.
43014020	Ye kopunto pesyonoto, mosonket akwek kule omitowune ani wule mite Papa, oŋnkumitowune akwek wule omite ani, kuyu, wulo omitowune ani wule omite akwek.
43014021	“Ci ake tokol nye kacäm ntarastinekwani oŋnkuywey kurip, kunye nyoto nye cömo ani, mosukucäm Papamwani nyo cömo ani, mosacäm mpo ani nyoto oŋnkoporcikey kunketo.’’
43014022	Kumwoci Yuta, (ntene puryo kot ku Isikaryoti kule,) “Mokoryontet, muci kulene porweckey acek nkit, nye puryo kot kule porcikey koret?’’
43014023	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mosukucäm Papamwani ci ake tokol nye kacäm lokoywekwani, mosicekwa acek oko Papa oŋnkwocemiŋisye cicoto orit.
43014024	Ci ake tokol nye katay macäma ani, kupuryo kot kuyweye cicoto ŋalekwani, kunyo puryo kot ku cikwani nkit ŋalek co kwalim akwek, ntene kwone wule mite Papa nyo kiyokwo ani.
43014025	“Komwowok ŋalecu omnye topontekey ani oko akwek.
43014026	Ntene Kokolyoyintet nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil; nye mosukukonok akwek Papamwani om Kaynemwani kunye mosukunetak akwek ŋalek tokol, oŋnkusowok oŋnket ŋalek tokol co kyomwowok.
43014027	“Kopokwok ani kalyet; kakonok kalyet nyimwani nkit. Puryo kot okonu kuyu wulo konuntoy koret, monte cemuye oŋnkonyeru, monte cenyokoritu.
43014028	Kwalim akwek omwowok ani kule, ‘Mosowecikey, ntene oŋnkoketukey wule omite akwek.’ Nto kwocömo ani akwek, nto kwoŋereci omnye kowo wule mite Papa, kunyo nyewo neto kupëlo ani.
43014029	Komwowok ani akwek yawut ŋalecu kutompo kot kwiyokis tokol, sukuŋet ye keyokis kuye oyen.
43014030	Komomuci toŋololwok ŋalek ce caŋ kuloyit, omnye mite kuconi nyewo nyepo koroni, ntene puryo kot kuponto kamukeywek kupayta ani.
43014031	Ntene möce kunket koret kule acöme ani Papa, kunyo oyiye kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo kimwowo ani neto, oŋetye cepete yu.’’
43015001	“Oyiku ani Sapiput nyepo manta, nto Papamwani kunye kapotintet.
43015002	Neto nye yeptoy saryantet ake tokol nye mite wule mite ani nye puryo kot kwiye omik, oŋnkumutyi sarisyek ce yiye omik sukuŋet kwiy omik alak ce caŋ.
43015003	Kunyo kicesatak akwek keny otililitu om ŋolyontet nyo kyomwowok ani.
43015004	Opurune wule amite ani, mosopurune mpo ani wule omite akwek. Ye puryo kot opurune akwek wule amite ani, kupuryo kot oyiye omik, kuyu wulo puryo kot kwiye saryantet omik ye puryo kot kumite wule mite Sapiput.
43015005	“Oyiku ani Sapiput, oyiku akwek wule po sarisyek, ci ake tokol nye kepurune wule amite ani, oŋnkopurune ani wule mite neto, mosukwiy nyoto omik ce caŋ. Omnye Puryo kot omuci akwek kot ayiy kiy ake tokol ye momite ani.
43015006	Ci ake tokol ye puryo kopurune wule amite ani, mosicekwetyi nyoto saŋ wokuyam kuyu saryantet nyepo ketit. Ciruruce sarisyecato oŋnkyewirci mata kuloy.
43015007	Ye kopurune akwek wule amite ani oŋnkopurune ŋalekwani wule omite akwek, oŋnkosom kiy ake tokol nye omöce mosonyoru kiyoto.
43015008	Kuyunyoto ye sicipor kutok woyinto nyepo Papamwani, kuye kayiy akwek omik ce caŋ. Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye soyeku akwek konomikwani cepo manta.
43015009	Ocömok ani akwek kuyu wule cömonto ani Papa; kunyo roko opurte cömisyemwani.
43015010	Ye karup akwek ntarastinekwani, kuye mosopurte cömisyemwani, kuyu wule kyopurte ani aywey ntarastinek cepo Papa oŋnkopurte cömisyenyi.
43015011	“Komwowok ŋalecu, sukuŋet kopurune ŋerekwekwani wule omite akwek oŋnkuyitita kuyem ŋerekwekwok.
43015012	Ntarastimwani nye kakonok kunyi kule; ocömnkey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu ocömntok ani akwek.
43015013	Cömisyet nyewo nye pëlisyi nye muce kunyor cito kuye kekoyito cito soponnyi kumeci coronutekyi.
43015014	Oyiku akwek coronutekwani, ye kayiy ŋalek co komwowok ani.
43015015	Komokurenok yec mutworik, omnye puryo kot kunket mutworinto yisyet nye yiye mokoryontenyi. Kunyo okurenok yawut coronutekwani, omnye komwowok ŋalek tokol ce kyalim kukwane wule mite Papamwani.
43015016	Kipuryo kot kwakwek ce kyokweyo ani, ntene ani nye kyakweyak akwek, oŋnkoyoktok kule ape wayiy omik ce caŋ, nto omik coto kuce pure okokoy. Kunyo mosukukonok Papa kiy ake tokol nye kosom akwek neto om kaynemwani.
43015017	Kunyo komwowok oŋnkolonwok kule, acämnkey akwek kwakwek nkit.’’
43015018	“Ye kasenkerak akwek koret kumisyini oŋnket kule kinyosyo kusenkera ani.
43015019	Nto kwopoye akwek koret nto kucömok akwek koret kuyu pikyi. Ntene kyakweyak ani akwek om koroni, oŋnku puryo kot opoye koret, kunyo senkerok koret.
43015020	Möce asot ŋalek co kyomwowok ani kule, ‘Puryo mutworin nyewo kupël mokoryontenyi.’ Ye kikutaŋanya ani cek, mosukutaŋanyak mpo akwek, nteye karup cekto lokoywekwani, mosukurup mpo lokoywek cikwakwek.
43015021	Ntene mosukwiwok akwek cekto ŋalecutecu tokol omnye oyiku akwek pikwani, omnye puryo kot kunket cekto cito nye kiyokwo ani.
43015022	Nto kipuryo kot aco ani coŋololyi cek, nto kupuryo koto kupunto lelis. Kunyo puryo kot kuponto yawut wule mokucililya om miyotyonikwa.
43015023	Ci ake tokol nye toyo ani kutoye cicoto Papamwani.
43015024	Nto kipuryo kot ayiy ani om wule mite cekto yisyet nye mnakwiy citake tokol kenyis, nto kipuryo kot kuponto cek lelis. Ntene kukäs cekto yisyemwani, kunyo kutaya ani oŋnkutay mpo Papamwani.
43015025	Misyini kwiyokis ŋalecutecu sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kicesil om ntarastinekwa kule, ‘Kisenkera ani puc pate nye puryo ŋolyo.’
43015026	“Mosukuco Kokolyoyintet nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil nyepo manta nye cone wule mite Papa. Mosoyoku ani kucone wule mite Papa mosucokuŋalal kuparta ŋalek ce nömo ani.
43015027	Kunyo oyiku mpo akwek muncururwanik ce moparta ani; omnye kwopur akwek oko ani kuceke ye kicece.
43016001	“Komwowok ani akwek ŋalecu sukuŋet monte kot omweyi.
43016002	Mosukukwetak akwek nye komo peti kotapkok, kunyo musukupunto pesyet nye sote ci ake tokol nye kapakäcak akwek kule ayiye yisyetap Yiyintet.
43016003	Mosukwiwok ŋalecutecu tokol omnye tompo kot kunket cekto Papa nto mpo ani.
43016004	Ntene komwowok ani akwek ŋalecutecu kule sukuŋet ye kopunto pesyet ye yiwok akwek cekto ŋalecutecu, yoto ye mososot oŋnket kule kyomwowok ani ŋalecu.’’ “Kipuryo kot omwowok ani akwek ŋalecutecu ikye kunyo omnye kito cepontekey akwek.
43016005	Kunyo amite yawut aweti wule mite neto nyo kiyokwo ani, ntene puryo citake tokol om akwek nye mokutepena kule, ‘Weti nyi ono?’
43016006	Kunyo konyer mukuleywekwok omnye komwowok ani ŋalecu.
43016007	Ntene omwowok ŋalek cepo manta kule, topon om wule omite akwek ye kawo ani, omnye ye puryo kot awo, kupuryo kot kuconi Kokolyoyintet wule omite akwek. Kunyo ye kawo ani mosuwoyoku neto kuco wule omite akwek.
43016008	Nteye kaco neto mosukuporci piko cepo koret kule, lelotin cekto om ŋalek ce nöme miyotyonik, oko ŋalek ce nöme cepo manta oko ce nöme musankut nye mute Yiyintet.
43016009	Lelotin om ŋalek cenöme miyotyonik, omnye puryo kot kuyeno ani,
43016010	lelotin om ŋalek cepo po manta, omnye mosowo ani wule mite Papa, kunyo komo oköso ani akwek yec.
43016011	Oŋnkulelotin cekto om ce nöme musankut omnye kucemutyi musankut, poytoyintet nyepo koroni.
43016012	“Toponte ani ŋalek ce caŋ ce amöce kule omwowok akwek, ntene mosukunyikisyok yawut ye mokesen.
43016013	Ntene ye kaco Muyet Nyetilil nyepo manta, kuye mosukuntowok om ŋalek tokol cepo manta. Puryo kot kuconi cokuŋalale neto ŋalek ce ceci cepo kamukeywekyi nkit, mosukuŋalale ŋalek ce lime oŋnkumwoy ŋalek ce mosukukwa.
43016014	Mosukulaŋnta ani kukono woyinto, omnye mosukunäm ŋalekwani oŋnkukonok akwek.
43016015	Cikwani tukuk tokol ce ponto Papamwani, kuyunyoto somwowok ani akwek kule, mosukunäm Muyet Nyetilil ŋalek ce kokoci ani oŋnkukonok akwek.’’
43016016	“Komo oköso ani akwek kuwany poroyinto nye miniŋ, ntene mosokäsa yec om letutap poroyinto nye miniŋ.’’
43016017	Kumwoci konomikyi alake konomikyi cut kule, “Poru ne ŋalecu? Omnye komwowec kule, ‘Komo oköse ani akwek kuwany poroyinto nye miniŋ, ntene mosokäsa yec om letutap poroyinto nye miniŋ?’ Oŋnkumwoy yec kule, ‘Omnye mosawo ani wule mite Papa?’ ’’
43016018	Yoto kutep cek kumwoy kule, “Poru ne ŋolyontoni po kule, ‘Poroyinto nye miniŋ?’ Puryo kot cinket acek kito nye ŋolole neto.’’
43016019	Kunket Yesu kule möce cek kutep ŋolyo. Kumwoci neto cekto kule, “Komwowu ani kule, ‘Komo oköso ani akwek kuwany poroyinto nye miniŋ, ntene mosokäsa yec om letutap poroyinto nye miniŋ.’ Ŋolyontonitenyi so nyi otepekey akwek nkit?
43016020	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosorirye oŋnkoncoy, ntene mosukuŋerec koret. Mosonerekisye akwek ntene mukuweckey nerekwekwok kwek ŋerekwek.
43016021	Nerece korko ye karik kucämnkey lekwet, omnye kopunto sawet nye ŋete moyet ntene ye koceyi lekwet, yoto kuyutye toŋoŋutekyi omnye ŋerece kule koceyi lekwet kuco koret.
43016022	Kuyunyoto om wule omite akwek. Oyiku akwek nerekotin yawut, ntene mosakäsak ani akwek yec om letut. Kunyo musukuŋerec mukuleywekwok yoto, ŋerekwek coto kuce puryo kot komuce ci kot konumunenok akwek.
43016023	“Ye kopunto pesyonoto komo osomo ani kiy. Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukukonok akwek Papa kiy ake tokol nye kosom neto om kaynemwani.
43016024	Okoy kupunto pesyoni tompo kot osom akwek kitake om kaynemwani. Kunyo osom mosicekonok sukuŋet kuyemak ŋerekwekwok.’’
43016025	“Komwowok ani ŋalecu oyiyisye tyonkocok, ntene mosukupunto pesyet nye komo oyiyisye tyonkocok kuyunyi; yoto mosoŋololwok oporwok topon kutok ŋalek ce nöme Papa.
43016026	Ye kopunto pesyonoto, mosasom akwek neto om kaynemwani, ntene puryo kot omwowu ani kule mososomwok ani Papa.
43016027	Omnye oyeni akwek Papa nkit. Cömok akwek neto omnye oyeno ani akwek, kunyo kwacäm akwek kule acone ani wule mite Yiyintet.
43016028	Kyacone ani wule mite Papa saŋet aco koret, kunyo anomeni yawut owete koret awo wule mite Papa.’’
43016029	Kumwoci konomik neto kule, “Käs pa, keŋalal yawut poru kutok nye puryo kot yiyisye tyonkocok.
43016030	Kocinket acek yawut kule nketi nyi tukuk tokol, kunyo puryo kot möce nyi kutepeniŋ citake teputek. Porwec acek ŋalecutecu ciyen kule kicone nyi wule mite Yiyintet.’’
43016031	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Koyen akwek so yawut?
43016032	Ntene mosukupunto pesyet, kunyi kopun yawut yuteyu ye mososeretye kuwo citake tokol kanyi, mosoŋetu ani nkit pate. Ntene puryo kot oŋetu kwani nkit, omnye ce pontekey oko Papa.
43016033	Komwowok ani ŋalecu kule sukuŋet onyoru akwek kalyet omnye kociyomekey oko ani. Mosukutaŋanyak akwek koret, ntene otitir oyiku nyikon! Kwopël ani koret!’’
43017001	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Yesu ŋalecata okoy kuwany, kunyal torot oŋnkumwoy kule, “Papa, kopunto sawet, ilaŋnte koci Weriŋuŋ woyinto, sukuŋet Werit kulaŋntiŋ nyi.
43017002	Omnye kikoci nyi neto kupayta tukuk tokol, sukuŋet kukoci neto soponto nye mopoku piko tokol ce kikoci nyi neto.
43017003	Nto Soponto nye mopoku kunyi kule, kunketiŋ piko tokol, nyi Yiyintet nyepo manta oŋnkunket cek Yesu Kristo nyo kiyoku nyi.
43017004	Kwoporu ani woyinŋuŋ om koret. Kwawany yisyet nyo kikono ayiy.
43017005	Ayi Papa! Kono yawut woyinto om tayŋuŋ, woyinto nyoto kunyo kyoponte ani oko nyi kutompo kot citany koret.
43017006	“Kwapartiŋ ani nyi om wule mite piko co kikono om koret, cekuk picoto, nyi nye kikono ani cekto, kunyo kurip cekto ŋolyonteŋuŋ.
43017007	Kukunket cekto yawut kule cone wule mite nyi kiy ake tokol nye kikono ani nyi.
43017008	Omnye kwomwoci lokoywek ce kikono ani nyi, kunyo kunäm cekto ŋalecato oŋnkunket kupoyit manta kule ocone ani wule mite nyi, oŋnkuyen kule nyi nye kiyokwo ani.
43017009	“Osomncini ani cekto. Ntene puryo kot osomncini koret, osomncini piko co kikono ani nyi, omnye cekuk pico.
43017010	Cekuk tukuk tokol ce oponte ani oŋnkucikwani tukuk tokol ce ponte nyi, kunyo ciporu woyinmwani kupunte wule mite cekto.
43017011	Omite yawut aconi wule mite nyi; komo minye ani koret, ntene tokuminye cek koret. Ayi Papa Nyetilil! Rip cekto topon om swametap kayneŋuŋ, kaynet nyoto kunyo kikono ani nyi sukuŋet kwek akenke cekto kuyu wulo ciku acek akenke oko nyi.
43017012	Kworip cek, kunyo monopot mpo akenke, tos pate cito nyo kicinket kule mosukupot sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet.
43017013	Kunyo amite ani yawut aconi wule mite nyi. Komwowu ŋalecu om koret sukuŋet kunyor cekto ŋerekwekwani ce kayem mukuleywekwa.
43017014	Kwomwoci cekto lokoywekuk; kunyo toye koret cekto, omnye puryo kot kupo koret kuyu wulo puryo kot opoye mpo ani koret.
43017015	Puryo kot osomiŋ kule sut kupete koret, ntene osome kule rip cekto om wule mite Nyo Miyat.
43017016	Puryo kot kupo cekto koret, kuyu wulo puryo kot opoye ani koret.
43017017	Wec cek kwek cekuk om aret nyepo manta. Ŋolyonteŋuŋ kunye po manta.
43017018	Koyokte ani cek kupa koret kuyu wulo kiyokwo ani nyi aco koret.
43017019	Okonukey ani wule mite nyi om kaynemwacek, sukuŋet mpecek kwek pikuk cepo manta.
43017020	“Puryo kot osomncini ani cek nkit pate, ntene osomncini mpo piko alake co yeno ani, omnye kalim lokoywek cikwa.
43017021	Osome kule kuyomekey cek tokol kwek akenke. Ayi Papa! Kante kopurune cekto wule cemitowune acek kuyu wulo mitowune nyi wule omite ani oŋnkomitowune ani wule mite nyi. Kante kwek cek akenke sukuŋet kuyen koret kule nyi nye kiyokwo ani.
43017022	Kokoci ani cek woyinto nye kerkey oko nyo kikono ani nyi, kule sukuŋet kwek akenke, kuyu wule ciku acek akenke oko nyi.
43017023	Opurune ani wule mite cek oŋnkipurune nyi wule omite ani, sukuŋet cek kukwilokis kwek akenke, sukuŋet kunket koret kule nyi nye kiyokwo ani oŋnkunket kule cöme nyi cekto kuyu wulo cömnto ani nyi.
43017024	“Ayi Papa! Kikono ani nyi cek, kunyo amöce kule kopurune cek wule omitowune ani, sukuŋet kukäs woyinmwani, woyinto nyoto kunyo kikono ani nyi, omnye kicäma ani nyi kutompo kot citany koret.
43017025	Ayi Papa nyepo manta! Puryo kot konketiŋ koret, ntene oŋnketiŋ ani nyi oŋnkunketiŋ picu kule nyi nye kiyokwo ani.
43017026	Kwoporci kunketiŋ nyi, kunyo mosotosyikey ayiy kuyunyoto sukuŋet kopurune wule mite cekto cömisyet nye ponte nyi om wule omite ani, oŋnkopurune ani wule mite cekto.’’
43018001	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Yesu ŋalecutecu okoy kuwany, kunomen oko konomikyi kupa kway roroŋtitap Ketron. Kimite wuloto mparet, yoto kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi okoy mparanato orit.
43018002	Kinket ŋomntoyintet Yuta mparanato, omnye kituytos Yesu oko konomikyi wuloto om pesyosyek alak ce caŋ.
43018003	Yoto kuwo Yuta okoy mparanato, kukwer neto luket nyepo sikarek oko piko ce ripe kotap Yiyintet ce kiyoktoy tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek. Kiponto picoto karikap poryet oko nomoryek oko tarinek.
43018004	Kinket Yesu kiy ake tokol nye mokwiyakäy om wule mite neto; yoto kuco tay oŋnkutepe kule, “Ocenye akwek ŋo?’’
43018005	Kuwekyi cek neto kule, “Cecenye Yesu nyepo Nasaret.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ani nyoto.’’ Kimite ŋomntoyintet Yuta kukeyo ye mite cek.
43018006	Ntowo kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ani nyoto,’’ kunata cek kupa let oŋnkuruyi ŋony.
43018007	Kutepe Yesu cekto yec kule, “Ocenye akwek ŋo?’’ Kumwoy cek kule, “Cecenye Yesu nyepo Nasaret’’
43018008	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, Ani nyoto! Kunyo ye ocenye ani akwek, ayaste picu alak kupecikey.’’
43018009	(Kimwoy Yesu ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kikimwoy kule, “Papa, puryo kot kupote mpo akenke om piko tokol co kikono ani nyi.’’)
43018010	Kucut Simon Petero rotwetap cok nye kiponto oŋnkuyep kulot yititap tay nyepo mutworintetap Tisintet nyewo. Kicekure kaynetap mutworintono Malko.
43018011	Kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Ketyi rotwetap cok kirarwet, soti nyi kule puryo kot omuci ani opunte toŋoŋutek ce möce Papamwani kule opunte ani?’’
43018012	Kukwa luket nyepo sikarek oko nyewo nyimwa oko sikarek cepo Yutayek, oŋnkunäm cek Yesu oŋnkurat,
43018013	oŋnkunyosye kukwer wule mite Anas. Anas kunye ki pontetap pikoy nyepo Kayafa nye ki Tisintet nyewo om kenyinoto.
43018014	Kayafa kunyo kikocini Yutayek ŋomnonet kule topon ye kumeci cito akenke piko tokol.
43018015	Kurup Simon Petero oko konomintet nyin ake Yesu let. Kinkete topon Tisintet nyewo konomintet nyin ake. Yoto kowo nyo oko Yesu okoy kowut saŋnta nyepo kaytap Tisintet nyewo.
43018016	Kuyoŋe Petero kayta saŋ om yepo kurket. Yoto kuketitakey konomintet nyo kinkete Tisintet nyewo kuwo saŋ oŋnkuwokuŋololyi cepto nye ripe kurket, oŋnkukwer Petero kuco orit.
43018017	Kumwoci cepoto kimite kurket Petero kule, “Puryo kot yiku nyi ne konomintetap cici?’’ Kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kwani nyo.’’
43018018	Omnye kikaytit koret, yoto kulay mutworik oko sikarek mata nyepo nesek oŋnkuyoŋ komut kuyuye cek mata. Kuwo mpene Petero wo kuyu mata.
43018019	Kutepe Tisintet nyewo Yesu ŋalek ce nöme konomikyi oko ŋalek ce nöme konetisyenyi.
43018020	Kowekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Kwoŋololi ani okokoy oporu kutok om wule mite ci tokol. Kwonetisye ŋalekwani korikapkok oko kotap Yiyintet wule rurukyinikey Yutayek tokol. Monaŋalale ani ŋolyo nye wuŋat mpo kisic.
43018021	Kunyo omne setepena ani nyi? Tepe pate piko ce kulime ŋalek ce kwomwowu. Nkete ŋalek ce kwomwocini. Tepe kumwowuŋ.’’
43018022	Ntowo kumwoy yesu ŋalecato, kusyec sikorintet nye kikiyoŋe ye lekite neto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Muci nyi kulene ŋololyi Tisintet nyewo kuyunyo?’’
43018023	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ye komwowu ŋolyo nye lelat, mwoci pa nyi ci tokol nye mite yu lelisoto. Ntene ye opoye manta om ŋalek ce komwowu, omne sesyeca ani nyi?’’
43018024	Yoto Kukoyito Anas cekwer Yesu kuratat kuwo wule mite Kayafa Tisintet nyewo.
43018025	Kimite Petero yoto kukeyo kutokuyuye mata. Yoto kumwoci piko alake neto kule, “Puryo kot yiku nyi ne konomintetap cici?’’ Kutuckey Petero kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kwani nyo.’’
43018026	Yoto kuŋalal mutworintet nyepo Tisintet nyewo nye kipo aretap mpo cito nyo koyepe Petero kulot yitit kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot akäsiŋ ani nyi ne pontekey cici om mparen?’’
43018027	Kutuckey Petero yec kutoyis, yoto pakenke koncur kurkonkit.
43018028	Kukwer cek Yesu kuwete kotap Kayafa okoy kaytap kotap Poytoyintet. Kimite yoto kerir koret pate. Kutay Yutayek nkit mewut kaytap Poytoyintet omnye kimöce kule ceripkey mente celelokisye sukuŋet kwam sakwetap Keytayet.
43018029	Yoto kuco Pilato saŋ kutorok cek oŋnkutepe kule, “Owosontyini akwek cici om ŋolyo ne?’’
43018030	Kuwekyi cek kumwoci neto kule, “Nto yunye kopuryo kot kwiy cici lelis nye miyat nto kopuryo kot cimuci acek kot cekweru kuco wule mite nyi.’’
43018031	Kumwoci Pilato cek kule, “Okwer wowosontyi akwek nkit neto kuyu wulo yunto ntarastinekwok.’’ Kuwec Yutayek kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot ce cömwec acek cepakäc ci.’’
43018032	(Kikwiyokis ŋalecutecu sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kikimwoy Yesu ce nöme menyi wule mokumeta)
43018033	Kuketitakey Pilato kuwo konyi orit oŋnkukur Yesu. Oŋnkutepe kule, “Yiku nyi Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’
43018034	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Tepe ŋolyontoni kwinyi nkit nto kumwowuŋ piko alake ŋalek ce nöme ani?’’
43018035	Kuwekyi Pilato kumwoci neto kule, “Soti nyi kule oyiku ani Yutoyin? Pikuk oko tisikwok cewoyec ce kokweruŋ nyi wuli omite ani, kweyiy ne nyi?’’
43018036	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Puryo kot kupo poytoyisyemwani koroni, nto koyunye kupo poytoyisyemwani koroni, nto kuportos konomikwani kuyeta mente kunäma Yutayek, kunyo puryo kot kupo poytoyisyet nyimwani koroni!’’
43018037	Yoto kutepe Pilato Yesu kule, “Kunyo yiku nyi so Kinko?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Nyi nye kemwowu kule oyiku ani Kinko, kiceyo ani oŋnkoco koret om ŋolyontonitenyi akenke, saŋet aŋalal ŋalek cepo manta, nto ci ake tokol nyepo manta kunye lime ŋalekwani.’’
43018038	Kutep Pilato kumwoy kule, “Ŋalek cepo manta ku kiy ne?’’ Yoto kuco Pilato saŋ wule mite Yutayek oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Mananyorte ani cici lelis nye momutyine musanku.
43018039	Ntene oponte akwek kwak kopurto nye otyokwok ani mopusyontet akenke ye pesyet nyepo sakwetap Keytayet. Omöce akwek kule otyokwok ani kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’
43018040	Kuwekyi cek kupol kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kunyo, cemöce Parapa!’’ Parapa kunye cito nye kicorin.
43019001	Yoto kukoyito Pilato Yesu wocepas korokonik.
43019002	Kutä sikarek kutwet nyepo kotok oŋnkukoci metitap Yesu, oŋnkulokyi cek neto siret nye mur kwarar,
43019003	oŋnkukwa ye kimite kwokumwoci kule, “Ilaŋnte sop okokoy Kinko nyepo Yutayek!’’ Oŋnkusyec cek Yesu.
43019004	Kuco Pilato yec saŋ oŋnkumwoci Yutayek kule, “Akäs pa, mosokweru neto kuco saŋ yu mite akwek sukuŋet akäs akwek kule mananyorta ani neto lelis nye momutyine musanku.’’
43019005	Yoto kuco Yesu saŋ kukelac kutwetap kotok oko siret nye mur kwarar. Kumwoci Pilato cek kule, “Akäs pa oŋyi cito!’’
43019006	Nteye kotokäse tisik cewoyec oko sikarek Yesu, kupol cek kumwoy kule, “Owuyite! Owuyite neto owuyitoci murtowontet’’ Kumwoci Pilato cek kule, “Akwer akwek nkit wowuyite; omnye mananyorte ani neto lelis nye momutyine musanku!’’
43019007	Kuwekyi Yutayek kumwoci Pilato, “Ceponte acek ntarastit, nto wule yunto ntarastinato, kumisyini kume neto omnye sutekey kule oyiku Weritap Yiyintet.’’
43019008	Ntowo kulim Pilato kumwowu cek kuyunyoto, kutosyikey kumuy yec koromun.
43019009	Kuketitakey kuwo kanyi orit oŋnkumwoci Yesu kule, “Cone nyi kor ne!’’ Ntene kutay Yesu mowekyi ŋolyo.
43019010	Kumwoci Pilato neto kule, “Meŋololwo ani nyi so? Nketi nyi kule oponte kamukeywek ce omuci atyaktiŋ nyi, oŋnkoponte kamukeywek ce omuci owuyitociŋ murtowntet?’’
43019011	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ponte nyi pate kamukeywek om wule omite ani omnye kikoniŋ Yiyintet. Kunyo cito nyo kukwerwo ani aco wule mite nyi kunye ponto nyoto miyotyet nyewo kupëlis.’’
43019012	Ntowo kulim Pilato ŋalecato, kutosyikey kusyem kule atyakte Yesu, ntene kupol, Yutayek kumwoy kule, “Ye ketyakte nyi neto, kuporkey kule puryo kot yiku nyi corwetap Kinko Nyewo! Kunyo ci ake tokol nye sutekey kule oyiku Kinko Nyewo kunye tintentyini Kinko Nyewo!’’
43019013	Nteye kotolime Pilato ŋalecato, kukwer Yesu kuwo saŋ, oŋnkopure ŋeceretap kokwet nye cemüte musankunek om otepto nye cekure, “Rwantet nye laŋntat.’’ (Nye cekure om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek “Kapasa.’’)
43019014	Kimite yoto sawet kakeyte pet kwen nye ntoyekune kwek pesyetap Keytayet. Kumwoci Pilato Yutayek kule, “Akäs pa Kinko nyimwoŋ’’
43019015	Kupol Yutayek kumwoy kule, Apakäc nyo! “Apakäc nyo! Wuyitoci Murtowontet!’’ Kutepe Pilato cekto kule, “Omöce akwek so kule owuytoci ani murtowontet Kinko nyimwoŋ?’’ Kuwec tisik cewoyec kumwoy kule, “Kinko nye ceponte acek ku Kinko nyewo pate.’’
43019016	Yoto kukoci Pilato cek Yesu wocewuyitoci murtowontet. Yoto kukwer sikarek Yesu,
43019017	kuwo neto kukonopoti murtowontenyi nkit okoy ye cekure, “Rokyetap Metit.’’ Ye cekure om ŋelyeptap, Puraniyek “Kolokosa.’’
43019018	Cewuyitoci neto murtowontet om wuloto oko piko alak oyeny, kopurune ake tapan oko tapan kumite Yesu kwenut.
43019019	Kusil Pilato ŋalek oŋnkukoci cikemer murtowontet parak nye kisil kule, “Yesu nyepo Nasaret Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’’
43019020	Kusuman Yutayek ce caŋ ŋalecato omnye kilekite yepo moŋet yoto kicewuyite Yesu, kunyo kicesil ŋalecato om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek, oko nyepo Romek, oko nyepo Kirikik.
43019021	Kumwoci tisik cewoyec cepo Yutayek Pilato kule, “Mente osil kule, ‘Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’ Ntene sil kule ‘Kimwoy cici kule oyiku Kinko nyepo Yutayek!’ ’’
43019022	Kuwekyi Pilato kumwoci cek kule, “Ce kosil ani, kuce kosil.’’
43019023	Nto om letut yu kowo kuwuyitoci sikarek Yesu murtowontet, kunäm cek sirokyi oŋnkupeciwune wok amwan, kusut sikorintet akenke akenke, kunäm cekto mpo kansunyi nye kisiret akenke nye puryo wule kicenap cituye ntene nye kicenap kucone met okoy kel.
43019024	Kurwoc sikarek kwicek nkit kumwocin kule, “Monte cepac, ntene cepirci kirot sicekäs ŋo nye mokusut.’’ Kikwiyokis ŋaleca kuyunyoto sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, “Kipcicin cek sirokwani kwicek nkit, oŋnkuporci kirot siremwani.’’ Yoto kwiy sikarek kuyunyoto.
43019025	Kimite kukeyoŋe yoto ye kilekit murtowontet mpo kametitap Yesu oko cekwametitap kamet nye cekure Mariyam korketap Kiloypa oko Mariyam nyepo koretap Maktala.
43019026	Yoto kukäs Yesu kamet oko konomintet nyo kicöme neto kumite kukeyoŋ ye lekite kamet. Kumwoci Yesu kamet kule, “Cepyos, oŋyo weriŋuŋ!’’
43019027	Oŋkumwoci konomintonoto kule, “Oŋyo komet.’’ Kuceke yoto pakenke kukwer konomintonoto kametitap Yesu kuwo kanyi.
43019028	Kunket Yesu yoto kule kaciwany kiy ake tokol, sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet. Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kakwama ani melelya!’’
43019029	Kimite kokitore yoto pokulit nye nyitat finyonik ce mintililec. Kowute cek cankut orit oŋnkurutyi ketit nye mwa koromun nye cekure isop oŋnkukoci yepo kutinyi.
43019030	Kuye Yesu finyonik oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kapok!’’ Yoto kolulyo metinyi oŋnkume.
43019031	Yoto kusom Yutayek Pilato kule kucömnci cekto kwiri kerenkokap piko co kocewuyitoy oŋnkurek muswek kukwane murtowonik. Kikwiy cek kuyunyoto omnye kipesyetap müt kunyo kipuryo kot kumöce cek kule kopur muswek murtowonik okoy pesyetap Sapat. Omnye kipesyo nyewo nyetilil koromun pesyetap Sapat nyoto kiconi.
43019032	Yoto kupa sikarek wokwiri kerenkokap piko ce kicepoköce oko Yesu. Kunyosye nyepo tay ntekere nyepo let.
43019033	Ntene yu kowo kupun ye mite Yesu kwokunyor kame keny kipuryo kot kwiri cek yoto kerenkokyi.
43019034	Ntene kupar sikorintet ake Yesu kupare ŋotit karasta, yoto kukwa korotik oko peko.
43019035	Cito nye kiköse kwiyoktos ŋalecu kunyi ŋolole. Cinket acek kule mwowu neto ŋalek cepo manta oŋnkunket mpene nkit kule oŋololi ŋalek cepo manta sukuŋet oyen mpo akwek.
43019036	Kikwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita kipoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, “Puryo kot cirye kowenyi mpo akenke.’’
43019037	Kumite yec silutekap Yiyintet nye mwowu kule, “Mosakukäs piko cito nyo kipore neto’’.
43019038	Nto om letutap ŋalecato. Yoto Yosep nyepo moŋetap Arimaseya, nye kikonomintetap Yesu nye kiwunyekey omnye kiyweye Yutayek. Kusom neto Pilato kukoci portap Yesu. Kucömnci Pilato neto. Yoto kuwo wokusut portap Yesu.
43019039	Kuco mpene Nikontemo nyo kiweti pesyet ake komoy wule mite Yesu. Kusut neto mwayta nye poŋu topon nye kipo kilonok konom nye kicilinyo oko mwaninek alak ce cekure mira oko alosik.
43019040	Kunäm picoto kwoyeny portap Yesu kurek oŋnkurate sirok ce cemuytoy oŋnkuyile mwayta, omnye kikwiye Yutayek kuyunyoto ye mocemuy musyontet.
43019041	Kimite ye kilekite yoto kicepokokyini Yesu mparet nye kimite yoto mwenet nye kitompo kot cemuci ci mpo akenke.
43019042	Kunyo kipesyet nyoto nye ntoyekune kwek pesyetap Sapat nyepo Yutayek oko omnye kilekite yoto mwenet, kumuci cekto Yesu yoto.
43020001	Nteye ki pesyetap Santey, nye kerir koret pate nye tokutuy, kuwo Mariyam nyepo Maktala wule mite mwenet. Yoto wokukäs kule kocinum rwantet kucone kurket nyepo mwenet.
43020002	Kunomen yoto kukony mweyek okoy wule mite Simon Petero oko konomintet nyin ake, nyoto kunyo kucöme Yesu neto oŋnkumwoci kule. “Kocinum Mokoryontet kucone mwenet. Kunyo mocinket wule kocitore neto.’’
43020003	Kunomen yoto Petero oko konomintet nyin ake kupa okoy wule mite mwenet.
43020004	Kukony cekto tukway, ntene kukony konomintet nyin ake kusirte Petero okoy wokunyosyo yepo mwenet.
43020005	Nteyu kowo kuyim kukoyto mwenet, kukäs yoto suket nyo kucerate, ntene kipuryo kot kowut orit.
43020006	Yoto kupun mpene Petero nye kirupu let, oŋnkoco kowut mwenet orit. Kukäs suket nye mite ŋony,
43020007	oko tamparit nyo kucerate metitap Yesu nye kipuryo kot kupontokey tukway, ntene kiciriny nye mite yeto nyenyi nkit.
43020008	Kowut mpene konomintet nyo konyosyi kupunto mwenet, kukäs oŋnkuyen kucämnta.
43020009	(Kipuryo kot kusow cekto yoto kunket silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule misyini kotutune met neto.)
43020010	Yoto kunomen konomik kuketitakey kupa ka.
43020011	Kimite Mariyam kukeyoŋe yepo mwenet saŋ oŋnukurire. Nteye kimite kurire kuyim kukoyito mwenet.
43020012	Yoto kukäs neto malaykanik oyeny ce kelac sirok ce lelac ce kepur yo kucemucini portap Yesu. Kiyoŋe ake ye kipo metit kuyoŋe ake ye kipo kerenkok.
43020013	Kutepe malaykanicoto neto kule, “Cepyos! Keririci ne?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Kocinum Mokoryontenyu kunyo monketi wule kucitore!’’
43020014	Kuweckey Mariyam yoto kukäs let okoy kukäs Yesu nye keyo, ntene kipuryo kot konket kule Yesu.
43020015	Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Cepyos! Keririci ne?’’ Kisote Mariyam kule cito nye ripe mparet, kumwoci kule, “Nyewo! Ye nyito nye kwenumu osomiŋ porwo ye kwetore saŋet ani wonumu.’’
43020016	Kuŋololyi Yesu neto kukur kaynet kule, “Mariyam.’’ Yoto kuwekyikey Mariyam kukäs Yesu oŋnkumwoci om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek kule, “Rapponi!’’ Nye poru kaynana kule, “Konetintet.’’
43020017	Kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mente anäma ani kutompo awo torot wule mite Papa, ntene iwo wule mite mpo yeya mwani wemwoci kule amite ani owete oloŋntoy wule mite Papa mwani oŋnku Papa mwakwek.’’
43020018	Yoto kunomen Mariyam nyepo Maktala wokumwoci konomik kule kokäs neto Mokoryontet oŋnkurorci ŋalek ce kokomwoci Yesu neto.
43020019	Nto om pesyonoto santey komoy, kimite yoto konomik kukokorurukyikey koto orit, oŋnkukerotin kurkotik omnye kimuye poytoyikap Yutayek. Yoto kuco Yesu oŋnkuyoŋe kwenumwacek oŋnkumwoci kule, “Opurte akwek kalyet.’’
43020020	Nteyu kowo kumwoci coto, kuporci yewuniyekyi oko karasta nyenyi. Kuŋerec yoto konomik koromun yu kowokukäs cekto Mokoryontet.
43020021	Kumwoci Yesu yec cekto kule, “Opurte akwek kalyet! Kuyu wolo kiyokwo ani Papa, kunyo oyoktok mpo ani akwek.’’
43020022	Nteyu kowo kumwoy ŋalecato, komuŋnkyi neto cekto Muyet Nyetilil, kumwoci kule, “Onyoru Muyet Nyetilil,
43020023	Ye kokalye akwek piko miyotyonik, mosicikalya. Nteye puryo kot okalye akwek piko miyotyonik kupuryo kot cikolyoy.’’
43020024	Kipuryo kot kumite akenke om konomik nye cekure Tomas-Soromin, yo kiconi Yesu.
43020025	Yoto kumwoci konomik cut alake neto kule, “Kucekäs acek Mokoryontet!’’ Kumwoci Tomas cekto kule, “Puryo kot oyeni ani mpo kisic okoy ye kakäs momitek cepo musumarisyek om yewuniyekyi oŋnkanäme yewuniyekwani momitecoto oko koroswekyi.’’
43020026	Nto letutap pesyosyek sisit. Ye kimite konomik koto orit, kupontokey cekto yoto Tomas. Kukerotin kurkotik. Ntene kuco Yesu oŋnkuyoŋe kwenumwacek, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Opurte akwek kalyet.’’
43020027	Kumwoci Yesu yoto Tomas kule, “Sutu pa morneŋuŋ kuco yu, käs yewuniyekwani, mente aŋuny pate, ntene yen cämnte pate.’’
43020028	Kuwec Tomas kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontenyu, oŋnku Yiyintenyu!’’
43020029	Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Keyen nyi so omnye kekäs ani? Ponto kupeyoy ce keyen kucömis kutompo kot kukäs!’’
43020030	Kwiy Yesu tukuk cepo kakitat alak om taytap konomikyi, coto kuce puryo kot cesil kitapuni.
43020031	Ntene kicesil cutecu sukuŋet cämnte nyi kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet, Weritap Yiyintet nto om koyenet om wule mite neto, kuye nyoru soponto om kaynenyi.
43021001	Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, kuporcikey Yesu nkit yec konomikyi om tampayayetap Tiperia. Kiporcikey neto cekto kuyunyi kule.
43021002	Kimite yoto kupontokey wanak konomikyi Simon Petero, oko Tomas soromin, oko Nasanael ŋyepo Kana om koretap Kalilaya, oko werikap Sepetayo oko konomikyi alak oyeny.
43021003	Kumwoci Simon Petero konomik tokol cut alak kule, “Mawo ani wanäm purpurunek.’’ Kumwoci cut neto kule, “Mocepetekey tokol oko nyi.’’ Yoto kupa cek oŋnkuwokulany rapet, ntene kipuryo kot kunäm cek kiy mpo akenke om komowunoto tokol.
43021004	Nto kerir koret pate, kuyoŋe Yesu tampayayet tapan, nye kipuryo kot konket konomik kule Yesu nyoto.
43021005	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Lekocu monanäm akwek kiy.’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Monacenäm kiy.’’
43021006	Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Owirci porokwok yewutap tay nyepo rapet mosonäm alak.’’ Yoto kuwirci cek porok peko, ntopere cicutu kocut kot kutiŋ omnye kikinäm purpurunek ce caŋ koromun.
43021007	Kumwoci konomintet nyo kicöme Yesu Petero kule, “Mokoryontet nyitenyi!’’ Nteye kotolime Petero kule, koko Mokoryontet nyitenyi kwisunekey sirenyi nyepo saŋ (omnye kikikorek sirokyi oŋnkurontyi peko orit.)
43021008	Kukwane konomik cut alake rapet okoy kupun tampayayet tapan kocutonu porok ce kanyiy Purpurunek. Kipuryo kot kuloyec cekto kuceke yoto okoy cepunte koret, ntene kupuntoy kakwoyutek pokol akenke.
43021009	Ntowo kupun cek tampayayet tapan kukäs mata nyepo nesek oko purpurunek ce kacewatan oko mukatinek.
43021010	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Osutu pa purpurunek alak co kotonöme akwek pantenyi.’’
43021011	Kuwo Simon okoy yepo rapet oŋnkucut porok ce kanyiy purpurunek cewoyec okoy kupun tampayayet tapan, kipuntoy Purpurunek tokol pokol akenke oko konom ok somok. Nka kot kicaŋ rupurunek ntene kipuryo kot kuŋetyo porok.
43021012	Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwa kwoyomisye.’’ Kipuryo mpo akenke om konomik nye kisyem kutepe neto kule, “Nyi ŋo?’’ Omnye kinket cek kule Mokoryontet nyitenyi.
43021013	Kuwo Yesu oŋnkonum mukatyantet oŋnkukoci cek oŋnkukoci mpo Purpurunek kuyunyoto.
43021014	Kunyo aret nyepo somok nyitenyi kuporcikey Yesu konomik om letut yu kowo ciŋet kotutune met.
43021015	Nto letut yu kowo kwomis cekto, kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Simon weritap Yowana, cömo ani nyi kusir alak cu?’’ Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci neto kule, “Mokoryontet, yunyoto nyi nye nketi kule ocömiŋ ani.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rip kecirekwani.’’
43021016	Kumwoci Yesu yec Petero kule, “Simon weritap Yowana, cömo ani nyi?’’ Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet yunyoto nyi nye nketi kule ocömiŋ ani nyi.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rip kecirekwani.’’
43021017	Kumwoci Yesu Petero yec nyepo somok kule, “Simon weritap Yowana, cömo ani nyi?’’ Yoto kunyer Petero omnye katepe Yesu neto nyepo somok kule, “Cömo ani nyi?’’ Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet nyi nye nketi ŋalek tokol kule ocömiŋ ani nyi.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rip kecirekwani.
43021018	Komwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye kiyiku nyi lekwa, kirotekey nkit oŋnkunomen iwo wolyo ake tokol wule möce, ntene ye keyositu, meseyite yewuniyekuk oŋnkurateniŋ citake misipit oŋnkukweriŋ wule memöce.’’
43021019	(Kimwoy Yesu ŋalecutecu kupor met wule mosukumeta Petero sukuŋet kusut woyinto om wule mite Yiyintet.) Yoto kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rupa ani.’’
43021020	Kuweckey Petero kukäs let, yoto kukäs konomintet nyin ake nyo kicöme Yesu kumite letunyi. Konomintet nyoto kunyo kutiŋntoykey oko Yesu ye kyomisyi cek komoy oŋnkunyoto kunyo kitepe neto Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋo nye mosukuŋomntiŋ, nyi?’’
43021021	Nteye kotoköse Petero konomintet nyoto. Kumwoci neto Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, nto nyi,’’
43021022	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ye omöce ani kule kusop neto, okokoy, kunömiŋ nyi coto? Rupa ani nyi pate.’’
43021023	Yoto kutisto ŋolyontono om wule mite konomik kule puryo kot kume konomintonoto. Ntene kipuryo kot kumwoy Yesu kule puryo kot kume neto, kimwoy pate kule, “Ye omöce ani kule kusop, okokoy aweckey ani, kunömiŋ nyi coto?’’
43021024	Konomintonoto kunye neto nyi poru ŋalecu, oŋnku neto nye kisile ŋalecu, kunyo cinket acek neto, kimwoy ŋalek cepo manta.
43021025	Kunyo mite ŋalek alak ce caŋ ce kikwiy Yesu. Ce nto kocesil ŋolyo ake tokol nye kikwiy, asoti ani kule nto puryo kot komuce koret kukonor kitapunek ce kocesil.
44001001	Mokoryontet nye cekonyite Teyopilo, Om kitapumwani nyo kipo tay, kyosil oŋnkatet yisyonutek tokol ce kikwiy oŋnkunet Yesu kuceke ye kicece yisyenyi,
44001002	okoy pesyet nyo kicesute neto kuwo torot. Ye kitompo kot cesut kuwo torot, kimwoci kunkolontyi om swametap Muyet Nyetilil piko co kikweny neto kwek kiyokikyi.
44001003	Kopur Yesu kuwany pesyosyek artam kiceke ye kitutune met, oŋnkuporcikey neto nkit cekto aret ce caŋ om aret nye poru manta nye puryo tintenot kule kikotutune met kusop. Kikäs cekto nkit neto om konyekwa. Yoto kumwoci Yesu cekto ŋalek ce nöme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
44001004	Nteye kipontokey Yesu oko cekto kunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Monte kot aŋete Yerusalem, ntene oken okoy kuco neto nyo kikurto Papamwani, nyo kyolim omwowok ani.
44001005	Omnye kipatisane Yowana piko peko, ntene om pesyos ce ŋeri mosicepatisanenak akwek Muyet Nyetilil.’’
44001006	Ntowo kuyomokey kiyokik oko Yesu, kutepe cek neto kule, “Mokoryontet, pesyosyecu so ye meseketyi nyi Israel poytoyisyet?’’
44001007	Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot kunömok akwek oŋnket pesyosyek nto kenyisyek co kikwiyta Papa om kamukeywekyi nkit.
44001008	Ntene mosonyoru akwek swametap Muyet Nyetilil ye kucontyok, yoto ye mosoyiku muncururwanik ce kamwayte ŋalekwani om Yerusalem, oko om Yuteya, oko om Samariya tokol okoy wule kiŋete koret.’’
44001009	Nteyu kowo kuwany kumwoy ŋalecutecu, cesut neto kuwo torot kumite cek kuköse, yoto kulum polyet kupote konyekwa.
44001010	Nteye kimite cekto kunyole torot kuköse ye weti, kuyoŋe lakwar komosmwacek piko alak oyeny ce kilac sirok ce lelac.
44001011	Kumwoy picoto kule, “Pikap Kalilaya, omne soyoŋe akwek yu oŋnkonyoli wulin po torot? Yesu nyitenyi kocesutenok akwek kuwo torot, kunye mosukuweckey kuyu nyitenyi oköse akwek cesute kuweti torot.’’
44001012	Yoto kuwecekey konomik tulwet nye cekure tulwetap Seituninek nye kimite ye puntoy kilomitet akenke keceke Yerusalem.
44001013	Nteyu kowo kupun cek Yerusalem, kupa koto orit oŋnkulaŋnta kupa koto nye kimite koto parak nye kipurune cekto. Coto ku Petero oko Yowana, oko Yakopo oko Antereya, oko Filipo oko Tomas, oko Paturumayo, oko Matayo, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo, oko Simon nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi, oko Yuta, weritap Yakopo.
44001014	Kipure picutecu tokol wanak om moyet akenke sukusome om pesyosyek tokol. Kipontokey cekto wanak oko koruk, kumite mpo Mariyam kametitap Yesu oko mpo yeyanyitap Yesu.
44001015	Om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, kopur kokwet nyepo piko tokol co kikoyen, kipuntoy piko tokol pokol ok timtem. Yoto kuŋet Petero kuyo oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule,
44001016	“Mpo yeya, roke ciyitita kupoyit manta ŋalekap silutekap Yiyintet ce nöme Yuta nyo kintocini piko ce kinöme Yesu.
44001017	Yuta kunye ki cito akenke nyepo lukenyacek nye kikicekwey kwiyis yisyoni nyacek.’’
44001018	(Om pesanik co kinyor om yisyet nyepo miyotyet kuco kikwale neto mparet wule kinyorta menyi, wule kiputyi kuŋas kuyatakay moyet kukwa okutanik saŋ.
44001019	Kulim oŋnkunket topon piko ce minye Yerusalem, kunyo kikur cekto mparanato kutoci kaynemwa kule, Akeltama, nye poru kule, “Mparetap koroti.’’)
44001020	“Omnye kicesil om kitaputap tumwonikap kakastayet kule, ‘Roke kopur konyi kwek kiratya, Puryo kot kumisyini kuminy ci orit.’ Kicesil yec kule, ‘Roke kusut citake oteptap yisyenyi.’
44001021	“Kunyo misyini kuco citake oŋnkuyomokey oko acek sukuŋet kwek neto nyoto muncururwet nye nket kotutunetap metap Mokoryontet Yesu.
44001022	Roke ku cito nye kicepesetoti tokol om lukenyacek yo kicepesetoti wanak oko Mokoryontet Yesu, kuceke pesyosyek co kimwoytoti Yowana ŋalekap potisonisyenyi okoy pesyet nyo kicesutenec acek Yesu kuwo torot.’’
44001023	Yoto kukwey cekto kaynokap piko oyeny, Yosep nye kicekure Parsapa (nye kicekure yec Yusto) oko Matiya.
44001024	Kusom cekto kumwoy kule, “Ayi Mokoryontet, nyi nye nketi mukuleywekap piko tokol, kunyo Mokoryontet, porwec acek ŋo om picu oyeny nye kekwey nyi,
44001025	sukuŋet kusut kuker yisyet kwek kiyokintet otepto nyo kipokoktoy Yuta nyo kiwecikey otepnyi wule kicone.’’
44001026	Nto om letut kukweyis cekto kuporci kirotyet picoto oyeny. Nto kaynet nye kicekwey kunye kipo Matiya, cituyo neto kuyomokey wanak oko luketap kiyokik co ki taman ok akenke.
44002001	Ntowo kupunto pesyetap Pentekoste, kimite pesyonoto kukerurukyikey yeto akenke piko tokol ce kikoyen.
44002002	Yoto pakenke kuco karumnta nye kicone torot nye kerkey oko yomat nye kiwuse om swamet nyewo koromun oŋnkunyiy koto tokol nye kimite kukepur cekto orit.
44002003	Yoto kukäs cekto ce kerkey oko ŋelyepikap motik ce kaseret oŋnkopure moticoto metitap ci tokol om cekto.
44002004	Yoto kunyor ci tokol Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkucec kuŋalal ŋelyepik alak kuyu wule kimukta kukoci Muyet Nyetilil ci ake tokol om cekto.
44002005	Kimite yoto Yutayek ce kiminye Yerusalem, piko ce kiyweye Yiyintet ce kikikwane koret tokol kumukul.
44002006	Nteye kotolime picoto karumnta nyoto, koruruckey wanak piko ce caŋ oŋnkukite tokol omnye kilim ci tokol kuŋolole piko co kikoyen om ŋelyepikwa.
44002007	Kukite piko oŋnkumuyo oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ku pikap Kalilaya cekto cutecu ŋolole!
44002008	Omne yec sicelim acek tokol ŋalek ce ŋolole cekto om ŋelyepta nyo kiceyitec acek?
44002009	Ciku acek Parasik oko Metisyek oko Elamayek oko pikap Mesopotamia oko cepo Yuteya oko cepo Kapontokiya, oko cepo Pontia, oko cepo Asia,
44002010	oko cepo Prukiya, oko cepo Pampiliya, oko cepo Misiri, oko cepo koretap Lipiya ce lekite moŋetap Kurene, oko toyek ce kwone Rom, wanak oko Yutayek oko lamek co kicäm tinitap Yutayek,
44002011	Kirikik oko Arapuk. Kunyi celime acek cekto kuŋolole ŋelyepik kyacek yisyonutek cewoyec cepo Yiyintet.’’
44002012	Yoto kukite cek tokol oŋnkunŋalal kwicek nkit kutepekey kule, “Ŋolyo ne ŋolyontoni?’’
44002013	Ntene kucur piko alake piko co kikoyen kumwoy kule, “Kopokit picu komek ce mwonec!’’
44002014	Yoto kuyo Petero nye kipontokey kiyokik taman ok akenke, oŋnkunŋalal kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoci luketap piko kule: “Merekyo akwek Yutayek, wanak oko akwek piko tokol ce minye Yerusalem, olimwo pa ani akwek topon koromun ŋalecu amöce kule omwowu.
44002015	Puryo kot kupokit picu kuyu wulo osotitoy akwek; omnye mite yawut sawet somok nyepo kororn.
44002016	Ntene ŋalecutecu kuce kiŋalale workoyontet Yower kumwoy kule,
44002017	‘Mwowu Yiyintet kule, om pesyosyek cepo letut cokwoni mosayiy ani ŋalecu: Mosokoci Muyemwani piko tokol; mosikuŋorsyo werikwok oko tipikwok, mosukukäs oyiperikwok ŋoŋutok, mosukurwotyeci poyikwok kirwotik.
44002018	Yunyoto, om pesyosyecoto mosokoci Muyemwani mpo mutworikwani moronik oko koruk, mosukuŋorsyo cekto.
44002019	Mosoporu tukuk cepo kakitat om wulin po torot, oko pelutok ce cekite om wuli koret ŋony mosukutok korotik oko mata oko yetit nyewo;
44002020	mosukuwälkey asista kutuyit kwek menon, oŋnkusalakay arawet kwek koroti, kutompo kot kapunto pesyet nyewo nye cikite nyepo Mokoryontet.
44002021	Yoto ye mosicisop ci tokol nye kure kaynetap Mokoryontet.’
44002022	“Pikap Israel, alimnte pa ŋalecu! Yesu nyepo Nasaret kunye cito nye kiporwok akwek Yiyintet om yisyonutek ce kikwiy cepo kakitat oŋnkupo swamet oko pelutok ce kikwiy Yiyintet om wule mite neto, oŋnket akwek nkit ŋalecutecu, omnye kikwiyokis om wule omite akwek.
44002023	Yiyintet nkit om cömisyenyi oko wule nketitoy neto nkit, kunye kicämnta keny kule roke anäm akwek Yesu; kunyo kyopar apakäc neto, omnye kyocämnte oŋnkokoyte kuwuyitoci piko co miyotec neto murtowontet.
44002024	Ntene koŋet Yiyintet kututune met kunumune neto mwonintap met, omnye kipuryo kot komukoktos kunäm oŋnkurip met neto kwek mopusyo.
44002025	Omnye kimwoy Tauti ŋalek ce nöme neto kule, ‘Oköse ani Mokoryontet kumite taymwani pesyosyek tokol, omnye mitowune neto yewumwani nyepo tay, sukuŋet mente kot atomtomen ani.
44002026	Kunyo sukuŋet kupaypayit mukuleymwani, oŋnkuŋerec ŋelyepmwani, kunyo ponto pormwani kokenotet nyepo ŋerekwek;
44002027	omnye puryo kot muci nyi yosyi soponmwani kopur kapkompic, oŋnkupuryo kot muci nyi yaste mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil kunun.
44002028	Kweporwo ani arosyek ce peti wule mite soponto, kunyo om tayŋuŋyi mesekono ani nyi ŋerekwek.’
44002029	“Mpo yeya! Omwowok ani akwek topon ŋalek ce nöme kukonyo nyewo Tauti, kule kime cemuy, kunyo mite mwenenyi nyo kicetupci ceköse acek okoy pesyoni.
44002030	Kunyo ki workoyo, oŋnkinkete Tauti kirotyet nye kikurtoci Yiyintet neto. Kiwalkey Yiyintet kumwoy kule mosokoci cito akenke om kesenisyekap Tauti kopure ŋeceret kwek Kinko; kuyu wule kiyunto Tauti.
44002031	Kikäs Tauti kito nye kimöce Yiyintet wokwiy om pesyosyek cepo tay. Yoto Kuŋalale ŋalek ce nöme kotutunetap metap Ŋapanet yo kimwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot cepokokyini neto kapkompic, Nto puryo kot kunun pornyi.’
44002032	“Kiŋet Yiyintet Yesu nyitenyi kotutune met, kunyo ceyiku acek tokol muncururwanik cepo manta ce nöme ŋalecutecu.
44002033	Kicilaŋnta kuwo torot wokopurune yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkunyor om wule mite Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kikikurtoci Papanyi. Kunyo ŋalek cu oköse oŋnkolime akwek kuce kokoteywekyi ce kokonec kuroŋwec acek.
44002034	Omnye kipuryo kot kulaŋnta Tauti kuwo torot; ntene mwowu neto nkit kule, ‘Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryotenyu kule, Purune yu po yewumwani nyepo tay,
44002035	okoy awec ani punikuk kopurune ŋonyutap kerenkokuk.’
44002036	“Kunyo möce kunket pikap kotap Israel tokol ŋalek cepo manta kule. Yesu nyitenyi nyo kyowuyitocini akwek murtowontet kunye kikoci Yiyintet kwek Mokoryontet oŋnku Ŋapanet!’’
44002037	Nteyu kowo kulim piko ŋalecata, kwam cekto mukuleywekwa. Yoto kumwoci cek Petero oko kiyokik alak kule, “Mpo yeya, mokyiy ne?’’
44002038	Kumwoci Petero cekto kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok citake tokol om akwek, oŋnkokany cepatisanak om kaynetap Yesu Kristo, sukuŋet cinumunenok miyotyonikwok; mosonyoru akwek kokotutyet, nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.
44002039	Omnye kikurtowok Yiyintet akwek oko lekokwok oko piko tokol ce mite wule low oko tokol ce kure Yiyintet kukwa wule mite neto.’’
44002040	Kurwokyi Petero kunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Osorukey akwek nkit osopkey om toŋoŋutek ce kwotyini pikap pinitenyi masat!’’
44002041	Cepatisan om yoto piko ce kiyen ce kirice kupunto elifunek somok oŋnkuyomokey oko luketap piko ce kikoyen.
44002042	Yoto kopurcin picoto pesyosyek tokol sukunete kiyokik cekto, oŋnkuyomokey wanak tokol sukupcicintos omikap Mokoryontet oŋnkusome okokoy.
44002043	Kunäm muyotet ci tokol om tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok ce kikwiye kiyokik.
44002044	Kuyomokey wanak piko tokol co kikoyen om cömisyet oŋnkusankan tukuk tokol ce kiponto ci tokol.
44002045	Kwalya tukukwa oko tukuk alak tokol ce kiponto oŋnkuyomo wanak sukupcicintos kuyem kuyu wule kimoktoy ci tokol.
44002046	Kutosyikey cek kuyu yete pesyo kutuytos wanak tokol kuyu luket akenke om kotap Yiyintet oŋnkwomncitos omik wanak om korikwa. Kwomisyi omik om ŋerekwek oko om mukuleywek ce poypoy.
44002047	Kukostoy cekto Yiyintet oŋnkuponto cömisyet nyewo nye kicöme piko tokol. Kutosyini Mokoryontet pesyosyek tokol kuyomo wanak oko cekto piko ce kimite cisope.
44003001	Nto om pesyet ake ye kimite Petero oko Yowana kupeti kuloŋntoy kotap Yiyintet wokusome om sawetap somset ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny.
44003002	Kimite citake nye kikomwal kuceke ye kiceyi, nye kicesutu pesyosyek tokol cokopure kurketap kotap Yiyintet nye kicekure, “Kurket nye karam.’’ Sukuŋet kusome pesanik piko ce peti kowute orit.
44003003	Nteye kotoköse cicoto Petero oko Yowana kupeti kotap Yiyintet, kusom neto cekto kakalyayet.
44003004	Kurotot cekto tukway cicoto topon, oŋnkumwoci Petero cicoto kule, “Käsec acek pa nyi!’’
44003005	Yoto kukäs cicoto cekto kusotyini kule tos musukukono kitake.
44003006	Ntene kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Moponte ani pesya tokol, ntene mosokoniŋ kito nye oponte, om kaynetap Yesu Kristo nyepo Nasaret, komwowuŋ kule, ŋet wesetote!’’
44003007	Yoto kunäm Petero yewutap tay nyepo cicoto oŋnkukalya kuyo. Yoto pakenke lakwar kuculokis kusopco kerenkok oko kutuŋokap cicoto,
44003008	Kuŋet lakwar kuyo oŋnkucec kuwesetot kowut kotap Yiyintet wanak oko cekto kuŋerekoti kuronoti kukostoy Yiyintet ye kimite kuweti.
44003009	Kukäs piko tokol cicoto kuwesetoti oŋnkukostoy Yiyintet.
44003010	Ntowo kukäs piko oŋnkunket kule cicoto ku somintet nyo kwepure kurketap kotap Yiyintet nye cekure, “Kurket nye karam.’’ Yoto kumuyo tokol oŋnkukite kito nye keyakay om wule mite cicoto.
44003011	Nteye kitokunomoti cicoto Petero oko Yowana, kukite piko tokol oŋnkurway kupa wule mite cekto om tekewut nye cekure, “Tekewutap Solomon.’’
44003012	Ntowo kukäs Petero piko, kuŋololyi kumwoci kule, “Pikap Israel, omne sokite akwek koromun ŋalecu, nto omne sorototec acek kuyunyi. Osoti akwek kule om swamet nto om toponiyenyacek nkit kunye kekoci cici kuwesetot?
44003013	Yiyintetap mpo kukonyo nye kwelaŋnta kukoci woyinto mutworintenyi Yesu, neto nyo kyoŋomntoy kunäm piko ce ponto kamukeywek, yo kyotoye taytap Pilato, nka mpo om letut yo kimöce Pilato kule atyakte kuwecikey.
44003014	Ki cito neto nye tilil nyepo manta, ntene otay akwek neto. Yoto osom Pilato kwiwok ce toponec kutyokwok rumintet,
44003015	Akany akwek cepar kume neto nyo konu soponto, nyo kiciŋet kotutune met. Ciku acek muncururwanik ce kicekäs ŋalecu.
44003016	Om swametap kaynenyi kunye kekoci swamet oŋnkusop cici kimwole nye oŋnketi akwek topon. Ŋalecu oköse kuce kakyiy om koyenet oko cömisyetap kaynenyi. Om koyenet nyewo nye ceponte acek om Yesu kunye kesop cici kuyu wule oköstoy akwek kumite yu po taymwoŋ kuyunyi.
44003017	“Kunyo yawut, mpo yeya oŋnketi ani kule kyayiy akwek coto oko pikwok cewoyec nye kipuryo oŋnketi.
44003018	Kikurto kumwoy Yiyintet keny kupunune kutuwakap workoyik tokol kumwoy kule mosukutaŋany Ŋapanenyi; kunyo kakwiy kuyitita coto kuyu nyitenyi.
44003019	Kunyo arenynkey, oŋnkowekyikey wule mite Yiyintet, sukuŋet kopukto miyotyonikwok,
44003020	sukuŋet Mokoryontet komuc kukonok pesyosyek ce omuŋe kupoypoyitu mukuleywekwok, oŋnkuyokwok kukonok Ŋapanet, Nyoto ku Yesu nyo kicekwewok akwek kuceke keny.
44003021	Kunyo misyini kopur neto torot okoy pesyet nye cewece tukuk tokol kulelakitu, kuyu wulo kikurto Yiyintet om kenyisyek cepo keny kupunune wule mite Workoyikyi ce tililec.
44003022	Omnye kimwoy Moses kule, ‘Mosukukonok kuyokwok akwek Mokoryontet Yiyintemwoŋ workoyontet nye mosukucone kwenumwakwek nkit, kuyu wulo kikweyo ani. Misyini olimnci kiy ake tokol nye komwowok.
44003023	Ci tokol nye puryo kot kulime ŋalek ce mwowu workoyontonoto, mosicekwey cito nyoto kucone wule mite pikap Yiyintet oŋnkyaranta.’
44003024	Mpo workoyik, kuyu Samuel oko cerupe neto kikurto tokol ŋalecu po pesyosyecutecu.
44003025	Kunyo oyiku akwek kontiyikap workoyik, oŋnkopoye kirotyet nyo kikwiy Yiyintet oko po Papamwoŋ kuyu wulo kimwoci Apram kule, ‘Kupunune wule mite kesenisyekuk, mosokoci ani kupeyok pikap koret tokol kumukul.’
44003026	Kunyo kunyosyo Yiyintet kukwey oŋnkuyokwok kuco wule omite akwek mutworintenyi cokukonok kupeyok oŋnkuwecak akwek tokol apakakte kopurwek ce miyotec.’’
44004001	Nteye kitokumite kuŋololyini Petero oko Yowana piko, kukwa tisik oko cito nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet oko Satusayek.
44004002	Kinyer cekto kunerekis omnye kinete kiyokik coto oyenku kumwoci kule kitutune met Yesu, nye poru kule mosukotutune met piko ce kipok.
44004003	Yoto kunäm cek oŋnkukerta mopusi okoy tun kororn, omnye kikikwimen koret.
44004004	Ntene kuyen piko ce caŋ ce kilim lokoywek okoy kapunto coŋintap moronik ce kirice elifunek mut.
44004005	Ntowo kuyec koret, korurukyikey Yerusalem poytoyikap Yutayek oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek;
44004006	oko Anas tisintet nyewo oko Kayafa oko Yowana oko Alekisanta, oko piko alak cepo aretap tisintet nyewo.
44004007	Kukwer cekto Kiyokik kukwa kuyoŋe taymwa om kokwet oŋnkutepe kule, “Swametap ŋo, nto kamukeywekap kaynetap ŋo nye oyiye akwek ŋalecu?’’
44004008	Yoto kunyor Petero swametap Muyet Nyetilil, kuŋalal kumwoci cekto kule, “Akwek kantoyikap piko oko poyik:
44004009	Ye otepenec acek pesyoni ŋalek ce nöme ŋalek ce toponec ce kukyici cito nyo kwemwole oko wule kusopto,
44004010	kuroke oŋnket akwek oko pikap Israel tokol; kule cici keyoŋe yu po taymwakwek kunye kucisop neto kunyol topon om swametap kaynetap Yesu Kristo nyepo Nasaret nyo kyowuyitoy akwek, ntene kuŋet Yiyintet neto kututune met.
44004011	Yesu nyitenyi nyo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Rwantet nyo kyonyile akwek tekik, kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.’
44004012	Cenyortoy kosopotet kupunune wule mite neto nkit pate omnye puryo kot kumite yec cito ake koret tokol kumukul nye kikoci Yiyintet kaynenyi piko, nye muce kot kusopec acek.’’
44004013	Kukite pikap kirwoket yu kowo kukäs cekto nyikanatetap Petero oko Yowana, oŋnkunket kule kipontotikey picutecu Yesu.
44004014	Yoto kupotyi cekto ŋolyontet nye mokumwoy omnye kiköse cito nyo kucisope kumite keyoŋe ye kimite Petero oko Yowana.
44004015	Kumwoci cekto Petero oko Yowana kuŋete kokwet kupa saŋ, oŋnkucec kurwoc kwicek nkit.
44004016	Kutepekey kumwoy kule, “Mokyiye ne acek picu? Omnye kukunket ci tokol nye minye Yerusalem kule, cekto ce kokwiye manta ŋolyontoni po kakitat nye puryo kot cimuce cetinten.
44004017	Ntene ye sicekerekte ŋolyontoni mente kot tokutosyikey kupunto wule mite piko tokol, roke cemwoci cisowu picu kule monte kot toŋalale yec mpo kisic kaynetap Yesu.’’
44004018	Yoto kukur cekto kiyokik kukwa kokwet oŋnkurwokyi kumwoci kule, “Monte kot toŋalale nto anet yec mpo kisic piko om kaynetap Yesu.’’
44004019	Ntene kuwekyi Petero oko Yowana kumwoci kule, “Orwoc akwek nkit nye roke ciywey om taytap Yiyintet, ciywey Yiyintet nto ciyweyak akwek?
44004020	Omnye puryo kot cimuci acek cesisie moceŋalale ŋalek ce kicekäs oŋnkyelim acek nkit.’’
44004021	Kunkolontyi kokwet kukerci cekto koŋ oŋnkutyakta kupecikey omnye kipuryo kot kunyorta lelis nye muce cerate, oko omnye kimite piko tokol om yoto kukostoy Yiyintet om tukuk ce kukwiyokis.
44004022	Kiponto cicoto kicisope om kosopet nyepo kakitat kenyisyek ce kikeytye artam.
44004023	Nteyu kowo cityakta Petero oko Yowana, kunomen kupa lakwar wule kimite lukemwa, oŋnkuwokumwoci ŋalek tokol ce komwoy tisik cewoyec oko poyik.
44004024	Nteye kotolime cut ŋalecato, kusom cekto tokol wanak Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Ayi Mokoryontetap torot oko ŋony, oko ruretok oko tukuk tokol ce mite koret!
44004025	Kiŋalal nyi om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kupunune kutitap kukonyo Tauti mutworinteŋuŋ yo kimwowu kule. ‘Omne sukunerekis lamek, omne sukuyiytakey piko nyepo püc pate?
44004026	Kuyiytakey kutetkey kinkonikap koret, oŋnkuyomokey poytoyik wanak, kutoye cekto Mokoryontet oko Ŋapanenyi.’
44004027	Omnye ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, kiyomokey wanak Erote oko Pontyo Pilato oko lamek oko pikap Israel om moŋoni oŋnkutay cekto Yesu mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil nye kiŋap nyi kwek Kinko.
44004028	Kururuckey cekto wanak kwiy kiy ake tokol nye kicäm nyi kunyo om swameŋuŋ oko cömisyeŋuŋ kule mosukwiyakay.
44004029	Kunyo yawut Mokoryontet, käs pa komuyotet wule kokomuytec acek, konec acek mutworikuk ceŋalale lokoywekuk om nyikanatet tokol.
44004030	Yite yewuŋuŋ oŋnkikonu kwiyokis ŋalek cepo kakitat om kaynetap mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil Yesu.’’
44004031	Nteyu kowo kusom kot kuwany, yoto koriŋriŋ koret om yoto kimite cekto, konyor tokol Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkucec kuŋalal kumwoy lokoywekap Yiyintet om nyikanatet tokol.
44004032	Yoto kuyomokey wanak piko tokol co kikoyen om moyet akenke oko mukuleyto akenke, nye kipuryo ci nye mwowu kule cecu tukuk ce kiponto, ntene kisonkone tukuk tokol ce kiponto cek tokol.
44004033	Kumwaytat kiyokik om swamet ŋalek cepo manta kutor kotutunetap metap Mokoryontet Yesu. Kukoci Yiyintet cekto tokol kupeyok ce caŋ.
44004034	Kipuryo yoto ci mpo akenke nye kimite lukonoto nye kipotyini kiy nye möce. Kwalya piko co kiponto mparosyekwa nto korik oŋnkusut pesanik ce konyor,
44004035	oŋnkwokukoci kiyokik, cepcicin pesanicato kuyem ci tokol kuyu wule kimoktoy.
44004036	Yoto mpo Yosep nye ki Lefintet nye kiceyici Kupro nye kikimulyi kiyokik kukure, “Parnapa’’ nye poru kaynanato kule, “Cito nye kimisyi.’’
44004037	Kwalya neto mparenyi nye kiponto oŋnkusut pesanik cokukoci kupoy kiyokik.
44005001	Ntene kimite citake nye kicekure kaynenyi Ananiya oko korkenyi Safira, yoto kwalya Ananiya mparenyi nye kiponto,
44005002	oŋnkuwuny kukonor pesanik alak kunkete korkenyi, oŋnkusut ce koŋet wule mite kiyokik.
44005003	Kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Ananiya, omne sekoci Setanit kupayta mukuleyŋun kuweciŋ perper Muyet Nyetilil, omnye kwewuny pesanik kererya ce kwenyorte mparet nyo kweyalye?
44005004	Ki cekuk tukuk tokol kutompo yalye, mpo yu koweyalye kutokucekuk pesanik. Kunyo omne secäm nyi om mukuleyŋuŋ kot yiy kiy nye yunyi? Puryo kot perper nyi piko ntene keperper Yiyintet.’’
44005005	Nteye kotolime Ananiya ŋalecato kuputyi ŋony kume. Yoto kumuyo piko tokol ce kilim ŋalecato.
44005006	Yoto kukwa oyiperik oŋnkurate musto sirok oŋnkusut kuwo saŋ wokumuy.
44005007	Nto om letut kukatil sawanik somoku, kuco korkenyi nye kipuryo kot kunkete kiy ake tokol nye kakwiyakay.
44005008	Kutepe Petero neto kule, “Mwowo ani pa, pesanik tokol so cutecu ce kyonyoru akwek oko santeŋuŋ om mparet nyo kyoyalye?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Manta tokol cutecu.’’
44005009	Yoto kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Omne sacäm akwek oko santeŋuŋ kule cesyem celotu Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Mokoryontet? Käs pa piko ce kowokomuye santenüŋ, mosukusutiŋ mpenyi iwo aranato!’’
44005010	Om yoto pakenke koputyi yepo kerenkokyi kume. Kukwa oyiperik koto orit kwokunyor kame, kanäm oŋnkusut neto kuwo saŋ wokumuy kurupkey oko santenyi.
44005011	Yoto kunäm muyotet nyewo koromun pikap Yiyintet oko piko alak tokol ce kilim ŋalecutecu.
44005012	Kwiy Kiyokik tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok om wule mite piko, kuyomokey wanak piko tokol co kikoyen kwek luket akenke sukutuytos tekewutap Solomon.
44005013	Kipuryo ci mpo akenke nye kipuryo kot kupo lukonoto nye kisyem kule nto owut wule kimite piko co kikoyen, ntene kuŋolole piko alake cut ŋalek ce toponec kucömntoy cekto koromun.
44005014	Yoto kutosyikey piko ce caŋ moronik oko koruk kucäm Mokoryontet oŋnkuyomokey oko luketap piko co kikoyen Yiyintet,
44005015	okoy cesutu mpo piko ce mnyontos cesutune kwiririnek oko tempok oŋnkwocimukontyi arastunwekap moŋet kule sukuŋet nteye kopunte Petero ye lekite cekto kuyen atotoynyi picoto alak ce kimnyontos.
44005016	Kukwa mpo piko ce caŋ ce kiminye moŋosyek ce lekitec ce kimut Yerusalem, kusut cekto piko ce kimnyontos oko ce kiponto oyik ce miyotec, cisop tokol kusopco.
44005017	Yoto kuŋet Tisintet nyewo oko pikyi ce kikolyoy neto, coto ku luketap kereryantetap Satusayek. Kunerekis cekto koromun kukocorok om wule mite kiyokik, oŋnkucömncin kule mocenäm citaŋany kiyokik.
44005018	Yoto kunäm cek kiyokik oŋnkukerta mopusitap piko tokol.
44005019	Ntene om kwomowunoto kwen, kuyat Malayketap Mokoryontet kurketap mopusit, oŋnkukwer kiyokik kukwa saŋ oŋnkumwoci kule,
44005020	“Ape woyoŋe kotap Yiyintet orit, oŋnkomwoci piko ŋalek tokol cepo soponitenyi lel.’’
44005021	Yoto kucäm kiyokik. Ntowo kuyec kororn kupa kotap Yiyintet oŋnkucec kunetis. Yoto kukur tisintet nyewo pikyi co kolyoy neto oko kokwet nyepo poyikap Yutayek tokol cepo Israel, oŋnkuyokto cepa wocekwerune kiyokik mopusi kukwa kokwet wule kimite cekto.
44005022	Nteyu kowo kupunto piko cewoyec co kiciyoktoy, munowokunyor yoto kiyokik kumite mopusi, kuweckey cek oŋnkwokumwoci kokwet kule,
44005023	“Kowocepunte acek mopusit kumite kukerat topon oŋnkumite sikarek kuripsi topon om kurket, ntene yu kowo ceyat kurkotik puryo kot cenyorte ci orit.’’
44005024	Nteye kotolime cito nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet oko tisik ŋalecato kukite kumwoy kule, kukwam ne kiyokik.
44005025	Yoto kuco citake oŋnkucokumwoci kule, “Mite piko co kwokertoy akwek mopusi keyoŋe kotap Yiyintet orit kunete piko!’’
44005026	Yoto kunomen cito nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet oko sikarek wokukwer cekto, ntene ye kipuryo kot kukwerune swama omnye kiywey kule mente kuwirenec piko rwontok.
44005027	Kukwer cek kiyokik kukwa oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe taytap kokwet. Kucec tisintet nyewo kutepe kule,
44005028	“Kucisowok cinkolonwok akwek kule, monte tocinetisye mpo kisic om kaynetap cici, kunyo akäs pa ŋalek ce kwayiy! Kwonetisye kunäm Yerusalem tokol, omöce akwek kule cesutwec acek miyotyetap korotikap cici!’’
44005029	Kuwekyi Petero oko kiyokik kumwoy kule, “Misyini celimnci acek Yiyintet kusir ye mocelimnci piko.
44005030	Yiyintetap mpo kukonyacek nye kiŋet Yesu kotutune met om letut yu kowo okwertoci akwek murtowontet apakäc.
44005031	Kunyo kikolaŋnta Yiyintet neto kuwo wokopure yewutap tay kwek kantoyintet nyewo oŋnkukosopintet, sukuŋet kukoci pikap Israel poroyinto kurenynkey om miyotyonikwa.
44005032	Ciku acek muncururwanik ce cinketi ŋalecutecu, acek oko Muyet Nyetilil nye kokotutyetap Yiyintet nye kocini piko co limncini neto ŋalek.’’
44005033	Nteye kotolime pikap kirwoket ŋalecato kunyer koromun okoy kurwoc kutilta kule cepakäc kiyokik.
44005034	Ntene kuyo cito akenke om kirwoket, nyoto ku Farasoyintet nye kicekure kaynenyi Kamaliel, nye kikonetintetap ntarastinek, nye kiyweye piko tokol. Yoto kumwayta cekwer kiyokik kupa saŋ kuminiŋ,
44005035	oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Merekyo pikap Israel, oripkey om kito nye omöce akwek kule ceyiye picu,
44005036	Omnye om kenyisyek ce ŋeri co kutil, kitok cito nye kicekure Seuta oŋnkusutkey kule oyiku ci nyewo koromun, yoto kulukyi luketap piko ce rice pokolwokik amwan, ntene cepakäc neto kume, kuseret piko tokol ce kirupoti, yoto kupok lukenyi.
44005037	Om letut yec, kutok Yuta nyepo koretap Kalilaya om pesyosyek co kiciyite piko tokol, yoto kururuc mpene piko ce caŋ kulukyi neto, ntene cepakäc kume oŋnkyiseret piko tokol co kirupoti.
44005038	Kunyo om ŋolyontoni mite yawut yu, komwowok ani kule monte ceyiye picu kitake, oyaste kwiyat cek nkit, omnye ye ŋalecu oko yisyoni mwacek kunye kiy nye kweye piko, mosukupot om letut;
44005039	ntene ye cone wule mite Yiyintet kupuryo kot omuci akwek kot opël cekto mpo kisic, omnye monte oporukey akwek kule omite oporye Yiyintet.’’
44005040	Cekur Kiyokik kukwa kokwet orit, oŋnkyepas oŋnkyemwoci cinkolontyi kule monte toceŋalale onet piko om kaynetap Yesu, oŋnkyasta kupecikey.
44005041	Kuŋete konomik kokwet kupunto ŋerekwek ce caŋ omnye kakonket kule misyini kutaŋany toŋoŋutek om kaynetap Yesu.
44005042	Kunetisye cekto pesyosyek tokol kotap Yiyintet oko korikap piko kumwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yesu nye Ŋapanet.
44006001	Om letut kuminiŋ ye kimite kutosyinikey kucoŋitu konomik, yoto kucec kaŋunyŋunyet om kwenutap Yutayek co ŋolole ŋelyeptap Kirikik oko Yutayek pikap koret. Kumwoy Yutayek co ŋolole ŋelyeptap Kirikik kule kyostoy musukik cikwa monyor omik co cepciwu pesyosyek tokol.
44006002	Yoto kukur kiyokik co kitaman ok oyeny luketap konomik tokol kukwa kuyomokey wanak oŋnkumwoci kule, “Puryo kot kumisyini kyaste acek mocemwayte ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkyerip cepciyte pesanik pate.
44006003	Kunyo mpo yeya, akwey akwek om kwenumwoŋ piko tisap ce oŋnket akwek kule ponto swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko ŋomnonet, siceŋet acek cikoci kwiy yisyoni.
44006004	Sukuŋet cenyoru acek poroyinto nye cesome oŋnkyiy yiyset nye cemwoytoy lokoywek.’’
44006005	Yoto kuŋerekyi luket tokol kasoteywek ce kimwoy kiyokik; cekwey Stefano cito nye kiponto koyenet nyewo oko Muyet Nyetilil, oko Filipo oko Nikolas, oko Nikanor, oko Timon, oko Pamena, oko Nikolas nyepo koretap Antiyok cito nye kikiweckey kwek Yutoyintet.
44006006	Kukwer luket picoto kukwa taytap kiyokik. Yoto kusomnci kiyokik cek oŋnkukemer yewuniyekwa metewokap picoto.
44006007	Yoto kutosyikey ŋolyontetap Yiyintet kutisto om koret oŋnkutosyikey koromun coŋintap konomik om Yerusalem oŋnkucäm tisik ce caŋ koyenet.
44006008	Yoto Stefano cito nye kiponto poypoyet oko swamet oko kamukeywek, kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok ce caŋ om wule mite piko.
44006009	Ntene yoto kutintentyi piko alake ŋalekap Stefano, coto ku piko cepo luketap kokwet nye cekure kotapkokwetap piko ce kikyasta (wule kicekurtoy cekto) ce kipontokey Yutayek cekwone Kurene oko Alekisantaria. Cek coto oko Yutayek alak ce kikwone Silisiya oko Asia, kucec picoto kutintentyin oko Stefano.
44006010	Ntene kukoci Muyet Nyetilil Stefano ŋomnonet nye kiŋalal nye kipuryo kot komuc cek neto.
44006011	Yoto kwal picoto piko alak ce kiŋalal kumwoy kule, “Kucelim acek neto kuŋolole kumwowu ŋalek ce miyotec om wule mite Moses oko Yiyintet.’’
44006012	Kuŋetŋet cekto kowurur piko oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek, kukwa oŋnkunäm Stefano oŋnkukwer taytap kokwet,
44006013	oŋnkukwer piko alak kukwa kwokumwoy ŋalek cepo mwiynanet pate kule, “Ŋolole cici pesyosyek tokol nye memunye ŋalek ce miyotec konyacek nye tilil nyepo Yiyintet oko ntarastinekap Moses.
44006014	Omnye kucelim kumwowu kule, mosukoturpup cicitenyi cekure Yesu nyepo Nasaret kululyi ŋony kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkuwec kopurto nyo kikonec acek Moses.’’
44006015	Yoto kurotot piko tokol ce kimite kokwet kukäs Stefano, nto pere cekäs kawälkey tokoynyi kukerkeyit tokoytap malayket.
44007001	Kutepe Tisintet nyewo Stefano kule, “Po so ŋalecutecu manta?’’
44007002	Kuwec Stefano kumwoy kule, “Mpo yeya, oko mpo Papa, olimwo ani pa akwek! Kiporcikey Yiyintet nye ponto woyinto kukonyo Apram ye kimite kuminye koretap Mesopotamia, kutompo kot kuwu wokuminy koretap Aran,
44007003	kimwoci kule, ‘Ŋet pakakte komwoŋ oko koreŋuŋ oŋnkiwuyi iwo koret nye mosoporuŋ ani nyi.’
44007004	Yoto kuwuye Apram koretap Kalitayek oŋnkuwo wokuminy Aran. Nto om letut yu kowo kume kwan, kuntoci Yiyintet Apram kukwer kucone wuloto okoy kupun koronitenyi omite akwek yawut.
44007005	Ntene kipuryo kot kukoci Yiyintet Apram kereryantetap maswetap koroni nka mpo kisic pate kwek nyenyi, ntene kukurtoci pate kumwoci kule mosokoniŋ kwek nyeŋuŋ oko kesenisyekuk, nka kot kipuryo kot kuponto Apram lekwa om pesyosyecoto.
44007006	Kimwoci Yiyintet neto kule, ‘Mosukupa kesenisyekuk wokumiŋis koretap piko alak wule mosokwek cekto mutwor oŋnkyitaŋany koromun om wuloto kuwany kenyisyek pokolwokik amwan.’
44007007	Kumwoy Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosomutyi musankut ataŋany picoto mosukutaŋany cekto, nto om letut okweru kukwane koronoto kukwa kwokusaya ani om koronitenyi.’
44007008	Yoto kukoci Yiyintet Apram sakwetap wonset kwek pelutyetap kirotyet. Kuwon Apram werinyi Isaka kuponto pesyosyek sisit kuceke koceyi. Kuwon Isaka werinyi Yakopo nto om letut kurupkey kuyunyoto kuwon Yakopo mpo kukonyo co kitaman ok oyeny.
44007009	“Kucorokyi mpo kukonyo Yosep oŋnkwalya neto kuwo Misiri wokwek mutworin, ntene kurip Yiyintet neto om wuloto,
44007010	oŋnkukalya kupunte toŋoŋutek tokol ce kinyor. Nteye kimite Yosep kaytap Farawo Kinko nyepo Misiri, kukoci Yiyintet neto kopurto nye topon oko ŋomnonet okoy kukwey Farawo neto kwek poytoyintet nye poytoy pikap koronoto wanak oko pikap kaytap Kinko nyepo Misiri.
44007011	Yoto kuco rupet nye kisut toŋoŋutek ce caŋ om koretap Misiri tokol oko koretap Kanan tokol, okoy kupotyi mpo kukonyo omik ce mokwam.
44007012	Ntene kulim Yakopo kule mite omik Misiri, sukuŋet yoto mpo kukonyo kupa wuloto om panta nye kipo tay.
44007013	Nto om Panta nyepo oyeny kuporcikey Yosep mpo yeyanyi okoy letut kunket Farawo pikap Yosep.
44007014	Yoto kuyokto Yosep ŋalek kupa wule mite kwan Yakopo kumwoci kule kuwu neto wanak oko pikap kanyi tokol kupa Misiri. Kipuntoy coŋintap picoto tokol tomonwokik tisap ok mut.
44007015	Yoto kuwu Yakopo kuwo Misiri wule kiwo kumeci neto oko mpo kukonyo tokol.
44007016	Cesut muswek cikwa okoy kupun Sekem wule kikwocemuci mwenet nyo kyole Apram pesanik kwale werikap Amor.
44007017	“Ntowo kupunto pesyet kuyitita Yiyintet kirotyet nyo kikurtoci Apram, yoto kutosyikey kupit kucaŋit pikyo om Misiri.
44007018	Om letut kupoytoyis Kinko ake nye kipuryo kot konket nyoto Yosep.
44007019	Kuŋet Kinko nyoto kumutyi ŋomnon kuŋom pikyacek kutaŋany mpo kukonyo kukerci koŋ kunumune lekokwa ce timinkec kumwoci kule kiwirci saŋ sukuŋet kupok.
44007020	Om pesyosyecoto kuye kiceyiye Moses, kwek lekwa nye topon koromun nye kiŋerece Yiyintet. Ntene cepaye kaytap kwan kuwany orok somok,
44007021	nto cinumu cewirta. Yoto kunyor ceptap Farawo, kunäm nyo kwek werinyi.
44007022	Cinet neto ŋomnonet tokol nyepo pikap Misiri, yoto kutok neto kwek ci nyewo koromun om ŋalek ce kiŋolole oko yisyonutek ce kikwiye.
44007023	“Nteye kiponto Moses kenyisyek artam, kusot kule mawo orutoci mpo yeyanyi pikap Israel.
44007024	Wokunyor cito akenke nyepo Misiri nye kimite kupire kutoŋonye cito nyepo Israel, kuwo yoto wokuyetyeci citap Israel nyo kicitoŋonye. Kupir Moses citap Misiri kupakäc kume.
44007025	Kisote Moses kule toskoy mokusow pikyi pikap Israel kule mite Yiyintet kuweti kule wosoru cekto kupunte wule mite Moses. Ntene kipuryo kot kusow cut.
44007026	Ntowo kuyekune om pesyet nyepo oyeny, kunyor yec Moses pikap Israel oyeny ce kiportos kwicek nkit. Yoto kusyem kule aket kumwoci kule, ‘Merekyo, alim pa, nteyu otupce akwek! Omne soporye akwek nkit?’
44007027	Ntene kuwunukto cito nyo kitoŋonye nyin Moses kuwo tapan oŋnkutepe kule, ‘Ŋo nye kokoniŋ nyi kule paytec nto ketec acek?
44007028	Möce kule apakäc ani kuyu wulo kwepoköci citap Misiri?’
44007029	Ntowo kulim Moses ŋalecato, kumwey kuwete Misiri wokuminy koretap Mitian wule kiwo kuyici werikyi oyeny.
44007030	“Yoto ntowo kupok kenyisyek artamu, kucontyi malayket neto oŋnkuporcikey om rukututwet nye kiloye om koretap kitela ye lekite tulwetap Sinai.
44007031	Kukite Moses kito nye kikäs oŋnkuwo kunokyi wule wakäs topon rukututwet nyi loye, yoto kulim kursetap Mokoryontet,
