44007032	nye kimwoy kule, ‘Ani nyo Yiyintetap mpo kukoŋuŋ, Yiyintetap Apram, Yiyintetap Isaka, Yiyintetap Yakopo.’ Yoto kumuy Moses kupotan nye kipuryo kot tokomuc kukäs.
44007033	Kumwoci Mokoryontet neto kule, ‘Numune kweyonik kerenkokuk omnye tilil koret yo koyeŋe nyi!
44007034	Kwakäs manta toŋoŋutek ce ponto pikwani om Misiri, kwalim rirekwa, kunyo kaco oreku cesoru osop cekto, amöce kule oyoktiŋ nyi iwo Misiri.’
44007035	“Moses nyitenyi neto nyoto kitoye pikap Israel yo kimwowu kule, ‘Ŋo nye kokoniŋ nyi kule paytec nto ketec acek?’ Moses kunyo kiyoku Yiyintet cokwek poytoyintet nyewo oŋnkwek kosopintet om kakalyayetap malayket nyo kiporcinikey neto om rukututwet nye loye.
44007036	Kukwerune Moses pikap Israel kukwane Misiri oŋnkwiy pelutok cepo kakitat om Misiri oko ruretyet nye arra oko om koretap kitela kuwany kenyisyek artam.
44007037	Moses kunyo kimwoci pikap Israel kule, ‘Mosukuyokwok akwek Yiyintet workoyontet ake kuyu wulo kiyokwo ani, mosukucone neto nyoto wule omite akwek pikap Israel nkit.’
44007038	Moses kunyo kipontokey mpo kukonyo luketap pikap Israel yo kirurucekey om kitela, yo kiŋololyini Malayket neto om tulwetap Sinai ye kicikocini lokoywek cepo soponto nyepo okokoy sukuŋet kukonec acek.
44007039	“Ntene kutay mpo kukonyo kulimnci Moses, kuwunukto kuwo tapan oŋnkusot kule keroke ceketitekey cipe let koretap Misiri.
44007040	Yoto kuyoŋ oŋnkumwoci Aron kule, ‘Toŋwec acek oyinotik alak ce sekuŋet kuntowec, omnye puryo kot cinket kito nye kukwam Moses nyo kikwerunenec acek koretap Misiri.’
44007041	Yoto kuye kitonye cekto kerkeyinto nye kerkey moyita, oŋnkupel kwici korosek kiyoto, oŋnkwiy sakwet nyewo kwici kiyoto kitonye cek om yewuniyekwa nkit.
44007042	Yoto kutay Yiyintet cek oŋnkwasta kusay kokelikap parak, kuyu wulo kicesilyo om kitaput workoyik kule: ‘Pikap Israel! Puryo kot ku ani nyo kyotilyini tyoŋik oko korosek kuwany kenyisyek artam om kitela.
44007043	Ki wemetap Yiyintet Moloc nyoto nyo kyotoroti akwek, oko kerkeyintap kokelyantetap Yiyintemwoŋ Repan; coto ku kerkeyik ce kyotany akwek om yewuniyekwok oŋnkosay, kunyo mosakwetak ani ape okoy akeyitye Papulon.’
44007044	“Kiponto mpo kukonyo wemet om kitela nye poru kule mite Yiyintet, wemanato kunye kicitany kopur kuyu wule kimwoci Yiyintet Moses kuyiyta, oŋnkukiciyoyec kuyu wule kikiciporci neto wule tento.
44007045	Nto om letut kukoci mpo kwan mpo kukonyacek kutorat wemanato yo kipontotikey cekto Yoswa, oŋnkusut okoy kupun koretap pikap lamek alak co kikwete Yiyintet. Kopur wemanato wuloto okoy pesyosyekap Tauti.
44007046	Yoto kucäm Yiyintet Tauti koromun okoy kucömnci kutec koto nye minye Yiyintetap Yakopo.
44007047	Ntene Solomon nye kitekyi Yiyintet koto.
44007048	Kunyo puryo kot kuminye Yiyintet nyewo nye mite torot koromun korik ce tece piko; kuyu wulo mwoytoy workoyontet kule.
44007049	‘Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, torot kunye ŋecerenyu nyepo mokoryontit, nto koret ŋony ku wule yoŋe kerenkokyu. Kunyo koto nye yu ne nye otekwo ani akwek? Ono otepto nye momuŋe ani?
44007050	Puryo kot ku yewumwani ne nye kitonye tukucu tokol?’
44007051	“Oyiku akwek pic ce kyorat kotwo! Oyiku pic ce puryo kot kuwonotin mukuleywekwok, oŋnkumiŋotin yitikwok nye molime ŋalek cepo manta! Okerkeyekey mpo kukomwoŋ! Okerektoy mpo akwek okokoy Muyet Nyetilil!
44007052	Mite pa nyun workoyonto mpo akenke nye kipuryo kot kutaŋany mpo kukomwoŋ? Kipar cek kupakäc piko ce kisutu lokoywekap Yiyintet ce kicemwoy keny kule coni mutworintet nyepo manta. Kunyo yawut kyoŋomnte akwek neto nyoto apakäc kume.
44007053	Oyik akwek piko ce kikonok malayket ntarastinekap Yiyintet, oŋnkurok otay akwek mocäm orip ntarastinecoto.’’
44007054	Ntowo kulim piko tokol om kokwet ŋalek ce komwoy Stefano, kunyiy cek kelak kunyerci neto koromun.
44007055	Ntene kunyor Stefano Muyet Nyetilil, yoto kunyal torot okoy kukäs woyintap Yiyintet oko Yesu kumite kukeyoŋe yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
44007056	Komwoy kule, “Akäs pa! Kakäs ani kayatakay wulin po torot, kunyo oköse Weritap cito nye kuyoŋe yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.’’
44007057	Yoto kupol piko tokol om kutit akenke nyewo oŋnkuker yitikwa, oŋnkurotyi Stefano,
44007058	kocutune moŋet kuwo saŋ oŋnkuwire rwontok. Kupokokyi piko muncururwanik ce kimite yeto sirokwa oyiperyontet ake nye cekure Saulo.
44007059	Nteye kimite cekto kuwire neto rwontok, kusom Stefano kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet Yesu Näm mukuleymwani.’’
44007060	Yoto kukutuny oŋnkukurto om kutit nyewo kule, “Mokoryontet mente oyityi cekto miyotyoni!’’ Kumwoy kuyunyoto oŋnkuru ŋony kume.
44008001	Kucämnta mpeneto Saulo wule kameta Stefano. Kuceke pesyonoto kucec kutaŋany toŋoŋutek ce caŋ koromun luket nyepo pikap Yiyintet om Yerusalem. Kumwey piko tokol co kikoyen kuseretyi koret tokol nyepo Yuteya oko Samariya okoy kuŋet pate kiyokik.
44008002	Kumuyis piko ce kikoyen kumuy Stefano ce kirire neto lokik ce caŋ koromun.
44008003	Ntene yoto kusyem Saulo koromun kule awurte kupotyo pikap Yiyintet, kuwo kowut korik tokol oŋnkocutune orit piko co kikoyen moronik oko koruk oŋnkukerta tokol mopusi.
44008004	Yoto kupa piko tokol co kikoyen kuseretyi koret tokol kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec.
44008005	Kunomen Filipo kurekto okoy kupunto moŋetap Samariya oŋnkuwokumwoci pikap wuloto lokoywek ce toponec cepo Ŋapanet.
44008006	Kulim topon piko ce caŋ ŋalek ce kimwowu Filipo, kilum cekto ŋalekyi oŋnkukäs tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto wuloto.
44008007	Kuŋetyo kupete oyik ce miyotec piko ce caŋ oŋnkupa kupolot polotet nyewo. Cisop mpo piko ce caŋ, piko ce kipok kuwusyo kerenkok oko ce kikikomwolis.
44008008	Yoto kuŋerec koromun piko tokol cepo moŋetap Samariya.
44008009	Kimite moŋonoto citake nye cekure Simon, nye kikwiye sokeyek ce cikite om pesyosyek alak okoy kukite pikap Samariya tokol koromun. Kisutekey kule oyiku ci nyewo nye tokunot koromun.
44008010	Kiyweye piko tokol neto kuceke lekwa okoy piko cewoyec, kumwowu cekto kule, “Cici kunye swametap Yiyintet nye cekure. ‘Swamet nyewo.’ ’’
44008011	Kiyweye piko neto omnye kikikwiy sokeyek ce cikite kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ.
44008012	Ntene yu kuwo kuyen piko lokoywek ce toponec cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko kaynetap Yesu Kristo ce kimwowu Filipo, yoto cepatisan piko moronik oko koruk.
44008013	Kuyen mpene Simon, nto om letut yu kowo cepatisan Simon kopurcin neto oko Filipo. Kokite koromun yu kowo kukäs pelutok cewoyec oko tukuk cepo kakitat ce kiciye.
44008014	Yoto kulim kiyokik ce kimite Yerusalem kule kulim oŋnkucäm pikap Samariya ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Kuyokto cekto Petero oko Yowana kupa wule mite picoto.
44008015	Ntowo kupunto Petero oko Yowana wuloto, kusomnci cek piko co kikoyen kule sukuŋet kunyor Muyet Nyetilil.
44008016	Omnye kitompo kot kucontyi Muyet Nyetilil mpo akenke om picoto. Ntene kikicepatisan cekto tokol pate om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.
44008017	Yoto kukemer Petero oko Yowana yewuniyekwa metewokap picoto, kunyor tokol Muyet Nyetilil.
44008018	Ntowo kukäs Simon kule kanyor picoto Muyet Nyetilil omnye kekemer kiyokik yewuniyekwa metewokap picoto, yoto kunam pesanik oŋnkukoci Petero oko Yowana,
44008019	kumwoci kule, “Okono mpo ani swamani sukuŋet kunyor Muyet Nyetilil piko tokol ce kakemer ani yewuniyekyu.’’
44008020	Ntene kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Wot pot oko pesanikuk, omnye soti nyi kule omuci ayale pesanik kokotutyetap Yiyintet!
44008021	Puryo kot kunyeŋuŋ yisyoni, omnye puryo kot kurotat mukuleyŋuŋ om konyekap Yiyintet.
44008022	Kunyo renynkey oŋnkicone areŋuŋ nyi miyat, oŋnkisom Mokoryontet sukuŋet kukalyiŋ nyi kasoteywekuk cu yucu.
44008023	Omnye kakäs ani kule ponte nyi corokyinotet nyewo koromun, oŋnkiyiku mopusyontetap miyotyet.’’
44008024	Kimwoci Simon nyonkey Petero oko Yowana kule, “Osomok ani akwek kule osomwo Mokoryontet sukuŋet mente kot kukwontyo tukucu komwowu akwek kule muce kukwontyo ani.’’
44008025	Nto om letut yu kowo kumwayta cekto lokoywekap Mokoryontet, kunomen Petero oko Yowana kuweckey kupa Yerusalem. Nteye kimite kupeti om aran kumwaytat lokoywek ce toponec om soŋwek ce caŋ cepo Samariyek.
44008026	Kuŋololyi malayketap Mokoryontet kumwoci Filipo kule, “Ŋet yiytekey, oŋnkinomen tokyikey tö okoy punte aret kacatanet nyo rekte Yerusalem okoy kupunto Kasa.’’ (Aretap surukwenet nyoto.)
44008027	Yoto kunomen Filipo kuwo, okoy wokunyor citake nyepo Esiopiya. Cicoto kunye cito nyewo nye kikonorintetap Kantake nto korko nye Kinko nyepo Esiopiya. Kimite cicoto yoto kucone Yerusalem wule kikiwo toyek wokusay Yiyintet.
44008028	Kunyo kimite poninekyi kuketitoykey Esiopiya kuwete karinyi oŋnkusumonoti kitaput nye kisile workoyontet Isaya.
44008029	Kumwoci Muyet Nyetilil Filipo kule, “Lapat ric apetekey karina.’’
44008030	Yoto kulapat Filipo okoy ye kimite karinata, kulim neto cicoto kusumone om kutit nyewo ŋalekap workoyontet Isaya. Yoto kutepe Filipo cicoto kule, “Nketi nyi ŋalecutecu sumoni?’’
44008031	Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci kule, “Omuci ani oŋnket kulene ye puryo ci nye keporwo?’’ Kumwoci cicoto Filipo kulany karit parak oŋnkupetakey tukway.
44008032	Ŋalekap silutekap Yiyintet ce kisumone cicoto kucu kule: “Kicekwer neto wocetil kuyu keciryet, Kikerkey neto lekwap kecir nye mute cito kororik ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kutwowu, Kunyo puryo kot kuŋany kutinyi.
44008033	Kicewec neto kuminiŋit oŋnkyeyete ŋalek cepo musankut nyepo manta. Puryo ci nye muce kuror kumwoy pikap arenyi, Omnye kicesut soponnyi kuwete koret.’’
44008034	Kumwoci cicoto Filipo kule, “Mwowo ani nyi pa, ŋolole workoyontet ci ŋo om ŋalecu? Kiŋololekey neto nkit; nto kiŋolole citake?’’
44008035	Yoto kucec Filipo kumwoci cicoto lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yesu kuceke ŋalecutecu kicesil om kitaputap silutekap Yiyintet.
44008036	Nteye kimite cekto tukway kupeti om aran kukwa okoy kupun ye kimite peko. Kumwoy cicoto kule, “Käs okyu peko, kiy ne nye kerektoy mocepatisana ani?’’
44008037	Kumwoci Filipo cicoto kule. “Cimuce cepatisaniŋ nyi ye keyen om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol.’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Koyen acäm ani kule Yesu Kristo kunye Weritap Yiyintet.’’
44008038	Kuyoŋnto cicoto karit, oŋnkupa tukway oko Filipo kolumntakey peko orit, yoto kupatisan Filipo cicoto.
44008039	Nteyu kowo koluŋune peko, kukwer Muyetap Mokoryontet Filipo kuwecikey arenyi. Kipuryo kot tokukäs cicoto Filipo yec om yoto. Ntene kutosyikey cicoto kuwo poninekyi kuŋerekoti ŋerekwek ce caŋ.
44008040	Wokukose Filipo pate mite wule cekure Asyotot. Yoto kuwo Filipo kupunte moŋosyek tokol kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec okoy kapunto Kaysariya.
44009001	Ntene om pesyosyecoto, kutosyikey Saulo kutaŋany konomikap Mokoryontet. Yoto kuwo wule mite Tisintet nyewo,
44009002	oŋnkusom parwet nye muce wokuporci kantoyikap korikapkok cepo Tamasko, sukuŋet ye kopunto wuloto oŋnkunyor ci tokol nye rupe ŋalekap Mokoryontet komuc neto kunäm oŋnkurat tokol moronik oko koruk oŋnkukwer cek kupa Yerusalem.
44009003	Nteye kimite Saulo panta kuweti Tamasko kukarikta moŋet, kucone lakweyet parak lakwar nye kikweny komut neto.
44009004	Yoto kuputyi ŋony, oŋnkulim kutit nye kikure neto kule, “Saulo, Saulo! Omne setaŋany ani nyi?’’
44009005	Kumwoy Saulo kule, “Mokoryontet, nyi ŋo?’’ Kumwoy kutit nye kokursyi kule, “Ani nyo Yesu nyo mite nyi toŋonyi.
44009006	Ntene ŋete ŋony oŋnkinomen iwo okoy moŋet wule mosicemwowuneniŋ nyi kito nye roke yiy.’’
44009007	Ntene kikikuyoŋ yoto piko ce kipetoykey neto nye puryo kot kuŋolole, omnye kilim cekto kutit nye kikursyi ntene amakäs ci.
44009008	Kuŋete Saulo ŋony oŋnkuŋany konyekyi, ntopere akaste komokuköstoy. Yoto cenäm neto yewut oŋnkyiretot okoy kupunto Tamasko.
44009009	Kuwany Saulo pesyosyek somok nye puryo kot kuköstoy oŋnkupuryo kot kwomisyi omit nto mpo kuyesyo.
44009010	Kimite Tamasko konomintet ake nye cekure Ananiya, yoto kuŋonkyi kuporci Mokoryontet neto kumwoci kule, “Ananiya!’’ Kuwec Ananiya kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, amite ani yu.’’
44009011	Kumwoci Mokoryontet neto kule, “Ŋet oŋnkinomen iwo okoy aretap moŋet nyo rotat okoy punte kotap Yuta oŋnkitepu citake nyepo Taruso nye cekure Saulo nye mite kusome.
44009012	Kunyo koceŋoŋnkyi neto kukäs cito nye cekure Ananiya kuconi kumiŋu ko oŋnkukemer yewuniyekyi sukuŋet kukästa yec konyekyi.’’
44009013	Ntene kuwec Ananiya kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, kumwowo ani piko ce caŋ ŋalek ce miyotec ce nöme cicitenyi ce kikwici pikuk om Yerusalem.
44009014	Kunyo kuco Tamasko kuponto kamukeywek cepo Tisintet nyewo sukuŋet kunäm piko tokol ce rupe kusoye kayneŋuŋ.’’
44009015	Kumwoci Mokoryontet Ananiya kule, “Iwo nyi, omnye kwakwey ani neto sukuŋet kwiwo, yisyet kuparta ani om wule mite Lamek oko kinkonikwa oko pikap Israel.
44009016	Omnye ani nkit nye mosoporci neto ŋalek tokol ce mosukutaŋany om kaynemwani.’’
44009017	Yoto kuwo Ananiya okoy koyoto oŋnkukemer yewuniyekyi metitap Saulo oŋnkumwoy kule, “Yeya Saulo, keyokwani Mokoryontet Yesu nkit, nyo kweporunkey nyi nkit om aran yo kwemite coni wuli, kule sukuŋet käste nyi yec oŋnkinyoru Muyet Nyetilil.’’
44009018	Om yoto pakenke kusuwune konyekap Saulo tukun ce yu taper, oŋnkuŋoŋokis konyekyi kukästa yec. Kuŋet kuyo oŋnkyepatisan,
44009019	oŋnkwomis omik oŋnkunyor swamet. Kopur Saulo kuwany pesyos tukusic kupontokey wanak oko konomik om Tamasko.
44009020	Yoto pakenke kuwo Saulo kowut korikapkok oŋnkumwayta ŋalekap Yesu kutor kumwoy kule, “Yesu kunye Weritap Yiyintet.’’
44009021	Kokite piko tokol ce kilim ŋalekyi, oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ku cicitenyi nyo syeme kule apakäc omis piko co cöme kaynani om Yerusalem? Kunyo kuco wuli kule canäm, picoto oŋnkokwer kupa wule mite tisintet nyewo?’’
44009022	Ntene kutosyikey Saulo kukimit oŋnkutintentyin oko Yutayek ce kiminye Tamasko okoy kupël, kumwoci neto cekto om swamet kule, Yesu kunye Ŋapanet nyepo manta.
44009023	Nteyu kowo kutil pesyosyek ce caŋ, koruruckey Yutayek kwiy rurumut kule cepakäc Saulo.
44009024	Ntene kusow Saulo konket kito nye kimöce cek kule ceyiy. Kuripso cekto kurkotikap moŋet komoy oko pet kule cepakäc neto.
44009025	Ntene kunäm konomikyi Saulo om kwomowut ake oŋnkukerta cikaput nyewo oŋnkukoyito kupunte pastit nyepo totetap moŋet kuwo saŋ.
44009026	Ntowo kuwo Saulo okoy Yerusalem, yoto kusyem kule oyomekey wanak oko luketap konomik om woloto, ntene kuywey cut tokol neto, omnye kipuryo kot kuyen kule kikwek Saulo konomintet.
44009027	Yoto kukalya Parnapa kukwer neto wule mite kiyokik, oŋnkurorci kuporci cekto wule kikästa Saulo Mokoryontet om aran, oko kule kikiŋololyi Mokoryontet neto. Kumwoci Parnapa cek yec ŋalek ce kimwayta Saulo om nyikanatet om kaynetap Yesu ye kimite Tamasko.
44009028	Kopur Saulo wanak oko cekto oŋnkuwesetote Yerusalem tokol kumwoytoti om swamet kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu,
44009029	oŋnkutintentyin oko Yutayek co ŋolole ŋelyeptap Kirikik. Kusyem co kule cepakäc neto.
44009030	Ntowo kulim mpo yeya piko co kikoyen ŋalecato, kukwer cek Saulo kurekto okoy kupunto Kaysariya oŋnkuyomis kuwecikey Taruso.
44009031	Yoto kunyor kalyet pikap Yiyintet ce kimite koretap Yuteya tokol oko Samariya. Kutekakay kuner oŋnkutosyikey kucaŋit piko om kakalyayetap Muyet Nyetilil, oŋnkunäm cekto kopurto nye yweye Mokoryontet.
44009032	Kuwesetote Petero koret wulyo tokol om wuloto. Nto mite pesyet ake kuwo kurutoci pikap Yiyintet ce kiminye Lita.
44009033	Wokunyor om wuloto citake nye cekure Ayineya, nye kikiru kwiriri kuwany kenyisyek sisit, omnye kipok kerenkok.
44009034	Yoto kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Ayineya, sopiŋ nyi Yesu Kristo ŋet yony oŋnkisat kwiririŋuŋ.’’ Yoto kuŋete Ayineya ŋony lakwar.
44009035	Kukäs piko tokol ce kiminye Lita oko Syaron cicoto kicisop, yoto kuwekyikey cekto kucäm Mokoryontet.
44009036	Kimite Yopa korket ake nye konomintet nye kicekure Tapisa (kaynenyi om ŋelyeptap Kirikik ku Torkas, nye poru kule, Cepkecey). Kikwiyisyi korokonoto yisyonutek ce toponec kukolyoy pononik okokoy.
44009037	Kumnyan pesyosyecoto okoy kume. Ciwun pornyi oŋnkyikoci kopur koto nye mite koto parak.
44009038	Kipuryo kot ku low kuceke Yopa okoy kupunto Lita. Nteye kotolime konomik ce kimite Yopa kule mite Petero Lita, kuyokto cekto piko oyeny kupa wokumwoci Petero kule, “Co sorukey lakwar okoy punu wuli cemite acek.’’
44009039	Yoto kuŋet Petero oŋnkunomen wanak oko picoto kiciyoku. Ntowo kupunto, cekwer neto kuwo koto nye kimite koto parak. Korurukyikey wuloto musukik tokol komut Petero kukirtos sukuporcini cekto neto sirok ce kinope Torkas ye kisope.
44009040	Yoto kukwet Petero piko tokol kukwane koyoto, oŋnkukutuny kusom, oŋnkuwekyikey musto kumwoci kule, “Tapisa, ŋet yony.’’ Kuŋany Tapisa konyekyi, nteye kotoköse neto Petero kuŋet kopur ŋony.
44009041	Yoto kukalya Petero neto kunäm kuŋet kuyo, oŋnkukur piko co kikoyen oko musukik oŋnkuporci neto cek Torkas nye kosop.
44009042	Celime ŋalecato koretap Yopa tokol kumukul, yoto kuyen piko ce caŋ Mokoryontet.
44009043	Kopur Petero Yopa kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ kopurune kaytap Simon nye kikute syerok.
44010001	Kimite citake Kaysariya nye cekure Korneliyo nye kinyewo nyepo sikarekap luket nye cekure, “Luketap Romek.’’
44010002	Ki cito neto nyepo tini koromun nye kisoye Yiyintet wanak oko pikap kanyi. Kikwiye neto tukuk ce caŋ ce toponec kukolyoy Yutayek ce pononik, oŋnkisome Yiyintet okokoy.
44010003	Nto mite pesyet ake ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny, kukäs Korneliyo ŋoŋutyet nye kimuc kot kukäs topon malayketap Mokoryontet nye kico oŋnkumwoci neto kule, “Korneliyo!’’
44010004	Yoto kurotot neto malayket topon om muyotet oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, kiy ne nyito?’’ Kuwekyi malayket kumwoci neto kule, “Kucäm Yiyintet somseŋuŋ oko yisyonutekuk co kolyoy pononik, kunyo kakusotiŋ nyi.
44010005	Yokte yawut piko alak kupa okoy Yopa wokukur citake nye cekure kaynenyi Simon Petero.
44010006	Mite neto tontonet om kotap cito nyo kute syerok nye cekure Simon nye minye ruretyet tapan.’’
44010007	Nteyu kowo kuwecikey malayket nye kiŋololyini neto, yoto kukur Korneliyo mutworikyi oyeny oko sikorintet akenke nye yweye Yiyintet nye ki akenke nye yicini neto yisyet.
44010008	Kumwoci neto cekto ŋalek tokol ce keyokis, oŋnkuyokto kupa Yopa.
44010009	Nteye kipesyetap oyeny ye kimite cekto tokupeti poninekwa nye kikirikta Yopa. Kuwo Petero kolaŋnta koto nye kimite koto parak wokusom ye kimite sawet pen kwen.
44010010	Yoto kwam Petero rupet okoy kumac kule ntoyomisye; nteye kimite tokyiye omik, kukäs neto ŋoŋutyet.
44010011	Kukäs kuyatakay wulin po torot, kureku kitake nye coni koret nye kerkey oko sira nyewo koromun nye cenömonu kototok tokol amwan.
44010012	Kimite kiyoto orit tyoŋik wok tokol, co pete kerenkok oko co cutekey ŋony, oko toritek.
44010013	Kumwoci Yiyintet Petero kule, “Petero, ŋet näm pakäc tyoŋicu oŋnkiyeny yam!’’
44010014	Ntene kumwoy Petero kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot kuyunyo! Omnye tompo kot ayam ani kenyis kiy nye puryo kot kutilil nto nye miyat.’’
44010015	Kukursyo Yiyintet yec nyepo oyeny kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kuroke kure nyi tukuk ce kikotilil Yiyintet kule puryo kot kutilec nto miyotec.’’
44010016	Kwiyakay kuyunyoto aret somok, oŋnkyesut kiyoto lakwar kuwo torot.
44010017	Nteye kimite Petero kusote nkit om moyenyi kule poru ne ŋoŋutyoni kakäs neto. Kimite yoto piko co keyoku Korneliyo kukeyoŋ om kurketap kayta om letut yu kowo kutep kot kunket kaytap Simon.
44010018	Kukursyo cekto yoto kutep kule, “Mite tontet ake nye cekure Simon Petero kayi?’’
44010019	Nteye kimite Petero tokusote kusyeme kule oŋnket poru ne ŋoŋutyet, kumwoci Muyet Nyetilil neto kule, “Lim pa! Mite piko alake somoku ce ceŋotiŋ nyi.
44010020	Kunyo ŋet yiytekey rekte ŋony, ntene mente kot atay mewetekey picoto omnye koyoku ani cekto.’’
44010021	Kurekto neto kuwo ŋony oŋnkumwoci picoto kule, “Ani cito nyo acenye akwek, kunyo kwokwotyini ne akwek?’’
44010022	Kuwec picoto kumwoci neto kule, “Keyokwec acek Korneliyo nyewo nyepo sikarek, nye ci nye topon nye soye Yiyintet oŋnkuyweye Yutayek tokol. Kumwoci malayketap Yiyintet neto kule kukuriŋ nyi iwo kanyi sukuŋet kulim ŋalek ce memwowu nyi.’’
44010023	Kukur Petero picoto kupa ko orit kwek toyekyi oŋnkuruy tokol. Ntowo kuyekune, kuŋet Petero oŋnkunomen oko picoto oko mpo yeya alak cepo Yopa kupatakey tokol.
44010024	Nto om pesyet nye kirupe kupunto Kaysariya wule kimite Korneliyo kukonye neto. Kimite Korneliyo yoto kokoruruc tilyonutekyi oko latosyekyi ce kikikur kukwa.
44010025	Ntowo kurikta Petero kupunto kayta, kuco Korneliyo kutorok oŋnkoputyi kerenkokyi oŋnkukutuny.
44010026	Ntene kunäm Petero neto oŋnkuŋet kuyo kumwoci kule, “Ŋet yony; omnye oyiku mpo ani ci pate.’’
44010027	Kuŋololyinot Petero Korneliyo ye kimite kuweti koto orit wule kimite kukorurukyikey piko ce caŋ.
44010028	Yoto Kumwoci Petero picoto kule, “Oŋnket, akwek nkit topon kule puryo kot kucömncini Yutoyintet ntarastinyi kurutoci nto mpo kuyomokey oko lomin. Ntene kukuporwo ani Yiyintet kule puryo kot kumisyo ani asut ci ake tokol kule puryo kot kutilil nto kule miyat.
44010029	Kunyi yu kweyoku nyi piko kule misyini aco ani, mpo ani aco nye puryo kot atay. Kunyo otepeniŋ kule, kiy ne nye kwekurco ani nyi?’’
44010030	Yoto kumwoy Korneliyo kule, “Kimite sawet kutenyitenyi om pesyosyek somok co kutil, ye kyomite ani osome om konyu ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny. Om yoto lakwar kuco citake nye kelac sirok ce lekecectos, oŋnkuyoŋe yepo taymwani,
44010031	oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Korneliyo! Kolim Yiyintet somseŋuŋ, oŋnkukusot mpo kokotutekap yisyonutekuk cepo kokolyoyisyet.
44010032	Kunyo yokte citake kuwo Yopa wokukur citake nye cekure Simon Petero. Mite neto tontonet om kotap citake nye kute syerok nye minye ruretyet tapan.’
44010033	Sukuŋet yoto oyoku ani kule ico nyi lakwar, kunyo keyiy topon keco. Kunyi ce mite acek tokol yu om taytap Yiyintet cekonye kule celim ŋolyo ake tokol nye komwowuŋ nyi Mokoryontet kule mwowu.’’
44010034	Kucec Petero kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Konket ani kupoyit manta kule, puryo kot kukweye Yiyintet piko,
44010035	ntene cöme ci tokol nye yweye neto oŋnkwiye ŋalek cepo manta ce cöme, nka kot kupo cito yemet oŋnkono.
44010036	Oŋnket akwek ŋolyontet nye kiyokoci Yiyintet pikap Israel kumwoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo kalyet om Yesu Kristo nye Mokoryontetap koret tokol.
44010037	Oŋnket akwek ŋolyontet nyewo nye kikwiyakay om koretap Yuteya tokol, kule kiceke koretap Kalilaya om letutap potisonisyet nyo kimwoytoy Yowana.
44010038	Oŋnket akwek ŋalek cepo Yesu nyepo Nasaret, nye kiŋape Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil oko swamet kwek Kinko. Nye kiwesetote koret tokol kwicini piko tukuk ce toponec, oŋnkusop piko tokol ce kitaŋany kupayta setani nyewo nyepo oyik, omnye kipontokey neto Yiyintet.
44010039	Ceyiku acek muncururwanik ce cinket tukuk tokol ce kikwiye neto om koretap Yutayek oko Yerusalem. Ntene kupakäc Yutayek neto kukwertoci murtowontet.
44010040	Ntene kuŋet Yiyintet kotutune met om pesyetap somok oŋnkukoci kuporkey,
44010041	nye kipuryo kot kuporkey kukäs piko tokol, ntene acek pate muncururwanik ce kikwey Yiyintet ce kicekäs. Kikyomisye oŋnkyeyesye acek wanak oko neto om letut yu kowo koŋet Yiyintet kotutune met.
44010042	Kunyo kinkolonwec acek kule womwoci piko lokoywek ce toponec oŋnkoporci ŋalek cepo manta kule neto kunye kikwey Yiyintet kwek ketintet nye mutyini musankut piko ce soptos oko ce kipok.
44010043	Neto nyo kiŋalale workoyik tokol ŋalek ce nöme neto kumwoy kule, ci tokol nye keyen neto kunye mocikalya nyoto miyotyonikyi om swametap kaynenyi.’’
44010044	Nteye kimite Petero tokuŋolole, kuco Muyet Nyetilil kurekyi piko tokol co kimite kulimntoy lokoywek.
44010045	Kukite Yutayek co kikoyen ce kukwontoykey Petero om Yopa kukäs kule kekoci Yiyintet kuco kurekyi kokotutyetap Muyet Nyetilil mpo lamek.
44010046	Omnye kilim cekto piko cut kuŋolole ŋelyepik cepciyotin, kukostoy woyintap Yiyintet. Yoto kuŋalal Petero kumwoy kule,
44010047	“Ŋo nye muce kuyet mocepatisane picu peko, omnye kanyor Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kicenyoru acek?’’
44010048	Kumwayta Petero cepatisan cekto om kaynetap Yesu Kristo. Kusom cekto Petero kopur wanak oko cekto kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri
44011001	Yoto kulim kiyokik oko piko co kikoyen ce kimite Yuteya tokol kule kucäm lamek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
44011002	Ntowo kulaŋnta Petero kowo okoy Yerusalem, kuwokutye luketap piko co wonotin neto.
44011003	Kumwoci cek neto kule, “Omne siwo nyi oŋnkiweyomekey oko piko ce puryo kot ce won oŋnkiyomisye wanak oko cekto?’’
44011004	Yoto kumwoci Petero kirorci cek ŋalek tokol ce kukwiyokis kuceke wule kicekta okoy kupok. Kumwoy kule,
44011005	“Kyomite ani osome om moŋetap Yopa, yoto akäs ŋoŋutyet akäs kitake nye kireku kuconi ŋony nye kerkey sira nyewo nye kicereku kucone torot om kototokyi. Kurek kiyoto okoy kupun ye kyomite.
44011006	Arotote ani topon orit oŋnkasot, okoy akäs tyoŋik cepo kerenkok amwan, oko tyoŋikap samiyita oko tyoŋik co cutekey ŋony, oko toritek.
44011007	Yoto alim ani Yiyintet kukuro kumwowo kule, ‘Petero, ŋet näm pakäc tyoŋicu oŋnkiyeny yam!’
44011008	Ntene omwowu ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet, puryo kot kuyunyo! Omnye tompo kot kowut kutimwani mpo kisic kiy nye puryo kot kutilil nto nye miyat.’
44011009	Yoto kuŋololwo Yiyintet aret nyepo oyeny kumwoy kule, ‘Mente kot akur kiy nye kikotilil Yiyintet kule puryo kot kutilil.’
44011010	Kwiyokis ŋalecato kuyunyoto aret somok. Nto om letut cesut kiyoto kuketitakey kuwo torot.
44011011	Yoto pakenke kupun piko alake somoku ce kiciyoku kukwane Kaysariya okoy koto nye kyomite ani.
44011012	Kumwowo Muyet Nyetilil kule wetekey picoto mente kot atay. Owetekey ani tokol oko mpo yeya cutecu lö okoy cepunte kotap Korneliyo om Kaysariya.
44011013	Yoto kumwowec acek Korneliyo kule kiporcikey malayket neto nye kico oŋnkuyoŋe konyi oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Yokte piko kupa Yopa wokukur citake nye cekure kaynenyi Simon Petero.
44011014	Nye mosukucokumwowuŋ nyi ŋalek ce mosukusoruŋ kusopiŋ oko pikap kaŋuŋ!’
44011015	Ntowo acec ani omwoci cekto ŋalek, yoto kukoci Yiyintet cek Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kikonec acek om kunyo.
44011016	Yoto asot ŋalek co kimwowu Mokoryontet kule, ‘Kipatisane Yowana peko, ntene mosicepatisanenak akwek Muyet Nyetilil.’
44011017	Porukey kupoyit manta kule kikoci Yiyintet cek lamek coto kokotutyet nye kerkey nyo kikonec acek yo kiciyeni Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Kunyo ani ku ŋo nye kyomuci kot akerkte Yiyintet!’’
44011018	Ntowo kulim cekto ŋalecato kusisio nye komokuwokutye Petero, oŋnkukasta Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kunyo kukukoci nyun Yiyintet mpecek Lamek poroyinto kurenynkey oŋnkusopco!’’
44011019	Kuseret piko co kikoyen om toŋoŋutek ce kikwiyokis yo kicepoköce Stefano kume. Yoto kupa alake om cekto okoy kupunto Foyinisiya oko Kupro oko Antiyok kumwocinoti Yutayek nkit pate lokoywek cepo Mokoryontet Yesu.
44011020	Nto om picoto ku piko alake co kikoyen ce kipo koretap Kupro oko Kurene. Kunomen picoto okoy kupunto Antiyok, oŋnkumwoci lamek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Mokoryontet Yesu.
44011021	Kiponto picoto swametap Mokoryontet, yoto kuyen piko ce caŋ kuwekyikey wule mite Mokoryontet.
44011022	Kupunto lokoywek cutecu wule mite pikap Yiyintet ce kimite Yerusalem, yoto kuyokto cek Parnapa kuwo Antiyok.
44011023	Ntowo kupunto, kukäs neto wule kikocinto Yiyintet kupeyok piko. Kuŋerec koromun oŋnkutosyi kumwoci cek ŋalek tokol kule kuyen oŋnkurup ŋalek kupoyit manta om mukuleywekwa tokol om wule mite Mokoryontet.
44011024	Ki cito nye topon koromun Parnapa nye kiponto swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko koyenet. Yoto cewec piko ce caŋ kuyen Mokoryontet.
44011025	Yoto kunomen Parnapa kuwo Taruso kuceŋat Saulo.
44011026	Ntowo kunyor kukwer okoy kupun Antiyok, Kuwany kenyit akenke kupontokey cek tukway wanak oko pikap Yiyintet. Kunet cekto luketap piko ce caŋ. Om Antiyok ku wule kikenyosye kunyo cecec cekure konomik kule, “Kristayek.’’
44011027	Kurekto om pesyosyecoto workoyik alake om Yerusalem kupa Antiyok.
44011028	Kuŋet akenke om cekto nye cekure Akapo, oŋnkuŋalal kuŋorsyo om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kumwoy kule mosukuco rupet nyewo nye mosukunäm koret tokol. Kuyuyit nyoto kuco rupet nyoto ye Kinko Nyewo Klautiyo.
44011029	Yoto kucäm konomik kule mokukoyto ci tokol om cekto kuyu wule muktoy kukalya mpo yeyamwa ce minye Yuteya.
44011030	Kwiy cekto kuyunyoto, yoto kukoyito pesanik cesutyi poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet ce kimite Yerusalem. Cikoci Parnapa oko Saulo kusut pesanik.
44012001	Kucec om pesyosyecoto Kinko Erote kutaŋany pikap Yiyintet alak.
44012002	Yoto kunäm Yakopo mutakwametitap Yowana oŋnkumwayta cepare rotwetap cok kume.
44012003	Ntowo kukäs kule koŋerekyi Yutayek ŋalecato, kitosyikey kunäm mpo Petero. Kikwiyokis ŋalecato om pesyosyekap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat.
44012004	Ntowo cenäm Petero cerotyi mopusi, oŋnkyikoci kurip sikarek co ripsi ce kipetote amwan. Kimöce yoto Erote kule sokweru Petero kuco kokwetap Yutayek ye kapok sakwetap keytayet.
44012005	Yoto ceripune Petero mopusi. Ntene kusomncini pikap Yiyintet neto koromun.
44012006	Nto om kwomowut nye kimöce Erote kule sokweru Petero ye koyekune kuco wule mite piko. Kimite yoto Petero kukoru kwenutap sikarek oyeny ce ripsi mopusi, Kicerate neto nyororonik oyeny, oŋnkumite sikarek ce ripsi kurketap mopusit.
44012007	Yoto kuco lakwar malayketap Mokoryontet, kukweny lakweyet mopusit orit. Kulucluc malayket Petero leyet kuŋet kukos, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋet lakwar.’’ Yoto pakenke kutyokokis nyororonik kusuyito om yewuniyekyi.
44012008	Kumwoci malayket neto kule, “Ratkey, oŋnkilac kweyonikuk.’’ Kwiy neto kuyunyoto, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yisinekey sireŋuŋ oŋnkirupani.’’
44012009	Kurup Petero neto okoy kupunto saŋ nye kipuryo kot kunkete om yoto kule po manta ŋalek ce kikwiye malayket, kisote kule toskoy oköse ŋoŋutyet.
44012010	Kupunte cekto kurkotik ce ripe sikarek, nyepo tay, oko nyepo oyeny, sicepa moŋet orit, yoto kuyatakay kurket nkit, kupa cek saŋ, kupa tukway kurup aret, nto om yoto pakenke kupakakta malayket Petero.
44012011	Yoto kusow Petero kunket kito nye kakwiyakay om wule mite neto, kumwoy kule, “Konket ani yawut kupoyit manta! Kule kokuyok Mokoryontet malaykenyi, kunyo kosoruneno ani kamukeywekap Erote oko tukuk tokol ce kumöce Yutayek kule ce yiy.’’
44012012	Nteyu kowo kusow Petero topon, kunomen kuwo okoy kotap Mariyam kametitap Yowana Marko wule kimite piko ce caŋ ce kokorurukyikey wuloto ce kimite kusome Yiyintet kusomncini Petero.
44012013	Kukonynkony Petero kurket nyepo saŋ yoto kuco cepto nye mutworin nye cekure Rota co kukäs.
44012014	Kunket cepoto kutitap Petero, kuŋerec koromun kulapat kuketitakey kuwo nye puryo kot kuyat kurket, wokumwayta kule, mite Petero kuyoŋe kurkat saŋ. Kumwoci piko neto kule,
44012015	“Kopunuŋ met!’’ Ntene kutinten koromun kumwoy kule, “Mite manta!’’ Kuwec cut kumwoy kule, “Malaykenyi nyo.’’
44012016	Kutosyikey Petero kukonykony kurket. Nto om letut kuyat cekto kurket. Nteye kotoköse cekto Petero kukite koromun.
44012017	Kuŋololyi Petero cek kuwuse yewuniyekyi kusisio, oŋnkumwoci kurorci wule ketyakta Mokoryontet neto kukwerune mopusi. Oŋnkumwoci Petero cek kule, “Womwoci ŋatecutecu Yakopo oko mpo yeya alak.’’ Oŋnkunomen kuwecikey wulyo ake.
44012018	Ntowo kuyec koret, yoto kupotpotenis koromun sikarek ce kiripsi kumwoy kule kukwam ne Petero?
44012019	Yoto kumwayta Erote kule ceceny Petero, ntene kipuryo kot komuc cekto kot kunyor. Yoto kukir Erote sikarek ce kiripsi koromun, oŋnkumwayta cepar kupok. Nto om letutap ŋalecato, kunomen Erote kuwete Yuteya kuwo Kaysariya wokopurune wuloto.
44012020	Kikiwokut koromun Erote oko pikap Tiro oko cepo Siton. Yoto koruruckey picoto kwek luket akenke oŋnkupa wule mite neto. Kunyosyo cekto kiny kunyo kunäm kwek corwemwa Plasto cito nyewo nye kiripe kaytap Kinko, oŋnkupa wule mite Erote wokusom kalyet, omnye kipoyekey koremwa omik ce kikwone koretap Kinko.
44012021	Nteye kipesyet nye kweyat, kulac Erote sirokyi cepo poytoyisyet oŋnkopure ŋeceretap kokwet oŋnkuŋololyi piko.
44012022	Yoto kupol piko kumwoy kule, “Kutitap Yiyintet nyito, ntene puryo kot kupo ci!’’
44012023	Om yoto pakenke kupir malayketap Mokoryontet Erote kumnyan, omnye mneywey Yiyintet. Kwam neto mokik okoy kume.
44012024	Kutosyikey ŋolyontetap Yiyintet kuseret kupunte koret tokol.
44012025	Ntowo kuwany Parnapa oko Saulo yisyonutekwa cepo ŋalek ce kikwontyi om Yerusalem, kuweckey cekto oŋnkupetakey Yowana Marko.
44013001	Om pikap Yiyintet ce kimite Antiyok, kuce kimite workoyik oko konetik coto ku mpo Parnapa oko Simiyon (nye cekure matuy) Lukio nyepo Kurene, oko Manaen nye kicepoye oko kinko Erote oko Saulo.
44013002	Nteye kimite cekto kwicini Mokoryontet yisyet oŋnkukire omik, kumwoci Muyet Nyetili cekto kule, “Okwewo Parnapa oko Saulo sukuŋet kwiy yisyet nye kyokweci ani.’’
44013003	Kukir cekto omik oŋnkusomnci kukemer yewuniyekwa metewokap Parnapa oko Saulo oŋnkuyokto kupa.
44013004	Nteyu kowo kuyokto muyet Nyetilil Saulo oko Parnapa, kunomen cekto okoy kapunto Seleukiya, kulany om yoto rapet oŋnkupa okoy kapunto Kupro.
44013005	Ntowo kupunto cek Salami, kumwayta ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om korikapkok cepo Yutayek. Kipontotikey yoto Yowana Marko nye kikolyoy cekto yisyet.
44013006	Kupa kupunte koret nyoto kikwen peko okoy kupunto Papo wule kipa kunyorta cepsokeyontet nye weritap Yoswa, yutoyintet nye kisutekey kule iyiku workoyo.
44013007	Kipontokey cicoto oko Serkio Paulo nye ki cito nye ŋom nye ki poytoyintetap koronoto kikwen peko. Kukur poytoyintonoto Parnapa oko Saulo kukwa wule mite neto, omnye kimöce kule alim ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
44013008	Yoto kuŋet Elima cepsokeyontet, (nye kaynenyi nyitenyi wule cekurtoy om ŋelyeptap Kirikik.) Kusyeme kule amas poytoyintet mente kot kuyen.
44013009	Yoto kunyor Saulo nye cekure Paulo swametap Muyet Nyetilil, kurotot koromun cepsokeyontonoto,
44013010	oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nyi, weritap Setani nyewo nyepo oyik! Yiku nyi puniyontetap ŋalek tokol ce toponec, ponto nyi koperperisyet oko ŋolset tokol, kunyo syeme pesyosyek tokol kule amas kwek mwiynan ŋalek cepo Mokoryontet!
44013011	Kunyo mosukupiriŋ yewutap Mokoryontet, mesokor nye meköse asis kuwany pesyos.’’ Yoto pakenke kukerokis kunäm cemereresyet nye tuy konyekap Elima, kutaptapat yoto wulo tokol kule nto sonyoru ci nye kanäm yewut oŋnkuretoto.
44013012	Kuyen kucömis poytoyintet yu kowo kukäs ŋalek ce kokwiyokis. Kukite neto koromun konetisyet nyepo ŋalekap Mokoryontet.
44013013	Kunomen Paulo oko piko ce kipontokey kulany rapet om Papo oŋnkupa okoy kupunto Peruka om koretap Pampiliya. Yoto kupokokyi Yowana Marko cekto wuloto oŋnkuweckey kuwo Yerusalem.
44013014	Kunomene cekto Peruka kupa okoy kupunto Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya. Nteye kipesyetap Sapat kupa cekto wokowut kotapkok oŋnkopur ŋony.
44013015	Nto om letut yu kowo ciwany cesuman ntarastinekap Moses oko silutekap workoyik, kumwoci kantoyik cepo kotapkok cek kule, “Mpo yeya, ye oponte akwek lokoywek ce muce kukalya kotitir piko, cesomok acek akwek kule aŋalal.’’
44013016	Kuŋet Paulo kuyo oŋnkuwuse cekto yewuniyekyi, oŋnkucec kuŋalal kumwoy kule: “Merekyo pikap Israel, oko akwek lamek co soye Yiyintet olimwo ani pa.
44013017	Yiyintetap picutecu po Israel kunye kikwey mpo kukonyacek oŋnkukoci kwek pic cewoyec om kenyisyek ce ye kimite kuminye koretap Misiri ku toyek. Kukwerune Yiyintet cekto swamenyi nyewo kukwane Misiri.
44013018	Kumuytoci Yiyintet kopurto nye kiponto cekto kuwany kenyisyek artam ye kiminye koretap kitela.
44013019	Yoto kukoci Yiyintet cek kwaranta lamek cepo yemosyek tisap ce kiminye koretap Kanan, oŋnkukoci pikyi kumiŋis kwek pikap koronoto.
44013020	Kumiŋis kuwany kenyisyek ce rice pokolwokik amwan ok konom. Nto om letut kukoci Yiyintet cek ketik okoy kenyisyek ce kipo workoyontet Samuel.
44013021	Ntowo kusom kule ce möce Kinko, kukoci Yiyintet cekto Saulo weritap Kisyi nye kipo aretap Penyamin kwek Kinko nyimwa. Kupoytoyis nyo kuwany kenyisyek artam.
44013022	Nto om letut yu kowo kunate Yiyintet Saulo, kukoci Tauti kwek Kinko nyimwa. Ŋalek ce kimwoy Yiyintet kutor ce nöme ŋalecutecu kucu kule, ‘Kwakäs ani kule, Tauti weritap Yese kunye cito nye ocöme, nye mosukwiy ŋalek tokol ce ocöme ani kule kwiy.’
44013023	Yesu nye akenke om mucokoronikap Tauti kunye kikoci Yiyintet kwek kosopintetap pikap Israel kuyu wulo kikikurtoci keny.
44013024	Kutompo kot kuco Yesu, kimwoci Yowana pikap Israel tokol kule misyini kwasta cekto miyotyonikwa oŋnkyepatisan.
44013025	Nteyu kowo kurik kuwany Yowana yisyenyi; kumwoci piko kule, ‘Asoti akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo? Puryo kot oyiku cito nyo okeni akwek. Ntene akäs! Mite cicoto kuconi om letumwani, nye puryo koto yiku ani topon nye ayeme kot atyac porokap kweyonikyi.’
44013026	“Mpo yeya, kesenisyekap Apram oko akwek lamek cu mite yu ce soye Yiyintet, acek pikap Israel ce kiciyokoci lokoywek cutecu po kosopotet!
44013027	Omnye kipuryo kot kunket piko ce kiminye Yerusalem oko poytoyikwa kule Yesu kunye kosopintet; nto kipuryo kot kusot cek kusow oŋnkunket ŋalekap workoyik co cesumone pesyosyek tokol ye pesyetap Sapat. Ntene kuyitita kupoyit manta ŋalekap workoyik omnye kiwosontyi cek Yesu.
44013028	Nka kot kipuryo kot kunyor lelis nye kiwosontyine neto kume, ntene kusom cek Pilato kule kupakäc Yesu.
44013029	Nteyu kowo kuwany kwici Yesu ŋalek tokol ce mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ce nöme neto, kunumune murtowontet oŋnkutupci mwenet.
44013030	Ntene kuŋet Yiyintet kotutune met.
44013031	Yoto kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ kuköse piko co kipontotikey neto kuceke Kalilaya okoy Yerusalem.
44013032	Cekto picoto yawut ce muncururwanikyi om wule mite pikap Israel,
44013033	Kunyo cemite acek yu cemwowok akwek lokoywek ce toponec kule, kokoyitita Yiyintet om wule mite lekokyi kirotyet nyo kikikurtoci mpo kukonyo, omnye kiŋet Yesu kotutune met kuyu wulo kicesilyo om kitaputap tumwonikap kakastayet nyepo oyeny kule. ‘Yiku nyi werimwani koyiku ani pesyoni Papaŋuŋ.’
44013034	Nto ŋalek cepo manta kule kiŋet Yiyintet neto kotutune met nye puryo kot komuce yec kot kunun, kucu kumwoy kule: ‘Mosokoniŋ ani nyi tililinto oko kupeyok cepo manta ce kerkey oko co kyokocini Tauti.’
44013035	Kunyo mwowu yec kupoyit manta om silutek alak kule, ‘Puryo kot muci nyi kot cömnci mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil kunum.’
44013036	Omnye kikwiy Tauti ye kisope yisyonutek ce kimöce Yiyintet okoy kume cetupci tapanta yo kicetupci mpo kukonyo, kunyo kinun neto.
44013037	Ntene puryo kot kunun neto nyo kiŋet Yiyintet kotutune met.
44013038	Kunyo möce oŋnket akwek mpo yeya tokol ŋalek cepo manta kule, kupunune wule mite Yesu, kunyi cemwowok akwek yawut lokoywek ce cerenyekey miyotyonik.
44013039	Möce oŋnket kule ci tokol nye yentyini neto kunyoto nye cinumune miyotyonik tokol co puryo kot komuce kunum ntarastinekap Moses.
44013040	Kunyo oripkey, mente kot kukwontyok akwek co kimwowu workoyik kule:
44013041	‘Akäs akwek nyilotik! Mosokite oŋnkopoku: Omnye yisyet nye oyiye ani om pesyemwoŋ nkit kunye kiy nye puryo kot omuci akwek kot oyen, nka kot kororwok kumwowok akwek cito ake.’ ’’
44013042	Nteye kimite Paulo oko Parnapa kumiŋntoy om kotapkok, kumwoci piko acek kule, oŋnkokwa om Sapatit nyo coni kwororwec yec topon ŋalecutecu.
44013043	Nto om letut yu kowo kupete piko tuyet nyepo kotapkok, yoto kurup Yutayek ce caŋ oko lamek ce caŋ co kicäm tinitap Yutayek Paulo oko Parnapa. Koŋololyi kiyokik picoto kotitir kumwoci kule kutosyikey kopurto swamet nyepo poypoyetap Yiyintet.
44013044	Nto om pesyetap Sapatit nye kirupe, kukwa koruruckey piko ce kirikta coŋinto cepo moŋet tokol kwokulimnta ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
44013045	Nteye kotoköse Yutayek luketap piko, kucorok oŋnkuŋalale ŋalek ce miyotec om ŋalek ce kimwowu Paulo oŋnkucup cek neto.
44013046	Ntene kutosyikey Paulo oko Parnapa om nyikanatet kumwoy kule, “Akwek kuce piko ce kumisyini cenyosye cemwoci ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Ntene omnye katay akwek oŋnkasot kule puryo kot kuponto latik cenyoru soponto nyemo poku, kunyo mocepakaktak acek oŋnkyipe wule mite lamek.
44013047	Omnye kikonec acek Mokoryontet ntarastini kunkolonwec kule: ‘Kwakweyiŋ ani nyi yiku lakweyetap lamek, sukuŋet sut kosopet kupunto wule kiŋete koret kumukul.’ ’’
44013048	Nteye kotolime lamek ŋalecato, kuŋerec cek koromun oŋnkukasta lokoywekap Mokoryontet. Kuyen mpecek piko co kikwey Yiyintet kule mosukunyor soponto nyemo poku.
44013049	Kutosyikey ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet om wulyo tokol om koronoto.
44013050	Ntene kowurur Yutayek kowurta piko ce kantoyik cepo moŋet oko korukap lamek ce tokunotin ce soye Yiyintet, oŋnkucec kutaŋany Paulo oko Parnapa oŋnkukwet kupete koremwa.
44013051	Yoto kulelekyi kiyokik tertitap kerenkokwa picoto oŋnkunomen kupa okoy Ikoniyom.
44013052	Kunyor konomik om Antiyok ŋerekwek ce caŋ oŋnkunyor Muyet Nyetilil.
44014001	Nteye kimite cek Ikoniyom, kupa Paulo oko Parnapa kotapkokwetap Yutayek kuyu wulo kiyunto om Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya oŋnkuŋalal ŋalek okoy kuweckey Yutayek oko Kirikik ce caŋ.
44014002	Ntene kowurur Yutayek ce puryo kot kuyen kuŋem lamek kuwec kasoteywekwa kutay mpo yeya.
44014003	Yoto kopur kiyokik wuloto kuwany pesyos ce caŋ. Kuŋalal om nyikanat ŋalek cepo Mokoryontet, nye kipor Mokoryontet nkit kule po manta lokoywekwa ce nöme poypoyenyi, omnye kikoci kiyokik swamet kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok.
44014004	Yoto kupciwunekey oyeny luketap piko om moŋet, kucäm alake ŋalekap Yutayek, nto alak kucäm ŋalek cepo kiyokik.
44014005	Yoto koyomokey lamek oko Yutayek oko poytoyikwa oŋnkucomncin kule citaŋany kiyokik oŋnkuwire rwontok.
44014006	Ntowo kunket kiyokik ŋalecato, kumwey kupa okoy Listira oko Terpe ce moŋösyek cewoyec cepo Likoniya oko korosyek ce lekite wuloto.
44014007	Wokumwayta cek om wuloto lokoywek ce toponec.
44014008	Kimite citake Listira nye kipok kerenkok nye kikomwal kuceke kiceyi nye mowesetoti mpo kisic.
44014009	Yoto kulimnta cicoto ŋalekap Paulo, okoy kukäs Paulo kule ponto cicoto koyenet oŋnkyimuce cisop.
44014010	Kurotot topon oŋnkupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ŋet yoŋe kerenkokuk topon!’’ Kuŋet cicoto kuran kuyo oŋnkucec kuwesetot.
44014011	Nteye kotoköse luketap piko kito nye kwakiy Paulo, kupol cek om ŋelyeptap Likoniyek kumwoy kule, “Korek kukwontyec acek yiyik ce kerkey pic!’’
44014012	Yoto kutoci cek Parnapa kaynet kukure Seu, nto Paulo kutoci kaynet kukure Erme, omnye neto kunye kiŋololintet nyewo.
44014013	Yoto kuŋet tisintet nyepo Seu nye kimite kotap Yiyintenyi moŋet saŋ, kuwo wokukwer yeyik oŋnkusut sinentet okoy yepo kurketap moŋet. Kimöce neto oko luketap piko kule ceyici kiyokik korosek.
44014014	Ntowo kulim kiyokik Paulo oko Parnapa tukuk ce kimöce cekto kule kwiy, kupac co sirokwa oŋnkurway okoy kwenutap piko oŋnkupol kumwoy kule,
44014015	“Merekyo, omne sayiy akwek tukucu? Ciku acek pic ce cekerekeye akwek! Cemite acek yu cerorwok lokoywek ce toponec, ayaste akwane wule mite tukucu moponto latik oŋnkowekyikey wule mite Yiyintet nye sopot nye kitany koret torot oko ŋony, oko ruretyet, oko tukuk tokol ce mite koret.
44014016	Kikwasta Yiyintet om pesyosyek co kitil pikap koret tokol kupesetat oŋnkurup kusay kuyu wule moktoy.
44014017	Ntene kikopor okokoy tukuk ce toponec ceyiye. Omnye konok ropta nye ropene om pesyosyek ce cemokyini, oŋnkukonok omik soŋet opiyoŋe oŋnkoŋerec om mukuleywekwok.’’
44014018	Nka kot kiŋalal kiyokik ŋalecato, kipuryo kot komuc kot kukerekta piko moyici cekto korosek.
44014019	Yoto kukwane Yutayek alake Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya oko Ikoniyom; oŋnkwokuŋem piko okoy kuwekyikey wule mite cekto. Kuwire cekto Paulo rwontok oŋnkocutune moŋet kusote kule kame.
44014020	Ntowo korurukyikey konomik komut Paulo, kuŋet oŋnkuwo okoy moŋet. Ntowo kuyekune kunomen neto oko Parnapa kupa okoy kapunto Terpe.
44014021	Kumwayta Paulo oko Parnapa lokoywek ce toponec om moŋetap Terpe kuwec kuyen piko ce caŋ. Oŋnkuweckey cek kupa okoy kupunto Listira oko Ikoniyom oŋnkutosyikey kupa okoy kupunto Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya.
44014022	Kunet cekto piko co kikoyen kukwilokis mukuleywekwa oŋnkuyomis kumwoci kopurto koyenotet nyepo manta. Kumwoci kule, “Misyinec cepunte toŋoŋutek ce caŋ sukuŋet ciwut poytosisyetap Yiyintet.’’
44014023	Nto om letut kukwey poyik om oteputek tokol wule kimite pikap Yiyintet oŋnkusomnci kukir omik, oŋnkukoci kopurtokey Mokoryontet nyo kikokenekey cekto.
44014024	Nteyu kowo kupunto cek koretap Pisitiya yoto kukwa okoy kupun Pampiliya.
44014025	Kumwayte lokoywek Peruka, oŋnkupa kurekto okoy Atalia.
44014026	Kulany cekto rapet om wuloto oŋnkupa kuketitakey okoy Antiyok wulo kicesomncine kupeta poypoyetap Yiyintet om yisyet nyi kukwiy cekto koyitita.
44014027	Ntowo kupun Antiyok koruruc wanak pikap Yiyintet oŋnkumwoci wule kuyatita Yiyintet aret kuyotyi lamek kayen
44014028	Kopur cek wuloto kuwany pesyos ce caŋ kupontokey piko co kikoyen.
44015001	Yoto kukwane piko alake Yuteya okoy kupun Antiyok oŋnkwokucec kunet mpo yeya piko co kikoyen kumwoci kule, “Ye puryo kot cewonak akwek kuyu wule mwoytoy ntarastinekap Moses kupuryo kot omuci kot osopce.’’
44015002	Kutintentyin Paulo oko Parnapa tintenot nyewo koromun oko picoto okoy kupcikey ŋalekwa om ŋalek ce nöme ŋalecato. Yoto kurwoc cek okoy kucömncin kule misyini Paulo oko Parnapa oko piko alak cepo Antiyok kupa Yerusalem wokukäs kiyokik oko poyik om ŋalek ce nöme ŋalecu.
44015003	Yoto kuyokto pikap Yiyintet cek kupa, kunomen kupunte Foyinisiya oko Samariya oŋnkumwaytat om wuloto wule kuwektakey lamek kuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet. Kukoci lokoywecoto ŋerekwek ce caŋ mpo yeya piko co kikoyen.
44015004	Ntowo kupunto cekto Yerusalem kuŋerekyi pikap Yiyintet oko kiyokik oko poyik. Yoto kumwoci cek cut ŋalek tokol ce kukukalya Yiyintet cekto kwiy.
44015005	Ntene kuyoŋ piko alake co kikoyen cepo luketap Farasayek oŋnkumwoy kule, “Roke cewon cekto oŋnkyemwoci kurip ntarastinekap Moses.’’
44015006	Yoto koruruckey wanak kiyokik oko poyik kurwoke ŋolyontonoto.
44015007	Nto om letut yu kowo kurwoc cek kuloyit, kuŋet Petero kuyo oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mpo yeyamwani, oŋnket akwek kule om pesyosyek co kutil kikweya ani Yiyintet om wule omite akwek kule saŋet omwoci lokoywek ce toponec lamek, sukuŋet cek kulim oŋnkuyen.
44015008	Yiyintet kunye nkete mukuleywekap piko kunye kwepor cömisyet om wule mite lamek kukoci Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kikonec acek.
44015009	Kunyo puryo kot kupciyec Yiyintet Yutayek oko lamek. Ntene kukukalya miyotyonik ce mite mukuleywekwa omnye kweyen.
44015010	Kunyo yawut omne sasyem akwek Yiyintet kule cetorci terekok piko co kukuyen, torokocato kuco kipuryo kot komuc mpo kukonyo kot kutor oŋnkupuryo kot cimuc mpo acek nkit kot cetor?
44015011	Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ciyeni acek kule mocisopec om poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu kuyu wulo mocisopto cekto.’’
44015012	Kusisio piko tokol ye kimite Parnapa oko Paulo kuroru ŋalek cepo kakitat oko pelutok ce kikwiy Yiyintet kupunte wule mite cekto om wule mite lamek.
44015013	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal okoy kuwany. Kuŋalal Yakopo kumwoy kule, “Mpo yeya, olimwo ani pa!
44015014	Kotokuŋolole kuroru pantanyi Simon wule kiporunto kunyo Yiyintet cömisyenyi om wule mite Lamek, omnye kikwey om wule mite cek piko ce kokwek pikyi.
44015015	Nömntos topon ŋalecu oko ŋalekap workoyik, kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule,
44015016	‘Om letutap ŋalecu mosoketukey ani, mwowu Mokoryontet yunyoto, mosatec kotap Tauti nyo kilul; mosatec yec wule kiturpup, oŋnkoyoŋnte yec kuyo.
44015017	Sukuŋet piko alake tokol kuceny Mokoryontet, mpo Lamek tokol ce kyokur ani nkit kwek pikwani,
44015018	Yunyoto wule mwoytoy Mokoryontet, nye kipor ŋalecutecu ikye po keny.’ ’’
44015019	Kutosyikey Yakopo kumwoy kule, “Om kasoteywekwani, asoti kule puryo kot kurokenec acek citaŋany Lamek co wekyinikey wule mite Yiyintet.
44015020	Ye koto yunyo, roke cesilyi acek parwet, cemwoci kule puryo kot kuroke tokwam cekto omit alak tokol ce puryo kot kutililec ce kocesoci kupoyit kerkeyik, oŋnkuripkey kusanekey sakwayanat, oŋnkutay mokwam tyoŋik co cikete nto korotik.
44015021	Omnye kicesumane ntarastinekap Moses korikapkok okokoy ye pesyosyekap Sapat, oŋnkyemwayte ŋalekyi moŋosyek tokol.’’
44015022	Yoto kucäm kiyokik oko poyik wanak oko pikap Yiyintet tokol, kukwey piko alak om kwenumwa oŋnkuyokto kupa Antiyok kupetakey Paulo oko Parnapa. Kukwey cekto Yuta nye cekure kaynet ake Parnapa oko Sila, picoto oyeny kuce kiyweye mpo yeya cekto.
44015023	Oŋnkukoci wokukoyto parwani sumone kule. “Acek mpo yeyamwoŋ kiyokik oko poyik. Kacisupayak akwek mpo yeya cepo lamek ce minye Antiyok, oko Siriya, oko Silisiya.
44015024	Kucelim acek kule kikwa piko alake wule omite akwek cekwone wuli cemite acek, oŋnkwokuntankwarak kowurta kasoteywekwok om ŋalek ce kikwokumwowok. Kipuryo kot cikoci acek picoto kamukeywek mpo kisic ce kimuce kwiy ŋalek co kikwiy.
44015025	Kunyo kucetuye acek wanak om kirwoket oŋnkyirwoc okoy ce comncine kule ciyoku piko kukwa wulo omite akwek, kwontokey picoto oko mpo yeya cämanik Parnapa oko Paulo,
44015026	ce kikokoyito soponnwekwa om yisyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Kunyo kociyoku Yuta oko Sila, ce mosukwokumwowok cek nkit om kutuwakwa ŋalek cekerkey oko cu kocesil acek parwani.
44015028	Omnye kweporkey topon om swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko om wule cemite acek kule, puryo kot kurok cekonok acek akwek nyikisin ake tokol, ntene tos pate ntarastinecu ce roke orip akwek.
44015029	Monte tokyam omit ce kocesoci kerkeyik, monte tokyam korotik, monte tökyam tyony nye kaciket, oripkey asanekey sakwayanat. Mosopur akwek topon ye koripkey om wule mite ŋalecutecu tokol. Cämetapkey.’’
44015030	Yoto kuyomis cekto piko co kiciyoktoy kunomen kupa Antiyok. Ntowo kupunto Antiyok, koruruc piko tokol co kikoyen oŋnkukoci parwet.
44015031	Nteyu kowo kusuman piko parwet okoy kuwany, kunyor ŋerekwek ce caŋ om lokoywek ce kimite parwet.
44015032	Kuŋololyi Yuta oko Sila ce ki workoy, kumwoci ŋalek ce caŋ mpo yeya piko co kikoyen kule rokekey kopurto cek swamet oŋnkukwilokis.
44015033	Nteyu kowo kupeni cekto wuloto kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri, kuyomis mpo yeyamwa cek kusomnci kupeyok. Yoto kuketitakey cek kupa wule mite piko co kiyoku.
44015034	[Ntene kucäm Sila kule opur wuloto.]
44015035	Kopur Paulo oko Parnapa Antiyok kupontokey oko piko alak ce caŋ. Kunetis oŋnkumwayta ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet.
44015036	Nto om letutap orok ce ŋeri, kumwoci Paulo Parnapa kule, “Kany cipe yec cerutoci mpo yeya cemite moŋosyek tokol co kikicemwaytate ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet sukuŋet cekäs kule mite cekto kutosyinikey kulene om koyenet.’’
44015037	Kimöce yoto Parnapa kule cepetekey tokol oko Marko.
44015038	Ntene kusot Paulo kule puryo kurok kupatakey. Omnye kitoyis Marko mapetakey cekto okoy kuwany yisyet. Ntene kiweckey kuketitakey kupokokyi cek Pampiliya.
44015039	Yoto kutintentyin tukway okoy kupcikey. Kuwetokey Parnapa Marko kulany rapet nye kiweti Kupro.
44015040	Kukwey Paulo Sila oŋnkunomen kupa, kuyomis mpo yeya cek oŋnkusomnci kupeta poypoyetap Yiyintet.
44015041	Kuwo Paulo kupunte Siriya oko Silisiya kuŋololyinoti kukwil pikap Yiyintet ce kimite wuloto.
44016001	Kuwo Paulo okoy kupunto Terpe oko Listira. Kimite wuloto citake nye kikoyen nye cekure Timosewo weritap korko nye Cepyutaya nye kikoyen mpene, ntene ki Kirikin kwan.
44016002	Yoto kuŋalale mpo yeya piko co kikoyen tokol ce kimite Listira oko Ikoniyom Timosewo.
44016003	Kumac Paulo kule cepetekey Timosewo, Yoto kuwon Paulo Timosewo, omnye kinkete Yutayek tokol ce kimite wuloto kule Kirikin kwan.
44016004	Nteye kimite cek kupeti kupunte moŋosyek, kumwoci piko co kikoyen kuporci ntarastinek co kicömncin kutilta kiyokik oko poyik om Yerusalem, oŋnkumwoci kuywey oŋnkurip ntarastinek coto.
44016005	Yoto kutosyikey pikap Yiyintet kukwilokis om koyenet oŋnkutosyinikey kucoŋitu piko ce keyen pesyosyek tokol.
44016006	Kupa cek kupunte koretap Prukiya oko Kalatiya. Kipuryo kot kucömnci Muyet Nyetilil cekto kumwayte lokoywek koretap Asia.
44016007	Ntowo kupunto cek kurikta kiyotyetap Musia kusyem kule cipe okoy cepunte koretap Pisiniya, ntene kipuryo kot kucömncini Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yesu.
44016008	Yoto kunomen kupa kupunte Musia oŋnkurekto okoy Troa.
44016009	Kukäs Paulo kwomowunoto ŋoŋutyet nye kikäs citap Maketoniya kukeyo kusome neto kumwoci kule, “Co, yowu okoy Maketoniya ce kalyec acek!’’
44016010	Yoto pakenke yu kowo kukäs Paulo ŋoŋutyonoto, ceyiytekey acek kule cenomen cipe Maketoniya omnye kacinket kule kokurec Yiyintet wocemwoci pikap wuloto lokoywek ce toponec.
44016011	Cenomene acek Troa celany rapet kyay ceculakisye okoy cepunte Samosrake, ntowo kuyekune cepunte Neapoli.
44016012	Ceŋete wuloto cipe okoy cepunte Filipi nye moŋet nyewo nyepo tayta om koretap Maketoniya nye kiminye Romek. Cepeni ciwany pesyos cemite moŋonoto.
44016013	Nteye kipesyetap Sapat, cipe moŋet saŋ okoy yepo oyinet tapan wule kicisotyini kule toskoy mite otepto nye cesome. Cipur ŋony yoto oŋnkyeŋololyi koruk ce kikikorurukyikey yoto.
44016014	Akenke om korucoto nye kilime ŋalekyacek ku korko nye cekure Litiya nyepo moŋetap Siatira nye kyolyoy sirok ce mur kworornec, nye kisoye neto Yiyintet okokoy. Kuŋany Mokoryontet mukuleynyi kulimnta topon ŋalek ce kimwowu Paulo.
44016015	Yoto cepatisan neto oko pikap konyi tokol. Ntowo kupok kumwowec acek kule, “Akwa cipe wocipurune komwani ye kacämnte akwek kule koyentyi ani Mokoryontet kupoyit manta.’’ Kusaysayec acek okoy cipe.
44016016	Nto mite pesyet ake ye kicemite acek cepeti otepto cesome, yoto kutuyenec mutworinto nye tye nye kiponto oyinot, nye kiŋorsyoti nye kisutyini mokorenikyi pesanik ce caŋ om ŋorsyet.
44016017	Kunamec acek oko Paulo cepoto oŋnkupolon kumwowu kule, “Picu kuce mutworikap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun ce mwowok akwek aret wule mocisoptok.’’
44016018	Kikwiye cepoto kuyunyitenyi kuwany pesyos ce caŋ, okoy kunyer Paulo koromun, kuwekyikey oŋnkumwoci oyinot kule, “Komwowuŋ om swametap kaynetap Yesu Kristo kule, ŋet wete neto!’’ Yoto pakenke kuŋet oyinotonoto kuwete cepoto.
44016019	Ntowo kukäs mokorenikyi kule kopot aret wule kunyortoy cekto pesanikwa ce kwenekey, kunäm Paulo oko Sila oŋnkukwer kupa matepo wule mite poytoyik.
44016020	Nteyu kowo kukwer cek okoy taytap ketik; kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Yutayek picu, ce kosut tankwarat moŋenyacek.
44016021	Nete cek piko kapurto nye yirye ntarastinekyacek. Ciku acek Romek, kunyo puryo kot cimuci kot cenäm nto cerup kopurto nyeyunyo!’’
44016022	Yoto kuŋetyi pikap kokwet tokol kuporye cekto; kupac ketik sirokap Paulo oko cepo Sila, oŋnkumwayta cepas korokonik.
44016023	Nto om letut yu kowo cepas korokonik ce caŋ, cekerta mopusi oŋnkyemwoci sikorintet nye ripe, kurip topon mente kucilil kumwey.
44016024	Nteyu kowo cemwoci sikorintet ŋalecato, kukerta nye cekto mopusit nyepo orit oŋnkurate kerenkokwa nyororonik kuratita kereywek ce nyikisec.
44016025	Ntowo kupunto komoy kwen ye kimite Paulo oko Sila kusome oŋnkutume kukostoy Yiyintet, kumite yoto mopusinek alake cut kulimntoy.
44016026	Yoto pakenke kuriŋriŋ koret koromun kutimtim koto tokol, kuyotokis pakenke kurkotik tokol cepo mopusit, oŋnkutyokokis nyororonik ce kacerate mopusinek tokol.
44016027	Nteye kotoköse sikorintet nye ripe mopusit, ntopere akäs kayotokis kurkotikap mopusit tokol, yoto kusot kule toskoy komwey mopusinek tokol, kucut rotwenyi, nteye kimite kumöce kule aparkey nkit.
44016028	Yoto kupol Paulo om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule“Mente awurtekey! Cemite acek tokol yu!’’
44016029	Kukurto sikorintet cesut tarit oŋnkulapat kuwo orit wokoputyi yepo kerenkokap Paulo oko Sila kupotone om Muyotet.
44016030	Yoto kukwer neto cekto kukwa saŋ oŋnkutepe kule, “Merekyo, mosayiy ne ani ye sosop?’’
44016031	Kumwoci kule, “Yen cömisye oŋnkikasekey Mokoryontet Yesu mosicisopiŋ nyi wanak oko pikap kaŋuŋ.’’
44016032	Kumwoci cek neto ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet oko piko alak cepo kanyi.
44016033	Kukwer sikorintonoto cekto pesyonoto komoy oŋnkuwokusityi mwoyokwa. Yoto pakenke cepatisan sikorintonoto wanak oko pikap kanyi tokol.
44016034	Kukwer neto Paulo oko Sila kupa konyi torot oŋnkukoci omik kwam. Kuŋerec neto oko pikap kanyi koromun omnye kokuyen yoto cekto Yiyintet.
44016035	Ntowo kuyec koret, kuyokto ketik sikarekwa cewoyec kupa wule mite sikorintet nyo ripsi wokumwoci kule, “Tyakte pico kupecikey.’’
44016036	Yoto kumwoci sikorintet nye kiripsi Paulo kule, “Kokuyok ketik ŋolyontet kumwoy kule cityaktak akwek. Kunyo roke apecikey poninekwok möt topon om kalya.’’
44016037	Ntene kumwoci Paulo sikarek kule, “Kumwayta cek cepasec acek om konyekap piko tokol nye puryo kot kuwosontyec kot kunyortec lelis oŋnkurok ciku acek Romek, oŋnkukertec mopusi! Kunyi möce cekto yawut kule cityaktec acek om sisyot nye moköse ci? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Misyini kukwa cek nkit oŋnkwokutyaktec acek.’’
44016038	Yoto kupa sikarek cewoyec wokumwoci ketik ŋalecato, nteye kotolime ketik kule koko Romek Paulo oko Sila, yoto kumuyo.
44016039	Kupa ketik okoy wule mite mpo Paulo oŋnkwokurenykey, oŋnkukwererune mopusi oŋnkusom kumwoci kule apecikey aŋete moŋet.
44016040	Kunomen Paulo oko Sila kupete mopusi oŋnkupa okoy kotap Litiya, ntowo kupunto wuloto wokunyor mpo yeya co kikoyen, kumwoci ŋalek ce kwile oŋnkunomen kupecikey.
44017001	Kunomen cekto poninekwa kupunte koretap Ampipoli oko Apoloniya okoy kupunto Sesolonika wule kimite kotapkok nyepo Yutayek.
44017002	Kuyu wule kiyunto kopurtap Paulo, yoto kowut kotapkok kuwany Sapatinek somok kutintentyintos oko Yutayek kuporcini ŋalek ce kinumune wule mite silutekap Yiyintet,
44017003	ce mwowu kupor manta kule mosukutaŋany Ŋapanet, oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met. Kumwoy kupor kule, “Yesu nyitenyi omwowok ani akwek kunye Ŋapanet.’’
44017004	Yoto kayen Yutayek alake oŋnkuyomokey oko Paulo oko Sila, oko mpo luketap Kirikik ce caŋ co soye Yiyintet oko koruk ce tokunotin ce caŋ.
44017005	Ntene kucorok Yutayek oŋnkoruruc piko sokoranik ce kiwur om moŋet oŋnkupol om moŋet tokol kumukul. Yoto kupa wokuput kurketap kotap Yason kusyeme kule cenyoru Paulo oko Sila sukuŋet cekweru kukwa wule mite piko.
44017006	Ntene kipuryo kot wokunyor. Kunam Yason oko mpo yeya alak oŋnkucut kukwer wule mite poytoyikap moŋet, oŋnkupol kumwoy kule, “Kokowurta picu koret wulyo tokol! Kunyi kakwa okoy moŋenyacek?
44017007	Kunyi Yason nye kurip picu kwek toyekyi om konyi. Yiye picu tokol ŋalek ce yirye ntarastinekap Kinko Nyewo kumwowu kule mite yec kinko ake nye cekure Yesu.’’
44017008	Ntowo kulim piko oko poytoyikap moŋet ŋalecato; kunyer kupol kukwanykwanynkey.
44017009	Nto om letut yu kowo konomune cek Yason oko piko alak pesanik ce keyoŋe, kwasta kupecikey.
44017010	Ntowo kwimen kutuyit koret, kuyomis mpo yeya co kikoyen Paulo oko Sila kupa Pereya. Ntowo kupunto woloto kowut kotapkok nyepo Yutayek.
44017011	Kisiken pikap wuloto kupël piko cepo Sesolonika, omnye kilimnta cek lokoywek om ŋerekwek, oŋnkusuman kukir silutekap Yiyintet pesyosyek tokol sukuŋet kukäs kule po manta ŋalek ce kimwowu Paulo.
44017012	Yoto kuyen piko ce caŋ, oŋnkuyen mpecek Kirikik koruk ce tokunotin oko moronik ce caŋ.
44017013	Ntowo kulim Yutayek cepo Sesolonika kule kumwayte Paulo ŋolyontetap Yiyintet Pereya, yoto kukwa cek okoy wuloto oŋnkwokucec kowurur luketap piko.
44017014	Yoto pakenke lakwar, kunäm mpo yeya co kikoyen Paulo oŋnkuyomis kuwo koret nye mite ruretyet tapan. Ntene kuŋetune Sila oko Timosewo Pereya.
44017015	Kupetakey Paulo piko co kiyomise neto okoy kupunto tokol Asene. Oŋnkuketitakey cut kupa okoy Pereya. Kumwoci Paulo cek kunkolontyi kule womwoci Sila oko Timosewo kukwa kusorkey lakwar okoy kupun wule mite neto ye kemukakay.
44017016	Nteye kimite Paulo kukonye Sila oko Timosewo om Asene, yoto kunyer mukuleynyi koromun yu kowo kukäs kerkeyik ce caŋ ce kimite moŋet kumukul.
44017017	Yoto kutintentyin neto oko Yutayek oko lamek co soye Yiyintet om kotapkok, oŋnkutintentyin pesyosyek tokol oko piko ce kituytos oko neto wulo po matepo.
44017018	Kutintentyin oko mpo piko muswokik alak cepo Epikuronik oko Stoyik. Kumwoy alake kule, “Syeme mwaskeyantani menket kiy tokol kule omwowu ne?’’ Kumwoy alake kule, “Yunye syeme kule aŋalale anet ŋalekap Yiyikap korosyek alak.’’ Kimwoy cek kuyunyoto, omnye kimwoytoy Paulo ŋalek ce nöme Yesu oko kotutunetap met.
44017019	Yoto kukwer cek Paulo okoy kokwet nye kipure ye cekure Areopako, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Cemöce acek kule cinket konetisyoni lel nyi ŋolole nyi.
44017020	Omnye tokulelac nye tompo kot celim acek ŋalecu ŋolole nyi, kunyo cemöce cinket poru ne?’’
44017021	Omnye kipuryo kiy ake nye kikwiye pikap Asene oko toyek ce kiwuci kumiŋis wuloto, ntene kiŋolole oŋnkulimntoy ŋalek ce kutokutoku.
44017022	Yoto kuyoŋe Paulo taytap kokwet om Areopako oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Pikap Asene! Kwakäsak ani akwek om tukuk tokol kule oyiku pic ce osoye Yiyik koromun.
44017023	Omnye ye kwomite owesetoti opuntote moŋemwoŋ akäs oteputek wule cepele korosek okoy onyoru otepto ake nye mite silutek ce kicesil kule, ‘Po nyi Yiyintet nye mocinket.’ Kunyo nyoto mocinket nyo osoye akwek nka kot monketi kunye Yiyintet nyoto nye omwowok ani akwek.
44017024	Yiyintet nyoto kunye kitany koret kumukul oko tukuk tokol ce mite koret, nyoto kunye Mokoryontet nye poytoy torot oko ŋony. Ntene puryo kot kuminye korik ce kitece piko yewuniyekwa,
44017025	oŋnkupuryo kot kumöce kiy ake nye koyici piko neto om yewuniyekwa kuyu nye panan. Omnye neto nkit nye kocini piko tokol soponto oko komuŋnto oko tukuk alak tokol.
44017026	Kinyosyo kunyo kutany cito akenke nye kiyi piko tokol om koret tokol kumukul. Neto nkit nye kiyoyec kenyisyek oŋnkusat kiyotonik tokol om koret wule ŋete wule minye piko.
44017027	Kikwiy kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet piko kuceny kutaptapat nto sukunyor cek neto. Ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, puryo kot kumite Yiyintet wule low om wule mite ci tokol om acek.
44017028	Omnye, ‘Cesoptosi acek, oŋnkyepesetoti, oŋnkyemite koret om kamukeywekyi.’ Kuyu wulo kimwoy mpo piko alake ŋololikap ceptyonkocok cikwakwek kule, ‘Ciku mpo acek lekokyi.’
44017029	Kunyo ye ciku lekokyi, kupuryo kot kuroke cisot kule Yiyintet ku kiy nye kerkey oko kerkeyin nye karin nye lekecece nto rwa nye kikwiy piko kupul om ŋomnon.
44017030	Kunyo kikwasta Yiyintet nye kipuryo kot kumany om pesyosyek co kitil ye kipuryo kot kunket piko. Ntene mwowu yawut kumwocini piko cepo koret tokol kuweckey oŋnkurenynkey kwasta miyotyonik.
44017031	Omnye kikwey neto pesyet nye mosukuwosontyine ci ake tokol nye mite koret tokol kumukul oŋnkumutyi musankut nyepo manta om kamukeywekap cito nyo kikwey neto nkit. Kikopor ŋalecu kupoyit manta om wule mite ci ake tokol, omnye kiŋet cicoto kotutune met.’’
44017032	Nteye kotolime piko alake kuŋolole Paulo ŋalek ce nöme kotutunetap met, kurorici cek neto. Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Cemöce acek kule celim ŋolole nyi ŋalecu yec pesyet ake.’’
44017033	Yoto kunomen Paulo kuŋete kokwet
44017034	Ntene kuyen alake oŋnkuyomokey oko neto, cekto coto ku mpo Tionisio nye kikirwokintet om kokwetap Areopako, oko korko nye cekure Tamari oko piko alak.
44018001	Om letutap ŋalecato, kunomen Paulo om Asene kuwo okoy Korinso.
44018002	Wokunyor om wuloto Yutoyintet nye cekure Akwila nye kiceyici Ponto nye kitokucone Italia oko korkenyi Priskila. Omnye kikwetune Kinko Nyewo Klautiyo Yutayek tokol kuŋete Rom. Kuwo Paulo wokukäs cekto.
44018003	Oŋnkopurcin kwiyis tokol omnye kikwiyisyi Paulo yisyet nye kerkey oko nye kikwiye cekto kunope wemanik sukuŋet kunyor pesanik ce kolyekey.
44018004	Kuŋalale Paulo kotapkok pesyosyek tokol ye pesyetap Sapat kutintentyin oko cek kusyem kule acutu kuyen Yutayek oko Kirikik.
44018005	Ntowo kupun Sila oko Timosewo kukwane Maketoniya. Kwiyis Paulo pesyosyek tokol nye puryo kot kwiye yisyet ake kumwoytoy lokoywek kuporcini Yutayek kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet.
44018006	Nteyu kowo kutay cek ŋalekap Paulo oŋnkumwoci ŋalek ce miyotec, kunäm Paulo sirokyi oŋnkulelekyi tertitap sirok oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye kopotye akwek, kwakwek nkit ce nömok lelisto! Puryo kot ku ani. Kuceke yawut pesyoni kuwo tay, mosowo ani womwoci lokoywek lamek.’’
44018007	Yoto kunomen kupakakta cekto oŋnkuwo wokopurune kotap lomintet ake nye kisoye Yiyintet nye kicekure Tito Yusto nye kilekite kanyi kotapkok.
44018008	Kuyen Krispo nye kinyewo nyepo kotapkok kuyen Mokoryontet wanak oko pikap kanyi tokol. Kulim pikap Korinso alake ce caŋ lokoywek okoy cepatisan cekto.
44018009	Nto mite kwomowut ake, kukäs Paulo ŋoŋutyet nye kimwoci Mokoryontet neto kule, “Mente amuy, tosyikey ŋalal mente asis,
44018010	omnye opontekey ani oko nyi, puryo ci nye muce kuporyeniŋ kowurtiŋ, omnye oponte ani pikwani ce caŋ ce mite moŋoni.’’
44018011	Yoto kopur Paulo wuloto kuwany kenyit akenke oko orok lö kunete piko ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
44018012	Ntowo cekwey Kalio kwek poytoyintetap Akaya, yoto koruruckey Yutayek oŋnkunäm Paulo kukwer kuwo kok wokuwosontyi.
44018013	Kumwoy cek kule, “Cici kunye syeme kule aŋem amas piko sukuŋet kusay Yiyintet om aret nye puryo kot kucöme ntarastinek!’’
44018014	Nteyu kikirik kucec kuŋalal Paulo. Yoto kumwoci Kalio Yutayek kule, “Nto komite lelis nye miyat nto ŋolyo nye miyat nye kociwurta nto kamuyte ani olimwok topon akwek Yutayek.
44018015	Ntene omnye mite pate tintenotet nyepo ŋalekap koyenotet oko ntarastinekwakwek, möce akäs oŋnkamut akwek nkit, omnye puryo kot oyiku ani ketintetap ŋalek ceyuco!’’
44018016	Yoto kukwet Kalio cek kupete kokwet.
44018017	Kurotyi piko tokol kunäm Sosene nyewo nyepo kotapkok oŋnkupir om taytap kokwet. Ntene om coto tokol, kusisyecikey Kalio kuyu nye mokiy nyepo lat.
44018018	Yoto kopur Paulo Korinso kuwany pesyos ce caŋ kupontokey oko mpo yeya piko co kikoyen nto pestos. Oŋnkunomen kulany rapet oko Akwila oko Priskila kupa okoy Siriya. Nteye kitompo kunomen Paulo kuwalkey om Kenseria oŋnkurwac metinyi.
44018019	Yoto kupunto Efeso wule kipokokyi neto Akwila oko Priskila, oŋnkuwo nkit okoy kotapkok oŋnkutintentyin oko Yutayek.
44018020	Kusom cek Paulo kule cipur tokol oko neto kuloyit. Ntene kutay.
44018021	Nteye kimite kunomene kumwoci kule, “Ye kacäm Yiyintet mosoweckey ani aco wule omite akwek.’’ Kunomene Efeso kulany rapet.
44018022	Ntowo kurekune Kaysariya kuwo kulaŋnta Yerusalem wokusupay pikap Yiyintet; oŋnkunomen kuwo Antiyok.
44018023	Kopur Paulo wuloto pesyos ce ŋeri nto nomene kuwo kupunte korosyekap Kalatiya oko Prukiya kuŋololyinoti kukwil piko tokol co kikoyen.
44018024	Yoto kuco okoy kupun Efeso yutoyintet ake nye cekure Apolo nye kiceyici Alekisantaria, nye kiŋolole kutok topon oŋnkusumanat nye ŋom nye kinket koromun silutekap Yiyintet.
44018025	Kikikonetkey neto konket ŋalekap aretap Mokoryontet. Yoto om ŋerekwek ce caŋ oko mukuleyto nye topon kuŋalal Apolo kunetis topon ŋalek ce nöme Mokoryontet Yesu. Ntene kinket neto pate potisonisyet nyo kinete Yowana.
44018026	Kucec kuŋalal om nyikanatet om kotapkok. Nteye kotolime Priskila oko Akwila ŋalekyi, kukwer kuwo komwa oŋnkuwo kunet kuporci topon ŋalek cepo aretap Yiyintet.
44018027	Nteyu kowo kunket mpo yeya piko co kikoyen cepo Efeso kule möce Apolo kule ayay ruretyet okoy opunte Akaya, yoto kukalya kusilyi parwet nye kosutyi mpo yeya piko co kikoyen ce kimite wuloto kumwoci kule kuŋerekyi neto. Ntowo kupunto Apolo wuloto, kwiyis topon kwek kokolyoyintet nyewo om wule mite piko co kikoyen kupunto poypoyetap Yiyintet
44018028	Omnye kitinten om swamet nyewo koromun okoy kupël Yutayek om taytap piko tokol, kuŋalal kupor kukwane silutekap Yiyintet kule, Yesu kunye Ŋapanet kupoyit manta.
44019001	Nteye kimite Apolo Korinso, yoto kuwo Paulo kupunte kwenutap koret okoy kupunto Efeso. Kunyorta wuloto konomik alak.
44019002	Yoto kutepe Paulo cekto kule, “Kyonyoru akwek Muyet Nyetilil yo kyoyeni?’’ Kuwec cut kumwoy kule, “Puryo! Tompo mpo kot celim acek kule mite Muyet Nyetilil.’’
44019003	Kutepe Paulo cek kule, “Kunyo kicepatisanak akwek patisanet oŋnkono?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Potisonisyetap Yowana.’’
44019004	Kumwoy Paulo kule, “Potisonisyetap Yowana kunye kipo piko ce renyekey kwasta miyotyonikwa; kunyo kimwoci pikap Israel kule misyini kuyen cekto neto cito nyo coni om letunyi, nyoto ku Yesu.’’
44019005	Ntowo kulim cekto ŋalecato cepatisan om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.
44019006	Yoto kukemer Paulo yewuniyekyi metewokwa, kunyor cekto Muyet Nyetilil; kicec kuŋalal ŋelyepik alak oŋnkumwayta lokoywekap Yiyintet.
44019007	Kipuntoy picoto ce kirice tokol taman ok oyeny.
44019008	Kuwany Paulo wuloto orok somok kuweti kotapkok oŋnkuŋololyini piko om nyikanatet. Kutintentyin oko cekto oŋnkusyem kumwoci ŋalek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
44019009	Ntene kutoyis piko alake kuwuryo oŋnkutay meyen oŋnkumwoy ŋalek ce miyotec kumwoci piko ce rupe aretap Yiyintet om taytap piko tokol. Yoto kuŋet Paulo kupakakta cek, kukwey oŋnkuweto piko co kikoyen oŋnkuŋololyi kunet cek pesyosyek tokol om sukulutap Turano.
44019010	Kutosyikey Paulo kwiyis kuyunyoto kuwany kenyisyek oyeny okoy kulim piko tokol ce kimite Asia ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet Yesu, Yutayek wanak oko Kirikik.
44019011	Yoto kwiy Yiyintet tukuk cepo kakitat kupël cepo kwak kupunte yewuniyekap Paulo.
44019012	Okoy cesute mpo tamparinekyi oko sirok ce kitiny porto, cesutyini piko ce mnyontos, kusopco porwonikwa oŋnkuŋetyo kupete oyik ce miyotec.
44019013	Yoto kucec Yutayek alake cepsokeyisyek ce kipesetoti sukukwetoti oyik, kusyem mpecek kukwet oyik ce miyotec om wule piko ce kiponto oyik kwiyisye kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu. Kumwoci cekto oyik kule, “Okwetok ani akwek om kaynetap Yesu nyo mwoytoy Paulo.’’
44019014	Piko ce kikwiye kuyunyoto ku werik tisap cepo Yutoyintet tisintet nyewo nye kicekure Sekewa.
44019015	Ntene kuwekyi oyik ce miyotec kumwoci kule, “Onŋket ani Yesu, oŋnkonket mpo Paulo, nto akwek ku ŋo?’’
44019016	Yoto kuran cito nyo kiponto oyik oŋnkuporye cek tokol om swama okoy kupël kukwet kumwey kupa saŋ püc nye puryo kot kupunto sirok oko mwoyok ce kanyor.
44019017	Kulim oŋnkunket ŋalecato piko tokol ce kiminye Efeso, Yutayek oko Kirikik. Kumuyo tokol koromun oŋnkukasta kuywey kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.
44019018	Kukwa piko ce caŋ co kikoyen oŋnkwokumwoy kutor om tayta piko tokol tukuk ce miyotec ce kikwiy cekto.
44019019	Kusut mpo piko tokol ce kitepe sokeyek kitapunekwa oŋnkoruruc wanak oŋnkupele taytap piko tokol. Ntowo ciyit pesanik ce kiyeme kyale kitapunecato tokol kupunto silinkinek Elifunek konom.
44019020	Om aret nye yunyoto nyepo swama, yoto kutosyikey kuner kucäm piko ce caŋ ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet oŋnkukwilakay kupoyit swama koromun.
44019021	Nto om letut yu kowo kwiyokis ŋalecato, kusot Paulo om moyenyi kule mawo opunte Maketoniya oko Akaya, oŋnkowo okoy Yerusalem, kumwoy yoto kule, “Ye kopunte wuloto, mosowo yec mpo okoy wakäs Rom.’’
44019022	Kuyokto kokolyoykyi oyeny Timosewo oko Erasto kunyosyo kupa Maketoniya, oŋnkupeni neto kupur koretap Asia kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri.
44019023	Om pesyosyecoto ye kitoku cukurotet nyewo om Efeso om wule mite piko co rupe aretap Mokoryontet.
44019024	Kimite wuloto citake nye cekure Temetrio nye kitonye karik ce kiyuytye kotap Yiyintet korko nye cekure Artemi; nye kinyoru piko ce kikwicini neto yisyonoto pesanik ce caŋ.
44019025	Yoto kukur koruruc pikyi ce kyiyisyi oko piko alak ce kikwiye yisyet nye kerkey oko nyenyi oŋnkumwoci kule, “Merekyo, oŋnket akwek kule cenyortoy acek mokoryontinyo yisyoni,
44019026	kunyo kwakäs oŋnkolim akwek nkit ŋalek ce yiye cici cekure Paulo, nyi mwocini piko kule, Yiyik ce kerkeyik co kikwiye piko kuce puryo kot kupo manta mpo kisic. Kunyo kokomukta kot kuwec piko ce caŋ, puryo kot ku wuli po Efeso nkit pate, ntene karik kunäm koretap Asia tokol.
44019027	Kunyo mite kaŋoyenotet kule mosukuwur kamonkesyentini nyacek oŋnkunyor kaynet nye miyat. Puryo kot kuyo mpo nkit pate, ntene oko yec kule mosiciwurta kupot woyinnyi nye soye ci tokol om Asia oko koret tokol kumukul!’’
44019028	Nteye kotolime piko tokol ŋalecato, kunyer oŋnkucec kupol kumwoy kule, “Nyewo Artemi nyepo Efesoyek!’’
44019029	Kutisto polotet nyewo kunäm moŋet tokol; kurway cek oŋnkunäm Kayo oko Aristariko pikap Meketoniya ce kipontotikey oko Paulo, oŋnkukwer lakwar okoy kupunto kotap arerosyek.
44019030	Yoto kumäc Paulo nkit kule awo wule mite piko, ntene kuyete piko co kikoyen.
44019031	Kuyok ŋalek piko alake cewoyec cepo koret ce kicoronutekap Paulo kumwoci kule mente kot kuco cokuporkey om kotap arerosyek.
44019032	Yoto kupol piko om kirwoket koromun; kumwowu alake ŋalek alak, kumwowu alake ŋalek alak, omnye kikiwur kirwoket nye kipuryo kot kunkete piko ce caŋ kule ŋolyo ne nye kerurukyikey cekto.
44019033	Yoto kucämnta piko alake kule Alekisanta nyepo ŋalecu, omnye kikwer Yutayek neto kuco cokuyoŋe tay. Yoto kuwuse Alekisanta piko yewuniyekyi kule kusisio saŋalal asyem ayetkey.
44019034	Ntowo kunket piko kule Yutoyintet neto, kupol tokol om kutit akenke kuwany sawanik oyeny kupole kumwowu kule, “Nyewo Artemi nyepo Efesoyek!’’
44019035	Nto om letut komuc Koronintet nyepo moŋet kuŋololyi piko okoy kusisio. Nteyu kowo kusisio piko, kumwoy neto kule, “Pikap Efeso, ŋo cito nye puryo kot konket kule, moŋetap Efeso, kunye ripe kotap Yiyintet nyewo Artemi oko rwantet nyetilil nyo kusuwune torot.
44019036	Puryo ci nye muce kot kutintentyi tukucutecu. Kunyo misyini osisie, monte cimomnci kot oyiy kiy nye miyat.
44019037	Omnye kokweru akwek picu kukwa yu, ce puryo kot kunyapan tukun cepo kotap Yiyintenyo nto mpo kucup Yiyintenyo nye korko.
44019038	Kunyo ye ponto Temetrio oko pikyi co toŋsi ŋolyo nye ŋunye om wule mite citake tokol, mite pesyosyek co cemute musankunek oko poytoyik co mute musankunek roke wokuwosontyinekey cek wuloto.
44019039	Nteye mite ŋalek alake ce omöce akwek ce pële co, mosicirwoke ŋalek coto kokwetap pikap koret nyepo kwak.
44019040	Omnye ciŋoyeni kule muce cewosontyec acek om pararetap ŋalek ce kokwiyokis pesyoni. Puryo kot cimuce kot cikalyec acek om polotoni, kunyo moceponte ŋolyo nye cimuci cemwowu ceyetekey.’’
44019041	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal kuyunyoto okoy kuwany, kuyomis kumwoci piko kuseret kupecikey.
44020001	Nto om letut yu kowo kusisio ŋalek, kukur Paulo kutuyo wanak piko co kikoyen oŋnkuŋololyi cek ŋalek ce kwile oŋnkuyomis oŋnkunomen kuwo okoy Maketoniya.
44020002	Kuwesetote kupunte korosyecoto oŋnkumwoci cekto lokoywek ce caŋ ce kwile. Yoto kuco okoy kupun koretap Akaya,
44020003	wule kipur kuwany orok somok. Nteye kimite kuyiytoykey kule onomen ayay okoy opunte Siriya, yoto kusow konket kule kakwiyta Yutayek rurumut kule cepakäca. Kusot oŋnkuwoŋnkyi kule maweckey opunte aretap Meketoniya.
44020004	Kiwetoykey Paulo yoto picu; Sapatro weritap Piriko citap Pereya, oko Aristariko oko Sekunto pikap Sesolonika, oko Kayo citap Terpe, oko Timosewo oko Tukiko oko Trofimo pikap koretap Asia.
44020005	Kupa cek kunto tay wokukanyec acek Troa.
44020006	Nto om letutap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, cenomene acek Filipi celany rapet, yoto cipe ciwany pesyosyek mut okoy wocenyorte cekto Troa wule kiwo cepeni ciwany wuloto pesyosyek tisap.
44020007	Nteye kipesyetap Santey kosoleny ciruruckey acek wanak oko piko co kikoyen kyomisye cepetec mukatyantet. Yoto kuŋololyi Paulo piko, ntene kutosyikey kuŋalal okoy kupunto komoy kwen, omnye kinomen kuwecinikey tun ye koyekune.
44020008	Kimite yoto tarinek ce caŋ ce kiloytos ce kimite koto nyepo parak wule kicirurukyikey acek.
44020009	Kimite oyiperyontet ake nye cekure Eutiko nye kikipure ye kipo pastit; ntowo kutosyikey Paulo kuŋalal kuloyit, kunuc neto okoy kunamnta rwonto, yoto kusuwune koto nyepo somok nye mite koto parak okoy wokupir ŋony. Wocenäme ŋony nye kame.
44020010	Kuwo Paulo kurekto lakwar oŋnkuputyi kokupuyekey kunäm oŋnkumwoy kule, “Osisie morirye, tokusopot cito!’’
44020011	Oŋnkulaŋnta Paulo kuwo koto parak oŋnkuwokupetec mukatyantet oŋnkwam. Yoto kutosyikey kuŋalal okoy kuyec koret ntonomene kuwecikey.
44020012	Kukwer cekto oyiperyontonoto kuwo ka kukosop, kuŋerec cek ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun.
44020013	Cipe acek tay wule mite rapet, oŋnkyelany cipe okoy cepunte Aso. Omnye kicemöce kule wocilany Paulo rapet om wuloto. Kimwowec acek neto cipe kuyunyoto, omnye kiwo neto kupunte oret nyepo koret.
44020014	Ntowo kunyorcec acek neto Aso, cilany kulany rapet oŋnkyenomen cipe okoy Mitulene.
44020015	Cenomene wuloto om rapet, ntowo kuyekune cepunte koret nye tokyintos oko Kiyo. Nto pesyet nye kirupe cepunte Samo, nto pesyet nyepo somok cepunte Melito.
44020016	Omnye kicäm Paulo kule akeyitye Efeso om rapet mente kot olilennkey om Asia. Omnye kisortokey lakwar kule ye kemukakay opunte Yerusalem ye pesyetap Pentekoste.
44020017	Nteye kimite Paulo Melito kuyokto cito kuwo Efeso wokukur poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet kule kukwa kwokutuyo oko neto.
44020018	Nteyu kowo kupun picoto, kumwoci Paulo cekto ŋalek kule, “Oŋnket akwek wule yunto kapurto nyimwani om pesyosyek tokol ce kicipurcine oko akwek kuceke pesyet nyepo tayta ye kyopunu ani Asia.
44020019	Kyoyisye yisyenyu kuyu mutworintetap Mokoryontet om poypoyet oko lokik oŋnkopunte syemutok ce kikwontyo om rurumunekap Yutayek.
44020020	Oŋnket akwek kule puryo kot awuŋenak ani akwek ŋolyo ake tokol nyepo latik nye muce kukalyak, kuyu wulo kyomwowok oŋnkanatek om taytap piko tokol oko om korikwok.
44020021	Kyomwowu asowu koromun Yutayek oko lamek omwoci kule misyini kuweckey kwasta miyotyonik oŋnkuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkuyen Mokoryontet Yesu.
44020022	Kunyo amite yawut oweti Yerusalem omnye aywey kupoyto Muyet Nyetilil nye puryo kot oŋnketi kito nye mosukwiyakay om wule amite ani om wuloto.
44020023	Oŋnketi kule kukosowo Muyet Nyetilil om moŋosyek tokol ce kwopunte kule keno ani pate mopusi oko toŋoŋutek.
44020024	Ntene asute soponmwani kuyu kiy nye puryo kot kuponto latik om wule amite ani, saŋet ayitite yisyetap poninekwani aŋnkawany yisyet nye kikono Mokoryontet Yesu; nye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo poypoyetap Yiyintet.
44020025	“Kyowesetote ani opunte wule amite akwek tokol, amwoytoy opuru poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Kunyo oŋnket ani yawut kule puryo ci mpo akenke om akwek nye muce kot tokukäs ani yec.
44020026	Kunyo omwowok owolikey pesyoni kule ye kopot citake tokol om akwek kupuryo kot kunyimwani lelisto mpo kisic.
44020027	Omnye kyomwowok akwek nye puryo kot awuŋenak tukuk tokol ce kikwiyta Yiyintet.
44020028	Akäste oripkey akwek nkit oŋnkorip piko tokol co kikonok akwek Muyet Nyetilil. Oyiku mesewekap pikap Yiyintet ce kiwec neto nkit kwek ceci om korotikap Werinyi nkit.
44020029	Omnye aŋnketi kule ye konomen ani, mosukukwa wule omite akwek suyik ce koromec ce puryo kot kotuce kecirek.
44020030	Mosukupunto pesyet nye mosukuŋet piko alake om kwenumwakwek kuŋalal ŋalek cepo mwiynan kuperper kumas piko co kikoyen kurup aretap picoto.
44020031	Kunyo oripkey akäste, oŋnkasot oŋnket kule om lokik ce caŋ cepo komoy oko pet, kyanet ani asowu ci tokol om akwek kuwany kenyisyek somok.
44020032	“Kunyo mopokokyok ani kuripok Yiyintet oko poypoyetap ŋolyontenyi. Neto nye mokutecak topon kukonok kupeyok ce kerkey oko cepo pikyi tokol.
44020033	Kipuryo kot acorokyi pesya nyepo ci nto mpo sira.
44020034	Oŋnket akwek tokol kule om yewuniyekwani cutecu kuce kyoyisye tukuk ce kipoyo oko piko co kicepontekey.
44020035	Kyoporwok ani om tukuk tokol kule yisyet nyepo swama kunye aret nye roke cikalye acek piko co puryo kot kuponto swamet, cisoti ŋalekap Mokoryontet Yesu co kimwoy kule, ‘Mite ŋerekwek ce caŋ ye cepciytoy kupël ye cekoniŋ.’ ’’
44020036	Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Paulo okoy kuwany, kukutuny wanak oko cekto tokol oŋnkusom.
44020037	Ntowo kuwany; kiriryo piko tokol oŋnkunäm kumot kuŋatut Paulo kupirci cämetapkey.
44020038	Kinerekis piko yoto koromun om ŋalek ce kimwoy Paulo kule komo komuce cekto yec kukäse neto konyekwa. Yoto kupa cekto kuyomis Paulo okoy kupunto ye kimite rapet.
44021001	Nteyu kowo cisupaykey acek oko cekto, cepciykey celany acek rapet cipe ceculakisye kyay okoy cepunte Kosi, nto pesyetap oyeny cepunte Roto, nto kuceke yoto cetosyikey cipe okoy cepunte Patara.
44021002	Cenyorte wuloto rapet nye nomene kuweti Foyinisiya, celany cepete nyoto .
44021003	Cipe okoy cepunte wule cekäs Kupro om komosta tö, yoto cipe okoy cepunte Siriya, wokuyo rapet Tiro wule kiwocirekyi terekok ce kisute.
44021004	Cenyorte wuloto piko alak ce kikoyen cipur oko cekto ciwany pesyosyek tisap. Kumwoci picoto Paulo om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kule mente kuwo Yerusalem.
44021005	Nteyu kowo ciwany wuloto pesyosyek ce kicipur, cenomen poninekyo, kuyomisec piko tokol koruk oko lekok okoy cepunte moŋet saŋ, yoto cekutuny om yepo ruretyet tapan oŋnkyesom.
44021006	Ntowo ciwany, cisupaykey acek oko cekto, oŋnkyipe acek wocelany rapet, kunomen cek, kuweckey kupa ka.
44021007	Cetosyikey acek cipe poninekyo om rapet kuceke Tiro okoy cepunte Ptolemayi, wule kiwo cisupay mpo yeya; oŋnkyipur wanak oko cekto ciwany pesyet akenke.
44021008	Ntowo kuyekune, cenomen cipe okoy cepunte Kaysariya. Nteye kicemite wuloto cipe kotap Filipo mwoytoyintetap lokoywek wocipur oko neto. Neto kunye akenke om piko tisap co kicekweye Yerusalem,
44021009	Kiponto tipikyi amwan ce puryo kot cimüt ce kimwoytoy ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
44021010	Nteyu kowo cipur wuloto ciwany pesyos ce ŋeri, yoto kucone workoyontet Yuteya nye cekure kaynenyi Akapo.
