44021011	Yoto kuco okoy wule cemite acek, oŋnkunäm porowetap suwe nyepo Paulo; oŋnkurate kerenkokyi oko yewuniyekyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Komwoy Muyet Nyetilil kule, yunyi wule mokuratita Yutayek citap porowoni po suwe om Yerusalem, oŋnkukoyito kunäm lamek.’’
44021012	Ntowo celim acek ŋalecato, cesom acek oko pikap wuloto cesaysay Paulo kule mente kuwo Yerusalem.
44021013	Ntene kuwec kumwoy kule, “Kiy ne nyi oyiye akwek, yu korirye kuyu nyi, omöce kule ceyiri mukuleymwani? Oyiku yiytat nye puryo kot ku kule cerata pate, ntene mpo womeci Yerusalem om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.’’
44021014	Ntowo kucis ye mocewec acek neto, kyaste pate, oŋnkyemwowu kule, “Cesome kwiyokis cepo Mokoryontet kuyu wule moktoy.’’
44021015	Nto om letut yu kowo cipur wuloto ciwany pesyos ce ŋeri, ceyiytekey acek cerat tukukyo oŋnkyenomen cipe celaŋnte Yerusalem.
44021016	Yoto cepetekey acek wanak oko konomik alak cepo Kaysariya, kukwerec acek okoy kotap Manason citap Kupro nye kikikoyen om pesyosyek ce kipo tay, nye kicepeti acek yoto kule wocipurune kanyi.
44021017	Ntowo cepunte Yerusalem, kuŋerekyec acek mpo yeya koromun.
44021018	Ntowo kuyekune cepetekey tokol oko Paulo wocekäs Yakopo. Kimite yoto poyik tokol cepo pikap Yiyintet.
44021019	Kosupay Paulo cekto oŋnkuŋalal kuporci topon ŋalek tokol ce kikwiy Yiyintet om wule mite lamek om yisyet nye kikwiy neto.
44021020	Ntowo kulim cekto ŋalekyi, kuŋerec tokol kukasta Yiyintet. Oŋnkumwoci cek Paulo kule, “Yeya muci nyi nkit käs wule yunto, kule mite mpo Yutayek pokolwokik ce caŋ ce kiweckey kuyen oŋnkukwilotin tokol om ntarastinekyo.
44021021	Kunyo kucemwoci cekto ŋalek alak ce nömiŋ nyi kule; neti nyi Yutayek tokol ce minye korosyekap lamek mwocini kule kwasta cekto ntarastinekap Moses, oŋnkimwoci kutay mawon lekokwa, oko kule kutay marup kopurtap Yutayek.
44021022	Kunyo mokyiy kulene? Omnye porukey kupoyit manta kule; mosukulim cek kule kweco nyi.
44021023	Kunyo roke yiy ŋalek ce mocemwowuŋ nyi. Mite yu piko amwanu ce kakuwalkey kawalat,
44021024	wetekey nyi picutecu oŋnkuwayiy tokol oko cekto ntasimnyet nye cipukte simnyontet oŋnkikoyite nyi pesanikwa sukurwac cekto metewokwa, sukuŋet konket piko tokol kule puryo kot kupo manta ŋalek co kuceŋololeniŋ nyi. Ntene kupor kule yiku Yutoyintet nye rupe ntarastinekap Moses.
44021025	Nto ŋalek ce nöme piko co lamek co kikoyen, kicirwoc oŋnkyesilyi cek parwet cemwoci kule, puryo kot kuroke kwam omit ce kocesoci kerkeyik oko korotik, nto tyony nye kaciket kume, oŋnkusanekay sakwayanat.’’
44021026	Yoto kukwer Paulo picoto, ntowo kuyekune kwiy neto oko picoto ntasimnyet nye cipukte simnyontet, oŋnkuwo Paulo kotap Yiyintet wokumwayta ye pekune pesyet nye cipukte simnyontet, oko pesyet nye mosukukonune neto kokotutekap ci tokol om cekto.
44021027	Nto tompo kot kupunto pesyosyek tisapu kukösyi Yutayek cepo koretap Asia kumite Paulo kotap Yiyintet orit. Yoto kowurur cekto luketap piko ce caŋ oŋnkunäm Paulo.
44021028	Kupol cek kumwoy kule, “Pikap Israel! Pikap Israel! Akalyec! Akalyec! Cito nyitenyi nyo wesotote koret tokol kumukul kunete piko tokol konetisyenyi kumwoci kule kusenkerec acek pikap Israel, oŋnkumwoci kutay ntarastinekap Moses oko koyi po Yiyintet. Kunyi kokwer mpo lamek kwokowut kotap Yiyintet kunyere koyi tilil!’’
44021029	Kimwoy cek kuyunyoto omnye kukukösyi cekto yikwe Paulo moŋet kupontotikey Trofimo citap Efeso, kusot cek kule toskoy kokwer Paulo neto kuco kotap Yiyintet orit.
44021030	Yoto kutonkworokis ŋalek om moŋet tokol kumukul, kukwa kurwoy piko tokol koruruckey oŋnkunäm Paulo kucutune kotap Yiyintet; yoto pakenke ceker kurkotikap kotap Yiyintet.
44021031	Nteye kimite luketap piko ce caŋ kusyeme kule cepakäc Paulo kume, yoto kupunto ŋalek wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarekap Romek cemwoci kule kutankwarakay Yerusalem tokol kumukul.
44021032	Kunäm nyo pakenke sikarekap Romek alak cewoyec oko sikarek oŋnkukwer kupa lakwar wule mite luketap piko. Nteye kotoköse piko neto oko sikarek kwasta nye komokupire Paulo.
44021033	Kuwo nyewo nyepo sikarek okoy ye kimite Paulo oŋnkunäm oŋnkumwayta cerate nyororonik oyeny, oŋnkutep kule, “Ŋo cici, kakwiy ne?’’
44021034	Yoto kupol piko alake om kwenutap piko kumwoy ŋalek alak, kumwowu yec alake ŋalek alak, okoy kupotyi nyewo nyepo sikarek ŋolyontet nyepo manta om polotet. Kumwayta cekwer Paulo kuwo kaytap sikarek.
44021035	Yoto cekwer Paulo okoy kupunto yepo loŋntowutokap kaytap sikarek kukonopoti sikarek neto omnye kikiwuryo piko tokol koromun.
44021036	Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ korwowu kunomu ce kipolonu kumwowu kule, “Apakäc cico kume!’’
44021037	Nteyu kirikik cekwer Paulo kowut kaytap sikarek orit kukopunto yepo kurket, yoto kuŋololyi Paulo nyewo nyepo sikarek kumwoci kule, “Omuci ani pa omwowuŋ nyi ŋolyo?’’ Kutepe nyewo sikarek neto kule, “Ŋololi nyi so ŋelyeptap Kirikik?
44021038	Puryo kot kwinyi ne cico po Misiri nyo kicece weywekatet om pesyosyek co kutil kuntoci piko Romek Elifunek amwan ce ponto karikap poryet kupa kitela.’’
44021039	Kuwekyi Paulo kumwoci neto kule, “Oyiku ani Yutoyintet sikwo nye kiceyico moŋetap Taruso om Silisiya, citap moŋet nye tokunot, osomiŋ kule cömwo oŋololyi piko.’’
44021040	Kucömnci nyewo Paulo kuŋalal. Yoto kuyo Paulo oŋnkuwuse yewuniyekyi piko, nteyu kowo kusisio kuŋololyi om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek.
44022001	Kuŋalal Paulo kumwoy kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya, oko mpo Papa, olimwo ani pa aŋalal ayetkey om taymwakwek!’’
44022002	Ntowo kulim kule koŋololyine neto cekto ŋelyeptap Puraniyek, yoto kusisio. Kutosyikey Paulo kumwoy kule,
44022003	“Oyiku Yutoyintet sikwo nye kiceyico Taruso om Silisiya, ntene kyanere moŋonitenyi, Kamaliel kunye kineto. Kunyo kicineta topon koromun wule yunto ntarastinekap mpo kukonyo. Kyoyiku ani nyikan pesyosyek tokol om yisyonutekap Yiyintet kuyu wule ayunte akwek piko tokol cu omite yo pesyoni.
44022004	Kyotoŋonyi ani oŋnkyopoköci piko ce kirupe aret nyitenyi; kyonöme koruk oko moronik oŋnkakerte tokol mopusi.
44022005	Muce tisintet nyewo oko kokwet tokol kunket kule po manta ŋalecutecu omwowu ani. Kikono cekto poronok ce kicesilyi Yutayek mpo yeya ce kiminye Tamasko. Yoto onomen awo wuloto kule wanäm picutecu oŋnkarate nyororonik oŋnkokweru kukwa Yerusalem sukwocitaŋany.’’
44022006	“Nteye kyomite oweti om aran karikte apunte Tamasko ye kipet kwen, yoto kucone lakweyet parak lakwar kuyu kaweket oŋnkomutwo ani.
44022007	Oputyi ŋony; oŋnkalim kutit nye mwowo kule, ‘Saulo! Saulo! Omne seteŋonyo ani nyi?’
44022008	Owekyi atepe kule, ‘Mokoryontet, nyi ku ŋo?’ Kumwowo kule, ‘Ani nyo Yesu nyepo Nasaret nyo toŋonyi nyi.’
44022009	Yoto kukäs piko ce kicepontekey lakweyet ntene kipuryo kot kulim kutit nye kiŋololwo ani.
44022010	Atepe ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet mosayiy ne ani?’ Kumwowo Mokoryontet kule, ‘Ŋete ŋoŋy; oŋnkiwo okoy Tamasko, mosuwocemwowuŋ om wuloto yisyonutek tokol ce kikwiytowuŋ Yiyintet kule yiy.’
44022011	Yoto omnye kikikokora lakweyet, kunäma piko ce kicepontekey yewut oŋnkuretoto okoy Tamasko.
44022012	“Kimite Tamasko citake nye cekure Ananiya, cito nye kipo tini nye kirupe ntarastinekyo nye kiyweye kucömntoy Yutayek tokol ce kiminye wuloto.
44022013	Kuco yoto okoy wule amite oŋnkucokuyoŋe yepo komosmwani, oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Yeya Saulo, käste yec.’ Yoto pakenke akäste ani akäs neto.
44022014	Kumwoy kule, ‘Yiyintetap mpo kukonyo nye kukweyiŋ seŋet nket cömisyenyi oŋnkikäs Mutworintenyi nyepo manta; oŋnkilim neto kuŋololuŋ om kutinyi.
44022015	Omnye meseyeku muncururwenyi nye mesemwoci pikap koret tokol ŋalek ce kekäs oŋnkilim nyi.
44022016	Kunyo konye ne yawut? Ŋet yony lakwar kur kaynetap Mokoryontet oŋnkikany cepatisaniŋ cipukto miyotyonikuk.’
44022017	“Aweckey ani aco Yerusalem, nteye kyomite osome om kotap Yiyintet, yoto akäs ŋoŋutyet,
44022018	nye kyakäs Mokoryontet nye kimwowo kule, ‘Sorci lakwar, nomen wete Yerusalem, omnye puryo kot komuce piko kot kuyen ŋalekwani ce mwowu nyi.’
44022019	Owekyi omwoci kule, ‘Mokoryontet nkete cek tokol topon kule kyoweti ani korikapkok oŋnkanäm oŋnkopir piko tokol ce yeniŋ nyi.
44022020	Nto mpo pesyet nyo kicepoköce Stefano muncururweŋuŋ, kyomite ani yoto aŋnkacäm wule kicepakakta kume, oŋnkorip sirokap piko co kiporisyi.’
44022021	Yoto kumwowo Mokoryontet kule, ‘Iwo, omnye mosoyoktiŋ ani iwo wule mite lamek.’ ’’
44022022	Kusisio piko kulimnta ŋalekap Paulo okoy kumwoy ŋalecato, yoto kucec kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Anate cico kuwete koret! Apakäc kume! Omnye puryo kot kurok kusop!’’
44022023	Kupol cek koromun kuwuse sirokwa oŋnkuswortoy teŋek kupa parak.
44022024	Kumwoci nyewo nyepo sikarek pikyi kukwer Paulo kuwo kaytap sikarek orit, oŋnkumwoci sikarek kupas neto sukuŋet kutok omne sukupol Yutayek kutay neto kuyunyi.
44022025	Ntene yu kowo cerat kule cepas, kumwoci Paulo nyewo ake nyepo sikarek nye kimite keyoŋe yoto kule, “Cömwok akwek ntarastinek kule apas cito nye kikwek Romin ye tompo kot cewosontyi om lelis nye kukwiy?’’
44022026	Nteye kotolime nyewo nyoto ŋalecato, kuwo wule mite nyewo oŋnkutepe kumwoci kule, “Möce nyi kule ayiy ne? Omnye Romin cici!’’
44022027	Yoto kuwo nyewo wule mite Paulo oŋnkutepe kule, “Mwowo ani, yiku nyi Romin!’’ Kuwec Paulo kumwoy kule, “Oyiku.’’
44022028	Kumwoy nyewo kule, “Kyanyoru ani soyiku Romin omnye kyayale pesan ce caŋ.’’ Ntene kuwekyi Paulo kumwoci neto kule, “Ntene kiceyito ani.’’
44022029	Yoto pakenke kunata piko ce komöce kule cepas Paulo. Ntene kumuy nyewo nyepo sikarek yu kowo kulim kule Romin Paulo, kunyi kakacerate neto nyororonik.
44022030	Ntowo kuyec koret, kumac nyewo nyepo sikarek kule oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta, ŋolyo ne nye wosontyini Yutayek Paulo. Yoto kukur kumwoci tisik cewoyec oko kokwet tokol kutuyo, oŋnkukwer Paulo cokuyoŋe taymwacek.
44023001	Kurotot Paulo topon piko ce kimite kokwet, oŋnkuŋalal kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya, kyopur ani nye topon koromun om mukuleymwani oko soponmwani om taytap Yiyintet kuceke keny okoy yawut pesyoni.’’
44023002	Yoto pakenke kumwoci tisintet nyewo Ananiya piko ce kimite ye kilekite Paulo kusyec neto kwarmatut.
44023003	Kumwoci Paulo neto kule, “Mosukusyeciŋ Yiyintet nyi totet nyi kiciyil kulelit! Mite nyi kepur yo wosontyo kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek, kunyi mite yec yirye ntarastinek mwocini piko kusyeca ani!’’
44023004	Kumwoci piko ce kimite keyoŋe ye kilekite Paulo kule. “Kecup tisintet nyewo nyepo Yiyintet!’’
44023005	Kuwec Paulo kumwoy kule, “Mpo yeya, kopuryo kot oŋnket kule neto ku tisintet nyewo, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mente kot omwoci ŋalek ce miyotet poytoyintetap pikuk.’ ’’
44023006	Ntowo konket Paulo kule piko ce kimite kokwet alak ku Satusayek nto alak ku Farasayek, yoto kuŋalal kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya! Oyiku ani Farasoyintet nye weritap Farasoyintet, kunyo amite ani cewosontyo om yu omnye acöme kokenotet kule mosukotutune met piko co kipok.’’
44023007	Yoto pakenke yu kowo kumwoy Paulo ŋalecato, kucec kowokut kutintentyin Farasayek oko Satusayek okoy kupciykey piko ce kimite kokwet.
44023008	Omnye kimwowu Satusayek kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko co kipok, oŋnkumwoy yec kule puryo kot kimite malaykanik nto oyik. Ntene kucöme Farasayek kule mite tukucutecu tokol ku somok.
44023009	Yoto kuŋetŋet kuwoyit polotet okoy kuyoŋ konetikap ntarastinek cepo luketap Farasayek oŋnkutinton kumwoy kutor kule, “Puryo kot cekösyi acek cici lelis nye miyat, pesyet ake nto kuŋololyi muyet ake nto malayket neto.’’
44023010	Yoto kutosyikey tintenotet oko wokutyet okoy kumuy nyewo nyepo sikarek kule muce cekto kusor Paulo kusacasac. Kumwoci sikarek kupa kwenutap piko oŋnkocut Paulo om swama kucone wule mite cek oŋnkukwer kuwo kaytap sikarek orit.
44023011	Nto om kwomowunoto, kuyoŋe malayketap Mokoryontet komostap Paulo, oŋnkumwoci kule. “Titir! Kuyu wulo keporu nyi mwowu ŋalekwani om yuteyu po Yerusalem kunyo meseyiy mpo kuyunyoto om Rom.’’
44023012	Ntowo kuyec koret, koruruckey kutuyo wanak Yutayek oŋnkurwoc kuyiyta rurumut. Kuwalkey cek kumwoy kule, puryo kot kwomisyi nto kuyesyo kiy ake tokol okoy ye kacepakäc Paulo.
44023013	Kipuntoy ce keyitye artam piko tokol ce kikiyiytakey kule ceporisye.
44023014	Kupa cek wule mite tisik cewoyec oko poyik oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kaciwalkey acek tokol koromun kule, puryo kot cecemcemi kiy tokol okoy ye kacepakäc Paulo.
44023015	Kunyo oyokte akwek oko kokwet yawut ŋolyontet kuwo wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarekap Romek, sukuŋet kukwer Paulo kuco wule omite akwek, ayiytekey kuyu nye omöce kule cinket ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankunyi. Mosiceyiytekey acek om aran oŋnkyepakäc neto kutompo kot kupun wuloto.’’
44023016	Yoto kulim weritap cekwametitap Paulo ŋalek cepo rurumunoto. Kunomen nyo kuwo okoy kupunto kaytap sikarek orit oŋnkuwokumwoci Paulo.
44023017	Kukur Paulo sikorintet akenke nyewo oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kwer pa nyi oyiperyontoni kuwo okoy wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarek, omnye ponto ŋolyontet nye möce kule amwoci neto.’’
44023018	Kukwer sikorintonoto oyiperyontonoto okoy kupunto wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarek oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kokuro mopusyontet Paulo oŋnkusomo kule akweru oyiperyontoni kuco wule mite nyi, omnye ponto ŋolyontet nye möce kumwowuŋ.’’
44023019	Yoto kunäm nyewo nyepo sikarek oyiperyontonoto yewut oŋnkukwer kuwo tapan, oŋnkutepe möt kule, “Ponte nyi ŋolyo ne nye möce kule amwowo ani.’’
44023020	Kumwoci kule “Kukurwoc oŋnkucömncin Yutayek kule cesomiŋ nyi pesyetap tun, seŋet kweru Paulo kuco kokwet kuyu nye möce kokwet kule cinket ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankunyi.
44023021	Ntene mente kot ocömnci, omnye mite piko ce keytye artam ce mosukuyiytakey kurip kule cenäm neto. Omnye kukuwalkey picoto tokol kumwoy kule puryo kot kwome cek omit nto kuyesyo okoy ye kapakäc neto. Mite yawut kuyiytoykey kunyo konye pate ŋalek ce memwowu nyi.’’
44023022	Kumwoci nyewo nyepo sikarek oyiperyontonoto kule, “Mente kot omwoci citake kule kemwowo ani ŋalecu.’’ Oŋnkumwoci oyiperyontonoto kuwecikey.
44023023	Yoto kukur nyewo nyepo sikarek alak cewoyec oyeny, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Akwey sikarek pokolwokik oyeny kupa Kaysariya, wanak oko sikarek cepo Farasinek tomonwokik tisap, oko cepo ŋotwek pokolwokik oyeny; aŋnkayiytekey kunomen pesyoni ye mite sawet somok nyepo komoy.
44023024	Okoci Paulo Farasinek ce kowete, oŋnkokwer topon okoy kupunto wule mite poytoyintet Filekis.’’
44023025	Yoto kusil nyewo nyepo sikarek parwet nye kisil kule.
44023026	“Ani nyo Klautiyo Lusia. Osupoyiŋ nyi poytoyintet nye Cekonyite Filekis.
44023027	Kunam Yutayek cici okoy kurik kupakäc cekto neto. Yoto awo ani oko sikarek okoy wosoru onumune cek, omnye kyonyoru oŋnket kule kikwek neto Romin.
44023028	Nteye kyomöce ani kule oŋnket lelisto nye wosontyini cekto neto, yoto okwer kuwo kokwemwacek.
44023029	Ntene anyoru kule puryo lelis nye miyat nye kikwiy nye roke cepakäce nto mpo cerotyi mopusi. Ŋalek ce wosontyini cek neto kuce nömekey oko tintenotetap ntarastinekwa pate.
44023030	Nto om letut cemwowo kule kakwiyta Yutayek rurumut kule cepakäc neto. Acäm ani kule okweru kuco wule mite nyi, oŋnkomwoci piko co wosontyini neto kukwa kwokumwoy om tayŋuŋyi ŋalek ce wosontyini cek neto.’’
44023031	Yoto kunäm sikarek Paulo oŋnkukwer kuyu wulo kacemwoci, kukwer cek neto kwomowunoto okoy kupunto Antipatri.
44023032	Ntowo kuyec koret, kuweckey sikarek cepo kerenkok kuketkey kukwa kaytap sikarek, oŋnkupakakta sikarek cepo Farasinek kukwer Paulo.
44023033	Yoto kukwer cek neto okoy kupunto Kaysariya, oŋnkukoci parwet poytoyintet oŋnkuporci Paulo.
44023034	Kusuman poytoyintet parwet oŋnkutepe Paulo kule cepoytowuneniŋ kureryantet oŋnkono. Nteyu kowo kunket kule cone Silisiya,
44023035	kumwoy kule, “Mosolimuŋ ani ŋalekuk ye kakwa piko co wosontyini nyi okoy kupun yu.’’ Yoto kumwayta ceripune Paulo kaytap Erote.
44024001	Nto om letutap pesyosyek mut, kurekto Ananiya Tisintet nyewo kuwo Kaysariya wanak oko poyik alak oko Puritet nyepo ntarastinek nye cekure kaynenyi Tertulo. Koyoŋe cek taytap poytoyintet Filekis oŋnkumwoci ŋalek ce wosontyini Paulo.
44024002	Yoto cekur Tertulo kuco. Kuyat nyo musankut kuŋalal kuwosontyi Paulo kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet Filekis nye cekonyite! Om ŋomnonetap Poytoyisyeŋuŋ kunye kukonec acek kalyet kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ, kunyo mite ce weywece tukuk ce roko kyiy om toponiyetap korenyacek.
44024003	Ceŋerekyini acek ŋalecutecu tokol okokoy om wulyo tokol oko om pesyosyek tokol, oŋnkyikostiŋ acek nyi koromun.
44024004	Puryo kot amöce kule awaŋeniŋ poroyinŋuŋ, kunyi osomiŋ om toponiyeŋuŋ kule limwec acek ŋalekyacek cu ŋeri.
44024005	Kucinket acek oŋnkyenyoru kule miyat cici koromun, neto nye wurure kutoytoy Yutayek om koret tokol, neto yec kunye kantoyintetap luketap citap Nasaret.
44024006	Cenäm acek neto, ceyiytekey kule cewosontyi kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekyo,
44024007	ntene kuconto pararet Lusia nyewo nyepo sikarek oŋnkuco kunumenenec acek oko om swama.
44024008	Yoto kumwoy Lusia kule roko kukwa piko co wosontyini neto wule mite nyi. Ye kekir nyi tepe cicitenyi, mesenket nkit kukwane wule mite neto ŋalek tokol cu cewosontyini acek.’’
44024009	Kuwasan Yutayek tokol kumwoy kule po manta ŋalekyoto tokol.
44024010	Yoto kuwus Poytoyintet kumwoci Paulo kuŋalal. Kucec Paulo kuŋalal kumwoy kule. “Oŋnket ani kule kweyiku nyi ketintetap pikap koroni kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ, kunyo oŋololi ani ŋalekwani oyetekey nye puryo kot oponte muyot.
44024011	Omnye muci nyi nkit nket ŋalek cepo manta kule tompo kot kukeytya pesyosyek tamanu ok oyeny kuceke ye kyalaŋnte ani awo Yerusalem wasay.
44024012	Kipuryo kot kunyorwo Yutayek otitentyintosi oko citake tokol om kotap Yiyintet, nto kunyorwo mpo owururi piko om korikapkok, nto mpo om wulyo ake tokol om moŋet.
44024013	Kunyo puryo kot komuce cekto kot kumwowuŋ nyi mpo yawut pesyoni ŋalek cepo manta ce wosontyo ani cekto.
44024014	Ntene ocöme ani om konyekukyi kule osoye ani Yiyintetap mpo kukonyo omnye arupe aret nyelel nyo mwowu cek kule puryo kot kupo manta. Ntene oŋnkoyen ŋalek tokol ce silotin om ntarastinekap Moses oko ŋalek cepo kitapunekap workoyik.
44024015	Oponte mpo ani kokenotet om wule mite Yiyintet nye kerkey oko nyo cöme cek picutecu wosontyo ani, kule mosukotutune met piko tokol co kipok ce toponec oko ce miyotec.
44024016	Kunyo osyeme ani oyiyisye pesyosyek tokol kuyu wule yunto cekto; kule opurte moyet nye topon om wule mite Yiyintet oko wule mite piko tokol.
44024017	“Ntene om letut yu kowo awany kenyisyek ce caŋ nye kimomite Yerusalem, yoto awo ani osutyi pikap korenyu pesanik ce kikolye oŋnkokoyte korosek co cikoytoy.
44024018	Nteye kyomite oyiye ŋalecutecu kuye kinyorwo ani cekto amite kotap Yiyintet orit om letut yu kowowawany ayiy ntasimnyet nyo cipukte simnyontet. Kipuryo kot opontekey yoto piko ce caŋ, kipuryo mpo kot kumite yoto cukurotet.
44024019	Ntene kimite yoto Yutayek ce kikwone koretap poytoyisyetap Asia. Cekto picoto kuce keroke kumite yawut yuteyu po tayŋuŋyi kuwosontyo ani ye ponteno ŋolyo ake tokol.
44024020	Kunyo yaste kuŋalal kumwoy piko cu mite yu yawut lelis ne nye kinyorta cekto yo kyoyoŋe kokwet,
44024021	tos pate ŋolyontoni akenke nye kyokurte omwowu yo kyoyoŋe taymwacek kule, ‘Amite ani yu pesyoni, cewosontyo omnye ayeni kule mosukotutune met piko co kipok.’ ’’
44024022	Yoto kuker Filekis kokwet omnye kinkete ŋalekap piko co kikoyen, aŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Mosamüt musankumwoŋ ye kaco Lusia nyewo nyepo sikarek.’’
44024023	Kumwoci Filekis sikorintet nyewo kule ceripune Paulo mopusi, ntene kumwayta cikoci poroyinto nye yeme nye puryo kot cekerektoy coronutekyi makwa kwokwici neto tukuk ce möce.
44024024	Om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, kuco Filekis oko korkenyi Trusila nye ki ceptap Yutayek. Yoto kumwayta cekwer Paulo kuco cokumwoci cek ŋalek ce nöme koyenet om Kristo Yesu.
44024025	Ntene yu kowo kutosyikey Paulo kuŋalale ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme toponiyet oko ripetapkey oko ŋalek cepo pesyetap musankut nye mosukuco, yoto kumuy Filekis oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kayem co pesyoni, wekany mosokuriŋ ani pesyet ake ye oponte poroyinto.’’
44024026	Kisote Filekis om aret ake kule muce kukono Paulo pesanik ce kalena. Kuyuyit nyoto kukure neto Paulo om pesyosyek alak oŋnkwokuŋalal tukway.
44024027	Ntowo kutil kenyisyek oyeny, kunam Porika Festo poytoyisyet kuker Filekis. Yoto kumac Filekis kule kucäma Yutayek, kupakakta Paulo kuratat om mopusi.
44025001	Nteyu kowo kuwany Festo pesyosyek somok kuceke kopun koret nye kipoytoy, yoto kunomene Kaysariya kulaŋnta kuwo Yerusalem.
44025002	Nteye kimite wuloto, kuwasan tisik cewoyec oko kantoyikap Yutayek kuwosontyi Paulo. Kusom cek Festo kule kucäm kukwer Paulo kuco Yerusalem.
44025003	Omnye kikwiy rurumut kule cenäm neto kuconi om aran oŋnkyepakäc.
44025004	Kuwekyi Festo kumwoci cekto kule, “Ceripune Paulo mopusi om Kaysariya, kunyo mosonomen aweckey ani lakwar awo kaysariya;
44025005	roke akwey akwek kantoyikwok cepetekey sukuŋet wokuwosontyi ye kukwiy lelis nye miyat.’’
44025006	Kopur Festo wanak oko cekto kuwany pesyosyek sisit nto taman, oŋnkunomen kurekto kuwo Kaysariya. Ntowo kuyec koret, kopure neto ŋeceretap kokwet nye cemute musankunek oŋnkumwayta cekwer Paulo kuco kokwet.
44025007	Nteyu kowo kuco Paulo; kuyoŋ Yutayek ce kikwone Yerusalem komut neto, oŋnkucec kuwosontyi kumwoy ŋalek ce caŋ ce nyikisec ce kipuryo kot komuce mpecek nkit kot kupor kule po manta ŋalecato.
44025008	Ntene kuŋalal Paulo kuyetkey kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ayiy ani lelis nye miyat nye yirye ntarastinekap Yutayek nto mpo nye nöme kotap Yiyintet, nto mpo kule kyawurte om wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
44025009	Ntene omnye kimöce Festo kule kucäm Yutayek, yoto kutepe neto Paulo kumwoci kule. “Möce kule awo Yerusalem wocewosontyineniŋ wuloto om taymwani?’’
44025010	Kumwoy Paulo kule, “Amite ani yu kukoyoŋe taytap ŋeceretap kokwetap Kinko Nyewo nye cemute musankunek, wule roke cewosontyineno, kunyo puryo kot ayiy lelis nye miyat om wule mite Yutayek kuyu wulo kenket nyi nkit topon.
44025011	Ye kyoyiri ntarastinek, nto ye kyayiy lelis nye roke cepakäca, kupuryo kot osome kule osop. Ntene ye puryo kot kumite lelis nyepo manta nye wosontyo cekto, kupuryo ci nye muce kot kukoyito awo wule mite cekto. Kunyo ocururoni kule kuwo musankut wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
44025012	Yoto kulolyin Festo oko kirwokikyi cepo kokwet, ntowo kuwany; kuwekyi kumwoci Paulo kule, “Kesom nyi kule awo wule mite Kinko Nyewo, kunyo mosukutastakey musankuŋuŋ kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
44025013	Nto om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri; kukwa okoy kupun kaysariya Kinko Akripa oko Pernike kurutoci kwokusupay Festo.
44025014	Nteyu kowo kopur cek pesyos ce ŋeri, kumwoci Festo Kinko Akripa musankutap Paulo kule, “Mite citake yuteyu nye kipokokyi Filekis mopusi;
44025015	nteye kyomite ani Yerusalem kuŋalal kuwosontyi tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek kusomo kule omutyi neto musankut kulot.
44025016	Ntene omwoci ani cek kule, puryo kot kukopurtap Romek kukoyito ci tokol nye cewosontyini kutompo kot kuwosontyin oko piko co wosontyini neto; oŋnkukoci poroyinto kuŋalal kuyetkey om konyekwa.
44025017	Ntowo kukwa cek okoy kupun yuteyu, yoto monolilennkey ani awany mpo pesyo, nteye kipesyet nye koyekune opure ŋeceretap kokwet nye cemute musankunek aŋnkamwayte cekwer neto kuco kokwet.
44025018	Yoto kuyoŋ piko co kiwosontyini, ntene kipuryo kot kumwoy kupor lelis nye miyat nye kikwiy cici kuyu wule kyosotitoy ani kule mosukumwoy.
44025019	Ŋalek tokol ce kimwoy cek pate kuce po tintenotet nye ponto cek oko neto ce nöme ŋalekap tinimwa oko cepo citake nye kime nye cekure Yesu nye mwowu Paulo kule sope.
44025020	Yoto kupotwo ani wule manyorte ŋalek cepo manta om ŋalecu. Atepe Paulo ye möce kule awo Yerusalem wocewosontyine wuloto musankunyi.
44025021	Ntene kutasta kucururan Paulo musankut, oŋnkusom cerip okoy kumüt Kinko Nyewo musankunyi. Yoto amwayte cerip neto okoy okoyite kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
44025022	Kumwoci Akripa Festo kule, “Amöce mpo ani kule alim ŋalekap cicitenyi.’’ Kumwoy Festo kule, “Meselim ŋalekyi tun.’’
44025023	Ntowo kuyec koret kukwa kotap kokwet Akripa oko Pernike om woyinto oko koyweyisyet, kupontonukey cewoyec cepo sikarekap poryet oko kantoyik cewoyec cepo moŋet. Yoto kumwayta Festo cekwer Paulo kuco kokwet.
44025024	Kuŋalal Festo kumwoy kule, “Kinko Akripa, oko akwek piko tokol cu cepontekey: Akäs pa akwek cici, nye kiwosontyi Yutayek tokol om wule amite ani om Yerusalem oko yuteyu ce mite. Kipol kumwoy kule puryo kot kuroke tokusop mpo kisic.
44025025	Ntene puryo kot anyoru ani aŋnket kule kikwiy lelis nye miyat nye roke cepakäce. Ntene omnye kitasta kucururan musankut nkit kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo, acäm ani kule okoyite kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.
44025026	Ntene puryo kot oponte ani ŋolyontet nyepo manta nye mosilyi Kinko Nyewo. Kunyo kokweru kuco yu po taymwakwek, ntene kupëlis om tayŋuŋyi Kinko Akripa! Sukuŋet ye kacenay acek okoy cenyoru ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankunyi, anyoru mpo ani ŋolyontet nye mosil.
44025027	Omnye porukey om wule amite ani kule puryo kot ku ŋolyo nyepo ŋomnon akoyite ani mopusyo kupuryo kot kopunto ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankut nye cewosontyini.’’
44026001	Kumwoci Akripa Paulo kule, “Kacecömuŋ ŋalal ŋalekuk yetkey.’’ Yoto koyito Paulo yewunyi oŋnkuŋalal kuyetkey kumwoy kule:
44026002	“Kinko Akripa! Kakäs kule oponte ani kupeyoy pesyoni aŋalal ŋalek ce oyetekey om tayŋuŋyi om ŋalek tokol ce wosontyo ani Yutayek.
44026003	Omnye nketi nyi nkit topon koromun kopurwek tokol oko ŋalekap tintenotetap Yutayek. Kunyo osomiŋ kule muytoci oŋnkilimwo ŋalek topon.
44026004	“Nkete cek Yutayek tokol wule kyopurtoy ani kuceke oyiku lekwa. Nkete kule kyopurune ani om soponmwani tokol wuli po korenyacek oko Yerusalem.
44026005	Kikonket kuloyit ye möce kule citoru, kule oyiku ani Farasoyintet nyepo luketap piko cepo tininyo nye ceripekey koromun.
44026006	Kunyo amite ani koyoŋe yu pesyoni cewosontyo omnye okonye kokenotet nye kikurtoci Yiyintet mpo kukonyo.
44026007	Kurtoyet nyoto kunye mite kukonye kule mosicenyoru orustunwek co taman ok oyeny cepo pikyacek ye mite cekto kusoye Yiyintet komoy oko pet, ntene omwowuŋ ani nyi kinko nye cekonyite kule om kokenisyoni kunye cewosontyineno ani Yutayek.
44026008	Kinko! Omne sukuwuyityok akwek Yutayek ye moyen kule muce Yiyintet koŋet kotutune met piko ce kipok?
44026009	“Ani nkit nye kyosyeme koromun ikye kule yisyemwani ayiy kiy ake tokol nye amuci okoy opot kaynetap Yesu nyepo Nasaret.
44026010	Kyayiy kuyunyoto om Yerusalem. Ani mpo nye kyorotyini mopusi pikap Yiyintet ce tililec ce caŋ om kamukeywek ce kikonu tisik cewoyec. Nteye kicemutyini cekto musankut kule cepakäc, kyocöme ani oporci kirot kule cepakäc.
44026011	Kyotoŋonyi okokoy om korikapkok tokol, osyeme kule sukuŋet kutay cek koyenemwa. Onyerci cek koromun okoy onomen awo mpo okoy apunte moŋosyekap lamek wanäm aŋnkataŋany cekto.
44026012	“Yoto om ŋolyontonitenyi, onomen ani awo Tamasko oponte kamukeywek oko woyinto nye kikono tisik cewoyec.
44026013	Komwowuŋ ani Kinko nye cekonyite kule, nteye kyomite yoto oweti om aran ye kimite asista pet kwen, yoto akäs ani lakweyet nye kicone parak nye kiluw kupël lakweyetap asista oŋnkukweny komutwo ani oko piko ce kicepontekey.
44026014	Ciputyi acek tokol ŋony, yoto alim ani kutit nye kiŋalal kumwowo om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek kule, ‘Saulo! Saulo! Omne setaŋanya ani nyi? Korom koromun ye meyamnkey kosur.’
44026015	Yoto atepe ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet, nyi ŋo?’ Kumwowo Mokoryontet kule, ‘Ani nyo Yesu nyo toŋonyi nyi.
44026016	Ntene ŋete ŋony, omnye koporunkey ani saŋet akweyiŋ yiku kiyokintet oko muncururwemwani nye meseporci piko alak ŋalek ce kekäs nyi pesyoni om wule amite ani, oko ŋalek ce mosoporuŋ ani nyi om pesyosyek ce mite tay.
44026017	Mososoruŋ ani nyi om wule mite pikap Israel oko wule mite lamek; wuloto ku wule mosoyoktiŋ ani,
44026018	siweŋany konyekwa oŋnkiwec kukwane menonet sukunyor lakweyet; oŋnkukwane wule mite swametap poytoyisyetap oyinot, oŋnkuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet, sukuŋet kunyor koyenet kupunte wule amite ani oŋnkyikalya cekto miyotyonikwa, oŋnkunyor otepto om wule mite pikap Yiyintet ce kweyotin.’ ’’
44026019	“Kunyo Kinko Akripa, kipuryo kot amuci ani atay molimnci ŋoŋutyet nye kyonyoru kucone torot.
44026020	Ntene kyanyosye oporci ŋalek pikap Tamasko oko cepo Yerusalem, nto okeri pikap koretap Yuteya tokol wanak oko lamek, omwoci kule misyini kurenynkey cekto oŋnkuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkwiy tukuk ce poru kule karenynkey cekto.
44026021	Om ŋalecutecu ye sukuŋet Yutayek kunäma ye kyomite kotap Yiyintet oŋnkusyem kule cepakäca.
44026022	Ntene okoy pesyoni; kyonyoru kakalyayet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet. Kunyo amite ani koyoŋe yu omwocini ŋalek ce kyakäs piko tokol cewoyec oko ce minkec, nye puryo kot omwowu alak; ntene omwowu pate ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyik oko Moses kule mosukwiyokis.
44026023	Coto kuce mwowu kule mosukutaŋany Ŋapanet oŋnkwek cito akenke nye kunyosyo kotutune met, oŋnkwek nye mosukoporci lakweyet Yutayek oko lamek.’’
44026024	Nteye kimite Paulo kuŋolole kuyetekey kuyunyoto, yoto kupol Festo kukurto om kuti nyewo kumwoy kule, “Paulo! Kopunuŋ met! Kukowurtiŋ nyi sumanet nyewo met!’’
44026025	Kumwoy Paulo kule, “Mokoryontet nye cekonyite, puryo kot kupunwo met, oŋololi ŋalek ce toponec ce toloyec cepo manta.
44026026	Kinko Akripa oŋololuŋ ŋalecutecu oponte nyikanatet tokol, omnye nketi nyi ŋalecutecu tokol. Kunyo oŋnket kupoyit manta kule kenket mpenyi ŋolyo ake tokol om ŋalecutecu omnye kipuryo kot kyiye ŋalecutecu wule wuŋat mpo kisic.
44026027	Kinko Akripa, yeni nyi ŋalekap workoyik? Oŋnketi ani kule yeni nyi.’’
44026028	Kumwoci Akripa Paulo kule, “Soti nyi kule muci kot aweca ani oyiku Kristoyin om ŋalek ce keŋalale poroyini nwac pate?’’ Kuwec Paulo kumwoy kule,
44026029	“Nka kot nto om poroyinto nye nwac nto nye koy, ntene osome wule mite Yiyintet kule, puryo kot kwinyi nkit pate, ntene wanak oko akwek piko tokol cu lime ŋalekwani pesyoni ce roke cekto kukerkeyitu oko ani, tos pate nyororonicu aponte!’’
44026030	Yoto kuŋet kinko oko poytoyintet Festo oko Pernike oko piko ce kimite kokwet.
44026031	Nteyu kowo kupa tapan, kuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kwiy cici lelis nye roke cepakäc nto mpo cerotyi mopusi.’’
44026032	Kumwoci Akripa Festo kule. “Kocimuce cityakta cici kuwecikey ntomo nye kucururan kutasta musankut kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
44027001	Nteyu kowo kecäm kule roke celany acek rapet cepete okoy Italia. Yoto cikoyto Paulo oko mopusinek alak cikoci Yuliyo nyewo nyepo sikarekap luketap Romek ce cekure sikarekap Kinko Nyewo.
44027002	Yoto celany acek rapet nye kicone Atramito nye kirikik kunomen kuwo kupunte moŋosyek ce mite tapantap ruretyet om koretap poytoyisyetap Asia. Cenomen cepete rapet. Kicepontotikey acek yoto Aristariko citap Maketoniya nye cone Sesolonika.
44027003	Nto ye pesyetap oyeny cepunte Siton. Kicöme Yuliyo Paulo, yoto kucömncini kuwo wokukäs coronutekyi oŋnkyikoci kiy ake tokol nye kimöce.
44027004	Cenomene wuloto celany rapet cipe cerup ruretyet tapan cekerektekey Kupro nye koret nye kikwen peko omnye kiwuse yomet ye kicone tay.
44027005	Yoto cipe kyay ruretyet ye lekite Silisiya oko Pampiliya okoy cepunte Mura moŋetap Lukiya.
44027006	Kunyor nyewo nyepo sikarek om yoto rapet nye kicone Alekisantaria nye kikirik kunomen kuwo Italia, kulanyec acek rapanato.
44027007	Cenomene wuloto cipe möt ciwany pesyos ce caŋ om wuyinto nyewo okoy cepunte Kunito moŋet nye mite ruretyet tapan. Yoto kucis yomet yemo cipe tay. Cerekte cerup tapantap koretap Kurete nye kikwen peko nye tokyintos oko Salmone.
44027008	Cipe möt om wuyinto cerup ruretyet tapan tapan okoy cepunte ye cekure loyta nye topon. Kilekite yoto moŋetap Laseya.
44027009	Cipur wuloto ciwany pesyos ce caŋ okoy kukoromit kucis ye mocetosyikey cipe poninekap ruretyet, omnye kikikeyta pesyet nyo cekure, “Cekire Omik.’’ Yoto kumwoci Paulo cekto ŋomnononi kule,
44027010	“Merekyo, kakäs ani kule miyat pantap ruretyet, kuceke yuteyu, omnye mosukuwuryo tukuk ce mite rapet oko mpo rapet oŋnkupotyo soponwekap piko.’’
44027011	Ntene kucäm nyewo nyepo sikarek ŋalekap cito nye poytoy rapet oko citap rapet kupël ŋalek ce kimwoy Paulo.
44027012	Kipuryo kot kutopon ruretyet yoto nye kimuce kot cipur okoy ciwany pesyosyekap koyitityet tokol. Yoto kucäm piko ce caŋ kule roke cenomen cesyem kyay ruretyet okoy cepunte Foyinike ye kemukakay, sukuŋet cekto wokukerektekey loytap ruretyet om koretap Kurete, nyoto ku Loyta nye mite ruretyet tapan nye tokyinikey kwenutap tö oko raraktay, oko kwenutap makentany oko raraktay wule kimuce cek wokopur kuwany pesyosyekap koyitityet om wuloto.
44027013	Yoto kucec kuwus yomet nye kisic nye cone tö, kusot piko kule konyol kacenyoru kito nye kocemöce. Kunum cek kito nyo ciyoŋnte rapet oŋnkupa kurup kulekityi koretap Kurete tapan tapan.
44027014	Ntene yoto pakenke nye mnoloyit, kuwus yomet nyewo nye cekure, “Yometap kwenutap makentany oko koŋasis’’ nye kicone koret.
44027015	Kuket kuyoŋnto rapet okoy kucis ye mocipe cetokyikey yomet, yoto kyaste kusutec.
44027016	Cipe okoy wocekerektekey tapantap koret om komostap tö nyepo koret kisic nye kikwen peko nye cekure Kawuta. Cesyem om wuyinto nyewo koromun okoy ciyoŋnte rapet nye miniŋ.
44027017	Nteyu kowo kuloŋune cek rapet nye miniŋ, kunäm porok co cikolye oŋnkurate komut rapet nyewo; omnye kikimuyo kule muce cek kupa kot wokuryac ŋaynet om tapantap koretap Lipiya. Yoto kurek cek siret nyo sute rapet oŋnkwasta kusut yomet rapet.
44027018	Kutosyikey kuwus yomet nyewo koromun, nto om pesyetap oyeny, kucec cek kunum terekok ce kimite rapet oŋnkuwirci peko.
44027019	Nto om pesyet nye kirupe, kunum cek tukuk ce kiciyisye om rapet om yewuniyekwa oŋnkuwirci peko.
44027020	Ciwany pesyosyek ce caŋ nye kipuryo kot ceköse asista nto mpo kokelik. Kutosyikey kuwus yomet nyewo koromun okoy cisot kule komocesoptosi.
44027021	Nteyu kowo kopur piko kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ nye puryo kot kwome omit, yoto kuyoŋe Paulo yepo taymwa oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Merekyo, kiroke olimwo ani akwek nto kipuryo kot cenomen cekwane koretap Kurete, nto puryo kot cenyoru miyotyo oko potyet nyeyunyi.
44027022	Kunyo osomok akwek kule, otitir! Akwil mukuleywekwok omnye komo kume ci mpo akenke om akwek, rapet pate nye mosukwaran.
44027023	Omnye kucontyo ani laŋat komoy Malayketap Yiyintemwani nyo osoye oŋnkuco kuyoŋe ye amite,
44027024	oŋnkumwowo kule, ‘Paulo, mente omuy! Mesewo okoy weyoŋe taytap Kinko Nyewo. Kunyo käs pa kakoniŋ nyi Yiyintet om toponiyenyi soponwekap piko tokol cu opontekey om rapet.’
44027025	Kunyo, merekyo otitir! Omnye Oyeni okenekey ani Yiyintet, kunyo mosukwiy ŋalek cepo manta kuyu wule kucemwoytowo.
44027026	Ntene mosukusutec yomet okoy cepunte koret ake nye kikwen peko.’’
44027027	Nteye kipesyetap kwomowutap taman oko amwan kumite kusutec yomet kutokyec wulin oko wuli om ruretyetap Metiterenian. Ntowo kupunto komoy kwen om pesyonoto kusow kunket piko co sute rapet kule yunye kacerikte cepunte koret.
44027028	Yoto kurate rwantet porowet oŋnkukoyito kuwo peko orit kuyoyec, ntowo ciyoyec cekäs kule mite peko koyinto nyepo kokwoyutek artam kuwo ŋony. Cipe kuminiŋ, ciyoyec, nteye pere cekäs cekäs kule mite peko koyinto nyepo kokwoyutek sosom kuwo ŋony.
44027029	Yoto kumuyo piko ce sute rapet kule muce kuwo rapenyacek kot wokuryac rwontokap ruretyet tapan. Kukoyito cek karik amwan co ciyoŋnte rapet let, oŋnkusom kule kuyec koret pate.
44027030	Kusyem piko co sute rapet kule cemwey cewuŋatekey, kunäm cek rapet nye miniŋ aŋnkukoyito kuwo peko orit kwiyiytakey nye yunye möce kule wocetosyi cikoci rapet tay karik co ciyoŋnte.
44027031	Kumwoci Paulo nyewo nyepo sikarek kule, “Ye puryo kot kopur orit piko co sute rapet, kupuryo kot omuci akwek kot osopce mpo akanke.’’
44027032	Yoto kumüt sikarek porok ce nöme rapet ye miniŋ oŋnkwasta kuwo peko orit.
44027033	Ntowo kurik kuyec koret, kusom Paulo piko tokol kwomis omik kumwoci kule, “Pesyoni kuye pesyetap taman ok amwan omite akwek okoŋisyi osoti pate nye moyome kiy mpo kisic.
44027034	Kunyo osomok akwek kule oyomisye, omnye möce soponwekwok omik ye sosopce. Omnye komokupote putyontetap metitap ci ake tokol om akwek.’’
44027035	Nteyu kowo kuwany neto kumwoy ŋalecato kunam mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet om taytap piko tokol, oŋnkupetec kwam.
44027036	Yoto kutitir ci tokol, oŋnkwomis omik.
44027037	Kicemite acek piko tokol rapet orit ce kicepuntoy pokolwokik oyeny ok tomonwokik tisap ok lö.
44027038	Nteyu kowo kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋ kunäm cekto nkanuk ce kimite rapet orit oŋnkuwirci ruretyet sukuŋet kukuskusit rapet.
44027039	Ntowo kuyec koret, kipuryo kot konket piko co sute rapet kule koret oŋnkono tapantap koronoto. Ntene kukäs cekto loytap ruretyet ye kimite ŋaynet, kusot kule ye kemukakay komuce kusut rapet okoy kupunto yoto.
44027040	Yoto kumüt porok co kacerate karik co yoŋntoy rapet oŋnkupokokyi karik peko orit, oŋnkutyac porok co rote nkwatyet nyo cesute rapet oŋnkuyoŋnto siret nyepo rapet tay kutokyikey yomet sukuŋet kusut yomet rapet kuwo ruretyet tapan.
44027041	Ntene kuwo rapet okoy kuryac tulwetap ŋaynet nye mite peko orit, kunam rapet wule po tay ŋaynet nye puryo kot kutwoyekey oŋnkumite kolucluce kupetece yomet rapet wulo po let om swama.
44027042	Yoto kurwoc sikarek kule roke cepakäc mopusinek tokol sukuŋet mente kot kupir peko mpo akenke kway okoy kupunto koret oŋnkumwey kupecikey.
44027043	Ntene kimöce nyewo nyepo sikarek kule osoru kusop Paulo, yoto kuyete neto sikarek mokwiy kito nye kimöce kule ceyiy. Kumwoci nyewo nyepo sikarek piko tokol ce kimuce kupir peko; kunyosyo kurane rapet oŋnkupir peko kupa okoy ruretyet tapan.
44027044	Nto piko co koŋet, kupa co kupir peko kunämat pawunekap rapet co kokwilyo. Kuyuyit nyoto wule kicepete acek okoy cepunte koret tapan oŋnkyesopce piko tokol.
44028001	Nteyu kowo cesopce cepunte piko tokol koret tapan, yoto cinket kule cekure koronoto kikwen peko Malta.
44028002	Kuŋerekyec acek pikap koronoto kwek coronut. Kulowec mata oŋnkukonec ceyuy omnye kikicec kuropen ropta oŋnkukayitit.
44028003	Koruruc Paulo siririk oŋnkukoci mata, yoto kucone erenet nye kowon mata oŋnkumwolmwolcikey yewunyi.
44028004	Nteye kotoköse pikap koronoto erenet nye kesikinine yewutap Paulo, kuŋalal nkit kumwoy kule, “Porukey kule porin cici, ntene komo kusope nyun yawut, nka kot kokosope neto ruretyet.’’
44028005	Ntene kulelec Paulo erenet kulelekyi mata nye puryo kot kwiye neto kiy mpo kisic.
44028006	Kukany picoto kule kukwa yewutap Paulo nto kule kumilcikey ŋony kume. Nteyu kowo kukany cek kuloyit nye puryo kot kukäs kiy nye keyakay om wule mite Paulo; kuwec kasoteywekwa kumwoy kule, “Yiyintet cici!’’
44028007	Kimite ye kulekite yoto mparenikap cito nyewo nyepo koronoto kikwen peko, nye kicekure kaynenyi Pupliyo. Kuŋerekyec acek cicoto kukwerec cipe kanyi wociku toyekyi oŋnkupayec topon kuwany pesyosyek somok.
44028008	Kimite yoto kwanitap Pupliyo kukoru kwiriri nye kimnyone yeset oŋnkuyitoy korotik. Yoto kuwo Paulo koto nye kirwe oŋnkusomnci kukemer yewuniyekyi kusop yoto.
44028009	Nteyu kowo kwiyakay ŋolyontonoto, yoto kukwa pikap koronoto tokol ce kimnyontos kwocisop tokol kusopco.
44028010	Kukonec acek pikap koronoto kokotutek ce caŋ, nteye kicenomeni kukoci cek rapet tukuk tokol ce kicemöce acek om poninekyo.
44028011	Nto om letut yu kowo cipur acek ciwany orok somok, celany rapet nye kicone Alekisantaria nye cekure, “Yiyik ce sorom.’’ Nye kikiyoŋe koronoto kikwen peko kuwany pesyosyekap koyitityet.
44028012	Cipe okoy cepunte moŋetap Sirakusa wule kicipur ciwany pesyosyek somok.
44028013	Cenomene wuloto om rapet cipe cimutu okoy cepunte moŋetap Rekio. Ntowo kutil pesyet akenke, yoto kuwus yomet nyewo nye cone tö, cipe ciwany pesyosyek oyeny cepunte moŋetap Poteyoli nye mite ruretyet tapan.
44028014	Cenyorte wuloto mpo yeya alak ce kikoyen ce kisomec acek kule cipur oko cekto kuwany pesyosyek tisap. Yoto cipe okoy cepunte Rom.
44028015	Kulim mpo yeya piko co kikoyen ce kimite Rom kule kacekwa acek, yoto kukwa kutorokwec okoy kwokunyorcec moŋetap Apiyo oko Korikap toyek somok. Nteye kotoköse Paulo cekto, kukasta Yiyintet oŋnkutosyikey kutitir kunyor swamet.
44028016	Nteyu kowo cepunte Rom, cecömnci Paulo kopur nkit oko sikorintet akenke nye kiripe neto.
44028017	Ntowo ciwany pesyosyek somok, kukur Paulo kukwa kuyomokey kantoyikap Yutayek cepo wuloto, nteyu kowo koruruckey cekto, kuŋalal Paulo kumwoci kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya! Nka kot kipuryo kot ayiy ani lelis nye miyat om wule mite pikyacek, nto awurte kapurto nyo kikonec acek mpo kukonyo. Kicenäma ani cerata oyiku mopusyo om Yerusalem oŋnkyikoyito awo wule mite Romek.
44028018	Kukiro co okoy kumac kule cityakta omnye kipuryo kot kunyor cek kule kyayiy ani lelis nye miyat nye roke cepakäcena.
44028019	Yoto ntowo kutoyis Yutayek, kusutyo ani acururan ataste musankut kuco wule mite Kinko Nyewo nye puryo kot ku kule oponte ani musanku nye amöce kule owosontyi pikwani.
44028020	Kunyo saŋet osomok kule akäsak oŋnkyeŋalal oko akwek, omnye oyiku ani ratat porowoni oponte omnye ocome kokenotetap pikap Israel.’’
44028021	Kumwoci cekto Paulo kule, “Tompo kot cenyoru acek parwet nye cone Yuteya nyepo ŋalek ce nömiŋ nyi, tompo mpo kot kuco okoy kupun wuli cemite acek yeya mpo akenke nye kucokumwoy nto kuŋalale ŋalek ce miyotec ce nömiŋ nyi.
44028022	Ntene cemöce acek kule celim kasoteywekukyi om ŋalek ce nöme Lukonitenyi. Omnye kucinket acek kule ŋolole piko kwapi Lukonitenyi mite nyi om wulyo tokol.’’
44028023	Yoto kukwey cek oko Paulo pesyet nye mokutuyo yec. Ntowo kupunto pesyonoto, kukwa Yutayek ce caŋ koyoto kipurune Paulo. Kucec Paulo kuŋololyi cek kuceke korron okoy kutuyit koret. Kuŋalal kutetyi cek lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kusyem kule anet cek kuyen Yesu, oŋnkuporci wule yunto ŋalek om ntarastinekap Moses oko silutekap workoyik.
44028024	Kuyen alake ŋalekap Paulo ntene kutoyis alake.
44028025	Yoto kunomen kupa kukotoytocin kwicek nkit, om letut yu kowo kumwoci Paulo cekto ŋolyontoni akenke kule, “Kiŋalal Muyet Nyetilil topon kumwoci mpo kukonyo kupunune wule mite workoyontet Isaya!
44028026	Omnye kimwoy kule, ‘Iwo wule mite picu wemwoci kule: mosolimnte oŋnkolimnte, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot olime, mosakäste, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot oŋnketi;
44028027	omnye koliliyotin kasoteywekap picu; kiker yitikwa, kunyo kikomis konyekwa. Nto kukostoy konyekwa, nto kulimntoy yitikwa, nto kwemuce kunket kasoteywekwa, nto kwemuce kuweckey kukwa wule amite ani, kimwoy Yiyintet kuyunyoto, Saŋet ani asop cekto kusopco.’ ’’
44028028	Kutosyikey Paulo kumwoy kule, “Kunyo möce oŋnket akwek kule kucesutyi lamek lokoywek cepo kosopetap Yiyintet. Mosukulim cekto!’’
44028029	[Nto om letut yu kowo kuwany Paulo kumwoy ŋalecato, kunomen Yutayek kupa kutintenoti koromun cekto kwicek nkit.]
44028030	Kopur Paulo kumiŋis wuloto kuwany kenyisyek oyeny, kuminye koto nye kikwole kukoyitoy pesanik, oŋnkutoroce piko tokol ce kikwoni kwokuköse neto.
44028031	Yoto kumwoytoy ŋalek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkunetis kumwoy ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Kiŋolole om nyikanat kutok nye puryo ci nye kikerektoy neto.
45001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo mutworintetap Yesu Kristo, nye Kiyokontet nye kikwey oŋnkukur Yiyintet sukuŋet kumwaytat lokoywekyi ce toponec.
45001002	Lokoywek ce toponec coto kuce kikurto Yiyintet keny kupunune wule mite workoyikyi oŋnkyesil om silutekap Yiyintet ce tililec.
45001003	Ŋalecato kuce nöme Werinyi Yesu Kristo nye kiceyi kuyu cito kucone keseniyantetap Tauti.
45001004	Ntene kicipor om swamet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil kule neto kunye Weritap Yiyintet; omnye kitutune met. Nyoto ku Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
45001005	Kikono ani Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Yesu om kupeyok ce kicekono oyiku kiyokintet kupo Kristo saŋet antoci piko cepo yemosyek tokol kuyen oŋnkuyweyis.
45001006	Picoto ku mpo akwek piko co mite Rom co kicekurok opoyitu Kristo.
45001007	Kunyo akwek piko tokol ce mite Rom, ce cöme Yiyintet oŋnkukur cekto kwek pikyi ce tililec, akante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
45001008	Anyosyi ani akaste Yiyintenyu kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo om wule omite akwek tokol, omnye mite kulime piko cepo koret tokol koyenet nye oponte akwek om wule mite neto.
45001009	Nkete Yiyintet kule osomwok ani okokoy ye omwoytoti lokoywekyi ce toponec cepo Werinyi.
45001010	Osome Yiyintet om cömisyenyi kule roke komukakay yawut saŋet orutocok ani.
45001011	Omnye amöce koromun kule akäsak akwek sukuŋet akwilak onyoru swamet.
45001012	Ntene kupëlis mosicikalyekey acek tokol yoto, kukalyak akwek koyenet nyimwani aŋnkukalya ani koyenet nyimwakwek.
45001013	Mpo yeya, amöce ani kule oŋnket kule kwasyem aret ce caŋ kule aco wule omite, ntene kukerekta kito ake ye mayiy kuyunyoto. Amöce kule cakäs yisyonutek ce tililec om wule omite akwek kuyu wulo yunto om wule mite lamek.
45001014	Omnye oponte ani oyici yisyet Kirikik oko mpo piko ce lamek, piko ce ŋomec oko ce perper.
45001015	Kunyo amöce koromun kule omwowok akwek piko co mite Rom lokoywek ce toponec.
45001016	Omnye akenekey ani owoŋnkyi lokoywek ce toponec, swametap Yiyintet kunye sope piko tokol ce kikoyen, nyosye kunyo Yutayek oko lamek.
45001017	Omnye poru lokoywek ce toponec wule muce kusatitakey kunyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet. Punte coto koyenet pate kuceke tayta okoy letut. Kuyu wule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosukusop cito nyetilil om koyenet nye ponto.’’
45001018	Ciporu nyerunotet nyepo Yiyintet kucone torot kucontyini piko ce miyotec oko ce ponto mwiynanet, picoto kuce kerektoy ŋalek cepo manta.
45001019	Toku topon wule yunto Yiyintet, omnye Yiyintet nkit nye poru tukucoto.
45001020	Kuceke ye kitany Yiyintet koret, kicipor kutok topon tukukyi ce motoku, coto ku swamet nyenyi oko kamukeywekyi, kunyo porukey neto om tukuk ce kicitany, puryo kot komuce cekto kot kutuckey mpo kisic.
45001021	Kikonket cekto Yiyintet, ntene kipuryo kot kuyweye cekto neto kuyu wule cemokyini nto mpo kokasta. Ntene kimo kuponto kasoteywek cikwa ŋomnon mpo kisic, pesetote menonet pate.
45001022	Sutekey cekto kule ciku ŋomec ntene solontoy pate.
45001023	Ye kotosoye Yiyintet nye mopoku, kuweckey yec kusay tukuk ce poku kuyu ci nye poku, nto kukerkeyitu toritek nto tyoŋik nto erenoy.
45001024	Kunyo kikwasta Yiyintet kwiy cekto tukuk ce somis ce corokyini mukuleywek cikwa, yiye cek kwicek nkit ŋalek cepo kalilan.
45001025	Wece ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta kwek mwiynanet oŋnkusay tyoŋin ce kicitonye ye kotosoye Yiyintet nye cikostoy okokoy okoy okokoy. Yunyoto.
45001026	Omnye yiye piko tukuk ce yucu! Kwasta Yiyintet cekto wokwiy ŋalek cepo kalilan. Kutay koruk moyiyisye topon porwonik cikwa om aret nye topon, ntene kwicininkey cek kwicek nkit sakwayanat.
45001027	Kunyo mpo moronik kwasta co ye mokopurcin oko korukwa oŋnkwicin cek kwicek nkit sakwayanatet, mokunyor cekto toŋoŋutek ce yeme om ŋalek ce miyotec ceyucoto.
45001028	Omnye toye piko morip ŋomnonet nyepo manta nye nöme Yiyintet. Kunyo kucämnta kule kurup konetik ce kipok kasoteywek Kunyo yiye ŋalek ce meroke kot kwiy.
45001029	Ponto miyotyet wok tokol, kuyu ŋokis, moroŋyantit. Ponto cekto corokyinotet, porisyet, koperperisyet, oko kowotyontit, oŋnkuŋorsyi cekto,
45001030	oŋnkuŋololekey kwapi, senkere cekto Yiyintet. Sokoran ce silekey, tosyinikey pate kusote wule mokwiyta ŋalek ce miyotec. Puryo kot kulimncini cekto piko cepo kamwa, puryo kot kuponto ŋomnon. Puryo kot kuripe kirotyet nyimwa, oŋnkupuryo kot kuporcini piko alak tolosyet nto mpo kurire kukalya.
45001031	Nkete cekto kule mwowu ntarastit nyepo Yiyintet kule, roke kupok piko ce pure kopurto nye yunyoto. Puryo kot kutosyinikey cekto kwiye ŋalecutecu pate, ntene cömntoy cekto kukasta piko alak ce yiye ŋalecato.
45002001	Kunyo Corwenyu, mutyini nyi piko alak musankut? Puryo kot oponte ŋolyo nye wosoni nka kot nyi ku ŋo? Omnye ye kewosontyi nyi piko alak kulot musankut, ntene oŋnkiyiye nyi ŋalecato, kuporkey kule wosontyinikey nyi nkit.
45002002	Cinket acek kule Yiyintet kunye po manta ye komutyi musankut piko ce yiye ŋalak ceyucoto.
45002003	Ntene nyi corwemwani nyo mutyini musankut piko alak ce yiye ŋalecutecu oŋnkurok yec yiye nyi nkit. Soti kule mesecilile musankut nyepo Yiyintet?
45002004	Nto tos nyile nyi tolosyenyi nyewo oko kwilatenyi oko muytocinotet nyenyi. Puryo nket nyi kule toponiyetap Yiyintet kunye ntowuŋ nyi serenynkey?
45002005	Kunyo om mukuleyto nyeŋuŋ nye wuy nye miyat, kuye mite tosyini toŋoŋutek cekuk om pesyet nye moceŋany cipor nyerunotetap Yiyintet ye mute musankut nyepo ŋalek cepo manta.
45002006	Omnye mosukupucici Yiyintet ci tokol kuyu wule yunto yisyenyi, nye kikwiy.
45002007	Tosyinikey piko alake kwiye yisyet nye topon, oŋnkuceny woyinto oko koyweyisyet oko soponto nye mopoku, mosukukoci Yiyintet picoto soponto nye mopoku.
45002008	Nto piko alak co soy oŋnkutay ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkurup ŋalek ce miyotec, mosukuporci Yiyintet picoto nerekwekyi.
45002009	Mosukutaŋany oŋnkunyor mwoninto piko tokol ce yiye ŋalek ce miyotec, nyosye Yutayek oko mpo Kirikik.
45002010	Ntene mosukukoci Yiyintet woyinto oko koyweyisyet oko kalyet piko tokol co yiye ŋalek ce toponec, kunyosye Yutayek oko mpo Kirikik.
45002011	Omnye sute Yiyintet kuyoyec piko tokol.
45002012	Omnye piko tokol co puryo kot kupunto ntarastinek oŋnkwiy miyotyet, kuce potos kuyu piko ce puryo kot kupunto ntarastinek. Nto piko tokol, ce yiye miyotyet oŋnkurok kupunto ntarastienk kuce mosicemutyi musankut kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek.
45002013	Puryo kot ku piko ce lime ntarastinek kuce toponec om taytap Yiyintet, ntene piko co yiye kuyu wule mwoytoy ntarastinek kuce mocecämnta kule tililec om wule mite Yiyintet.
45002014	Ye karup Lamek kuywey ntarastinek, kuporkey kule ponto cekto ntarastinek nka kot kupuryo kot kuponto ntarastinek.
45002015	Poru cekto om kopurto nyimwa kule silotin mukuleywekwa orit ŋalek ce nöme ntarastinek. Poru yec mpo kasoteywekwa kule po manta ŋalecutecu omnye wosontyini kasoteywekwa ce sote oŋnkuyet kukalya cekto, om
45002016	pesyet nyo mute Yiyintet musankut nyepo yisyonutek cepo ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo piko tokol. Kuyu wule yunto lokoywek ce toponec ce omwoytoy ani kupunte Yesu Kristo.
45002017	Ntene nyi nyo kurekey kule Yutoyin, oŋnkikenekey ntarastinek, oŋnkisilekey Yiyintet.
45002018	Nketi tukuk tokol ce möce Yiyintet kule yiy nyi, kunyo kinetkey om wule mite ntarastinek kule kwey kiy nye topon.
45002019	Nketi nyi kupoyit manta kule yiku nyi kantoyintet nyepo piko co korotin, oŋnkiyiku lakweyet nyepo piko ce mite menonet.
45002020	Yiku nyi konetintet nyepo piko ce perper oko lekoy ce minkec. Nketi nyi kupoyit manta kule om ntarastinek ku wule mite ŋomnonet.
45002021	Nyi nyo neti piko alak, omne menetkey nyito nkit? Mwoytoy nyi kule, “Monte cecorsye!’’ Oŋnkurok yec corsyi nyi!
45002022	Mwowu mpo kule, “Monte cesakwayan.’’ Oŋnkurok yec yiye nyi sakwayanatet? Senkeri nyi koromun kerkeyik ce kerkey Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec core nyi tukuk ce mite korik orit.
45002023	Silekey kule ponte ntarastinek, oŋnkurok yec yirye ntarastinek sutu kalilan om wule mite Yiyintet.
45002024	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Yutayek kuce kwesokyi sukuŋet kuŋalale Lamek kwapi kaynetap Yiyintet.’’
45002025	Ponto wonset nyimwakwek latik ye korip ntarastinek. Ntene ye koyiri ntarastinek kuporkey wonset nyimwoŋ kuyunye puryo kot cewonak.
45002026	Kunyo nteye korip lomin nyo mowonat ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek, kupuryo kot kusute Yiyintet cicoto kuyunye kicewon?
45002027	Kunyo Lamek co mowonotin kuce mosukumutwok musankut akwek Yutayek ce oponte ntarastinek oŋnkoyiku wonotin oŋnkurok yec oyirye ntarastinek.
45002028	Ntene ŋo nye Yutoyin nyepo manta nye kicewon kupoyit manta? Puryo kot ku Yutoyin kunye po wonset nyenyi porto nyepo saŋ pate
45002029	Ntene Yutoyintet nyepo manta kunye Yutoyin nyepo porto orit, nye kicewon mukuleyto nyenyi orit, nye yiye yisyet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil, ntene puryo kot ku nyepo ŋalek pate. Nyoru cicoto kakastayet kucone wule mite Yiyintet, puryo ku kule kucone wule mite piko.
45003001	Kunyo toponiyo ne nye pëlisyi nye ponto Yutoyin? Nto latik ne ce ponto wonset?
45003002	Caŋ koromun om aret ake tokol! Nyepo tayta kunyi kule, kicikoci Yutayek kurip lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet.
45003003	Kunyo mokwiy kulene ye puryo kot kuponto Yutayek alake koyenet? Kuporkey so om ŋolyontoni kule puryo kot cikenekey Yiyintet?
45003004	Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic! Yiyintet kunye po manta nka kot komuce kwek ci ake tokol mwiyn, kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Misyini cinket kule poye manta ye keŋalal, misyini lotisyi musankuŋuŋ ye kocewosontyiŋ.’’
45003005	Ntene nteye kaciy acek miyotyet, yoto kuye kupor kule po manta Yiyintet? Mocemwowu kulene? Mocemwowu so kule, puryo kot kupo manta Yiyintet ye kucetaŋany acek? Kaŋalal kuyu ci.
45003006	Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet manta, komuce neto kulene kot kwek ketintet nye mutyini koret musankut?
45003007	Ntene nteye mwiynanemwani kunye poru topon woyintap Yiyintet, omne sicewosontyo ani om miyotyet?
45003008	Cimuci pa cemwowu kule, kyiy miyotyet sukuŋet kuco toponiyet? Mwowu piko co ŋomsi kule ce mwowu acek kuyunyoto. Kicemutyi cekto musankut nyepo manta.
45003009	Kunyo Ceponte acek pa Yutayek soponto nye topon kupël Lamek? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic! Kwoporu ani keny kutok topon kule mite Yutayek oko Lamek tokol ŋonyutap miyotyet.
45003010	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Puryo ci mpo akenke nye tilil,
45003011	Puryo mpo akenke nye ŋom, puryo mpo nye cenye wule mite Yiyintet,
45003012	Kiweckey piko tokol kwasta Yiyintet kimosokis piko tokol puryo mpo akenke nye yiye ŋolyo nye topon, puryo mpo akenke.
45003013	Kerkey kutuwak cikwa mwenon ce kicetupci pic ce yototin, oŋnkukwone kutuwak cikwa ŋalek ce miyotec ce kerkey oko mwonet nyepo erenoy.
45003014	Kunyiy kutuwak cikwa cupisyonok ce mwonec
45003015	Sorcini lakwar ye mokutumto korotik.
45003016	Turpupoti kwaranta aret wule punte oŋnkupakakta toŋoŋutek.
45003017	Puryo kot konkete aret nyepo kalyet,
45003018	Oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto koyweyisyet nye yweye Yiyintet.’’
45003019	Kunyo cinket kule ŋalek tokol ce mite orit kuce nöme piko tokol ce poytoy ntarastinek, sukuŋet mpo yec kuker kutuwak cepo piko alak, sukumutyi Yiyintet musankut koret tokol.
45003020	Omnye puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce cesat kunyol om taytap Yiyintet ye korip ntarastinek. Kito nye yiye ntarastinek kunye porcini cito kule kwiy miyotyet.
45003021	Ntene kuciŋoŋ yawut aret nye sate piko kunyolom wule mite Yiyintet, nyoto kunye puryo kot konömekey oko ntarastinek.
45003022	Sate Yiyintet piko kunyol kupunto koyenemwa om Yesu Kristo. Yiye Yiyintet kuyunyoto om wule mite piko tokol ce cöme Kristo omnye puryo pciyatet mpo kisic.
45003023	Kikowurta piko tokol, kunyo mitowune cekto wule low om wule mite kosopotet nyepo Yiyintet.
45003024	Nto ye cesöte cekto kunyol om kokotutyetap Yiyintet nye pöc om poypoyet kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo nye kikokalyec acek.
45003025	Kikon Yiyintet Yesu Kristo sukuŋet kwek met nyenyi aret nye cikolye piko miyotyonik. Kupunte koyenet nye ponto cekto om wule neto. Kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyoto sukuŋet kupor yisyenyi nyepo manta. Kimuytoci neto nye kipuryo kot kumany miyotyonikap piko om pesyosyek co kitil.
45003026	Kunyo poru yawut om pesyosyecu kule po manta neto oŋnkusöte kunyol cito om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
45003027	Kunyo muce cesilekey ne? Puryo kiy! Omne? Omnye möce pa kule ciywey ntarastinek? Puryo! Ntene omnye ciyeni ce cömisye pate.
45003028	Omnye cinket ciwoŋnkyi kule satoktos kunyol cito om wule mite Yiyintet om koyenet pate, ntene puryo kot omnye kikwiy ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek.
45003029	Nto osoti akwek kule Yiyintet kunye Yiyintet nyepo Yutayek nkit pate? Puryo kot ku Yiyintet neto ne nyepo mpo Lamek? Neto kunye Yiyintet nyepo mpo Lamek.
45003030	Omnye akenke Yiyintet Mosukusat neto Yutayek kunyol om wule mite neto kupunte koyenet nyimwa oŋnkusat kunyol mpo Lamek kupunto koyenet nyimwa.
45003031	Poru pa ŋolyontoni kule ye kiciyen kuroke cetay ntarastinek? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic! Ntene misyini cerip ntarastinek.
45004001	Kunyo mocemwowu ŋolyo ne nye nöme kukonyo Apram. Kinyor kiy ne?
45004002	Nto yunye kicesat Apram kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om tukuk ce kikwiy, nto ponto neto kito nye silekey, ntene puryo komuce kusilekey taytap Yiyintet.
45004003	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kucäm Apram Yiyintet, nto omnye kiyen, yoto kuye kusut Yiyintet neto yu ci nyetilil.’’
45004004	Cikocini cito nye yiyisyi musyaret, ntene puryo kot ciyite musyaret nyoto kwek kokotutek, ciyite kuyu kiy nye konyor kupo yisyet nye kokwiy.
45004005	Nto cito nyo puryo kot kwiy yisyet, ntene kukenekey Yiyintet nyo kolyoy piko co menket neto, ciyite kule tilil neto nyoto.
45004006	Ŋalecutecu kuco kiporu Tauti ye kiŋolole ŋerekwek cepo cito nye cöme Yiyintet. Ye puryo kupunto yisyonutek ceci latik, kimwoy kule:
45004007	Ponto kupeyoy piko co kicikalya miyotyonik cikwa, piko co kicinum miyotyonik cikwa
45004008	Ku ŋerekat cito nyo puryo kot koyityini Mokoryontet kule ponto miyotyet.
45004009	Po ra pa ŋerekwecutecu kiŋolole Tauti pate piko co kicewon? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Po ŋerekwek coto mpo piko co mowonotin. Omnye kocinum ŋalek kukwane silutekap Yiyintet kule. “Kicäm Apram Yiyintet; kunyo omnye kiyen, yoto kucäm Yiyintet neto kwek ci nyetilil.’’
45004010	Kunyo kikwiyokis ŋalecu oyu? Kutompo kot cewon Apram nto om letut yu kacewon? Kikwiyokis kunyo kutompo kot cewon, ntene puryo kot ku om letut yu kacewon.
45004011	Kicewon Apram om letut, kunyo wonsenyi kunye pelutyet nye poru kule kicäm Yiyintet Apram kwek ci nyetilil omnye kiyen kutompo kot cewon; sukuŋet kwek neto kukonyitap piko tokol ce yene Yiyintet oŋnkucäm neto cekto kule po manta nka kot kupuryo kot kuwonotin.
45004012	Apram kunye kukonyitap piko co wonotin, ntene nye puryo kot ku kule omnye wonotin, ntene omnye purtoy cekto soponto nyepo koyenet nye kerkey nyo kiponto Apram kutompo kot cewon.
45004013	Kikurtoci Yiyintet Apram oko kesenisyekyi kule mosukwek nyimwa koret. Kipuryo kot cekurtoci omnye kirip Apram ntarastinek, ntene omnye kiyen sukuŋet kucäm Yiyintet kule ci nyetilil neto.
45004014	Omnye ye piko co ripe ntarastinek kuce mosikonti tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet, kuporkey kule puryo kot kupunto latik ye kiciyen, oŋnkupuryo kot koponto latik kurtoyetap Yiyintet.
45004015	Omnye ntarastinek kuce sutu kunyer Yiyintet, ntene ye puryo kot kimite; kupuryo mpo kot kimite kawurtayet nyepo ntarastinek.
45004016	Kunyo co kikurto Yiyintet kuce yoŋe koyenet, sukuŋet kuporkey kutok kupoyit manta kule kikwone poypoyetap Yiyintet, nyepo pöc om wule mite kesenisyekap Apram, nye puryo kot kupo pate piko co ripe ntarastinek, ntene mpo piko co kikoyen kuyu wule kikwiyta Apram. Omnye Apram kunye kukonyacek tokol.
45004017	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kayiyiŋ ani nyi yiku kukonyitap yemosyek ce caŋ.’’ Kunyo topon kirotyet om taytap Yiyintet, omnye kiyen Apram. Yiyintet kunye ŋete kotutune met piko, oŋnku nye muce kwiy kutok kiy nye kipuryo kutoku.
45004018	Kiyen Apram oŋnkukenis yoto kuye kipuryo kot kurok kukenis, kunyo kikwek neto kukonyitap yemosyek ce caŋ. Kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mokucaŋit kesenisyekuk.’’
45004019	Nka kot kiponto neto yoto kenyisyek ce kirice pokol, kipuryo kot kucas om koyenenyi ye kesot porto nyenyi nye kikerkeyit nye kime. Nto mpo ye kesot sononetap Sara.
45004020	Kipuryo kot kwasta neto koyenenyi. Kikenekey neto koromun kurtoyetap Yiyintet. Kikoci koyenet nyenyi swamet, yoto kukasta neto Yiyintet.
45004021	Omnye kinkete neto kupoyit manta kule mosukoyitita Yiyintet tukuk ce kikurto.
45004022	Kuyunyoto om koyenenyi kuyit Yiyintet neto kwek ci nye kinyol.
45004023	Ŋalecu “Kwek ci nye kinyol.’’ Kuce kipuryo kot cesilyi neto nkit,
45004024	kicesilwec mpo acek co cecöme kule ciku pic ce kinyol, acek coto kuce ciyeni neto nyo kiŋet Yesu Mokoryontenyo kotutune met.
45004025	Kicikoyto Yesu kumeci miyotyonik cicacek oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met sukuŋet kusatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet.
45005001	Kunyo ye kicesatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte koyenet, kunyo ceponte kalyet oko neto kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
45005002	Kisutwec acek neto koyenet cenyoru kupeyokap Yiyintet ce cemite ciportoy yawut. Kunyo ceŋereci om kokenotet nye ceponte om woyintap Yiyintet!
45005003	Ceŋereci mpo om toŋoŋutekyo omnye cinket kule sutu toŋoŋutek muytocinotet,
45005004	oŋnkusutu muytocinotet cämntayet nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkutec cämntayet nyitenyi kokenotet.
45005005	Puryo kot kulotwec acek kokenotet omnye kikoci Yiyintet koyenet kowut mukuleywekyacek orit kwiyisye Muyet Nyetilil, nyoto kunye kokotutyetap Yiyintet nye kikonec.
45005006	Omnye ye kimo ceponte acek swamet, yoto kumeci Kristo piko ce miyotec om pesyosyek ce kikwey Yiyintet.
45005007	Kiy nye wuy ye mokumeci citake cito nyetilil. Mukoktos om aret ake kusyem cito ake kot kumeci cito nyetilil!
45005008	Ntene kiporwec Yiyintet wule cömntec acek; omnye ye kito ceponte acek miyotyonik, yoto kuye kumecec Kristo!
45005009	Kunyo ye kicesatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet om metap Kristo, porukey kupoyit manta kule mosicesorwec acek om wule mite nerekwekap Yiyintet kupunte neto.
45005010	Kiciku acek ikye punik cepo Yiyintet, ntene kiwecec yawut ciku coronutekyi kupunte metap Werinyi. Kunyo omnye ciku yawut coronutekap Yiyintet, aret cetya nyun ce cimuci cisopec om soponto nyepo Kristo!
45005011	Ntene nka kot ku coto tokol, ceŋereci acek om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo nye kiwecec ciku coronutekap Yiyintet.
45005012	Kunyo, kuyu wulo kico miyotyet koret kupunune cito akenke, oŋnkusut kunäm met piko tokol, omnye kikowurta piko tokol.
45005013	Kupoyit manta kimite miyotyet koret kutompo kot cekon ntarastinek, ye puryo ntarastinek kupuryo kot ciyite miyotyet.
45005014	Kunyo kipayta miyotyet piko kuceke Atam okoy kupun Moses, kipayta oko mpo piko co kipuryo kot kowurta kuyu Atam, nye kikwiri ntarastinekap Yiyintet. Atam kunye kikerkey oko neto nyo kicikene kuco.
45005015	Ntene puryo kot kukerkey cutecu tukway, omnye puryo kot kukerkey kokotutyetap Yiyintet nyepo pöc pate oko miyotyetap Atam. Manta kule kipok piko ce caŋ kupo miyotyet nyoto po cito akenke. Ntene cemosi nyewo koromun poypoyetap Yiyintet. Kunyo mpo kokotutyenyi nye kocini piko ce caŋ kupunte poypoyetap cito nyoto akenke Yesu Kristo.
45005016	Kunyo pciyat kokotutyetap Yiyintet oko miyotyet nyepo cito akenke, nyoto kunye kisutyi kulot piko musankut nyepo lelisto. Ntene kikwiy piko miyotyonik ce caŋ, yoto kuco kokotutyet nye numune piko lelisto.
45005017	Po manta kule om miyotyet nyepo cito akenke yoto kupoytoyis miyotyet kupo cito nyoto akenke. Ntene nyewo koromun yisyet nye kikwiy cito akenke Yesu Kristo! Co mosukunyor poypoyetap Yiyintet nyewo koromun oko kokotutyet nyepo tililinto kuce mokupoytoyis kupëlis om soponto kupunte Kristo.
45005018	Kunyo kuyu wulo kisut miyotyet nyepo cito okenke musankut om wule piko tokol, kuyunyoto kusut yisyet nye topon nyepo cito akenke kalyet oko soponto om wule mite piko tokol.
45005019	Kuyunyoto kikwiri cito akenke ntarastinek kwiy miyotyet sukuŋet kowurta piko ce caŋ, kuyunyoto wule mosicesatita kunyol piko ce caŋ om wule Yiyintet kupunte cito akenke nye kimecec.
45005020	Ye kicece ntarastinek yoto kutosyikey kawurtayet, ntene ye kotosyikey miyotyet, kutosyikey mpo koromun poypoyetap Yiyintet.
45005021	Kunyo kuyu wulo poytoyisyi miyotyet kwiyisye met. Kunyo poytoyisyi mpo poypoyetap Yiyintet kwiyisye toponiyet nye ntowec acek om wule mite soponto nye mopoku kupunte Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
45006001	Kunyo mocemwowu kulene? Mocetosyikey pa cipurte miyotyet sukuŋet kutosyikey poypoyetap Yiyintet?
45006002	Puryo kot kunyunyo mpo kisic! Kicepoku acek nye kimokyiye miyotyet, kunyo cimuci kulene yec cipurte miyotyet?
45006003	Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule acek tokol co kicepatisanec ciyomec oko Kristo, kuce kicepatisanec ciyomec oko met nyenyi.
45006004	Kunyo om patisanet nyinyacek kuye yoto ye kicemuyec acek oko Kristo oŋnkyepoku kuyu neto, sukuŋet ciŋetec kuyu wulo kiciŋetitoy Yesu kotutune met om swametap woyinto nyepo Papa, kunyo mpo acek mosicesopce om soponto nyelel.
45006005	Omnye ye kicemuyec acek om met nyenyi, kuyunyoto mosiciyomec oko neto om kotutunet nyenyi.
45006006	Cinket kule kicepakäc soponto nyinyacek nyepo keny oko Yesu om murtowontet sukuŋet kyaranta swamet nyepo miyotyet, sukuŋet komo ciku acek yec mutworikap miyotyet.
45006007	Omnye ye kame cito kukacityac neto om wule mite swamet nyepo miyotyet.
45006008	Ntene ye kicepoku acek oko Kristo, ciyeni kule mosicesopce oko neto.
45006009	Omnye cinket kule kikotutune met Kristo, kunyo kimo kume yec mpo kisic, kimokupoytoy met neto.
45006010	Met nye kime kunye met nye kimeci miyotyet aret akenke nkit, nto soponto nye ponto yawut kunye soponto nyepo Yiyintet.
45006011	Kunyo möce asot akwek nkit om aret nye yunyoto kule kicepoku nye mokyiye miyotyet, ntene oŋnkyesoptosi om Yiyintet om koyomotet nye opontekey oko Kristo.
45006012	Puryo kot kuroke yec kot tokupayta miyotyet porwonikwok ce poku. Saŋet acäm corokyinotet nyepo porto.
45006013	Monte kot acämnte akwek kereryantet ake tokol nyepo porto kwiy miyotyet Ntene okoytekey opoyitu Yiyintet kuyu pic ce kiciŋet kotutune met oŋnkocämnte soponto nyimwoŋ tokol kopurune wule mite neto, sukuŋet kyiyisye kupo ŋalek cepo manta.
45006014	Puryo kot kumisyini kupaytak akwek miyotyet, omnye puryo kot kupoytok ntarastinek, ntene poytok poypoyetap Yiyintet.
45006015	Kunyo mokyiy kulene? Mokyiy so miyotyet omnye puryo kot kupoytec ntarastinek? Puryo kot kuyunyo!
45006016	Oŋnket akwek ŋolyontoni kupoyit manta kule ye kecämntekey yiku mutworin, nye yweyi citake kuye yiku yoto mutworin nyepo mokoryontonoto yweyi nyito, nka mpo ye yweyi miyotyet nyo sutu met, nto ye koyweyisyet nyo sutu soponto cenyol om wule mite Yiyintet.
45006017	Ntene cikasta Yiyintet nye kikwiy topon, omnye kyoyiku akwek mutworik cepo miyotyet, ntene kunyo kyacäm yawut om mukuleywekwok ŋalek cepo manta ce kyonyorte konetisyet nyo kicinetak.
45006018	Kicityakenak akwek miyotyet okoy oyiku mutworik cepo ŋalek cepo manta.
45006019	Oŋololi ani oyiyisye ŋalek cepo kwak omnye miniŋ ŋomnonet nyimwoŋ kuyu wolo kikyokoytekey akwek om pesyosyek alak oyiku mutworik cepo simnyontet oko leliswek, om yisyet nyepo miyotyet. Kunyo yawut möce ocämntekey kuyunyoto oyiku mutworikap toponiyet om yisyetap tililinto.
45006020	Ye kitoyiku akwek mutworikap miyotyet kuye kipuryo kot kupoytok yoto toponiyet.
45006021	Ntene kyonyoru akwek yoto ne om tukuk ce oliloni ye mayiy yawut, omnye sutu coto met.
45006022	Kicityaktak yawut akwane miyotyet; kunyo oyiku mutworikap Yiyintet. Kito nye monyoru ku citililok oŋnkonyoru soponto nye mopoku om pesyet nyepo letut.
45006023	Omnye musyaret nyepo miyotyet ku met. Ntene kokotutyetap Yiyintet nyepo pöc ku soponto nye mopoku om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
45007001	Mpo yeya, oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta ŋalek ce amöce ani kule omwowu, omnye oŋnketi tokol ntarastinek. Poytoy ntarastinek pate cito ye tokusope.
45007002	Kuyu korko nye mütat. Ripe nyo ntarastinek om wule mite santenyi ye tokusope, ntene ye kame santenyi, yoto kuye kutyak om wule ntarastinek cepo santenyi.
45007003	Nteye kepurcini neto oko citake ye tokusope santenyi mosicekur kule kasakwayen korkonoto. Ntene ye kame santet, komo kuripe neto ntarastinek, kunyo komokwiye sakwayanat ye kemüt citake.
45007004	Mpo yeya, yunyoto om wule omite akwek kyopoku om wule mite ntarastinek, omnye oyiku kereryantetap porto nyepo Kristo, kunyo opoye yawut neto nyo kiciŋet kotutune met sukuŋet cepoyitu acek latik om yisyet nyepo Yiyintet.
45007005	Omnye ye kitoceponte acek soponto nyepo cito; kuye kikwiyisyi yoto corokyinotet nye miyat kupunte ntarastinek ce kimite porwonikyacek oŋnkusut met.
45007006	Ntene yawut acek co kicityacec cekwane wule mite ntarastinek, kuce kicepoku cekwane wuloto, kinömec ciku mopusin. Kunyo kimokyiyisyi om aret nyepo keny nyepo ntarastinek ce silotin, ntene kyiyisyi om aret nyelel nyepo Muyet Nyetilil.
45007007	Kunyo moceŋalal ce mwowu kulene? Mocemwowu pa kule ponto ntarastinek miyotyet? Puryo kot kuyunyo? Ntene ntarastinek kuce porwo ani sukuŋet oŋnket miyotyet. Kipuryo kot omuci kot oŋnket corokyinotet nto kipuryo kot kumwoy ntarastinek kule. “Mente ocorokyi kiy.’’
45007008	Kinyor miyotyet poroyinto sukuŋet kowurur corokyinotet ake tokol nye mitowune wule omite ani, omnye kikwiyis kupunte ntarastinek. Omnye miyotyet kunye kiy nye kime ye puryo kot kumite ntarastinek.
45007009	Kimite pesyosyek alak om soponmwani ye kipuryo kot oŋnket ntarastinek, ntene ntowo kuco ntarastit, yoto kotut miyotyet, yoto amey ani:
45007010	Nto ntarastit nye kicemöce kule sukuŋet kusutwo soponto, kunye nyoto nye kisutwo ani met.
45007011	Omnye yu kowo kunyor miyotyet poroyinto kupunte ntarastinek, yoto kuperpera ani okoy kupakäca.
45007012	Tilil ntarastinek kwine nkit, tililec koyomiset, oŋnkupo manta, oŋnkutopon.
45007013	Poru pa ŋalecu kule kito nye topon kunye kisutwo ani met? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Miyotyet kunye kisut, omnye kikwiyisye miyotyet kito nye topon sukuŋet kusutwo ani met oŋnkupor kutok wule yunto miyotyet. Kunyo porwec ntarastinek kule miyotyet ku miyotyo kupoyit manta.
45007014	Cinket kule mite ntarastit kupo muyet, ntene poyto ani porto, kicalya ani sayiy miyotyet.
45007015	Puryo oŋnketi kito nye oyiye, omnye puryo kot oyiye kito nye amöce kule ayiy ntene aŋnkayiy kito nye puryo kot amöce kule ayiy.
45007016	Ye oyiye ani ce puryo kot omöce kule ayiy, kuporkey kule ocöme kule toponec ntarastinek.
45007017	Omnye puryo kot ku ani nye oyiye kiyitenyi, ntene miyotyet nye mitowune wule amite ani orit nye yiye.
45007018	Oŋnketi kule puryo kiy nye topon nye mite pormwani, omnye nka kot amöce kule nto ayiy kiy nye topon, kupuryo kot omuci kot ayiy.
45007019	Puryo kot oyiye kito nye topon nye amöce kule ayiy, ntene owece oŋnkayiy kito nye miyat nyo puryo kot amoce kule nto ayiy.
45007020	Kunyo ye oyiye kito nye puryo kot omöce kule nto ayiy, kuporkey kule puryo kot ku ani nye oyiye kiyoto ntene miyotyet nye mitowune wule omite kunye yiye.
45007021	Kunyo oköse ani kule yiyisyi ntarastit kuyunyoto. Omnye ye amöce kule ayiy kito nye topon, ku miyotyet pate nye okweye ani.
45007022	Oŋerekyini om soponmwani nyepo Muyet ntarastinekap Yiyintet.
45007023	Ntene oköse ntarastit nye cone kasoteywekwani, kunyo sutwo oyiku mopusyontet nyepo ntarastitap miyotyet nye mite kwiyisyi om pormwani orit.
45007024	Opo! Oyiku ani ci nye kitaŋany koromun! Ŋo nye mosukusorwo om wule mite porto nyi mokusuto wule mite met?
45007025	Makaste Yiyintet nye kisorwo kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Kunyo soponto nyimwani nye oponte kunyi. Ani nkit kunye oripe ntarastinekap Yiyintet om kasoteywekwani, oŋnkurok kwiyisyi porto nyimwani kwicini yisyet miyotyet.
45008001	Kunyo puryo kot kuponto yawut musanku piko co ponto koyomotet oko Kristo Yesu.
45008002	Omnye ntarastit nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nyo sutwec soponto oŋnkoyomec oko Yesu Kristo, kunye kikotyaca ani acone wule mite ntarastitap miyotyet oko met.
45008003	Omnye kito nye puryo kot komuce ntarastinek omnye puren porto kunye kikwiy Yiyintet nyoto. Kimutyi Yiyintet miyotyet musankut, omnye kiyok Werinyi nkit nye kiconto porto nye kerkey nyepo cito nye ponto miyotyet sukuŋet kunum miyotyet.
45008004	Kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyoto sukuŋet ciyitita kupoyit manta ntarastinek om wule ce mite acek co cipuri kopurto kuyu wule moktoy Muyet Nyetilil, ntene puryo kot kuyu wule moktoy soponto nyepo porto.
45008005	Omnye piko co purtoy soponto kuyu wule moktoy porto kuce poytoy kasoteywekwa tukuk ce möce porto. Nto piko co purtoy soponto kuyu wule moktoy Muyet Nyetilil, kupoytoy kasoteywekwa tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil.
45008006	Ye kapayta kasoteywekuk tukuk ce möce porto, kusutu met, ntene ye kapayta kasoteywekuk tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil kuye mesenyoru soponto oko kalyet.
45008007	Kunyo yiku cito puniyontetap Yiyintet ye kapayta kasoteywekyi tukuk ce möce porto, omnye puryo kot kurupe neto ntarastinekap Yiyintet, puryo kot kurupe mpo kisic.
45008008	Puryo kot komuce koŋerec Yiyintet piko co rupe tukuk ce möce porwonikwa.
45008009	Ntene puryo kupoytok akwek porto, poytok Muyet Nyetilil, ye puren om wule omite akwek ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kuponto Muyet Nyetilil, kunye moponto nyoto Kristo.
45008010	Ntene ye mitowune Kristo wule omite akwek, nka kot kipok porwonikwok om miyotyet, kusopcotin soponwek nye kicesatak onyolu om wule mite Yiyintet.
45008011	Ye mitowune wule omite akwek Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nyo kiŋet Yesu kotutune met, kuporkey kule nyoto kiŋet Kristo kotutune met kunye mosukukoci soponto porwonikwok cepoku kupunte Muyet Nyetilil nyoto mitowune wule omite akwek.
45008012	Kunyo mpo yeya, ceponte pesen puryo kot ku pesento nye yocec porto kule cipur kuyu wule moktoy porto.
45008013	Omnye mosopoku ye kurup kapurto nyepo porto. Ntene mososopce ye kapakäc yisyonutek ce möce porto om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
45008014	Lekokap Yiyintet piko tokol co ntocini Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.
45008015	Omnye Muyet Nyetilil nyo kikonok akwek Yiyintet kunye puryo kot kuwecok oyiku mutwor oŋnkomuye, ntene wecok oyiku lekokap Yiyintet. Kunyo citeyi acek om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kule, “Apa’’ Nye mwowu kule, “Papa.’’
45008016	Muyet Nyetilil nkit nye mitowune soponwekyacek orit kunye poru kule ciku lekokap Yiyintet.
45008017	Kunyo nteye ciku lekokyi; kuporkey kule mosicenyoru kupeyok ce kikonorci neto pikyi, oŋnkunti oko Kristo tukuk ce kikonorci Yiyintet neto. Omnye ye kakeyemnte toŋoŋutek oko Kristo kuye mosiceyemnte mpo woyinto oko neto.
45008018	Asoti ani kule toŋoŋutek ce cetoŋonyi acek om pesyosyecu kuce puryo kot cimuce mpo kisic kot ciyoyeke woyinto nye mosiceŋoŋwec acek.
45008019	Omnye mite kukoŋisyi koromun tukuk tokol ce kicitany okoy ye mociŋoŋ kutok lekokap Yiyintet.
45008020	Omnye kicewosontyi tukuk ce mite koret kwek ce moponto latik, puryo kot omnye kicäm nkit, ntene omnye kicäm Yiyintet nkit, oŋnkurok yec kumite kokenotenyi.
45008021	Kule mosicityac pesyet ake koret kucone mutworyontit nye nunat oŋnkunyor woyinto nyewo nyepo lekokap Yiyintet.
45008022	Cinket kule mite kosiltos kutoŋonye om mwoninto okoy pesyoni tukuk tokol co kicitany kuyu korko nye möce kucämnkey.
45008023	Ntene puryo kot ku tukuk ce kicitany nkit pate, mpo acek co ceponte Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nye kokotutyet nyepo tayta, kuce cemite mpo acek cerire cekonye ye mokuwecec Yiyintet ciku lekokyi oŋnkusor porwokyacek.
45008024	Omnye kisopec om kokenotet nyitenyi pate. Ntene kokenotet nye ceköse kunye puryo kot ku kokenotet nyoto. Omnye ŋo nye muce kuken kiy nye mite kuköse?
45008025	Kunyo nteye cikeni acek kito nye puryo ceköse, kuroke cemuytoci ciken kiyoto.
45008026	Kuyunyoto Muyet Nyetilil kolyec acek; omnye moceponte swama, puryo kot cinket wule cesomntoy kuyu wule misyinec cesom. Muyet Nyetilil nkit kunye kolyec oŋnkusorwec om wule mite Yiyintet, om ŋalek ce nyikisec koromun ce memuci ci kuŋalal.
45008027	Yiyintet nye köse mukuleywek orit kunye nkete wule yunto kasoteywek cepo Muyet Nyetilil. Omnye Muyet Nyetilil kunye kolyoy kuporcini pikap Yiyintet kuyu wule yunto cömisyetap Yiyintet.
45008028	Cinket kule yiyisyi Yiyintet topon om kiy ake tokol om wule mite piko co yene neto. Picoto kuco kikur Yiyintet kuyu wule moktoy.
45008029	Yiyintet kunye kikwey keny oŋnkutapan pikyi sukuŋet kukerkeyitu oko Werinyi, sukwek Werit poretyet om wule mite mpo mutakwam ce caŋ.
45008030	Kunyo kikur Yiyintet piko co kikwey kutapan, nto picoto kikur neto kuce kicesat kunyol om wule mite neto, nto coto kicesat kunyol om wule mite neto kuce kunyor mpo woyinto.
45008031	Kunyo moceŋalal cemwowu kulene? Ye mitowune Yiyintet wule ce mite acek, kuŋo nye muce kuporyenec?
45008032	Neto nyo kipuryo kot kukalya Werinyi nkit, ntene kukoyto kupo acekto kunye memuce kulene kot kukonec acek tokol oko Werinyi?
45008033	Ŋo nye muce kuwosontyi pikap Yiyintet ce kikwey?
45008034	Ŋo nye muce kumutyi kulot musankut cekto? Puryo kot ku Kristo Yesu, nyo kime oŋnkotutune met kupoyit manta, kunyo mite yawut kukepure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet kuyetyecec acek!
45008035	Kunyi ŋo yec nye muce kot kupesyec acek om wule mite cömisyetap Kristo. Muce pa wuyinto? Nto mwoninto? Nto toŋoŋutek? Nto rupet? Nto sirok? Nto kyoran? Nto met?
45008036	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Ce mite miyotyet nyepo kule cepakäcec om pesyo tokol kupo nyito. Ciyitec kuyu kecir ce cemöce wocetil’’
45008037	Ntene om coto tokol, cipëlisyi kupoyit manta kupunte neto nyo kicämec.
45008038	Omnye oŋnketi ani kupoyit manta kule, nka malaykanik, nto poytoyik alak cepo torot, nto kamukeywek, cepo pesyosyecu, nto cepo pesyosyek cokwoni.
45008039	Nka mpo koret torot, nto koret ŋony, puryo kiy nye mite koret nyitenyi kicitany nye muce kenyis kot kupesyec acek om wule mite cömisyet nye kicenyoru acek kipunte Kristo Yesu Mokoryontenyo.
45009001	Oŋololi ani ŋalek cepo manta, opoye Kristo nye moperperisyi: Kasoteywekwani ce poytoy Muyet Nyetilil kuce poru kule puryo kot operperisyi.
45009002	Oponte nerekwek ce caŋ oko mwoninto nyewo om mukuleymwani.
45009003	Omnye aomöce kule cecupo oŋnkocone wule mite Kristo om kaynetap mpo yeyamwani cepo yememwani ce cetupce.
45009004	Cekto kuce pikap Israel ce kikwey Yiyintet. Kikwey kwek lekokyi oŋnkunyor woyintap Yiyintet. Kikoci kirotyet oko ntarastinek, ponto mpo sayet nyepo manta, oŋnkikurtoci Yiyintet cekto.
45009005	Cekto kuce mucokoronikap mpo kukonyo taman ok oyeny. Kicone Kristo kuyu ci arenyacek. Kante cikasta Yiyintet okokoy okoy okokoy, Yunyoto.
45009006	Puryo kot omwowu kule kimokwiyisyi kurtoyetap Yiyintet. Omnye puryo kot kupo piko tokol cepo Israel Yiyintet.
45009007	Oŋnkupuryo kot ku lekokap Yiyintet piko tokol ce kesenisyekap Apram. Omnye kimwoci Yiyintet Apram kule, “Kupunte Isaka kuye mesonyoru nyi mucokoronik.’’
45009008	Poru ŋalecu lekok co kiceyi kuyu kwak, kuce puryo kot kweku co lekokap Yiyintet, ntene lekok cepo kirotyet kuce ciyite kule mucokoronik cepo manta.
45009009	Omnye kikurto Yiyintet om ŋalecu kule, “Mosoketukey ani om pesyet nye kweyat, kunyo mosukuyi Sara werit.’’
45009010	Ntene puryo kot ku ŋalecu nkit pate, omnye lekokap Rapeka oyeny kuce kiponto kwan akenke nyoto ku kukonyo Isaka.
45009011	-
45009012	Ntene ye kitompo ceyi cekto oŋnkutompo kot kwiy kiy nye topon nto nye miyat, kimwoci Yiyintet Rapeka kule; “Mosukwici Werit nyewo yisyet Werit nye miniŋ’’ Kwiyakay kuyunyoto sukuŋet kutok kupoyit manta kule kweye Yiyintet cito nye kokur nye puryo kot kuyoŋe tukuk ce yiye piko.
45009013	Kuyu wulo kicesil kule, “Kyacäm ani Yakopo, ntene asenker Esawu.’’
45009014	Kunyo mecemwowu kulene? Mocemwowu kule puryo kot kwiye Yiyintet cepo manta? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic!
45009015	Omnye kimwoci Yiyintet Moses kule, “Mosakalye ani ci tokol nye kakwey, mosarire ci tokol nye kacäm.’’
45009016	Kunyo puryo kot ku kito nye möce cito nto nye yiye cito nye ponto latik, ntene kwone pate kokolyoyisyet nyepo Yiyintet nkit.
45009017	Omnye mwocini silutekap Yiyintet Farawo kule, “Kyakweyiŋ ani nyi yiku kinko kule sukuŋet oporu kamukeywekwani, oŋnkoporu cinket kaynemwani om koret tokol kumukul.’’
45009018	Kunyo rire kukalya Yiyintet ci tokol nye keyen neto.
45009019	Kunyo mesemwowo ani akenke om akwek kule “Ye yunyoto, omne yu tokumite kulele Yiyintet cito? Ŋo nye muce kukerekta Yiyintet om kito nye möce?’’
45009020	Ntene corwenyu, nyi ku ŋo ci nye muci ŋalal wekyi Yiyintet. Puryo kot kutepe teret cito nyo kikwiy teronoto kule, “Omne seyiya ani nyi kuyunyi?’’
45009021	Ntene ponto cito nyo yiye terenik kwiyisye menet kuyu wule moktoy, muce kwiyisye menonoto akenke kwiy terenik oyeny, akenke kunye kyiyisye om sokwonutek, nto ake kunye kyiyisye kwak okokoy.
45009022	Kunyo yunyoto kupoyit manta wule kikwiyta Yiyintet. Kimöce kule oporu nyerunotet nyenyi oko kamukeywekyi. Yoto kumuytoci oŋnkukoŋis koromun om wule mite piko ce kinyerci neto, co kiceyiyta kule kyaranta.
45009023	Kimöce mpo kule oporu woyinto nyenyi nyo kicekonec acek ciku piko cepo kokolyoyisyenyi, acek coto kuce kikiwiyta neto sukuŋet kunyor woyinto nye nyi.
45009024	Omnye acek kuco kicekurec, nye puryo kot ku Yutayek pate nkit, ntene mpo Lamek.
45009025	Kuyu wulo mwowu kitaputap Yosiya kule, “Piko ce kipuryo kot ku cikwani, mosokure ani cekto, ‘Pikwani’ Yemet nye kipuryo kot ocöme, Mosokure ani. ‘Cämanenyu’
45009026	Nto om wulyo ake tokol wule kicemwocine cekto kule, ‘Puryo kot oyiku pikwani’ ku wuloto wule mosicekure cekto lekokap Yiyintet nye sope.’’
45009027	Kunyo kurtoy kumwowu mpo Isaya ŋalek ce nöme Israel kule, “Nka kot ku caŋ pikap Israel cete coŋinto ŋaynet nye mite tapantap ruretyet, ntene tukusic pate ce mokusopco.’’
