45009028	Omnye mosukuwosontyi Mokoryontet musankut koret om lakwar.
45009029	Kerkey oko wulo kiŋor Isaya keny kumwoy kule, “Nto kipuryo kot kupokokwec acek Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kesenisyek, nto kicekerkeyitu Sotom, nto kicekerkeyitu mpo oko Komora.’’
45009030	Kunyo mocemwowu ne? Mocemwowu kule Lamek co kipuryo kot kusyeme kule cesatkey cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kuce kicesat kunyol om wule neto omnye kiyen.
45009031	Nto pikap Israel ce kiceny ntarastit nye sukuŋet kusat cekto kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet kuce mnonyor?
45009032	Omne? Omnye kito nye kikwiy kunye puryo kot kunöme koyenet, ntene nöme pate yisyonutek. Yoto kunoc cekto rwantet nyo nokisyi.
45009033	Kuyu wulo kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Akäs pa, kokoci Siyon rwantet nye noce piko. Rwa nye noce piko koputis; Ntene puryo kot kolilone ci tokol nyo yene neto.’’
45010001	Mpo yeya, amöce ani om mukuleymwani kule nto cisop pikwani, osomncini cekto Yiyintet.
45010002	Oŋnkonketi kule yweye cekto Yiyintet koromun, ntene puryo kot kucone koyweyisyet nyimwa ŋomnonet nyepo manta.
45010003	Omnye tompo kot konket aret wule wektoy Yiyintet kunyol piko om wule mite neto, ntene kusyem cekto aret nyimwa nkit, kunyo puryo kurup cekto aret nyepo Yiyintet nyo säte piko kunyol.
45010004	Omnye Kristo kunye woŋntoy ntarastinek sukuŋet kusatakay kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet ci tokol nye kikoyen.
45010005	Ŋalek ce kisil Moses ce nöme wule cesotitokey cenyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet ye kacerup ntarastinek kucu kule, “Mosukusop cito nye yiye ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek.’’
45010006	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ce nöme wule cesotitoykey cenyol om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte koyenet kule, “Mente atep kwinyi nkit mwowu kule, ŋo nye mosukuwo torot.’’ Yoto kuye kacesut Kristo kuco ŋony.
45010007	Mente mpo atep mwowu kule, “Ŋo nye mosukuwo koret ŋony?’’ (Yoto kuye kocesut Kristo kotutune met.)
45010008	Ŋalek ce mwowu kucu kule, “Korikyok akwek lokoywekap Yiyintet om kutuwakwok oko mukuleywekwok orit.’’ Lokoywek coto kuce cemwoytoy acek cepo koyenet.
45010009	Omnye ye keŋalal nyi nkit om kutiŋun mwowu kule, Yesu kunye Mokoryontet oŋnkiyen om mukuleyŋuŋ orit kule kiŋet Yiyintet Yesu kotutune met kuye mocisopiŋ.
45010010	Omnye om koyenet nyinyacek kuye cesotokisye cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet. Ye kaceŋalale acek kutuwakyo yoto kuye cisopec.
45010011	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Puryo kot kolilone ci tokol nye kokuyen neto.’’
45010012	Omnye puryo kot kumite pciyatet om kwenutap Yutoyin oko Lomin. Mokoryontet akenke kunye Mokoryontet nyepo piko tokol oŋnkukocini kupeyok cepo Mokoryontit piko tokol.
45010013	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosicisop ci tokol nye kure kaynetap Mokoryontet.’’
45010014	Ntene muce kulene kukur kaynet nyenyi, ye puryo kot kucömis? Komuce cekto kulene kot kuyen ye tompo kot kulim lokoywek? Komuce cekto kulene kulim lokoywek ye puryo cito nye komwoci.
45010015	Muce piko kulene kumwaytat lokoywek ye puryo kiyokik ce kiciyokto? Kuyu wolo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Toponec koromun kerenkokap cito nyo sutu Lokoywek ce toponec!’’
45010016	Ntene puryo kot kuyen piko tokol lokoywek ce toponec. Kimwoy Isaya nkit kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋo nye kicäm Lokoywekyacek?’’
45010017	Kunyo coni koyenet ye kacelimnte lokoywek, oŋnkukwoni lokoywek ye kacemwayta lokoywek cepo Kristo.
45010018	Nteye katep kule, manta kule puryo kot kulim piko lokoywek? Ntene kilim cekto kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kiwo polotet nyepo ŋalek cikwa kupunte koret tokol, kipunto ŋalek cikwa wule kiŋet koret.’’
45010019	Atep yec kule, kipuryo kot konket pikap Israel? Moses kunye po tayta nye kimwoy kule: “Mosokonok ani acorokyi piko ce puryo kot ku yemet nyepo manta, mosokonok onyerci yemet nye perper nye puryo kot kuponto ŋomnon.’’
45010020	Kunyo kinyikan Isaya yo kimwowu kule, “Kinyorwo ani piko ce kipuryo kot kuceŋoto, Kyoporkyikey piko ce kipuryo kot kutepo ani.’’
45010021	Ntene kuŋalal ce nöme Israel kumwoy kule: “Kyoyite ani yewuniyek kwani kuwany pesyet tokol, atoroc pic ce kitoyis, ce molimwo.’’
45011001	Kunyo katep ani kule, kitay so Yiyintet pikyi? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Oyiku mpo ani Israel, oyiku keseniyantetap Apram, opoye aretap Penyamin.
45011002	Puryo kot kutay Yiyintet pikyi ce kikwey ikye keny. Oŋnket akwek ŋalek ce mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ye kiwosontyini Eriya pikap Israel om wule mite Yiyintet kule.
45011003	“Mokoryontet, kipakäc cekto workoyik, oŋnkoturpup oteputek ce pele korosek, ani nkit pate akenke nye kwoŋetu, kunyi syeme kule cepakäca.’’
45011004	Ntene kuwekyi Yiyintet kumwoci neto ŋolyo ne? Kumwoci kule. “Kwakwey ani pikyu elifunek tisap ce puryo kot kusoye yiyintet nyepo mwiynan Paal.’’
45011005	Kunyo yunyoto mpo yawut pesyosyecu, mite piko ce ŋeri ce kikwey Yiyintet om poypoyenyi.
45011006	Cone kweyisyet nyenyi poypoyet pate, ntene puryo kot ku tukuk ce kikwiy cekto. Omnye nto kikwiy Yiyintet kupo tukuk ce kikwiy piko; nto puryo kot kupo poypoyet nyenyi manta.
45011007	Kunyo ce mwowu ne? Puryo kot kunyor piko cepo Israel kito nye kicenye. Luket nyepo piko ce ŋeri ce kikwey Yiyintet ce kinyor. Kimiŋitu cut alake nye molime kursyetap Yiyintet.
45011008	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kikoci Yiyintet kuperperitu mukuleywek cikwa, puryo kukäste konyek cikwa, nto mpo kulimnta yitik cikwa okoy pesyoni.’’
45011009	Kimwoy Tauti kule: “Roke kwek sokwonutek musatit nye tekat mwenet nye kitany cekto nyo sucini!
45011010	Roke kukoryo konyek cikwa sukuŋet mente kot kukästa: mente kot kumuny cekto co kesene terekok ce nyikisec.’’
45011011	Kunyo katep kule, kicinoc Yutayek sukuŋet kosuto cekto? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Kiwurta kwiy miyotyet, kunyo kacontyi kosopet Lamek sukuŋent kucorok Yutayek.
45011012	Kunyo ye miyotyonik cepo Yutayek kuce kisut mokoryontit om koret tokol, oŋnku miyotyet nyimwa nye kisuto kunye kisutyi kupeyok wule mite lamek. Kunyo kupeyok ce tya nyun ce cetosyini kucaŋit ye keyen Yutayek tokol.
45011013	Oŋololwok ani yawut akwek Lamek, oyiku kiyokintet nyepo Lamek, mososilkey om yisyenyu,
45011014	sukuŋet asutyi kucorok mpo yeyamwani Yutayek, oŋnkamuc kot osop alak om cekto.
45011015	Omnye ye kicetoye cekto, yoto kuye kikwiye koret corwantit oko Yiyintet, kunyo mosukwiy kulene ye kacecäm cekto? Yiku yoto kotutunet nye numu met.
45011016	Ye tilil mukatya kereryantet nye kisic nye kocikoci Yiyintet kwek korosek cepo tayta, kutilil mpo mukatyantet tokol kumukul. Nteye tilil tikityantet nyepo ketit nye kocikoci Yiyintet, kutililec mpo sarisyek tokol.
45011017	Kiceyepta sarisyek alak cepo ketitap seitunit nyo cipote oŋnkyiyomo kupite sarisyek cepo ketit seitunit nyepo samiyita, Akerkeyekey akwek oko ketit seitunit nyepo samiyita, kunyo omite yawut oyemntoy swamet nyepo soponto nye topon nyepo Yutayek.
45011018	Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini onyil piko co kuceyepta kuyu sarisyek. Omuci akwek osilkey kulene? Oyiku sarisyek pate, puryo kot otinye tikityek, tikityek kuce tiyok akwek.
45011019	Ntene mesemwowu kule, “Kiceyep sarisyek sukuŋet kutok poroyinto nyimwani.’’
45011020	Manta, kiceyepta cekto omnye kipuryo kot kuyen, yoto pure nyi otepto omnye kiyen, ntene mente apurte kasoteywek cepo silotet kupo ŋaleca, ripkey.
45011021	Omnye kipuryo kot kwasta Yiyintet Yutayek ce kerkey sarisyek cepo ketit. Soti nyi kule muce kwastiŋ.
45011022	Ceköse om ŋaleca kule ponto Yiyintet poypoyet nyewo oŋnkunyeker koromun om wule mite piko co kikosuyto, ntene tala om wule mite nyi ye ketosyikey om poypoyenyi, nteye puryo, mosiceyeptiŋ mpe nyito.
45011023	Nteye katay Yutayek kwasta toyisyet nyimwa, mosiceketyi cekto ye kimite. Omnye muce Yiyintet kuketyi cekto ye kimite.
45011024	Okerkeye akwek Lamek oko saryantet yepo ketit seitunit nyepo samiyita nye kaceyep oŋnkyiyomo kupite ketit seitunit nye cipote oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kucomntös. Kerkey Yutayek oko ketit seitunit nye cipote, kunyo mosukulekitit koromun ye mokuketyi Yiyintet sarisyek kupite ketimwa nyepo keny.
45011025	Mpo yeya, mite ŋalek cewuŋotin cepo manta ce amöce ani kule oŋnket akwek. Omnye mosukuripok nye mosutekey kule ciku ŋomec. Coto kucu kule, puryo kot kopure toyisyet nyepo Israel okokoy, ntene pure pate okoy ye kakwa lamek tokol wule mite Yiyintet.
45011026	“Kuyunyoto wule mecisopto pikap Israel tokol, kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule: Mosukucone kosopintet Siyon, Mosukunum miyotyonik tokol cepo kesenisyekap Yakopo.
45011027	Mosayiy ani kirotyani oko cekto, ye onumu miyotyonikwa.’’
45011028	Omnye kitay cekto lokoywek ce toponec, kunyo kikwek Yutayek pikap Yiyintet kupo toponiyemwakwek Lamek. Ntene omnye kikwey Yiyintet cekto, kunyo coronutekyi kupo toponiyetap mpo kukomwa.
45011029	Omnye puryo kot kuwec Yiyintet kasoteywekyi om kule ŋo nye kweye neto oŋnkukoci kupeyok.
45011030	Ntene akwek Lamek, kyotoye Yiyintet om yun kipo tay, ntene kukalyak yawut Yiyintet omnye kitoyis Yutayek.
45011031	Om aret nyeyu nyitenyi nye kicerirenak akwek, kunyo toye Yutayek, yawut Yiyintet sukuŋet kukalya neto mpecekto.
45011032	Omnye kiwec Yiyintet piko tokol kwek mopusinek cepo toyisyet kule sukuŋet kuporci kukalya cekto tokol.
45011033	Wo koromun mokoryontit nyepo Yiyintet! Wo mpo ŋomnonet nyenyi oko muswokyontit, ŋo nye muce kumwoci neto kito nye mokwiy? Ŋo nye muce kunket arosyekyi?
45011034	Kuyu wule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Ŋo nye nkete kasoteywekap Mokoryontet, Ŋo nye muce kukoci neto ŋomnonet?
45011035	Ŋo nye kukoci neto kenyis kiy? Sukuŋet kuket kiyoto.’’
45011036	Omnye kitany neto tukuk tokol, kunyo mitowune tukuk tokol kamukeywekyi. Kopurune woyinto wule mite Yiyintet okokoy. Yunyoto.
45012001	Kunyo osomok ani akwek mpo yeya, om poypoyetap Yiyintet nyewo nye kikonec kule okoyte porwonikwok kwek korosek ce tililec om wule mite Yiyintet. Oyiyisye yisyonutekyi ce ŋerece neto. Nyoto kunye sayet nyepo manta nye roke osoye akwek.
45012002	Monte cecäm soponto nyepo koret; nyepo pintap pesyosyecu. Ntene ayaste kuwec Yiyintet kasoteywekwok cepo orit sukuŋet oŋnket cömisyetap Yiyintet nye topon oŋnkoŋerec neto kupoyit manta.
45012003	Oŋololwok ani akwek tokol om kupeyok ce kikono Yiyintet. Ntene asoti kule puryo kot kuroke kusutkey ci ake tokol om akwek kusirte ye misyini. Möce kusot ci tokol kwine nkit wule tento koyenet nye kikoci Yiyintet.
45012004	Ceponte kereryanik wok ce caŋ om porto akenke, ntene oŋnkuponto kereryantet ake tokol yisyet nye yiye.
45012005	Kuyunyoto om wule ce mite acek nka kot ciku caŋ, ntene ciku akenke om koyomotet oko Kristo, Omnye kiciyomec tokol ciku akenke kuyu wulo yunto porto.
45012006	Kunyo roke ciyisye kokotutekyacek ce pciyotin kuyu wule yunto kupeyok ce kikonec Yiyintet. Ye kicekonec acek kokotutyet nye cemwoytoy lokoywek, kumisyini ciyisye kuyu wolo yunto koyenet nye ceponte.
45012007	Nteye kule kyiy yisyonutek, kumisyini kyiyisye. Nteye kule cinetisyi, kumisyini cinetisye.
45012008	Nteye kule cititiri piko alak, kumisyini kyiy kuyunyoto. Nto ci ake tokol nye pcicini piko alak tukuk, kumöce kule kupciyta nyoto ce yeme. Nto cito nye ponto kamukeywek; kumöce nyoto kwiyisye swama; nto cito nyo kolyoyisyi kumisyini kwiyis nyoto om ŋerekwek.
45012009	Misyini kupoyit cömisyet manta. Asenker miyotyet, oŋnkorip pate kiy tokol nye topon.
45012010	Ocämnkey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu mpo yeya ce tupco, oŋnkuywey ci ake tokol citake.
45012011	Oyiyisye swama, monte cepuren. Oyici Mokoryontet yisyet om mukuleyto akenke.
45012012	Kukonok koyenet nyimwoŋ ŋerekwek, omuytoci om ŋerekwek, oŋnkosome okokoy.
45012013	Opcici tukuk piko cepo Yiyintet co moponto kiy, oŋerekyi atoroc om korikwok toyek ce mukulec konyek.
45012014	Osomnci kupeyok piko co toŋonyok, osomnci kupesyok ntene monte cecup.
45012015	Oŋerece oko piko co mite kuŋerec, omesye oko co mite kumesyi.
45012016	Opurte kasoteywek cepo moyet akenke akwek kwakwek nkit, monte cesilekey, ntene ocäm yisyonutek co cenyile, monte cesutkey kule ciku ŋomec.
45012017	Ye kokwiwuŋ citake miyotyo monte ceyokune miyotyet ake. Oyiye tukuk ce toponec ce cöme piko tokol.
45012018	Oyiy akwek nkit kiy ake tokol nye mukoktos sukuŋet opurte kalyet oko piko tokol.
45012019	Coronutekwani, monte ceyokukey, ntene ayaste kwiy co pate nyerunotet nyepo Yiyintet, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosoyoku ani, ani nye Mosoketu.’’
45012020	Ntene ayiy kuyu wolo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ye ponto puniyontet nyeŋuŋ rupet, ipay, ye ponto melelya, ikoci peko. Omnye ye keyiy kuyunyoto, kukerurukyi metit nyenyi oŋonyntit nyepo nesek’’
45012021	Monte kupëlok miyotyet, ntene oyiyisye toponiyet sukuŋet opël miyotyet.
45013001	Misyini kuywey ci tokol poytoyik cepo koret. Omnye kwone kamukeywek tokol wule mite Yiyintet. Kunyo konu Yiyintet poytoyik co yiyisyi yawut.
45013002	Ci tokol nye katay poytoyik ce yiyisyi yawut, kukatay cito nyoto piko co kikwey Yiyintet, nto cito nye kayiy kuyunto kukomutyikey neto nyoto musankut nkit.
45013003	Omnye puryo kot kumuye piko ce toponec poytoyik cepo koret, ntene muytos piko co miyotec. Ye memöce nyi kule amuye poytoyik kumöce kule yiy ce toponec, mosukukastiŋ nyi cekto.
45013004	Omnye mutworintetap Yiyintet neto nye yiyisyi kupo toponiyet nyeŋuŋ. Ye keyiy ŋalek ce miyotec, kuroke muyi om wule mite neto, omnye po manta kamukeywek kupiriŋ nyi. Neto kunye mutworintetap Yiyintet, kunyo yiyisye nerekwekap Yiyintet om wule mite piko co miyotec.
45013005	Möce aywey poytoyik co ponto kamukeywek, nye puryo ku kule omnye nerec Yiyintet, ntene omnye nketi nyi nkit om ŋomnoneŋuŋ.
45013006	Kuyunyoto omne sokweye akwek mosoret, omnye yiye poytoyik yisyetap Yiyintet ye yiye yisyemwa.
45013007	Kunyo okwecini tukuk ce yoce cekto. Okwey mosoret, okweye mosoret nyepo mosonok oŋnkaywey piko tokol cewoyec.
45013008	Monte cipurte pesen nyepo citake ntene acämnkey akwek nkit, ci ake tokol nye kacäm latyenyi kunye iyititoy cicoto ntarastinek.
45013009	Omnye ntarastinecu kule, “Mesekwayan, meporisye, mecorsye, mecoroku.’’ Kuce yomntos kwek ntarastit akenke nye mwowu kule, “Misyini kucäm cito latyenyi kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
45013010	Ye kucäm cito latyenyi kupuryo kot komuce yici miyotyo. Kunyo ye kokecömis kuye kaciyitita ntarastinek tokol.
45013011	Misyini ayiy kuyunyoto omnye oŋnket akwek sawet kule kopunto pesyosyek, oŋetye rwonto omnye kolekitit yawut ye mocisopec kusir wule kicisotitoy acek kunyo.
45013012	Kapok menonet, kayec koret kwek pet, okany kyaste mokyiyisyi yisyet nyepo menonet, okany cenäm Karik cepo poryet nye ceporye wule mite lakweyet.
45013013	Okany cepesetate kuyu piko cepo lakweyet nyepo pet kwen, nye puryo kot ceŋerece tumwonik ce miyotec oko pokitet, nto sakwayanatet, oko syepisyet, oko wokutyet oko corokyinotet.
45013014	Ntene alac Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo, kwek loŋet, ayaste monte cisot tukuk ce corokyini porwonikwok.
45014001	Atoroc opurcine oko cito nye moponto swamet om koyenet. Ntene mente cetintentyine oko neto om ŋalek cepo kasoteywekyi nkit.
45014002	Ponto citake koyenet nye muce kwam kiy ake tokol, ntene kuponto citake yec koyenet nye puryo kot kupo swama, kwome nyoto nkuyek pate.
45014003	Puryo kot kuroke kunyil nyo ome kiy ake tokol nyo puryo kot kwome, oŋnkupuryo kot kuroke kumut musankut cito nyo ome nkuyek pate kumutyi nyo ome kiy ake tokol. Omnye kicäm Yiyintet mpene cito nyoto.
45014004	Nyi ku ŋo nye muci kot mutyi musankut mutworintetap cito ake. Ntene Mokoryontenyi nye mosukupor kule yonye nto mosukosuto cito, kunyo muce kuyo omnye mokoryontet kunye keyoŋnto neto.
45014005	Sote cito ake kule pesyo nyewo koromun pesyet akenke kupël pesyosyek alak, kusote citake yec kule kerkey pesyosyek tokol. Roke kukwilakay ci tokol om kasoteywekyi.
45014006	Ci tokol nye ripe topon pesyet akenke, kwiye nyo kuyunyoto om koyweyisyet nye yweye Mokoryontet. Ci tokol nye ome kiy ake tokol, kwiye nyoto kuyunyoto om koyweyisyet nye yweye Mokoryontet, omnye kostoy neto Yiyintet, ci tokol nye katay nye puryo kot kwome tukuk alak, kwiye nyoto kuyunyoto om koyweyisyet nye yweye Mokoryontet, omnye kostoy Yiyintet om omik.
45014007	Omnye puryo ci mpo akenke om acek nye sope kwine nkit, oŋnkupuryo nye me kwine nkit.
45014008	Ye ce soptosi acek, kupo Yiyintet nkit, nteye kocepoku kukocepeku kupo Mokoryontet. Kunyo ye cesoptosi nto ye kacepoku cepoye Mokoryontet.
45014009	Omnye kime Kristo oŋnkotutune met sukuŋet kwek Mokoryontet nyepo piko ce soptos oko ce kipok.
45014010	Kunyo omne semutyi nyi yeyaŋuŋ musanku, nyi nyo iyome nkuyek pate? Omne senyil nyi yeyaŋuŋ nyi nyo iyome kiy ake tokol? Mosiciyoŋe acek tokol taytap Yiyintet sukuŋet kumutwec musankut.
45014011	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, Ayiku Yiyintet nye Sopot, Mosukukutuŋe ci tokol taymwani, Mosukuŋalal ci tokol kumwoy kule, Oyiku ani Yiyintet.’’
45014012	Kunyo mosukoyit ci ake tokol om acek tukuk ceci koyityi Yiyintet.
45014013	Kunyo akente kyaste mocemutyinikey musankunek. Ntene möce asot kule mente teyiy kiy nye muce kot kunoc yeyaŋuŋ nto kuwec kusuci miyotyet.
45014014	Koyomotet nye oponte ani oko Mokoryontet Kristo kunye kikono oŋnket kupoyit manta kule toponec omik tokol. Ntene ye cöme cito ake kule puryo kot kutoponec omik tokol, kuporkey kule puryo kot kutoponec omik coto om wule mite cicoto.
45014015	Ye komwontyi yeyaŋuŋ om kito nye iyome nyi kuporkey kule puryo kot yiyisye nyi cömisyet. Kunyo mente ayaste kot kowurta omik ce iyome nyi cito nye kimeci Kristo!
45014016	Mente ayaste kot kunyor kaynet nye miyat tukuk ce kure nyi kule toponec
45014017	Omnye poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kunye puryo kot kunömekey oko tukuk ce kyome nto ce ceye, ntene nömekey pate oko tililinto oko kalyet oko ŋerekwek ce konu Muyet Nyetilil.
45014018	Kunyo ci tokol nye yicini Kristo yisyet om aret nyeyu nyitenyi kunye nyoru cömisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkucämnta ci tokol neto.
45014019	Kunyo möce cetyikyini acek okokoy tukuk ce sutu kalyet, oŋnkyikalyekey acek kwacek nkit.
45014020	Monte ciwurte kwaran yisyet nyepo Yiyintet kukesac omit pate. Möce kyam omik wok tokol, ntene miyat ye kakyam kiy nye muce kowurta citake kot kosuci miyotyo.
45014021	Kunyo pëlisyi ye kacetay mokyam peny, nto ceye komek nto kyiy mpo kiy ake tokol nye sutyini kosuto yeyaŋuŋ.
45014022	Rip koyenet nye ponte kwek nye nketi nyi nkit oko Yiyintet. Ponto kupeyoy cito nye puryo kot kumutyinikey musanku ye mite kwiye ŋalek ce nkete nkit kule po manta!
45014023	Nteye mune neto omik ce ome, kumutyini Yiyintet neto musankut ye kam omnye puryo kot kunömekey oko koyenet nyenyi. Nto kiy ake tokol nye puryo kot kunömekey oko koyenet kunye miyotyo nyoto.
45015001	Roke ceponte acek swamet om koyenet sukuŋet cikalye piko co moponto swamet cetorci terekokwa. Puryo kot kuroke ciŋereckey acek kwacek nkit.
45015002	Ntene misyini ci ake tokol om acek kuŋerec mpo yeyanyi sukuŋet kukalya om koyenet nyimwa.
45015003	Omnye kipuryo kot kuŋereckey Kristo nkit, ntene kikwiy kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kitica ani cupisyet nyo ŋolole piko co cupiŋ nyi.’’
45015004	Omnye ŋolyo ake tokol nye kicesil keny om silutekap Yiyintet kunye kicesil sukuŋet kunetec acek, sukuŋet cikenisye, oŋnkyemuytoci oŋnkyetitir ye cesumoni silutekap Yiyintet.
45015005	Kunyo kante kukonok akwek Yiyintet nyepo muytocinotet oko kotitirotet, sukuŋet onyoru akwek kwakwek nkit kasoteywek ce kerkey, ye korup wule yunto Yesu Kristo.
45015006	Saŋet oyiku kutit akenke, akaste Yiyintet oŋnku kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
45015007	Kunyo oŋerekyinikey akwek kwakwek nkit kupo woyinto nyepo Yiyintet, kuyu wulo kicämak Kristo.
45015008	Omnye komwowok ani kule kikwek Yesu Mutworintetap Yutayek sukuŋet kupor kule kiyitita Yiyintet kupoyit manta kurtoyutek ce kimwoci neto mpo kukonyo.
45015009	Sukuŋet komuc Lamek kukasta Yiyintet om poypoyenyi kuyu wolo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kunyo mosakastiŋ ani nyi om wule mite Lamek. Mosotum akaste kayneŋuŋ’’
45015010	Kumwoy yec kule: “Aŋerec Lamek oko pikap Yiyintet ce kweyotin!’’
45015011	Kumwoy yec kule: “Akaste Mokoryontet akwek Lamek tokol. Akaste koromun akwek piko tokol!’’
45015012	Mwowu mpo Isaya yec kule: “Mosukuco keseniyantetap Yese; nye mosukuŋet kupayta Lamek; mosukukenekey cekto neto.’’
45015013	Kunyo akente kukonok akwek Yiyintet nyepo kokenotet ŋerekwek tokol, oko kalyet kupunte koyenemwoŋ nye oponte om wule mite neto, sukuŋet kutosyikey kuner koyenet nyimwoŋ om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
45015014	Mpo yeya, oŋnket ani kule oponte akwek toponiyet nyewo koromun, oŋnketi kule oponte ŋomnonet tokol; kunyo omuci anetkey akwek kwakwek nkit.
45015015	Ntene om parwani kosilwok om nyikanatet ŋalek ce kasotwok. Kwoyiyisye kuyunyoto om kamukeywek ce kikono Yiyintet.
45015016	Oyiku mutworintetap Yesu Kristo nye oyiyisyi om wule mite Lamek. Oyiyisyi kuyu tisintet ye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet; sukuŋet kwek Lamek kokotutyet nye cömntoy Yiyintet, oŋnkusat Muyet Nyetilil.
45015017	Kunyo om koyomotet nye oponte om Yesu Kristo, omuci osilkey om yisyet nyepo Yiyintet.
45015018	Mosaŋalale om nyikanatet ŋalek pate ce kikwiy Kristo kupunte wule amite ani antoci Lamek kuywey Yiyintet om ŋalek oko yisyonutek.
45015019	Om swamet nye kicipor om pelutok cepo kakitat oko om swametap Muyet Nyetilil. Kunyo om poninek kuceke Yerusalem okoy Iluriko. kyamwaytate okoy awany lokoywek ce toponec ce nöme Kristo.
45015020	Ŋolyontet nye amöce ani kwak okokoy kunye amöce kule amwaytate lokoywek ce toponec om wule tompo kot kulim piko ŋalek cepo Kristo, nye puryo kot amöce kule otosyi yisyet nye kicece cito ake.
45015021	Kuyu wulo Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosukukäs piko ce kitompo kot cemwoci Lokoywekyi, Mosukonket piko ce tompo kot kulim mpo kisic.’’
45015022	Om ŋolyontoni, kucekerekta ani aret ce caŋ ye maco orutocok akwek.
45015023	Ntene omnye kwawany yawut yisyonutekwani om komosta nyitenyi, oŋnkurok kyamac kuloyit kule aco wule omite akwek.
45015024	Mosayiy kuyunyoto yawut amöce kule cekäsak akwek om poninekwani ye otile oweti Supaniya. Amöce kule akalya ani akwek opunte wuloto, om letut ye kocipur oko akwek om ŋerekwek pesyos ce ŋeri.
45015025	Ntene yawut pakenke amite ani oweti Yerusalem om yisyetap Yiyintet nyepo piko cepo wuloto .
45015026	Omnye kucäm nkit pikap Yiyintet cepo Meketoniya oko Akaya kule cikalye cikoci kokotutek pikap Yiyintet pononik ce mite Yerusalem.
45015027	Kucäm cekto nkit, ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, ponto cek pesento kule misyini kukalye cekto pononik omnye pcicintos Yutayek oko Lamek kupeyok cepo soponto nyetilil, kunyo misyini kukalya cekto Yutayek om tukuk cepo porto.
45015028	Ntene ye kawany ani yisyet nyitenyi ye kokoci cekto pesanik tokol ce kicirurukyi, mosonomen poninek coto.
45015029	Oŋnketi kule ye kaco wule omite akwek mosoconte kupeyok tokol cepo Kristo.
45015030	Osomok ani akwek mpo yeya om Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo oko om cömisyet nye konu muyet kule ciyomekey oko ani. Oŋnkosomwo Yiyintet koromun.
45015031	Osomwo oripokisye topon om wule piko ce puryo kuyen cepo Yuteya, oŋnkucäm piko ce mite Yerusalem yisyet nyimwani.
45015032	Kunyo mosaco wule mite akwek oponte ŋerekwek ce caŋ ye kacäm Yiyintet, oŋnkuŋerekyi tontonet nye topon om wule omite akwek.
45015033	Kante Kopur Yiyintet nyepo kalyet oko akwek tokol. Yunyoto.
45016001	Kaporwok ani akwek yeyanyo Foipe nye kokolyoyintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet ce mite Kenkeriya.
45016002	Atoroc neto om kaynetap Mokoryontet kuyu wulo roke kwiyta pikap Yiyintet. Akalye om kakalyayet ake tokol nye möce. Omnye kukakalya neto piko ce caŋ oŋnkukalya mpo ani nkit.
45016003	Osupoywo ani Prisika oko Akwila, ce kikyiyisyi tokol yisyetap Yesu Kristo.
45016004	Cekto kuce kikoyto soponwek cikwa kusorwo ani. Okostoy cekto koromun nye puryo ku ani nkit, ntene kostoy mpo pikap Yiyintet tokol cepo Lamek.
45016005	Osupoywo mpo pikap Yiyintet ce rurukyinikey kot nyimwa. Osupoywo corwemwani nye ocöme koromun Epaineto. Neto kunye cito nye kinyosyo kuyen Kristo om koretap Asia.
45016006	Osupoywo Mariyam nye kikwiyis yisyet nyewo koromun om wule omite akwek.
45016007	Osupoywo Antroniko oko Yunia pikwani ce Yutayek ce kicepontekey tokol om mopusi. Kicinket cekto koromun om wule mite Kiyokik. Cekto kuce kunyosyo kwek Kristayek kutompo kot oyiku ani.
45016008	Osupoywo Ampliato nye corwemwani koromun om Mokoryontet.
45016009	Osupoywo Urpano nye kyiyisyi tokol yisyet nyepo Kristo oko Staku nye corwemwani koromun.
45016010	Osupoywo Apele nye kicinket kule po manta koyenet yenyi om wule mite Kristo. Osupoywo pikap Yiyintet cepo kotap Aristopulo.
45016011	Osupoywo Erotiyana nye Yutoyin oko mpo yeya Kristayek cepo kaytap Narkisi.
45016012	Osupoywo Trufena oko Trufosa ce yiyisyi yisyetap Mokoryontet, oko corwemwani Perusi, nye kikwiy yisyet nyewo nyepo Mokoryontet.
45016013	Osupoywo Rupo cito nye tokunot om Mokoryonetet, oko kamet nye kisuto ani kuyu Werinyi.
45016014	Osupoywo Asunkrito oko Plekon oko Erme oko Patropa, oko Erima oko mpo Yeya Kristayek alak tokol ce pontokey oko cekto.
45016015	Osupoywo Filoloko oko Yulia oko Nereya oko cekwam, oko Olumpa oko piko tokol cepo Yiyintet cepontokey oko cekto.
45016016	Asupaykey akwek nkit oŋaŋutkey kuyu mpo yeya. Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol cepo Kristo.
45016017	Mpo yeya, konkolonwok ani kule, oripkey koyenet nyepo piko, co toye konetisyet nyo kicinet cekto, oripkey pico.
45016018	Omnye puryo kot kwicini yisyet Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo piko ce yiye ŋaleca, ntene poye pate mucesta nyimwa nkit. Omnye perpere cekto kumas kasoteywekap piko ce moponto ŋolyo; kwiyisye ŋalekwa ce ŋerekyini piko.
45016019	Kilim ci ake tokol koyenet nyimwoŋ nyepo lokoywek ce toponec, kunyo oyiku ani ŋerekat om wule omite akwek. Amoce kule oŋomekitu om kiy ake tokol nye topon, oŋnkumöce kule opur nye moponte lelis nyepo miyotyet.
45016020	Nto Yiyintet nye lukune kalyet nyinyacek kunye mosukoturpup Setanit kopurune kerenkokwok ŋony. Opurte akwek poypoyet nyepo Mokoryontet Yesu.
45016021	Kesupayak akwek Timosewo nye kyiyisyi acek tukway yisyet, kunyo kesupayak mpo Lukio oko Yason, oko Sosipatro ce Yutayek cekto.
45016022	Ani Tertiyo nye kusile parwani, kasupayak om Mokoryontenyo.
45016023	Kesupayak akwek Kayo nye apurune ani kanyi oŋnku konyi kunye rurukyinikey pikap Yiyintet. Kesupayak Erasto konorintet nyepo pesanikap moŋet oko yeyanyo Kwarto.
45016024	[Kunyo opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Yunyoto]
45016025	Akante cikaste cikoci Yiyintet woyinto. Muce neto kukonok akwek okwilokisye om koyenet, kuyu wule yunto lokoywek ce toponec om kenyisyek co kitil.
45016026	Kunyo yawut, kucipor kutok ŋalecutecu kupunte silutekap workoyik oko wule mwoytoy Yiyintet nye mopoku, kuciporci yawut yemosyek tokol, sukuŋet kuyen oŋnkuyweyis.
45016027	Kupoyit woyinto Yiyintet nye neto nkit kunye ŋom kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
46001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kicekur kwek Kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om cömisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Sosene.
46001002	Casilyini pikap Yiyintet cepo Korinso, piko tokol ce kicekur kwek pikap Yiyintet cetililec om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo, wanak oko piko tokol ce mite wulyo ake tokol ce kure kaynetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, nye Mokoryontemwa oŋnku Mokoryontenyacek.
46001003	Kante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
46001004	Okostoy ani okokoy Yiyintenyu om wule amite akwek, omnye kikonok neto poypoyet kupunte Yesu Kristo.
46001005	Omnye koyomet nye oponte akwek oko Kristo kunye kukonok mokoryontit nyepo tukuk tokol, kupontokey wanak oko ŋalalet tokol oko ŋomnonet tokol.
46001006	Kikwilokis koromun om wule omite akwek lokoywek ce nöme Kristo,
46001007	nye puryo kot omuytoy monyoru kupeyok tokol ye tomite okonye ciŋoŋ Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
46001008	Mosukuripok kukwilak kuyunyoto okoy pesyet nyepo letut, sukuŋet otoku nye puryo kot oponte lelis om pesyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
46001009	Yiyintet kunye cikosekey, nyoto kunye kikurok akwek oyomekey oko Werinyi Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
46001010	Osomok ani akwek mpo yeya om kamukeywekap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo kule, ocömncine tokol om ŋalek ce oŋolole sukuŋet komo kumite pciyatet om wule omite akwek nkit. Ntene oyomekey tokol wanak om kasoteywontet akenke oŋnkotyikyi ŋolyo akenke.
46001011	Mpo yeya, kumwowo ani kupoyit manta piko alake cepo kaytap Klowe kule oponte akwek wokutyet om kwenumwoŋ.
46001012	Ŋolyontet nye omwowu kunyi kule, mwowu citake tokol om akwek ŋolyontet nye pciyat. Mwowu ake kule, “Opoye ani Paulo.’’ Kumwoy ake kule, “Opoye ani Apolo.’’ Kumwoy ake kule, “Apoye ani Kefa.’’ Kumwoy ake kule, “Opoye ani Kristo.’’
46001013	Pciyat pa Kristo? “Paulo kunye kimecok akwek om Murtowontet? Kicepatisanak akwek oyiku konomikap Paulo?’’
46001014	Okostoy ani yiyintet omnye kipuryo kot apatisan ci ake tokol om akwek, tos pate Krispo oko Kayo.
46001015	Kunyo puryo ci nye muce kumwoy kule kicepatisana om kaynetap Paulo.
46001016	(Ntene kasotyi yec kule kyapatisan ani Stefana oko pikap kanyi, ntene puryo kot omuci kot asot kule kyapatisan yec citake.)
46001017	Kipuryo kot kuyokto ani Kristo wepotisonisye, ntene kiyokto wamwayte lokoywek ce toponec, oŋnkamwayte nye puryo kot oyiyisye ŋomnonet nyepo piko sukuŋet mente kot kupokune swamet metap Kristo om murtowontet.
46001018	Omnye lokoywek ce nöme metap Kristo om murtowontet kuce sute piko co mite kupotos kule perperyo pate. Ntene cesute acek cu cemite cisopec kule swametap Yiyintet.
46001019	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Mosayarante ani ŋomnonetap piko co ŋomec, mosonumu kasoteywekap piko co muswokik.’’
46001020	Kunyo poru ŋaleca kule, mite ono piko ce ŋomec nto muswokik? Nto kirwokik ce ŋomec cepo koroni? Kukupor Yiyintet kule perperyo pate ŋomnonet nyepo koroni.
46001021	Omnye kikwiy Yiyintet kuwuyit nye puryo kot komuce konket piko neto om ŋomnonet nye nyimwa nkit. Ntene kicäm Yiyintet kule osop piko ce yene kwiyisye, ŋolyontoni. “Perperyet’’, coto ku lokoywek cu cemwoytoy acek.
46001022	Möce Yutayek cepo kakitat kule sicinket cepo manta, kucenye lamek ŋomnonet.
46001023	Cemwoytoy acek Kristo nye kimeci murtowontet, lokoywek coto kuce konokut om wule mite Yutayek oŋnkwek perperyo om wule mite lamek.
46001024	Ntene om wule mite piko co kikur Yiyintet nka Yutayek nto lamek, lokoywekyu ku Kristo nye neto kunye swamet nyepo Yiyintet oŋnku ŋomnonet nyepo Yiyintet.
46001025	Omnye kito nye porukey kuyu perperyetap Yiyintet, kunye ŋomnon nyoto kupël ŋomnonetap piko. Nto kito nye porukey kuyunye purenotatap Yiyintet kunye ponto swamet kupël swamet nyepo piko.
46001026	Mpo yeya, möce asot yawut wule kyoyunte akwek yo kikurok Yiyintet. Kuyu wule yunto sopontap koret, kipuryo kot oyiku ŋomec alake om akwek. Kipuryo kot oponte kamukeywek alake om akwek, kipuryo kot ciyweyok oyiku tokunotin alake om akwek.
46001027	Ntene kikwey Yiyintet tukuk cesute koret kupoyit perperyo sukuŋet kusornen piko co ponto ŋomnonet. Kikwey Yiyintet tukuk co sute piko kule puryo kot kuponto swamet sukuŋet kosornen piko co ponto swama.
46001028	Kikwey Yiyintet tukuk co cetoye oŋnkyenyile om koret, mpo ce puryo kot kutoku, sukuŋet kwaranta tukuk co sute koret kule ponto latik.
46001029	Poru ŋalecu kule puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce kot kusilkey om taytap Yiyintet.
46001030	Ntene kikoyomok akwek Yiyintet oko Kristo Yesu, kunyo kikwey Yiyintet Kristo kwek ŋomnonet nyinyacek, omnye kisatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet. Kiciku pikap Yiyintet, kunyo kicityacec.
46001031	Kunyo kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Ye möce ci ake tokol kule osilkey kumisyini kusilekey kito nye kikwiy Mokoryontet.’’
46002001	Mpo yeya, yo kyoconi ani wule omite akwek comwowok ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta ce woŋotin, kipuryo kot oyiyisye yoto ŋalek ce koyec oko ŋomnonet nyewo.
46002002	Omnye yo kicepontekey kyasot kule ayutye kiy ake tokol oŋnkasot Yesu Kristo nkit oko menyi nye kimeci mortowontet.
46002003	Kipuryo kot oponte swama ye kicepontekey ntene kyapotoni pate om muyotet.
46002004	Kunyo ŋalalemwani oko lokoywek ce kyomwowu kuce kipuryo kot kupo polot nyepo ŋomnon nyepo cito. Ntene kiporu kupoyit manta swametap Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.
46002005	Kunyo puryo kuroke kopurune koyenet nyimwoŋ ŋomnonet nyepo cito, ntene kopurune swametap Yiyintet.
46002006	Ntene oŋololi ani ŋalek cepo ŋomnon ye oŋololyini piko co kikilyo om koyenet, ntene puryo kot ku ŋomnon nyepo koroni nto swamet nyepo poytoyik cepo koroni ce mite yawut kucucucktoy kupoku.
46002007	Ŋomnonet nye oŋololi kunye ŋomnonet nyepo Yiyintet nye wuŋat om wule mite piko, nye kikwey Yiyintet keny kupoyit woyinto nyinyacek. Kikwiy kunyo mpo kutompo citany koret.
46002008	Puryo mpo akenke om poytoyik cepo koroni nye nkete ŋomnonet nyitenyi. Nto yunye kikikonket nto kipuryo kot kuwuyitoci cekto neto murtowontet.
46002009	Ntene kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Tukuk ce tompo kot kukäs koŋnta kenyis, nto kulim yitik, tompo kusot mukuleytap cito, tukuk coto kuce kikwiytoci Yiyintet piko co cöme cekto neto.’’
46002010	Ntene kikoporwec acek Yiyintet ŋalekyi ce wuŋotin kwiyisye Muyenyi Nyetilil. Cenye Muyet Nyetilil kiy ake tokol nka mpo nye wuŋat om wule mite Yiyintet.
46002011	Omnye ŋo nye nkete kasoteywekap cito, tos pate Muyet nye mite soponto nyenyi orit. Kuyunyoto Muyet Nyetilil kunye nket ŋalek tokol ce nöme Yiyintet.
46002012	Kunyo puryo kot cenyoru acek muyetap soponto nyepo koret, ntene kicekonec Muyet Nyetilil nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, sukuŋet cinket kokotutek tokol ce kikonec Yiyintet.
46002013	Kunyo puryo kot ceŋololi acek ciyiyisye ŋalek ce kinet ŋomnonet nyepo cito, ntene om ŋalek cepo manta ce kinet Muyet Nyetilil, ye ce mite ceŋolyini piko co ponto Muyet Nyetilil.
46002014	Puryo kot kunyoru cito nye moponto Muyet Nyetilil kokotutek ce kwone wule mite Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet. Puryo kot kunkete, sute kuyu perperyo pate, omnye nkete pate latik cikwa nkit.
46002015	Muce cito nye ponto Muyet Nyetilil kunket latik cepo kiy ake tokol, ntene puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce konket wule yunto neto.
46002016	Kuyu wule mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Ŋo nye nkete kasoteywekap Mokoryontet? Ŋo nye muce kukoci neto ŋomnonet?’’ Kunyo ceponte acek kasoteywekap Kristo.
46003001	Kunyo mpo yeya, kipuryo kot oŋololwok ani kuyu piko ce ponto Muyet Nyetilil nyoto, ntene kyoŋololwok kuyu piko cepo koroni, ce lekoy ce minkec om koyenet om wule mite Kristo.
46003002	Kyapayenak ani ceko ntene nye puryo kot ku omik ce wuyec, omnye kitompo kot ayem akwek, kunyo nka mpo yawut tompo kot ayem.
46003003	Omnye topuri kuyu piko cepo koroni. Ye tokumite corokyinotet om kwenumwakwek, oŋnkowokutosi akwek kwakwek nkit kupuryo kot kuporu coto kule oyiku piko cepo koroni cepurtoy kopurto nyepo koret?
46003004	Ye mwowu akenke om akwek kule, “Apoye ani Paulo’’ Kumwoy ake kule: “Apoye ani Apolo’’ Kupuryo ne kot oyiyisyi akwek kuyu piko cepo koret?
46003005	Ntene Apolo ku ŋo? Nto Paulo ku ŋo? Ciku acek pate mutworikap Yiyintet ce kintowok sukuŋet oyen. Yiye ci ake tokol om acek yisyet nye kikoci Yiyintet.
46003006	Ani kunye kyakole kupuswontet. Apolo kunye kipise peko kupuswontet.
46003007	Ntene Yiyintet nye kikoci kupit. Kunyo puryo kot ku nyewo koromun cito nyo kole, nto mpo nyo pise peko. Yiyintet nyewo omnye neto kunye kocini kupit.
46003008	Kerkey kwoyecin cito nyo kole oko nyo pisisyi, ntene mosukukoci Yiyintet ci ake tokol om acek kuyu wule yunto yisyet nyo kikwiy.
46003009	Omnye ciku acek piko ce kyicintosi om yisyet nyepo Yiyintet oyiku akwek mparenikap Yiyintet oŋnkoyiku koto nyenyi.
46003010	Kuyu wule yunto kokotutyet nye kikono ani, kunyo kyacec yisyet nyepo tekset kuyu cito nye ŋom, kunyo mite citake kutece kutosyi, ntene misyini kurip ci ake tokol wule tektoy.
46003011	Omnye puryo komuce citake kucec yisyet ake kusir yisyet akenke nyepo manta nyo kicece, nyoto ku Yesu Kristo.
46003012	Mosukutec piko alake koto kwiyisye Saput nto karin nyelel, nto rwontok ce piciyec, kwiyisye alak ketik nto suswek nto solik.
46003013	Kunyo mosicekäs toponiyet nyepo yisyet nyepo ci tokol om pesyet nye cone Kristo. Omnye pesyet nyoto kunye mosukuŋoŋ yisyo nyepo ci tokol, mosukusyem mata kupor wule yunto toponiyet nye ponto.
46003014	Ye kemukta mata yisyet nye kikwiy cito, mosukukoci cicoto kokotutyet.
46003015	Ntene ye kalay kupok yisyet nye kikwiy cito mosukupot yisyonoto, ntene oŋnkyisop neto kuyu nye kacilil kupunte mata.
46003016	Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule, oyiku akwek kotap Yiyintet, kunyo minye Muyet Nyetilil mukuleywekwok orit!
46003017	Ye karanta kowurta citake kotap Yiyintet, mosukwaranta Yiyintet cicoto, omnye tilil kotap Yiyintet. Kunyo oyiku akwek kotap Yiyintet.
46003018	Puryo kot kuroke kuperperkey citake nkit, ye sote citake om akwek kule oyiku ŋom, kuyu wule yunto kopurto nyepo koret, kuroke kuweckey kuperperit sukuŋet kuŋomit kupoyit manta.
46003019	Omnye kiy ake tokol nye sute koret kule po ŋomnon, kunye perperyo pate nyoto om taytap Yiyintet. Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Tëce Yiyintet piko ce ŋomec om ŋomnonemwa.’’
46003020	Kumwowu yec silutekap Yiyintet alak kule: “Nkete Yiyintet kule puryo kot kuponto latik kasoteywek cepo piko ce ŋomec.’’
46003021	Kunyo puryo ci nye misyini kusilkey om tukuk ce muce kwiy piko. Ntene cikwakwek tukuk tokol kupoyit manta.
46003022	Nto mpo Paulo nto Apolo nto Kefa, nto koret, nto soponto, nto met, nto pesyosyecu, nto pesyosyek co kwoni, kuce cikwakwek tokol.
46003023	Opoye akwek Kristo, nto Kristo kunye po neto Yiyintet.
46004001	Roke oŋnketec kule ciku acek mutworikap Kristo ce kicikoci kurip ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta ce wuŋotin.
46004002	Kito akenke nye cemokyini mutworintet nyoto ku kule kikokenekey Mokoryontet.
46004003	Kunyo asute kwek ŋolyo nye miniŋ ye komutwo ani akwek musankut, nto mpo ye komutwo piko musankut. Puryo mpo kot omutyinikey ani nkit musanku.
46004004	Puryo kot oŋnketi kule oyiku lelat, ntene puryo kuporu kule moponte lelis, Mokoryontet kunye mutwo ani musankut.
46004005	Kunyo puryo kuroke omut musanku kutompo kot kupunto pesyet nye kweyat. Möce kukany musankut okoy kuco Mokoryontet. Mosukuco oŋnkuluci lakweyet tukuk cepo menonet oŋnkupor ŋalek ce wuŋotin ce mite mukuleywekap piko orit. Yoto kuye kunyor ci tokol kakastayet ye yeme nye cone wule mite Yiyintet.
46004006	Mpo yeya, sukuŋet akalyak; koyoyeke ŋalecu tokol Apolo oko anito. Koyiyisye kwek koporunot sukuŋet oŋnket akwek kule mwowu ne ŋolyontoni, “Orip monte cekeyte silutek.’’ Puryo kuroke ci ake tokol om akwek kusil citake oŋnkunyil ake.
46004007	Ŋo nye kikoniŋ nyi yiku nyewo kupël piko alak? Kipuryo kot kukoniŋ Yiyintet tukuk tokol ce ponte? Nteye kinyoru, omne sesilkey kuyunye kipuryo kot ku kokotut?
46004008	Oponte akwek yawut tukuk tokol ce omöce! Kwomokoren keny! Kwoyeku kinkonik nka kot puryo kot ciku acek! Kunyo amöce ani kule ntoyiku akwek kinkonik sukuŋet ciku mpo acek kinkonik oko akwek.
46004009	Omnye osoti ani kule, kukupartec Yiyintet acek kiyokik ciku cepo letutap piko tokol, kuyu pic ce kocimutyi musankut cepakäc, om taytap koret oko malaykanik oko piko.
46004010	Ciku acek perper kupo kaynetap Kristo, ntene oyiku akwek ŋomec om Kristo! Puryo kot ceponte acek swamet, ntene oponte akwek swamet! Cenyilec acek, ntene ciyweyok akwek!
46004011	Ce ponte acek rupet oko melelya okoy mpo yawut. Kicilac sorokotok, cepirec, cimpokoti om koret tokol.
46004012	Kyiyisyi om swamet sukuŋet cikalyekey. Ye kocecupec, cesomnci acek cekto kupeyok. Ye kacitaŋanyec, yoto cemuytoci.
46004013	Ye kacecupec cewekyi om ŋalek cepo tolosyet. Kicekerkeyitu acek oko tutwek cepo koret. Kiciku kwontun nyepo koret okoy kupunto pantanyi.
46004014	Kosilwok ani kuyunyitenyi, ntene nye puryo kot omöce kule sukuŋet asornenok. Kayiy kuyinyi saŋet anetak kuyu lekokwani ce ocöme koromun.
46004015	Omnye nka mpo ye oponte akwek konetik kantoyik pokolwokik ce caŋ om soponwekwok om wule mite Kristo, ntene oponte Papa akenke pate. Omnye kyoyiku ani papamwoŋ om soponto nye oponte akwek om Kristo, omnye kyosutwok lokoywek ce toponec.
46004016	Kunyo kosomok kule orup wule ayunte ani.
46004017	Kunyo koyoku Timosewo kuco wule omite akwek. Neto kunye werimwani cämanet nye cikenekey om Mokoryontet. Mosukusutwok neto akwek arosyek cikwani om Kristo ce oneti pikap Yiyintet om wulyo tokol.
46004018	Kusilkey alake om akwek, kusote kule puryo kot aconi ani orutocok akwek.
46004019	Kunyo ye kacäm Mokoryontet mosaco lakwar saŋet akäs ani nkit nye puryo kot ku ŋalek ce ŋolole pate, ntene akäs mpo kito nye mokwiy piko co silekay.
46004020	Omnye Puryo kot ku ŋalek pate poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, ntene swamet.
46004021	Oŋnkono nye okweye akwek? Maconte Korokto nto maconte mukuleyto nyepo cömisyet oko tolosyet?
46005001	Kunyo kucemwoy kupoyit manta kule, oponte akwek sakwayanatet nye miyat koromun nye puryo mpo kot cenyortoy wule mite lamek co menket Yiyintet. Kucemwowo kule purtoykey cito korketap kwan!
46005002	Kunyo omuci akwek osilkey kulene? Roke onerekisye koromun, oŋnkokwet cito nye kweye ŋaleca kuŋete wule amite akwek!
46005003	Ntene nka kot amite wule low om porto om wule omite akwek, ntene opontekey oko akwek om kasoteywekwani om kaynetap Mokoryontet. kwomutyi ani keny musankut cito nye kikwiy ŋolyontoni miyat.
46005004	Kunyo ye koyomekey akwek wanak, oŋnkyepontekey oko akwek om kasoteywekwani om swametap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo nye mitowune wule cemite acek.
46005005	Yoto kuye roke okoyte portap cicoto kuwo wule mite Setanit kyaranta, sukuŋet cesor soponto nyenyi om pesyetap Mokoryontet.
46005006	Puryo kot kuroke osilkey akwek! Oŋnketi ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Kocini mumarek ce tukusic kukut pusyek tokol.’’
46005007	Misyini onumu mumaryantani nye ponto miyotyet nyepo keny sukuŋet otililitu onyolu akwek topon, sukuŋet akerkeyitu oko pusyek ce puryo kot cetase mumarek, kuyu wulo oŋnketi ani kule oyiye akwek kuyunyoto. Kunyo kukwitita keny sakwenyo nyepo Keytayet, omnye kicekon Kristo nye Keciryetap korosyontet nyepo sakwetap Keytayet!
46005008	Möce kyam kunyo sakwenyo nye puryo kot ku mukatyantet nyepo keny nyepo miyotyet oko sakwayanatet, ntene om mukatyantet nye moponto mumaryantet, nyoto ku mukatyantet nyepo tililinto oko manta.
46005009	Om parwet nyo kyosilwok ani, kyomwowok kule monte ciyomekey oko piko to sakwoyonot.
46005010	Ntene kipuryo omwowu kule piko ce menket Yiyintet, co sakwoyonot nto co moroŋis nto ce yirye ntarastinek nto co soye kerkeyik! Omnye ye kotay akwek cekto kuporkey kule kaŋete koret sukuŋet komonyortosi oko cekto.
46005011	Ŋolyontet nye kyomwowu kunyi kule, puryo kot kurok kot oyomekey akwek oko cito nye kurekey kule oyiku yeya oŋnkurok yec kwiye sakwayanat nto moroŋya nto nye soye kerkeyik nto nye perpersyi nto nye pokite nto nye corsyi. Monte mpo cipur oŋnkoyomisyi oko cito nye yunyo!
46005012	-
46005013	Ntene puryo kot ku yisyemwani omutyi musanku piko cepo saŋ. Yiyintet kunye mosukumutyi cekto musankut. Ntene puryo ra kot kurok omutyi akwek musankut piko cepo lukemwoŋ? Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Onumune kucone lukemwoŋ cito nye miyat.’’
46006001	Ye ponto citake om akwek wokutyet oko yeya ake, kuroke kulene kusut neto musankut kuwo wule mite piko ce menket Yiyintet, ye kotomwocini kusat ŋaleca pikap Yiyintet.
46006002	Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule pikap Yiyintet kuce mutyini musankut koret? Kunyo ye akwek kuce mosomutyi musankut koret, kupuryo kot omuci mpo kot amut musankut cepo ŋalek ce tukusic?
46006003	Puryo kot oŋnket kule acek kuce mosicemutyi malaykanik musankut? Mosukupurunenec kulene mocemut musankut nyepo soponto nyitenyi?
46006004	Kunyo nteye kakwa ŋalek ce yucoto mososut ra ŋaleca kupa wule mite piko co menkete wule yunto koyenet nyepo pikap Yiyintet?
46006005	Ŋolyo nyo nyepo kalilan koromun om wule omite! Puryo kot kumite cito akenke wule omite akwek nye ŋom nye muce kumut musankunek cepo mpo yeya?
46006006	Ntene kwere yeya ake yeya ake wokuwosontyi om taytap piko co menket Yiyintet.
46006007	Kunyo poru kule kwosute koromun omnye owosontyinikey nkit. Omne macäm akwek ye kalel citake kwiwok miyotyet? Omne mocäm akwek ye kanyapanak piko alake?
46006008	Kunyo yec oyicinikey akwek nkit miyotyonik, onyapankey akwek nkit oŋnkocorokyikey nkit mpo yeya!
46006009	Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule puryo komuce kot kunyor ci nye miyat poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Monte ciperperkey omnye puryo kot kunyoru poytoyisyetap Yiyintet piko ce, syepisyi koruk, nto ce soye kerkeyik, nto ce sakwoyot, nto co cesyepekey moronik nkit,
46006010	nto ce corsyi, nto pokitisyek, nto ceŋomsi, nto ce ponisyi, nto ce moroŋis, nto ce corik.
46006011	Kyokerkeykey akwek picoto, ntene kiciwunok om miyotyonik oŋnkyikoytok opoyitu Yiyintet. Kicesatak onyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo om Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintenyo.
46006012	Mosukumwoy citake kule, “Ce cömwo ani ayiy kiy ake tokol.’’ Yunyoto, ntene puryo kot kutoponec tukuk tokol. Omuci omwowu kule, “Ce cömwo ani ayiy kiy ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ocöme kot kusuto kito ake oyiku mutworintenyi.’’
46006013	Mosukumwoy citake kule, “Po omik moyet, oŋnkupo moyet omik.’’ Yunyoto manta, ntene mosukunum Yiyintet coto tukway. Porto nyepo cito kunye puryo kot kupo sakwayanat, ntene po Mokoryontet nto Mokoryontet kunye poye porto.
46006014	Kiŋet Yiyintet Mokoryontet Yesu kotutune met oŋnku neto kunye mosukuŋetec citutune met om swamenyi.
46006015	Oŋnket akwek kule porwonik cikwok kuce kereryanik cepo portap Kristo. Omuci ra anäm kereryantet nyepo portap Kristo oŋnkayiy kwek portap korko ce moroniyo? Memukoktos!
46006016	Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule ye kokuyomo cito porto nyenyi oko korko nye cemoroniyo kukokwek akenke oko neto? Poru silutekap Yiyintet kutok topon kule, “Mosukwek picoto oyenku porto akenke.’’
46006017	Ntene ye keyomokey cito oko Mokoryontet kokwek Muyet nyenyi akenke oko neto.
46006018	Asanekey sakwayanat. Puryo kot kowurtoy cito porto ye kayiy miyotyonik alak tokol, ntene wurtoy cito porto nyenyi nkit ye kayiy sakwayanatet.
46006019	Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule porto nyemwoŋ kunye kotap Yiyintet nye minye Muyet Nyetilil? Puryo kot opoyekey akwek nkit, ntene opoye Yiyintet.
46006020	Kikwalenak akwek neto peyit nyewo, kunyo oyiyisye porwonikwok kukasta woyintap Yiyintet.
46007001	Kunyo teputyet nye nöme ŋalek co kyosile akwek. Topon ye kepur cito nye motinye korko.
46007002	Ntene omnye mite syemutok cepo sakwayanatet, kuroke kuponto ci tokol korkenyi; oŋnkuroke kuponto korko tokol santenyi.
46007003	Roke kwiy morono koyitita yisyenyi kuyu moron, oŋnkuroke kwiy korko koyitita yisyenyi tokol kuyu korko; oŋnkoyitita ci ake tokol om cekto kito nye möce ake.
46007004	Puryo kot kupoytoy korko porto nyenyi, ntene santenyi nye poytoy, kunyo puryo mpo kot kupoytoy santet porto nyenyi, ntene korket nye poytoy.
46007005	Monte cetoyekay tos pate ye kocömncine tukway, sukuŋet onyoru poroyinto nye osome, oŋnkoyomkey yec sukuŋet mente kot kunyor Setanit poroyinto nye kasyemenak omnye korom ye moripkey.
46007006	Komwowok ŋalecu, nye puryo kot kokonok kwek ntarastit, ntene ŋolyo nyepo ŋomnon.
46007007	Amöce kule ntepur piko tokol kuyu wule oyunte ani, ntene ponto ci tokol kokotutyet nye kikokoci Yiyintet. Kicikoci citake kokotutyet nyi, cikoci citake kokotutyet ake.
46007008	Kunyo, omwocini ani piko co puryo kot komütis oko koruk musukik, kule topon koromun ye kopur akwek nkit kuyu wule ayunte ani.
46007009	Ntene nye puryo omuci kot akarekte makatet nyepo porwonikwok, omütisye moronik oŋnkyimütak koruk. Omnye topon ye kocimütis kusir ye kotoloytos porwonik cikwok.
46007010	Oponte ntarastit nyepo piko co kikomütis, nye puryo kot ku nyimwani nkit ntene po Mokoryontet: puryo kot kumisyini kupakakta korko santenyi.
46007011	Ye kotepe kot kwiy kuyunyo, kumisyini wokopur kwine nkit, nto kuŋalal oko santenyi okoy kucämnkey yec. Puryo kot kumisyini kukwet morono korkenyi.
46007012	Omwocini piko alak tokol, (ani nye omwowu puryo kot ku Mokoryontet) kule, ye ponto cito nye Kristoyin korket nye puryo kot kucömis oŋnkucäm korkonoto kule opurtkey oko neto, kupuryo kot kumisyini kukwet korkonoto.
46007013	Nteye kemüt korko nye Kristoyin cito nye puryo kot kucömis oŋnkucäm cicoto kule opurtkey korkonoto kupuryo kot kumisyini kukwetkey korkonoto.
46007014	Omnye cewece kuyen Yiyintet cito nye puryo kot kucömis ye keyomokey oko korkenyi, oŋnkuwec kuyen Yiyintet korket nye puryo kot kucömis ye keyomokey oko santenyi nye Kristoyin. Nto yunye kipuryo kot kuyunyoto nto kuyeku lekokwa lekoy ce menket Yiyintet, ntene kuyu wule yunto; cöme Yiyintet cekto.
46007015	Ntene ye möce citake tokol nye puryo kot kucömis kule ayaste cito nye Kristoyin kuroke kwiy nyoto kuyunyoto. Om ŋalek cayucoto, kuponto kukwey nkit cito nye Kristoyin nye morn nto korko. Omnye kikurok akwek Yiyintet opurte kalyet.
46007016	Nyi korko nye Kristoyin nketyine nto muci pesyet ake kot sop santeŋuŋ nye puryo kot ku Kristoyin. Ntenyi santet nketyine nyi nto muci pesyet ake sop korkeŋuŋ.
46007017	Kutosyikey kopur ci tokol kopurto kuyu wulo yunto kokotutyet nye kikoci Yiyintet, oŋnkuyu wule kiyunto ye kikure Yiyintet neto, ntarastit nyitenyi nye oneti ani pikap Yiyintet tokol.
46007018	Ye kecäm cito nye wonat kursetap Yiyintet, kupuryo kuroke kunum pelutyet nyepo wonset. Ye kacam cito nye mawonat kursetap Yiyintet, kupuryo kot kuroke cewon.
46007019	Omnye ye kicewoniŋ nto ye puryo kot cewoniŋ, ŋolyontet nyewo kuye kaciywey ntarastinekap Yiyintet.
46007020	Misyini kopur ci tokol kuyu wule yunto yo kicöme kursetap Yiyintet.
46007021	Kiyiku ra mtuworin yo kikuriŋ nyi Yiyintet? Kunyo mente asot, ntene ye ponto poroyinto kot cityanciŋ kuroke yiyisye.
46007022	Omnye neto nyo kikur Mokoryontet ku mutworin kunye kikwek citap Mokoryontet nye kicityac, kuyunyoto mpo cito nye tyakat nye kikur Kristo, kunye kikwek nyoto mtuworintenyi.
46007023	Kikwalak akwek Yiyintet, kunyo monte ciku mutwor cepo piko.
46007024	Mpo yeya, roke ci tokol kopurto koyomotet oko Yiyintet kuyu wule yunto kopurto yo kicekure neto.
46007025	Kunyo, ŋolyontet nye nöme piko co tompo komütis: puryo kot oponte ntarastit nye cöne wule mite Mokoryontet, ntene kakonok kasoteywekwani kuyu ci nye ponto latik nye roke cikenekey om poypoyetap Mokoryontet.
46007026	Kuyu wule yunto toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyecu, kasot ani kule roke kopur cito kuyu wule yunto.
46007027	Ye kimütisye nyi mente asyem kule akwet korket. Ye tompo kot mütisye nyi. Mente asot kule amütisye.
46007028	Ntene ye kemütisye kupuryo kot yiy miyotyo. Nteye kacimüt korko nye tompo kot cimüt; kupuryo kot kwiy neto miyotyo. Ntene mosukutaŋany toŋoŋutek cepo koret piko co kemütis kunyo amoce ani kule osopok akwek coto.
46007029	Mpo yeya, ŋolyontet nye omwowok kunyi kule, komo kumite poroyinto nye yeme! Kunyo kuceke yawut kuwo tay, misyini kopur piko co kikomütis kuyunye tompo komütis.
46007030	Kopur piko co rirtos kuyunye monerekyotin, kopur piko co rorye kuyunye puryo kot kunerekyotin. Kopur co olyoyisyi kuyunye puryo kot kuponto tukuk ce kikwal.
46007031	Kopur piko co yiyisye tukukap koret kuyunye puryo kot kusute tukucoto kasoteywekwa. Omnye kuyu wule yunto koret yawut, kunye komo kopure kuloyit.
46007032	Amöce ani kule oyiku akwek piko ce puryo kot kusote koromun. Sote cito nye puryo kot komütis yisyetap Mokoryontet, möce kule aŋerec Mokoryontet.
46007033	Ntene sote cito nye kikomütis ŋalek ce nöme koret, omnye möce kule aŋerec korkenyi.
46007034	Kunyo cicute neto om komoswokik oyeny. Sote yisyetap Mokoryontet korko nye puryo kot cimüt, nto cepto nye mukul nye menket morn, omnye möce kule kutililit porto oko soponto, ntene sote korko nye kicimüt ŋalekyi cepo koret omnye möce kule aŋerec santenyi.
46007035	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalecu omnye amöce kule akalyak. Puryo kot asyeme kule akonok nyikisinto, ntene amöce kule ayiy akwek ŋolyontet nyepo manta nye rotat oŋnkokoytekey ayiy yisyetap Mokoryontet nye puryo kot omune.
46007036	Nto om wule mite cito nye köse kule puryo kot opuri topon om wule mite cepto nye möce neto kule amüt, oŋnkuponto makatet nyewo, kuroke kwiy kuyu wule moktoy komütkey, omnye puryo kot kumite miyotyo.
46007037	Ntene ye kokuwoŋnkyi cito om mukuleynyi nkit nye puryo kot cisimnci, oŋnkukwilat om kasoteywekyi kule marup kuyu yeya, oŋnkuwoŋnkyi kito nye möce kule ayiy, kakwiy topon ye kayiy kuyunyoto.
46007038	Kunyo sukuŋet kwiy topon cito nye kemüt cepto, oŋnkwiye mpo topon kusirto cito nye puryo kot komüt cepto.
46007039	Puryo kot kutyakat korko nye kicimüt ye tokusope santenyi, ntene ye kame santenyi yoto kunyor poroyinto kuwo wokomüt santet ake nye kacäm neto. Ntene oŋnkumisyini kwek kamütisyet nyepo Kristayek.
46007040	Ntene möce kopurto ŋerekwek ye kepur nye puryo kot cimüt. Kasoteywekwani cutecu oŋnkosoti kule oponte Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.
46008001	Kunyo, yawut ŋolyontet nye nöme omik ce kocesoci Kerkeyik. Cinket kuyu wulo cemwoytoy kule, “Ceponte acek tokol ŋomnonet.’’ Ntene ŋomnonet nyoto kunye sute cito kusutkey parak om silotet, ntene teksi cömisyet.
46008002	Ye sote cito kule oŋnketi kito ake, kunye menkete kiyoto kupoyit manta kuyu wule misyini.
46008003	Ntene cito nye cöme Yiyintet kunye nkete Yiyintet mpene cicoto.
46008004	Kunyo ŋolyontet nye nöme ye kakyam omik ce kocesoci karkeyik, cinket acek kule kerkeyinto kunye kiy pate nye puryo kot kumite koret mpo kisic. Cinket kule mite Yiyintet akenke pate nkit.
46008005	Omnye nka kot kumite co cekure kule yiyik ce caŋ oko mokorenik ce caŋ.
46008006	Nto om acek kumite Yiyintet nye Papa akenke nkit pate, nye kitoŋintet nyepo tukuk tokol, oŋnku nye cesope acek om neto, oŋnkumite Mokoryontet akenke Yesu Kristo nye kicitany tukuk tokol kupunte neto, oŋnku nye cesoptosi acek om wule mitowune neto.
46008007	Ntene puryo kuponto ci tokol ŋomnoni. Kikonketune piko alake kerkeyik kuloyit. Kunyo okoy yawut ye kam omik ce kocesoci kerkeyik kusot kule kakyam ce punyo kot kupo Yiyintet, ntene omnye moponto kasoteywek cikwa swamet kusot kule kakwiy miyotyet.
46008008	Omik kuce puryo kot komuce kusat kunyol soponwekyo om wule mite Yiyintet, puryo kot kupotwec acek kiy ye mnakyam, oŋnkupuryo kot cenyoru kutos kiy ye kakyam.
46008009	Kunyo oripkey, monte kyiy kuyunyoto omnye muce piko alak ce puryo kot kuponto swamet kosuci miyotyet.
46008010	Omnye ye kakäsiŋ cito nye puryo kot kuponto swamet mite nyi nyo yiku ŋom yomisyi om kotap kerkeyik kupuryo kotitire cicoto ŋalecato kwam omik ce kocesoci kerkeyik.
46008011	Kunyo mokwaran cicitenyi moponto swamet, omnye kesac ŋomnonet nyeŋunyi. Yeya nyitenyi kunyo kimecini Yesu Kristo neto.
46008012	Kunyo om aret nyeyunyitenyi, keyiy nyi miyotyet om wule mite Kristo oŋnkiyiy miyotyet om wule mite yeyaŋuŋ oŋnkipar kasoteywek cikwa co moponto swamet.
46008013	Kunyo, ye muce kusutyi omik kosuto yeyamwani komo oyome ani yec penynto mpo kisic, sukuŋet mente kot osutyi kosuto yeyamwani.
46009001	Puryo kot oyiku ani ne cito nye tyakat? Puryo kot oyiku kiyokintet? Tompo kot akäs ani ne Mokoryontenyo Yesu? Puryo kot oyiku akwek ne pikap Mokoryontet om yisyet nye kyayiy ani?
46009002	Nka kot puryo kot kucöme piko alake kule ayiku ani kiyokintet, ntene ocöme akwek, omnye akwek pelutyet nye poru kule ayiku ani kiyokintet nyepo Mokoryontet.
46009003	Ye karenya piko, ŋalek ce omwowu ye oyetekey kucu kule.
46009004	Puryo kot ceponte acek ne kamukeywek kyam omik oŋnkyeyesye kupo yisyet nye kiciy?
46009005	Puryo kot ceponte kamukeywek cepetekey korko kuyu piko ce tupco om Mokoryontet. Kuyu wulo kyiytoy kiyokik alake oko mpo Kefa oko mpo yeyanyitap Mokoryontet.
46009006	Nto acek nkit so oko Parnapa ce yiyisyi sukuŋet cenyoru omik ce kyome?
46009007	Kikäs ŋo kenyis sikorin nye pcicinikey musyaret nkit? Nto kikäs ŋo kopotin nye puryo kot kwome omik cepo mparenyi? Nto mesewontet oŋnkono nye puryo kot kulwe ceko cepo kecirekyi?
46009008	Omwowu ani so ŋalecu om kamukeywek cepo cito? Puryo kot kumwowu ntarastinek kuyunyoto?
46009009	Omnye kicesil om ntarastinekap Moses kule, “Mente arat yeyto kutit ye mite kuwore nkanuk.’’ Kunyo sote pa Yiyintet yeyto?
46009010	Kimwoy Yiyintet ŋalecato kunämec acek. Kicesil ŋalecutecu kunämec kupoyit manta! Cito nye potisyi mparet oko cito nye wore omik, kuce yiyisyi kukene kule cepcicine omik.
46009011	Kicekol acek om wule omite akwek kupuswek cepo Yiyintet. Kunyo ŋolyo pa nyepo kakitat ye kokenyoru acek latik cepo kisisyet om wule omite akwek.
46009012	Nteye ponto piko alake kamukeywek kunyor latik om wule omite akwek, kupuryo kot ceponte acek ne kamukeywek ce pëlisyi? Ntene tompo kot kyiyisye acek kamukeyweca, kunyo kucemuytoci wuyinwek tokol sukuŋet mente kot cesutyi konokut aret nyepo lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo.
46009013	Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule, nyortoy piko co yiyisyi kotap Yiyintet omik kukwane kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkupicicintos omikap korosek piko co koytoy korosek om otepto nye pele korosek.
46009014	Kunyo kimwoy Mokoryontet kuyunyoto kule roke kunyoru musyaret piko co mwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec om yisyet nye yiye.
46009015	Ntene tompo kot oyiyisye ani kamukeyweco mpo akenke. Kunyo puryo mpo kot osile yawut parwani kule sukuŋet kyiwo yunyoto. Omnye puryo ci nye muce kuwec silotet nyimwani kwek ŋalek cepo püc pate, roke amey ani kusir ye kotoyostoy kukerekta citake ye mosilkey.
46009016	Puryo kot oponte ani kamukeywek osilkey pate omnye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec, ntene kicemwowo kule yiy kuyunyoto. Kunyo ŋolyo nye miyat koromun ye puryo kot amwayte lokoywek ce toponec!
46009017	Nto kyayiy yisyet omnye ocöme nkit nto kwomoce kule cekono musyaret, ntene oyiye kuyu yisyo nye kikono Yiyintet.
46009018	Kunyo onyoru musyara ne? Onyoru pate musyaret nye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec nye puryo kot amöce kule cekono kiy, nye puryo mpo kot oyiyisye kwapi kamukeywek om yisyemwani nyepo lokoywek ce toponec.
46009019	Oyiku ani tyakat nye puryo kot oyiku mutworin nyepo citake tokol, ntene aweckey oyiku mutworin nyepo ci tokol sukuŋet awec ce caŋ kuyu wule mukoktos.
46009020	Ye amite oyiyisyi om wule mite Yutayek, apuri kuyu Yutoyin sukuŋet awec cekto, nka kot kupuryo kot omite ŋonyutap ntarastinekap Moses, ntene opuri kuyu nye poyto ye amite oyiyisyi oko piko cepoytoy ntarastinek sukuŋet awec cekto.
46009021	Kuyunyoto ye opontekey lamek, opuri kuyu lamek, ce moponto ntarastinek sukuŋet awec lamek. Puryo kot kuporu coto kule moyweyi ani ntarastinek omnye poyto ntarastinekap Kristo.
46009022	Apuri ani kuyunye moponte koyenet nyepo swamet ye pontekey oko piko ce moponto koyenet nyepo swamet sukuŋet awec cekto. Kyoyiku kiy tokol om wulo mite tokol, sukuŋet onyoru piko ce mosoru.
46009023	Oyiye ŋalecu tokol kupo toponiyetap lokoywek ce toponec sukuŋet onyoru kupeyokyi.
46009024	Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule konye mweyek piko tokol ce mwenekey ntene pëlisyi akenke nye nyoru kokututyet. Kunyo okonyi akwek mweyek sukuŋet opëlisye onyoru kokotutyet.
46009025	Ripekey koromun ci ake tokol nye mite wule cinete piko co konye mweyek. Yiye kuyunyoto kule cenyoru kokotutyet nyepo nkwatyet nyepo taptet nye poku lakwar. Ntene kyiye acek kule cenyoru kokotutyet nye mopoku.
46009026	Kunyo akonyi ani otyikini kule awaŋnte topon. Puryo kot otuluci ani kuyu ci nye tuluce tapan.
46009027	Otoŋonyi porto nyimwani oŋnkorip sukuŋet mente kot cetaya om letut ye komwoci piko alak lokoywek.
46010001	Mpo yeya, amöce ani kule oŋnket akwek kito nye kikwiyakay om wule mite mpo kukonyo co kirupe Moses. Kilum kukerekta polyet cekto tokol okoy kway topon tokol ruretyet nye arrar.
46010002	Kicepatisan cekto tokol om polyet oko ruretyet kwek konomikap Moses.
46010003	Kikwam tokol mukatyantet nyepo Yiyintet,
46010004	oŋnkuye tokol peko cekosune wule mite Yiyintet ce kikwone rwantetap Yiyintet. Rwantet nyoto kunye kipesetoti oko cekto nyoto kunye Kristo.
46010005	Ntene kipuryo kot kuŋerec Yiyintet om wule mite cekto ce caŋ, kunyo kiseretyi muswek cikwa koret nyepo kitela.
46010006	Kunyo porwec tukucutecu kusowec acek tokol kule puryo kot kuroke cecäm tukuk cepo miyotyo kuyu wule kiyunto cekto.
46010007	Nto mpo kule cesay kerekeyik kuyu wulo kikwiyta alake om cekto, kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kipur piko ŋony kwomis oŋnkuyesyo oŋnkuŋetyo kutum.’’
46010008	Puryo kot kumisyini ceyiy acek sakwayanat kuyu wulo kikwiyta alake om cekto okoy kupok pesyet akenke alake om cekto ce kiyite elifunek tiptem ok somok.
46010009	Puryo kot kumisyini cesyem acek Mokoryontet kuyu wule kikwiyta alake om cekto okoy kupakäc erenok cekto.
46010010	Puryo kumisyini kot aŋunyŋuny akwek kuyu wule kikwiyta alake om cekto okoy kupakäc malayket nyepo met cekto.
46010011	Kikwiyokis ŋaleca om wule mite cek sukuŋet kwek koporunot om wule mite piko alake, kunyo kicesil ŋalecato sukuŋet kusowec acek. Omnye ce mite acek pesyosyek ce karik kuponto pesyet nyepo letut.
46010012	Cito nye sote kule omite koyony topon kuroke kuripkey sukuŋet mente kosuto.
46010013	Syemutok tokol ce kokwontyok kuce kerkey oko syemutok cepo kwak ce kwontyini piko tokol. Ntene ripe Yiyintet kurtoyenyi, kunyo puryo kot kucöme kule cesyemak akwek kusir wule tento swamet nyimoŋ. Ntene ye kasyemak mosukukonok neto swamet nye omukte oŋnkuporwok aret nye mopunte.
46010014	Kunyo coronutekwani, oripkey monte cesay kerekiyik.
46010015	Oŋololwok kuyu piko ce oyiku ŋomec, kunyo akäs akwek nkit ŋalek ce mwowu ani.
46010016	Cikompet nyepo kupeyok nye cikoste acek Yiyintet kunye puryo kot ceyemntoy acek om korotikap Kristo ye koceyesye cikompet nyenyi? Nto Mukatyantet nyo cepeteci kunye puryo kot ceyemntoy cepcicine om portap Kristo ye kyome?
46010017	Mite mukatyantet akenke pate, kunyo nka kot ciku acek caŋ, ntene ciku porto akenke. Omnye ceyemntoy cepcicine mukatyantet nyoto akenke.
46010018	Asot pa Yutayek piko co ome korosek ce cikoytoy kuce yemntoy kupcicin yisyetap Yiyintet om otepto nye pele korosek.
46010019	Ŋolyo ne nye amoce ani kule omwowu? Amoce pa kule omwowu kule, kerekeyin nto kito nye kicikoci kerekeyinto kunye kiy nyepo latik?
46010020	Puryo kot kuyunyo! Komwowu kule kiy nye kocesoci oyik om mesetap piko co menket Yiyintet kuce kocikoci coto kupoyit oyik, ntene puryo kot kocikoci Yiyintet. Kunyo puryo amoce ani kule ayomekey akwek oko oyik.
46010021	Puryo kot omuci akwek ayemnte oyesye cikompet nyepo Mokoryontet oŋnkoyesye yec cikompet nyepo oyik. Kunyo puryo kot omuci oyomisye mesetap Mokoryontet oŋnkoyomisye yec mesetap oyik.
46010022	Nto ce möce acek kule kunyer Mokoryontet? Cisoti acek kule ceponte swamet kupël neto?
46010023	Cemwowu kule, “Ce comwec kyiy kiy ake tokol.’’ Yunyoto, ntene puryo kot kuponto latik tukuk tokol. “Ce comwec kyiy kiy ake tokol’’, ntene puryo kot kuponto kakalyayet tukuk tokol.
46010024	Puryo ci nye roke kumwoy kule acenye tukuk ce nöme neto nkit, ntene möce kuköse tukuk ce nöme piko alak.
46010025	Omuci akwek ayal kiy ake tokol nye kyoloy om motepetap panyek nye puryo kot atepe kupo ŋalek ce nöme kasoteywekwok.
46010026	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Po Mokoryontet koret oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit.’’
46010027	Ye kokurok akwek cito nye tompo kocömis kule kwa yomisye omik oŋnkocäm roke oyam kiy ake tokol nye kacekonok nye puryo kot otepe ŋolyo nye nöme kasoteywekwok.
46010028	Ntene ye komwowok citake kule, “Kocesoci omicu kerekeyik.’’ Mente kyam yoto omicoto kupo toponiyet nyepo cito nyo komwowok oŋnkupo toponiyet nyepo kasoteywekyi.
46010029	Puryo kot ku cekuk kasoteywek coto, ntene po cito nyin ake. Kunyo mokutep citake kule, “Omne sukurip kasoteywek cepo cito ake kito nye mayiy ani?
46010030	Ye kakaste ani Yiyintet om omikyu, omne sukurenya ani citake om omik ce oyome okostoy Yiyintet?’’
46010031	Kunyo, kiy ake tokol nye oyiye akwek ye koyomisyi, nto ye koyesyi, kumöce oyiye coto tokol kupo woyintap Yiyintet.
46010032	Opuri kapurto nye puryo kot komuce kusutyi Yutayek wuyinto nto mpo lamek nto mpo pikap Yiyintet.
46010033	Opuri kuyu wulo opurtoy ani. Omnye asyeme kule aŋerec ci tokol om tukuk tokol ce ayiye nye puryo kot asotyini toponiyet nyimwani nkit, ntene om toponiyetap piko tokol kule, sukuŋet cesoru cekto kusopco.
46011001	Kunyo orup wule ayunte ani, kuyu wulo arupe ani wule yunto Kristo.
46011002	Okostok ani akwek, omnye osoti okokoy oŋnkorup kanetisyet nye kyanetak.
46011003	Ntene möce kule oŋnket akwek kule Kristo kunye nyewo om wule mite ci ake tokol. Nyewo santet om wule mite korkenyi, kunyo nyewo Yiyintet om wule mite Kristo.
46011004	Kunyo ci tokol nye mwoytoy ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om sayet nyepo piko tokol kuyenot metit nyenyi kesornen cicoto Kristo.
46011005	Nto korko nye soye nto mwoytoy ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om sayet nyepo piko tokol kupuryo kot koyen metinyi kunye kesornen korkonoto santenyi. Omnye kerkey nye rwakat metinyi.
46011006	Ye puryo kot kuyen korko metinyi, kuroke kurwac putek, ntene omnye kiy nyepo kalilan ye karwac korko metit, kunyo roke kuyen metinyi.
46011007	Puryo kot kuroke kuyen morono metinyi omnye poru tonto oko woyintap Yiyintet. Ntene poru korko woyinto nyepo cito.
46011008	Omnye kipuryo kot citany moron kucone wule mite korko, ntene kicone korko wule mite morono.
46011009	Kipuryo mpo kot citany moron kupo korko, ntene kicitany korko kupo moron.
46011010	Kunyo misyini kuponto korko kito nye yene metinyi kupo malaykanik nye poru kule poytoy santenyi neto.
46011011	Ntene om soponto nyepo Mokoryontenyo, puryo kot kumite korko ye puryo moron, oŋnkupuryo kot kumite morono ye puryo korko.
46011012	Kuyu wulo kicitany Korko kucone wule mite morono, kuyunyoto kunyo iye yawut korko moron, ntene kwone tukuk tokol wule mite Yiyintet.
46011013	Amut akwek nkit musankut, misyini pa kusome korko om tuyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet ye puryo kuyen metit?
46011014	Puryo kot kunetak akwek ne koret kule sornon ye kepit morono putek?
46011015	Ntene toponec kuromun putek om wule mite korko, kicikoci neto putek ce koyec sukuŋet kuyene metit.
46011016	Ye möce citake kule otinten, ŋalek tokol ce omwowu ani kucu, puryo kot ceponte acek nto mpo pikap Yiyintet kopurto ake nyepo sayet.
46011017	Puryo kot okostok ani akwek om ŋalek cu amöce omwowok, ye koyomekey akwek om sayet nyimwoŋ oyiye ce miyotec ye kotoyiye ce toponec.
46011018	Nyepo tayta kunyi kule, kicemwowo kule mite piko ce tintentyinos kupciykey ye koyomekey akwek pikap Yiyintet. Acöme ani kule pesyet ake po manta ŋaleca.
46011019	Omnye roke kumite pciyatet om wule omite akwek sukuŋet cinket kutok piko cepo manta.
46011020	Ye koyomekey akwek wanak kupuryo kot okwoni kule kwokyam omikap Mokoryontet.
46011021	Omnye ye oyomisyi kutosyinikey citake kwan omikyi nkit okoy kwam alak rupet, kupokit piko alake.
46011022	Omne? Puryo kot oponte akwek korikwok wule oyomisye oŋnkoyesye? Oŋnkokoci kolilonis piko ce moponto kiy? Nto onyile akwek pikap Yiyintet? Momwowok ani ne? Makastak om ŋalecato? Puryo kot okostok.
46011023	Omnye ŋalek ce kikono ani Mokoryontet kuce kyanetak kule; om kwomowut nyo kiceŋomntoy neto, kunäm yoto Mokoryontet Yesu Mukatyantet,
46011024	oŋnkusomci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye pormwani nye kacekonok akwek, oyiye kuyunyi ye asoteno ani.’’
46011025	Kuyunyoto om letutap omik, kunäm cikompet oŋnkumwoy kule, “Cikomponi kunye kirotyet nyelel nyepo Yiyintet nye kociporune pelutyet nyepo korotik. Ye koye akwek, oyiye kuyunyoto ye asoteno ani.’’
46011026	Omnye om pesyo tokol ye kayam Mukatyantet oŋnkoye cikomponi kuye omwoytoy yoto metap Mokoryontet okoy kuco neto.
46011027	Kunyo, ye kam citake mukatyantet oŋnkuye cikomponi om aret nye puryo kot kuyeme mosukulel cicoto kowurta porto oko koritikap Mokoryontet.
46011028	Kunyo misyini kukaskey citake nkit topon kunyo kutompo kwam mukatyantet oŋnkuye cikompet.
46011029	Omnye ye puryo kot konkete neto kito nye poru portap Mokoryontet ye ome mukatyantet oŋnkuyesye cikompet ku kosutyikey cicoto nkit musankut ye mite kwomisyi oŋnkuyesyi.
46011030	Yunyoto sukuŋet kumnyonis moponto swamet alake ce caŋ om akwek, oŋnkupotyo mpo alak.
46011031	Ye kocemutyikey acek nkit musankut nyepo manta, kupuryo kot cemutwec musankut.
46011032	Ntene omnye Mokoryontet kunye mutwec musankut oŋnkupirec, sukuŋet mente cemutwec musankut wanak oko koret.
46011033	Kunyo mpo yeya, ye koyomekey akwek wanak kule kyam omikap Mokoryontet, roke akanynkey tokol.
46011034	Nteye ponto cito ake rupet, ku misyini kwomis kunyo kanyi, sukuŋet mente kumutwok akwek Yiyintet musankut ye koyomekey wanak. Nto ŋalek ce nöme tukuk alak mosicasat ani ye kaco.
46012001	Mpo yeya, amöce ani kule oŋnket akwek ŋalek cepo manta, ce nöme kokotutek ce kwone wule mite Muyet Nyetilil.
46012002	Oŋnket kule yo kito oyiku akwek pic ce monket Yiyintet, ku kipoytok yoto kerkeyik ce moponto sopon ce kimosok omosokisye.
46012003	Kunyo misyini oŋnket kule puryo ci nye ntocini Muyet Nyetilil nye muce kot kucupis kumwoy kule, “Kupot Yesu.’’ Oŋnkupuryo ci nye muce kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Yesu kunye Mokoryontet,’’ okoy ye ntocini Muyet Nyetilil nyoto.
46012004	Mite kokotutek ce pciyotin wok ce caŋ, ntene konu tokol Muyet Nyetilil akenke.
46012005	Mite mpo arosyek wok ce caŋ ye cikolyoyisyi, ntene keyicini Mokoryontet akenke.
46012006	Mite arosyek wok ce caŋ wule muce cito kwiyiyta yisyonutek, ntene Yiyintet akenke nye kocini ci ake tokol kwiy yisyonutek tokol.
46012007	Kocini Muyet Nyetilil ci ake tokol kopur wule yunto, sukuŋet kukalya piko tokol.
46012008	Kocini Muyet Nyetilil cito ake ŋomnonet oŋnkukoci Muyet nyitenyi akenke cito ake lokoywek cepo konketotet.
46012009	Kocini Muyet nyitenyi akenke cito ake koyenet, oŋnkukoci cito ake swamet nye sopse.
46012010	Kocini Muyet Nyetilil cito ake swamet nye yiye tukuk cepo kakitat, oŋnkukoci cito ake kokotutyet nye muce kuŋalal kupor lokoywekap Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci yec mpo cito ake komuc kot kumwoy pciyatet nyepo kokoteywek cepo Muyet Nyetilil oko ce puryo kot kupo Muyet Nyetilil. Kukoci yec cito ake komuc kot kuŋalal ŋelyepik alak, kukoci cito ake kupor kule mwowu ne ŋelyepicoto.
46012011	Ntene Muyet Nyetilil akenke nyitenyi kunye yiye tukucutecu tokol. Kocini neto ci ake tokol kokotutek ce pciyotin kuyu wule moktoy.
46012012	Omnye kerkey Kristo oko porto nye akenke nye ponto kereryanik wok ce caŋ oŋnkurok ku akenke porto nka kot kiciy cituyo kereryanik wok ce caŋ ce pciyotin.
46012013	Kuyunyoto mpo acek tokol Yutayek oko Lamek, oko mutworik, oko piko co kicityac, kicepatisanec ciku porto akenke om Muyet Nyetilil akenke, kunyo kicekonec ceye Muyet Nyetilil akenke.
46012014	Omnye porto kunye puryo kot ku kiy akenke, ntene ponto kereryanik wok ce caŋ.
46012015	Nto kwemuce kerenket kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot opoye ani porto omnye puryo kot oyiku yewut.’’ Kupuryo ra kot komuce kerenket mopoyit porto?
46012016	Nto kumwoy mpo yitit kule, “Puryo kot opoye ani porto omnye moyiku koŋnta.’’ Komuce ra kot kukerekta mopoyit porto.
46012017	Nto kikwek porto tokol koŋnta, nto kilime ŋalek kulene? Nto kikwek porto tokol yitit, nto kiŋutoy cito kulene?
46012018	Kunyo kuyu wule yunto, kikoci Yiyintet porto tukuk wok ce pciyotin kuyu wule moktoy.
46012019	Nto yunye kikwek porto kiy akenke nto mite porto kulene?
46012020	Kunyo ponto porto kereryanik ce caŋ ntene akenke porto.
46012021	Kunyo puryo kot komuce koŋnta kumwoci yewut kule, “Puryo kot omociŋ ani nyi.’’ Nto mpo yec kumwoci metit kerenkok kule, “Puryo kot omöcok ani akwek’’
46012022	Ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, kereryanik cepo porto ce cisote kule puryo kuponto swamet kuce ce möce coto koromun.
46012023	Nto kereryanik cepo porto co ce nyile kule puryo kuponto latik koromun, kuce cikostoy acek kule ponto woyinto, nto kereryanikap porwonik cicacek co puryo kot kutoku topon, kuce ceripe coto topon.
46012024	Kereryanik co toku topon kuce puryo kot kumoce kule cerip topon. Yiyintet nkit kunye kituyo porwonikyacek, sukuŋet kukoci woyinto kereryanik co puryo kot kuponto latik.
46012025	Kunyo puryo kot kupciyat porto, ntene yicintos kereryanik tokol cepo porto.
46012026	Ye kataŋany kereryantet akenke nyepo porto, yoto kutaŋany mpo cut tokol oko kereryantet nyoto. Nteye kacikasta kereryantet akenke nyepo porto, kuŋerec kereryanik cut tokol.
46012027	Kunyo oyiku akwek tokol porto nyepo Kristo oŋnkupo yec ci ake tokol om akwek porto nyenyi.
46012028	Om piko cepo Yiyintet, kikokoci neto ci tokol yisyenyi. Cepo tayta ku kiyokik, cepo oyeny ku workoyik, cepo somok ku konetik oko co yiye tukuk cepo kakitat, oko co sopsi, oko co kolyoyisyi, oko co poytoyisyi, oko co ŋolole ŋelyepik alak.
46012029	Puryo kot kweku piko tokol kiyokik. Puryo kot kweku piko tokol workoyik. Puryo kot kweku piko tokol konetik. Puryo kot kwiye piko tokol tukuk cepo kakitat.
46012030	Puryo kot ku ponto piko tokol kokotutek ce sopsi, moŋolole piko tokol ŋalyepik alak, nto mpo kuŋor kumwoy kule mwowu ne ŋalecato.
46012031	Ntene okoci mukuleywekwok kucorokyi kokotutek ce woyec koromun. Kunyo moporwok ani aret nye topon nye pelisyi.
46013001	Nka mpo ye amuci ani aŋalal ŋelyepik cepo piko, nto ŋelyepik cepo Malaykanik, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot oponte cömisyet, ku kerkey ŋalalemwani oko kiy nye kyiye nto kerkey twolik ce kwerekey.
46013002	Nto mpo ye aponte swamet nyepo workoyontit nye omuci aŋnket tukuk tokol ce wuŋotin oŋnkoponte ŋomnonet tokol, oŋnkoponte mpo koyenet nye omuci aŋet tulonok, ntene oŋnkurok yec moponte cömisyet, ayiku ani püc pate.
46013003	Ye omuci mpo okoyte tukuk tokol ce oponte, okoci pononik; oŋnkokoyte cepel porto nyenyu, ntene ye moponte cömisyet, kupuryo kot onyoru kiy.
46013004	Cömisyet ku muytocinotet oko poypoyet, cömisyet kunye puryo kot ku corokyinot nto koperperisyo nto silotet.
46013005	Puryo kot kwiye cömisyet sornon, nto puryo kot kunyeru lakwar, cömisyet kunye puryo kot kuyukyini mukuley ŋolyo.
46013006	Puryo kot kuŋerekyini cömisyet miyotyet, ntene ŋerekyini pate ŋalek cepo manta.
46013007	Ripe cömisyet kiy ake tokol, oŋnkuyene kiy ake tokol, ponto kokenotet om kiy ake tokol, oŋnkumuytocini kiy ake tokol.
46013008	Cömisyet kunye puryo kot kupoku kenyis, mosukupok ŋorsyet, mosukupok ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik, mosukupok ŋomnonet.
46013009	Omnye puryo kot cinket tukuk ciwoŋnkyi oŋnkupuryo kot ceŋorsyi ciwoŋnkyi.
46013010	Ntene ye kakwa tukuk cepo manta, yoto kuye mosukupotyo co mocinket ciwoŋnkyi.
46013011	Ye kyoyiku ani lekwa, kyosoti kuyu lekwa, kyonketi ŋalek kuyu lekwa, nteyu kowo ayiku ci nyewo ayaste cepo lekwantit.
46013012	Kito nye ceköse acek yawut kunye kerkey oko kerkeyin nye motoku topon nye ceköse ciyoyit. Ntene om letut mokwocekäs acek Yiyintet om konyekyacek. Aŋnketi ani yawut kereryantet ake pate, ntene mosonket topon koromun om pesyosyek co kwoni kuyu wulo kicinketo.
46013013	Kunyo om tukucutecu somok, koyenet kokenotet, oko cömisyet nye nyewo nye pëlisyi cömisyet.
46014001	Kunyo möce otyiki koromun onyoru cömisyet. Okoci kurup mukuleywek cikwok kokotutek cepo Yiyintet ntene kupëlis oŋnket amwayte lokoywekap Yiyintet.
46014002	Cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak kunye puryo kuŋololyini nyo piko, ntene ŋololyini Yiyintet. Omnye puryo ci nye lime ŋalekyi. Ŋolole neto ŋalek cepo manta ce wuŋotin om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
46014003	Ntene cito nyo mwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye ŋololyini nyo piko, kukalya kutitir oŋnkuŋerec cekto.
46014004	Cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak, kolyoykey neto nkit. Ntene cito nyo mwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye kolyoy pikap Yiyintet tokol.
46014005	Amöce ani kule nto aŋalal akwek tokol ŋelyepik alak, ntene amöce kupëlis kule oponte kokotutek ce mwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet. Omnye cito nye ŋolole kumwowu lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye ponto nyoto latik kupël cito nyo ŋolole nelyepik alak, tos pate ye mite yoto cito ake nye koror topon ŋalek ce mwowu cicoto, sukuŋet kukalya pikap Yiyintet tokol.
46014006	Kunyo mpo yeya, mosonyoru akwek latik pa, ye kaco ani wule omite onŋkyaŋalale ŋelyepik alak? Puryo mpo kisic, tos pate ye kosutwok ani ŋoŋutyet ake nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, nto ŋomnonet ake, nto lokoywek alak cekwone torot nto konetisyet ake.
46014007	Nka mpo tukuk co moponto soponto kuyu kurerut nto pukantit, muce citake kunket kule tum ne nye pute ye puryo kot ceput kutok topon.
46014008	Ye puryo kot kukut cito kontit kutok topon, komuce kulene piko kuyiytakey kupa poryet?
46014009	Kuyunyoto mpo muce kunket cito ake kulene ŋalek ce ŋololi nyi ye ŋolole ŋelyepik alak ce puryo kot celime topon? Mosukusut yomet pate ŋalekuk!
46014010	Mite ŋelyepik wok ce caŋ, ce mite koret tokol, oŋnkurok kuponto ŋelyepta ake tokol kito nye poru.
46014011	Ntene ye puryo kot aŋnket ani ŋelyepta nye ceŋolole, mosukwek cito nyo ŋolole tontet om wule amite ani, oŋnkoyeku ani tontet om wule mite neto.
46014012	Kunyo ye omöce akwek koromun kule cenyoru kokotutek cepo Muyet Nyetilil, kumöce asyem oyiyisye aŋalal kupëlis ŋalek co kolyoy pikap Yiyintet.
46014013	Kunyo misyini cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak kusome kokotutek sukuŋet konket kule mwowu ne ŋalek co ŋolole neto.
46014014	Omnye ye kosom ani om ŋelyepta nye menket ake, kusome mukuleyto nyimwani manta, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kumite kasoteywek wule mite ŋolyontonoto.
46014015	Kunyo masayiy kulene? Mososom om mukuleymwani ntene oŋnkosom mpo om kasoteywekwani, mosotum om mukuleymwani, ntene oŋnkotum mpo om kasoteywekwani.
46014016	Ye kesom kaste Yiyintet om mukuleyto pate, kumuce kulene cito ake nye püc pate nye mite kusome kumwoy kule, “Yunyoto.’’ Om somseŋuŋyi nyepo kakastayet? Puryo komuce neto kot konket ŋalek ce mwowu nyi.
46014017	Nka kot kutopon somset nyeŋuŋ nyepo kakastayet om wule mite Yiyintet, kupuryo kot kukolyoy mpo kisic cito nyin ake.
46014018	Okostoy Yiyintet omnye oŋololi ani ŋelyepik alak kupëlok akwek tokol.
46014019	Ntene pëlisyi ye kaŋalal ŋalek mut ce toku om sayet nyepo pikap Yiyintet saŋet anet piko alak, kusir ye kaŋalal ŋalek elifunek ce caŋ om ŋelyepik ce puryo kot kulime piko.
46014020	Mpo yeya, monte cipurte kasoteywek cepo lekwantit, opur kuyu lekoy om wule miyotyet. Ntene oŋnkopurte kasoteywek cepo piko ce woyec.
46014021	Kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Komwoy Mokoryontet kule, Mosoŋolyolyi ani picu, oyiyisye piko cepo ŋelyepik alak, oko kutuwak cepo piko alak, ntene nka mpo yoto kupuryo kot kulimwo pikwani.’’
46014022	Kunyo ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik alak kunye porcini ŋalek piko co puryo kot kuyen, nto ŋalalet nye cemwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye porcini ŋalek piko co kikoyen.
46014023	Kunyo ye keyomokey pikap Yiyintet oŋnkucec kuŋalal om ŋelyepik alak, oŋnkukwa orit piko cepo saŋ nto piko co puryo kot kuyen, kupuryo kot kumwowu cek kule kopunwok akwek metewok?
46014024	Ntene ye kaŋalal piko tokol lokoywek cepo Yiyintet, oŋnkukwa orit piko alak cepo saŋ nto piko co puryo kot kucömis, mosukonket cito miyotyenyi om ŋalek ce kalim ce cemwowu mosukumutyikey musankut.
46014025	Mosukonket om moyenyi, mosukukutuny oŋnkusay Yiyintet kuror kumwoy kule, “Oponte akwek Yiyintet kupoyit manta.’’
46014026	Mpo yeya, ŋalek ce omwowu cu. Ye koyomekey akwek om sayet, kuponto cito ake tumnto, kuponto ake konetisyet, kuponto ake ŋoŋutyet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, kuponto ake ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik alak, oŋnkumuce cito ake mpo kupor kule mwowu ne ŋalek ce komwoy.Kumöce kule kukalya ŋalecato tokol pikap Yiyintet.
46014027	Ye möce cito ake kule waŋalal ŋelyepik alak, kumöce kuŋalal piko oyenku nto somok kurupekey picoto oŋnkuroke cito ake kupor topon kito nye mwowu ŋalecato.
46014028	Nteye puryo kot kumite yoto cito ake nye muce kot kupor kule mwowu ne ŋalecato, kuroke kusis nye maŋalal cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak om tuyet, ntene kuŋalal neto kwine nkit oko Yiyintet.
46014029	Misyini kuŋalal pate piko oyeny nto somok ce kocikoci lokoywekap Yiyintet, oŋnkulimnta piko alak kukäs koyoyec topon ŋalek ce mwowu.
46014030	Nteye kanyor cito ake nye kepur tuyet lokoywek ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet, kumisyini kusis cito nyo koŋolole.
46014031	Omuci akwek piko tokol ce mite tuyet oŋalale akenke akenke sukuŋet anetkey cititirok.
46014032	Möce cito nyo mwoytoy lokoywek cepo Yiyintet kurip topon ŋalek ce ŋolole.
46014033	Omnye Yiyintet kunye puryo kot kupo tankwarat, ntene Yiyintet nyepo kalyet. Kuyu wule yunto om wulyo tokol wule mite pikap Yiyintet,
46014034	Möce kusisio koruk ye mite cek tuyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet. Puryo kot ce cömncini cekto kuŋalal kuyu wulo mwowu ntarastinek.
46014035	Ye möce kule cinket ŋolyo ake tokol, kuroke kutepe sanikwa ye mite korikwa. Ŋolyo nyepo kalilan ye kaŋalale korko tuyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet.
46014036	Kicone so ŋolyontetap Yiyintet wule omite akwek? Nto kico wule omite akwek nkit?
46014037	Ye sote cito ake kule oyiku kiyokintetap Yiyintet, nto sote kule oponte kokotutyet nyepo soponto nyetilil, kumisyini konket cicoto kule ŋalecu osilwok ani kuce kwone ntarastinekap Yiyintet.
46014038	Ye katay malim ŋalecu, kumerok mpo olimnci akwek neto.
46014039	Kunyo mpo yeya, asat mukuleywekwok om mwaytayet nyepo lokoywekap Yiyintet, ntene monte omwaytatet akerekte ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik alak.
46014040	Misyini kyiy kiy ake tokol topon om aret nye rotat.
