46015001	Mpo yeya, amöce ani yawut kule asotwok akwek lokoywek ce toponec co kyomwowok, coto kuco kyonyoru ce kikwil koyenet nyimwoŋ.
46015002	Lokoywek coto, kuce lokoywek ce toponec co kyomwowok. Mososopce ye kanäm topon lokoywek ce toponec, tos ye kyoyen parak pate.
46015003	Kyomwowok ŋalek ce woyec koromun ce kyonyoru mpo ani, kule, kimeci Kristo miyotyonik kyacek, kuyu wulo kicesilyo om silutekap Yiyintet,
46015004	kule kicemuy neto, oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met om pesyet nyepo somok kuyu wule kicesilyo om silutekap Yiyintet.
46015005	Oŋnkuporkyikey neto Kefa, oko yec kiyokik taman ok oyeny.
46015006	Oŋnkuporkyikey neto yec aret akenke konomikyi ce kikeyte pokolwokik mut ce tokusoptos coto okoy kunyi nka kot kipok alake.
46015007	Yoto kuporkyikey Yakopo oko yec kiyokik tokol.
46015008	Nto om letutap coto tokol, kuporwokey mpo ani kuyu lekwa nye kiciwos.
46015009	Omnye oyiku ani nye miniŋ koromun om kiyokik, nye puryo kot kuyeme cekureno kiyokin, omnye kyotoŋonyi koromun pikap Yiyintet.
46015010	Ntene oyuye wule ayunte om poypoyetap Yiyintet, kunyo puryo kot kupoyit püc poypoyenyi nye kikono ani, ntene kyayiy yisyonutek ce caŋ kupël kiyokik alak tokol, nka kot kipuryo kot ku ani nkit nye kyoyiye, ntene om paypoyetap Yiyintet nye yiyisyi om kule amite.
46015011	Kunyo ye kwone wule amite ani nto kwone wule mite cek kuce, ŋelecato ce cemwoytoy acek tokol oŋnku ŋalecato ce kyoyen akwek.
46015012	Kunyo yawut, ye lokoywek ce cemwoytoy kucu kule, kiciŋet Yesu kotutune met, komuce kulene piko alake om akwek kumwoy kule puryo kot komuce kotutune met piko ce kipok?
46015013	Nteye manta ŋalek coto kuporkey kule kipuryo kot ciŋet Yesu kotutune met.
46015014	Nteye kipuryo kot ciŋet Yesu kotutune met, kuporkey kule po püc pate ŋalek ce kicemwowok acek, oŋnkupoyit koyenet nyimwoŋ püc pate.
46015015	Oŋnkuporkey kule ciperperisyi acek om wule mite Yiyintet omnye kicemwowu kule kiŋet Yiyintet Yesu kotutune met. Ye po manta kule puryo kotutune met piko ce kipok.
46015016	Kunyo ye puryo kot kotutune met piko ce kipok, kuporkey kule kipuryo kot kotutune met Yesu.
46015017	Nteye kipuryo kot kotutune met Yesu kuporkey kule koperperisyo pate koyenet nyimwoŋ oŋnkutoyiku potyotin om miyotyonikwok.
46015018	Kuporkey mpo yec kule kipotyo mpo piko co kipok kucöme cekto Kristo.
46015019	Nteye kokenotet nyinyacek om wule mite Kristo kunye topon om soponto nyepo pesyosyecu pate, nye puryo kito ake yec, kuporkey kule roke cerirenec cikalyec acek kupël ci tokol om koret tokol.
46015020	Ntene ŋolyontet nyepo manta kunyi kule, kiciŋet kotutune met Kristo nye kikwil kule mosiciŋet kotutune met mpo piko co kipok.
46015021	Kuyu wulo kico met kupunune wule mite cito, kuyunyoto mosicitutune met kupunte wule mite cito.
46015022	Kuyu wulo kipok piko tokol omnye kipunune cekto koyomotet nye ponto oko Atam, kuyunyoto mosiciŋet kotutune met piko tokol kupunune koyomotet nye ponto oko Kristo.
46015023	Ntene oŋnku ci tokol om otepto nyenyi kwine nkit om pesyet nyo cone neto. Kristo kunye po tayta, kuker piko cepo Kristo.
46015024	Nteye kapok coto kuco pesyet nyepo letut, ye mosukokoyto neto poytoyisyet kukoci Yiyintet om letut ye kakwaranta poytoyisyonik tokol oko swamanik oko kamukeywek.
46015025	Omnye misyini kupoytoyis Kristo okoy kupël Yiyintet punikyi tokol oŋnkukoci kopurune ŋonyutap kerenkokyi.
46015026	Puniyontet nyepo letut nye mosicipël ku met.
46015027	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kikokoci Yiyintet kopurune tukuk tokol ŋonyutap kerenkokyi.’’ Poru ŋalecu kule, “Tukuk tokol.’’ Kunye puryo kot kumite orit mpene Yiyintet nyo kikoci kopurune tukuk tokol ŋonyutap Kristo.
46015028	Ntene ye kocikoci kopurune tukuk tokol poytoyisyet nyepo Kristo, kunyo Werit nkit nye mosukuweckey kupurune ŋonyutap Yiyintet nyo kikokoci kopurune tukuk tokol wule mite Kristo, sukuŋet kupayta Yiyintet tukuk tokol.
46015029	Kunyo yawut yec, nto piko ce kicepatisan om kaynetap piko co kipok? Mosukunyor coto kiy ne? Nteye po manta kule puryo kot kotutune met piko co kipok, kunyo omne sicepotisone cekto om kaynetap co kipok?
46015030	Nto acek omne sicetaŋany kila sawa.
46015031	Mpo yeya, orice ani met okokoy, kupo silotet nye oponte om wule omite akwek om soponto nyepo Kristo kunye sutwo omwowu ŋalecutecu.
46015032	Kiy ne nye omuci onyoru ani kuyu cito nye kyoporye oko tyoŋik om wuli po Efeso. Kunyo ye puryo kot komuce kotutune met piko co kipok, Kyaste nas, kyomisye oŋnkyeyesye omnye mocepoku tun.
46015033	Monte ciperperak: “Coronutek ce miyotec kuce wurtoy kopurto nye topon.’’
46015034	Oketyikey akwek kasoteywek cikwok cepo manta, ayaste arustunwekwok cepo miyotyet. Komwowu ani ŋalecu kusornenok akwek, omnye menkete piko alake om akwek Yiyintet.
46015035	Mosukutep citake kule, “Muce kotutune met piko ce kipok kulene? Mosukunyor cekto porto nye yu ne?’’
46015036	Yiku nyi perper! Ye kekol nyi kupuswontet, ku puryo kot kume kunyo nto turu kupit.
46015037	Kole nyi koci ŋony kupuswontet nkit, oŋnkopo nkanu nto kupuswo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ku ketit tokol nye pite kuwoyit.
46015038	Kocini Yiyintet kupuswontonoto porto kuyu wule moktoy. Kocini kupuswo ake tokol porto nye nyenyi nkit.
46015039	Puryo kot kukerkey panyek cepo tukuk tokol ce soptos. Ponto piko panyek cikwa, kuponto tyoŋik panyek cikwa, kuponto toritek panyek cikwa, kuponto purpurunek panyek cikwa.
46015040	Kunyo mite mpo tukuk cepo koret torot oko tukuk cepo koret ŋony, kumite toponiyet nyepo tukuk cepo torot, oŋnkumite toponiyet nyepo tukuk cepo ŋony.
46015041	Ponto asista toponiyet nye nyenyi nkit, kuponto arawet toponiyet nye nyenyi nkit, oŋnkuponto kokelik toponiyet wok ce cepciyotin, omnye puryo kot kukerkey kokelik om toponiyet nye ponto.
46015042	Mosukwiytakey nyoto om pesyet nyo tutune met piko. Nune porto ye kacemuy, puryo kot kunune porto ye kakotutune met.
46015043	Cemuye porto nye puryo kot kuponto woyinto, ntene tutune met porto nye ponto woyinto. Cemuye porto nye puryo kot kuponto swamet, ntene tutune met porto nye ponto swamet.
46015044	Cemuye kuyu porto nyepo kwak, ntene tutune met kwek porto nye ponto soponto nyepo okokoy. Ye mite porto nyepo kwak, kumite yec mpo porto nye ponto soponto nyepo okokoy.
46015045	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kicitany Atam cito nyepo tayta kusop kuponto soponto nyepo kwak,’’ ntene Atam nyepo letut kunye konu Soponto nyepo Muyet Nyetilil.
46015046	Puryo kot kunyosyi kuco soponto nyepo okokoy, ntene soponto nyepo kwak nye nyosyi ntekere soponto nyepo okokoy.
46015047	Kicitany Atam nyepo tayta kucone teŋek, ntene cone Atam nyepo oyeny torot.
46015048	Kerkey piko cepo koret oko cito nyo kicitanye teŋek cepo koret, kukerkey piko cepo torot oko cito nyo cone torot.
46015049	Kuyu wulo kicilac acek tonto nyepo cito nyo kicitanye teŋek, kuyunyoto musicilac tonto nyepo cito nyo cone torot.
46015050	Mpo yeya, ŋalek ce koporu ani kucu kule, puryo kot kunyoru porto oko korotik poytoyisyet nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo kot kunyoru kito nye nune kito nye puryo kot kunune.
46015051	-
46015052	Olim omwowok ŋalecu wuŋotin kule, puryo kot cepoku acek tokol, ntene ye kaciy kontit nyepo letut mosicewecec acek lakwar kuyu wulo lekecectoy koŋnta. Omnye ye kaciy kontit mosokuŋetyo piko nye komo kopoku mosicewecewecec acek tokol.
46015053	Omnye misyini kulac kito nye nune kito nye puryo kot kunune, oŋnkulac kito nye me kito nye puryo kot kume.
46015054	Yoto ye kacilac kito nye nune kilokyi kito nyo puryo kunune, oŋnkyilac kito nye me cilokyi kito nye puryo kot kume. Yoto kuye kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kakyaranta met, kupok poryet!’’
46015055	“Nyi met, pëlisyi nyi oyu? Nyi met, ono swamet nyeŋuŋ.’’
46015056	Nyortoy met swamet nye wutisye wule mite miyotyet, kunyortoy miyotyet swamet nye wutisye wule mite ntarastinek.
46015057	Ntene cikaste Yiyintet nye konec acek cipëlisye kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
46015058	Kunyo mpo yeya cämanik, oyoŋnkye okwilokisye topon, oyiyisye okokoy om yisyemwoŋ nyepo Mokoryontet, omnye oŋnketi akwek kule puryo yisyo nye oyiye om yisyetap Mokoryontet nye moponto latik.
46016001	Kunyo yawut ŋalek ce nöme pesanik co ciruruce sukuŋet cikalye pikap Yiyintet ce mite Yuteya. Misyini ayiy akwek kuyu wulo kyomwocini ani pikap Yiyintet cepo Kalatiya.
46016002	Roke kukonune ci ake tokol om akwek pesanik tukusic ce kanyor kuyu wule muktoy ye pesyetap santey, sukuŋet mente yec kot ciruruc pesan ye kaco ani wule omite akwek.
46016003	Nteye kaco ani, mosoyokte piko ce kakwey akwek nkit kupa Yerusalem kusut kokotutekwok.
46016004	Nteye keporkey kule mite latik owetekey ani picoto, kuye cepetekey tokol.
46016005	Masoco wule omite akwek om letut ye kawo opunte Meketoniya, omnye amoce kule apunte wuloto.
46016006	Mosopur oko akwek pesyos ce ŋeri, nto pesyet ake opur awany pesyosyek cepo koyitityet tokol. Yoto kuye okalya om poninekyu om wulyo ake tokol wule mosowo.
46016007	Omnye puryo kot amoce ani kule copur oko akwek awany pesyos tukusic pate ye okeytoy. Asoti kule mosopur oko akwek awany pesyos ce caŋ ye kacäm Mokoryontet.
46016008	Ntene mosopur wuli po Efeso okoy pesyetap Pentekoste.
46016009	Yatat kurket om wuli, mite yisyet nyewo nka kot kumite piko ce caŋ ce kerektoy yisyet.
46016010	Ye kuco Timosewo okoy wule omite akwek kumöce kule atoroc oŋerekyi, sukuŋet kuŋerec om wule omite akwek; omnye yiyisyi yisyetap Mokoryontet kuyu wulo oyiyisyi ani.
46016011	Puryo kuroke kot kunyil citake neto, ntene möce akalye kutosyikey poninekyi om kalyet sukuŋet kuketkey kuco amite ani, omnye amite okonye neto oko mpo yeya alak.
46016012	Kunyo ŋalek ce nöme yeya Apolo, kwasaysay ani neto oko mpo yeya alak kule kuco kurutocok akwek, ntene tompo kuwoŋnkyi kule aco yawut pakenke, mosukuco ye kanyor poroyinto.
46016013	Oŋomekitu, oŋnkoyoŋnkye okwilokisye om koyenet, oyiku nyikon oŋnkopoyitu swama.
46016014	Oyiye yisyonutek tokol om cömisyet.
46016015	Oŋnket akwek Stefana oko pikap kanyi, cekto kuce piko ce kinyosyo cewec kwek Kristayek om Akaya kunyo kicikenekey cekto om yisyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet. Mpo yeya, osomok ani kule
46016016	arup kantoyintet nyepo piko ceyucoto oko ci ake tokol nye kolyoyisyi oŋnkwiyisyi wanak oko cekto.
46016017	Oyiku ani ŋerekat omnye kukwa mpo Stefana oko Fortunato oko Akayiko, omnye kukwiy cekto tukuk ce kumo oponte akwek poroyinto nye oyiye.
46016018	Kukuŋereca ani cekto, oŋnkuŋerecak mpo akwek, möce oŋnketi akwek piko ce yuco.
46016019	Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet cepo koretap Asia. Kesupayak akwek Akwila oko Prisika pikap Yiyintet ce tuytos om koto nyimwa om kosupoyisyet nyepo poypoyet om Kristo.
46016020	Kesupayak akwek mpo yeya tokol ce mite wuli asupayikey akwek aŋatutkey kuyu mpo yeya.
46016021	Ani nkit nye kosile ŋalecu om yewumwani. Kasupayak ani Paulo.
46016022	Ye puryo kot kucöme ci ake tokol Mokoryontet, kucupot nyoto! Ico Mokoryontet!
46016023	Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu.
46016024	Kopur cömisyet nyimwani wule omite akwek tokol om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo. Yunyoto.
47001001	Cone parwani wule omite ani Paulo nye kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om cömisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Timosewo. Cesilyini pikap Yiyintet cepo Korinso oko pikap Yiyintet tokol cepo Akaya.
47001002	Kante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
47001003	Cikasta Yiyintet kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Papa nyoto nyepo poypoyet oŋnku nye konu kokolyoyisyet tokol!
47001004	Kolyec acek neto wuyinwek tokol, sukuŋet cimuc cikalye piko co ponto wuyinwek wok tokol, ciyisye kokolyoyisyet nye kerkey nyo kicenyoru kucone wule mite Yiyintet.
47001005	Omnye kuyu wulo ceponte toŋoŋutek cecaŋ ce kerkey oko cepo Kristo, kuyunyoto cenyoru mpo kokolyoyisyet nyewo kupunte wule mite Kristo.
47001006	Ye kacetaŋany acek, kukacetaŋany kupo kokolyoyisyemwoŋ oko kosopet, nteye kacikalyak mpo akwek mosicikalyak oŋnkyekonok swamet omuytoci toŋoŋutek ce kerkey ce cemuytocini acek.
47001007	Kunyo mocewewecikey kenyis kokenotet nye ceponte acek om wule omite akwek. Cinket kule kuyu wulo onyoru mpo akwek toŋoŋutek ce kerkey cicacek, kunyo mosonyoru mpo akwek kakalyayet nye cenyoru acek.
47001008	Mpo yeya, ce möce kule oŋnket akwek wuyinto nye kicenyoru acek om Asia. Kicenyoru wuyinto nyewo nye nyikisit koromun okoy cemwowu kule komo cesoptosi.
47001009	Kicisot yoto kule kacemutwec musankut nyepo met. Ntene kikwiyakay kuyunyoto sukuŋet komo cikenekey swamet nyinyacek nkit, ntene cikenekey Yiyintet nyo ŋete piko kotutune met.
47001010	Kisorwec Yiyintet om met nye miyat nye yunyoto, kunyo kicikenekey kule mosukusorwec yec.
47001011	Kunyo ye kokalyec acek akwek osomwec, yoto kuye mosukupunto somset nyepo piko ce caŋ wule mite Yiyintet om poypoyenyi nkit.
47001012	Ŋolyontet nye cesilekey acek kunyi, porwec kasoteywekyacek kopurto wule kicipurte acek om koroni, nto kupëlis om wule omite akwek. Kicipurte kopurto nye toku nyepo manta nyetilil, nyoto kunye kopurto nye konu Yiyintet om poypoyenyi nye puryo kot ku ŋomnon nyepo cito.
47001013	Omnye cesilwok acek pate ŋalek ce omuci asuman oŋnkonket. Asoti ani kule mosonket akwek topon.
47001014	Ŋalek ce oŋnketi akwek yawut kererya kuce mosonket coto om pesyetap Mokoryontet Yesu, oŋnkyinket kule oponte akwek ŋolyontet nye osilekey om wule ce mite acek kuyu wule cesilekey mpo acek om wule omite akwek.
47001015	Kyonket ani topon ŋalecutecu saŋet ayiytekey orutocok akwek nyepo tayta sukuŋet onyoru kupeyok aret oyeny.
47001016	Omnye kyayiytekey yoto kule orutocok akwek om poninekyu cepo Meketoniya oko yec ye owecekey saŋet anyoru kakalyayet nyimwakwek om poninekwani ye oweti Yuteya.
47001017	Kyoteltelen ani so yoto ye kyoyiytoy coto? Ye oyiytoykey ani so oyiytoykey kuyu cito nyepo koret? Nye muce omwowu kule “Yunyoto, Nto moyunyoto, om yoto pakenke?’’
47001018	Yiyintet kunye po manta! Kurtoyemwani om wule omite akwek kipuryo kot kule. “Yunyoto,’’ nto “Moyunyoto.’’
47001019	Omnye Yesu Kristo Weritap Yiyintet, nyo kimwowok Silwano oko Timosewo oŋnkomwowok ani kunye kipuryo kot ku kule, “Yunyoto,’’ nto “Puryo’’ Ntene om wule mite neto ku kule, “Yunyoto.’’
47001020	Omnye kupunte wule mite neto kuye koyitita Yiyintet kurtoyet nyenyi tokol. Kunyo sukuŋet cemwowu acek kule “Yunyoto’’ Kupunte wule mite neto cikaste Yiyintet.
47001021	Omnye Yiyintet kunye kwile soponto nyinyacek oko nyimwakwek om wule mite Kristo. Yiyintet nkit kunye kiŋapec kukweyec acek.
47001022	Neto kunye kiŋapenec pelutyet nyenyi oŋnkukoci Muyet Nyetilil mukuleywekyacek kwek kwilatet nyepo tukuk ceponto neto ce cicacek.
47001023	Yiyintet nye muncururwet nyimwani. Nkete mukuleyto nyimwani! Kipuryo kot aco ani Korinso omnye kyakalyak akwek.
47001024	Puryo kot cesyeme acek kule cekerak koŋ om ŋalek ce mocäm, omnye oponte koyenet nye kwilat, ntene ciku piko ce kiciyisyi tokol kupo ŋerekwek cikwakwek.
47002001	Kunyo kyowoŋnkyi ŋolyontoni om mukuleymwani kule puryo amoce aco wule omite akwek osutwok nerekwek.
47002002	Omnye ye kanerecak ani akwek, ku ŋo yec cito nye ŋetu nye muce kuŋereca ani? Nyoto kunye cito nyo kyanerec ani!
47002003	Kuyunyoto sukuŋet osilwok ani parwani, kupuryo kot amoce yec kule aco cokunerekis piko ce keteŋereco ani, omnye oŋnketi topon kule ye ayiku ani ŋerekat, kuye mosoŋerec mpo akwek.
47002004	Kyosilwok yoto oponte wuyinto oko nerekwek ce mite mukuleyto oko lokik, nye kimomöce kule onerekisye, ntene kyomöce kule sonket kule ocömok ani akwek koromun.
47002005	Ye mite citake nye kinerec cito ake, kipuryo kot kunereca ani, ntene kinerecak akwek tokol, nka kot momoce ani kule omwontyok akwek.
47002006	Yeme cico lelisto ye komutyi akwek piko ce caŋ musankut.
47002007	Kunyo misyini akalye akwek oŋnkotitir neto, sukuŋet mente kot kunyikisyi nerekwek okoy kutoyis kuwoŋnkyi.
47002008	Osomok ani möce oporci kule ocöme akwek neto.
47002009	Kyosilwok ani parwana. Kule asyemak akäs oŋnkomuci otitir; oŋnkomuci kot arup konetisyet nyepo tukuk tokol.
47002010	Ci ake tokol nye kokalye akwek lelis nye kakwiy mosakalye mpo ani neto ŋolyo ake tokol, nteye kakalye; kukakalye om Kristo om kaynemwakwek.
47002011	Cinket ŋomnonet nyepo Setanit kunyo puryo kot kuroke cikoci acek poroyinto kot kuperperec.
47002012	Nteyu kowo apunte ani Troa amwayte lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, onyoru yoto kule kiyat Mokoryontet aret nyepo yisyet om wuloto.
47002013	Ntene kyasot koromun omnye kipuryo kot onyoru yeyanyo Tito. Yoto oyomis pikap woloto oŋnkonomen awo Meketoniya.
47002014	Ntene cikaste Yiyintet! Omnye om koyomotet nye ceponte oko Kristo kunye ntowec Yiyintet okokoy cipëlisye. Yiyisyenec acek neto sukuŋet cemwayte lokoywek ce toponec kupunte wulyo tokol kuyu kiy nye poŋu topon.
47002015	Omnye cekerkeyekey acek oko korosek ce poŋu topon ce pele Kristo sukunet kupunto wule mite Yiyintet. Peti korosecoto wulyo tokol wule mite piko co mite cisope oko co peti wokusoptos.
47002016	Korosyontoni poŋu topon kunye poru soponto om wule mite piko co cisope, oŋnkupor met om wule mite piko co peti wokupotos. Kunyo ŋo nye muce yisyoni?
47002017	Puryo kot cerkeyekey acek oko piko alak ce caŋ ce yiyisye lokoywekap Yiyintet kupoyit kamonkesyantit. Ntene omnye kikoyoktec acek neto, kunyo ceŋololi om tay nyi cepo manta om poypoyet, kuyu mutworikap Kristo.
47003001	Poru pa ŋalecu kuyunye cemite acek yec cesilekey? Ce moce ra poronok ce portec acek om wule amite akwek, nto akwek om wule cemite acek, kuyu wulo yiytoy piko alake?
47003002	Oyiku akwek nkit parwet nyinyacek nye kicesil mukuleywekyacek orit, nye cinkete oŋnkusumone piko tokol.
47003003	Porukey kutok topon kule oyiku akwek parwet nye cone wule mite Kristo, nye kicesutu acek, nye puryo cesile winet, ntene kicesile Muyet nyepo Yiyintet nye sopot, nye puryo kot cesil rwantet, ntene kicesil mukuleywekap piko.
47003004	Cemwowu acek ŋalecu omnye cikenekey Yiyintet kupunte Kristo.
47003005	Puryo kot ku kule ceponte swamet nyinyacek nkit, cesutekey kule cimuci kyiy yisyoni. Ntene cone swamet wule mite Yiyintet.
47003006	Neto kunye kikonec acek cimuc kot kyiy yisyet nyepo kirotyet nyelel, omnye puryo kot ku ntarastinek co silotin, ntene Muyet Nyetilil. Sutu ntarastinek ce silotin met. Ntene konu Muyet Nyetilil soponto.
47003007	Ntene ye ntarastinek ce sutu met kuce kicesil kutok om rwontok kuce kicekon om woyinto nyewo okoy kutiŋ ye mokukäs pikap Israel tokoytap Moses omnye kilekecec.
47003008	Kupuryo kot cekonu ne Muyet Nyetilil om woyinto nyewo kupëlis?
47003009	Kunyo ye ponto woyinto ye cemutyini piko kulot musankut, kupuryo kot kuponto woyinto kupëlis ye cikocini piko tililinto!
47003010	Omnye om ŋolyontoni, kuporkey kule kito nye kiponto woyinto ikye kunye kimo kuponto nyoto yawut woyinto, omnye kutok woyinto ake nye pële nyoto.
47003011	Omnye ye kimite ikye woyinto nye kipure pesyos ce ŋeri, kunyo tya nyun woyinto nyo poyitu okokoy!
47003012	Ciku acek nyikon omnye ceponte kokenotet nyitenyi.
47003013	Puryo kot cekerkeyekey oko Moses nye kiyene tokoynyi siret kule sukuŋet mente kukäs pikap Israel wule yunto lakweyet nye kimite kipoku.
47003014	Kikerokis kasoteywekwa kupoyit manta, kunyo tokoyene siret nyoto kasoteywekwa okoy kunyi ye mite cek kusumane kitapunek cepo kirotyet yoswaket. Cinumu pate siret nyoto ye keyomokey cito oko Kristo.
47003015	Nka mpo okoy pesyosyecu, ye cesumone ntarastinekap Moses, kumite kuyene siret nyoto kasoteywekwa.
47003016	Ntene cinumu siret nyoto, ye kowekyikey cito wule mite Mokoryontet.
47003017	Kunyo, “Mokoryontet’’ nyo mwowu ŋalecu kunye Muyet Nyetilil nyoto. Nto om wulyo tokol wule mitowune Muyet Nyetilil, kutyokotin piko cepo wuloto.
47003018	Kunyo acek tokol kuce ciportoy woyinto nyepo Mokoryontet, om tokocik ce puryo kot kuyenotin. Woyinto nyoto cone wule mite Mokoryontet, nye Muyet Nyetilil nye wecec acek cekerkeyitu oko tonto nyenyi om woyinto nyewo kupëlis.
47004001	Kikonec acek Yiyintet kyiy yisyoni om poypoyenyi, kunyo cetosyinikey ceponte titirotet.
47004002	Kicetay tukuk tokol ce wuŋotin cepo menonet cepo sornon, puryo kot kyiyisye yec koperperisyo, nto mpo cemas ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, cineti kutok nye mocewunye ŋalek cepo manta. Cemöce kule cekonu konetisyet kucäm ci tokol topon om taytap Yiyintet.
47004003	Omnye ye wuŋotin lokoywek ce toponec cu cemwowu acek, kuwuŋotin pate om wule mite piko co peti wokupotos.
47004004	Puryo kot kucömisyi cekto omnye kiker oyinoto nyepo koroni kuyene menonet kasoteywekwa cikwa. Sukuŋet mente kukäs cekto topon lakweyet nye mite lokoywek ce toponec cepo tililinto nyepo Yesu Kristo; nye tonto nyepo manta nyepo Yiyintet.
47004005	Omnye puryo kot cemwoytoy acek ŋalek ce cicacek nkit. Cemwoytoy Yesu Kristo nye Mokoryontet, oŋnku ciku acek mutworik cikwok om kaynetap Yesu.
47004006	Yiyintet nyo kimwoy kule “Mosukoluci lakweyet menonet.’’ Kunye Yiyintet nyoto nye kikoci koluci lakweyet nyenyi mukuleywek cicacek, sukuŋet kusutwec lakweyet nyepo ŋomnonetap woyinto nyepo Yiyintet nye luwu om tokoytap Kristo.
47004007	Oŋnkurok yec acek cu ceponte soponto nyitenyi konorat kuce cekerkey oko terenik cepo menon, sukupor kule Yiyintet kunye ponto swamet tokol, ntene puryo kot ku nyinyacek.
47004008	Cetoŋonyi om aret tokol, ntene puryo kot kupotwec titiret, cecoŋoŋeni, ntene puryo kot kupokunenec kokenotet.
47004009	Cinyolilec, ntene puryo kot kupotwec kiy, ceŋwolec, ntene puryo kot kuwoŋntec.
47004010	Cesutoti acek pesyosyek tokol metap Yesu om porwonikyacek, sukuŋet kuporkey cekäs soponto nyenyi Kristo om porwonik cicacek.
47004011	Cemite acek okokoy om soponwek cicacek ŋoyeniyontit nyepo met om kaynetap Yesu, sukuŋet kutok cekäs soponto nyenyi Kristo om porwonik cicacek cu poku.
47004012	Poru ŋolyontono kule yiyisyi met om wule cemite acek, ntene kwiyisyi soponto om wule omite akwek.
47004013	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kyaŋalal ani, omnye kyoyen.’’ Ceŋololi mpo acek om koyenet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nye kerkey nyoto.
47004014	Cinketi kule Yiyintet nyo kiŋete kotutune met Yesu, kunye musukuŋetec acek citutune met oko Yesu oŋnkusutwec wanak oko akwek cekwa taynyi.
47004015	Omnye cikwakwek cutecu tokol, kunyo mite kupuntoy poypoyetap Yiyintet wule mite piko ce caŋ, mosukokasta cekto om sayet kupo woyintap Yiyintet.
47004016	Puryo cecose acek mocetitir om ŋolyontoni, nka kot mite kucostos porwonik cicacek wule po panyek, ntene kumite kutosyinikey pesyosyek tokol soponwek cicacek cepo orit.
47004017	Ntene toŋoŋutecutecu tukusic oŋnkuminkec kuce mosukukonec acek woyinto nyewo nye mopoku nye pële toŋoŋutek.
47004018	Omnye puryo kot ceköse acek tukuk ce toku, ntene ceköse pate tukuk ce motoku. Pure pesyos ce ŋeri tukuk ce toku, ntene pure okokoy tukuk ce motoku.
47005001	Cinket acek kule, ye kacipuryet kuyu menet porto nyi ceponte acek om koret, mosukukonec Yiyintet koto ake nye moceminy om torot. Koto nyoto kunye kitece neto nkit nye pure okokoy.
47005002	Kunyo om yawut cerirtosi nye ce möce kule cekonec koto nyenyo nye kicetekwec nye mite torot.
47005003	Omnye ye kacilacec komo cipuri püc nye moceponte sira.
47005004	Omnye ye tocemite acek ceminye wemet nyi po koret, mosicekäs kule citoŋonyec. Puryo ku kule omnye cemöce kule cewirte porto nyi ceponte om koret, ntene ce möce pate kule cilokwec porto nyepo torot, sukuŋet cilum porto nyi po koret.
47005005	Yiyintet nkit kunye kikwiytowec acek wekwekatenyi; kunyo kikonec Muyet Nyetilil nyenyi kwek kurtoyet nyepo tukuk tokol ce pontewec acek neto.
47005006	Kunyo ce ponte acek titirotet okokoy, omnye cinketi kule ye tocemite ceponte porto om wuli po koret, kuporkey kule cemite wule low om wule mite kotap Mokoryontet.
47005007	Omnye soponto nyinyacek kunye po koyenet, nye puryo ku ceköste.
47005008	Ceponte titiret nyewo, kunyo ce möce kule cepakakte porto nyi ceponte oŋnkyipe wocipur oko Mokoryontet.
47005009	Ntene om kiy ake tokol, ce möce kule ciŋerec neto; ye ce mite wuli po koret nto ye kacipe wulin po torot.
47005010	Omnye mosiciyoŋe acek tokol taytap Kristo sukuŋet kuwosontyec. Mosukunyor ci tokol kito yeme kuyu wule yunto ŋalek ce kikwiy om soponto nyepo porto, ye kikwiy ce toponec nto ce miyotec.
47005011	Cinket acek kito nye poru ye kiciywey Yiyintet, kunyo cesyeme kule cesaysay kucömis piko. Kikonec Yiyintet kuwoŋnkyi kupoyit manta, kunyo asoti kyonketo mpo ani akwek om mukuleywekwok.
47005012	Puryo kot cesyeme yec kule ciporukey acek om wule omite akwek, ntene cemite cesyeme kule ciporwok ŋalek ce toponec; sukuŋet osilkey akwek om wule ce mite acek, oŋnkomuc owekyi piko ŋalek co silekey kuyu wule yunto cekto wulopo saŋ nye puryo kot kuyu wule yunto kopurto nyenyi nkit.
47005013	Ye kipunwec acek metewok, kukipunwec kupo Yiyintet, nteye ceponte ŋomnonet, ku ceponte kupo toponiyenyi.
47005014	Omnye ripec acek cömisyet nyepo Kristo. Kicinket ciwoŋnkyi kule kime cito akenke kumeci piko tokol, nye poru kule mosukupok piko tokol kuyu neto.
47005015	Kimeci neto piko tokol sukuŋet piko co sopcotin komokusoptos kwicek nkit ntene kukosopco om wule mite neto, nyo kime oŋnkyiŋet kupo cekto.
47005016	Kunyo kuceke yawut kuwo tay, kimo ciyoyeci acek ci ake tokol kuyu wule yunto soponto nyepo cito nyepo koret, nka kot kimite pesyosyek ce kiciyoyeci Kristo kuyu cito, kimo kuyu nyo yawut.
47005017	Ye kociyomo citake oko Kristo, kokwek nyoto kataŋanet nye lel, omnye kuwo yoswaket oŋnkuco cito nyelel.
47005018	Yiye Yiyintet ŋalecutecu tokol, kunyo kiwecec acek Kristo cekwane puniyontit okoy ciku coronutekyi, oŋnkukonec yisyet nye cewece mpo piko alak kwek coronutekyi.
47005019	Lokoywek cicacek kucu kule, mite Yiyintet kuwece kwek piko tokol coronutekyi kupunte Kristo. Kipuryo kurip koyit Yiyintet miyotyonikwa om tukuk ce kikwiy cekto. Kikonec lokoywek cepo wule cewektoy piko kwek coronutekyi.
47005020	Kunyo cemite acek yawut ceŋolole kuyu kiyokikap Kristo, Yiyintet nkit nye ŋololwok kupunte wule cemite acek, kunyo cesomok om kaynetap Kristo kule ocomisye om wule mite Yiyintet.
47005021	Kipuryo kot kuponto Kristo miyotyo, ntene kikoci Yiyintet kusut miyotyonik cicacek sukuŋet cenyoru acek ŋalek cepo manta ce konu Yiyintet.
47006001	Kunyo kuyu wulo kyiyisyi acek oko Yiyintet cesomok monte ce cäm kupot püc pate poypoyet nyo kyonyoru kucone wule mite Yiyintet.
47006002	Kuyu wulo mwowu Yiyintet kule, “Kyolimuŋ ani om pesyet nye kicecäm, Kyakalyiŋ om pesyet nyepo kosopet.’’ Limnte! Kunyo pesyet nyitenyi nye cenyorune cömisyetap Yiyintet, pesyoni kunye pesyet nyepo kosopotet.
47006003	Puryo kot cemöce acek kule kunyor citake tokol konokut, sukuŋet kuwur wurat yisyet nyinyacek. Kunyo cesyeme kule mente cekerekte aret nyepo citake.
47006004	Ntene ciporu kule ciku mutworikap Yiyintet om kiy ake tokol nye kyiye, omnye cemuytocini koromun wuyinwek tokol oko toŋoŋutek tokol.
47006005	Kicepirec, kicekerktec mopusi, kicewunuktec, kiciyisye kot cecosye nye puryo rwonto oŋnkwamec rupet.
47006006	Kunyo kiciporu acek kule ciku mutworikap Yiyintet om tililinto, oko ŋomnonet, oko muytocinotet oko tolosyet om swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko cömisyet nyinyacek nyepo manta,
47006007	oko lokoywek cicacek cepo manta om swametap Yiyintet. Ŋalek ce tililec cepo manta kuce karik ce kyiyisye ce porye oŋnkyeyetekey.
47006008	Ciyweyec acek, oŋnkyenyilec, cecupec, oŋnkyikastec, cesutec kuyu mwiynot, oŋnkurok ceŋololi ŋalek cepo manta.
47006009	Cesutec kuyu pic ce mocinket, oŋnkurok konketec piko tokol. Cesutec kuyu pic ce kipok, oŋnkurok ciku sopcotin kuyu wulo oköse akwek. Nka kot kicitaŋanyec, ntene puryo kot cepakäcec.
47006010	Nka kot kicinerecec, ntene ceŋereci okokoy. Cekerkeyekey nye ciku ponon, ntene cewece kwek piko ce caŋ mokoren. Cekerkeyekey nye ciku ponon, oŋnkurok ceponte tukuk tokol.
47006011	Mpo yeya, Korinsoyek! Koceŋololwok acek akwek ciporwok kutok, kuceŋany mukuleywek cicacek.
47006012	Puryo kot ceker cewuny mukuleywek cico om wule omite. Ntene akwek kuce kwaker awuny mukuleywek cikwok om wule cemite acek.
47006013	Oŋololi yawut kuyunye oyiku akwek lekokwani, möce oŋany mukuleywek cikwok oporwec kopurto nye kerkey nye ceponte acek om wule omite akwek.
47006014	Monte ceyiyisye oyoyeckey oko piko co puryo kot kuyen, omnye puryo kot komukoktos kuyunyo. Muce kucomnyo ŋalek cepo manta oko miyotyet? Muce kopurcini kulene lakweyet oko menonet?
47006015	Muce kucömncin kulene Kristo oko setanit? Kiy ne nye muce kwicin cito nyo kikoyen oko nye tompo koyen?
47006016	Kumuce kulene kwicin kotap Yiyintet oko ototoywek cepo piko co menket Yiyintet? Omnye ciku acek kotap Yiyintet nye sopot! Kuyu wulo kimwoy Yiyintet nkit kule, “Mosatec ani konyu wuli mite pikwani, Oŋnkominy wule mite cekto, Mosoyeku Yiyintet nyimwa, kwek cekto pikwani.’’
47006017	Mwowu mpo Mokoryontet kule, “Misyini apakakte cek, oŋnkakwane wule mite cekto. A sanekey kiy nye puryo kot kutilil. saŋet atorocak ani.
47006018	Mosoyeku ani Papamwoŋ, oŋnkoyiku akwek werikwani oko tipikwani. Mwowu Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kuyunyoto.’’
47007001	Corunutekwani cämanik! Kicekurtowec ŋalecutecu tokol. Kunyo möce kule cesitkey acek om wule mite kiy ake tokol, nye wurtoy kumiyatit porto nto mukuleyto. Möce cetililitu ciwoŋnkyi topon, oŋnkyipurte koyweyisyet om wule mite Yiyintet.
47007002	Oŋoŋwec mukuleywek cikwok, tompo kot celel acek om wule mite citake tokol, nto tompo mpo kot kyarante nto ciperper acek ci ake tokol.
47007003	Puryo kot omwowu ani ŋalecu nye orenyok akwek, kuyu wulo kyomwowok kunyo kule oyiku akwek cämanik ce cepontekey okokoy ye cesoptosi nto ye cepoku.
47007004	Okenenokey ani akwek koromun ye oŋololwok, kunyo osilenokey akwek koromun. Oponte titirotet nyewo om wuyinwekyo tokol. Oponte ani ŋerekwek ce caŋ kusirto.
47007005	Kipuryo kot cimuny acek mpo yu kowo cepunu Meketoniya. Kimite wuyinwek wulyo tokol, kumite wokutyet wule mite alake oko muyotet nye kimite mukuleywek cicacek.
47007006	Ntene Yiyintet nyo titire piko ce kokwilyo mukuleywek kunye kititirec omnye kico Tito.
47007007	Kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kico neto, ntene om ŋalekyi ce kimwoy, kuyu wule kyotitirte akwek neto. Kimwowec kule ömoce akwek koromun kule cekasa, oyiku nerekotin omnye oyiku yiytotin oyetyeco ani, kunyo oyiku yawut ŋerekat.
47007008	Omnye nka kot kinerecak akwek parwemwani, momwowu kule akalya omnye kyosil parwanato. Kyasowu oŋnket kule kinerecak om pesyos ce ŋeri pate, ntene nka kot kikyamwowu kule akalya,
47007009	oyiku yawut ŋerekat, nye puryo ku kule omnye kyanerecak, ntene omnye kiwecak nerekwek okoy arenynkey awec kopurto nyimwoŋ. Kikwiyisye Yiyintet nerekwek coto, kunyo puryo kot ciwurtak.
47007010	Omnye nerekwek ce yiyisye Yiyintet kuce wece mukuleyto kunyor soponto. Kunyo mocetoye ŋolyo nyeyunyo! Ntene sutu met nerekwek cepo koret.
47007011	Akäs pa wule kikwiyta Yiyintet om nerekwek kwakwek coto; kikonok asot koromun, nye kipor kule moyiku akwek lelotin! Om nerekwek oko ŋoyenotet, oko kasoteywek, oko cömisyet oko yiytayatet, yoto omutyi musankut piko ce lelotin! Kwoporu kule moponte akwek lelis om ŋolyontono tokol.
47007012	Kunyo nka kot kyosilwok ani parwanato, kipuryo kot asile kupo cito akenke nye kilel, nto kupo mpo cito akenke nye kicelel om wule mite neto. Ntene kyosilwok oporu kutok om taytap Yiyintet cömisyet nyewo nye oponte akwek om wule cemite acek.
47007013	Kuyunyoto sukuŋet cetitir acek. Kipuryo kot kotitirec acek pate, ntene kiŋerecec koromun Tito kuporwec aret nye kyakalye akwek neto.
47007014	Kyosilenokey ani akwek om wule mite neto, kunyo puryo kot awurte akwek om wule ämite ani. Kiceŋololwok okokoy ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo kukuporkey kule po manta silotet nyo kucemwocini acek Tito.
47007015	Tosyinikey kunere cömisyet nyenyi om wule omite akwek, ye kesotak kule kyoyiku yiytotin olimnci, oko kuyu wule comuye opotontye atoroc oŋerekyi neto.
47007016	Ayiku ani ŋerekat koromun omnye omuci okenenokey akwek koromun om kiy ake tokol.
47008001	Mpo yeya, cemöce acek kule oŋnket akwek ŋalek ce kikwiy poypoyetap Yiyintet om pikap Yiyintet cepo Meketoniya.
47008002	Kicesyem syemutok ce wuyec cepo toŋoŋutek ce kipunte cekto, ntene kuŋerec cek koromun kutil, omnye kiŋerec oŋnkupciw tukuk ce kiponto nka kot ki ponon.
47008003	Komwowok cepo manta kule kipciw cekto kuyu wule ki muktoy, oŋnkutil coto kikonec acek kwicek nkit.
47008004	Oŋnkusaysayec acek kule roke cecomnci cekto kukalya pikap Yiyintet om Yuteya.
47008005	Kikon cek ce caŋ kusir ce kicisotyini! Nyepo tayta kunye kikoytokey cekto om wule mite Mokoryontet oŋnkukonnkey mpo yec om wule ce mite acek om cömisyetap Yiyintet.
47008006	Kuyuyit nyoto sukuŋet cesom acek Tito nyo kicece yisyoni kuwaŋnta kukalyak awany yisyoni pciyat nyepo cömisyet.
47008007	Oyiku akwek mokoren koromun om tukuk tokol ce oponte om koyenet, oko ŋalalet, oko ŋomnonet, oko swamet nye amöce kule kyiye ce toponec, oko cömisyet nye acömec acek. Kunyo cemöce kule okolyoyisye mpo akwek om yisyoni po cömisyet.
47008008	Puryo kot amöce ani kule okonu ntarastinek, ntene oporwok wule moktoy piko alake kule cikolyoyisye. Sukuŋet oŋnket kule po cömisyet nyimwoŋ manta.
47008009	Omnye oŋnket akwek poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, nka kot ki mokoryo neto kuyu wule kiyunto, ntene kiweckey kwek panan kupo akwek, kule sukuŋet omokoren akwek kupunte pananiyantit nyenyi.
47008010	Kunyo okonok ŋomnonet nyimwani om ŋolyontoni kule, roke awany akwek yawut yisyet nyo kyocec kenyit nyankwe. Oyiku akwek cepo tayta; puryo kot ku kule oyiyisye pate, ntene kyocöme kule kyiyisye.
47008011	Otosyikey kuyunyoto okoy awany yisyet. Otitir awany yisyonoto kuyu wule kikyokoytekey oyiyisye tukuk ce oponte.
47008012	Ye möce cito kule okolyoyisye okonu, kucöme Yiyintet kokotutyet nye muce kukon; neto ntene puryo kot kuce moponto.
47008013	Puryo kot kuroke kule cetorwok akwek nyikisinto sukuŋet cikuskus nyikisinto nyepo alak.
47008014	Omnye oponte akwek yawut tukuk ce caŋ kuporkey kule misyini akalye piko co möce kokolyoyisyet, nto punto pesyosyek ce omöce akwek kokolyoyisyet oŋnkuponto cekto tukuk ce caŋ, mosukukalyak akwek cekto yoto. Om aret nyeyunyitenyi kuye mosiciyoyec piko tokol.
47008015	Kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Cito nye kiruruc ce caŋ, kunye moponto ce caŋ, nto nye kiruruc ce ŋeri kunye puryo kot kurorci.’’
47008016	Cikostoy Yiyintet koromun nye kikoci Tito mukuleytap kokolyoyisyet nye kerkey oko nyinyacek, kumac kule kukalyak akwek.
47008017	Kicesom acek neto kuco wulo omite akwek, ntene kimite kuyiytat kwine nkit kule aco.
47008018	Kociyoku neto oko yeya akenke nye ciyweye koromun om wule mite pikap Yiyintet om yisyenyi nye mwoytoti Lokoywek ce toponec.
47008019	Kunyo kikwey pikap Yiyintet neto kule cepesetate oko acek ye cemwoytoti yisyet nyepo cömisyet nyepo woyinto nyepo Mokoryontet oŋnkuporu kule cemöce kakalyayet.
47008020	Ceripekey acek koromun kule mente kot cesutu kaŋunyŋunyet om wule ceriptoy kokotutecutecu konu piko.
47008021	Yisyet nye cetyikini acek kunye ce möce kule kyiy kito nyepo manta om taytap Yiyintet oko taytap piko.
47008022	Kunyo kociyoku acek cekto oko yeyanyo ake nye kucekir acek neto aret ce caŋ okoy cinket kule titirot koromun kule okolyoyisye. Kunyo omnye kenenokey neto akwek, möce koromun kule akalyak akwek.
47008023	Nto Tito kunye cito nye kyiyisyi acek tukway cikalyak akwek. Nto mpo yeya cut alak cekwontoykey neto kuce sutu woyintap Kristo om kaynetap pikap Yiyintet.
47008024	Oporci akwek cekto cömisyet nyimwoŋ sukuŋet kukäs pikap Yiyintet tokol oŋnkunket kule cepoye acek manta ye cesilenokey akwek.
47009001	Puryo kot kuroke osilwok ani akwek ŋalek ce nöme kokolyoyisyet nyo mite cesutyini pikap Yiyintet.
47009002	Oŋnket kule omöce kule cikolyoyisye, kunyo kwosilkey ani om wule mite pikap Meketoniya omwoci kule, “Mpo yeya cepo Akaya kuce kiyiytakey kukolyoyis kuceke kenyit nyankwe.’’ Kunyo kokowurur cömisyet nyimwoŋ cekto.
47009003	Koyoku yawut mpo yeya cutecu sukuŋet mente kwek silotet nyinyacek ŋal cepo kutit pate, ntene kupoyit manta kuyu wulo kwomwowu kule oyiku akwek yiytotin okolyoyisye.
47009004	Nto pesyet ake ye kacekwantekey acek pikap Meketoniya oŋnkwocenyoru kule puryo kot oyiku akwek yiytotin, kupuryo kot cecurokyisyi acek nkit, yoto mosocurokisye mpo akwek omnye kicesilkey wokutil.
47009005	Kunyo kwasot kule misyini omwoci mpo yeya cutecu kunyosyeno kukwa wule omite akwek oŋnkwokuyiyta kokotutek co kyokurte akwek kutompo kot kupunte pesyet, sukuŋet ye kopunu ani conyoru kukuciyta topon, yoto kupor kule okonu akwek kokotutek nye ocöme nye puryo kot omnye kocisimncok
47009006	Möce oŋnket kule, “Nye kakol kupuswek ce ŋeri, kunye nyoru omik ce ŋeri, nto nye kakol kupuswek ce caŋ, kunye nyoru omik ce caŋ.’’
47009007	Kunyo misyini kukon ci ake tokol kuyu wule kacämnta nkit om moyenyi nye puryo kot kumwowu kule kokoyte püc pate nto kocisimnci. Omnye cöme Yiyintet nyo konu om ŋerekwek.
47009008	Kunyo muce kukonok ce caŋ kusir ce omöce sukuŋet onyoru ce caŋ om kiy ake tokol nye omöce akwek, sukuŋet akalya yisyet tokol nye topon.
47009009	Kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Pciytoy Yiyintet püc pate, kupcici pononik, Pure cömisyet nyenyi okokoy okoy okokoy.’’
47009010	Kunyo Yiyintet nyo kocini kolintet kupuswek oŋnkukoci omik ce ome, kunye mosukukonok kukoci kuteris kupityo kupuswek cikwok, sukuŋet kupityo kupuswek ce caŋ cepo poypoyemwoŋ.
47009011	Mosukukonok Yiyintet akwek oyiku mokoren kuyemak sokolyoyisye okokoy, sukuŋet kukasta piko ce caŋ Yiyintet om kokotutek ce cikwakwek ce kyokoci kupunte wule mite cekto.
47009012	Omnye puryo kot kukolyoy pikap Yiyintet nkit pate tukuk cu okonu akwek, ntene sutu mpo kakastayet nyewo om wule mite Yiyintet
47009013	Kunyo om yisyet nyimwakwek nyitenyi, kunye sutu kukasta piko ce caŋ Yiyintet omnye oyeni akwek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, oko kokolyoyisyet nye okolyoy piko alak.
47009014	Yoto ye mosukusomwok cekto akwek koromun omnye oponte poypoyet nye pciyat nye kikoporwok Yiyintet.
47009015	Cikaste Yiyintet om kokotutekyi ce caŋ ce mociyite.
47010001	Osomok ani Paulo nkit, om kokolyoyisyet oko tolosyetap Kristo. Ani nyo cemwowu kule oyiku tala ye cepontekey oko akwek, ntene oyiku nyeker om wule omite akwek ye mocepontekey.
47010002	Osomok akwek kule ye cepontekey oko akwek monte cesutwo anyekeritu om wule mite piko co sote kule kyiyisyi acek cerupe cepo koret.
47010003	Manta kule cemite acek koret, ntene puryo ceporye kyiyisye cepo koret.
47010004	Karik ce kyiyisye om poryet kuce puryo kot kupo koret, ntene kyiyisye karikap Yiyintet cepo swamet ce turpupe totet tokol nye wuyi. Kyorontoy tintenotet nyepo mwiynan.
47010005	Citurpupi ŋolyo ake tokol nyepo silot nye kacemwoy cekerekte ŋomnonet nyepo Yiyintet. Cenome ŋolyo kwek mopusyo oŋnkyewec kuywey Kristo.
47010006	Ye kopurukey akwek kule kocepoyitu manta, yoto kuye moceyiytekey acek cemutyi musankut piko co mocömisyi.
47010007	Oköse akwek tukuk kuyu wule yunto wulo po saŋ. Mite pa citake wule omite akwek nye nkete kule oyiku citap Kristo? Kunyo möce kukäskey wule yunto neto nkit, omnye cepoye mpo acek Kristo kuyu neto.
47010008	Omnye puryo kot oliloni ani nka kyosilikey wokusirto om kamukeywek ce kikonec acek Kristo. Kamukeywek coto kuce cetecenok, ntene puryo kot kuce citurpupenok.
47010009	Mömöce ani akerkeyitu nye osyeme kule omuyok akwek om poronokwani.
47010010	Omnye mosukumwoy citake kule, “Koromec koromun oŋnkuponto swamet poronokap Paulo, oŋnkurok yec ku moponto neto swama ye cepontekey oko neto, oŋnkupuryo kiy ŋalekyi!’’
47010011	Möce konket nyoto kule puryo kot kupciyotin ŋalek ce cesile acek om poronokyo ye mocepontekey oko ŋalek ce kyiye ye cepontekey oko akwek.
47010012	Ntene puryo kot kuroke cesutkey acek nkit nto ciyoyeckey acek nkit oko piko co sutekey parak. Perper coto koromun. Kiwecekey oŋnkuyoyeckey picoto kwicek nkit oŋnkusutekey parak kuyoyeckey kopurto nye nyimwa nkit!
47010013	Ntene acek kuce puryo kot cemöce kusirte silotet nyenyo ye cemokyini, mosukuŋete pate wule tento yisyet nye kikonec Yiyintet. Yisyet nyinyacek nyoto kunye kiciy om wule omite akwek.
47010014	Acek kuce kicenyosye cesutwok akwek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo kutompo kot kuco citake, kunyo ye kocesilkey acek om wule omite akwek; kupuryo kot kocesirte kukeyte ye cemokyini.
47010015	Kunyo puryo kot cesilekey yisyet nye kikwiy piko alake kusirte ye ŋete nye kikonec Yiyintet. Ntene ce möce kule kuner kutosyikey koyenet nyimwoŋ, sukuŋet cimuc kot kyiy yisyet nyewo om wule omite, nto yisyet nyoto kunye ŋete ye kimwoy Yiyintet.
47010016	Yoto kuye sukuŋet cimuc acek cemwayte lokoywek ce toponec om korosyek alak kukeyte wulo omite akwek nye puryo kot cesilekey yisyet nye kikwiy citake keny om komosta nyenyi.
47010017	Ntene kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ci tokol nye möce kule osilkey kuroke kusilkey om yisyet nye kikwiy Mokoryontet.’’
47010018	Omnye poyitu cito manta ye kacämnta Yiyintet neto, ntene puryo kot kuye kosilkey neto kwine nkit.
47011001	Osome ani kule omuytoco kuminiŋ, nka kot kaperperitu kutya.
47011002	Acorokyok ani akwek, kuyu wulo corokyok Yiyintet. Akerkeyekey akwek cepto nye mukul nye menket moron nye kyomokyi cito ake, cito nyoto ku Kristo.
47011003	Ntene oponte muyotet kule muce kuwuryo kasoteywek okoy otay nyimwoŋ nyepo manta nyepo Kristo kuyu wulo kiperpertoy Erenet Kawa kwiyisye mwiynanet nyewo nyepo ŋomnon.
47011004	Omnye omuci akwek omuytoci kot olimnci ci ake tokol nye kocomwowok Yesu ake yec, nye puryo kot ku Yesu nyo kicemwowok acek oŋnkocäm yec lokoywek oko ototoywek alak nye puryo kot ku Muyet Nyetilil oko lokoywek ce toponec co kyonyorte wule cemite acek.
47011005	Osoti kule puryo kot oyiku nye miniŋ koromun om wule mite co cekure “Kiyokik cewoyec.’’
47011006	Pesyet ake moyiku muswokin om ŋalalet, ntene oponte ŋomnonet nye oŋnketi kiy ake tokol. Kicemwowok acek akwek ŋalecoto tokol, oko om aret ake tokol nye mukoktos.
47011007	Kyomwowok lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet, nye kipuryo kot osomok kule ayal okonu kiy ake tokol. Kyosutok opoyitu akwek tayta opoyitu ani letut. Kyayiy yoto so miyat?
47011008	Kyanyapan so pesanik cepo pikap Yiyintet cepo wulyo ake omnye kyacäm kokolyoyisyet nyimwa, yo kyoyiyisyi om wule omite akwek?
47011009	Nteye kyomite wule omite akwek, kipuryo kot ayimak ani kule akalya ye kyomöce pesanik, omnye kisutwo ani mpo yeya cepo Meketoniya kiy ake tokol nye kyomöce. Kuyu wulo kiyunto yoto om kunyo, kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyosyek cokwoni, puryo omuci ani kot okonok akwek nyikisin.
47011010	Owolikey cepo manta om Kristo nye mitowune wule omite kule, puryo kot kusise silotet nye oponte ani om koretap Akaya tokol kumukul.
47011011	Omne somwowu ani kuyinyi? Omnye mocömok ra? Nkete Yiyintet kule ocömok ani!
47011012	Mosotosyikey ani ayiye ŋalek cu amite ayiye yawut, sukuŋet mente kunyor kiyokik cut alake kito nye mokusilekey kumwoy kule yiyisyi cekto kuyu wulo kyiyisyi acek.
47011013	Puryo kot ku kiyokik co cepo manta, po mwiynan, perperisyi om yisyet nyimwa oŋnkuweckey kule ciku kiyokikap Kristo.
47011014	Kunyo puryo kot cimuce cikite! Nka mpo Setanit komuce kuweckey nkit kukerkeyit oko malayket nyepo lakweyet!
47011015	Kunyo puryo kot ku ŋolyo nye cikite ye keporkey mutworikyi kwiye cepo manta cepo lakweyet. Mosukunyor om letut ce yeme om tukuk ce kikwiy.
47011016	Kotosyi omwowok kule, mente kot kusot citake kule oyiku ani solwo. Ntene ye osote kuyunyoto, kuroke osuto kule oyuye nyoto, sukuŋet osilkey silotet nyenyu nye miniŋ.
47011017	Manta kule ŋalek cu omwowu yawut kuce munomwowo Mokoryontet kule omwowu. Oŋololi kuyu solwo om ŋolyontoni po silotet.
47011018	Ntene omnye mite piko ce caŋ ce silekey cepo koret, kunyo mosilekey mpo ani kuyunyoto.
47011019	Oyiku akwek ŋerekotin kot omuytoci piko ce perper! Oyiku ŋomec koromun!
47011020	Omnye omuytocini ye kakwiyak citake oyiku mutwor, mpo ye koŋomok, mpo ye katëcak, mpo ye kanyilak, mpo ye kasyecak.
47011021	Osornene ye macämnte kule, kiciku nyokorec ye mokyiy tukucoto. Ntene ye möce citake kule osilkey om kiy ake tokol - Oŋololi kuyu solwo - Osilekey mpo ani.
47011022	Puraniyek so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani. Lekokap Israel so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani. Mucokoronikap Apram so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani.
47011023	Mutworikap Kristo so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani. Oŋololi ŋalecu kuyu punmetyo. Oyiku mutworin nyepo Kristo kupël cekto. Kyataŋany om yisyet nye wuyi, kicerotyo mopusi kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ, kicepasa aret ce caŋ, kyacilile met aret ce caŋ.
47011024	Kipasa Yutayek aret mut korokonik sosom ok sokol.
47011025	Kipasa Romek aret somok. Kicewirena rwontok aret akenke. Kipuryet rapet nye kyowete aret somok. Kyopur peko orit awany sawanik tiptem ok amwan pet oko komoy.
47011026	Ye kyowesetoti ani poninek ce caŋ kyonyoru yoto toŋoŋutek cepo oyinosyek ce keyin, oko corik, oko toŋoŋutek ce kitaŋanya mpo yeya Yutayek oko lamek. Kyonyoru toŋoŋutek om moŋosyek, oko toŋoŋutek cepo tyoŋik cepo samiyita, oko toŋoŋutek cepo ruretok, oko toŋoŋutek cepo coronutek cepo mwiynan.
47011027	Kyoyiyisye ataŋany, opuri pesyosyek alak nye puryo kot orwe rwonto. Kikwama rupet oko melelya. Kyopur pesyosyek alak nye moponte omik ce oyome, oko koto nye ominye, oko sirok ce malac.
47011028	Kunyo puryo kot omwowu ani ŋalek tokol. Oponte pesyosyek tokol nyikisinto nyimwani nyepo yisyet nye nöme pikap Yiyintet.
47011029	Ye puryo kot kuponto citake swamet, opur ani nye moponte swamet, ye kesuci citake miyotyet, opur mpo ani kwapi.
47011030	Ye kosilkey ani, mosilkey om ŋalek ce poru kule moponte ani swamet koromun.
47011031	Kopurto kupeyok okokoy kaynetap Yiyintet nye kwanitap Mokoryontet Yesu! Nye nkete kule puryo kot operperisyi ani.
47011032	Ye kyomite Tamasko, yoto kumwoci kinko Areta poytoyintet kukoci sikarek kurip kurkotik cepo moŋet sukunäma ani.
47011033	Ntene ciwuteno cikaput nyewo oŋnkyipunteno pastit om totetap moŋet okoy omweye wule mite neto.
47012001	Mososilkey ani nka kot puryo kot kwiye kiy nye topon. Ntene mosaŋalale kirwotik oko ŋoŋutek ce kikono Mokoryontet.
47012002	Oŋnket ani cito akenke Kristoyintet nye kicenäm oŋnkyekwer kuwo koret nyepo somok wulin po torot om kenyisyek taman ok amwan co kitil. Moŋnket kule kukwiyakay kuyunyoto manta nto kuponto porto nto om muyet nto kyakäs ani ŋoŋutyet, Yiyintet nye nkete.
47012003	Oŋnket kule kicesut cicoto kuwo wule topon (ntene moŋnket yec kule kikwiyakay kuyunyoto nto kyakäs ani ŋoŋutyet, Yiyintet nye nkete.)
47012004	Kilim neto om wuloto ŋalek ce wuŋotin ce memuce kot kuŋalale cito.
47012005	Kunyo mosilkey ani kupo cicoto, ntene puryo kot osilkey om ŋalek ce nömo ani, tos pate om tukuk ceporu purenotet nyimwani.
47012006	Nto kwomöce ani kule osilkey, nto kupuryo kot oyiku solwo, omnye nto kwomwowu ŋalek cepo manta. Ntene puryo kot osilekey, omnye momöce kule kusotyo citake kule opoye ani parak kusir ce kikäs oyiye nto ŋalek ce kilim oŋololi ani.
47012007	Ntene sukuŋet kuripo mente kot osutkey ani om silotet kupo tukuk cepo kakitat ce kyakäs aret ce caŋ. Kicekono ani mwoninto nyepo porto nye yu kötet nye mite porto, nye yiyisyi kuyu kiyokintetap Setanit sukuŋet kupiro oŋnkukerekta mosilkey kusirto.
47012008	Kyosom ani Mokoryontet aret somok kule kunumuneno kiyitenyi.
47012009	Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Poypoyet nyimwani kunye yemiŋ nyi, omnye swamet nyimwani kunye tökune purenotet nyeŋuŋ.’’ Kunyo oyiku ŋerekat koromun osilkey omnye moponte swamet, sukuŋet kuripo swamet nyepo Kristo.
47012010	Kunyo oŋerekyini purenotet; oko cupisyet, oko nyikisinto, oko toŋoŋutek, oko wuyinwek kupo kaynetap Kristo. Omnye ye oyiku puren kuye yoto ye oponte swamet.
47012011	Oyiyisyi ani kuyu solwo. Ntene akwek kuce kwosokyo ayiy kuyunyoto. Akwek kuce kweroke acämnta ani. Omnye nka kot moponte latik, ntene puryo kot oyiku miniŋ om aret ake tokol om wule mite, “Kiyokikwok coto.’’
47012012	Kyoporwok kule oyiku ani kiyokintet om tukuk ce kyayiy om wule omite akwek om muytocinotet nyewo, coto ku pelutok oko tukuk cepo kakitat, oko yisyonutek cepo swamet.
47012013	Ntene kyoyiku akwek miyotec kulene kupël pikap Yiyintet alak, tos ani nkit pate nye mnosomok kokolyoyisyet. Osomok akalya omnye mnoyiyisye cepo manta!
47012014	Aret nyepo somok nyitenyi nye oyiku ani yiytat aco wule omite akwek, momöce kule cataŋanyak. Omocok akwek, ntene momöce pesan. Omnye puryo kot kukiy nyepo kwak kukonorci lekok poyik tukuk, ntene poyik ce konorcini lekok tukuk.
47012015	Mosaŋerec ani ye koyiyisye tukuk tokol ce oponte oŋnkokoytekey mpo ani nkit sukuŋet akalyak akwek. Omuci ocäm ani kuminiŋ aŋnkacämak ani akwek koromun?
47012016	Kunyo mosocam akwek kule kipuryo kot onyikisyok ani. Ntene mosukumwoy citake kule, kyatecak oyiyisye mwiynanet.
47012017	Kyomwowok ani so kuyunyoto ayiyisye ci ake tokol om nyo kyoyoku kuco wulo omite?
47012018	Kyosom ani Tito kuco kucontoykey yeya Kristoyintet ake, omwowu so kule kiŋomwok akwek Tito? Puryo kot kyiyisye acek oko neto kasoteywek ce kerkey oko kopurto nye kerkey?
47012019	Pesyet ake osoti akwek kule om ŋalecu tokol kuce cemite acek ceyetekey om wule omite akwek. Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ceŋololi kuyu wule moktoy Kristo kule ceŋalal om taytap Yiyintet. Mpo yeya cämanik, nto kiy ake tokol nye kyiye kunye kyiye kule sukuŋet cikalyak akwek.
47012020	Oponte muyotet kule ye kopunu wulo omite akwek, mosiconyorwok kupuryo kot oyiye kuyu wule omoktoy ani, oŋnkokäs akwek kule puryo kot ayiye ani kuyu wule omoktoy akwek. Oponte Muyotet kule mosonyoru wokutyet oko corokyinotet, nyerunotet, soynonet, cupisyet, ŋomset, silotet, oko cukurotet.
47012021	Oponte muyotet kule ye kaco yec mosukusorneno Yiyintet nyimwani om tayta nyimwakwek, kunyo mosarir ani om wule mite piko ce caŋ ce kikwiy miyotyet ce tompo kot kurenynkey om ŋalek ce somis ce kikwiy cepo sakwayanatet oko corokyinotet nye miyat.
47013001	Aret nyepo somok nyitenyi orutocok ani akwek kuyu wulo cemwoytoy kule, “Cemute musankut ye kaŋalal piko muncururwanik oyeny nto somok.’’
47013002	Yo kyopontekey oko akwek om panta nyepo oyeny, kyosowu yoto piko ce kikwiy miyotyet ikye, oŋnkosowu mpo piko alak tokol. Kunyo asowok mpo yawut ye amite wule low, nteye kaco yec aret nyepo somok kupuryo ci nye muce kucilile toŋoŋutek.
47013003	Mosokäs akwek nkit kule ŋolole Kristo kupunte wule amite ani. Puryo kot kupuren Kristo om wule omite akwek, ntene yiyisyi swamet nyenyi om wule omite.
47013004	Omnye nka kot kimoponto neto swamet yo kicewuyitocini murtowontet, ntene sopot yawut om swamet nyepo Yiyintet. Moceponte mpo acek swamet om koyomotet nye ceponte oko neto, ntene om tilyanatet nye ceponte acek oko akwek kunye mosicesopce oko neto om swametap Yiyintet.
47013005	Akäskey akwek nkit oŋnkomutyikey musankut oŋnket kule ceponte koyenet. Oŋnket pa kule mitowune Kristo wule omite akwek? Tos pate ye kyosute koromun.
47013006	Asoti ani kule mosonket akwek kule puryo kot cisute acek.
47013007	Cesome acek Yiyintet sukuŋet mente kot ayiy akwek lelis, nye puryo kot ku kule sukuŋet kuporu kule kuciy acek topon, ntene sukuŋet ayiy akwek cepo manta; nka kot ku kuporukey kuyunye kicisute acek.
47013008	Omnye puryo kot cimuci acek kot kyiy tukuk ce toyekey oko ŋalek cepo manta, kyiye pate ceporyecini.
47013009	Omnye ciku acek ŋerekotin ye moceponte swamet oŋnkoponte akwek. Kunyo cesome kule onyolu akwek owoŋnkyi.
47013010	Osilwok ani parwani kutokumite wule low om wule omite, sukuŋet ye kaco mente conyercok oyiyisye kamukeywek ce kikono Mokoryontet. Kamukeywek cutecu kuce otecenok puryo kot oturpupenok.
47013011	Kunyo mpo yeya, cemutakwey! Asyem anyoru toponiyet, alimnte ŋomnonet nyimwani, acömncine akwek kwakwek nkit. Opurte kalyet, kuye sukuŋet opurte akwek Yiyintet nyepo cömisyet oko kalyet.
47013012	Osupayikey om ŋatutet nyetilil nyepo tupcet, Kasupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol.
47013013	Poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, oko cömisyetap Yiyintet, oko koyomotet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil kopur oko akwek tokol.
48001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo; kiyokintet nye kipuryo kot kukweya ani piko nto kukweya cito, ntene kikweya Yesu Kristo nkit oko Papa nyo kiŋet Yesu kotutune met.
48001002	Ani oko mpo yeya ce cepontekey kuce cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet ce mite koretap Kalatiya.
48001003	Cesomwok onyoru poypoyet oko kalyet nye cone wule mite Papanyo oko Yesu Kristo.
48001004	Kristo nye kiywey cömisyetap Yiyintenyo oŋnku Papanyo oŋnkukoytokey neto sukuŋet konum miyotyonik cicacek om pesyosyecu miyotec.
48001005	Kunyo kante kupoyit woyinto wule mite Yiyintet okokoy okoy okokoy. Yunyoto.
48001006	Kwakitenak ani akäs kule omoce akwek kule kyaste lakwar Yiyintet nyo kikurok om poypoyetap Kristo, oŋnkolimnte yec lokoywek alak.
48001007	Ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, puryo kot kumite yec lokoywek alake ce toponec. Komwowu kuyunyoto omnye mite piko alake ce mosok akwek ce syeme kule cewecwec piko cepo Kristo.
48001008	Ntene nka mpo acek nto mpo malayket nye cone torot, oŋnkusyem cokumwowok akwek lokoywek ce pciyotin ce puryo kot kukerkey oko lokoywek co kicemwowok acek, kuporkey kule misyini kucup Yiyintet cicoto.
48001009	Kicemwowu acek ŋalecu kunyo om tay, kunyo omwowu ani yec otosyini kule, ye komwowok akwek ci ake tokol lokoywek ce toponec ce puryo kot kukerkey oko lokoywek co kyocäm akwek, misyini kucup Yiyintet cicoto.
48001010	Poru ra yawut ŋalekwani cutecu kuyunye asyeme kule sukuŋet kucäma piko? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Amöce kule kucämnta Yiyintet! Osoti akwek kule asyeme ani kule aŋerec piko? Nto kwosyeme kule aŋerec piko pate, nto puryo kot oyiku mutworintet nyepo Kristo.
48001011	Omwowok ani akwek mpo yeya kule, lokoywek ce toponec co kyomwowok akwek kuce kipuryo kot kutowu cito.
48001012	Kipuryo mpo kot kukono nto kuneta ani ci ake tokol. Ntene Yesu Kristo nkit nye kiŋoŋwo kuporwo ŋaleca.
48001013	Kyolim akwek ŋalek cepo manta cepo kopurto nye kyoponte ani ye kitorupe ntarastinek tokol cepo Yutayek. Oŋnketi akwek wule kyotoŋoŋntoy ani pikap Yiyintet, nye kipuryo kot omuye, nye kyosyeme kule opot kupotyo.
48001014	Kyopëli ani piko cepo pinta nyimwani om aret nye kyorupe tinitap Yutayek oko om aret nye kyorupe ntarastinek cepo mpo kukunyo.
48001015	Ntene Yiyintet nkit om poypoyenyi nye kikweya ani kutompo kot ceyiyo, nto om letut kukono oyici neto yisyet,
48001016	oŋnkuporwo kuŋoŋwo Werinyi kule saŋet womwoci lamek lokoywekyi ce toponec. Kipuryo kot awo wule mite ci ake tokol watepe kukono ŋomnonet nyepo kito nye mayiy.
48001017	Kipuryo mpo kot awo ani Yerusalem wakäs kiyokik co kinyosyo kwek kiyokik. Puryo kot kuyunyo. Kyanyosye awo Arapia, nto om letut oketukey yec Tamasko.
48001018	Yoto om letutap kenyisyek somok, onomen ani awo Yerusalem orutoci Petero, kule saŋet kukono lokoywek. Wopur oko neto awany pesyosyek taman oko mut.
48001019	Ntene kipuryo kot amuc ani yoto kot akäs kiyokik alak. Kyakäs pate Yakopo mutakwametitap Mokoryontenyo.
48001020	Owolikey ani om taytap Yiyintet kule po manta ŋalek tokol cu osile nye puryo kot ku mwiynan.
48001021	Nto om letut, onomen awo okoy opunte koretap Siriya.
48001022	Ntene kipuryo kot konketo Kristayek cepo Yuteya om pesyosyecoto tokol.
48001023	Kilime cek pate kumwowu piko kule, “Citye kisyeme kule ataŋanyec acek kunyi mite yawut kumwoytoti koyenet nye kisyeme neto ikye kule opot kupot.’’
48001024	Kunyo kukasta cekto Yiyintet om wule amite ani.
48002001	Nto om letutap kenyisyek taman ok amwan onomen ani aketitekey yec Yerusalem cepetekey Parnapa, yoto akwer cepetekey oko Tito.
48002002	Kyawo alaŋnte omnye kiŋoŋwo kuporwo Yiyintet kule roke awo ani wuloto. Wocetuye acek om kirwoket nye kiwuŋat oko kiyokik cewoyec nkit, oŋnkoporci cekto lokoywek ce kyomwoci ani lamek. Kipuryo kot amöce ani kule kupot pöc pate yisyemwani nye kyayiy, nto yisyet nye kyomite oyiye yoto.
48002003	Kipuryo mpo yoto kot cisimnci kule cewon Tito nye kicepontekey acek tukway, nka kot ki ci nye Kirikin.
48002004	Ntene kimöce piko alak kule cewon neto. Kikwa picoto ce kipuryo kot kupo luket nyinyacek oŋnkwokowut orit kuyu wotik kule sukuŋet kuwot oŋnkukäs kalyet nye ceponte acek om Kristo. Kimöce cekto kule cewecwecec acek ciku mutwor.
48002005	Ntene kipuryo kot cecömnci ŋalekwa mpo kisic, sukuŋet ceripok acek opurte okokoy lokoywek ce toponec.
48002006	Komwowu kule kantoyik co sutekey kule ciku cewoyec. Akure ani cekto kantoyik. Ntene yoyece Yiyintet piko tokol, omnye puryo kuköse neto kule yunto tontap cito nyepo saŋ. Kunyo kipuryo kot kuneta ani kantoyicoto ŋolyo nyelel.
48002007	Ŋalek ce kikäs cekto pate om wule amite ani kucu kule, kikono Yiyintet yisyet nye omwoytoti omwoci lamek lokoywek ce toponec, kuyu wulo kicikoci Petero yisyet kumwocinot Yutayek lokoywek ce toponec.
48002008	Omnye Yiyintet nyo kikocini Petero kwek kiyokintet nyepo Yutayek kunye kikono mpo ani oyiku kiyokintet nyepo lamek.
48002009	Kunyo Yakopo oko Kefa oko Yowana ce kicinket kule cekto kuce tolocikap piko cepo Yiyintet, kuce kinket kule kikono ani Yiyintet yisyoni pciyat. Yoto cisupaykey oko cekto cenämnkey yewuniyek, oŋnkyelimncine kule ani oko Parnapa mosicipe acek wule mite lamek, kupa cekto wule mite Yutayek.
48002010	Kimite ŋolyontet akenke nye kicecomncine kule misyini cisoti acek pononik. Ŋolyontet nyoto kunye kyoyisye ani swama okokoy kunyi.
48002011	Ntene yoto ntowo kuco Petero okoy kupun Antiyok, apolyi ani neto koromun om taytap piko tokol om ŋalek ce kitoku ce kipuryo kot kupo manta ce kikwiye.
48002012	Kikwomisyi neto kunyo oko mpo yeya cepo lamek kutompo kot kukwa piko ce kiyoku Yakopo; Ntene ntowo kupun picoto, kutoyis Petero nye komokwomisyi oko piko cut, omnye kinyokorit om wule mite piko co kimöce kule roke cewon lamek.
48002013	Yoto kuyomokey Petero oko Yutayek ce nyokorec oŋnkwiy ŋolyontoni po perperyo okoy kowut mpene Parnapa wule mite cekto picoto kinyokorec.
48002014	Nteyu kowo akäs ani kule puryo kot kurupe cekto aret nye rotat nyepo lokoywek ce toponec, yoto omwoci ani Petero om taytap piko tokol kule, “Yiku nyi Yutoyin, kunyo kwemite kwak puri kopurto nyepo lamek nye puryo kot kupo Yutayek, omne sesimnci nyi kule misyini kopur lamek kapurto nyepo Yutayek?’’
48002015	Po manta kule kiceyiyec acek ciku Yutayek, ntene puryo kot ciku lamek co ponto miyotyonik.
48002016	Kunyo cinket acek yec kule satoktos cito kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om koyenet nye keyen pate Yesu Kristo, ntene puryo kot ku kule kocerip ntarastinek; kunyo kiciyen mpo acek Yesu Kristo sukuŋet cesatokisye cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte koyenet nye ceponte om wule mite Kristo.
48002017	Kunyo ye cemite acek cesyeme kule cesatokisye om wule mite Yiyintet om koyomotet nyenyo nye kiciyomekey oko Kristo, oŋnkutok kuporkey yec kule ciku pic ce ponto miyotyonik kuyu wule yunto lamek, kupor pa ŋalecato kule yiyisyi Kristo yisyet nye kolyoy miyotyonik? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic!
48002018	Ye kasyem ani yec atec kuyoŋ ntarastinek ce kikyawirte kupotyo, kuporkey kule amite owurtoy.
48002019	Nto kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek, kyamey om wule mite ntarastinek saŋet arup soponto nyepo Yiyintet. Kicepakäca ani oko Kristo om murtowontenyi.
48002020	Kunyo kimosope kwani nkit, ntene Kristo kunye mitowune soponto nyimwani orit. Soponto nye osope ani yawut, kunye soponto nye osope om koyenet nye oyentyini Weritap Yiyintet; nye kicäma oŋnkukoyito soponto nyenyi kumeco ani.
48002021	Puryo kot otoye ani poypoyetap Yiyintet. Ye muce kot kusatokis kunyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte ntarastinek, kuporkey kule kime Kristo püc pate.
48003001	Akwek Kalatiyek solonocu! Kicepanak? Akwek kuce kuciporwok akäs om konyek kule kicewuyitoci Yesu kumeci murtowontet.
48003002	Kunyo omwowo ani pa akwek ŋolyontoni akenke: Kyonyoru Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet omnye kyorup Ntarastinek nto omnye kyolim oŋnkocäm lokoywek ce toponec?
48003003	Omuci akwek osolwonken kulene? Kyocece ocäm Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet, kunyo omöce yawut kule wociwaŋnte om ŋalek cepo swamet nyimwoŋ nkit?
48003004	Mokwek ŋal cepo püc pate ce puryo kot kuponto latik ŋalek tokol co kyayiy akwek. Ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, puryo komokomukoktos kot kuyuyit nyo.
48003005	Ye kikonok Yiyintet akwek Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkwiy ŋalek cepo kakitat om wule omite akwek, kuporkey pa kule yiye Yiyintet kuyunyoto omnye orupe akwek ntarastinek nto omnye kyolim oŋnkocäm lokoywek ce toponec.
48003006	Kerkey ŋaleca oko wule mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet om ŋalek ce nöme Apram ce mwowu kule; “Kiyen Apram kucäm Yiyintet, nto om letut nyepo koyenet nyenyi nyoto, yoto kucäm Yiyintet Apram kwek ci nyepo manta.’’
48003007	Kunyo yunyoto om wule omite akwek, misyini aŋnket kule, piko ceponto koyenet nyoto kuce mucokoronik cepo Apram.
48003008	Kiŋor silutekap Yiyintet kule mosukusat Yiyintet kunyol lamek om wule mite neto om koyenet. Kumwoy silutekap Yiyintet cepo lokoywek ce toponec ce nöme Apram kule, “Mosukukoci Yiyintet kupeyok piko cepo koret tokol kupunte wule mite nyi.’’
48003009	Kuyen Apram kucömis yoto cikoci neto kupeyok, kunyo cikocini piko tokol kupeyok ye kocömis kuyu wulo kicikocinto Apram.
48003010	Kunyo piko tokol ce kenekey kule ceripe ntarastinek, kuce kicesoci. Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kurupe oŋnkuywey ŋolyo ake tokol nye kicesil kitaputap ntarastinek kunye kicesoci cicoto!’’
48003011	Porukey yawut topon kule, puryo ci nye muce kusatakay kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet ye karup ntarastinek, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosicisop ci ake tokol nye nyolunot om wule mite Yiyintet om koyenet pate.’’
48003012	Ntene puryo kukenekey ntarastinek koyenet omnye mwowu silutek kule, “Ci ake tokol nye yiye ŋalek tokol ce mwowu ntarastinek kunye mosukopurto neto nyoto ntarastinek.’’
48003013	Kristo kunye kisorwec acek om wule mite cupisyet nyepo ntarastinek, omnye kinum neto nkit cupisyet nyo sutu ntarastinek. Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ci ake tokol nye kiciketyi ketit kunye cupot.’’
48003014	Kunyo kikwiy Kristo kuyunyoto sukuŋet kupeyokap Yiyintet co kikikurtoci Apram cikoci coto lamek kupunte wule mite Kristo Yesu, oko kule siceŋet mpo acek om koyenet cenyoru kokotutyet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nyo kikurtoy Yiyintet.
48003015	Mpo yeya, mosoporwok ani ayuye soponto nyepo kwak kule, “Ye kokwicin piko oyenku oŋnkusil kirotyet, kupuryo yec cito ake om picoto nye muce kot kot kwiri kirotyet nyoto; nto mpo kutayi ŋolyontet ake om kirotyanato.’’
48003016	Kunyo Kikurtoci Yiyintet Apram oko mucokorenyi, puryo kot kumwowu kule, “Oko mucokoronikyi,’’ Nye poru kule pic ce caŋ, mwowu pate kule, “Oko wule mite mucokoreŋuŋ.’’ Nye poru kule akenke pate. Nto nyoto akenke ku Kristo!
48003017	Ŋolyontet nye amöce ani kule omwowu kunyi kule, kikwiy Yiyintet kirotyet oŋnkukurto kumwoy kule mosorip kirotyanato, kunyo ntarastinek ce kikwoni letutap kenyisyek pokolwokik amwan ok sosom kuce puryo kot komuce kot kwiri oŋnkunum kirotyet nyo kikurto Yiyintet keny.
48003018	Kunyo ye nömekey tukuk ce konu Yiyintet oko ntarastinek, kupuryo kot kunömekey oko kirotyenyi. Ntene kikoci Yiyintet Apram kirotyet omnye kikurtoci neto.
48003019	Kunyo omne sicekon ntarastinek? Kicekon cetos sukuŋet kupor wule yunto kawontyontit; ntene kicemöce kule sukopur pate okoy pesyet nye cone mucokoretap Apram nyo kikicekurtoci. Kisut malaykanik ntarastinek. Kiyoŋe citake kwenutap Yiyintet oko malaykanicato.
48003020	Ntene puryo kot cemöce cito nye yiyisyi kuyoŋe kwen omnye mite cito akenke, nyoto ku Yiyintet akenke nkit pate.
48003021	Porukey pa ŋalecu kule toyekey ntarastinek oko kurtoyetap Yiyintet? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Omnye nto kicekon ntarastinek ce ponto kamukeywek ce muce kusop piko, nteporukey kule cimuce cesat kunyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte wule mite ntarastinek.
48003022	Ntene kimwoy silutekap Yiyintet kule “Kupayta miyotyet koret kumukul, sukuŋet kunyor piko ce kikoyen kokotutyet nyo kicekurto nye cekonu om koyenet nye ponte cito om wule mite Kristo.’’
48003023	Kutompo kot kuco koyenet, kicemite yoto ciku acek rototin om mopusi om poytoyisyetap ntarastinek cekonye okoy ciŋoŋ koyenet nyitenyi musukuco.
48003024	Kunyo kerkey ntarastinek oko konetintet nye kiripec acek okoy kuco Kristo. Sukuŋet kuco cokusatec cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet cepunte koyenet.
48003025	Kunyo kipunto yawut pesyetap koyenet, kuporkey kule kimokuripec acek konetintet nyankwe.
48003026	Kyopunte akwek tokol koyenet sukuŋet oyiku lekokap Yiyintet ce kikoyomokey oko Yesu Kristo.
48003027	Omnye kicepatisanak oyomekey oko Yesu Kristo, kunyo kyolac kerkeyinto nyepo Yesu Kristo.
48003028	Kunyo puryo kot kumite pciyatet nyepo Yutayek oko Kirikik, nto nye pciye mutworik oko co puryo ku mutworik, nto nye pciye moronik oko koruk, oyiku akwek tokol akenke om koyenet om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
48003029	Nteyu oyiku akwek tokol pikap Kristo, kuporkey kule oyiku mucokoronikap Apram ce mosonyoru kokotutyet nye kikurto Yiyintet.
48004001	Ŋalek ce amöce ani omwowu kucu kule, ye tominiŋ wero nye mosikonti tukuk tokol cepo kwan, kwoyecin neto yoto oko mutworintet, nka kot ku neto nyepo tukuk tokol,
48004002	Ye tokuminiŋ weroto kumite piko alake ceripe neto oko tukukyi okoy kupunto pesyet nyo kikwey kwan.
48004003	Om aret nyeyunyoto kiciku mpo acek mutworik cepo poytoyisyet nyepo oyik cepo koret ye kitompo ciku piko cewoyec.
48004004	Ntene ntowo kupunto pesyet nye yiytat topon, yoto kuyok Yiyintet Werinyi nkit nye kiyi korko oŋnkyepayta kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek cepo Yutayek.
48004005	Yoto kutyacec acek piko ce kipaytec ntarastinek sukuŋet ciku lekokap Yiyintet.
48004006	Kito nye poru kule oyiku akwek lekokyi kunye kiyok Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Werinyi kuco mukuleywek cicacek orit. Muyet Nyetilil nyoto kunyo kursyi kule, “Apa,’’ nye mwowu kule, “Papa.’’
48004007	Kunyo kimo oyiku yawut mutwor, ntene oyiku lekokyi. Nteye ye oyiku lekokyi kuporkey kule oyiku kontiyik.
48004008	Kipuryo kot oŋnket akwek ikye keny Yiyintet, kunyo kyoyiku yoto mutwor cepo oyik ce puryo kot ku yiyik mpo kisic.
48004009	Ntene yawut om pesyosyecu kyonket Yiyintet, nto momwowu kule kikonketok Yiyintet akwek, omne samac yec kule cewekyikey wule mite poytoyisyetap oyik ce moponto swama oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto latik. Omne samac akwek kule ceketyikey ciku mutwor cikwa!
48004010	Toripe ntarastinek cepo pesyossyek oko orok, (oko wule yunto pesyoyek alake cewoyec) oko kenyisyek!
48004011	Kunyo kwasot ani kule mosukupot püc pate yisyet nye kyayiye ataŋany om wule omite akwek.
48004012	Mpo yeya, osomok kule opur kopurto nye kerkey oko nyimwani, omnye akerkeyekey ani oko akwek, tompo oyiwo ani akwek ŋolyo nye miyat.
48004013	Omuci akwek asot omne somwowok ani lokoywek ce toponec om panta nyo kipo tayta; omnye kyomnyoni.
48004014	Ntene kipuryo kot anyila nto mpo ataya ani akwek, nka kot kisyemak kunyikisyok porto nye kyomnyoni. Kyatoroca yoto kuyu wule omuci atorokte malayketap Yiyintet oko kuyu wule omuci atorokte Yesu Kristo!
48004015	Kyoyiku yoto ŋerekotin, kukwiy kulene yawut? Omwowok ani nkit kule, nto kimukoktos yoto, ntokyomuci akwek kot olotu konyek cikwok oŋnkokono!
48004016	Kunyo kwoyiku ani so yawut puniyontet nyimwoŋ omnye omwowok ŋalek cepo manta?
48004017	Mite piko alake ce poru ŋerekwek kucämak akwek, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kutoponec ŋalek cemöce. Ŋalek cemöce cekto pate ku kule cepciyak akwek om wule amite ani sukuŋet oŋerekyi akwek cekto.
48004018	Ŋolyo nye topon kwak okokoy ye ŋerekyok akwek piko alake om ŋalek ce toponec, nka mpo ye mocepontekey oko akwek.
48004019	Lekokwani ce minkec, otoŋonyi ani om mwoninto kuyu korko nye möce kucämnkey sukuŋet oyiyok akwek om aret nyepo oyeny oŋnkopurune Kristo wule omitowune akwek.
48004020	Amöce ani kule ntokopontekey oko akwek om pantanyi, saŋet oŋnket ŋolyontet nye momwowu. Omnye asotok ani akwek koromun.
48004021	Omwowo ani pa yawut akwek piko co möce kule kupaytec ntarastinek? Puryo kot olime akwek ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek?
48004022	Mwowu ntarastinek kule kiponto Apram werik oyeny, kipo werit ake korko nye mutworin, nto werit ake kupo nyo korko nye momutworin.
48004023	Kiceyi werit nyepo korket nyo mutworin kuyu wulo keyitoy piko tokol, ntene werinyi nyepo korket nye momutworin kunye kiceyi nyo om kurtoyet nyepo Yiyintet.
48004024	Tyonkoc nyi nye poru ŋalek cepo orit. Kerkey korucoto oyenku oko kirotyanik oyeny. Korket akenke kunye cone tulwetap Sinai nyoto ku Akar nye yiye lekok ce mutwor.
48004025	Kerkey Akar oko tulwetap Sinai nye mite koretap Arapia nye ciyuye Yerusalem nyepo pesyosyecu, omnye mutworin Yerusalem oko lekokyi.
48004026	Ntene kerkey Yerusalem nyepo torot oko korket nye momutworin, nyoto ku yeyonyacek.
48004027	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Iŋerec korko nye son, nye tompo kot kuyi lekwa! Pol om ŋerekwek, nyi nye tompo kot käs mwonin nyepo lekwa! Omnye mosukuyi korko nye kicetay lekok ce caŋ, kupël korko nyo pontekey santenyi.’’
48004028	Ntene akwek mpo yeya, oyiku akwek lekokap kirotyet nyepo Yiyintet kuyu wulo kiyunto Isaka.
48004029	Kitaŋany om pesyosyecoto werit nyo kiceyi kuyu wule ceyitoy piko tokol kutaŋany werit nyo kiceyi om swametap Muyet Nyetilil. Kunyo kuyunyoto mpo yawut.
48004030	Ntene mwowu ne silutekap Yiyintet cu mwowu kule, “Kwet korket nyo mutworin oko werinyi; omnye puryo kot komukoktos kot kontiyis kupcicin tukukap kwan werit nyepo korko nye mutworin oko werit nyepo korko nye momutworin.’’
48004031	Kunyo mpo yeya, puryo kot ciku acek lekokap korko nye mutworin, ntene ciku lekokap korko nye momutworin.
48005001	Kikutyacec acek Kristo sukuŋet komo kyiku mutwor. Kunyo oyoŋnkye okwilokisye, monte yec kot tokunämak kutiŋnkyok ŋony mucokit nyepo mutworyontit.
48005002	Ani nyo Paulo nkit nye oŋololwok akwek, kunyo möce alim topon. Ye kocäm akwek kot cewonak, koporukey kule puryo kot kuponto Kristo latik mpo kisic om wule omite akwek.
48005003	Omöce ani kule otosyikey yec akwil ŋolyontoni omwoci citake tokol nye kacäm kot cewon kule, mosukuratakay cito nyoto kurip ŋalek tokol ce mwowu ntarastinek.
48005004	Nto piko alak ce mite wule omite akwek ce syeme kule cerup ntarastinek sukuŋet cesatokisye om wule mite Kristo. Omite akwek piko coto saŋ om wule mite poypoyetap Yiyintet.
48005005	Ŋaleca ku cecemite acek cikeni om Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nye mite kwiyisyi om koyenet nyinyacek.
48005006	Omnye ye kiciyomekey acek oko Kristo, kupuryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo mpo kisic ye kacewonak nto ye puryo kot cewonak. Ŋolyontet nyewo ku koyenet nye yiyisyi kupunte cömisyet.
48005007	Kyomite akwek oyiyisyi topon! Ŋo nye kikerektak ye marup ŋalek cepo manta? Kiperperak picoto kulene?
48005008	Nka kot kiperperak cito nyoto kwiyisye ŋalek ce yune; kipuryo kot kukwone ŋaleca wule mite Yiyintet nyo kikurok akwek,
48005009	kuyu wulo cemwoytoy kwak kule, “Muce mumarek ce tukusic kukoci kukut pusyek cepo teret nyewo.’’
48005010	Ntene tomite ani okenenokey akwek kule puryo kot omuci yec kot asot ŋalek alak, omnye kiciyomekey cepoyitu Mokoryontet akenke. Mosukumutyi Yiyintet musankut ci ake tokol nye mosok akwek nka kot ku nye yu ne.
48005011	Mpo yeya, omne yu toce mite citoŋonyo ani okoy kunyi; ye kokomwoytoti ani kule topon wonset. Nto yunye kipo ŋaleca manta, nto puryo kot oponte ani wuyin om ŋalek ce omwoytoti cepo murtowontetap Kristo.
48005012	Kuyu piko co mosok akwek, amöce ani kule kutosyikey cek om aret nyimwa okoy wokulotokis cekto nkit.
48005013	Nto akwek mpo yeya, kicekurok oŋnkityaktak, kunyo monte kyiyisye kalyet nyoto sukuŋet kupaytak corokyinotet nyepo tukuk ce möce porwonik cikwok, kunyo oyiyisye koromun cömisyet okolyoykey akwek kwakwek nkit.
48005014	Omnye ciyomntos ntarastinek tokol kwek akenke om ntarastit akenke nyo mwowu kule, “Cäm lyatyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
48005015	Nteye kowuskey kuyu tyoŋin oŋnkataŋanynkey akwek nkit, kumöce oripkey omnye omuci kwayarantekey akwek nkit.
48005016	Ŋolyontet nye omwowok ani akwek kunyi kule, ayaste kwiyis Muyet Nyetilil kupayta soponwek cikwok, ntene monte ciŋerec porto om tukuk ce möce porto nyepo cito.
48005017	Omnye tukuk ce möce porwonikyo kuce toyekey oko tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil. Nto tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil kuce toyekey oko tukuk ce möce porto nyepo cito. Coto tukway kuce punik ce senkerekey, kunyo puryo kot oyiye akwek tukuk ce möce kule kyiy.
48005018	Nteye ntowok akwek Muyet Nyetilil, kupuryo kot omite yec ŋonyutap ntarastinek.
48005019	Tukuk ce toku koromun ce yiye porto nyepo cito kucu, kuyu sakwayanat, simnyo, makatet nye miyat.
48005020	Sayetap ototoywek, ponisyet, puniyontit, wokutyet, corokyinot, cemukuleyo, mucesta,
48005021	oko pokitet, oko tumwonik ce miyotec, oko ŋalek alak tokol cekerkey oko coto. Kunyo osowok ani yawut kuyu wulo kikyasowok ikye kunyo kule, puryo kot kunyoru piko ce yiye ŋaleca poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
48005022	Ntene konu Muyet Nyetilil, cömisyet, ŋerekwek, kalyet, muytocinotet, poypoyet, toponiyet, cikaseninkey,
48005023	sikenotet oko ripetapkey. Puryo yec ntarastit nye toye ŋalek ceyucutecu.
48005024	Piko cepo Kristo kuce kipakäc soponto nyepo corokyinotet oko tukuk tokol ce möce porto.
48005025	Muyet Nyetilil nye ceponte acek; kunye roke kurip soponwek cicacek.
48005026	Puryo kot kuroke cenyim nto puryo kot kuroke cewuskey acek nkit, nto mpo cecorokyi citake.
48006001	Mpo yeya, ye kacenäm citake tokol kwiye ŋolyo nye miyat, roke asat akwek piko co oponte mukuleywek ce toponec cito nyoto kawur, ntene roke ayiy kuyunyoto om aret nye topon, oŋnkosyem oripkey akwek nkit sukuŋet mente cesyemak mpo akwek kuyu cicoto.
48006002	Otorcikey akwek kwakwek nkit terekok, omnye om aret nyeyunyoto kuye mosorup akwek ntarastinek cepo Kristo.
48006003	Omnye ye sotekey citake kule oyiku nye tokunot oŋnkurok kupöc pate, ku keperperkey cicoto nkit.
48006004	Ntene roke kukäskey ci ake tokol wule yunto neto nkit, nteye köse kule oyiye ŋalek ce toponec, kumöce kusilkey om tukuk ce kikwiy nye puryo kot kuyoyece ce kikwiy cito ake.
48006005	Omnye ponto ci ake tokol terekwet nyenyi nkit nye tore.
48006006	Möce cito nyo cinete lokoywek ce toponec kupcicin mokoryontit nye ponto oko konetintet nyenyi.
48006007	Monte ciperperkey akwek kwakwek nkit, omnye puryo kot ciperpere Yiyintet. Tukuk ce kole cito; kuce tukuk ce mosukukis cicoto.
48006008	Ye kakol cito mparet nyepo corokyinotet nyepo porto nyenyi, ku mparanato nye mosukukise omik cepo met. Nteye kakol cito mparet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil, ku mparanato nye mosukukise omik cepo soponto nye mopoku.
48006009	Kunyo puryo kuroke cecosye acek mokyiy ŋalek ce toponec. Omnye ye kakyiy yisyonutek ce toponec, mosukupunto pesyosyek ce mocekisisye acek omikyo.
48006010	Omnye om pesyo tokol nye kacenyoru poroyinto, kumisyini cikalye piko tokol, ntene kupëlis mpo yeya co kikoyen.
48006011	Akäs pa akwek nyukutanik cewoyec ce kosilwok ani om yewumwani nkit.
48006012	Piko tokol ce möce kule cesilkey ciporu momitek cepo porwonik cikwa kuce syeme kule cisimncok cewonak akwek. Kunyo yiye kuyunyoto pate kule sukuŋet mente citaŋanyec kupo murtowontetap Kristo.
48006013	Omnye nka mpo picoto cewone, kuce puryo kot kurupe mpecek ntarastinek, kunyo möce cek kule cewonak akwek sukuŋet kusilkey om momitek nye mite porwonik cikwakwek.
48006014	Ntene puryo kot osilekey ani om kiy ake tokol, tos pate om murtowontetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Omnye om murtowontet nyenyi, kunye asute kule kipok ŋalek cepo koret om wule amite ani oŋnkyamey om wule mite ŋalek cepo koret.
48006015	Puryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo ye kacewon cito nto ye puryo kot cewon. Ŋolyontet nyewo koromun pate, kuye ketililkey cito.
48006016	Nto om wule mite piko co rupe ŋalecu om porwonik cikwa, osomncini ani cekto kule opurte kalyet oko kokolyoyisyet wanak oko Israel nyepo Yiyintet.
48006017	Mawaŋnte omwowu kule, kuceke yawut kuwo tay, mente kot tokutaŋanya yec ci ake tokol; omnye momitek ce oponte om porto nyimwani kuce pelutok ce poru kule ayiku ani mutworintetap Yesu.
48006018	Mpo yeya, osomwok kule opurte akwek poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Yunyoto.
49001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om cömisyetap Yiyintet. Osilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet ce minye Efeso ce kikoyen soponwek cikwa Yesu Kristo.
49001002	Kante onyoru poypoyet oko kalyet nye cone wule mite Papanyo Yiyintet oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo!
49001003	Kante cikaste Yiyintet oŋnku kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo! Omnye kikonec acek kupeyok om koyomet nye ceponte oko Kristo, omnye kikonec kokotutekyi tokol cepo wulin po torot.
49001004	Kikweyec acek ciku pikyi om Kristo kutompo kot citany koret sukuŋet ciku piko ce tililec ce moponto lelis om tayta nyenyi.
49001005	Kicäm Yiyintet keny kule masawecec acek cekwa wule mite neto ciku lekokyi cepunte wule mite Yesu Kristo. Kicäm om ŋerekwekyi oko yiytayatet nyenyi nkit.
49001006	Kikwiy ŋolyontoni kule sukuŋet cinket acek kokotutekyi ce woyec ce kicekonec püc pate kupunte Werinyi cämenet.
49001007	Kicityacec acek oŋnkyikalyec miyotyonikyo kupunte met nyepo Kristo. Ponto Yiyintet poypoyet nyewo koromun,
49001008	kikonec acek kuyemec kuyunyoto om ŋomnonet nyenyi tokol oko kuyu wule nketitoy.
49001009	Kikwiy Yiyintet kito nye kimöce kuporwec acek yiytayet nye wuŋat nye kiciyta keny kule mosawaŋnte aponune Kristo.
49001010	Yiytayet nyepo Yiyintet nye mosukuwaŋnta ye kopunto pesyet nye topon; kunye mosukoyomo yoto tukuk tokol ce kicitany cepo torot oko ŋony oŋnkwek Kristo kantoyintet nyewo.
49001011	Kikyiy tukuk tokol kuyu wule kikikwiyta oŋnkutilta Yiyintet. Kunyo kikweyec Yiyintet acek Yutayek ciku pikyi om koyomotet oko Kristo nye kikwiyta oŋnkutilta neto nkit kutompo kot citany koret.
49001012	Kunyo misyini acek Yutayek co ciku piko cepo tayta ce cikeni Kristo, cikaste woyinto nyepo Yiyintet.
49001013	Kunyo yunyoto mpo om wule omite akwek lamek co kyoyen Kristo yo kicemwowok lokoywek cepo manta, coto kuce lokoywek ce toponec ce kisutwok akwek kosopotet. Kikoci Yiyintet pelutyet nye poru kule oyiku akwek pikyi, pelutyet nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil nye kikurto.
49001014	Muyet Nyetilil kunye poru kukwile kule mocenyoru acek tukuk co kikurtoci Yiyintet pikyi, oŋnkuporwec kupoyit manta kule mosukutyakta piko ceci. Kunyo akente cikaste woyinto nyenyi.
49001015	Kunyo kuceke ye kyalim koyenet nyimwoŋ om wule mite Yesu Kristo oko cömisyet nye ocöme akwek piko tokol cepo Yiyintet,
49001016	tompo kot ayaste ani kuceke yoto nye mokostoy Yiyintet osomwok akwek ye osome sayutekwani.
49001017	Osome Yiyintetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, Papa nyepo woyinto, sukuŋet kukonok Muyet Nyetilil nyepo ŋomnonet nye muce kuŋoŋwok Yiyintet sukuŋet oŋnket neto.
49001018	Osome kule kuyotokis kasoteywek cikwok okäs lakweyet oŋnkonket kokenotet nyo kicekurcok, oko mokoryontit nyewo koromun nye cikite kuce kupeyok ce kikurtoci neto pikyi.
49001019	Oŋnkonket kule cemosi nyewo koromun swamet nyenyi nye mite kwiyisyi om wule cemite acek co ciyeni. Swamet nye ceponte kunye kerkey oko swamet nyewo
49001020	nye kikwiyisye neto yo kiŋete kotutune met Kristo oŋnkukoci kopure yewunyi nyepo tay om torot.
49001021	Poytoy Kristo om wuloto poytoyik tokol cepo torot, oko mokorenik ce ponto kamukeywek oko swamet. Kaynenyi kunye nyewo kupël kaynok tokol cepo koroni oko cepo koret nyin ake.
49001022	Kikoci Yiyintet kupayta Kristo tukuk tokol, oŋnkukoci Yiyintet neto metit nyepo porto.
49001023	Porto nyoto ku pikap Yiyintet. Neto kunye kocini kupeyok
49002001	Kikyopoku akwek ikye om leliswek oko miyotyonik ce kyoyiye.
49002002	Kyorupe yoto soponto nye miyat nyepo koret. Kipoytok yoto muyet nyepo swametap oyinot nyepo parak, nyoto kunye poytoy mpo yawut piko ce meyweye Yiyintet.
49002003	Kicekerkeyekey acek tokol oko cekto. Kicipuri kopurto nye kicerupe corokyinotet nyenyo nyepo tukuk cepo koret oko tukuk ce möce porwonikyacek. Kunyo kuyu wulo yunto sopontap koret, misyinec mpo acek kumutwec Yiyintet musankut.
49002004	Ntene ponto Yiyintet poypoyet nyewo koromun nye mociyoyece nye cömec acek.
49002005	Omnye nka kot kikicepoku acek om miyotyonik ce kiceponte, ntene kukonec Yiyintet soponto citutu oko Kristo. Kunyo poypoyetap Kristo kunye kisopok akwek.
49002006	Kiciŋetec acek citutune met oko Kristo oŋnkuyomec oko neto sukuŋet cepoytoyisye oko neto om poytoyisyet nyepo torot.
49002007	Kikwiy ŋolyontoni sukuŋet kupor kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ cekwoni poypoyenyi om cömisyet nye kipor Yesu Kristo.
49002008	Omnye kicisopok akwek om cömisyetap Yiyintet kupunte koyenet nye oponte. Kipuryo kot kukule om yisyet nyimwakwek nkit, ntene om kokotutyetap Yiyintet.
49002009	Puryo kot kumite ŋolyo nye roke cesilekey omnye puryo kot ku yisyet nyimwakwek nkit.
49002010	Kityacec Yiyintet acek sukuŋet kyiy yisyonutek ce toponec om koyomotet nye ceponte oko Yesu Kristo, kiyiytowec keny kuyunyoto kule kyiy.
49002011	Möce asot akwek wule kyoyunte ikye, akwek Lamek co kicekurok kule, “Mowonotin’’ Kikurok akwek kuyunyoto piko co kurekey kule, “Ciku wonotin.’’ Ntene wonset kunye po porto nyepo saŋ pate.
