49002012	Kyoyiku yoto kweyotin om wule mite Kristo. Kyoyiku toyek ce kipuryo kot opoye pikap Yiyintet ce kweyanik. Kipuryo kot oponte akwek kirotyet nye kikyiy om kurtoyet nye kikurtoci Yiyintet pikyi. Kyomite yoto ominye koret nye kipuryo kot oponte kokenotet oŋnkipuryo mpo kot oponte Yiyintet.
49002013	Ntene om koyomotet nye oponte yawut oko Kristo akwek piko co kyomitowune wule low, kuce kicekurok olekititu om korosyontetap metap Yesu Kristo.
49002014	Yesu Kristo nkit kunye kisutwec acek kalyet, omnye kikoyomo Yutayek oko lamek kwek akenke. Kikoturpup neto totet nye kipciye picoto kwek punik; omnye kikwiyisye porto nyenyi.
49002015	Kinum ntarastinek oko ŋalek alak tokol ce ponte ntarastinek cepo Yutayek. Kikwiy kuyunyitenyi kule sukuŋet kuyomokey Yutayek oko Lamek kwek aret akenke. Yoto kuye kisutu kalyet.
49002016	Kimeci neto murtowontet kule sukuŋet kunum puniyontit. Murtowontet kunye kiyomo neto Yutayek oko lamek kwek porto akenke oŋnkuwec kukwa wule mite Yiyintet.
49002017	Kunyo kico Kristo cokumwayta lokoywek ce toponec ce kipoyit piko tokol, Lamek co kimite wule low, oko Yutayek co kilekite wule mite neto.
49002018	Acek Yutayek oko lamek cepunte tokol wule mite Kristo om koyomotet oko Muyet Nyetilil siceŋet cepunte taytap Yiyintet Papanyo.
49002019	Kunyo, kimoyiku akwek Lamek toyek ce punonik alak, ntene oyiku pikap koret wanak oko pikap Yiyintet, coto kuce piko cepo kanyi.
49002020	Oyiku akwek kereryantet akenke nyepo koto nye mite cetece, koto nye kicece kiyokik oko workoyik. Nto Yesu Kristo nkit kunye tolocta.
49002021	Yesu kunye tiye kuyoŋnto koto tokol oŋnkukoci kutekakay okoy kwek koto nyetilil om Mokoryontet.
49002022	Om koyomotet oko neto kunye omite akwek cetecok wanak oko piko alak tokol sukuŋet oyiku koto nye minye Yiyintet kupunte Muyet Nyetilil.
49003001	Om ŋolyontoni kuye sukuŋet osomwok Yiyintet ani Paulo nyo mopusyontet nyepo Yesu Kristo kupo Lamek.
49003002	Kwalim akwek kupoyit manta kule kikono ani Yiyintet yisyoni om poypoyenyi kupo toponiyet nyimwakwek.
49003003	Kiŋoŋwo oŋnkuporwo ani Yiyintet yiytayatet nyenyi nye wuŋat. (Kwosil ani ŋalek ce tukusic ce nöme ŋalecato,
49003004	Nteye kosuman akwek ŋalek ce kwosil mosonket wule oŋnketitoy ani ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo Kristo.)
49003005	Kipuryo kot cemwoci piko ŋalecutecu wuŋotin om pesyosyek co kitil. Ntene kukuporci Yiyintet yawut om Muyet Nyetilil kiyokikyi ce tililec oko workoyik.
49003006	Ŋolyontet nye wuŋat kunyi kule, yomntoskey Yutayek oko Lamek oŋnkunyor tokol kupeyok cepo Yiyintet kupunte lokoywek ce toponec. Kwek cekto piko cepo koto akenke oŋnkunyor tokol kirotyet nyo kimwowu Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo.
49003007	Kicekono ani oyiku mutworintet nyepo Lokoywek ce toponec om kokotutyet nye pciyat nye kikono om swamenyi nye yiyisyi.
49003008	Oyiku ani miniŋ koromun om wule mite piko tokol cepo Yiyintet, oŋnkurok kikono Yiyintet yisyoni pciyat nye osutyini Lamek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Mokoryontit nyepo Kristo nye mopoku.
49003009	Oŋnkanet okoy kukäs piko tokol wule mokyiyta yisyet nyepo Yiyintet nye wuŋat. Yiyintet nye kitonye tukuk tokol kunye kirip kuwuny yiytayatet nyenyi okoy kutil kenyisyek co kitil.
49003010	Kule sukuŋet konket om pesyosyecu malaykanik oko poytoyik cepo torot wule yunto ŋomnonet tokol nyepo Yiyintet. Ŋomnonet nyoto kunye yomntos pikap Yiyintet.
49003011	Kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyoto kuyu wule yunto yiytayet nyenyi nyepo keny, coto kuce kikoyitita kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
49003012	Om koyomotet nye ceponte acek oko neto, oŋnkupunte koyenet nye ceponte om wule mite neto, kunye kicityacec cimuc cipe taytap Yiyintet.
49003013	Kunyo kosomok ani kule monte komuyok toŋoŋutek cu otoŋonyi ani om kaynemwakwek. Ponto latik ŋalecu tokol om wule omite akwek.
49003014	Kunyo om ŋolyontoni, kuye saŋet akotuŋe taytap Papa.
49003015	Nyoto kunye Papa nye nyortoy kaynet nyepo manta piko tokol cepo koret torot oko cepo koret ŋony.
49003016	Osome ani Yiyintet om Mokoryontit nyepo woyinto nyenyi, kukonok akwek onyoru swamet om mukuleywekwok orit kupunte Muyet nyenyi Nyetilil.
49003017	Sukuŋet kutec Kristo konyi mukuleywekwok orit kupunte koyenet. Osome kule onyoru akwek tikityek ce kwilotin oŋnkonerye om cömisyet,
49003018	saŋet akwek wanak oko pikap Yiyintet tokol onyoru swamet nye oŋnket kule para koromun, oŋnkukoy, oŋnkukoy kuwo parak, oŋnkukoy kuwo ŋony koromun cömisyet nyepo Kristo.
49003019	Osome ani kule oŋnket akwek cömisyet nyenyi, nka kot mocimuce kot cinket topon, kuyunyoto oŋnkonyoru kupeyok ce yemok.
49003020	Wule mite Yiyintet nye muce kwiy tukuk ce caŋ, kupëlis ce cesome nto ce cisoti acek, om swamet nye mite kwiyisyi om wule cemite acek.
49003021	Kopurune woyinto wule mite Yiyintet, kupunte pikap Yiyintet oko Yesu Kristo, kuceke pinta ake okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto.
49004001	Kunyo osomok ani akwek. Ani kunye oyiku mopusyontet omnye oyiye yisyet nyepo Mokoryontet. Möce opurte soponto nye oyoyeci oko nyo kikonok Yiyintet ye kikurok.
49004002	Otoloyitu, oŋnkopoypoyitu, oŋnkomuytocini okokoy, sonyoru cömisyet okolyoykey akwek kwakwek nkit.
49004003	Kikoyomok Muyet Nyetilil oyiku akenke, kunyo asyem orip koyomet nyoto, opurte kalyet akwek kwakwek nkit.
49004004	Mite porto akenke oko Muyet Nyetilil akenke, kuyu wulo mite konketotet akenke nye kikurtowok akwek Yiyintet.
49004005	Mite Mokoryontet akenke nkit oko koyenet akenke, oko patisanet akenke.
49004006	Mite Yiyintet akenke nkit nye Papa nyepo piko tokol oŋnku nye Mokoryontet nye poytoy tukuk tokol, nye yiyisyi om tukuk tokol, oŋnkumitowune tukuk tokol wule mite neto.
49004007	Kicikoci ci ake tokol om acek kokotutek ce pciyotin kuyu wule moktoy Kristo.
49004008	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Yo kiweti torot wule low, kikwer neto yoto oyik ce miyotec. Kikoci piko kokotutek.’’
49004009	Kunyo poru ne ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Yo kiweti neto torot wule low.’’ Poru kule kinyosyo kuco ŋony.
49004010	Kunyo neto nye cito nye kirek kuco ŋony, kunye neto nye kiwo torot wule low koromun sukuŋet kupayta koret tokol kumukul.
49004011	Neto kunye kikoci piko kokotutek, kukwey piko alak kwek kiyokik, kwek alak workoyik, kwek alake mwoytoyik cepo lokoywek ce toponec, kwek alake mesewek, kwek alake konetik.
49004012	Kikwiy kuyunyitenyi sukuŋet kuyiyta piko tokol cepo Yiyintet om yisyet nyepo Kristayek, nyoto kunye yisyet kutec porto nyepo Kristo.
49004013	Kunyo mosiciyomekey acek om koyomotet nyoto akenke om koyenet nyinyo oko ŋomnonet nye ceponte nye conket Weritap Yiyintet. Mosiciku piko cewoyec okoy cepunte koyinto nyepo wule tento Kristo.
49004014	Yoto kuye komo cekerkeyekey acek oko lekoy ce sute yomet kuroye wuli oko wuli, nto yomet nyoto kunye konetisyet nyepo piko ce perperisyi. Piko coto kuce ntocini piko alak kumosokis kwiyisye ŋomnonet nye kitowu cekto nkit.
49004015	Ntene moceŋalal yoto ŋalek cepo manta om mukuleyto nyepo cömisyet, misyini cenerye om aret ake tokol om wule mite Kristo nye metit nye ntowec.
49004016	Yomntos Kristo kutuyo tukuk tokol cepo porto oŋnkupayta. Nomntos tukuk tokol sukuŋet kwek porto akenke. Kunyo ye keyis tukuk tokol topon kuyu wule cemoktoy, yoto kuye sukuner porto tokol topon om cömisyet.
49004017	Kunyo osomwok ani aŋnkasyem asowok om kaynetap Mokoryontet kule ayaste monte yec tocipur kupurto nye kerkey nyepo Lamek co ponto soponto nyepo kasoteywek ce puryo wol.
49004018	Ponto kasoteywek cikwa menonet, puryo kot kuponto cek soponto nyo konu Yiyintet, omnye puryo kot kunkete oŋnkupuryo kot kucöme mpo kisic.
49004019	Kimo kuponto kalilan ake tokol, kicämnta pate kule kyiye ŋalek ce miyotec nye kimokuyweyisyi ye mokwiy ŋolyo ake tokol nye samis.
49004020	Ntene kipuryo kot anetkey akwek ŋalek cepo Kristo ceyucoto!
49004021	Kyolim akwek kupoyit manta ŋalek cenöme Yesu. Kicinetak kuyu konomikyi ŋalek cepo manta ce mite wule mite neto.
49004022	Kunyo awirte kapurto nyimwoŋ nyepo keny nye kiwur nye kipo corokyinotetap koperperisyet.
49004023	Misyini awec kulelakitu mukuleywek cikwok.
49004024	Misyini alac siret nyepo soponto nyelel nye kicitany kukerkeyit oko Yiyintet nye porukey om soponto nyepo manta nye rotat oŋnkutilil.
49004025	Kunyo awirte koperperisyo, möce kuŋalal ci tokol ŋolyo nyepo manta om wule mite yeyanyi, omnye ciku acek tokol luket akenke nyepo porto nyepo Kristo.
49004026	Ye Kotepe kot onyeru, monte kusutwok nyerunotet kot yiy miyotyet, monte cipurte nyerunotet kot kwimen koret.
49004027	Monte cikoci setani nyewo nyepo oyik poroyinto.
49004028	Misyini kwasta cito nyo kicorin corsyet oŋnkucec kwiyis sukuŋet kunyor omik om aret nyepo manta, oŋnkucec kukalya pononik.
49004029	Ye oŋololi, monte kot kukwane kutuwak cikwok ŋalek ce miyotec, oyiyisye pate ŋalek cetoponec ce kolyoy, sukuŋet kukalya ŋalek ce oŋololi akwek piko co lime.
49004030	Monte kot cinerec Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkupor kukwil kule mosukupunto pesyet nye mosukutyacak Yiyintet. Omnye Muyet Nyetilil kunye pelutyet nye poru kule opoye akwek Yiyintet.
49004031	Awirte meyintap mo ake tokol oko sokornat oko nerekwek. Monte kyiyisye polot oko cupisyet, awirte senkerat ake tokol.
49004032	Ntene otoloyitu oŋnkopoypoyitu om mukuleywekwok om wule mite ci tokol om akwek. Akalyakey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu wulo kikalyak. Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo.
49005001	Omnye oyiku akwek lekokap Yiyintet ce camanik, kunyo misyini akerkeyitu neto.
49005002	Misyini kurip soponto nyimwoŋ cömisyet kuyu wulo kicämec acek Kristo oŋnkukon soponto nyenyi kupo acek sukuŋet kwek kokotutyet nye poŋu topon nye korosyontet nye ŋerece Yiyintet.
49005003	Kunyo ye oyiku akwek lekokap Yiyintet, kupuryo kuroke kot celimncok sakwayanat nto kopurto nye miyat nto moroŋyantit.
49005004	Puryo mpo kot ku topon oyiyisye ŋalek cepo kawotyontit, nto perperyo nto ŋalek ce somis. Ntene möce akaste Yiyintet pate.
49005005	Möce oŋnket ŋalecu kule, puryo kot komuce kot kunyor kontisyet om poytoyisyet nyepo Kristo oko nyepo Yiyintet ci nye yiye sakwayanat, nto nye ponto kopurto nye miyat, nto nye moroŋya (omnye moroŋyantit kunye poru sayet nyepo kerkeyik)
49005006	Monte kuperperak ci ake tokol kwiyisye ŋalek cepo mwiynan pate omnye ŋalek ceyucoto kuye sukuŋet kunerekyi Yiyintet piko ce puryo kot kulimncini neto.
49005007	Kunyo ayaste kwiyat kwicek nkit piko ceyucoto.
49005008	Kyomite akwek ikye menonet, ntene omite yawut wule mite lakweyet.
49005009	Omnye lakweyet kunye sutu kupuswek wok cecaŋ cepo toponiyet oko tililinto oko ŋalek cepo manta.
49005010	Asyem anetkey ŋalek ce ŋerece Yiyintet.
49005011	Ayaste monte ayiy tukuk cepo menonet ce puryo kot kuponto latik co yiye piko, ntene otoru kukwa wule lakwey.
49005012	Omnye ŋolyo nyepo kalilan koromun mpo ye moceŋalale wule wuŋat ŋalek ce yiye cek.
49005013	Nteye kocipor ceŋany tukuk tokol kukwa wule lakwey yoto kuye cipor kutok topon wule yunto tukucoto.
49005014	Omnye toku topon kiy ake tokol nye kaceŋany kutok, kuyunyoto sukuŋet cemwoy kule, “Ŋet cito nyo mite rwonto! tutune met! Mosukukoniŋ Kristo lakweyet.’’
49005015	Kunyo möce orip topon wule opurtoy akwek, monte cipur kopurto nyepo piko co perper, ntene opur kuyu piko ce ŋomec.
49005016	Oyiyisye topon poroyinto ake tokol nye oponte, omnye miyotec pesyosyecu.
49005017	Kunyo monte ceperperitu, ntene möce asyem oŋnket kito nye möce Mokoryontet kule ayiy.
49005018	Monte cepokitye komek ce muce kowurtak, ntene möce opiyony Muyet Nyetilil,
49005019	Möce otumncinikey kwakwek nkit om tumwonik cepo kakastayet, oko om tumwonik ce kostoy Yiyintet, oko tumwonik ce tililec. Möce otumnci Mokoryontet tumwonik ce rurtos ce kwone mukuleywekwok.
49005020	Akaste Yiyintet Papa okokoy om kiy ake tokol kupunte kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo!
49005021	Möce ayweyikey akwek nkit omnye oyweyi akwek Kristo.
49005022	Möce koruk ayweyi sanik cikwok, kuyu wulo oyweyi akwek Mokoryontet.
49005023	Omnye moron kunye nyewo om wule mite korkenyi, kuyu wulo nyewo Kristo om wule mite pikap Yiyintet, nyoto kunye porto nyenyi, nto Kristo nkit kunye Kosopintet.
49005024	Kunyo misyini kuywey koromun koruk sanik cikwa, kuyu wulo yweye cekto pikap Yiyintet om Kristo.
49005025	Möce moronik acäm koruk cikwok kuyu wulo kicämnta Kristo pikap Yiyintet oŋnkukoyito soponto nyenyi kumeci cekto.
49005026	Kikwiy kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet kowun kutililitu pikap Yiyintet om ŋolyontenyi oko peko,
49005027	kule sukuŋet kukwer pikap Yiyintet kukwa wule mite neto kuponto toponiyet tokol nyetilil nye moponto lelis, oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto tisyet nto nye moponto kiy ake tokol nye miyat.
49005028	Kunyo misyini moronik kucäm korukwa kuyu wulo cömtoy cek porwonik cikwa nkit. Ci nye kacäm korkenyi kunye kacämnkey neto nyoto nkit.
49005029	Omnye puryo ci nye senkere porto nyenyi nkit, ntene poye oŋnkurip topon kuyu wulo riptoy Kristo pikap Yiyintet.
49005030	Omnye ciku acek piko cepo porto nyepo Kristo.
49005031	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Om ŋolyontoni kuye sukuŋet kupakakta cito kwan oko kamet oŋnkuyomokey oko korkenyi, yoto kwek piko oyenku porto akenke.’’
49005032	Mite ŋalek ce woyec cepo manta ce wuŋotin om ŋalecu po silutekap Yiyintet. Asoti ani om kasoteywekwani kule nömekey oko Kristo oko pikap Yiyintet.
49005033	Ntene nömekey mpo yec ŋalecu oko akwek, kunyo möce kucäm ci ake tokol om akwek korkenyi kuyu wulo cömtoykey neto nkit, oŋnkumöce konket korko kule oyweyi santenyi.
49006001	Akwek lekok, yisyemwakwek kuyu Kristayek aywey poyik co kiyok, omnye yisyet nyoto nyepo manta.
49006002	Ntarastit nyi kule, “Ywey kon oko komet.’’ Kunye po tayta nye ponto kurtoyoni kule,
49006003	sukuŋet kunyol kiy ake tokol om wule mite nyi, oŋnkipur koret wany kenyisyek ce caŋ.
49006004	Poyik, monte cesut lekokwok om aret nye miyat nye muce kusutyi kunerekis, ntene möce anet kuneryo kuyweyis topon kuyu Kristayek.
49006005	Akwek mutworik, möce aywey mokorenikwok om muyotet, möce oyiyisye mukuleyto akenke nye topon kuyu nye ayweyi Kristo.
49006006	Monte kyiye kuyunyoto ye mite cek kukösok kuyu piko ce möce kule ciŋerece piko, ntene oyiye yisyet nye möce Yiyintet om mukuleyto akenke kuyu mutworikap Kristo.
49006007	Oyiye yisyonutek om ŋerekwek kuyu nye oyicini Mokoryontet nye puryo kot ku kule oyicini piko.
49006008	Möce oŋnket kule mosukukoci Mokoryontet musyaret ci ake tokol nka mpo mutworin nto nye puryo ku mutworin; kupo yisyet nye topon nye yiye.
49006009	Akwek mokorenik, möce oyiye mpo akwek kuyunyoto om wule mite mutworikwok, mönte cimuyi cekto, möce oŋnket kule opoye akwek, oko mutworikwok Mokoryontet akenke nye mite torot, nye mutyini musankut ci ake tokol kuyoyec kukerkeyit.
49006010	Ŋolyontet nyepo letut, möce otitir om koyomotet oko Mokoryontet oŋnkoyiyisye swamet nyenyi nyewo.
49006011	Anäm loŋet nyepo Yiyintet, sukuŋet amukte tekutek ce miyotec cepo setani nyewo nyepo oyik.
49006012	Omnye puryo kot cepoye acek piko, ntene cemite ceporye oyik ce miyotec ce motoku ce mite koret torot, oko ce poytoyisyi, oko ceponto kamukeywek, oko ceponto swamet nyewo, om kenyisyecu po menonet.
49006013	Kunyo anäm yawut loŋet nyepo Yiyintet sukuŋet amukte pesyet nye miyat, nteye koporye kot awany, yoto kuye anyoru ye koyoŋe.
49006014	Kunyo oyoŋnkye topon, okoci kwek ŋalek cepo manta porowet nye orote suwenutek cikwok, oŋnkolac tililinto kwek loŋet nyepo karnet nye kerektoy teket.
49006015	Akante kukwilakay yiytayatet nye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo kalyet kwek kweyonik cikwok cepo kerenkokwok.
49006016	Anämate okokoy koyenet kwek loŋet, sukuŋet kukerekta kotyek tokol ce loyotin ce wutu oyinoto nye miyat.
49006017	Acäm kasopotet kwek nyo kutwetap karnet nyimwoŋ oŋnkwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet rotwetap cok nye konu Muyet Nyetilil.
49006018	Ayweye ŋalecu tokol om somset nye osome kokolyoyisyet nyepo Yiyintet. Osome om pesyo ake tokol om swamet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil. Kunyo otitir, monte kyaste, osomnci pikap Yiyintet okokoy.
49006019	Osomwo mpo ani sukuŋet kukono Yiyintet lokoywek ce ye kaŋalal amuc aŋalal om nyikanatet aparte lokoywek ce toponec ce wuŋotin.
49006020	Oyiku ani kiyokin nyepo lokoywek ce toponec nka kot omite mopusi. Osomwo sukuŋet aŋalal om nyikanatet kuyu wulo misyini aŋalalye.
49006021	Tekiko yeya nyacek oŋnku mutworintet nyepo manta om yisyetap Mokoryontet kunye mosukumwowok akwek ŋalek tokol ce nömo ani, sukuŋet oŋnket akwek wule opurtoy ani.
49006022	Kunyo koyoku kuco cokumwowok wule cipurtoy acek om wuli oŋnkutitirok.
49006023	Kante kukoci Yiyintet Papa oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo kalyet oko cömisyet mpo yeya tokol om koyenet.
49006024	Opurte poypoyet piko tokol co yene Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo om cömisyet nye puryo kot kupoku.
50001001	Cone parwani wule ce mite acek Paulo oko Timosewo mutworikap Yesu Kristo. Cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol ce kikoyomokey oko Yesu Kristo ce mite Filipi, wanak oko kantoyikwok kosik oko kokolyoyikwok.
50001002	Kante kukonok akwek Yiyintet Papa oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
50001003	Okostoy ani Yiyintenyu okokoy om pesyo ake tokol ye kasotak akwek.
50001004	Nteye osome osomwok akwek tokol om ŋerekwek.
50001005	Omnye kwakalya ani akwek om yisyet nye cemwoyoyt lokoywek ce toponec kuceke pesyet nyo kipo tay okoy yewut pesyoni.
50001006	Kunyo aŋnket ani kupoyit manta kule Yiyintet nyo kinyosye yisyenyi om wule omite akwek kunye mosukutosyi yisyenyi kuwo tay okoy kupunto ye pesyetap Yesu Kristo.
50001007	Omite akwek mukuleymwani orit! Kunyo ŋolyo nye porukey topon ye kasot kuyunyoto om wule omite akwek. Omnye kukyiyisye tokol topon yisyoni kikono Yiyintet. Nka mpo yawut amite mopusi oko mpo ye oyiku tyakat yo oporye oyete kule kukwilokis lokoywek ce toponec.
50001008	Yiyintet nkit kunye nkete kule omwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta ye komwowu kule cömisyet nyewo nye oponte ani om wule omite akwek; kunye cone mukuleytap Yesu Kristo nkit.
50001009	Osomwok kule, roke kutosyikey kuner okokoy cömisyet oŋkuwoyit ŋomnonet oko kasoteywek cepo manta.
50001010	Sukuŋet amuc akwek kot akwey ŋalek cepo manta cepëlisyi, sotililitu nye moponte lelis ye kopunto pesyet nyepo Kristo.
50001011	Oŋnkunyor soponwek cikwok ŋalek cepo manta ce konu Yesu Kristo nkit om woyinto oko kakastayetap Yiyintet.
50001012	Mpo yeya, amöce kule oŋnket akwek kule ŋalek ce kukwiyokis om wule amite ani kuce kwekoci kutosyikey lokoywek ce toponec.
50001013	Kunyo kukunket kupoyit manta piko tokol ce ripo ani om kaytap kinko nyewo oko piko tokol ce mite wuli, kule amite ani mopusi omnye oyiku mutworintetap Kristo.
50001014	Rotisyet nyi amite ani kunye kwekoci kukwilokis mpo yeya ce caŋ om wule mite Mokoryontet, kunyo kutosyikey cek kunyor nyikanatet nye puryo kot kumuytos ye mwoytoy lokoywek cepo Yiyintet.
50001015	Ntene mwoytoy piko alake om cekto ŋalek cepo Kristo om corokyinot oko nyekernatet, kumwoytoy piko alak ŋalekyi om toponiyet.
50001016	Yiye picoto kuyunyoto om cömisyet nye ponto om wule amite ani, omnye kikonket kule kikono ani Yiyintet yisyet nye oporye oyetyecini lokoywek ce toponec.
50001017	Nto piko alak kuce puryo kot kumwoytoy ŋalekap Kristo kupoyit manta, ntene mwoytoy pate om mukuleywek cepo corokyinot. Sote cek kule cimuci cesutwo ani wuyinto ye tomite mopusi.
50001018	Puryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo! Oyiku ŋerekat kuyu wulo cimuce cemwayta ŋalekap Kristo om aret ake tokol nye mukoktos, nka ye kacemwayta om aret nye topon nto om aret nye miyat. Kunyo mosotosyikey ani aŋerec,
50001019	omnye oŋnketi kule mosicityakta om letut om somotet nye osome akwek oko kokolyoyisyet nye cone wule mite Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yesu Kristo.
50001020	Ŋoloyontet nye amöce koromun om mukuleymwani oŋnkokeni kunyi kule, puryo kot oyostoy yisyenyu. Om pesyosyek tokol, nka mpo pantanyi mosonyoru titiret nyewo koromun, sukuŋet soponto nyimwani tokol osutu koyweyisyet om wule mite Yesu Kristo, nka ye tosope nto ye kamey.
50001021	Kristo kunye soponto om wule amite ani.
50001022	Ntene ye kotosyikey ani tosop oŋnkyiy yisyet nye topon nyepo latik, kuporkey kule puryo mpo kot oŋnket kule oŋnkono yisyet nye topon nyepo manta nye makwey.
50001023	Omnye nömo ani ŋalecutecu tukway. Amöce ani koromun kule nto kapakakte soponto nyi aponte oŋnkowo wopur oko Kristo, omnye kito nyoto nye topon nye pëlisyi.
50001024	Ntene kito nye topon nye pëlisyi koromun om wule omite akwek kunyi kule, roke topur ani osope.
50001025	Oŋnket ani kupoyit manta kule mosopur osope oŋnkyipurcine oko akwek tokol, sukuŋet kutosyikey ŋerekwekwok oko koyomotet.
50001026	Kunyo ye kaco ani yec okoy wule omite akwek, mosonyoru ŋerekwek ce kosilekey om wule omite kuyu yeyamwoŋ om Yesu Kristo.
50001027	Kunyo ŋolyontet nye pëlisyi yawut kunyi kule, roke kopurto nyepo soponwek cikwok oko nyepo piko alak kopur kuyu wule moktoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, sukuŋet nka mpo ye kaco ani nto kopuryo kot aco, mosalim kule cokwilokisye oŋnkoponte soponto nyepo koyomotet nye kyoyiku akenke oŋnkoyiku luket nye tyikyini kiy akenke, nyoto ku koyenet nyepo lokoywek ce toponec.
50001028	Monte ciywey punik cikwok, opurte nyikanatet okokoy, mosukupor kule opëlisyi akwek opël cekto, omnye Yiyintet kunye konok akwek opëlisye.
50001029	Omnye kicekonok akwek kupeyok nye oyicini yisyet Kristo, ntene puryo kot omnye oyeni akwek neto pate, ntene möce ataŋany om kaynenyi.
50001030	Kunyo ciyomekey oko ani om poryet. Cicitenyi kunyo kyolim akwek oporyecini ani ikye, kunyo to ku cicitenyi kunye tomite ani oporyecini kuyu wulo olime akwek.
50002001	Tosukey ra swamet om soponwek cikwok ye opoye Kristo nto puryo? Oponte akwek tolosyet oko kokolyoyisyet om wule mite ci ake tokol om akwek?
50002002	Kunyo oŋereco ani kuyema topon ye opurtoy kasoteywontet akenke, oŋnkoyomekey, oŋnkoyome soponwek cikwok, oŋnkocomncine ŋolyo ake tokol akwek kwakwek nkit.
50002003	Monte cipurte corokyinot nto silot nyepo perperyo. Ntene möce otoloyitu oŋnkosut piko alak kwek cewoyec kupëlok akwek.
50002004	Monte cisot tukuk ce nömok akwek, ntene osoti tukuk ce nöme piko alak.
50002005	Möce oponte akwek kopurto oko kasoteywek ce kerkey co kiponto Yesu Kristo.
50002006	Kikerkey Yesu okokoy oko Yiyintet, Ntene kipuryo kot kusyem om swamet kule oyoyeckey oko Yiyintet,
50002007	Ntene kicämnta nkit kwasta woyinto, Oŋnkusutkey kuyu mutworin, oŋnkwek ci, oŋnkuporkey kuyu ci nye yu acek.
50002008	Kutalayit oŋnkurup aret nyepo koyweyisyet okoy kunyor met, met nyepo murtowontet.
50002009	Om ŋolyontoni, kuye sukuŋet kukoci Yiyintet neto atepto nyewo om torot, oŋnkukoci kaynet nye pële koynok tokol.
50002010	Sukuŋet om kaynetap Yesu, Kuye kukutuny tukuk tokol cepo torot oko koret ŋony, oko cepo kapkompic oŋnkusay neto.
50002011	Oŋnkurarta kutor tokol kule Yesu kunye Mokoryontet, om woyinto nyepo Yiyintet Papa.
50002012	Kunyo coronutekwani, kuyu wulo kyoyweya ani akwek okokoy yo kicepontekey, kunyo ayweya yawut koromun kupëlis ye mocepontekey. Olimnte ŋalek ce omwowok. Otosyikey oyiyisye om koyweyisyet oko potanet, sukuŋet awaŋnte kosopet nyimwoŋ.
50002013	Omnye mite Yiyintet nkit kwiyisyi om wule omite akwek, sukuŋet kuwecak ocömisye oŋnkoywey arup ŋalekyi ce ŋerece neto.
50002014	Oyiye kiy ake tokol nye puryo kot oŋunyŋunyi nto otinteni.
50002015	Sukuŋet oporukey oyiku piko ce tililec ce puryo kot kuponto lelis, kuyu lekokap Yiyintet ce toponec ce minye koret nyepo piko ce kiwuryo ce mosotin.
50002016	Mosokoci akwek cekto lokoywek cepo soponto. Ye kayiy kuyunyoto mosonyoru ani ŋolyontet nye kosilekey om wule omite akwek om pesyetap Kristo, omnye mosukupor kule kipuryo kot kupotyo püc pate titiret nyimwani oko yisyonutek tokol ce kyayiy.
50002017	Koyenet nyimwakwek kunye korosyontet nye cikocini Yiyintet, kunyo muce pesyet ake kot kacitata korotik cikwani sukutosyi kuwoyit korosyontet nyimwoŋ. Ye keyakay kuyunyoto mosaŋerec koromun wanak oko akwek tokol.
50002018	Kunyo misyini aŋerec mpo akwek tokol wanak oko ani.
50002019	Asoti ani kule ye kacäm Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo, mosoyoku Timosewo kuco lakwar wule omite akwek. Amöce kule kutitiro lokoywek ce kwone wule omite akwek.
50002020	Timosewo pate nye sote ŋalek ce karkey oko cikwani, oŋnkusotok akwek.
50002021	Sote ci ake tokol tukuk ce nöme soponto nyenyi nkit pate, ntene puryo kot kusote yisyetap Yesu Kristo.
50002022	Kunyo oŋnket akwek nkit latik ce ponto Timosewo. Oŋnket yisyet nye kikyiy acek tukway kuyu werit oko kwan. Kikyiyisye tukway cemwaytate lokoywek ce toponec.
50002023	Asoti kule mosoyoku ani neto kuco wulo omite akwek ye konket wule mosukupeta ŋalek cikwani nkit.
50002024	Kunyo okenekey Mokoryontet kule mosamuc ani nkit aco lakwar okoy wule omite akwek.
50002025	Kwasot kule roke oyoku yeyanyo Epafrotito kuketkey wulo omite akwek. Neto kunye kiyokintet nyimwakwek nye kikalya ani koromun. Kyiyisyi ceporye yisyet kukolyo ani.
50002026	Möce neto kule nto akäsak akwek, kunyo kukusot koromun omnye kyolim akwek kule kikimnyan.
50002027	Kikimnyan manta nye kikirik kume ntene kukalya Yiyintet. Kipuryo kot kukalya Yiyintet neto nkit pate, ntene kikalya mpo ani kusop neto omnye kinumuneno lokik ce caŋ.
50002028	Kunyo amöce koromun kule oyoku neto kuco wulo omite akwek sukuŋet aŋerec akwek ye kokäs neto oŋnkupok lokik cikwani ce kwoponte.
50002029	Oŋerekyi neto om ŋerekwek tokol kuyu yeya om Mokoryontet. Möce kule ayweyi akwek piko tokol ce kerkey oko neto.
50002030	Omnye kicilile yosic kume om yisyet nyepo Kristo, kikoyito soponto nyenyi sukuŋet kukalya ani om kaynamwakwek.
50003001	Kunyo mpo yeya, ŋalek ce owoŋnte ani kucu kule, kante kukonok Mokoryontet akwek ŋerekwek ce caŋ, Puryo kot kuyuye moketyikey ŋalek ce kyosil ikye, mosukutosyi kukalyak opur topon.
50003002	Oripkey piko ce yiye ŋalek ce miyotec, ŋokica kuce piko ce simncini kule cewon porto nyepo saŋ.
50003003	Omnye ciku acek piko ce kicewonec wonset nyepo manta, omnye cesoye Yiyintet om swamet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkyesilekey pate soponto nye ceponte om Kristo. Puryo kot cikenekey acek mpo kisic wonset oko sokwonutek.
50003004	Ye kekenekey piko wonset oko sokwonutek, oŋnkusot kule cimuce cisopec ye karup ntarastinecutecu, kuporukey kule opëli ani cekto om ŋalecutecu.
50003005	Omnye kicewona ani ye kyoponte pesyosyek sisit pate, oyiku Isroloyin sikwo, nyepo kotap Penyamin, oyiku Puraniyantet sikwo. Oyiku Farasayantet nyepo manta kuyu wulo ceriptoy ntarastinek.
50003006	Kunyo kyoyiku nyikan koromun nye kyotoŋonyi pikap Yiyintet. Kyoyiku ci nyepo manta nye kipuryo kot oponte lelis omnye kyoripe ntarastinek tokol.
50003007	Ntene osute ani yawut tukuco tokol kuyu tukun ce puryo kot kuponto latik omnye kyoyentyi Kristo.
50003008	Puryo kot ku tukuk ceyucoto pate, ntene asute kule puryo kot kuponto latik tukuk alake tokol, nye pëlisyi pate kuye konket Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyu. Kyawirte tukuk oko toponiyet nye ponto tukucoto tokol. Kyosut kukerkeyitu tukuk tokol tutwek sukuŋet onyoru Kristo.
50003009	Oŋnkoyomekey ani oko neto ciku akenke. Kunyo kimo oponte yec toponiyet nye nyimwani nkit nye kerkey oko nyo cenyoru ye cerupe ntarastinek. Oponte ani yawut toponiyet nyepo manta nye cekonu kupunune koyenet om Kristo. Toponiyet nyoto kunye cone wule mite Yiyintet nye ciyoyeke koyenet.
50003010	Ŋolyontet nye amocë ani pate ku kule oŋnket Kristo oŋnkonket swamet nyepo kotutunetap met nyenyi, oŋnkyeyemnte tukway toŋoŋutek ceci oŋnkakerkeyitukey ani oko neto om met nyenyi.
50003011	Oŋnketi mpo kule mosiciŋeta otutune met oŋnkonyoru soponto.
50003012	Puryo mpo kot osutekey ani kule kwayitite ŋalecu tokol, nto mpo kule kyonyolu owoŋnkyi. Ntene amite otosyinikey asyeme kule anyoru ŋalecu omnye kisuto keny Kristo oyiku nyenyi.
50003013	Mpo yeya, oŋnket kule tompo kot opunte wule mite ŋalecu, ntene ŋolyontet nye oyiye kunyi, amöce ayutye ŋalek ce kyopokokyi let oŋnkasyem oyiyisye sukuŋet anyoru tukuk ce mite tay.
50003014	Kunyo amite olopoti otokyinikey aret nyoto saŋet apëlisye anyoru kokotutyet nyepo soponto nyepo torot nyo konu Yiyintet kupunune wule mite Yesu Kristo.
50003015	Möce cisoti kuyunyitenyi acek co kicenerye ciku Kristayek. Ntene ye ponto piko alake om akwek kasoteywek ce pciyotin, mosukuporwok akwek Yiyintet topon.
50003016	Kunyo nka kot kuyunyoto, kuroke cetosyikey cipe tay cerupe ntarastinek cetecu kicerup acek kuceke keny okoy kunyi.
50003017	Mpo yeya, asyem akwek tokol opur kuyu wule ayunte ani. Kiciporwok aret nyepo manta, kunyo möce olimnci piko co rupe aret nyo kiciporwok.
50003018	Kwomwowok ani akwek ŋalecutecu aret ce caŋ, kunyo otosyini omwowok aponte lokik. Mite piko ce caŋ ce kokopur kopurto nye miyat kwek punik cepo murtowontet nye kimeci Kristo.
50003019	Kunyo mosukowoŋnkyi picoto kwaranta soponwek cikwa om wule mite mata nye momise. Omnye soye picoto corokyinotet nyepo porwonik cikwa. Silekey cek tukuk ce kotosutyini kolilonis. Sote cekto pate tukuk cepo koroni.
50003020	Ntene ciku acek piko cepo koret nyepo torot. Kunyo cemite cekeni Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo nye mosukucone torot cokusopec.
50003021	Mosukuwec neto porwonikyacek ce kuskus kukerkeyitu oko porto nyenyi nye ponto woyinto. Mosukwiy neto ŋalecu tokol om swamet nye yiyisye ye wece tukuk tokol cepo koret.
50004001	Kunyo mpo yeya, ocömok ani akwek koromun, oŋnkomöce kule nto akäsak. Oŋereco ani akwek koromun, kunyo oyiku pelutyet nyimwani nye poru yisyet nyimwani. Mpo yeya, möce oyiyisye topon om soponwekwok om wule mite Mokoryontet.
50004002	Osomok ani akwek Ewotia oko Suntike kule roke asat oŋnkocomncine ŋalek cikwok kuyu pic ce tupco om Kristo.
50004003	Mpenyi corwemwani nyepo manta nye kicintosi tukway, amöce ani kule kalye nyi koruco, omnye kiciyisye acek oko cekto yisyet nyewo koromun cemwayte lokoywek ce toponec wanak oko Klement, oko piko tokol ce kicesil kaynokwa kitaput nyepo soponto.
50004004	Roke aŋerec akwek okokoy om soponwek cikwok om wule mite Mokoryontet. Kunyo otosyini omwowu kule, aŋerec!
50004005	Oporci piko tokol kule oyiku akwek toloyec. Karik kuco Mokoryontet.
50004006	Monte cisot kiy ake tokol, ntene om somutek cikwok tokol ye omite osome Yiyintet kiy ake tokol nye omöce, kumöce osome okokoy om mukuleyto nye kostoyisyi.
50004007	Mosukurip kalyet nyepo Yiyintet mukuleywekwok oko kasoteywekwok om Yesu Kristo. Kalyet nyoto kunye puryo kot komuce kunket kasoteywek cepo piko.
50004008	Mpo yeya, ŋalek cepo letut kucu, orip kasoteywek cikwok om ŋalek cepo manta, oko cepo sikonotet, oko ce rototin, oko ce tililec, oko ce toponec, oko cepo koyweyisyet.
50004009	Oyiyisye ŋalek co kyolim oŋnkokäs akwek oyiye ani, oko konetisyet oko yisyonutek ce kyonket akwek om wule amite ani. Kunyo mosopurte akwek kalyet nyo konec acek Yiyintet.
50004010	Oponte ani ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun om soponto nyimwani, om wule mite Mokoryontet! Omnye om letutap pesyosyek ce caŋ, kwacec akwek yawut akalya ani. Puryo kot omwowu kule kikyotaya nye mokolyo, ntene omnye kipuryo kot oponte poroyinto.
50004011	Oŋnkupuryo yec kot omwowu ani ŋalecu kuyunyi omnye asoti kule kicetaya, omnye kyanetkey wule opurtoy ani kwani nkit.
50004012	Oŋnket wule mopurte ye moponte tukuk ce yeme oko ye oponte tukuk ce yeme. Kyanetkey ani ŋalecu sukuŋet amuc apur kuyu ci nye yemo kiy tokol, mpo ye koyomisye okoy opiyony nto mpo ye monoyomisye okoy opiyony, nto ye komokoren nto mpo ye kapanan.
50004013	Amuci amukte wuyinto ake tokol om swamet nye kono ani Kristo.
50004014	Ntene kyayiy akwek topon akalya ani om toŋoŋutekwani.
50004015	Oŋnket akwek Filipik kule om pesyosyek co kipo tay yo kyomwoytoy ani lokoywek ce toponec yo kyocone Maketoniya kwakwek nkit om pikap Yiyintet ce kikalya kukono pesanik ce kyoyiyisye.
50004016	Mpo ye kyomite Sesolonika, kyosutwo ani akwek yoto kokolyoyisyet nyepo pesanik aret oyeny.
50004017	Puryo kot amöce kule anyoru kokotutek, ntene amöce pate kule akäs latik ce kotosyikey om wule omite akwek.
50004018	Kunyo aponte ani yawut tukuk tokol ce yemo kusirte ce amöce. Kuyema topon yawut tukuk omnye kwonyoru kokotutekwok ce kwokonu akwek ce kusutu Epafrotito. Kerkey kokotutecu oko korosek ce poŋu topon ce puntoy wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkuŋerec neto.
50004019	Kunyo Yiyintemwani om Mokoryontinyi nyewo koromun nye mosukukonok akwek tukuk tokol ce omöce kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo.
50004020	Kopurune Woyinto wule mite Papanyo Yiyintet okokoy oko okokoy - Yunyoto.
50004021	Asupay pikap Yiyintet tokol ce kipoyit Yesu Kristo. Kesupayak akwek mpo yeya cepo wuli ce cepontekey oko ani.
50004022	Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol ce mite wuli, ntene kupëlis piko ce mitowune kaytap Kinko nyewo.
50004023	Kunyo opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
51001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kikwey Yiyintet kwek kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Timosewo.
51001002	Cesilyini pikap Yiyintet mpo yeya ce cikenekeny om Kristo cepo koretap Kolosaya. Kante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo poypoyet oko kalyet.
51001003	Cikostoy acek okokoy Yiyintet kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo ye ce mite cesomwok.
51001004	Omnye kicelim koyenet nye oponte akwek om wule mite Yesu oko cömisyet nye ocöme piko tokol cepo Yiyintet.
51001005	Kwone ŋalecutecu tukway kokenotet nyo kicekonorwok akwek om torot. Kokonotet nyoto kunye po ŋalek cepo manta cepo lokoywek ce toponec co kyolim akwek kunyo.
51001006	Mite lokoywecoto toponec kukonu kupeyok oŋnkutosyinikey om koret tokol kuyu wulo yunto om wule mite akwek, kuceke pesyet nyepo tay nyo kyolime poypoyetap Yiyintet oŋnkonket ŋalecato kuyu ŋalek cepo manta.
51001007	Mutworintet nye kerkey oko acek Epafra oŋnku cämanenyacek kunye kinetak akwek ŋaleca. Neto kunye cito nye kikoyen nye yicin yisyet Kristo om kaynenyacek.
51001008	Kico neto cokumwowec acek cömisyet nye oponte akwek nyo kikonok Muyet Nyetilil.
51001009	Kunyo, kuceke pesyet nye kicelim acek ŋaleca, munakyaste mpo pesyo akenke nye mocesomwok. Cesome acek kule roke oŋnket akwek topon cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet oŋnkonyoru ŋomnonet om mukuleywekwok orit saŋet oŋnket ŋalek tokol ce konu Muyet Nyetilil.
51001010	Cesome kule otosyikey akwek opurte okokoy soponto nye ponto latik om wule mite Yiyintet, oŋereci akwek neto koromun, saŋet ayiy yisyonutek wok tokol cepo toponiyet, oŋnkotosyikey anetkey ŋalek ce caŋ cepo Yiyintet.
51001011	Cesome kule roko kukwilak akwek Yiyintet om woyinto nyepo swamenyi nyewo, sukuŋet amuc otitir om swama oŋnkomuytoci oŋnkoŋerec om kiy ake tokol nye kacontyok.
51001012	Oŋnkokaste Papa Yiyintet nye kikonok ayem onyoru otepto nyimwoŋ om koret nyepo lakweyinto om wule mite pikyi cetililec.
51001013	Omnye neto kunye kisorunenec acek wule mite poytoyisyet nyepo menonet, oŋnkukwerwec cekwa okoy wule mite poytoyisyet nyepo Werinyi Camanet.
51001014	Kunyo Werit nye kikalyec acek miyotyonikyo oŋnkutyaktec.
51001015	Kristo kunye tonto nye toku nye kerkey oko Yiyintet nyo puryo kot kutoku. Neto kunye Werit poretyet nyewo nye poytoy tukuk tokol ce kicitany om koret tokol.
51001016	Om wule mite neto kunye kitany Yiyintet tukuk tokol ce mite koret torot oko koret ŋony, cetoku oko cemotoku wanak oko swamet nyepo oyik oko poytoyik oko kamukeywek. Kitany Yiyintet koret tokol kupunte wule mite neto, oŋnkwek nyenyi.
51001017	Kimite neto om towunot kutompo kot citany kiy ake tokol, neto nye nöme kuyomo kwek kiy akenke koret tokol.
51001018	Neto metitap porto, nto porto nyoto ku pikap Yiyintet ce kikoyomekey. Neto kunye lukune soponto nyepo porto, sukuŋet kopoyit tay om tukuk tokol.
51001019	Yiyintet nkit kunye kicäm oŋnkukwey kule mokunyor Werit tonto nyepo Yiyintet.
51001020	Kunyo kicäm Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Werit, sukuŋet kuket kuwec koret kuco wule mite neto. Kisut Yiyintet kalyet om metap Werinyi nyo kimeci murtowontet, kunyo kiwec tukuk tokol kukwa yec wule mite neto. Tukucoto tokol kuce mite koret tokol torot oko ŋony.
51001021	Kyomitowune akwek ikye wule low om wule mite Yiyintet, kunyo kikyawecekey akwek oyiku punik cepo Yiyintet om tukuk cemiyotec ce kyayiy oŋnkasot.
51001022	Kunyo kikweyak akwek yawut Yiyintet aketitekey wule mite neto kupunte metap porto nyepo Werinyi, nye kiceyi, oŋnkume sukuŋet kuwecak akwek otililitu oŋnkotoponitu nye komoponte miyotyo mpo kisic.
51001023	Kunyo misyini otosyikey om koyenet nye kwilat nyepo manta nyo kyonyoru, monte kyastekey ciluclucak kot akwane kokenotet nyo kyonyoru nyo kyolim akwek lokoywek ce toponec. Lokoywecutecu toponec kuce kicemwaytate koret tokol kumukul. Kunyo ani Paulo kunye kicekweya oyiku mutworintet nyepo ŋalecu.
51001024	Kunyo oyiku ani yawut ŋerekat om toŋoŋutekwani. Omnye om toŋuŋutek cikwani cepo porto nyimwani kuye okolyoy awaŋnte toŋoŋutek cepo Kristo ce kiŋet kupo porto nyenyi, coto ku luketap Yiyintet.
51001025	Kunyo kikweya Yiyintet oyiku mutworintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet. Kikono ayiy yisyoni kupo toponiyet nyimwakwek. Yisyet nyoto kunye omwoytoti topon lokoywekyi.
51001026	Ŋalecutecu kuce kikiwuŋe Yiyintet piko cepo pinutek tokol kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ ntene kuŋoŋ om letut kuporci pikyi.
51001027	Omnye kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyitenyi kule oporci pikyi ŋalekyi ce wuŋotin, ŋalecutecu kuce po mokoryonti oko woyinto ce mokyini Yiyintet piko tokol, nto ŋalecoto kucu kule mitowune Kristo wule omite akwek orit, nye poru kule mosonyoru akwek woyintotap Yiyintet.
51001028	Kunyo cemwocini acek piko tokol ŋalek cepo Kristo. Cisowu oŋnkyinet ci ake tokol om ŋomnonet ake tokol nye mukoktos, sukuŋet cekweru ci ake tokol kuco wule mite Yiyintet. Kukokwek cito nye kikil nye ponto koyomotet oko Kristo.
51001029	Otitiri ani aŋnkataŋany ye sukwiyokis ŋalecutecu, oyiyisye swamet nyewo nye konu Kristo nye mite kwiyisyi om wule amite ani.
51002001	Kunyo akany omwowok wule kyotitirte ani oyiwok akwek yisyet oŋnkoyici piko ce mite Laotisea oko mpo piko alak tokol ce tompo kot kukäsa ani om konyekwa.
51002002	Ayiye kuyunyoto sukuŋet kutosyikey kutitir mukuleywekwa ce toponec oŋnkuyomokey cekto kwek akenke om cömisyet, oŋnkunket mokoryontit tokol nye konu ŋomnonet nyepo ŋaleca, oŋnkunyor ŋalekap Yiyintet ce woŋotin, nyoto ku Kristo.
51002003	Kristo kunye Funkuwet nye yote wule kiwuŋekey Mokoryontit tokol nyepo ŋomnonet oko kokenotetap Yiyintet.
51002004	Komwowok ani akwek ŋalecu sukuŋet mente kot tokuperperak citake om ŋalek alak cepo tintenot nyepo mwiynan nka kot ku ŋalek ce toponec ceyune.
51002005	Omnye nka kot mopontekey ani oko akwek om porto ntene cepontekey oko akwek om kasoteywek. Kunyo ayiku ŋerekat koromun akäs kopurto nye kwilat oko koyenet nye oponte akwek om wule mite Kristo.
51002006	Kuyu wulo kyocäm akwek Yesu Kristo kwek Mokoryontet, kunyo misyini oyomekey oko neto.
51002007	Opur kuyu pic ce kwilotin tikityet cekwok om wule mite neto; atec kuneryo soponwek cikwok om wule mite neto, oŋnkokwilokisye okokoy om koyenet nyimwoŋ kuyu wule kicinetitak, oŋnkotosyikey akaste okokoy Yiyintet nyewo.
51002008	Misyini oripkey akäs kule mente kot kumasak citake om konetisyet nyepo ŋalek cepo mwiynan ce moponto latik ce kwone konetisyet nye kirup piko kuceke keny, oko ŋomnonetap oyik cepo koret, ce puryo kot kukwone wule mite Kristo nkit.
51002009	Omnye mitowune soponto tokol nyepo Yiyintet wule mite Kristo kuyu cito.
51002010	Kunyo kicekonok akwek soponto tokol, oŋnkyiyomok oyiku akenke oko neto. Neto kunye nyewo nye poytoy poytoyik oko kamukeywek alak tokol.
51002011	Yo kyoyomntosikey akwek oko neto kuye yoto ye kicewonok akwek. Ntene puryo kot ku wonset nyo wone piko porto, ntene wonset nyepo Kristo nkit, nyoto kunye sorunet nye kicityacec cekwane swamet nyepo porto nyi ponto miyotyet.
51002012	Omnye yo kicepotisonok akwek kuye kicemuyok yoto oko Kristo. Nto patisanet yec kuye kyotutune met oko Kristo kupunte koyenet nyimwoŋ om swamet nyepo Yiyintet nye yiyisyi nye kiŋet Yesu Kristo kotutune met.
51002013	Kikipok ikye soponwek cikwok om wule mite Yiyintet om miyotyonik ce kyoponte, oko yec omnye kyoyiku akwek Lamek ce kyomite saŋ om ntarastinek. Kunyo kikwerwok akwek yawut Yiyintet kwonyoru soponto kuyu Kristo! Kikukalyec Yiyintet acek miyotyonikyo tokol.
51002014	Kupël neto ntarastinek, oŋnkunum wule kicesil pesenutek cicacek ce miyotec, oŋnkukwertoci murtowontet kupok.
51002015	Nteye kimite Yesu Murtowontet, kutyacekey nkit kucone wule mite poytoyisyet nyepo oyik oko kamukeywek ce kinöme neto. Kipël neto oyik oŋnkunam kuyu sira oŋnkuwesetot kupartat kukäs piko tokol.
51002016	Kunyo puryo kot kurok kwiwok akwek citake ntarastinek ce nöme omik ce moyam, nto yisyet, nto ce nöme pesyosyek ce tililec, nto ce nöme sakwet nyepo arawet nye kolel, nto ce nöme pesyetap Sapat.
51002017	Ŋaleca tokol kuce rurwet nyepo ŋalek ce mosukukwa, nto ŋalek cepo manta ku Kristo.
51002018	Monte kot acäm kot kumutwok musanku citake tokol nye sutekey kule oyiku nyewo opëlisye, omnye köse neto ŋoŋutok ce kweyotin. Kusyem kukerekey ŋalek cepo mwiynan oko soyutek cepo malaykanik. Kwontos cicoto pöc pate om kasoteywek cepo koret.
51002019	Kikwasta neto nye kimo kurupe Kristo nye metit nye poytoy oŋnkupoye porto tokol oŋnkotuyo om wule kicituye om melilok oŋnkuner kuyu wulo moktoy Yiyintet kule kuner.
51002020	Kyopoku akwek oko Kristo, kicityakenak poytoyisyet nyepo oyik cepo koret! Kunyo omne sopur akwek kuyunye opoye koroni? Omne sacäm akwek cirwokwok kule,
51002021	“Monte kot anäm kiyi? Monte kot acemcem kiyin? Monte kot otiny tukuk alak?’’
51002022	Puryo kot kuponto tukuco latik ye kokyiyisye. Ntarastinecoto kuce kikwiye oŋnkunet cito.
51002023	Porukey manta kuyunye ponto ŋaleca ŋomnon om ŋalek ceponto ce ceripekey oko muyotet nyepo kopreperisyet nyepo portap cito. Ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto latik cepo manta ce muce kot kurip tukuk ce möce porto.
51003001	Kyotutune met akwek oko Kristo, kunyo misyini asat mukuleywek cikwok kukäs tukuk ce mite torot wule mite Kristo kukepure ŋecerenyi om yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
51003002	Okoci kukäs pate kasoteywek cikwok tukuk ce mite torot, ntene monte cekäs tukuk ce mite koret ŋony.
51003003	Omnye kyopoku akwek, kunyo kiwuŋokis soponwek cikwok oko Kristo om wule mite Yiyintet.
51003004	Kristo kunye soponto nyimwakwek nyepo manta, nteye coni kuporukey neto, mpo akwek mosoporukey oko neto oŋnkonyoru woyinto nyenyi!
51003005	Kunyo misyini apakäc corokyinotet nyepo koret nyo mite kwiyisyi om wule omite akwek, kuyu sakwayanat, simnyo, corokyinot nye samis, oko sayet nye miyat (Omnye sayet nye miyat kunye kacesay kerkeyik)
51003006	Omnye mosukukwontyi nerekwekap Yiyintet piko co puryo kot kuyweye cek neto om tukuk ceyucutecu.
51003007	Kyomite akwek ikye pesyosyek alak opurtoy soponto nye yunyoto oko piko alak ce kyominye tokol.
51003008	Kunyo oyiku akwek yawut Kristayek, misyini ayaste tukucu tokol, kuyu nerekwek, nyerunotet, kowotyontit, oko mwiynanet, oko ŋalek ce somis ce kwone kutuwak cikwok.
51003009	Monte ciperperkey akwek kwakwek nkit om ŋal cepo mwiynan, omnye kyowirte akwek soponto nyo kipo keny kupetakey kopurto nye miyat.
51003010	Kunyo kyolac soponto nyelel. Nyoto kunye cito nye mite cilelite okokoy sukuŋet oŋnket Yiyintet nyo kitonyok akwek akerkeyitu oko neto.
51003011	Om soponto nyitenyi lel kunye puryo kot kumite pciyatet om wule mite Yutoyintet oko Kirikintet, nto cito nye wonat oko cito nye mawonat, nto cito nye lomin, nto piko ce Lamek alak tokol, nto ci nye mutworin oko cito nye momutworin, ntene Kristo kunye po ŋalek tokol, oŋnkumitowune kiy ake tokol wule mite Kristo.
51003012	Kunyo ye kikweyak akwek Yiyintet oyiku pikyi ce cämanik, kumisyini opurte moyet oko mukuleyto nye kolyoyisyi, oko tolosyet oko poypoyet oko muytocinotet.
51003013	Okolyoykey akwek nkit, nteye ponto ci ake tokol om akwek ŋolyo nye ŋunye om wule mite citake, kumisyini kumuyta oŋnkukalya nyin, kuyu wulo kikokalyak akwek Mokoryontet.
51003014	Ntene ce pëlisyi om ŋalecu tokol ku cömisyet; Omnye cömisyet kunye kwile kuyomntos sukuŋet kutoponitu tukuk tokol kwek akenke.
51003015	Kalyet nye konu Kristo kunye roke kwek ketintet om mukuleywekwok orit. Kikurok akwek Yiyintet sukuŋet onyoru kalyet nyitenyi soyiku pic ce kikwek porto akenke, kunyo okostoyisyi.
51003016	Lokoywekap Kristo wanak oko mokoryontit tokol nye ponto kuce roke kopurune mukuleywekwok orit. Onetisye oŋnkorwokyikey akwek nkit om ŋomnonet tokol. Otumnci Yiyintet tumwonik cepo kakastayet oko tumwonik cepo ŋerekwek oko tumwonik cetililec, okostoy Yiyintet om mukuleywekwok orit.
51003017	Kunyo tukuk tokol ce oyiye akwek, nto ŋalek ce oŋololi; kuce roke oyiye om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu ye omite akwek okostoy Yiyintet Papa kupunte wule mite Yesu.
51003018	Misyini aywey akwek koruk sanikwok, omnye roke ayiy kuyunyoto kuyu kristayek.
51003019	Misyini acäm moronik korukwok, monte cewuse.
51003020	Akwek lekok, yisyemwakwek kuyu Kristayek aywey okokoy mpo kon oko mpo komet, omnye ŋerece ŋalek ceyucoto Yiyintet.
51003021	Akwek poyik oko cepyosok, monte cewuse lekokwok, omnye sutyini ŋalek ceyucoto kumuyo pate.
51003022	Akwek mutworik, aywey mokorenikwok cepo koret om ŋalek tokol, monte oyiyisyi pate ye mite cek kukosök sukuŋet kukastak.
51003023	Ntene oyiye kiy ake tokol oyicini Mokoryontet kukowoŋnkyi om mukuleywekwok tokol ntene nye puryo kot oyicini piko.
51003024	Misyini oŋnket kule mosukuyokwok akwek Mokoryontet, mosonyoru musyaret nye kikonorci neto pikyi, omnye Kristo kunye Mokoryontet nye oyicini akwek yisyet.
51003025	Nto ci ake tokol nye yiye ŋalek ce miyotec, nka kot ku cito nye yune, mosicikoci nyoto musyaret nyepo tukuk ce miyotec ce kikwiye; omnye yoyece Yiyintet piko tokol.
51004001	Akwek mokorenik, opoytoy mutworikwok topon oŋnkoyoyeci topon, oŋnketi kule oponte mpo akwek Mokoryontet nye mite torot.
51004002	Otosyikey osome okokoy, oŋnkoripkey ye okostoy Yiyintet.
51004003	Nteye omite osome, osomwec mpo acek sukuŋet kukonec Yiyintet kuyotwec kurket cenyoru poroyinto cemwaytate lokoywek ce wuŋotin cepo Kristo, omnye ŋalecato ce kisokyo ani sicekerta mopusi.
51004004	Kunyo osomwo saŋet aŋalal ŋalek ce toku om aret nye topon kuyu wule omuktoy.
51004005	Oŋomekitu koromun om ŋalek ye oŋololyini piko co tompo kot kucömis co tokumite saŋ, oyiyisye topon poroyinto nye oponte.
51004006	Möce kutoponit ŋelyepta nyimwoŋ oŋnkoŋerece piko, oŋnkumöce oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta ye owekyini citake tokol ŋolyo.
51004007	Yeyanyo nye cämanet Tukiko nye kikoyen nye yiyisyi oŋnku mutworintet nye kerkey oko acek om yisyetap Mokoryontet nye mosukuco cokwumwowok akwek ŋalek tokol ce nömo ani.
51004008	Kunye koyoku kuco wule omite akwek, kule sukuŋet cokuŋerecak kumwowok ŋalek cekwone wule ce mite acek oko wule cipurtoy acek tokol.
51004009	Contoykey neto Onesimo cito nyinyacek nye kokoyen oŋnku yeyanyo nye ceman nye cone koremwoŋ. Mosukukwa cek oŋnku kwokumwowok ŋalek tokol cekwone wuli cemite acek.
51004010	Kesupayak akwek Aristariko nye cepontekey acek tukway om mopusi oko Marko nye tupco oko Parnapa.
51004011	Oko Yoswa nye cekure kaynet ake Yusto (Kunyo kyolim akwek ŋalek cepo Marko, roke atoroc oŋerekyi neto ye kaco wule omite akwek) Picutecu pate kuce Yutayek ce kikwek Kristayek ce mite kwiyisyi oko ani yisyet nyepo poytosyisyetap Yiyintet. Kukukalya ani cekto koromun.
51004012	Kesupayak akwek mpo Epafra nye cito akenke nyepo koremwoŋ oŋnku mutworintet nyepo Yesu Kristo. Neto nye somwok akwek okokoy nye memunye kule saŋet okwilokisye oyiku Kristayek ce kwilotin ce kikoywey cömisyet tokol nyepo Yiyintet.
51004013	Omwowok ani nkit yisyet nyewo nye yiye neto om kaynamwakwek oko mpo pikap Laotisea oko piko cepo Yerapoli.
51004014	Kesupayak akwek Luka cepsakityantet nye cämanet nyinyacek oko Tema.
51004015	Osupoywec koromun mpo yeyanyo ce mite Laotisea oko yeya Nimfa oko pikap Yiyintet ce mite kanyi.
51004016	Ye kacesumonwok akwek parwani okoyite wocesumontyi pikap Yiyintet cepo Laotisea, nto kapok oyiytekey mpo akwek cesumonwok parwet nye mokucone Loatisea.
51004017	Omwoci Arkipo kule, “Möce käs kule keyiy okoy wany topon yisyetap Mokoryontet nyo kicekoniŋ.’’
51004018	Yewumwani nkit nye kosile ŋalekyu: Ani Paulo nye kasupayak akwek. Kunyo Monte ceyutye kule amite ani Mopusi. Osomwok kule opurte akwek poypoyetap Yiyintet.
52001001	Cone parwani wule ce mite acek Paulo oko Silfano oko Timosewo. Cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet ce mite Sesolonika. Piko coto kuce po Papa Yiyintet oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Kante opurte akwek poypoyet oko kalyet.
52001002	Cikostoy acek akokoy Yiyintet om wule omite akwek tokol, oŋnkyeŋalalenak okokoy ye ce mite cesome.
52001003	Omnye cisoti acek om taytap Yiyintet oŋnku Papa; kuyu wulo oyiyisye akwek koyenet nyimwoŋ kutok oko kuyu wulo konok cömisyet nyimwoŋ oyiyisye om swamet, oko kuyu wulo kwilat koromun cömisyet nyimwoŋ om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
52001004	Mpo yeya, cinket acek kule cömok Yiyintet; kunyo kikweyak oyiku pikyi.
52001005	Omnye kipuro kot cesutwok acek lokoywek ce toponec om ŋalek pate, ntene kicesutu mpo swamet oko Muyet Ntetilil oko ŋomnonet tokol nyepo ŋalecato. Oŋnket wule kicipurtoy acek yo kicepontekey oko akwek. Kicipur kuyunyoto kupo topiniyet nyimwakwek.
52001006	Kyacec mpo akwek yoto opurte kopurto nye kerkey oko nyinyacek oko nyepo Mokoryontet. Nka kot kyonyuru yoto wuyinwek ce caŋ, ntene kyatoroc akwek lokoywek om ŋerekwek co konu Muyet Nyetilil.
52001007	Yoto oporukey oyiku piko ce kekasenak piko tokol co kikoyen cepo Meketoniya oko Akaya.
52001008	Omnye kipuryo kot ku ŋolyontetap lokoywek pate ce kyotaste celime Meketoniya, ntene kipunte koyenet nyimwoŋ ceŋalale om wulyo tokol. Kunyo puryo kot ceponte acek yec ŋolyontet ake nye mocemwowu.
52001009	Ŋolole picoto nkit wule kyotoroktec acek akwek yo kicetorocec, oŋnkumwoy wule kyawektekey akwek ayaste kerkeyik oŋnkowekyikey wule mite Yiyintet. Sukuŋet oyici Yiyintet nye sopot yisyet nyepo manta,
52001010	oŋnkoken Werinyi nye mosukucone torot. Nyoto ku Yesu Kristo nyo kiŋet Yiyintet kotutune met, kunye kosopintet nye kisorwec om wule mite nerekwek cepo Yiyintet ce mosukukwa.
52002001	Mpo yeya, oŋnket akwek nkit kule kipuryo kot kupoyit püc pate rutoyenyacek yo kicekwoni wule omite akwek.
52002002	Oŋnket kule kikicitaŋanyec acek kunyo oŋnkyecupec om Filipi kutompo cepunu wule omite akwek om Sesolonika. Ntene kutitirec Yiyintenyo okoy cemwowok lokoywek ce toponec cekwone wule mite neto, nka kot kimite piko ce caŋ ce kitoyisyi.
52002003	Puryo kot kumasat konetisyet nye kicinetak acek akwek, nto mpo ku kule ponto kosotey ce miyotec, nto mpo kule cesyeme ciperper ci ake tokol.
52002004	Ntene ce möce kule ceŋalal okokoy kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet, omnye kikweyec oŋnkukonec lokoywek ce toponec. Puryo kot cesyeme kule ciŋerec piko, ntene ce möce kule ciŋerec Yiyintet nyo syeme mukuleywek cicacek.
52002005	Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule, kipuryo kot cekwa wule omite akwek cesutu ŋalek cepo kutit saŋ pate, puryo mpo kot ciyiyisye ŋalek ce kicewunye kule cemöce pesanik, Yiyintet nye nkete coto.
52002006	Kipuryo kot cesyem kule cenyoru kakastayet nye cone wule mite ci ake tokol, kuyu nye cone wule omite akwek, nto mpo nye cone wule mite piko alake,
52002007	Nka kot kicimuci acek cemakenak akwek tukuk alak kuyu kiyokik cepo Kristo. Ntene kicetoloyitu yo kicepontekey akwek kuyu yeyo nye ripe lekokyi.
52002008	Kunyo kicecämak acek koromun, yoto okoy cekonok, puryo kot ku lokoywekap Yiyintet pate, ntene kicekonok mpo soponwek cicacek.
52002009	Mpo yeya, möce asot kupoyit manta kuyu wulo kiciyisye acek cetitir! Kiciyisye pet oko komoy sukuŋet mente kot cesutyi nyikisin ci ake tokol om akwek, oŋnkurok yec cemwowok lokoywek ce toponec ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet.
52002010	Akwek kuce oŋnketi ŋalecato oŋnkonket mpo Yiyintet nkit, kule kicipurte acek kapurto nyetilil nyepo manta nye kipuryo kot kupunto lelis om wule omite akwek co kyocömisye.
52002011	Oŋnket wule kiceriptok acek akwek kuyu wulo riptoy kwan lekokyi.
52002012	Kicititirok, oŋnkyipaypayak oŋnkyesomwok kule opurte soponto nye ŋerece Yiyintet nyo kikurok kwonyoru poytoyisyenyi oko wonyinto.
52002013	Mite ŋolyontet ake nye cikostoy acek Yiyintet okokoy, nyoto kunyi kule, yo kiciporwok acek akwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, olim yoto oŋnkoyen nye puryo kuyu ŋolyo nyepo cito, ntene kuyu ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Kunyo yunyoto kupoyit manta, omnye mite Yiyintet kwiyisyi om wule omite akwek co kyoyen.
52002014	Nto akwek mpo yeya, kyotaŋany toŋoŋutek ce kerkey oko cepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Yuteya. Kuyu wule kitaŋany pikap koremwoŋ, kunyo kitaŋany mpecek Yutayek,
52002015	co kipoköce Mokoryontet Yesu oŋnkupakäc workoyik oŋnkukwetec acek saŋ. Puryo kot kuŋerece piko coto Yiyintet, kunyo punik cekto cepo piko tokol.
52002016	Omnye kusyem kule cekerktec mente cemwoci Lamek wule mocisopto. Miyotyet nyitenyi nye kinyit miyotyonik cikwa ce caŋ ce kikwiy cekto. Kunyo konyor cekto yawut om letut nerekwek cepo Yiyintet.
52002017	Mpo yeya, yu kowo cepakaktak acek akwek kumuniŋ, kunyo nka kot puryo kot cekosekey om konyek, ntene kicepontekey oko akwek om kasoteywek, kicesyem koromun kule cekasenak yec konyek.
52002018	Kicemöce kule ceketukey wule omite akwek. Kyasyem ani Paulo aret ce caŋ kule aco wule omite akwek, ntene kukurekta Setanit.
52002019	Ntene akwek nkit, nye puryo kot ku piko alak, oyiku kokenotet nyinyacek. Kunyo om akwek nkit kuce cesilekey acek om taytap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo ye kaco.
52002020	Akwek kuce cesilekey oŋnkoyiku ŋerekwek cicacek cepo manta.
52003001	Yoto yu kowo cekäs kule komocimuci tocemuytoci, cecäm kule cipur Asene kwacek nkit,
52003002	oŋnkyiyoku Timosewo yeyanyo nye kyiyisyi acek tokol yiysyetap Yiyintet cemwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, sukuŋet kuco cokotitirok oŋnkukalyak koyenet nyimwoŋ.
52003003	Sukuŋet mente kot kumasak ci ake tokol omnye konyoru toŋoŋutek coto. Oŋnket akwek nkit kule toŋoŋutek ceyucoto kuce tukuk ce poru cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet om wule cemite acek.
52003004	Omnye yo kicepontekey, kicemwowok kutompo kot kupunto pasyosyek kule mosicitaŋanya, kunyo kukwiyokis yawut kuyunyoto.
52003005	Kuyiyit nyoto sukuŋet oyoku ani Timosewo, omnye kimomuci kot tomuytoci yec. Kyoyoku ani neto kule cokukäs wule yunto koyenet nyimwoŋ. Kwomöce kule oŋnket kule titirot koyenet nyimwoŋ kot kwamukte oyinot, nto pesyet ake kupoyit püc pate yisyet nye kikyiy acek.
52003006	Kunyo kuweckey yawut Timosewo okoy wule ce mite acek kusutu lokoywek cekwone wule omite akwek cepo ŋerekwek ce nöme koyenet oko cömisyet nyimwoŋ. Kumwowec kule asotec acek akwek topon okokoy oŋnkomöce koromun kule cekäsec kuyu wulo cemöce mpo acek kule cekäsak akwek.
52003007	Mpo yeya, koyenet nyimwoŋ kunye kwetitirec acek om wuyinwekyo oko toŋoŋutekyo tokol.
52003008	Kunyo ponto soponto latik om wule cemite acek yawut ye kwokwilokisye akwek,
52003009	Cimuci acek yawut cikaste Yiyintet om wule omite akwek. Cikostoy om ŋerekwek ce ceponte om taytap Yiyintet kupo akwek.
52003010	Cesome acek neto pet oko komoy om mukuleywekyo, kule sukuŋet cekäsak akwek om konyekyo, sicekonok swamet nye omöce om koynet nyimwoŋ.
52003011	Yiyintenyo nkit oŋnku Papa oko Mokoryontenyo Yesu, kunye roke kuyiytowec acek aret sukuŋet cekwa wule omite akwek!
52003012	Mokoryontet nkit kunye roke kukonok kutosyikey kuwoyit cömisyet nyimwakwek om wule omite akwek kwakwek nkit, oko wule mite piko tokol; kuyu cömisyet nye ceponte acek om wule omite akwek.
52003013	Om aret nyeyunyoto kuye mosicekwil acek mukuleywek cikwok oŋnkonyolu opoyitu manta, oŋnkotililitu om taytap Yiyintenyo oŋnku Papa om pesyet nyo coni Mokoryontenyo Yesu wanak oko piko tokol ce kikwek pikyi.
52004001	Mpo yenya, ŋolyontet nyepo letut kunyi kule, oŋnket kucone wule cemite acek wule yunto kopurto nye misyini cipurte sukuŋet kuŋerec Yiyintet. Ntene kapurto nyoto kunyo oponte akwek. Cesomok acek yawut koromun om kaynetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu kule otosyikey ayiy kupëlis.
52004002	Omnye oŋnket konetisyet nyepo ŋalek co kicinetak acek akwek om kamukeywekap Mokoryontet Yesu.
52004003	Kito nye möce Yiyintet kunyi kule, otililitu nye puryo kot oponte sakwayanat mpo kisic.
52004004	Möce ci ake tokol om akwek konket kule misyini komüt korket nyenyi om aret nye topon nyetilil,
52004005	Nye puryo kot ku om aret nyepo corokyinotet nye miyat kuyu wulo yiytoy piko co puryo kot konket Yiyintet.
52004006	Kunyo om ŋolyontoni, puryo kot kuroke kot kowurta nto mpo kot kumas citake yeyanyi. Kicemwowok acek ŋelyontoni ikye, kicisowok koromun kule mosukotaŋany Yiyintet piko ce yiye ŋalecutecu miyotec.
52004007	Kipuryo kot kukurec acek Yiyintet kule sukuŋet cipurte yec soponto nyepo sakwayanatet, ntene möce kule cipurte soponto nyetilil.
52004008	Kunyo ci ake tokol nye katay konetisyoni kunye kupryo kot kutay konetisyet nyepo cito, ntene kukatay cicoto Yiyintet nyo kikonok akwek Muyet Nyetilil.
52004009	Puryo kot kuroke cesilwok ŋalek ce nöme cömisyet wule roke acämnte piko alak co kicömis. Kikonetak akwek Yiyintet wule roke acämntekey akwek kwakwek nkit.
52004010	Kunyo kopurto nyeyunyoto omite akwek oporcini mpo yeya tokol cemite Meketoniya, kunye kopurto nyoto nye cesomok kule otosyikey kupëlis.
52004011	Otosyikey opurte pate soponto nye topon oŋnkasot oyiyisye yewuniyek cikwok sukuŋet onyoru pesanik cepo omik ce oyome kuyu wulo kikicemwowok acek kunyo.
52004012	Om aret nyeyunyitenyi kuye kuyweyak piko ce puryo kot kucömis. Puryo kot kuroke okenekey citake tokol om tukuk ce omöce.
52004013	Mpo yeya, cemöce acek kule oŋnket akwek ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme piko co kipok, sukuŋet monte cemuye kuyu wulo yunto piko co puryo kot kuponto kokenotet.
52004014	Cecöme kule kime Yesu oŋnkotutune met; kunyo ciyeni kule mosukoŋet Yiyintet kotutune met piko co kipok kuyene Yesu.
52004015	Konetisyetap Mokoryontet nyitenyi cemwowok kule, acek co cesoptosi om posyonoto coni Mokoryontet kuce cepeti tay cintoci piko co kipok.
52004016	Mosukuco polotet nye ŋetŋete piko. Nyoto kunye kutit nyepo malayket nyewo nyo kontitap Yiyintet. Mosukurek Mokoryontet nkit kucone torot kuco ŋony. Mosukunyosyo kuŋetyo kotutune met piko co kipok kukicäm Kristo.
52004017	Yoto cirurucec acek piko co cesoptosi om pesyonoto oŋnkyepetekey cekto cetorokte Mokoryontet cetuye om polyet om wulin po parak, oŋnkyipur oko Mokoryontet okokoy.
52004018	Kunyo aŋereckey otitirkey akwek kwakwek nkit oyiyisye ŋelacutecu.
52005001	Mpo yeya, puryo kot kuroke cisilwok acek ŋalek ce nöme pesyosyek oko kenyisyek ye mokwiyokis tukucutecu.
52005002	Omnye oŋnket akwek nkit topon kule mosukuco pesyetap Mokoryontet kuyu corintet nye coni komoy.
52005003	Pesyosyek coto kuye mwowu piko kule, “Mite kiy ake tokol topon nye puryo ŋoyenot.’’ Yoto pakenke kuye mosukwaran cekto lakwar! Puryo ci nye cilile. Mosukukerkeyit oko mwoninto nyo contyini korko nye karik kucämnkey lakwet.
52005004	Ntane akwek mpo yeya, puryo kot omite wule po menonet, kunyo puryo kot kuroke kucerak pesyonoto kuyu corin.
52005005	Opoye akwek tokol lakweyet; oŋnkoyiku piko cepo pet. Puryo kot ciku acek piko cepo komoy nto mpo ciku cepo mononet.
52005006	Kunyo puryo kot kuroke ceruye kuyu piko alak; misyini cekosu oŋnkyepoypoyitu.
52005007	Ruytos piko ye komoy, oŋnkupokitos ye komoy.
52005008	Ntene cepoye acek pet, kunyo misyini cepoypoyitu, misyini cenäm koyenet oko cömisyet kwek loŋet nyepo teket, oŋnkyilac kutwet nyepo karnet kwek kokenotet nyepo kosopotet.
52005009	Kipuryo kot kukweyac acek Yiyintet nye kimecec kule sukuŋet cetaŋany kunerekyec neto, ntene kikweyec sukuŋet cenyoru kosopotet kupunune wule mite Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
52005010	Omnye kimecec acek sukuŋet cipur wanak oko neto. Ye cesoptosi nto ye kacepoku om pesyet nye coni.
52005011	Kunyo roke otitirkey akwek nkit oŋnkokyokyey kuyu wulo oyiytoy yawut.
52005012	Mpo yeya, cesomok acek akwek kule aywey topon piko co yiyisyi om wule omite, piko co kuce kikwey Mokoryontet sukuŋet kunetak oŋnkuntowok.
52005013	Aywey cekto koromun oŋnkocäm yisyet nye yiye. Opurte kalyet akwek kwakwek nkit.
52005014	Mpo yeya, cesomok acek kule, asowu co puren, otitir piko co muytos, akalye piko co moponto swamet, omuytoci ŋalek cepo piko tokol.
52005015	Möce akäs kule puryo ci om akwek nye yokte miyotyet kuyakte miyotyet ake, Ntene möce otyikyi ayiy ŋalek ce toponec okokoy om wule omite akwek kwakwek nkit oko om wule mite piko tokol.
52005016	Oŋerece okokoy.
52005017	Osoye Yiyintet okokoy.
52005018	Okostoyisye om ŋolyo ake tokol. Möce Yiyintet kule ayiy akwek kuyunyoto om soponto nye oponte om Yesu Kristo.
52005019	Monte cekerekte Muyet Nyetilil.
52005020	Mönte cenyil lokoywek cepo ŋorsyet.
52005021	Ntene asyem wule yunto ŋolyo ake tokol, oŋnkorip ŋalek ce toponec.
52005022	Asanekey miyotyo ake tokol.
52005023	Yiyintet nyo kikonec kalyet kunye roke kukonok akwek otililitu om aret ake tekol, oŋnkorip topon mukuleywek cikwok oko soponwek cikwok oko porwonik cikwok, sukuŋet komoponte lelis ake tokol om pesyet nyo coni Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
52005024	Neto nyo kikurok akwek kunye po manta, kunyo mosukwiy kuyunyoto kupoyit manta.
52005025	Mpo yeya, osomwec mpo acek tokol.
52005026	Asupay mpo yeya tokol om kasupoyisyet nye ceŋotukekey nye poru tupcet.
52005027	Kosomok ani akwek om kamukeywekap Mokoryontet kule osumontyi pawani mpo yeye tokol.
52005028	Kunyo opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
53001001	Cone parwani wule ce mite acek Paulo oko Sila oko Timosewo. Cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet cepo Sesolonika. Piko coto kuce kipoyit Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokorykntet Yesu Kristo.
53001002	Kante kukonok akwek Yiyintet Papa oko Mokoryontet Yesu poypoyet oko kalyet.
53001003	Mpo yeya, misyini cikaste acek Yiyintet okokoy om wule omite akwek. Ŋolyo nyepo manta ye kaciy acek kuyonyoto, omnye mite kunere koyenet nyimwoŋ koromun, oŋnkutosyinikey cömisyet nye oponte akwek om wule mite piko alake.
53001004	Kunyo cesilekey acek nkit om ŋalek ce nömok akwek om taytap pikap Yiyintet. Cesilekey acek omnye omite akwek otosyinikey omuytoy oŋnkocömisyi nka kot oponte toŋoŋutek tokol oko nyolilutek ce omite opunte yawut.
53001005	Akwek kuce oporu wule mosukumutita Yiyintet musankut nyepo ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo mosukupor ŋalecutecu kule oyeme akwek onyoru poytoyisyenyi nye omite akwek yawut otoŋonye.
53001006	Mosukwiy Yiyintet ŋolyontet nyepo manta, mosukutaŋany neto piko co mite kutoŋonyo akwek yawut,
53001007	oŋnkutyacak akwek co omite otoŋonyi yawut oko mpo acek. Mosukwiy kuyunyoto om pesyet nyo porukey Yesu kucone torot oko malaykanikyi ce ponto swamet nyewo.
53001008	Mosukulay mata nyewo nye rikitite, sukuŋet kutaŋany piko co menket Yiyintet: oko piko co puryo kot kuyweye lokoywek ce toponec cepo Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
53001009	Mosukutaŋany cekto om aranet nye mopoku, oŋnkukweyokis om taytap Mokoryontet nye puryo kot kunyoru woyinto nyenyi nyewo.
53001010	Mosukwiyokis ŋalecu om pesyet nye coni neto cokunyor woyinto om wule mite pikyi oŋnkunyor kuywey piko tokol co kikoyen. Mosoyiku akwek alak om picoto omnye kyocäm lokoywek co kicemwowok acek.
53001011	Kunyo po wulo sukuŋet cesomwok acek okokoy. Cesome Yiyintenyo kule kukonok akwek soponto nyepo latik nyo kikurcok kwonyoru. Cesome kule roke kukonok Yiyintet om swamenyi tukuk ce omöce akwek cepo toponiyet oŋnkusat kunyol yisyet nyepo koyenet nyimwoŋ.
53001012	Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye sukuŋet kunyor woyinto kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu om wule omite akwek, oŋnkonyoru akwek woyinto om wule mite neto om poypoyetap Yiyintenyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
53002001	Mpo yeya, ŋalek ce nöme pesyet nye cone Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo, oko ye mosicirurucec acek sukuŋet cetuye oko neto.
53002002	Cesomok acek akwek kule monte kupotpotenis kasoteywek cikwok lakwar nto mpo onyeru om ŋalek ce cemwowu kule kupunto pesyet nyepo Mokoryontet. Pesyet ake kimwoy citake ŋaleca nye kiŋorsyi nto nye kimwoytoy lokoywek. Nto kicemwoy pesyet ake kule kicesil acek parwet nye mwowu ŋalecato.
53002003	Monte kot kuperperak ci ake tokol om aret ake tokol. Omnye puryo kot kwititoy pesyonoto okoy kunyosyo kuco cukurotet nyepo letut; oŋnkutok neto nyo miyat. Nyoto kunye weti wule mite mata nye momise.
53002004	Mosukutay neto kiy ake tokol nye soye piko oŋnkutay kiy ake tokol nye sute piko kule po Yiyintet. Mosukusutkey kwek nyewo nyepo kiy ake tokol, oŋnkowut kotap Yiyintet oŋnkopur ŋony kusutkey kwek Yiyintet.
53002005	Puryo kot tosoti akwek kule kyomwowok ani ŋalecutecu tokol yo kicepontekey oko akwek?
53002006	Oŋnket akwek kito nye kerektoy Neto okoy kwitita pesyet nye kicekwey sukuŋet kuporkey.
53002007	Omnye mite yawut kwiyisyi miyotyet nye motoku, ntene ŋolyontet nye mokwiyakay kunye puryo kot kwiyoktos okoy cinate kuwo tapan neto nyo kerektoy.
53002008	Yoto kuye mosukoporkey kutok Neto nye miyat.
53002009	Mosukupakäc Mokoryontet Yesu nyoto miyat kwiyisye muyet nye cone kutinyi oŋnkwaranta om pesyenyi nyewo ye kaco neto. Mosukuco Neto nye miyat om swametap Setanit oŋnkwiy tukuk wok tokol cepo kakitat oko pelutok cepo mwiynan ce cikite,
53002010	oŋnkwiyisye kaperperisyo ake tokol nye miyat om wule mite piko co mokwaran. Mosukwaran picoto omnye kipuryo kot kutoroc oŋnkucäm ŋalek cepo manta sukuŋet kusopco.
53002011	Om ŋolyontoni kuye kukoci Yiyintet kwiyis mwiynanet om wule mite cek sukuŋet kucäm cekto ŋalek cepo mwiynanet.
53002012	Kunyo ŋalek ce mokutok kucu kule, mosicewosontyi cemutyi musankut piko tokol co puryo kot kuyen ŋalek cepo manta, ntene kucäm pate ŋerekwek cepo miyotyet.
53002013	Mpo yeya, misyini cikaste acek Yiyintet okokoy om wule omite akwek co kicämak Mokoryontet, Omnye kikweyak Yiyintet opoyitu tayta ce kicisop om swametap Muyet Nyetilil sukuŋet kwiyak oyiku pikyi cetililec
53002014	Kikurok akwek Yiyintet kwonyoru ŋalecu kupunte lokoywek ce toponec co kicemwowok acek. Kikurok sukuŋet kwonyoru woyinto nyepo Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
53002015	Kunyo mpo yeya, okwilokisye oyoŋnkye topon akwil ŋalek cepo manta ce kicinetak om kutit nto parwet.
53002016	Cesomwok Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo nkit oko Yiyintet Papanyo nye kicämec om poypoyenyi nye mopoku oko kokenotet nye topon.
53002017	Kante kutitir neto mukuleywek cikwok oŋnkukonok okwilokisye sukuŋet ayiy oŋnkomwowu ŋalek ce toponec.
53003001	Mpo Yeya, osomwec acek sukuŋet kutosyikey kutisto lakwar lokoywekap Mokoryontet oŋnkupëlis kuwoyit kuyu wulo kiyunto om wule omite akwek.
53003002	Osomwec mpo sukuŋet kusorwec Yiyintet om wule mite piko ce kiwuryo oŋnkwiye miyotyet, omnye puryo kot kuponto piko tokol koyenet.
53003003	Ntene Mokoryontet kunye po manta, mosukukwilak onyoru swamet oŋnkuripok topon om wule mite Neto nye miyat.
53003004	Kikonec acek Mokoryontet cikasenakey akwek, kunyo cinket kule oyiyisyi akwek kupoyit manta, kunyo motosyikey ayiye ŋalek ce cemwowok acek.
53003005	Kante kuntoci Mokoryontet mukuleywek cikwok okoy onyoru cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet oko muytocinotet nye konu Kristo.
53003006	Mpo yeya, cemwowok acek cinkolonwok om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu kule, oripkey wule mite mpo yeya alake tokol ce puren ce puryo kot kuripe ŋalek co kicinet acek.
53003007	Omnye oŋnket akwek nkit topon kule misyini orupe kuyu wulo kiciytoy acek. Kipuryo kot ciku puren yo kicepontekey oko akwek.
53003008	Kicole omik tokol ce kikyome, kiciyisyi om swamet pet oko komoy sukuŋet mente cekonok akwek wuyin ake tokol.
53003009	Kiciy kuyunyoto nye kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kimocimuci kot cemwowok akwek kule apayec, ntene kiciy kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet akäsenec wule yunto soponto nyinyacek nye roke arup.
53003010	Kicemwowok ye kitocepontekey oko akwek kule, “Puryo kot kuroke kwomis ci ake tokol nyo puryo kot kumöce kule oyiyisye.’’
53003011	Cemwowu acek ŋalecato omnye kicelim kule mite piko alake ce puren ce puryo kot kwiye yisyet ake, ntene cukure cekto yisyonutek cepo piko alak.
53003012	Cemwocini acek oŋnkyisowu picoto om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo kule, misyini kopurto cekto soponto nye topon oŋnkwiy yisyonutek sukuŋet kunyor pesanik ce kolyekey.
53003013	Ntene akwek mpo yeya, monte cecosye ye mayiy yisyet nye topon.
53003014	Ye katay ci ake tokol nye mite wule omite akwek macäm ŋalecu mite parwani kocesilwok acek, okäs cico topon, oŋnkoyaste kwiyat nkit, sukuŋet kusornen neti nkit.
53003015	Ntene monte cesut nyoto akwek puniyo, asowu kuyu yeya.
53003016	Kunyo Mokoryontet nkit nyo konu kalyet kunye roke kukonok akwek kalyet om pesyosyek tokol, oŋnku om aret ake tokol. Opurtekey akwek Mokoryontet.
53003017	Ani nyo Paulo nkit om yewumwani nye kosile kasupoyisyoni. Kasupayak koromun. Osile ani kwak yunyitenyi. Yewumwani nyitenyi nyepo manta.
53003018	Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
54001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om kamukeywekap Yiyintet Kosopintenyo, oko Yesu Kristo nye kokenotet nyinyacek.
54001002	Osiluŋ Timosewo werimwani nyepo manta om koyenet. Kante kukoniŋ Yiyintet Papa oko Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo poypoyet oko cömisyet oko kalyet.
54001003	Amöce ani kule ipur nyi Efeso kuyu wulo kikyosomiŋ yo kyonomeni aweti Meketoniya. Mite piko alake wuloto ce mite kunete konetisyet nyepo mwiynan, kunyo misyini mwoci kwasta lakwar.
54001004	Mwoci picoto kwasta ŋalaletap tyonkocok oko koynok ce caŋ cepo mpo kuko ce moponto ye ŋete, omnye sutu ŋaleca tintenotet pate, ntene puryo kot kwiye yisyetap Yiyintet nye kiceyiyta, nyoto kukokenotet nye kicinket.
54001005	Komwowu ani ŋalecu sukuŋet kuŋetŋet kutosyi cömisyet nye cone wule mite mukuleyto nyetilil oko konketotet nye toku oko koyenotet nyepo manta.
54001006	Kupotyi piko alak aret om ŋalecu, kunyo kuwekyikey cekto aret nyepo ŋalalet nyepo perperyo.
54001007	Möce kule ciku konetik cepo ntarastinekap Yiyintet, ntene oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot konkete ŋalek cikwa nkit, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot kunkete tukuk ce ŋolole kuyunye nkete.
54001008	Cinket acek kule toponec ntarastinek, ye kokyiyisye topon kuyu wule cemoktoy.
54001009	Misyini cinket kule kipuryo kot cekon ntarastinek kupo piko ce toponec, ntene kicekon kupo piko ce yirye ntarastinek oko sokoranik oko co puryo kot konket Yiyintet, oko co ponto miyotyet, oko co puryo kot kuponto tini, oko co miyotec mukuleywekwa. Kicekon kupo piko co poköce mpo kwan nto mpo kamet, oko co porisyi,
54001010	oko co ponto sakwayanatet, oko co ponto soponto nye miyat, oko co core piko, oko co mwiynec oŋnkuŋolole ŋalek cepo mwiynan nto mpo kwiy kiy ake nye monomekey oko konetisyet nyepo manta.
54001011	Mitowune konetisyet wule mite lokoywek ce toponec ce kicekono, coto kuce lokoywek ce toponec ce kicekono ani, coto kuce lokoywek ce toponec cekwone wule mite nyewo oŋnku Yiyintet nyepo kupeyok.
54001012	Okostoy ani Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo nye kikono swamet om yisyemwani. Okostoy omnye kisuto opoyitu latik okoy kukweya oyici yisyet,
54001013	nka kot kyoŋolole kwapi oŋnkocup ani neto. Ntene kikalya Yiyintet omnye kipuryo kot oŋnketi ce kyoyiye yoto.
54001014	Yoto kukono ani Yesu poypoyenyi nyewo oŋnkukono koyenet oko cömisyet nye ceponte acek om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
54001015	Ŋolyontet nyepo manta nye roke cetac oŋnkyiyen kupoyit manta kunyi kule! Kico Yesu Kristo koret cokusop piko ce ponto miyotyet. Ani akenke om cekto nye miyat kupëlis.
54001016	Ŋolyontoni nye sukuŋet kukalya kurire ani Yiyintet, kumöce kule sukuŋet ayiku koporunotet nyepo tayta nyepo muytocinotet. Kimöce kule oyiku ani kantoyintet nye porcini piko co mokuyen om letut sukunyor cekto soponto nye mopoku.
54001017	Om wule mite neto Kinko nye mopoku, nye puryo kot kume, nye puryo kot kutoku, nye Yiyintet akenke nkit, kunye roke kopurune koyweyisyet oko woyinto okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
54001018	Lekwenyu Timosewo, kakoniŋ ntarastini, nömekey ŋalecu oko ŋorsyet nye kiceŋor keny nye nömiŋ nyi. Kunyo roke yiyisye ŋaleca kwek karik ce meporye poryet nye topon.
54001019	Rip koyenet nyeŋuŋ oko kasoteywek ce toku topon. Kutay piko alake morip ŋalek cepo kasoteywek cikwa, kunyo kukwaranta koyenet nyimwa.
54001020	Om picoto ku mpo Imenayo oko Alekisanta. Picoto kuce kwokoyte ani kupa wule mite Setanit sukuŋet wocinet kwasta komo kucupe cekto Yiyintet.
54002001	Kunyo ŋolyontet nyepo tayta; asome kule, somet oko kakastayet kuce möce osome okostoy Yiyintet kupo piko tokol.
54002002	Osomnci kinkonik oko poytoyik ce ponto kamukeywek, sukuŋet cipurte soponto nye topon, nye paypay, nyepo kalyet, nye ciyweye Yiyintet, oŋnkyeripkey om kiy ake tokol.
54002003	Topon koromun ye kaciy kuyunyoto omnye ŋerece Yiyintet Kosopintenyo,
54002004	nye möce kule cisop piko tokol oŋnkunket ŋalek tokol cepo manta.
54002005	Omnye mite Yiyintet akenke oŋnku mite cito akenke nye yomntos Yiyintet oko piko, nyoto ku Yesu Kristo,
54002006	nyo kikokoytokey kwolis sukusop piko tokol. Ŋolyontet nyoto kipor kupoyit manta om pesyet nyepo manta kule möce Yiyintet kule cisop piko tokol.
54002007	Kuyunyoto sukuŋet cekweya ani oyiku kiyokintet oŋnkoyiku konetintet nyepo Lamek nye mwoytoy lokoywek cepo koyenet nyepo manta. Omwowu ŋalek cepo manta nye moperperisyi.
54002008	Amöce ani kule kusome moronik om wulyo tokol, coto kuce kikokenekey Yiyintet kupoyit manta, oŋnkusome kuyitoy yewuniyekwa ce tililec nye puryo kot kuponto nerekwek nto mpo tintenotet.
54002009	Amöce mpo kule kuŋomekitu koruk oŋnkulackey om aret nye topon. Puryo kot kuroke kulet koruk putek nto kukoci yitik Sapunek nto karik ce piciyec, nto kulac sirok cepo pesan ce caŋ.
54002010	Ntene möce kwiye yisyet nye topon kuyu wule cemoktoy om wule mite koruk co yweye Yiyintet.
54002011	Misyini kunetkey koruk om sisyot oŋnkuyweyis om kiy ake tokol.
54002012	Puryo kot acömncini ani kunetis koruk nto mpo kule kupayta moronik. Misyini kusistos.
54002013	Omnye kicenyosyo citany Atam nto cikere Awa.
54002014	Ntene korket kunye kiciperper sukuŋet kwiri ntarastitap Yiyintet. Puryo kot ku Atam nye kiciperper sukuŋet kwiy miyotyet, ntene korket nye kiciperper sukuŋet kwiy miyotyet.
54002015	Ntene mocisop korko omnye koyi lekok. Ye komuytoci kurip topon koyenet oko cömisyet oko tililinto, oŋnkuripkey.
54003001	Ŋolyontet nyepo manta kunyi kule, ye kamac cito kule oyiku kantoyintet kosintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet, kukamac yisyet nyetilil nye topon.
54003002	Misyini Kantoyintet kosintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet kwek cito nye moponto lelis, Misyini kuponto korket akenke, oŋnku cito nye paypay nye ripekey, oŋnkuponto tolosyet. Misyini kutoroce kuŋerekyini toyek ce mocinket kukwa kanyi, oŋnkuponto ŋomnonet nye muce kunetis.
54003003	Puryo kot kuroke kwek pokityo, nto pororin, ntene ci nye siken oŋnkuponto tolosyet nye puryo kot kucorokyini pesan.
54003004	Misyini kwek cito nye muce kurip topon piko cepo kanyi oŋnkunet lekokyi kuyweyis om aret ake tokol.
54003005	Omnye ye puryo kot konket cito kurip piko cepo kanyi nkit, komuce kulene kot kurip piko cepo Yiyintet?
54003006	Puryo kot kumisyini kwek ci nye kotokowute koyenet. Omnye muce kusilekey kusutkey torot okoy kosuci cemutyi musankut kuyu wulo kicemutyini setani nyewo nyepo oyik.
54003007	Misyini kwek ci nye yweye piko tokol cepo saŋ. Sukuŋet mente kot cenyil oŋnkosuci musatit nyepo setani nyewo nyepo oyik.
54003008	Piko ce yiyisyi kukolyoy pikap Yiyintet kuce misyini kwek piko ce ponto kopurto nyepo soponto nye topon nyepo manta ce cikenekey. Puryo kot kumisyini kuye komek ce caŋ, nto moroŋis cepo pesan.
54003009	Misyini kukwil cekto topon koyenet nyepo manta nye kicipor oŋnkuponto ŋomnonet nye toku.
54003010	Misyini cenyosye cesyem cekto kunyo, nteye kacekäs kule yeme, yoto kuye cikoci kwiyis.
54003011	Misyini kuponto mpo korukwa kopurto nyepo soponto nye topon om koyenet om kiy ake tokol.
54003012	Misyini kuponto kokolyoyintet korket akenke, oŋnkomuce kurip lekokyi oko piko cepo kanyi.
54003013	Omnye piko co yiye topon yisyet nyepo kokolyoyisyet kuce muce cekto nkit kunyor cinket topon, oŋnkomuc kuŋalale om nyikanat ŋalek ce nöme koyenet nyimwa nye ponto om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
54003014	Ye amite osiluŋ ani parwani, asoti kule mosaco lakwar okoy cakäsiŋ.
54003015	Ntene ye kotepe kot olilennkey, mosukumwowuŋ parwani wule misyini cipurte acek nkit piko cepo kaytap Yiyintet, coto kuce pikap Yiyintet nye sopot oŋnku tolocta nye tiye ŋalek cepo manta.
54003016	Puryo ci nye muce kutay kule woyec koromun ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo tininyo ce mwowu kule: “Kicipor neto kuponto porto nyepo cito, Kipor Muyet Nyetilil kule po manta neto. Kikäs malaykanik neto, Kicemwayte ŋalekyi wule mite piko cepo yemosyek tokol, Kiciyen neto om koret tokol, kunyo, kicesut kuwo torot om woyinto.’’
54004001	Mwowu Muyet Nyetilil kutok topon kule, om pesyosyek ce kwoni, mosukuwirta piko alake koyenet, mosukucäm oyik cepo mwiynanet ake konetisyet nyepo oyik ce miyotec.
54004002	Konetisyet nyoto kunye cone wule mite piko ce mwiynot ce perperisyi. Piko coto kuce kipok kasoteywek cikwa kuyunye kicepele karin nye layat.
54004003	Netisyi pico kumwoy kule puryo kot kuroke cimütis koruk, nto kule kyam omik alak, oŋnkurok yec kitany Yiyintet omicoto kule sukuŋet kyome om letut ye kacesomnci kukostoyis piko co kikoyen, oŋnkunket cepo manta.
54004004	Omnye topon kiy ake tokol nye kitany Yiyintet, momite kiy nye roke cetay, ye kacesomnci kupeyok oŋnkyam om kakastayet.
54004005	Omnye ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oko ŋalek ce kocesomncine kuce wece kutililit kiyoto.
54004006	Ye kenet nyi ŋalecu mpo yeya, kuye meseyeku kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo nye topon, oŋnku yoto ye poyekey nyi nkit ŋalek cepo koyenet oko konetisyet nyepo manta nyo kwerip nyito.
54004007	Möce tay sanekey wule mite piko co menket Yiyintet, oko tyonkocok cepo perperyo co puryo kot kurok ceŋalale. Tosyikey nkit netkey soponto nyepo Yiyintet.
54004008	Omnye ponto latik alak ye kacerip porto, ntene kuponto latik ce caŋ ye kocerip tinit nyepo manta, omnye kurtoy coto soponto nyepo pesyosyecu oko soponto nye mosukuco letut.
54004009	Po manta ŋolyontono, nye roke cecäm kupoyit manta.
54004010	Kuyunyoto omne sukuŋet cetitir acek kyiyisye swamet, omnye kicikenekey Yiyintet nye sopot nye kosopintet nyepo piko tokol co kikoyen.
54004011	Polyi oŋnkinet ŋalecu.
54004012	Mente ayaste kot kunyiliŋ ci ake tokol omnye teyiku miniŋ, ntene porci piko co kikoyen kukäseniŋ om ŋalalet nyeŋuŋ oko kopurto nyeŋuŋ, oko cömisyet nyeŋuŋ, oko koyenet nyeŋuŋ oko om tililinto nyeŋuŋ.
54004013	Möce syem koromun weti sumanet nyepo piko tokol nyo cesumone silutekap Yiyintet, oko mwaytayet nyepo lokoywek oko konetisyet okoy opunu ani.
54004014	Mente kot ayaste kupeyok co ponte nyi co kicekoniŋ ye kiŋolole workoyik oŋnkukemeriŋ poyik yewuniyekwa.
54004015	Möce yeyisye yisyonutek cutecu oŋnkikwilakisye nyi nkit sukuŋet kukäs ci tokol yisyet nyeŋuŋ nye tosyinikey.
54004016	Ripkey nyi nkit oŋnkirip konetisyet nyeŋuŋ. Tosyikey iyiy ŋalecutecu, omnye ye keyiy, mesesopkey nyi nkit oko piko co lime ŋalekuk.
54005001	Mente kot polyi poyo nyewo, ntene ŋolyolyi kuyu Papaŋuŋ. Sute oyiperik oyoyecine kuyu mpo yeyeŋuŋ.
54005002	Sute cepyosok cewoyec kuyu mpo komet, sut tipik kuyu mpo cekwomet om mukuleyto nye tilil.
54005003	Ywey koruk co musukik, coto kuce musukik cepo manta.
54005004	Ye ponto korko nye musuk lekok nto mucokoronikyi, kumoce kunetkey kunyo kunket yisyonutek cepo tinimwa om wule mite mpo kwan oko mpo kamet. Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye kwici cekto yisyet mpo kwan oko mpo kamet oko mpo kukomwa oko mpo kokomwa. Omnye ŋalek ceyucoto kuce ŋerece Yiyintet.
54005005	Korko nye musuk nyepo manta kunye moponto ci nye kolyoy, nye kikokenekey oŋnkutosyinikey kusome Yiyintet kokolyoyisyet pet oko komoy.
54005006	Ntene korko nye musuk nye weti wule mite ŋerekwek kunye kime nyo kusope.
54005007	Möce koci cekto ntarastini, sukuŋet komo kuponto lelis.
54005008	Ntene ye puryo kot kuripe cito piko tilyonutekyi, nto nye puryo kot kuripe piko cepo kanyi, kuporukey kule katay cito nyoto koyenet oŋnkowurta cito nyoto kusir cito nye puryo kot kuyen.
54005009	Mente osil kaynetap musuk korko nye tokuminiŋ okoy ye kiyosit nye ponto kenyisyek tomonwokik lö, oŋnku nye kikomüt santet akenke pate.
54005010	Misyini ku musuk nye kiciyweye om yisyonutekyi ce toponec, nye kinet lekokyi topon, nye kitoroce toyek, nye kiwune kerenkokap pikap Yiyintet, nye kikolyoy ce ponto wuyinwek, oŋnkunye kikokoytokey kwiye yisyonutek tokol ce toponec.
54005011	Mente osil koynokap koruk musukik ce tokuminkec, omnye ye kotepe kot kucorok porwonik cikwa kumac kule cimütec yec, yoto kuye kwasta nye komo kurupe Kristo,
54005012	kuye kalel kwiri kawalemwa nye kipo tay om wule mite Kristo.
54005013	Ŋalek alak kucu kule, netekey cekto kupuren kowurta poroyinwek cikwa, kupesetoti kupunte korin kuŋololote ŋomso pate, oko ŋalek cepo porwonik cikwa, oŋnkuŋalale ŋalek ce meroke kuŋalale.
54005014	Amöce ani kule cimüt koruk musukik ce tokuminkec, sukuyi lekok oŋnkurip korikwa, sukuŋet mente kukoci punikyacek poroyinto kot kuŋalalenec kwapi.
54005015	Omnye kuweckey keny musukik alake oŋnkurup Setanit.
54005016	Ntene ye ponto korket nye kikoyen koruk ce musukik ce tilyonutekyi ce mite konyi, kuroke kurip neto cekto, puryo kot kuroke kwosyi nyikisinto pikap Yiyintet, sukuŋet co kurip musukik ce mite kwicek nkit ce moponto ci nye mokurip.
54005017	Misyini poyik co yiye yisyet nye topon kuyu poyik kunyor musyaret aret oyeny, nto kupëlis poyik ce titire kumwoytoti lokoywek oŋnkunetis.
