54005018	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet “Mente arat yeyito kutit ye mite kuwore nkanuk’’. Oŋnkumwoy yec kule, “Misyini cito nye yiyisyi kunyor musyaret.’’
54005019	Mente kot acäm lelis nye nöme pontet ake tokol okoy ye komwoy piko ayenku nto somok kule lelat.
54005020	Polyi reny piko tokol ce yiye miyotyet om taytap piko tokol sukuŋet kunyokoritu piko cut alake.
54005021	Komwowuŋ oyomiseniŋ om taytap Yiyintet oko Yesu Kristo oko Malaykanik ce tililec kule, misyini rip ntarastinecu nye puryo kot yele kereryantet ake, ntene yiye yoyeci pate.
54005022	Mente kot osorci lakwar kot kemer ci ake tokol yewuniyekuk kupo yisyetap Yiyintet. Mente kot wutekey miyotyonik cepo piko alak, ripkey tililitu.
54005023	Mente taye peko nkit, ntene iye nfinyonik tukusic sukuŋet kukalyiŋ moyet oko porto nye mnyoni kwak okokoy.
54005024	Toku nye cimuce cekäs topon miyotyonik cepo piko alak, kunyo sute miyotyonicoto cekto wule mite musankut, ntene mosukutok cekäs miyotyonik cepo piko alak om letut.
54005025	Om aret nye yunyoto kuye ceköse kutok topon yisyonutek ce toponec, nka kot mpo ce puryo kot kutoku topon, kupuryo kot kuwuŋotos.
54006001	Misyini mutworik tokol kukäs kule roke kuywey mokorenik cikwa, sukuŋet komo kuŋolole ci ake tokol kwapi kaynetap Yiyintet oko konetisyet nyinyacek.
54006002	Mutworik co kikoyen mokorenik cikwa kuce puryo kot kuroke kunyilsyo meyweyis kumwoy kule omnye mpo yeya cut, ntene möce kwiyis kunyol topon, omnye mokorenik co mokunyor latik om yisyet nye yiye cekto kuce mpo yeya mpecek ce cöme cekto. Misyini net ŋalale yisyonutekyu.
54006003	Ci ake tokol nye nete konetisyet ake tokol nye pciyat oŋnkupuryo kot kucöme ŋalek cepo Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo oko konetisyet nyepo tininyo.
54006004	Kunye ponto cito nyoto silotet nyewo koromun, oŋnkupuryo kot konket kiy. Ponto corokyinotet nye miyat nyepo tintenotet oko wokutyet nye nöme ŋalek pate. Kunyo sutu ŋaleca corokyinotet oko wokutyet oko ŋomset oko kasoteywek ce miyotec;
54006005	oko tintenotet nyepo okokoy nye moponto ye ŋete nyo cone wule mite piko co kowuryo kasoteywek cikwa, ce kimokuponto ŋalek cepo manta. Sote cekto kule tinit kunye aret nye cenyorune mokoryontit.
54006006	Kupoyit manta, sutyini tinit cito kwek mokoryo koromun, ye kayem neto tukuk ce ponto.
54006007	Omnye kipuryo kot cekwante acek kiy koret, kunyo puryo kot cepetoy kitake!
54006008	Ye ceponte omik oko sirok kuroke kuyemec coto.
54006009	Ntene piko co möce kule ce mekoren kuce sucini syemutok oŋnkunäm musatit nyepo cerokyinotet nye miyat nyepo perperyet ce cute cekto okoy kupa wule mite arantayet.
54006010	Omnye corokyinotet nyepo pesan ku wule lukune miyotyonik cepo wok tokol. Kusyem piko alake kule cenyoru pesanik okoy kumosokis om aret nyepo koyenet, kunyo kokowurta cek mukuleywekwa om kasoteywekwa ce caŋ ce miyotec.
54006011	Ntene nyi nyo yiku citap Yiyintet, kunye möce ripkey om wule mite ŋalecato tokol, syem tyikyi pate toponiyet, poyitu Yiyintet, nye ponte koyenet oko cömisyet oko muytocinotet oko sikenotet.
54006012	Syem porye poryet nye topon nyepo koyenet, rip kwil koromun soponto nye mopoku nyo kicekurciŋ yo kiwolikey renynkey om tayatap piko ce caŋ.
54006013	Komwowuŋ om tayatap Yiyintet nyo kocini tukuk tokol soponto, oko taytap Yesu Kristo nyo kiwalkey kupor topon koyenenyi om taytap Pontio Pilato kule,
54006014	Ywey ntarastinek, oŋnkirip tililitu om koyenet nye meponte lelis, okoy Pesyet nye cone Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
54006015	Mosukupor Yiyintet yec Yesu Kristo om pesyenyi nyepo manta. Yiyintet nyoto kunye cikostoy oŋnku poytoyintet nkit, nyepo kinkonik, oŋnku poytoyintet nyepo mokorenik.
54006016	Neto nkit kunye sopot okokoy, mitowune wule mite lakweyet nye puryo kot kurice ci ake tokol. Puryo ci kenyis nye kikäs neto. Kopurune wule mite neto koyweyisyet ake poytoyisyet nyewo okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
54006017	Mwoci sowu piko co mokoren ce ponto tukuk cepo koret mente kusilkey, mente kukenekey tukuk cepo mokoryontinek, ntene kukenekey Yiyintet nyo konec acek tukuk tokol sukuŋet kuŋerecec.
54006018	Mwoci kwiy ŋalek ce toponec, oŋnkumokoren kwiy yisyet nye topon, oŋnkwicin topon oko piko alak tokol.
54006019	Om aret nye yunyoto kuye sukuŋet kukonore torot mokoryontit nye kwilat nyepo pesyosyek cepo tay oŋnkomuc kunyor soponto nyepo manta nye cemöce.
54006020	Arenyo Timosewo, rip kiy ake tokol nye kicekoniŋ. Ripkey ŋalalet nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet oko tintenotet nyepo mwiynanet nye kure piko alake kule ŋomnon.
54006021	Sutekey piko alake kule ceponte, kunyo kupotyi picoto aret nyepo koyenet. Opurte akwek tokol poypoyet.
55001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kicäm Yiyintet kwek kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo, nye kiciyok cokumwoy ŋalek ce nöme soponto nyo kicekurto, nyoto kunye ceponte acek om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
55001002	Osiluŋ werimwani camanet Timosewo. Kante kukoniŋ Yiyintet Papa oko Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo poypoyet oko cömisyet oko kalyet.
55001003	Okostoy ani Yiyintet nye ayicini yisyet kupoyit manta kuyu wule kikwiytoy mpo kukomwani. Okostoy ye amite asotiŋ nyi okokoy ye osome pet oko komoy.
55001004	Tasoti ani lokik, kunyo amöce koromun kule akäsiŋ sukuŋet aŋerec kuyema.
55001005	Tasoti koyeneŋuŋ nyepo mukuleyto orit. Koyenet nyoto kunye ponto mpo kokoŋuŋ Loyis oŋnkuponto mpo komet Ewunike.
55001006	Kunyo kosotuŋ ani nyi kule rip topon kokotutek co kikoniŋ Yiyintet yo kyokemeriŋ yewuniyekwani.
55001007	Omnye kipuryo kot kukonec Yiyintet mukuleyto nyepo nyekernan, ntene kikonec swamet, oko cömisyet oko ripetapkey.
55001008	Kunyo mente alilan ye memwayte ŋalekap Mokoryontet, mente mpo alilan om wule amite ani nyi oyiku mopusyontenyi. Taŋany toŋoŋutek om swametap Yiyintet kupo toponiyetap lokoywek ce toponec.
55001009	Kisopec Yiyintet oŋnkukurec ciku pikyi, nye puryo kot kupo tukuk ce kikyiy acek, ntene om cömisenyi nkit oko poypoyet. Kikonec poypoyet nyoto ikye towunot kupunte koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
55001010	Kunyo kuciporwec yawut omnye kico kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo. Kiker neto swamet nyepo met. Kunyo kikopor soponto nye mopoku kupunte lokoywek ce toponec.
55001011	Kikweya ani Yiyintet oyiku kiyokintet oŋnku konetintet nye amwocini piko lokoywek ce toponec.
55001012	Kuyunyoto omne sukuŋet kunyi amite yawut otoŋonyi kuyunyitenyi. Ntene moliloni, omnye oŋnketi kupoyit manta cito nye kyoyen, oŋnkonket kule muce kurip neto topon kito nye kikonorwo okoy pesyonoto.
55001013	Rip topon ŋalek cepo manta co kyanetiŋ ani nyi sukuŋet rip oŋnkipurte koyenet oko cömisyet nye ceponte acek om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
55001014	Rip topon cepo latik co kicekoniŋ om swametap Muyet Nyetilil nye mitowune wule cemite acek.
55001015	Nketi nyi kule kimweyeno ani ci tokol om koretap Asia, om coto ku mpo Pukelo oko Eromokene.
55001016	Roke kukalya Yiyintet piko cepo kotap Onesiporo, omnye kiŋerec kutitiro ani aret ce caŋ. Kipuryo kot kunömnci kalilan kule oyiku ani mopusyo.
55001017	Pakenke yu kowo kupun neto Rom, yoto kuceny wule amite okoy kunyorwo.
55001018	Nketi topon yisyonutek ce caŋ ce kikwiy neto om Efeso. Roke kukoci Mokoryontet neto poypoyenyi nkit om pesyonoto po letut.
55002001	Nyi werimwani, poyitu swama om poypoyet nye cone wule mite koyenotet nyepo Yesu Kristo.
55002002	Näm ŋalek ce kilim nyi oneti ani om taytap piko ce caŋ cekikäs, oŋnkikoci ŋalecato kunäm oŋnkurip piko co kenekey nyi cekto, ce muce kunet mpo piko alak.
55002003	Mpenyi, taŋany toŋoŋutek cekuk kuyu sikorintetap Kristo nye topon.
55002004	Sikorintet nye mite poryet kunye puryo kot kucöme kowutekey yisyonutek cepo piko cepo ka omnye tyikyini kule oyiyisye topon saŋerec nyewo nyenyi.
55002005	Puryo ci nye orerene ŋweyek nye muce kot kupëlis kunyor kokotutyet nye cipëlisye ye puryo kot kurip ntarastinek cepo ŋweyek.
55002006	Kopotintet nye yiyisyi om swamet kunye roke kunyosyo kunyor omik ce kacekis cepo tayta.
55002007	Möce sot ŋalecu omwowuŋ ani, omnye mosukukalyiŋ Mokoryontet okoy nket ŋalek tokol.
55002008	Sot Yesu Kristo nye kimocokeretap Tauti kunye kiciŋet kotutune met, kuce lokoywek ce toponec coto ce amwoytoy ani.
55002009	Otoŋonyi omnye amwoytoy lokoywek coto toponec, kunyo oyiku mpo ratat pinkonok kuyu corin. Ntene puryo kot kuratat pinkonok ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
55002010	Omuytocini ani kiy ake tokol kupo toponiyetap piko kweyanik cepo Yiyintet, sukuŋet kunyor mpecek soponto nye mitowune wule mite Yesu Kristo wanak oko woyinto nye mopoku.
55002011	Manta koromun ŋalecu mwowu kule: “Ye kicepoku acek oko neto, mosicesopce mpo oko neto.
55002012	Ye kocetosyikey cemuytoci, kuye mosicepoytoyisye oko neto, Ye kacetay acek neto, mosukutayec acek mpo neto.
55002013	Ye puryo kot ciyeni acek, ntene kukwilat neto okokoy. Omnye memuce kot kutaykey neto nkit.’’
55002014	Sotyi pikuk ŋalecu, oŋnkisowu cekto koromun om taytap Yiyintet, mente kuwokut kutintentyin om ŋal ce muponto latik ce puryo kot kusutu toponiyet ntene wurtoy pate piko ce lime.
55002015	Syem koromun porukey om taytap Yiyintet yiku ci nye ce cömntoy kuyu cito nye puryo kot kolilone om yisyenyi. Ntene nye nete kutok topon ŋolyontetap Yiyintet nyepo manta.
55002016	Sanekey koromun ŋalalet nyepo perperyo nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet, nye kwetyini piko wule low om wule mite Yiyintet.
55002017	Konetisyet nyoto kunye kerkey mwayet nye kiyenyakay nye mite kwome panyek. Om picoto oyeny ce netisyi ku Umenayo oko Pileto.
55002018	Kimosokis kutay aret nyepo manta, kunyo wurtoy cek koyenet nyepo piko alak ce kikoyen kumwowu kule kipunto keny kotutunetap met nyinyacek.
55002019	Ntene mocetwoye cetyem tolocta nye kipolyi Yiyintet ŋony. Nto ŋalek ce kicesil tolocta kucu kule: “Nkete Mokoryontet piko ceci, kunyo ci ake tokol nye mwowu kule opoye Yiyintet, kunye misyini kwasta miyotyet.’’
55002020	Mite koto nyewo terokok saninek oko pokulinek cepo wok tokol, kicitanye alak karik cepo pesanik, citanye alak sapunek, citanye alak ketik, citanye alak menonik. Ponto alake latik koromun, kupuryo kot kuponto alake.
55002021	Ye kasatkey citake kutililit om wule mite tukucutecu miyotec kuye mosukwek nyoto terek nyepo latik om wule mite mokoryontenyi, nye kicitapan kutililit kupoyit Yiyintet oŋnkyiyta kwiy yisyo tokol nye topon.
55002022	Yaste corokyinotet nyeŋuŋ nye kipo lekwantit, tyikyi rip ŋalek cepo manta oko koyenet oko cömisyet oko kalyet pontekey wanak oko piko ce kure kaynetap Mokoryontet om mukuleywekwa ce tililec wulin po orit.
55002023	Sanekey tintenotet nyepo perperyo nye puryo ŋomnon, nketi nyi kule sutu coto wokutyet.
55002024	Puryo kot kumisyini kwek pororin cito nye mutworintetap Mokoryontet, möce kwek ci nye tala om wule mite piko tokol, oŋnku konetintet nye topon nye muytoy,
55002025	nye paypay ye mite kukete piko co tintentyintos oko neto om poypoyet, omnye muce kukoci Yiyintet poroyinto kurenynkey picoto oŋnkunket ŋalek cepo manta.
55002026	Yoto kuye mosukusow cekto om kasoteywekwa oŋnkucilile musatit nyepo Setani nyewo nyepo oyik nye kinäm oŋnkukoci kurup kuyu wule moktoy neto.
55003001	Möce nketi nyi ŋalecu! Kule mite wuyinto om pesyosyek cepo letut.
55003002	Mosukwek piko soyi, cemoroŋis cesilekey, oŋnkuperperis, mosukucup Yiyintet, ce meyweye poyik co kiye cekto, ce puryo kot kuŋerece, ce puryo kusote Yiyintet,
55003003	Ce puryo kot kukolyoyisyi, ce kawot, ce ŋomnsi, ce pararot, ce nyekerec, ce senkere ce toponec.
55003004	Ce ŋomntoyisyi, ce silekey koromun, mosukucäm ŋerekwek kupël Yiyintet.
55003005	Mosukurip tinit wulo po saŋ, ntene oŋnkutay swamet nyenyi. Asanekey koromun picoto.
55003006	Peti picoto alake wokowut korin oŋnkupayta koruk co moponto swamet, ce kinyikisyi miyotyonik cepo leliswekwa oŋnkupayta corokyinotet tokol.
55003007	Korucoto kuce syeme okokoy kule cinetkey ntene puryo kot kunkete ŋalek cepo manta.
55003008	Kuyu wule kitoyis Yane oko Yampure kutay Moses. Kunyo toye mpo picutecu ŋalek cepo manta kuyunyoto. Kiwuryo kasoteywek cepo picutecu oko koyenet nye moyeme.
55003009	Ntene puryo kot kupuntoy cekto wule low, mosukonket piko tokol perperyemwa kuyu wule kiyunto pico ayenku Yane oko Yampure.
55003010	Ntene kwerup nyi konetisyet nyimwani oko kopurto nyimwani, oko kito nye otyikyini ani, om soponto, oko muytocinotet nyimwani, oko cömisyet nyimwani, oko titirotet nyimwani,
55003011	oko toŋoŋutek cikwani, oko nyalilya nyimwani. Nketi nyi tukuk tokol ce kikwiyokis om wule omite ani om Antiyok oko Ikoniyom oko Listira. Toŋoŋutek cewoyec ce cotitir omuytoci, ntene kukalya Mokoryontet acone wule mite coto tokol.
55003012	Mosicitaŋany kupoyit manta piko tokol co möce kule cipurte kopurto nyepo Yiyintet om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
55003013	Ntene mosukutosyi kuwuryo koromun piko ce miyotec oko koperperik. Mosukuperperis, oŋnkuperperkey cekto nkit.
55003014	Ntene tosyikey nyi yiy ŋalek cepo manta co kicinetiŋ oŋnkwikwil cömisyet.
55003015	Nketi nyi kule silutekap Yiyintet ce muce kukoniŋ ŋomnonet nye sutuŋ kosopotot om koyenet nye ponte om Yesu Kristo.
55003016	Silutek ce kicesil kuce kintoci Yiyintet cesil tokol, kunyo ponto latik koromun ye kocinetisye kwek ŋalek cepo manta, oko ye cerenye co kimosokis, oko ye kacesate leliswek oko ye kocinetisye kopurto nye topon.
55003017	Sukuŋet kukwilakay kunetkey citap Yiyintet okoy kuyem kwiy topon yisyo ake tokol nye topon.
55004001	Kasowuŋ ani om taytap Yiyintet oko taytap Yesu Kristo nye mosukumutyi musankut piko tokol ce kipok oko ce ceptos, oko omnye mosukuco poytoyisyenyi, omwowuŋ kule.
55004002	Mwayte ŋolyontet, syem mwayte ye toponec pesyosyek nto mpo ye miyotec, ketu, reny, titir, netisye om muytocinotet.
55004003	Omnye mosukupunto pesyosyek ce memuce kot kulimnta piko konetisyet nyepo manta, ntene mosukurup corokyinotet nye nyimwa nkit, oŋnkoruruc konetik cikwa nkit ce mosukumwoci ŋalek ce lime yitik cikwa nkit.
55004004	Mosukutoyis nye komo kulime ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkulim ceptyonkocok cepo mwiynanet pate.
55004005	Ntene misyini ripkey nyi nkit om aret ake tokol, yiy yitite yisyeŋuŋ kuyu mutworintetap Mokoryontet.
55004006	Omnye karik cikoyito ani oyiku korosyontet, kopunto pesyet nyimwani nye opokokte soponto nyi.
55004007	Kwoporye poryet nye topon, kunyo kwawany kamwenet, Kworip koyenet.
55004008	Kunyo konyo ani yawut kutwet nye kwopëlisye, nyoto kunye kutwet nyepo tililinto nye mosukukono Mokoryontet, nye ketintet nyepo manta om pesyonoto. Puryo kot kukono ani nkit, ntene kocini mpo piko tokol co koŋisyi om koyenet ye mokucone neto.
55004009	Syem sorukey co lakwar okoy wuli amite ani.
55004010	Omnye kukusuci Tema ŋerekwek cepo koret, kunye kutaya kunomen kuwo Sesolonika. Kuwo Kresene Kalatiya, kuwe Tito Talmatia.
55004011	Opontekey ani pate oko Luka. Kweru okwantekey Marko omnye ponto latik mokukalya ani yisyet.
55004012	Kwoyokte Tekikos kuwo Efeso.
55004013	Ye keco, sutwo kotit nye kyopokokyi Krapo om Troa. Sutu mpo kitapunek, ntene kupëlis kitapunek cepo syerok.
55004014	Kokwiwo ani kumiyat koromun Alekisanta kitoŋintetap karik, mosukuyokyi Yiyintet nkit om ŋalek ce kikwiwo.
55004015	Möce ripkey wule mite neto, omnye kitintentyi om swamet ŋalek ce kicemwowu acek.
55004016	Puryo ci mpo akenke nye kikalya ani ye kyoŋololi oyetekey nyepo tayta, kitaya ci tokol. Puryo kot kurok kuyityi Yiyintet cekto lelisto nyoto.
55004017	Ntene kiripo ani Mokoryontet kukono swamet okoy amuc kot aŋalale ŋolyontet nye yeme kulim Lamek tokol, cesoruneno metap tilisyet.
55004018	Mosukusorwo ani Yiyintet om wule mite miyotyet ake tokol oŋnkukwero topon okoy wule mite poytoyisyenyi nye mite torot. Kunyo kopurune woyinto wule mite neto okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
55004019	Osupoywo ani Prisika oko Akwila oko pikap kotap Onesiporo.
55004020	Kipur Erasto Korinso, kunyo kyopokokyi Trofimo Melito omnye kimnyone.
55004021	Syem sorukey co lakwar kutompo kot kukatitit koret. Kesupayak Epulo oko Pute oko Lina oko Klautiya oko mpo yeya alak tokol.
55004022	Kopurune Mokoryontet mukuleyŋuŋ. Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Yiyintet.
56001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye mutworintetap Yiyintet oŋnku kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Kicekweya ani oŋnkyiyokto wakalye otosyi koyenet nyepo pikap Yiyintet kweyanik oŋnkanet cekto kunket ŋalek cepo manta cepo tininyo,
56001002	nye kokenotet nyepo soponto nye mopoku. Kikurto Yiyintet soponto nyitenyi ikye keny om towunot; kunyo puryo kot kuperperisyi.
56001003	Oŋnkuŋoŋwec ŋolyontoni om pesyet nye yeme. Kicekono ani kule mwayte ŋolyontoni, kunyo omwowu kuyu wulo kimwowo Yiyintet kosopintenyo.
56001004	Osiluŋ ani nyi Tito werimwani nyepo manta om koyenet nye ceponte. Kante kukoniŋ nyi Yiyintet Papa oko Yesu Kristo kosopintenyo poypoyet oko kalyet.
56001005	Kyopokokyiŋ ani nyi Kurete kule sukuŋet sat yisyet nye kikiŋet nye kimöce kule takyiy om wuloto. Kyomwowuŋ yoto kule kwey poyik ce kentoci pikap Yiyintet om moŋet ake tokol.
56001006	Pontet nye cekweye kunye moponto lelis ake tokol. Misyini kuponto korket akenke pate, oŋnkukikoyen lekokyi ce puryo kot kusokaran nto ce kimosokis.
56001007	Kosintet kunye kantoyintet nye ripe piko cepo Yiyintet, kunyo puryo kot kuroke kuponto lelis, puryo kot kumisyini ku ci nye silekey koromun, nto nye nyeru lakwar, nto pororin, nto nye moroŋya nyepo pesanik.
56001008	Misyini kwek ci nye poyisyi oŋnkucome tukuk ce toponec. Misyini kwek cito nye ripekey nkit, nye siken, nye paypay oŋnkumuytoy.
56001009	Misyini kwek cito nye kwilat om lokoywek ce toponec; nye cikenekey oŋnkurupe konetisyet nyinyacek. Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye mosukotitir neto piko alak om konetisyet nyepo manta, oŋnkupor ŋolyontet nye masat om wule mite piko co toye ŋolyontonoto.
56001010	Omnye mite piko ce caŋ ce mosotin ce perpere piko alak om ŋalekwa cepo perpereryo, nto piko ce pëlisyi om koperperisyonoto ku piko co kuweckey kukwane tinitap Yutayek.
56001011	Roke cekerekta ŋalekwa, omnye mite cekto kumose piko cepo kestonik tokol kunete konetisyet nye puryo kot kuroke cinet, omnye möce kule cenyoru pesanik om aret nyepo sornon.
56001012	Kimwey akenke om picoto, nyoto kunye sute cekto kule workoyontemwa, kimwoy kule, “Pikap Kurete kuce kaperperot, cepo kwak, tyoŋin ce miyotec, oŋnkucemoyetis ce puren.’’
56001013	Kimwoy neto cito nyoto ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo misyini polyi nyi cekto koromun sukuŋet kunyor koyenet nyepo manta,
56001014	nye komo kurupe cekto tyonkocok cepo Yutayek oko ntarastinek cepo piko co kitay ŋalek cepo manta.
56001015	Tilil kiy ake tokol om wule mite piko co tililec kwicek nkit, ntene puryo kiy nye tilil om wule mite piko co kiwuryo oŋnkupuryo kot kucömisyi, omnye kiciwurta ŋomnonet oko kasoteywek cikwa.
56001016	Sutakey cekto kule cinket Yiyintet, oŋnkurok kutoye Yiyintet om yisyonutekwa ce yiye. Kisenkeris oŋnkutoyis nye puryo kot kuyeme kwiy kiy nye topon.
56002001	Möce kule net nyi ŋalek ce rupe konetisyet nyepo manta.
56002002	Mwoci poyik kutoloyitu oŋnkuŋomekitu oŋnkuripkey ce ponto koyenet nye kwilat, oko cömisyet oko muytocinotet.
56002003	Mwoci mpo cepyosok kopurto soponto nyetilil. Puryo kumisyini kot kwek semsemot nto mpo kwek pokitis. Misyini kunetis cek konetisyet nyepo ŋalek cepo manta ce toponec,
56002004	sukuŋet koruk ce minkec kucäm sanikwa oko lekok,
56002005	oŋnkuripkey kutililitu oŋnkwek koruk ce toponec om korikwa ce yweye sanikwa. Sukuŋet komokuŋolole kwapi ci ake tokol lokoywek cepo Yiyintet.
56002006	Oŋnkimwoci mpo Oyiperik kuripkey kuyunyoto.
56002007	Möce ripkey mpenyi nkit sukuŋet poru yisyonutek ce toponec om kiy ake tokol nye yiye. Misyini netisye kupoyit manta oŋnkiyiyisye swama.
56002008	Yiyisye ŋalek ce toku cepo manta ce memuce kot kunyil kutay citake, sukuŋet kusornen punik cekuk omnye moponto ŋolyo nye miyat nye mokuŋalalenec acek.
56002009	Möce kuywey mutworik mokorenikwa, oŋnkuŋerec om kiy ake tokol, nye puryo kot kutintentos.
56002010	Mpo kucor kiy ake tokol nyepo mokorenikwa. Ntene misyini kupor kule ciku toponec okokoy oŋnkyiye yisyet nye kacemwowec, sukuŋet kusut kakastayet om wule mite konetisyetap Yiyintet kosopintenyo om kiy ake tokol nye yiye.
56002011	Omnye kiceŋany kutok poypoyetap Yiyintet kosut kosopotet om wule mite piko.
56002012	Netec kuporwec acek kupeyok coto kule kyaste soponto nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet oko corokyinotet nyepo koret. Oŋnkyeripkey cipurte soponto nye topon nye rotat nye cöme Yiyintet;
56002013	ye ce mite cikeni pesyet nyepo kupeyok ce cemöce koromun. Pesyet nyoto kunye pesyet nye mosukutok woyinto nyewo nyepo Yiyintenyo oŋnkukosopintet Yesu Kristo.
56002014	Kikonnkey neto nkit cokusorwec acek om wule mite miyotyonik alak tokol, oŋnkusatec cetililitu oŋnkuwecec ciku pikyi, oŋnkukonec kyiy yisyonutek ce toponec.
56002015	Net nyi cekto ŋalecu, oŋnkiyiyisye kamukeywek tokol ye mite titiri, oŋnkipolyi piko co lime ŋalek cekuk. Mente kot kunyiliŋ ci ake tokol.
56003001	Möce sowu pikuk kuywey poytoyik oko piko co ponto kamukeywek, oŋnkulimnci oŋnkuyiytakey kwiy yisyo ake tokol nye topon.
56003002	Mwoci mente kuŋom kuŋalale cek kwapi ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kuponto parar, ntene möce kuponto sikenotet oko kopurto nye topon nyepo okokoy om wule mite piko tokol.
56003003	Omnye kiciku acek ikye perper nye kipuryo kot ciyweyisyi. Kikicepotye cerup aret ake nye kiciku mutworik cepo corokyinotet cepo ŋalek wok tokol. Kicipurtoy sokornatet oko corokyinotet, nye kicesenkeri piko oŋnkyesenkerkey acek kwacek nkit.
56003004	Ntene ntowo kupor Yiyintet kosopintenyo toponiyet oko cömisyenyi om wule mite piko,
56003005	yoto kusopec acek. Kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kiciy acek kiy ake tokol nye topon, ntene om cömisyenyi nkit kunye kisopec kusir kowunet nye kikonec acek Muyet Nyetilil nye yiyotet nyelel oko soponto nyelel.
56003006	Kikonec acek Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil kuyomec kupunune wule mite kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo,
56003007	sukuŋet cesatec cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kusir poypoyenyi oŋnkyenyoru soponto nye mopoku nye cemite cikeni.
56003008	Ŋalek cepo manta coto. Amöce ani kule titirci nyi ŋalecato sukuŋet piko co yene Yiyintet kusot kukoytokey kwiyis yisyonutek ce toponec. Toponec oŋnkuponto latik ŋalecutecu om wule mite piko.
56003009	Ntene syem koromun tay tintenotet oko pararet nyepo ŋalek ce nöme ntarastinek. Puryo kot kuponto ŋaleca latik mpo kisic.
56003010	Möce sowu aret oyeny cito nye sutu pciyatet; nto kapok yaste kwiyat neto nkit oko ŋalekyi.
56003011	Nketi nyi kule kuwur cicoto oŋnkuporu miyotyonikyi kule masat.
56003012	Ye koyoku ani Artema nto Tukiko kuco wule mite nyi kuroke syem koromun ico okoy punu wuli amite ani om Nikopoli, omnye kwayiytekey kule wopur wuloto okoy awany pesyosyek cepo koytityet.
56003013	Syem koromun kalye Sena nye nkete ntarastinek oko Apolo sukuŋet kusorkey lakwar kucec poninekwa oŋnkikas kule kanyor cekto kiy ake tokol nye möce.
56003014	Mwoci kunetkey piko ceco kukoytokey kwiyis yisyonutek ce toponec, sukuŋet kunyor tukuk ce kolyoy cekto, puryo kot kuroke kupurto kapurto nyepo soponto nye moponto latik.
56003015	Kesupayak akwek piko tokol ce cepontekey oko ani. Asupay mpo akwek coronutek cicacek om koyenet. Opurte akwek tokol poypoyet nyepo Yiyintet.
57001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Paul nye ratat om mopusi kupo Yesu Kristo, oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Timosewo. Cesiluŋ acek nyi corwenyo Filemon nye kyiyisyi tokol,
57001002	oko yeyanyo Apia oko sikorintet nye kyiyisyi tokol Arkipo oko pikap Yiyintet tokol ce tuytos koŋuŋ.
57001003	Kante kukonok akwek Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
57001004	Yeya Filemon, osomuŋ ani okokoy ye amite osome, oŋnkokostoy Yiyintemwani.
57001005	Omnye olime cömisyet nye ponte nyi om wule mite pikap Yiyintet tokol oko koyenet nye ponte om wule mite Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
57001006	Osome kule roke kutosyikey kupoyit swama koyomotet nye ceponte acek oko nyi kuyu piko ce kikoyen sukuŋet cinket kupeyok tokol ce ceponte om soponnwekyo om wule mite Kristo.
57001007	Yeya, kosutwo ani cömisyet nye ponte nyi ŋerekwek ce caŋ oko titiret, omnye kweŋerec nyi mukuleywekap pikap Yiyintet tokol.
57001008	Kwomuci ani oyiku nyikan om Kristo kot omwowuŋ kule yiy kito nye misyini ceyiy.
57001009	Ntene cömisyet kunye sutwo ani osomiŋ ye kotoyiye kuyunyo. Oyiye kuyunyoto nka kot koyiku ani Paulo kiyokintet nyepo Yesu Kristo. Kunyo amite yawut mpo pantanyi oyiku mopusyo kupo kaynetap Yesu.
57001010	Kunyo kosomiŋ om kaynetap Onesimo nye Werimwani nkit om Kristo. Omnye kwoyiku ani kwan om koyenet omite mopusi.
57001011	Kipuryo kot kuponto neto latik om pesyosyek alak om wule mite nyi, ntene ponto yawut om wule cemite acek tukway ani oko nyi.
57001012	Kunyo koyoku kuketkey wule mite om mukuleyto akenke.
57001013	Kwomöce ani kule opurte neto om wuli ye tomite mopusi kupo lokoywek ce toponec, sukuŋet kukalya om otepto nyeŋuŋyi.
57001014	Ntene puryo kot amöce kule osomiŋ ŋolyo nye puryo kot cäm nkit, puryo kot kuroke cisimnciŋ kule talayitu, ntene möce ye kecäm nyi nkit.
57001015	Pesyet ake kiwete Onesimo wule mite nyi kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri kule sukuŋet kuketkey kwopur tukway okokoy.
57001016	Kimo kumutworin yawut, ntene kitosyikey kupël mutworin omnye kikwek yeya om Kristo. Kikwek cito nyepo latik koromun om wule amite ani oŋnkuponto latik ce caŋ om wule mite nyi kuyu mutworin oŋnku yeya om Mokoryontet!
57001017	Kunyo; ye cömo ani nyi nye cicintosi tukway, kuroke toroc ŋerekyi neto kuyu wulo ketetorokto ŋerekyo ani.
57001018	Ye kikwiy neto ŋolyo nye miyat om wule mite nyi, nto ye ponto pesento nyeŋuŋ, yitwo ani pesento nyoto.
57001019	Kosil ani nkit om yewumwani kule, “Ani Paulo nkit nye mosoyoku peaento.’’ (Puryo kot kuroke osotuŋ ani nyi kule yoco ani nyi soponnüŋ)
57001020	Kunyo yeya, kalya comwo ŋolyontoni om kaynetap Mokoryontet, roke ŋerec mukuleyto nyimwani kuyu yeya om Kristo.
57001021	Oŋnket ani kupoyit manta ye osile ŋalecu kule meseyiy kuyu wulo kosomiŋ, oŋnkonket kule meseyiy tosyikey kukeyta.
57001022	Ntene yec oŋnkoyiytowo koto nye moru, omnye, oŋnket kule mosukuwec Yiyintet somet nyo osome akwek, mosukukalya Yiyintet aco okoy wule omite akwek.
57001023	Kasupayiŋ Epafra nye cepontekey om mopusi om kaynetap Yesu Kristo.
57001024	Kunyo kesupayiŋ piko co kyiyisyi acek tokol, Marko oko Aristariko oko Tema oko Luka.
57001025	Opurte akwek poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
58001001	Kiŋololyi Yiyintet mpo kukonyo om kenyisyek co kitil aret ce caŋ oko om wok ce caŋ kupunune wule mite workoyik.
58001002	Ntene kuŋololwec acek om pesyosyecu po letut kupunune wule mite Werinyi. Kitany Yiyintet koret kupunte Werit oŋnku neto nye kikwey Yiyintet kupayta tukuk tokol cemite koret.
58001003	Lekecece neto om lakweyet nyepo woyintap Yiyintet. Kerkey neto Yiyintet kuwoŋnkyi, kunyo ripe neto koret kumukul om swamet nyepo ŋolyontenyi. Nto om letut yu kowo kowun miyotyonik cepo piko tokol, kopure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet nyewo koromun om koret.
58001004	Kikoci Yiyintet Werit kwek nyewo kupël malaykanik, kuyu wulo nyewo mpo kaynet nyenyi kupël nyepo malaykanik.
58001005	Omnye tompo kumwoci Yiyintet kenyis malayket ake tokol kule, “Yiku nyi Werimwani; koyiku ani pesyoni Papaŋuŋ!’’ Tompo mpo kot kumwoci kule, “Mosoyiku ani Papanyi, oŋnkwek neto Werimwani.’’
58001006	Ye kikirik kuyok Yiyintet Werinyi poretyet kuce koret, kimwoy kule, “ Misyini kusay malaykanik tokol cepo Yiyintet neto.’’
58001007	Kimwoy Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme malaykanik kule, “ Yiyintet kunye wece malaykanik kwek yomet, oŋnkuwec mutworikyi kwek ŋelyepik cepo mata’’
58001008	Ntene mwowu ŋalek ce nöme Werit kule, “Ayi Yiyintet, ŋecereŋuŋ nyepo poytoyisyet kunye pure kenyis okoy kenyis! Poytoy pikuk om poytoyisyet nyepo manta.
58001009	Cöme ŋalek ce tililec, oŋnkitay senker ce miyotec. Kunyo Yiyintet nye Yiyinteŋuŋ kunye kikwey nyi, oŋnkuŋapeniŋ mwayta nyepo ŋerekwek cepo woyinto nyewo koromun, kupël ce kikoci coronutekuk’’
58001010	Kumwoy mpo kule, “Mokoryontet, nyi kunye kitany koret om yun kipo towunot, Kitanye yewuniyekuk koret torot.
58001011	Mosukupotyo coto, mosukuyosekitu tokol kuyu siroy, ntene meseŋetu nyi;
58001012	Meseriny nyi cekto kuyu kotit. Mpecek mosukuwecweckey kuyu siroy. Ntene yuye nyi nyoto okokoy, nye puryo kupoku soponŋuŋ.’’
58001013	Tompo kot kumwoci Yiyintet kenyis malayket kule: “Pure nyi yu po yewumwani nyepo tay, okoy okoci punikuk kwek ŋeceret nyepo kerenkokuk.’’
58001014	Kunyo malaykanik tokol kuce mukuleywek ce muyet pate ce yicini yisyet Yiyintet. Ce yoktoy neto wokukalya piko ce mosukunyor kosopotet.
58002001	Kunyo misyini cekwil topon ŋalek cepo manta ce kicelim sukuŋet mente kot cemosokisye kupotwec aret.
58002002	Kicipor kule po manta lokoywek ce kisutyi malaykanik mpo kukonyo, nto ci ake tokol nye kipuryo kot kurup nto kuywey kunye kinyor nyo citaŋany kuyem.
58002003	Kunyo cimuci acek kulene kot cecilil ye puryo kot ce cöme ŋalek cepo kasopotet nyewo nye tenyo? Mokoryontet nkit nye kinyosyo kupor kosopotenyi, nto piko co kilim ŋalekyi kuce kiporwec acek kule manta ŋalecu kupoyit manta.
58002004	Kunyo kitosyi Yiyintet tukukyi cepo manta ce poru, omnye kikwiy pelutok ceporu swamet oko tukuk wok ce caŋ cepo kakitat. Kipciyta mpo kokotutek cepo Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wule moktoy neto.
58002005	Kipuryo kot kukoci Yiyintet malaykanik kwek poytoyik cepo koret nye mosukuco, koret nyi ceŋolole acek.
58002006	Ntene mwowu om wulyo ake om silutekap Yiyintet kule “Yiyintet! Cito ku kiy ne nye muci nyi kot sot? Nto ci pate kunye kiy ne nye muci nyi kot rire?
58002007	Kitany nyi neto kopur pesyos ce ŋeri kuminiŋ kupël malaykanik, kilokyi nyi neto kutwet nyepo woyinto oko koyweyisyet,
58002008	oŋnkupayta tukuk tokol ce kitany.’’ Mwowu ŋaleca kule, kikoci Yiyintet cito kupayta tukuk tokol, ntene kuyu wule yunto yawut puryo kot ceköse acek kule poytoy cito tukuk.
58002009	Ntene ceköse yawut Yesu Kristo nyo kicirek kuminiŋit kupël malaykanik kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri, sukuŋet kumeci piko tokol kupunte poypoyetap Yiyintet. Ceköse kule kicilokyi Woyinto oko koyweyisyet om met nye kitaŋany.
58002010	Ŋolyo nyepo manta kule Yiyintet nye kitany oŋnkuripe tukuk tokol, kunye kisat kunyol Yesu kupunte toŋoŋutek, sukuŋet kukwer lekok ce caŋ kwokunyor woyinto nyenyi. Omnye Kristo kunye ntocini cekto wokunyor kosopotet.
58002011	Neto kunye söte kutililitu piko om miyotyonikwa, neto wanak oko piko co kicesat kutililitu kuponto Papa akenke. Kuyu wulo puryo kot kunomkyini kalilan Yesu ye mokukure cekto kule mpo yeya.
58002012	Mwowu kule, “Mosomwoci ani mpo yeyamwani kayneŋuŋ, mosakastiŋ nyi om kwenutap luket nyimwa tokol.’’
58002013	Mwowu mpo yec kule, “Mosokenekey ani Yiyintet.’’ Mwowu mpo yec kule, “Amite ani yu opontekey oko lekok ce kikono Yiyintet.’’
58002014	Kunyo lekok kuce piko ce ponto porto oko korotik. Kuweckey Yesu nkit kukerkeyit oko cekto nye kiponto porto nye kerkey nyimwa. Kikwiy kuyunyoto kupunte met nyenyi sukuŋet kwaranta setani nyewo nyepo oyik . Setanit kunye kiponto kamukeywek om wule mite met,
58002015	yoto kuye sukuŋet kutyac piko co kikwek mutworik cepo okokoy ye kisoptos, omnye kiyweye met.
58002016	Omnye porukey kupoyit manta kule kipuryo kuco neto cokukalya malaykanik, ntene kuyu wulo mwowu silutek kule, “Kukalya lekokap Apram.’’
58002017	Kunyo kiweckey neto kukerkeyit mpo yeyanyi om aret ake tokol sukuŋet kwek Tisintet nyewo nye paypay oŋnkupo manta om yisyetap Yiyintet nye kolyoy piko miyotyonikwa.
58002018	Kunyo muce Yesu yawut kukalya piko co cesyeme, omnye kicesyem neto oŋnkyitaŋany.
58003001	Mpo yeyamwani ce tililec, ce kikur Yiyintet kunyor woyinto nyepo torot! Asot pa akwek Yesu Kristo, nye kiyok Yiyintet kwek Tisintet nyewo nyepo koyenet nye ciyeni acek.
58003002	Kiywey kukenekey neto Yiyintet nyo kikwey neto kwiy yisyenyi kuyu wule kiywey mpo Moses Kotap Yiyintet tokol.
58003003	Cito nye tece koto kunye nyoru kakastayet kupël koto nkit. Kuyunyoto ponto Yesu cikasta koromun kupël Moses.
58003004	Cito kunye kitece koto ake tokol nye tekat. Ntene kitece Yiyintet tukuk tokol.
58003005	Kikwiye Moses cepo manta tokol om kotap Yiyintet orit kuyu mutworintet, kuŋalale yoto tukuk ce mosukumwoy Yiyintet om pesyosyek ce kwoni.
58003006	Ntene Kristo kunye po manta kuyu weritap Yiyintet nye ponto kamukeywek kupayta kotap Yiyintet. Kunyo ciku acek konyi ye kacenäm cekwil koromun kokenotet nyoto nye mite cikeni.
58003007	Kunyo kuyu wulo mwowu Muyet Nyetilil kule, “Ye kolim pesyoni kutitap Yiyintet,
58003008	monte cekwil mukuleywekwok, kuyu wulo kikwiyta mpo kukomwoŋ, ye kitoye cekto Yiyintet, kuyu wulo yo kyomite kitela, yo kyosyem Yiyintet.
58003009	Wuloto ku wule kisyemeno ani mpo kukomwoŋ, mwowu Yiyintet, okoy kukäs cekto yisyonutekwani ce kyayiy awany kenyisyek artam.
58003010	Kunyo kyonerekyi ani piko ce kipo pesyosyecoto, okoy omwowu kule, ‘Kimosokis cekto okokoy om mukuleywekwa, puryo kot konkete arosyekwani.’
58003011	Kyonyeru okoy awalkey okurtoci kule, ‘Puryo kot amuci kot okoci cekto wule kemuŋe.’ ’’
58003012	Mpo yeya, oripkey sukuŋet mente kot kumite kwenumwakwek cito nye ponto mukuleyto nye miyat nye yunyo nye muce kutay Yiyintet nye sopot.
58003013	Ntene kito nye möce kule ayiy akwek nye tokunömec om ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Pesyoni’’ Kunye möce kule cititirkey acek kwacek nkit om pesyo ake tokol oŋnkyekäs kule puryo kot kumite ci ake tokol om akwek nye kapayta miyotyet okoy kunyekerit kutay Yiyintet.
58003014	Omnye ciku tokol akenke oko Kristo, ye kacekwil ce nöme ŋolyontet nye topon nye kiceponte kunyo okoy kupunte pesyet nyepo letut.
58003015	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Ye kolim pesyoni kutitap Yiyintet, monte cekwil mukuleywekwok, kuyu wulo kyoyunte yo kyotoye Yiyintet’’.
58003016	Mpo ŋo piko co kilim kutitap Yiyintet, oŋnkurok kutoyis? Coto ku piko tokol ce kikweru Moses kukwane koretap Misiri.
58003017	Mpo ŋo piko co kinyercini Yiyintet kuwany kenyisyek artam? Picoto kuco kiwurta kwiy miyotyet okoy kupok kuwoŋnkey kuŋetune muswek cikwa kitela.
58003018	Piko oŋnkoco co kiwolcinikey kukurtoy Yiyintet kule, “Puryo kot okoci cekto wule kemuŋe?’’ Picoto kuco kitoyisyi.
58003019	Kunyo ceköse yawut kule kipuryo kot kowut cekto orit omnye kipuryo kot kuyen.
58004001	Kunyo ye kikurtowec Yiyintet kule mosicenyoru kamuŋet nyo kimwoy. Kumöce ciyweyisye sukuŋet mente kot cekäs kule kopotyi akenke om akwek nye monyor komuŋnto nyoto.
58004002	Omnye kucelim lokoywek ce toponec kuyu wulo kilime cekto piko cepo keny. Kipuryo kot kunyor cekto latik om lokoywek ce kilim omnye kipuryo kot kuyen.
58004003	Kunyo acek co kicecäm kule mosicenyoru kamuŋet nyo kikurtowec Yiyintet, kuyu wule kimwoy kule, “Kyawalkey akurte om nerekwekwani kule, Puryo kot amuci okoci cekto wule kemuŋe.’’ Kimwoy Yiyintet kuyunyitenyi nka kot kikipok yisyenyi om pesyet nye kitonye neto koret.
58004004	Omnye kimwoy ce nöme pesyetap tisap om komosta ake om silutek kule, “Kimuny Yiyintet ye pesyetap tisap nye puryo kot kwiye yisyenyi ake tokol.’’
58004005	Mwowu mpo yec om ŋalek ce nöme ŋalecu kule, “Puryo kot amuci kot okoci cekto wule kemuŋe.’’
58004006	Puryo kot kupa wokomuny oko Yiyintet piko co kinyosyo kulim lokoywek ce toponec omnye kitoyis. Kunyo mite piko alake ce ce cömncini kupa orit oŋnkuwokomuny oko Yiyintet.
58004007	Poru kupoyit manta kule, kikwey Yiyintet pesyet ake nye cekure kule, “Pesyoni.’’ Kimwoy ŋaleca om letut kukatil kenyisyek ce caŋ kupunune wule mite Tauti om silutek ce kicesil kule, “Ye kolim pesyoni kutitap Yiyintet, Monte cekwil mukuleywekwok.’’
58004008	Nto yunye kikikontoci Yoswa piko okoy kunyor kamuŋet nyepo Yiyintet, nto kipuryo kot kuŋolole Yiyintet ce nöme pesyet ake yec.
58004009	Kunyo tokumite pesyet nye munye pikap Yiyintet kuyu wulo kimunye neto om pesyetap tisap.
58004010	Omnye citake tokol nye kanyor komuŋnto nyo kikurto Yiyintet kunye kemuny om yisyonutekyi kuyu wulo kimunye Yiyintet om yisyonutekyi.
58004011	Kunyo möce cesyem koromun okoy cenyoru komuŋet nyoto sukuŋet kupuryo kot kumite akenke om akwek nye kopotyi, kuyu wulo kiyunto cekto omnye kipuryo kot kunyor kamuŋet.
58004012	Sopot ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkuponto swamet. Ŋatip kupël ŋatipinto nyepo rotwetap cok. Mute kuwo orit koromun okoy kuponto ye tuytos soponto oko mukuleyto, oko okoy wule tuytos melilok oko mwaytap kowet. Ŋolyontoni kunye syoce topon corokyinotet oko kasoteywek cepo mukuleywek cepo piko.
58004013	Puryo kiy nye muce kuwunynkey om wule mite Yiyintet. Toku kiy ake tokol nye kicitany om konyekyi. Kunyo wociportoykey acek tokol, om tayta nyenyi.
58004014	Kunyo misyini cekwil acek koromun koyenet nye ceponte, omnye ceponte Tisintet nyewo nye kinyosyo kuwo taytap Yiyintet, nyoto ku Yesu Weritap Yiyintet.
58004015	Tisintet nyewo nyoto kunye puryo kot kutoye mekalyec kurirenec om purenotet nye ceponte. Ntene neto kunye kicesyem om aret ake tokol kuyu wulo cesyemntec acek.
58004016	Kunyo misyini cetitir cekwa tay wule mite poypoyet nyepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet sukuŋet cenyoru kokolyoyisyet oŋnkyenyoru poypoyet nye kolyec om pesyet nye ce möce kokolyoyisyet.
58005001	Cekweye tisintet nyewo ake tokol kucone kwenutap piko oŋnkyikoci kwiy yisyet nyepo Yiyintet om kaynetap piko. Sukuŋet kukoytoy kokotutek oko korosek ce tise miyotyonikwa.
58005002	Omnye puryo kuponto neto swama om aret ake tokol, komuce kupaypayit om wule mite piko ce menket kiy oŋnkwiye leliswek.
58005003	Omnye puryo kot kuponto swamet neto nkit, kumisyini kukoytoy korosek cepo miyotyonik ceci nkit oko miyotyonik cepo piko tokol.
58005004	Puryo ci nye kweyekey nkit kwek tisintet nyewo. Ntene Yiyintet nkit nye kure sukwek tisintet nyewo kuyu wulo kikurto Aron.
58005005	Kunyo kipuryo kot kusutkey Kristo nkit sukwek tisintet nyewo, ntene Yiyintet kunye kikwey neto nyo kimwowu kule, “Yiku nyi Werimwani, koyiku ani pesyoni Papaŋuŋ.’’
58005006	Kimwoy om komosta ake kule: “Yiku nyi tisintet nyewo okokoy kenyis, nye rupe tisyontitap Melikisantek.’’
58005007	Ye kimite Yesu koret kisome kukurtoy om kutit nyewo oko lokik kusome Yiyintet nye muce kot kusorune neto wule mite met. Celimnci neto omnye kiyweye Yiyintet.
58005008	Kunyo nka kot ki Weritap Yiyintet, ntene kinetkey kuyweyis kupunte toŋoŋutek ce kitaŋany.
58005009	Nteyu kowo cesat kunyol, yoto kwek neto wule lukune kosopotet nyepo piko tokol co yweye neto.
58005010	Yoto kukwey Yiyintet neto kwek tisintet nyewo, nye rupe tisyontitap Melikisantek.
58005011	Ceponte acek ŋalek ce caŋ ce mocemwowu ce nöme ŋolyontoni, ntene korom ye mocerorwok omnye oyiku wuyec ye monket.
58005012	Omnye nka kot kwoyiku akwek pesyosyecu konetik, ntene omöce yec cito nye kenetak ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo tayta. Ye koto oyome omik ce wuyec, kunyi tolwe ceko.
58005013	Omnye lekwa ci tokol nye luwe ceko, omnye menkete cepo manta oko ce puryo kot kupo manta.
58005014	Po omik cewuyec piko ce woyec co kikonetkey oŋnkonket ŋalek ce miyotec oko ce toponec.
58006001	Kunyo roke cipe tay om konetisyet nyewo nye kilot, oŋnkyepokokyi let konetisyet nyo kinyosyi nyepo Kristo. Puryo kot kuroke yec ce konu konetisyet, nye ciyene Yiyintet oko kuyu wule cerenyntoykey om miyotyonikyo cepo keny.
58006002	Coto ku konetisyet nye nöme Potisonisyet, kakameretap yewuniyek, kotutunetap met oko musankut nye mopoku.
58006003	Kunyo cipe tay! Mosikyiy pate kuyunyoto ye kacäm Yiyintet.
58006004	Omnye cimuce kulene ceketu kot kurenynkey yec piko co kimosokis? Kikinyor lakweyetap Mokoryontet Yiyintet, kikicemcem kokotutyet nyepo torot, oŋnkunyor Muyet Nyetilil.
58006005	Kikonket cekto keny kule topon ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, oŋnkunyor swamet nyepo koret nyin coni.
58006006	Yoto kwasta cekto koyenet nyimwa, komokomukoktos kot cewec cekto yec kot kurenynkey, omnye mite kuwuyitocini murtowontet Weritap Yiyintet oŋnkuparta kunyil piko.
58006007	Kocini Yiyintet kupeyok teŋekap koret kwak ye koropentyi kuye peko, yoto kupityo omik cepo latik om wule mite piko co potisyi.
58006008	Ntene ye kopityo kotok, oko samiyita, kupuryo kot kuponto yoto latik, oŋnkurik kucup Yiyintet, nto nyepo letut cepele mata kuloyo.
58006009	Ntene mpo yeya, nka kot kaceŋalal acek kuyunyi, ntene cikenenokey akwek kupoyit manta. Cinket kule oponte kupeyok cepo kosopotet nyimwoŋ.
58006010	Puryo kot kuwurat Yiyintet, kunyo puryo kot kuyutye yisyet nye kyayiy oko nye tomite oyiye nyo kyoporci om yisyet nye kyokalye pikap Yiyintet.
58006011	Ŋolyontet nyewo nye ce möce acek kunyi kule, kutitir ci tokol om akwek okoy pesyet nyepo letut, sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta tukuk ce okeni akwek.
58006012	Mocemöce kule opuren, ntene ce möce kule akerkeyitu piko ce kikoyen oŋnkumuytoy, sukuŋet kunyor tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet.
58006013	Yo kiwolekey Yiyintet kukurtoci Apram. Kiwalkey neto kwine nkit, omnye kipuryo nyewo nye pële neto nye mokuwolyikey.
58006014	Kimwoy kule, “Mosokoniŋ ani nyi kupeyok oko mucokoronik ce caŋ’’
58006015	Yoto kumuytoci Apram okoy kunyor tukuk ce kikurtoci Yiyintet.
58006016	Ye kewalkey cito, kuwolyinikey citake nyewo kupël neto, nto kawalet kunye sate kuwany tintenot ake tokol.
58006017	Möce Yiyintet kule oporu kutok topon piko ce mosukunyor tukuk ce kikurto neto kule puryo kuwecwece kenyis kito nye tyikini, yoto kutosyi kawalet nyenyi kirotyet.
58006018	Kunyo kikwiyisye Yiyintet tukuk oyeny, ce mocimuce kot cewec oŋnkupuryo kot kuperperisyi Yiyintet, tukucoto ku kurtoyenyi oko kawalenyi. Kunyo acek co cemwecini wule mite neto kuce möce cekwilokisye om kurtoyet nyo kicikoci taynyacek.
58006019	Ceponte acek kurtoyet nyitenyi kunye kito nye kwile mukuleywekyacek, po manta nye cikenekey, punte siret wule kiceŋar om kotap Yiyintet nyepo torot okoy kupunto otepto nyetilil nyepo orit.
58006020	Kinyosyo Yesu kuwo wuloto om kaynenyacek, omnye kikwek tisintet nyewo nyepo okokoy nye kirupe tisyontitap Melikisantek.
58007001	Melikisantek kunye Kinko nye kipo Salem oŋnku tisintet nyepo Yiyintet nyewo nyepo torot. Kunye kituye Apram kucone poryet wule kikiporye kot kukwet kinkonik. Yoto kusomnci Melikisantek neto kupeyok.
58007002	Kukoci Apram neto taman om pokol cepo tukuk tokol ce kikipor. (Ŋolyontet nyepo tayta nye poru kaynani, Melikisantek ku kule, “Kinko nyepo toponiyet,’’ kunyo omnye ki Kinko nyepo Salem, porwec kaynenyi kule, “Kinko nyepo kalyet.’’)
58007003	Puryo kot cinket kwan nto kamet nto mpo kukonyi. Mocinket ye kiceye nto ye kime. Kerkey neto oko Weritap Yiyintet, kunyo tisintet neto okokoy.
58007004	Kunyo möce okäs woyinto nye kiponto. Apram nye kukonyo nyewo kunye kikoci neto taman om pokol cepo tukuk ce kikiporune poryet.
58007005	Kunyo mucokoronikap Lefi ce tisik kuce cömncini Ntarastit koruruc taman om pokol om wule mite pikap Israel. Kunyo ruruce cekto wule mite mpo Yeyamwa pikap Israel nka kot ku mucokoronikap Apram coto.
58007006	Melikisantek kunye kipuryo ku mucokoretap Lefi, ntene kinyor taman om pokol ce kikoci Apram nye kicekurtoci oŋnkusomnci kupeyok nyo kikikurtoci Yiyintet.
58007007	Ŋolyontet nyepo manta kunyi kule, somncini nye miniŋ nyewo kupeyok.
58007008	Nyoru tisik co poku taman om pokol, ntene ce nöme Melikisantek, kinyor cito nye sope taman om pokol kuyu wulo mwowu silutek.
58007009	Omnye cimuce mpo cemwoy kule, Lefi nyo nyoru taman om pokol kunye kikon taman om pokol kupunte Apram,
58007010	omnye kitompo kot ceyi Lefi nye kitokumitowune porto nyepo kukonyi Apram yo kinyoru Melikisantek.
58007011	Kicikoci pikap Israel Ntarastinek kupunte tisyontit nyepo Lefik. Kunyo ntoyunye kinyolunot yisyet nyepo tisik, nto kipuryo kot kuroke kutok yec tisintet ake nye pciyat, nyoto ku tisintet nyerupe Melikisantek nye puryo kot ku Aron.
58007012	Omnye ye kacewecwec tisyontit, kumöce mpo kule cewecwec ntarastinek.
58007013	Mokoryontet nyo nye ceŋolole om ŋalecu kunye po aret ake. Aret nyoto kunye tompo kot kwiyis cito mpo akenke kwek tisintet om meset nyetilil.
58007014	Cinket kutok topon kule kicone Mokoryontenyo kotap Yuta. Kunye kipuryo kot kuŋalale Moses ce nöme tisik cekwone koto nyitenyi po Yuta.
58007015	Kunyo kutok topon koromun kule, kutok Tisintet ake nye kerkey oko Melikisantek.
58007016	Kipuryo kot kwek neto tisintet om ntarastinek cepo piko, kikwek tisintet om swametap soponto nye moponto ye ŋete.
58007017	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Meseyeku tisintet okokoy, om tisyontit nyepo Melikisantek.’’
58007018	Kunyo kicinum citore tapan ntarastit nyepo keny, omnye puryo kot kuponto swamet oko moponto latik.
58007019	Omnye puryo kot kusat ntarastinekap Moses kunyol kiy ake tokol. Kunyo kucekon yawut kokenotet nye topon nye cimuci cekwa celekityi wule mite Yiyintet.
58007020	Ntene mite kawalet nyepo Yiyintet. Kipuryo kot kumite kawalet yo kiyiku alake tisik.
58007021	Kikwek Yesu tisintet om kawalet yo kimwowu Yiyintet kule, “Kakuwalkey Mokoryontet kunyo puryo kot kuwece kasoteywekyi, ‘Meseyeku nyi tisintet okokoy.’ ’’
58007022	Kunyo pciyatet nyepo Yesu kunye kwile kule kirotyet nyenyi kunye topon nyepo manta.
58007023	Mite mpo pciyatet ake yec. Ki caŋ tisik coto omnye kipok nye kipuryo kot komuce kutosyikey om yisyemwa.
58007024	Ntene Sope Yesu okokoy. Kunyo puryo kot kuweti yisyenyi oko tisyontit wule mite citake.
58007025	Kunyo muce neto yawut oko okokoy kusop piko co kwoni wule mite Yiyintet kupunte neto, omnye sope okokoy sukuyetyecini cekto om wule mite Yiyintet.
58007026	Kunyo Yesu nye Tisintet Nyewo nye yemekey oko tukuk ce cemöce acek. Kunye Tilil, moponto lelis, nto miyotyo, kweyat om wule mite piko co ponto miyotyet, oŋnkukicilaŋnta kuwo kopurune torot wule low.
58007027	Puryo kot kukerkey oko tisik alak, momöce kule kukoyto kwak korosek cepo miyotyonik kunyosye kunyo cepo ceci nkit ntekere cepo miyotyonik cepo piko tokol. Kikon korosyontet nyepo aret akenke nkit nye yeme. Yoto kuyo kikonukey neto nkit.
58007028	Kweye ntarastinekap Moses piko co puryo kot kutoponec kuwoŋnkyi kwek Tisik. Ntene kurtoyet nyepo Yiyintet nye kiwalkey nye kiconi letutap. Ntarastinek kunye kikweye Werit nyetilil okokoy.
58008001	Kunyo, ŋolyontet nyewo nye cemwowu acek kunyi kule; Ceponte acek Tisintet nyewo kupoyit manta nye yunyo, nye pure yewutap tay nyepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet nyepo Kamukeywek om torot.
58008002	Mite kwiyisyi kuyu Tisintet nyewo om Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi, nyoto kunye wemet nyepo manta nye kitec Mokoryontet, nye kipuryo kot kutece ci.
58008003	Cekweye Tisintet ake tokol kule sukuŋet kukoytoy kokotutek oko korosek ce cikocini Yiyintet. Kunyo misyini kuponto mpo Tisintet nyinyo nyewo kito nye koytoy.
58008004	Nto yunye kupo neto koret, nto komoyeku Tisintet mpo kisic, omnye mite tisik ce caŋ ce koytoy kokotutek kuyu wulo mwoytoy Ntarastinekap Yutayek.
58008005	Yisyet nye yiye cekto kuyu tisik kunye kerkeyinto oŋnku rurwet nyepo meset nyetilil nye mite torot. Kerkey wule kiyunto om Moses. Omnye ye kikirik kutec wemet, yoto kumwoci Yiyintet neto kule, “Käs kule ketec kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo kukuciporuŋ om tulwo.’’
58008006	Ntene kuyu wulo yunto, kicikoci Yesu yisyet nyepo tisyontit nyewo kupël nyimwacek, kuyu wulo topon kirotyet nye kikwiytoy neto om kwenutap Yiyintet oko piko, omnye kiyoŋe kirotyet nyitenyi tukuk ce toponec kupëlis.
58008007	Omnye nto kipuryo kot kuponto lelis kirotyet nyo kipo tayta, nto kipuryo kot kumöce Yiyintet kukon kirotyet nyepo oyeny.
58008008	Ntene kireny Yiyintet pikyi yo kiŋolole kumwowu kule, “Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, mite kukwoni pesyosyek, ye masayiy ani kirotyet nyelel oko pikap Israel oko kotap Yuta.
58008009	Puryo kot kukerkey kirotyet nyoto oko nyo kyoyiye ani oko mpo kukomwa, om pesyet nyo kyokwerune ani cekto kukwane koretap Misiri. Kipuryo kot kurip kuywey kirotyet nyoto kyoyiye ani oko cekto. Kunyo kyayaste ani nye kimolimncini, yunyoto wule mwoytoy Mokoryontet.
58008010	Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, kirotyet nye masayiy ani oko pikap Israel om pesyosyek ce kwoni kunyi, Mosokoci kupurune ntarastinekwani kasoteywekwa orit, mososil mukuleywekwa orit. Mosoyeku ani Yiyintemwa, oŋnkwek cekto pikwani.
58008011	Puryo ci om cekto nye muce kunet citake nto mpo kunet yeyanyi kumwoci kule, ‘Roke nket Mokoryontet.’ Omnye mosukonketo piko tokol, kuceke lekwa nye miniŋ okoy cito nyewo.
58008012	Omnye mosakalye ani leliswekwa, nye kamosoti yec miyotyonikwa.’’
58008013	Ye kaŋalale Yiyintet kumwoy kule kirotyet nyelel, kuporkey kule sute Yiyintet kule kiyosit kirotyet nyo kipo tay, kunyo kiy ake tokol nye mite kuyositu kunye mosukupot lakwar.
58009001	Kiponto kirotyet nyo kipo tay ntarastinek cepo sayet oko otepto nye tilil nye kikweye cito.
58009002	Kicetec yoto wemet saŋ nye cekure Otepto Nyetilil. Kimite orit kito nye yoŋe tarit, oko meset, oko mukatyantet nye kacesoci kupoyit Yiyintet.
58009003	Otepto nyepo oyeny kunye kiceŋare siret. Kumite otepto nye cekure. Tilil wule po Cetililec.
58009004	Nye kimite meset nyepo Saput nye kicepele korosek ce poŋu oko santukut nyepo kirotyet nye kicilume Saput, oko teret nyepo Saput nye kimite orit Mana, oko koroktap Aron nye kiponto sokek ce kipityo, oko rwontok oyeny ce kicesil ntarastinek.
58009005	Kimite parak om yoto tyoŋik alake ce cekure Cerupin ce poru woyintop Yiyintet, ce kiponto kepepok ce keyene otepto nyepo yo cikolye miyotyonik. Ntene puryo kot kumite yawut poroyinto nye cimuce cerorune wule kiyunto tukucoto tokol.
58009006	Kiceyiyta tukucoto kuyunyoto. Kunyo kiwute tisik pesyosyek tokol wemet nyepo saŋ wokwiye yisyonutekwa.
58009007	Ntene Tisintet Nyewo nkit pate kunye kiwute wemet orit nyepo oyeny aret akenke om kenyit akenke. Kisute yoto korotik ce kikoytoy kwek korosek cepo leliswek ceci nkit oko leliswek ce kikwiye piko nye puryo kot kunkete kule kyiye miyotyet.
58009008	Nete Muyet Nyetilil kupor kutok topon om tukucutecu kule tompo kuyatakay aret nye weti Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi, ye tokumite kutekat Wemet nyepo saŋ.
58009009	Pelutyet nyitenyi nye poru wule yunto pesyosyecu. Poru kule kokotutek oko korosek cepo tyoŋik ce kocikoci Yiyintet kuce puryo kot kusöte kunyol mukuleytap cito nyo soye.
58009010	Omnye nömekey coto tokol oko omit, oko ce ceye, oko sokwonutek wok tokol ce cipukte simnyo. Ntarastinek coto kuce nöme wule po porto saŋ ce mite kwiyisyi okoy kupunto pesyet nye mokusat Yiyintet tukuk tokol.
58009011	Ntene kico Kristo kuyu Tisintet nyewo nyepo tukuk ce toponec ce mite yawut. Wemet nye yicini neto kunye nyewo oŋnkusatat nye pëlisyi, nye puryo kot ku wemet nyo kikwiye piko. Kunye puryo kot kupo koroni kicitonye.
58009012	Yo kiwute Yesu Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi aret akenke kuwany kupok, kipuryo kot kusut yoto korotik cepo warek nto tuka wokukoyto kwek korosek, ntene kiweto korotikyi nkit oŋnkukonec acek kosopotet nye mopoku.
58009013	Kunyo nteye korotikap warek oko cepo yeyik oko aryantet nyepo rorta nye kacepel kuce ye kocitotoci piko ce puryo kot kutililec, komuce kowun kutililitu om miyotyonikwa.
58009014	Kunyo, omnye manta coto, ku aret cetya nyun ce muce kowun korotikap Kristo nye kikonnkey kupunte Muyet nye mopoku kwek korosyontet nye nyolunot om wule mite Yiyintet. Korotikap Yesu kuce wece kutoponitu kasoteywek cicacek sukuŋet kyiy yisyet nyepo Yiyintet nye sopot.
58009015	Kunyo, Kristo kunye söte kirotyet nyelel sukuŋet kunyor piko co kikur Yiyintet soponto nye mopoku nyo kikurto. Muce kwiyakay ŋolyontoni omnye kime Kristo sukusop piko kukwane miyotyonikwa co kikikwiy ye kitokupoytoy ntarastit nyepo keny.
58009016	Ye mite kirotyet nye kiwalkey cito, kumöce cinket kule kime cicoto.
58009017	Omnye puryo kwiyisyi ŋolyo nyepo kirotyet ye tokusope nyo kiwölekey kukurto. Yiyisyi pate ye kame cito nyo kikurtoy.
58009018	Kuyunyoto omne sukuŋet ciyisye korotik cekwil kunyol kirotyet nyepo tay.
58009019	Kinyosye Moses yoto kumwoci piko ntarastinek tokol kuyu wule kiyunto. Nto om letut kunäm korotikap tuka oko warek oŋnkutankware peko, oŋnkutotoci kitaputap ntarastinek oko piko tokol kwiyisye ketit nye mwa koromun nye cekure Isop oko putekap kecirek ce murwonec.
58009020	Kimwoy kule, “Koroticu kuce kwile kukwilakay kirotyet nyo kukonok Yiyintet kule orip.’’
58009021	Om aret nye yunyoto kutotoci Moses korotik wemet oko kiy ake tokol nye kyiyisye ye cesoye.
58009022	Kito nyepo manta kuyu wulo yunto ntarastinek kunyi kule, korotik kuce wune kutililit kiy ake tokol. Kunyo puryo kot cimuce cikalya miyotyonik ye puryo kot citata korotik
58009023	Kunyo tukucutecu ce akerkeye oko tukuk cepo torot kuce kicesat kutililitu om aret nye yunyitenyi. Ntene tukuk cepo torot kuce möce korosek ce pëlisyi.
58009024	Omnye kipuryo kot kowut Yesu Otepto Nyetilil nye kicitanye yewuniyek, nye kerkeyinto nyepo manta. Ntene kiwo torot, wule mitowune yawut kuporyewec acek om taytap Yiyintet.
58009025	Kiweti Tisintet nyewo aret akenke om kenyit akenke Otepto Nyetilil, kisute yoto korotik cepo tyoŋik, ntene kipuryo kot kokoytokey Kristo kuwo orit aret ce caŋ,
58009026	omnye nto kikwiy kuyunyoto nto kimuce kutaŋany aret ce caŋ kuceke ye kicitany koret. Ntene wule kikwiyta kunye kiporkey yawut aret akenke om pesyosyecu po letut, sukuŋet kunum miyotyonik, omnye kikoytokey nkit kwek korosyontet.
58009027	Mosukume ci tokol aret akenke, nto om letut kuco musankut.
58009028	Kuyunyoto kicekon Kristo aret akenke kwek korosyontet nye numu miyotyonik cepo piko ce caŋ. Mosukuco aret nyepo oyeny, nye puryo kot kuconi kule casat miyotyet, ntene coni cokusop piko ce mite kukonye neto.
58010001	Ntarastinekap Yutayek kuce poru pate kuyu rurwet nyepo wule yunto kerkeyinto nyepo tukuk ce toponec ce mite tay, nye puryo kot kuporu wule yunto tukucoto kupoyit manta. Kunyo komuce kulene ntarastinek kot kusat kunyol piko ce kenekey korosek pate, cekyicini Yiyintet kila kenyit?
58010002	Nto yunye piko co soye Yiyintet, kuce kiciwun miyotyonikwa kupoyit manta nto puryo kot konkete kule mite miyotyet. Nto kiciyoŋnto nye mokyiye korosek.
58010003	Kunyo kuyu wule yunto korosek co cikoytoy kila kenyit kuce sowu kunket piko miyotyonikwa om kenyit ake tokol.
58010004	Omnye puryo kot komuce kenyis kot kowun miyotyonik korotik cepo yeyik oko warek.
58010005	Omnye ye kikirik kuco Yesu koret, kimwoci Yiyintet kule: “Puryo kot möce nyi korosek oko kokotutek, ntene kiyiytowo ani nyi porto.
58010006	Puryo kot ŋerekyini korosek ce cepele kumukul, nto kokotukek ce numu miyotyonik.
58010007	Yoto omwowu kule, ‘Yiyintet omite yu kule ayiy kito nye möce nyi kule ayiy ani, kuyu wulo kicesilyo ŋalek ce nömo ani om kitaputap Ntarastinek.’ ’’
58010008	Kimwoy nyepo tayta kule, “Kipuryo kot möce nyi nto ŋerekyini korosek oko kokotutek oko mpo korosek cepo tyoŋik ce cepele.’’ Kimwoy kuyunyoto nka kot cikoytoy korosecutecu tokol kuyu wulo mwoytoy ntarastinek.
58010009	Oŋnkumwoy yec kule, “Yiyintet amite yu saŋet ayiy kiy tokol nye möce nyi kule ayiy ani.’’ Kunyo kinum kuwec Yiyintet korosek tokol co kipo tay, sukuŋet kuker yeto korosyontet nyepo oyeny.
58010010	Omnye Yesu Kristo kunye kiwany yisyet nye kimokyini Yiyintet. Omnye kisatec acek cetililitu om miyotyonik aret akenke om porto nye kime, kuyem nyoto.
58010011	Yonye tisintet Yutoyintet ake tokol kila pesyo oŋnkwiy yisyet nye koytoy kokotutek ce caŋ ce kerkey, ntene puryo kot komuce kot konum kokotutecoto miyotyonik.
58010012	Ntene Kristo kunye kikon kokotutyet akenke nyepo okokoy nye numu miyotyonik oŋnkopure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
58010013	Kunyo mite kopure wuloto okokoy pesyet nye mokukoci Yiyintet kwek punikyi ŋecerok cepo kerenkokyi.
58010014	Kunyo om korosyontenyi akenke, kunye kisat kunyol okokoy piko ce kimo kiponto miyotyo.
58010015	Kwile mpo Muyet Nyetilil kumwowu nyepo tayta kule,
58010016	“Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, Mosayiy ani kirotyani oko cekto om pesyosyecoto, mosokoci kopurune ntarastinekwani mukuleywek cikwa, mososil kowut kasoteywekwa orit.’’
58010017	Oŋnkumwoy yec kule: “Yoto kuye komosoti yec miyotyonikwa oko ŋalek ce miyotec ce kikwiy.’’
58010018	Kunyo, ye kicikalya pic miyotyonikwa kupuryo kot kutocemöce yec kokotutek ce numu miyotyet.
58010019	Kunyo mpo yeya, cimuci yawut ciwut Otepto Nyetilil nye puryo kot cemuytosi, omnye kime Kristo kupo acek.
58010020	Neto kunye kiyotwec aret nyelel nyepo soponto nye cepunte totetap siret, nyoto kunye porto nyepo Kristo nkit.
58010021	Ceponte Tisintet nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet.
58010022	Kunyo akente cekwa celekite wule mite Yiyintet nye ceponte mukuleyto nyepo manta, oko koyenet nye kwilat, oko mukuleywek ce kicesit cinum kasoteywek ceponto leliswek, oko porwonik ce kiciwune peko ce tililec.
58010023	Möce kule cekwil kokenotet nye ceponte, omnye cinket kupoyit manta kule mosukoyitita Yiyintet kurtoyet nye kikurto.
58010024	Möce kule cisot wule moceriptekey. Cikalyekey acek kwacek nkit om cömisyet oŋnkyiy yisyet nye topon.
58010025	Monte kyaste nye komo cetuytosi om kirwoket kuyu wulo yiytoy piko alake yawut. Ntene möce cititirkey koromun kuyu wule kokäs kule karik Pesyetap Mokoryontet.
58010026	Omnye ye kocetosyikey kyiy miyotyet cinketi oŋnkurok yec kicinket ŋalek cepo manta. Kupuryo kot kumite yec korosyontet ake nye muce kunum miyotyonik.
58010027	Kito nye koŋet pate ku cemuye om kito nye mokwiyakay, nyoto ku musankut nyepo mata nye loye nye mokwaranta piko co toye Yiyintet!
58010028	Cepoköce kume nye mocesoye ci ake tokol nye koyiri ntarastinekap Moses, ye mite piko oyenku nto somok ce kiköse ye kiyiye cicoto ŋolyontonoto.
58010029	Kunyo asot pa, mosukutaŋany kulene cito nyo nyile Weritap Yiyintet? Ŋo nye nyile kule puryo kot kupo latik korotik cepo kirotyet nyo kisope neto miyotyet? Ŋo nye cupe Muyet Nyetilil nyepo poypoyet? Sot pa misyini cicoto kunyor taŋanynta nye tya?
58010030	Omnye cinket cito nye kimwowu kule, “Mosoyoku ani,’’ Oŋkumwoy yec kule, “Mosukumutyi Mokoryontet pikyi musankut.’’
58010031	Ŋolyo nyepo muyot koromun ye kesuci cito yewuniyekap Yiyintet nye sopot!
58010032	Möce asot wule kyoyunte akwek om letut yu kowo kulucok lakweyet nyepo Yiyintet. Kyotaŋany om tukuk ce caŋ oŋnkurok otitir nye kipuryo kot kupëlok wuyinwek.
58010033	Kicecupok pesyosyek alak om taytap piko tokol oŋnkyitaŋanyak oŋnkoyomekey mpo oko piko alak ce kicitoŋonye kuyunyoto.
58010034	Kyotaŋany mpo oko piko ce mite mopusi, oŋnkomuytoci om ŋerekwek cenyapan tukukwok tokol, omnye kyonketi kule ceponte kito ake nye topon nye pëlisyi nye pure okokoy.
58010035	Kunyo monte kyaste titirotet nyimwoŋ omnye mosukukonok kokotutyet nyewo.
58010036	Möce omuytoci sukuŋet ayiy kito nye möce Yiyintet, oŋnkonyoru kito nyo kikurto neto.
58010037	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Om poroyinto nye miniŋ yawut, ye mosukuco neto nyo coni, puryo kot kulilenekey.
58010038	Ntene mosokuyen oŋnkusopco pikwani co yiye cepo manta. Nteye kotepe kot kuketitakey ake let, kupuryo kot oŋerekyini ani nyoto.’’
58010039	Puryo kot ciku acek piko co ketitoykey let okoy kupotyo. Ntene ceponte koyenet, kunyo mosicisopec.
58011001	Koyenet kunye poru kule po manta tukuk ce ce mite cikeni, oŋnkyinket kule po manta co moceköse om konyek.
58011002	Om koyenet nyimwa, kunye kisutyi piko ce kipo keny kucämnta Yiyintet cekto.
58011003	Om koyenet kunye sukuŋet cinket acek kule ŋolyontetap Yiyintet kunye kitany koret om tukuk ce toku kukwane tukuk ce motoku.
58011004	Om koyenet kunye kisutyi kucämnta Yiyintet kule topon korosyontet nyepo Apel kusir nyepo Kain. Kicämnta Yiyintet kule po manta Apel kupunte koyenet nye kiponto, omnye Yiyintet nkit kunye kicäm kokotutyetap Apel. Kunyo nka kot kime keny kutoku kwiyisyi koyenenyi.
58011005	Om koyenet kunye kisutyi cesut Enok kuwo torot kusope nye kipuryo kot kume. Kipuryo kot cenyor neto omnye kisut Yiyintet kuwo torot. Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, kiŋerece Enok Yiyintet kunyo kutompo kot cesut kuwo torot.
58011006	Puryo kot kuŋerekyini Yiyintet ci tokol ye moponto koyenet. Omnye ci tokol nye coni wule mite Yiyintet kunye misyini kuyen kule mite Yiyintet, kunyo kocini musyaret piko ce cenye wule mite neto.
58011007	Om koyenet kunye kikoci kulimnta Nuwa kosowunotetap Yiyintet nye kimwoci tukuk ce kikwoni ce kipuryo kot komuce Nuwa kot kukäs. Yoto kulimnci neto Yiyintet, kutec Rapet nye kisop neto oko piko tokol cepo kanyi. Yoto kumutyi musankut koret oŋnkunyor kupeyok co cenyoru ye ponte koyenet.
58011008	Om koyenet kunye kisutyi Aprayam kulimnci Yiyintet yo kikure kunomen kuwo koret ake nye kikikurtoci kule sokoci kwek nyenyi. Yoto kunomen Aprayam nye kipuryo kot konkete wule weti.
58011009	Om koyenet kunye kisutyi Aprayam kumiŋis kuyu tontet om koret nye kikikurtoci Yiyintet neto. Kiminye wemanik kuyu Isaka oko Yakopo, ce kikikurtoci Yiyintet mpecek.
58011010	Kikonye Aprayam moŋet nye kicetec topon, moŋet nyoto kunyo kicece oŋnkutec Yiyintet nkit.
58011011	Om koyenet mpo kunye kinyorta Sara swamet okoy kukoyakay nka kot kikiyosit nye kimemuce kuyi lekoy. Kinket neto kule kikurto Yiyintet kunyo kikenekey Yiyintet.
58011012	Kunyo nka kot kime cicitenyi akenke Aprayam, kiyi mucokoronik ce caŋ cete kokelik cepo torot oŋnkucaŋit cete coŋintap ŋaynet nye mite ruretyet tapan.
58011013	Kipok picutecu tokol kuponto koyenet. Kutompo kot kunyor cek tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet, ntene kikäs cekto kutokumite tukucoto wule low, oŋnkuŋerekyi, oŋnkucäm kutor kulim piko kule minye cek koret kuyu toyek ce wuwen.
58011014	Piko ce mwowu ce yucoto kuce poru kutok manta kule cenye cekto koret nye nyimwa nkit.
58011015	Nto yunye kimite cekto kusote koret nyo kikwone, nto kwemuce kunyor poroyinto nye kaketitekey wuloto.
58011016	Nto om wule yunto, möce cekto yawut koret nye topon, nyoto ku koret nyepo torot. Kunyo sukuŋet melilone Yiyintet ye kacekur kule Yiyintetap picoto. Omnye kikwiytoci neto nkit cekto moŋet.
58011017	Om koyenet kunye kusutyi Aprayam kukoyto werinyi Isaka kwek korosyontet, ye kisyeme Yiyintet neto. Aprayam kunye kikurtoci Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec kucäm kule okoyte werinyi akenke kwek korosyontet.
58011018	Kikimwoci Yiyintet neto kule, “Mesenyeru mucokoronik kukwane wule mite Isaka.’’
58011019	Kinket Aprayam kule muce Yiyintet kot koŋet kotutune met piko, kunye kipor kuyunyoto omnye kiceketyi Isaka kuyunye ketutune met.
58011020	Om koyenet kunye kikoci Isaka kusomnci Yakopo oko Esawu kupeyok cekwoni om letut.
58011021	Om koyenet kunye kikoci Yakopo ye kikiyosit kusomnci kupeyok werikap Yosep tokol yo kitepene korokto oŋnkusay Yiyintet.
58011022	Om koyenet kunye kikoci Yosep kuŋalale ye kikirik kume kule mosukupete lekokap Israel Misiri oŋnkumwayta wule möce cemuyta koyek ceci.
58011023	Om koyenet kunye kikoci kwanitap Moses oko kamet kuwuny neto kuwany arok somok, omnye kikäs cekto kule lekwa nye topon koromun kunyo kimeneywey ntarastinekap kinko.
58011024	Om koyenet kunye kikoci kutay Moses yu kowo kuner kuwoyit mocekure weritap ceptap kinko Farawo.
58011025	Yoto kucäm kule ataŋany oko pikap Yiyintet kusir ye koto ŋerece ŋerekwekap miyotyet nyepo pesyos tukusic.
58011026	Kikäs neto kule cupisyet nyepo toŋoŋutek kupo Kristo kunye Mokoryontit nyewo kupël mokoryontit tokol nye kimite Misiri. Omnye kinket neto kokotutyet nye mosukunyor om letut,
58011027	Om koyenet kunye kikoci Moses kuŋete koretap Misiri nye kipuryo kot kuywey ntarastinekap kinko Farawo, oŋnkumuytoci koromun kuyunye kiköse Yiyintet nye motoku.
58011028	Koyenet nyenyi kunye kikoci kucec sakwetap keytayet, oŋnkumwayta ciyile korotik kurkotik, sukuŋet mente kot kupakäc malayket nyepo met werik poretok cepo pikap Israel.
58011029	Om koyenet kunye kikoci kway pikap Israel ruretyet nye arra kuyu koret nye yamat. Ntowo kusyem pikap Misiri kule kyay yoto kwaranta peko tokol.
58011030	Om koyenet kunye kikoci kulul totetap moŋetap Yeriko, om letut yu kowo komut pikap Israel kuwany pesyosyek tisap.
58011031	Om koyenet kunye kikoci kusop nye mnacepakäc Rakap cemoroniyontet oko piko co kipuryo kot koyene Yiyintet, omnye kiwuny neto topon wotik.
58011032	Momwowu yec ŋal ne ce caŋ? Puryo kot oponte poroyinto nye moŋalale mpo, Parak, Samuson, Yafesa, Tauti, Samuel, Kition oko workoyik.
58011033	Om koyenet kiporye cekto tokol korosyek alak okoy kupëlis. Kikwiy ŋalek cepo manta okoy kunyor tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet. Kirat cekto kutuwakap ŋetumwek,
58011034	oŋnkomis motik ce rikititos koromun. Kipuryo kuponto swamet, ntene kinyor swamet, kiponto swamet om poryet okoy kuporye kot kupël lukosyek cepo piko alak.
58011035	Om koyenet kunye kimuce kunyor koruk kotutune met pikwa ce kipok. Piko alak ce kitay mocityakta kuce kicitaŋany kupok, sukuŋet ciŋet kotutune met kunyor soponto nye topon.
58011036	Kicecup alak oŋnkyepas, cerate alak nyororonik, oŋnkyekerta mopusi.
58011037	Kicewire rwontok, cesacasac alak ceyepe rotokap cok, kupesetat kulokoti syerokap kecirek oko cepo warek, kiponon, kicitaŋany, oŋnkyinyalil.
58011038	Kunäm koret cekto kwapi koromun! Kupesetat kumpakate pate kitela, oko lakamosyek kuminye kepenonik oko mwenonik.
58011039	Kicämnta Yiyintet picutecu tokol kupo koyenemwa. Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet,
58011040	omnye kikwiytowec Yiyintet acek yiytayatet nye pëlisyi. Kito nye kimöci Yiyintet ku cenyolu acek wanak oko cekto.
58012001	Nto acek kuce ceponte luket nyewo nyepo muncururwanik ce kimutwec. Kunyo akany cewirte acek kiy ake tokol nye muce kukerektec, oko miyotyet nyo kinämec kukwilec. Okany cirway ŋweyek nye kacemuytoci om kamwenet nyi ceponte.
58012002	Akente cirotote cetokyikey Yesu nye kicece koyenet nyinyacek oŋnku neto kunye mosukoyitita. Kupo ŋerekwek ce kimite kukonye neto, kunye kikoci neto kumuytoci om murtowontet nye kipuryo kot kolilan. Kunyo kikopure yewutap tay om yepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet.
58012003	Asot pa wuyinto nye kipunte Yesu, kimuytoci senkeratet nyewo nyepo piko ce miyotec! Kunyo monte cecosye nto mpo kwilyo mukuleywekwok.
58012004	Omnye om wuyinto nye oporye akwek miyotyet, kunye tompo oporye okoy cepakäcak awaste korotik.
58012005	Kwoyutye akwek so ŋalek cekwilok ce kimwowok Yiyintet kuyu lekokyi? Mwowu kule, “Lekwenyu, mente kot areny kataŋanyetap Mokoryontet, Mente anyokoritu ye kapolyiŋ.
58012006	Omnye toŋonye Mokoryontet ci tokol nye cöme, oŋnkunyolile ci tokol nye kacäm kwek lekwenyi.’’
58012007	Omuytoci toŋoŋutek kuyunye kopirok Papa, omnye toŋoŋutek ce otoŋonyi akwek kuce poru kule sutok Yiyintet kuyu Lekokyi. Mite pa lekwa nye puryo kot kupire kwan?
58012008	Ye puryo kot cepirok akwek kuyu wule yunto lekokyi, kuporukey kule puryo kot oyiku lekokyi cepo manta, ntene oyiku pate pantayek.
58012009	Ceponte acek mpo papa cepo koret ce kiyec cepirec, ntene ciyweyi cekto. Kunyo puryo kot kuroke ne ciyweye acek kupëlis Papa nyepo torot sukuŋet cesopce!
58012010	Kipirec acek mpo papa kisic kuyu wule kostoy kule topon. Ntene pirec acek Yiyintet kupo toponiyet nyinyacek sukuŋet cenyoru tililinto nyenyi.
58012011	Puryo kot kutopon pirotet om pantanyi, ntene mwa nye puryo kot kutopon, ntene om letut mosukunyor kalyet oko tililinto co kicepire.
58012012	Kunyo onömnci torot yewuniyekwok ce nyelnyeltos oŋnkokwil kutuŋokwok co potontos.
58012013	Otosyikey apesetate arup aret nye rotat, sukuŋet mente kumnyan kerenket nye mwole, ntene kusop .
58012014	Otyikyi opurte kalyet oko piko tokol oŋnkopurte soponto nyetilil, omnye puryo ci nye muce kot kukäs Mokoryontet ye moponto soponoto.
58012015	Oripkey mente kwasta ci tokol poypoyetap Yiyintet. Oripkey mente kot kupitenak akwek ketit nye mwa nye muce kowurta piko ce caŋ om mwonet nyenyi.
58012016	Oripkey mente kusekweyan nto nye moponto tini ci ake tokol om akwek kuyu Esawu nyo kikwalya poretyantit nyenyi kuyu werit nyewo kwale omik cepo aret akenke.
58012017	Oŋnket akwek kule kimac om letut kule onyoru kupeyok ce kosomnci kwan, ntene ceyete omnye kipuryo kot kurenynkey om ŋalek ce kikwiy nka kot kisyem kurir lokik kule anyoru.
58012018	Puryo kot akwa akwek kuyu pikap Israel ye kikwoni tulwetap Sinai, nye kiponto mata nye loye oko menonet nye tuyi mis oko yomet kisonet,
58012019	oko kontit nye ciye oko polotet. Nteyu kowo kulim piko polotet, yoto kusom kule mente kot tocelim ŋolyo ake,
58012020	omnye kipuryo kot komuce kumuytoci ntarastit nye kimwowu kule, “Mpo ye karik kutiny pate tyony tulwet mosicewire rwontok kume.’’
58012021	Ki ŋolyo nyewo koromun nye kicekäs yoto okoy kumwoy Moses kule, “Komuyi oŋnkapotan.’’
58012022	Ntene omite akwek yawut kukoyoŋe taytap tulwetap Siyon oŋnku moŋet nyepo Yiyintet nye sopot nye Yerusalem nyepo torot, wule kerurukyikey malaykanik ce caŋ ce mociyite.
58012023	Kakwa akwek wule mite koyomotet nyepo poretokap Yiyintet ce kicesil kaynokwa om torot. Kakwa wule mite ketintet nyepo piko tokol, wule mite mukuleywek cepo piko cepo manta ce kicesat kunyol.
58012024	Kakwa wule mite Yesu Kristo nye kisat kirotyet nyelel om korotikyi ce kicitata ce porwec ŋalek ce toponec kupël co kipo Apel.
58012025	Kunyo, möce oripkey mente kot otay malim ŋalekap nyo ŋololwok, kuyu cekto co kitay molimnci neto nyo kisowu cek om wuli po koret, kuce kipuryo kot kusopco. Cimuci acek kulene cesopce ye kacetay mocelimnci neto nyo sowec kucone torot!
58012026	Kitimtim polotet nyenyi yoto koret, ntene kukurto yawut kumwoy kule, “Mosotimtim koret yec, ntene puryo kot ku koret nkit pate, mosotimtim mpo torot.’’
58012027	Ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Yec’’ Kunye poru kutok topon kule, tukuk ce kicitany kuce citimtime oŋnkyinum sukuŋet kuŋet co mocitimtime.
58012028	Kunyo misyini cikostoyisyi acek omnye kicenyoru poytoyisyet nye mocimuce kot citimtim. Kunyo akany cikaste cikoci Yiyintet sayet nye misyini nye yeme ceponte koyweyisyet oko muyotet.
58012029	Omnye Yiyintenyo kunye mata nye orontoy.
58013001	Otosyikey acämnkey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu mpo yeya om Kristo.
58013002	Mente ceyutye moŋerekyi atoroc oŋnkopay toyek. Mite piko alake ce kikwiy kuyunyoto okoy kuŋerekyi malaykanik nye kipuryo kot kunkete.
58013003	Möce asoti piko ce mite mopusi oŋnkosut kuyunye opontekey tokol om mopusi. Möce asoti mpo piko co mite kutoŋonye oŋnkosut kuyunye otoŋonyi mpo akwek oko cekto.
58013004	Möce kuywey piko tokol komütisyet, nye puryo kumisyini kowurta morono nto korko komütisyet nyenyi. Omnye mosukumutyi Yiyintet musankut piko co syepisyi, oko sakwoyotik.
58013005	Monte ciku pic ce corokyini pesan, okany kuyemak tukuk ce oponte, omnye kimwoy Yiyintet kule, “Puryo kot oyostok ani mpo kisic oŋnkupuryo kot owirtiŋ.’’
58013006	Kunyo sukuŋet cenyoru nyikanatet ceŋalal ce mwowu kule, “Mokoryontet kunye kokolyoyintemwani, puryo kot amuye. Mosukwiyena ani ne cito ake?’’
58013007	Möce osoti kantoyikwok co kimwowok lokoywekap Yiyintet; Asot topon wule kipurtoy om kopurto nyimwa. Möce otyikyi Koyenet nyimwa.
58013008	Yesu Kristo kunye yunyoto omutun, oŋnkuyunyoto yawut, oŋnku mokuyuyit nyoto okokoy.
58013009	Mönte kot kumasak konetisyonik ce lelac kot ape tapan; Omnye poypoyetap Yiyintet kunye kwile mukuleywek cikwok, puryo ku ntarastinek ce nöme omik ce tompo kot kukalya ci tokol nye rupe ntarastinek.
58013010	Puryo kot kuponto kamukeywek tisik ce yiyisyi om kotap wemet kot kwam korosek ce mite meset nyetilil.
58013011	Sutu tisintet nyewo korotik cepo tyoŋik okoy Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi, sukuŋet kukoyto kwek korosek cepo miyotyonik, ntene cepele panyekap tyoŋicoto kayta saŋ.
58013012	Kunyo kitaŋany mpo Yesu kuyunyoto kumeci kurketap moŋet saŋ sukuŋet kowun miyotyonik cepo piko om korotikyi nkit.
58013013	Kunyo akente cipe kayta saŋ wecenyoru tokol kalilanta nye kinyor Yesu.
58013014	Omnye puryo kot kumite moŋet nye ceminye acek kenyisyok om wuli po koret, ce mite cecenye moŋet nye mosukuco.
58013015	Kunyo akente cetosyikey cikoci Yiyintet korosek ce cikoste kupunte Yesu, om kutuwak ceŋolole kuŋoŋu kaynenyi.
58013016	Monte ceyutye mayiy tukuk ce toponec oŋnkokolyoykey kwakwek nkit, omnye korosek coto ce ŋerece Yiyintet.
58013017	Ayweyi kantoyikwok oŋnkolimnci ntarastinek ce mwowu. Omnye mite cekto kuripe mukuleywekwok nye memunye, omnye mosukuporci cekto Yiyintet yisyet nye kikwiy. Ye kaywey akwek cekto mosukwiyis topon om ŋerekwek, nteye puryo, mosukwiyisyi kunerekotin. Kunyo puryo kot kukolyok akwek ceyuco.
58013018	Otosyikey osomwec mpo acek, cinketi acek kule ceponte ŋomnonet nye cinketi cepo manta, omnye cemöce kule kyiye okokoy ŋalek cepo manta.
58013019	Otosyinikey ani osoysoyok akwek kule osomwo sukuŋet kuketwo Yiyintet aco lakwar okoy wule omite akwek.
58013020	Yiyintet nye kiŋet kotutune met Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, neto kunye mesewontet nyewo nyepo kecirek, omnye kitata korotikyi ce kikwil kirotyet nyepo kenyisyok.
58013021	Akente kukonok akwek Yiyintet nyepo kalyet kiy ake tokol nye topon nye omöce sukuŋet ayiy ce möce neto. Roke kwiy neto kito nye ŋerekyini kupunte Yesu Kristo. Kunyo kopurune woyinto wule mite Kristo okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto.
58013022	Mpo yeya, osomok kule omuytoci om ŋalecu po kotitirotet. Kosilwok pate parwet nye nwac.
58013023	Omoce ani kule oporwok kule kucityakta yeyanyo Timosewo kuwete mopusi. Ye kotepe kot kupun wuli lakwar, mosocontekey okoy wule omite akwek.
58013024	Osupoywec kantoyikwok tokol oko pikap Yiyintet tokol! Kesupayak mpo yeya cepo Italia.
58013025	Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Yiyintet.
59001001	Ani nyo Yakopo nye Kiyokintetap Yiyintet oŋnkupo Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Osupoyi pikap Yiyintet cepo arosyek taman ok oyeny ce kiseretyi koret tokol.
59001002	Mpo yeya, möce aŋerec akwek ye kokwontyok syemutok wok ce caŋ,
59001003	omnye oŋnketi kule ye kacesyem koyenet nyimwoŋ yoto kuye omuytoci.
59001004	Ntene möce akäs kule komuytoci nye puryo kot osutoy okoy pesyet nyepo letut, sukuŋet opoyitu manta owoŋnkyi nye puryo kot kupotwok kiy.
59001005	Ye moponto ci ake tokol om akwek ŋomnonet, kumöce kusom Yiyintet nye mosukukoci. Omnye kocini Yiyintet piko tokol poypoyet nye puryo kot kukweye.
59001006	Ntene möce kusome kuponto koyenet nye puryo kot kuponto montuwok oyeny. Omnye cito nye ponto montuwok oyeny, kunye kerkey nyo oko peko cepo ruretyet ce wuse yomet kuroye wuli oko wuli.
59001007	-
59001008	Cito nye yunyoto kunye puryo kot kuwoŋnkyi om kasoteywekyi, nye potpotone om kiy ake tokol nye yiye, kunye mente kot kusot kule mosonyoru kiy kucone wule mite Mokoryontet.
59001009	Möce kusilkey yeya nye panan ye kelaŋnta Yiyintet nyoto.
59001010	Oŋnkuŋerec mpo yeya ake tokol nye kocirekto. Omnye mesukupot Mokoryontit kuyu taptet nyepo ketit.
59001011	Omnye mwoku asista oŋnkulay kupel ketit okoy kosuto taptet oŋnkupot toponiyet nyenyi. Kunyo mosikyaranta kuyunyoto cito nye mokoryo ye mite kwiyisyi yisyonutekyi.
59001012	Ŋerekat kuponto kupeyoy cito nye kwilat om koyenet ye kacesyem, omnye ye kacesyem kot komukta; mosukunyor soponto kwek kokotutyet nyo kikurtoci Yiyintet piko ce cöme neto.
59001013	Ye kacesyem cito kuyunyoto, kupuryo kot kuroke kumwoy kule, “Kasyema Yiyintet.’’ Omnye memuce setanit kot kusyem Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo kot komuce Yiyintet kot kusyem ci ake tokol.
59001014	Ntene cesyeme cito ye kuperperit oŋnkocut cerokyinotet nyenyi nkit.
59001015	Yoto kuye mosukusic cerokyinotet kupuswek okoy kuyi miyotyet, nteye kaner miyotyet kuwoyit, yoto kuyi met.
59001016	Mpo yeya camamnik koromun! Monte ciperperak.
59001017	Kokotutyet nye tilil tokol kunye cone torot wule mite Papa Yiyintet, nye kitoŋintet nyepo lakweyet nyepo torot, nye puryo kot kuwecwecekey, nto mpo kusut menonet, omnye kamilkey.
59001018	Kicitanyec acek cenyoru ŋolyontenyi nyepo manta, sukuŋet cepoyitu manta om otepto nyepo tayta om tukuk tokol ce kicitany.
59001019	Mpo yeya, möce oŋnket ŋalecu! Möce kulimntoy ci tokol lakwar, ntene nye mosorcini ye mokuŋalal, oŋnkupuryo kot kunyeru lakwar.
59001020	Omnye mosutu nerekwek cepo cito tililinto nyepo Yiyintet.
59001021	Kunyo möce owirte soponto ake tokol nye samis oko kopurto ake tokol nye miyat. Ocäm Yiyintet ake ŋolyontenyi nyo kicekol mukuleywekwok. Ŋolyontonoto kunye muce kusopok.
59001022	Ntene möce oyiku pic ce yiyisye ŋolyontet, nye puryo kot olimntoy pate kulimntan nye opeperisyi.
59001023	Omnye cito nyo lime ŋolyontet pate oŋnkupuryo kot kwiyisye kukerkey nyo oko cito nye kosekey ciyoyit, kukäskey wule yunto neto nkit.
59001024	Kösekey yoto wule yunto nkit oŋnkuwo, yoto pakenke lakwar kuyutye wule koyunto neto.
59001025	Ntene ci tokol nye kakäs topon ntarastinek cepo manta co tyoce piko, oŋnkurip nye puryo kot kulimntoy pate ntene yiyisye ŋalek ce lime, mosukunyor nyoto kupeyok om kiy ake tokol nye yiye neto.
59001026	Ye sote cito kule opoye tini, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kuripe ŋelyepta nyenyi, kupuryo kot kuponto tinit nyenyi latik oŋnkuperperisyi nyoto.
59001027	Tinit nye tilil nyepo manta nye puryo kot ciwurta om taytap Yiyintet nye Papa kunyi kule: Ye kocerutoci ceköse lekok pononik oko musukik om toŋoŋutek ce ponto, oŋnkuripkey cito om wule mite simnyontet nyepo koret.
59002001	Mpo yeya, omnye oponte akwek koyenet om Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo nyepo woyinto, mente cecäm piko alak oŋnkotay alak om wule yunto soponto nyimwa nyepo saŋ.
59002002	Nteye kaco pesyet ake tuyet nyimwoŋ cito ake nye ponto komolilyet nyepo saput oŋnkelac sirok ce toponec, oŋnkuco yec pananet ake nye kelac sarkotok.
59002003	Ye koŋerekyi nyo kelac sirok ce toponec oŋnkomwoci kule, “Co nyi cepure ŋeceret nyi topon!’’ Ntene Omwoci pananet kule, “Yoŋe nyi yun.’’ Nto kule “Co cepure nyi yu po kerenkokwani.’’
59002004	Kupuryo kot kalel akwek yoto omnye koporu kweyisyet oyiyisye miyotyet?
59002005	Mpo yeya, olimnte! Kikwey Yiyintet pononik om koret sukuŋet kumokoren cekto om koyenet oŋnkunyor poytoyisyet nyo kikurtoci piko ce cöme neto.
59002006	Ntene onyile akwek pananet! Ŋo co toŋonyok akwek oŋnkukwerok kok wokuwosontyok? Mokorenik coto!
59002007	Coto kuce ŋolole kwapi kaynet nye topon nyo kicemulok cekurenok akwek.
59002008	Mosayiy akwek topon ye kayitite ntarastit nyepo poytoyisyet nyo kicesil silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Cäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
59002009	Ntene ye kacäm akwey piko kuyu wule yunto soponwek cepo saŋ, yoto kuye kalel ayiy miyotyet, oŋnkumutwok ntarastinek musankut kule koyiri ntarastinek.
59002010	Omnye ci tokol nye kalel kwiri ntarastit akenke kunye kalel nyoto kwiri ntarastinek tokol.
59002011	Omnye neto nyo kimwoy kule, “Mente ayiy sakwayanat.’’ Kunye nyoto akenke mpo nyo kimwoy kule “Mente oporisye.’’ Ye mneyiy sakwayanat, ntene oŋnkiporisye kukeyiri yoto ntarastinek.
59002012	Kunyo aŋalal oŋnkoyiyisye kuyu piko ce mocemutyi musankut kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek ce tyoce piko.
59002013	Omnye puryo komuce Yiyintet kukalya cito nye mutyini musankut cito nye puryo kot kukolyoyisyi, ntene pëlisyi kokolyoyisyet kupël musankut.
59002014	Mpo yeya, toponiyo ne ye komwoy cito kule, oponte koyenet. Ye puryo kot kuporu yisyonutekyi? Muce ra koynenyi kusop neto?
59002015	Nteye mite yeya ake nye moron nto korko nye moponto sirok oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto omik ce kam.
59002016	Topon pa ye kocemwoci kule, “Opurte kalyet, ololoŋitu oŋnkoyomisye opiyoŋnkye. Ye puryo kot koci cekto omik cepo porto ce kam?’’
59002017	Kunyo ye koyenet nkit pate nye puryo kot kumite yisyonutek; kukerkey nye kime koyenet nyoto.
59002018	Ntene mosukumwoy cito ake kule, “Oponte ani koyenet, iponte nyi yisyonutek ce toponec.’’ Mosawec ani omwowu kule, “Porwo ani pa, muce ra kuponto cito koyenet oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kuponto yisyonutek? Kuye mosoporuŋ ani koyenet nyimwani oko yisyonutek.’’
59002019	Yeni nyi so kule mite Yiyintet akenke nkit? Topon! Kunyo yene mpo oyik kuyunyoto, oŋnkuyweyisyi mpecek.
59002020	Yiku nyi solwo! Möce nyi kule ciporuŋ kule puryo kot kupunto koyenet latik nye moponto yisyonutek?
59002021	Asot pa kukonyo Apram wule kicesatita kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om yisyet nye kikwiy omnye kikoyto werinyi Isaka om otepto nye cepele korosek.
59002022	Puryo kot oköse akwek kule koyenet nyenyi oko yisyonutek kuce kikwiyis wanak? Yoto kuye kicekwil kupoyit manta koyenet nyenyi om yisyet nye kikwiy neto.
59002023	Kwitita yoto kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowec kule, “Kiyentyi Apram Yiyintet, sukuŋet kucäm Yiyintet kule po manta Apram okoy cekure corwetap Yiyintet.’’
59002024	Kunyo kokäs kule cesate kunyol cito om wule mite Yiyintet om yisyet nye yiye, ntene puryo kot om koyenet nyenyi nkit pate.
59002025	Kuyunyoto om wule mite korket nyo kicemoroniyo Rakap. Kisatakay neto kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om yisyet nye kikwiy omnye kiŋerekyi wotik Yutayek oŋnkukalya kuwuny okoy kumwey kurup aret ake.
59002026	Kunyo kuyu porto nye kime nye moponto soponto, kuyunyoto mpo koyenet nye moponto yisyonutek kunye kime mpene.
59003001	Mpo yeya, puryo kot kuroke oyiku konetik piko ce caŋ om akwek, omnye oŋnket kule acek co ciku konetik kuce mucemutwec musankut nyewo kupël piko alak.
59003002	Omnye kyiye acek tokol leliswek aret ce caŋ. Kunyo ye mite ci nye puryo kot kulele kenyis om ŋalek ce ŋolole, kunye nyoto nyepo manta nye muce kurip soponto nyenyi tokol.
59003003	Cikocini karnet kutitap Farasit sukuŋet kulimwec, kunyo cimuci cekwer kuwo wulyo tokol wule ce möce.
59003004	Akäs pa mpo Rapet, nka kot ku kiy nyewo koromun, ntene kosute yomet nyewo, ntene yiyisye kito nye miniŋ nye pire peko oŋnkukwer cito nyo kwere kuyu wule moktoy.
59003005	Kuyunyoto mpo ŋelyepta, kiy nye miniŋ koromun, ntene oŋnkusilekey koromun om tukuk ce woyec. Akäs pa woket nye muce kulay kupok kukapel mata nye kisic!
