59003006	Kerkey ŋelyepta oko mata, ŋelyepta kunye koret nyepo miyotyet nye mitowune wule ce mite. Mitowune porto nyinyo, oŋnku nye pciytoy miyotyet kunäm porto tokol. Neto kunye kocini kunäm mata nye cone kapkompic porto nyinyacek tokol.
59003007	Muce cito kunet tyoŋik, kunyo kikonet kot kunay tyoŋik tokol oko toritek oko erenok, oko tyoŋik cepo peko okoy kucömis kopur topon.
59003008	Ntene puryo ci nye muce kenyis kot kurip kunet okoy kopur ŋelyepta topon. Ŋelyepta kunye miyat, nye sokoran oŋnkuponto mwonet nyewo.
59003009	Cecupisye ŋelyepta, cikaste Mokoryontet oŋnku Papa, oŋnkyiyisye cecup mpo yeya ce kicitany om tonto nyepo Yiyintet.
59003010	Kutit kunye akenke nye kwone ŋalek ce cikoste oko ce cecupisye. Mpo yeya, puryo kot kuroke kuyuyit nyo.
59003011	Memuce kot kukosune yeto akenke peko ce misyontet oko ce toponec.
59003012	Mpo yeya, puryo kot kwiye mokoywet sapipunek, oŋnkupuryo kot kwiye sapipunek omik ce mokoyek. Kunyo puryo mpo kot kuwecekey peko ce misyontet kwek peko ce toponec.
59003013	Mite pa cito ake om wule omite akwek nye ŋom nye nkete ŋolyo? Möce koporune soponto nyenyi nye topon om yisyonutek ce yiye om toŋoŋutek oko ŋomnonet.
59003014	Ntene ye ponte corokyinotet nye mwa oko soynonet nye mite mukuleyŋuŋ, kupuryo kot kuroke silkey kwinyi nkit mwowu mwiynanet kerekte ŋalek cepo manta.
59003015	Puryo kot kucone ŋomnonet nyoto torot, cone koret, nye puryo kot ku topon oŋnkupo oyik.
59003016	Omnye! wule mitowune corokyinotet oko soynonet, kumite wuloto cokurotet oko miyotyonik wok tokol.
59003017	Ntene mpo yeya, tilil ŋomnonet nyepo torot, ponto kalyet, sikenotet oko corwantit, oŋnkuponto kakalyayatet nyewo nye konu Mokoryontit nyepo yisyonutek ce toponec, puryo kot kuponto kweyatet oko koperperisyo.
59003018	Nto kupuswek cepo toponiyet kuce kole piko co sutu kalyet.
59004001	Cone ono poryet oko wokutyet nyo oponte akwek? Cone corokyinotet nyimwoŋ nye omöce ŋerekwek ce mite kuportos om porwonikwok orit.
59004002	Omöce tukuk ntene puryo kot onyoru, yoto kuye oyiye wokutyet oko poryet. Monyoru tukuk ce omöce omnye puryo kot osome Yiyintet.
59004003	Puryo kot onyoru ye kosom omnye puryo kot osome topon, osome tukuk kule kyiyisye om ŋerekwekwok nkit.
59004004	Akwek piko co mocikenekey! Puryo kot oŋnket kule, ye keyiku corwet nyepo koret yoto kuye keyiku puniyontetap Yiyintet? Ci ake tokol nye möce kule oyiku corwetap koret, kunye yiku nyoto puniyontet nyepo Yiyintet.
59004005	Monte cisot kule po püc pate silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule: “Soponto nyepo Yiyintet nye konec acek, kunye ponto corokyinotet nyeker koromun.’’
59004006	Ntene poypoyet nye konu Yiyintet kunye ponto yec swamet kupëlis. Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Toye Yiyintet piko co silekey, ntene kocini kupeyok co toloyec.’’
59004007	Kunyo okoytekey akwek ape wule mite Yiyintet. Otay Setani nyewo nyepo oyik yoto kuye kumweyenok.
59004008	Akwa alekityi Yiyintet, yoto kuye kunok kulekitit om wule omite akwek. Awun yewuniyek cikwok piko co oponte miyotyonik! Awec Mukuleywek cikwok piko co oyiku kaperperot!
59004009	Onyeru yawut, orirye, omesye, awec roryet nyimwoŋ kwek mesyet! Awec ŋerekwek kwek nerekwek ce caŋ.
59004010	Onetkey otoloyitu om taytap Mokoryontet, mosukulaŋntak.
59004011	Mpo yeya, monte cerenyenkey akwek kwakwek nkit. Ci tokol nye kareny yeyanyi kunye kareny nyoto ntarastit oŋnkumutyi musankut. Ye kemutyi musankut ntarastinek kuye kemerupe ntarastinek coto, ntene mutyini pate musankut.
59004012	Yiyintet nkit kunye konu ntarastinek oŋnku ketintet. Neto mpo kunye sope oŋnkwaranta. Nyi kuŋo nye muci kot mutyi musanku cito ake nye akerkeyekey.
59004013	Alim pa piko co mwowu kule, “Mosicipe yawut nto tun okoy moŋet nyi nto nyin, wule mwocipur kenyit akenke kyiy kamonkesyantit okoy cenyoru latik ntene akany.’’
59004014	Puryo kot oŋnketi ŋolyontet nyepo pesyet nyepo tun, oko wule mosukopurto soponto nyeŋuŋ. Akerkeyekey akwek cekwerut nye coni lakwar oŋnkupot yec lakwar.
59004015	Ntene roke omwowu kule, “Ye kacäm Mokoryontet ye tocesoptosi mosayiy nyi nto nyin.’’
59004016	Kunyo osilekey akwek yawut, oŋosekey kunyo miyotyo silotet nyoto tokol.
59004017	Ye nkete cito kwiy ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kwiy, kakwiy cito nyoto ce miyotec.
59005001	Akwek mokorenik ce oponte tukuk, alim pa yawut! Orirye oyome mnyat om toŋoŋutek ce karik kukwontyok!
59005002	Kinuntyo mokoryontinekwok oŋnkwam solopik sirok cikwok.
59005003	Kukurwotyeci Sapunek oko karik cepo pesanik cikwok. Wule kerwotyeci ku wule mosukwek muncururwanik ce wosontyok akwek. Mosukwam panyek cepo porwonik cikwok kuyu mata. Kworuruc akwek mokoryontit om pesyosyek cepo letut ye karik ye ŋete koret.
59005004	Monokoci akwek musyaret piko ce kipote mparenikwok. Alim mpa rirek cikwa! Kupunto yitikap Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol rirek cepo piko co kisisyi om mparenikwok.
59005005	Kwopur koret oponte soponto nye topon oko ŋerekwek. Kwoyokwoyitu sukuŋet opoyitu pesyet nye cetilenok.
59005006	Kwomutyi musankut oŋnkapakäc cito nye moponto lelis nye memuce kot kuporyenok kuyetkey.
59005007	Kunyo mpo yeya, omuytoci okoy kuco Mokoryontet. Akäs wule muytocini kopotintet okoy kwiy mparenyi omik ce toponec. Muytocini neto okoy kuteryec koret kuropen ropta nyepo tayta oko ropta nyepo yo karik kwek kemey.
59005008	Misyini omuytoci mpo akwek. Osat topon mukuleywekwok, omnye karik pesyetap Mokoryontet.
59005009	Mpo yeya, monte ciŋunyŋunyi akwek kwakwek, nkit, sukuŋet mente cemutwok musankut. Mite ketintet yuteyu keyoŋe yepo kurket.
59005010	Mpo yeya, möce asot workoyik ce kiŋolole om kaynetap Mokoryontet. Möce kwek cekto kito nye ceköse om muytocinotet ye mite toŋoŋutek.
59005011	Cekure acek kule ponto cekto kupeyoy omnye kimuytoci. Kyolim kule kimuytoci Yopu, oŋnketi kule kikoci Yiyintet neto tukuk om letut. Omnye ponto Mokoryontet poypoyet nyewo oko kalyet.
59005012	Mpo yeya, kito nye pële tokol kunyi kule, monte ciwolyikey koret torot, nto mpo koret ŋony. Ye owolikey kawalet ake tokol. Omwowu pate kule, “Puryo’’ ye puryo kupoyit manta. Oŋnkomwowu kule, “Yunyoto’’ ye yunyoto kupoyit manta, sukuŋet mente kot kuwosontyok Yiyintet.
59005013	Mite pa cito ake om akwek nye ponto wuyinto? Kuroke kusom. Mite pa cito nye ŋerekat? Roke nyoto kutum tumwonik ce kostoyisye.
59005014	Mite pa cito nye mnyone? Roke nyoto kukur poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet, ce mosukusomnci cicoto oŋnkuŋape mwayta om kaynetap Mokoryontet.
59005015	Sayet nye kacesay om koyenet kunye mosukusop cito nye mnyone. Mokusop Yiyintet cito nyoto kukalya ye kikwiy miyotyet.
59005016	Kunyo oŋoŋu oporcinikey miyotyonikwok akwek kwakwek oŋnkosomncinikey kwakwek nkit sukuŋet osopce. Ponto Swamet nyewo koromun sayet nye topon.
59005017	Eriya kunye ci nye kikerkey oko acekto. Kisom koromun kule mente kuropen ropta. Yoto kutay moropen ropta kuwany kenyisyek somok ok orok lö.
59005018	Oŋnkusom yec, yoto kuropen ropta okoy kupityo omik.
59005019	Mpo yeya, ye kotepe kot kumasakay cito ake om akwek marup aret nyepo manta, oŋnkuwec cito ake kot kuketkey yec,
59005020	kuroke kunket ŋolyontet nyi kule, ci tokol nye kawec cito nye miyat kwasta lelisto nyenyi mosukusop soponto nyepo cito nye miyat oŋnkusut mpo kokolyoyisyet nyepo miyotyonik ce caŋ.
60001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Petero kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Osilwok akwek kweyanikap Yiyintet ce miŋisyi kuyu wuwen ce kiseretyi korosyek cepo Ponto, oko Kalatiya oko Kapontokiya oko Asia oko Pisiniya.
60001002	Kicekweyak akwek kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet Papa. Kicesatak oyiku piko cetililec kupunte Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet, sukuŋet aywey Yesu Kristo oŋnkowunok om korotikyi. Kunyo kutosyikey poypoyet oko kalyet om wule omite akwek.
60001003	Möce cikaste acek Yiyintet Papa kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo! Omnye kikonec acek soponto nyelel om kokolyoyisyenyi nyewo omnye kiŋet kotutune met Yesu. Konec acek ŋaleca kokenotet nye sopot.
60001004	Kunyo cemite cekonye kule cenyoru kupeyok ce caŋ ce kikonorci Yiyintet pikyi. Kikonorwok akwek kupeyocu om torot wule puryo kununtos nto kuwuryo nto mpo kupotyo.
60001005	Ripok topon swamet nyepo Yiyintet omnye kyocäm Yiyintet, kunyo mosicisopok om pesyet nyepo letut ye poru ŋalek cepo kosopenyi.
60001006	Möce aŋerec om ŋalecoto, nka kot kuroke orirye yawut kuminiŋ om toŋoŋutekwok ce caŋ ce otoŋonyi.
60001007	Poru toŋoŋutecoto kule po manta koyenet nyimwoŋ. Muce saput kuwur kupot, ntene cesyeme cepele mata sukuŋet cekäs kule topon. Kunyo yunyoto mpo koyenet nyimwoŋ nyepo latik kupël Saput, misyini cesyem sukuŋet kutitir, sonyoru akwek kakastayet oko woyinto oko koyweyisyet om pesyet nye ciŋoŋu kutok Yesu Kristo.
60001008	Ocöme akwek neto nka kot kupuryo kot okäs, Oyeni neto nka kot kupuryo kot oköse yawut; oŋerekyini om ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun.
60001009	Omnye omite onyoru musyaret nyepo koyenemwoŋ, nyoto kukosopotet nyepo mukuleywekwok.
60001010	Kosopet nye yunyitenyi kunyo kicenye workoyik koromun oŋnkuŋor kokotutecutecu mosukukonok akwek Yiyintet.
60001011	Kiŋor Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Kristo nye kimite wule mite workoyik. Toŋoŋutek ce mosukunyor Kristo oko woyinto nye mosukuco om letut. Ntene kisyem cek kule cinket pesyo ne pesyonoto oŋnku mosukuco kulene.
60001012	Kiŋany kuporci Yiyintet workoyik yisyet nye kikwiye cek, kunyo kipuryo kot kupo toponiyet nyimwacek nkit. Yoto kuye kiŋolole cek ŋalek cenöme ŋalecu kwalim akwek yawut kukwane wule mite kiyokik cepo lokoywek ce toponec. Kimwoy cekto ŋalecato om swametap Muyet Nyetilil nye kiciyok om torot. Ŋalecutecu kuce möce mpo malaykanik kule nto cinket.
60001013	Kunyo oripkey oŋomekitu om kasoteywekwok, oŋnkokasekey kupeyok ce mosicekonok akwek pesyet nye ciporu Yesu Kristo.
60001014	Aywey Yiyintet. Monte kupaytak yec kopurto nyimwoŋ nyepo corokyinotet nyo kyoponte ye kitompo kot osowu.
60001015	Möce otililitu om tukuk tokol ce oyiye kuyu wulo tilil Yiyintenyo.
60001016	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule “Misyini otililitu akwek omnye oyiku ani tilil.’’
60001017	Okure akwek neto kule Papa ye osome Yiyintet, Yiyintet kunye mutyini piko tokol musankut koyoyec wule yunto yisyet nye kikwiy cito. Kunyo misyini opur koret om aret nye oyweyi neto.
60001018	Omnye oŋnket akwek kito nye kikyale sukuŋet cityakenak wule mite soponto nye moponto latik nyo kikonok mpo kukomwoŋ. Kipuryo kot kukiy nye wure kuyu pesya nto Saput.
60001019	Kicityacak kyalenak korotikap Kristo ceponto latik. Kicikoyto neto kuyu lekwap kecir nye moponto tisyet nto mpo simnyontet.
60001020	Kicekwey Yesu kupoyit ŋalecu kutompo kot citany koret, kunyo kucipor om pesyosyecu po letut kupo toponiyet nyimwakwek.
60001021	Kyoyen akwek Yiyintet kupunte wule mite neto. Yiyintet kunye kiŋet neto kotutune met oŋnkukoci woyinto, sonyoru akwek koyenet oko kokenotet om wule mite Yiyintet.
60001022	Kunyo yawut omnye kwopukte akwek simnyontet nyepo mukuleywekwok, oŋnkoywey ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkocämnkey akwek nkit kupoyit manta, kuroke kwek cömisyet nyimwoŋ kiy nye yiyisyi oŋnkucone mukuleywekwok orit.
60001023	Kuceyiyok aret nyepo oyeny kupunte ŋolyontet nye sopot nye mopoku nyepo Yiyintet. Kunyo oyiku lekokap Papa nye sope okokoy nye puryo kot kume.
60001024	Kuyu wule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kerkey piko tokol suswek, kerkey woyinto nyepo cito taptok cepo samiyita! Yamntos suswek, kulelece taptok.
60001025	Ntene pure ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet kenyis ce mopoku.’’ Ŋolyontonoto ku lokoywek ce toponec co kicemwowok akwek.
60002001	Kunyo awirte onumunekey akwek nkit miyotyonik tokol, oko mwiynanet, oko koperperisyet oko corokyinotet oko cupisyet.
60002002	Kuyu lekoy ce rwerun ce möce ceko pate, kuyunyoto mpo akwek roke omäc ceko ce tililec cekwone torot, sukuŋet onerye oŋnkosopce.
60002003	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kwacemcem akwek nkit tolosyetap Mokoryontet.’’
60002004	Kunyo akwa wule mite Mokoryontet nye rwantet nye sopot nye kitay piko kule puryo kot ku topon cetekse, ntene kikwey Yiyintet kule topon.
60002005	Akwa akerkeyitu oko rwontok ce ponto soponto oŋnkokany cetektak cetekenak kayta nye tilil nyepo kotap Yiyintet, wule mosoyiyisye akwek kuyu tisik ce tililec cecöme Yiyintet. Punte korosecoto wule mite Yesu Kristo.
60002006	Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Akäs mosokoci Siyon rwantet nye kweyan, rwantet nyoto kunye ponto latik koromun, puryo kot kolilone ci tokol nye kacäm neto.
60002007	Ponto rwantani latik ce caŋ koromun om wule omite akwek piko co cömisyi; ntene om wule mite piko co puryo kot kucömisyi kucu kule, Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule puryo kot kuponto latik kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.’’
60002008	Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet yec kule, “Rwantanitenyi kunye noce piko koputis, Kitawet nye mosikonoc piko koputis.’’ Mosicinoc cekto omnye kipuryo kot kuyen ŋolyontet. Kicäm Yiyintet kule kopur cek kuyunyoto.
60002009	Ntene oyiku yemet nye kweyat, oyiku tisikap kinko, oyiku yemet nye tilil, oyiku piko cepo Yiyintet ce kicekweyak sukuŋet oporu yisyetap Yiyintet nyepo kakitat. Yiyintet kunye kikurok akwane wule mite menonet kwonyoru lakweyenyi nye cikite.
60002010	Kipuryo kot oyiku akwek ikye om pesyosyek alak pikap Yiyintet ce kweyotin, ntene kunyo oyiku yawut pikyi. Kipuryo kot oŋnket akwek ikye wule yunto tolosyetap Yiyintet, ntene kunyo kwonyoru yawut tolosyenyi.
60002011	Coronutekwani, osomok ani akwek kuyu pic ce toyek oŋnkuwuwen om koroni! Ntene monte cecäm tukuk ce cöme porto, ce mite kwak kuportos oko soponto.
60002012	Möce opurte kopurto nye topon om kwenutap piko co menket Yiyintet. Sukuŋet nka mpo ye kowosontyok akwek kule oyiye miyotyet kuye kukäs cekto yoto yisyonutek ce toponec, oŋnkukasta cek Yiyintet om pesyet nye coni cokumut musankut.
60002013	Aywey akwek kamukeywek cepo ci tokol nyewo om kaynetap Mokoryontet. Aywey mpo Kinko nyewo nye pëlisyi om kamukeywek.
60002014	Aywey mpo poytoyik ce kikoyok neto cokutaŋany piko ce yiye miyotyet oŋnkokaste piko co yiye ce toponec.
60002015	Omnye möce Yiyintet kule akerekte akwek ŋalalet nyepo piko co perper om ŋalek ce toponec ce oyiye.
60002016	Möce kule opur kuyu pic ce tyokotin. Monte ciyisye katyakatet nyo oponte kwek siret nye yene miyotyet, ntene opur kuyu mutworik cepo Yiyintet.
60002017	Aywey piko tokol, acäm piko cikwok co kikoyen. Aywey Yiyintet oŋnkaywey Kinko nyewo
60002018	Möce akwek mutworik aywey mokorenikwok, oŋnkoporci kayweyisyet nyepo manta, nka mpo ye toponec oŋnkutoloyec nto mpo ye wusisyi.
60002019	Omnye ye nkete cito kule opontekey Yiyintet oŋnkumuytoci wuyinwek nka mpo ye kopuryo kot kumisyini kunyoru cicitenyi kupeyokap Yiyintet.
60002020	Omnye monyoru kakastayat ne, ye komuytoci pirisyet nye misyini, roke onyoru omnye kwalel? Ntene ye kwomuytoci toŋoŋutek omnye kwayiy ŋolyo nyepo manta, mosukukonok Yiyintet kupeyok om ŋolyontonoto.
60002021	Kicekurcok akwek ŋolyontonoto. Omnye kitaŋany Yesu Kristo kupo akwek oŋnkupokokwok pelutyet sukuŋet arup akwek neto letut.
60002022	Kipuryo kot kwiy neto miyotyo, oŋnkupuryo ŋolyo mpo akenke nyepo mwiynan nye kicone kutinyi.
60002023	Kipuryo kot kuwec kucupis ye kicecupe. Kipuryo kot kunyer neto ye kitoŋonye, ntene kikokenekey Yiyintet nye ketintet nyepo manta.
60002024	Kristo nkit kunye kikesen miyotyonik kyacek om murtowontet, sukuŋet cepoku acek nye komokyiye miyotyet oŋnkyesopce om ŋalek cepo manta. Kunyo mwayok ceci kuce kisopok akwek.
60002025	Kyokerkeyekey akwek kecir ce kipotyi aret nye pete, kunyo kiceketwok kwarup mesewontet oko ripintet nyepo soponwekwok.
60003001	Kunyo mpo akwek koruk möce aywey sanikwok. Nteye mite sanikwok alak ce puryo kot kucöme ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, kuye kucömis omnye kakäs cek kopurto nye topon nye oponte akwek. Puryo kot omuci akwek kot omwowu ŋolyo,
60003002	omnye mosukukäs cekto wule yunto tililinto oko koyweyisyet nye oponte akwek.
60003003	Puryo kot kuroke otase toponiyet nyimwoŋ tukuk ce ciloce, kuyu putek ce kacilet oko sonoyek oko raranik oko sirok.
60003004	Möce kuporkey toponiyet kwine nkit om mukuleyto nye paypay nye cone soponto nyepo cito orit. Puryo kot kumite kito nye muce kot kowurta soponto nyoto, oŋnkuponto latik ce caŋ om taytap Yiyintet.
60003005	Omnye kikwiy kuyunyoto koruk cepo keny ce kikoyen ce kikenekey Yiyintet. Kitililitu cek kuyunyoto kuywey sanikwa.
60003006	Kiyunyoto Sara, omnye kiywey neto Apram omnye kikure, mokoryontenyu. Oyiku akwek yawut tipikyi ye kayiy ŋalek ce toponec nye puryo kot omuye kiy ake.
60003007	Mpo akwek Moronik, mocë opurte poypoyet oko korukwok om soponto nyepo kamütisyet. Misyini oŋnket kule puryo kot kuponto cek swamet nye kerkey moronik. Kunyo misyini aywey omnye mosukunyor mpecek tokol kuyu akwek kokotutyet nyepo soponto nye konu Yiyintet. Ayiy kuyunyoto sukuŋet mente kot kukerekta kito ake somset nyimwoŋ.
60003008	Ŋolyontet nyepo letut, möce kule oponte akwek tokol kasoteywek ce kerkey, acämnkey akwek nkit kuyu mpo yeya. Möce opoypoyitu akwek kwakwek nkit.
60003009	Monte ceyokune miyotyet ake miyotyet ake, nto koyokune cupisyet ake. Ntene möce ayakte osomnci kupeyok, omnye kikurkyok Yiyintet kupeyok ye kikurok.
60003010	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ye möce cito kule aŋerekyi soponto; oŋnkunyor soponto nye topon, kumöce kurip ŋelyepnyi maŋalal ŋolyo nye miyat, oŋnkuripkey maŋalal kutinyi mwiynan.
60003011	Misyini kwasta kuwecekey wule mite miyotyet oŋnkwiy ce toponec, puryo kot kuroke kucas ye cenye kalyet.
60003012	Omnye ripe Mokoryontet kuköse piko co toponec, Oŋnkulime somset nye some picoto, Ntene tukyini patay piko co yiye ce miyotec.’’
60003013	Ŋo nye muce kowurtak ye omöce akwek kule kyiy ŋalek ce toponec?
60003014	Ntene nka mpo ye kotaŋany ye omite oyiye ŋalek cepo manta, kumöce aŋerec monte cemuye piko, monte cisot!
60003015	Aywey Kristo om mukuleywekwok, oŋnkokoci kwek Mokoryontemwoŋ. Ayiytekey pesyosyek tokol sukuŋet owekyi ci tokol nye katepenak kule ororwo kokenotet nye oponte akwek.
60003016	Ntene möce ayiy kuyunyoto om tolosyet oko koyweyisyet. Möce oponte ŋomnonet nye topon sukuŋet soponto nyimwoŋ nye oponte om Kristo kusutyi kolilonis piko co ŋololenok kwapi.
60003017	Topon ye kacetaŋany ye kyiye ce toponec ye möce Yiyintet kule kwiyokis kuyunyoto, kusir ye kakyiy miyotyet.
60003018	Omnye kime Kristo nkit kumeci miyotyonik cikwakwek aret akenke oŋnkuwany kupok. Kime cito nye topon kumeci piko ce miyotec, sukuŋet kuntowok akwek ape wule mite Yiyintet. Kicepakäc neto kume met nyepo porto, ntene kotutune met om Muyet.
60003019	Kiwo muyenyi nye sopot wokuŋololyi oyik ce kimite mopusitap met.
60003020	Oyik cutecu kupo piko co kipuryo kot kuywey Yiyintet ye kimuytocini neto om pesyosyek co kitece Nuwa rapet. Kisopce peko yoto piko ce ŋeri pate ce kipuntoy sisit ce kimite rapet.
60003021	Poru pecu patisanet, nto patisanani kunye sopok akwek yawut. Kunyo puryo kot kunumu simnyontet nyepo porto, ntene sopok kurtoyet nye kacemwoy om wule mite Yiyintet kucone mukuleyto nye topon orit. Sopok patisanet kupunte kotutunetap met nyepo Yesu Kristo,
60003022	nye kiwo torot, nye mite yawut kukepure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet kupoytoy malaykanik tokol oko kamukeywek oko swamet nyepo torot.
60004001	Kitaŋany Kristo toŋoŋutek cepo porto, kunyo misyini otitir mpo akwek kuyunyoto oŋnkarup kosoteywekyi, omnye ye kataŋany cito om porto nyenyi, kuye yoto ye komokwiye miyotyet.
60004002	Kunyo kuceke yawut kuwo tay, ye tomite koret misyini soponto nyimwoŋ kwek soponto nye poytoy Yiyintet nye puryo kot kupoytok corokyinotet nyepo porto nyepo cito.
60004003	Kyawany akwek pesyos ce caŋ co kitil oyiye ŋalek co yiye piko co menket Yiyintet, kyopurtoy soponto nye kyoyiye sakwayanatet oko corokyinotet oko pokitet oko arosyek ce miyotec oko sokwonutek cepo pokitet oko sayet nye miyat nye osoye kerkeyik.
60004004	Kunyo kukukite picoto yawut ye puryo kot kukosök akwek opontekey oko cekto om soponto nye miyat nyo yiye cek kucupok akwek.
60004005	Ntene mosukuror kumwoy musankut nyepo ŋalek cikwa om taytap Yiyintet nye mosukumutyi musankut piko co kipok oko ce soptos.
60004006	Kicemwoci lokoywek ce toponec piko co kipok sukuŋet kopur soponto nyimwa nyepo muyet kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet, nka kot kicemutyi porwonikwa musankut kuyu piko tokol.
60004007	Karik pesyet nye pekune tukuk tokol. Misyini oripkey akwek nkit oŋnkopoypoyitu sukuŋet omuc osome.
60004008	Ntene kupëlis möce acämnkey owoŋnkyi akwek kwakwek nkit, omnye yene cömisyet miyotyonik ce caŋ.
60004009	Atorockey akwek om korikwok nye puryo kot oŋunyŋunyi.
60004010	Kikokoci Yiyintet ci ake tokol om akwek kokotutyet nyenyi nkit, kunyo möce oyiyisye okokoy kuyu ripikap tukuk ce toponec ce kikonok Yiyintet.
60004011	Ye ponto ci tokol ŋolyo nye möce kule omwowu, kumisyini kuŋalal ŋolyontet nyepo Yiyintet. Nteye mite cito kukolyoyisyi, kumöce kwiyisye swamet nye kocini Yiyintet neto, sukuŋet cikasta Yiyintet om tukuk tokol kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo nyo ponto woyinto oko swamet okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyonto.
60004012	Coronutekwani, monte cikite mata nyepo mwoninto nyo otoŋonyi, kuyu nye mite kwiyoktos ŋolyo nye monket akwek. Yiyoktos ŋaleca kusyemak akwek.
60004013	Ntene möce aŋerec omnye otoŋonyi toŋoŋutek ce kipo Kristo sukuŋet kuyemak ŋerekwek om pesyet nye ciporu woyinto nyenyi.
60004014	Möce osutkey kule ceponte kupeyoy ye kacecupok omnye oyiku konomik cepo kristo. Omnye poru ŋalecato kule Muyet Nyetilil nyewo nyoto, kunye Muyet nyepo Yiyintet nye mitowune wule omite akwek.
60004015	Puryo kot kuroke kutaŋany ci ake tokol om akwek omnye koporis nto omnye corin nto omnye sokoran, nto omnye wutekey ŋalek cepo piko alak.
60004016	Ntene ye yiku Kristoyin oŋnkitaŋany mente alilan, kaste Yiyintet omnye ponte kaynetap Kristo.
60004017	Kapunto pesyet kucec musankunek. Mosicenyosye cewosontyi piko cepo Yiyintet. Kunyo ye kacecenec acek, mosiciwaŋnta ra kulene om wule mite piko co puryo kot kucöme lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet.
60004018	Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Korom koromun ye mosisop piko ce toponec, kunyo mosukwiyakay kulene om wule mite piko co menket Yiyintet, oko piko co ponto miyotyet?’’
60004019	Kunyo piko co toŋonye kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet, kuce misyini kutosyikey kwiy ŋalek ce toponec oŋnkukenekey Kotoŋintemwa nyo yititoy kurtoyenyi.
60005001	Osomwok akwek poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet ce mite wule omite akwek, oŋololi mpo ani kuyu Pontet. Kyakäs toŋoŋutek cepo Kristo, kunyo okeni kule mosonyoru woyinto nye mosiciŋoŋ. Osomwok kule,
60005002	oyiku mesewek cepo kecirek cepo Yiyintet ce kicekonok orip. Orip topon kuyu wule moktowok Yiyintet, ntene nye puryo ku kule omnye omöce musyaret, ntene omnye omöce kule kyiy.
60005003	Monte cepayte kwapi piko co kicekonok, ntene oporci kopurto nye topon nye kakäsenak.
60005004	Nteye kopunto pesyet nye porukey kutok Mesewontet Nyewo, kuye sonyoru mpo akwek musyaret nyepo woyinto nye mopoku.
60005005	Kunyo möce aywey mpo akwek, oyiperik poyik cikwok cewoyec. Möce alac akwek tokol siret nyepo tolosyet oŋnkokalyekey yisyonutek. Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Toye Yiyintet piko co silekey, ntene oŋnkukoci kupeyok piko co poypoyec.’’
60005006	Kunyo opoypoyitu oyem opurune yewutap Yiyintet nye ponto swamet, sukuŋet koŋetak oŋetye om pesyet nye kikwey neto.
60005007	Ye osoti koromun, owirci kasoteywekwok coto oponte wule mite neto, omnye ripok.
60005008	Okösu oŋnkoripkey! Mite puniyontet nyimwoŋ Setani nyewo nyepo oyik kuwesetoti kutule kuyu ŋetuny kuceŋoti cito nye möce kule atakum ayam.
60005009	Okwilokisye om koyenet nyimwoŋ oŋnkotay oyinot cekwol yitik, omnye oŋnket kule mite mpo yeya mwoŋ alake om koret tokol ce mite kutoŋonye toŋoŋutek ce kerkey cikwok.
60005010	Ntene om letut kuminiŋ ye kataŋany, mosikusatak Yiyintet nkit nyepo kupeyok tokol nyo kikurok akwek kwonyoru woyinto nye mopoku om koyomotet nye oponte oko Kristo, oŋnkukonok swamet oko kwilatet oŋnkotitirok.
60005011	Kopurune swamet wule mite neto okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
60005012	Kosilwok ani parwani nwac kusir wule mite Silifano yeya nye oŋnket oŋnkokenekey. Omöce ani kule akwilak akwek oŋnkomwowok ŋalek cikwani kule kokotutyetap Yiyintet nyitenyi nyepo manta. Okwilokisye koromun om ŋolyontoni.
60005013	Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet cepo Papulon ce kikwey Yiyintet mpecek kuyu akwek, oŋnkusupayak werimwani Marko.
60005014	Asupaykey akwek nkit om ŋatutet nye poru cömisyet nyepo Kristayek. Kante kopurune kalyet tokol wule omite akwek co opoye Kristo.
61001001	Cone parwani wule amite ani Simon Petero, mutworintet oŋnku kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Osilwok ani akwek piko ce ponto koyenet nyepo latik nye kerkey nyinyacek. Omnye Yiyintet nyinyacek oko kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo om yisyenyi nyepo manta kunye kikonec acek tokol koyenoni.
61001002	Kutosyikey poypoyet oko kalyet kupunte ŋomnonet nye oŋnket Yiyintet oko Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
61001003	Kikonec acek swametap Yiyintet tukuk tokol ce cemöce, sukuŋet cipur kopurto nyepo Yiyintet oŋnkyinket Kristo nyo kikurec acek kwocenyoru woyinto nyenyi oko toponiyet.
61001004	Om aret nyeyu nyitenyi kuye kikonec kokotutek ce woyec ce toponec ce kikurto, sukuŋet kukalyak akwek kokotutecutecu ocilile arantayet nyepo corokyinotet nye mite koret, oŋnkwonyoru soponto nye kerkey nyepo Yiyintet.
61001005	Om ŋolyontoni, kumöce asyem koromun otosyi toponiyet om wule mite koyenet nyimwoŋ, otosyi ŋomnonet om wule mite toponiyet nyimwoŋ.
61001006	Otosyi ŋomnonet nyimwoŋ om ripotetapkey, oŋnkotosyi muytocinotet, oŋnket Yiyintet oŋnkotosyi cömisyet nyepo tupcet nye oponte kuyu mpo yeya.
61001007	Nto om tupcet kuyu mpo yeya, otosyikey ocäm piko tokol.
61001008	Ye oponte akwek kopurto nyeyu nyitenyi nye mite kutosyinikey okokoy, kuye mosukukunok oyiyisye om swamet opoyitu latik oŋnkukonok onyoru ŋomnonet nye yeme om wule mite Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
61001009	Ntene korat nye memuce kukästa ci ake tokol nye moponto kopurto nyoto oŋnkiyutye kule kiciwun miyotyonikyi co kipo tay.
61001010	Kunyo mpo yeya, asyem oyiyisye swama koromun akwil kursyet nyo kicekurok oko kweyatet nyo kikweyak Yiyintet, puryo kot osutoy akwek mpo kisic ye kayiy kuyunyoto.
61001011	Om aret nye yunyoto kuye mosicekonok akwek kamukeywek ce owute poytoyisyet nye mopoku nyepo Mokoryontenyo oŋnku Kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo.
61001012	Kunyo mososilwok ani ŋalecutecu okokoy nka kot conket akwek, oŋnkokwilokisye om ŋalek cepo manta ce kyonyoru.
61001013	Asoti ani kule ŋolyo nye topon ye kasotwok kulelakitu ŋalecu om kasoteywekwok ye tosope.
61001014	Oŋnket kule om pesyos ce ŋeri mosawirte porto nyitenyi nune kuyu wulo kikurtowo kumwowo Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
61001015	Kunyo mosasyem koromun okonok akwek ye omuci kot osot ŋalecu om pesyosyek tokol ye kamey ani.
61001016	Puryo kot kyiyisye acek tyonkocok ye cemwowok kamukeywek cepo ye coni Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Kicekäs woyinto nyenyi om konyekyo.
61001017	Kicemite acek yeto ye kikocini Yiyintet Papa neto Woyinto oko kakitatet, ye kicone kutit wule mite Yiyintet nyepo woyinto nye kimwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani Camanet, nye oŋerekyini Koromun!’’
61001018	Kicelim acek nkit kutit nyitenyi kucone torot ye kicepontekey acek oko neto om tulwet nyetilil.
61001019	Kunyo cikenekey koromun ŋolyontet nye kimwoy workoyik. Mosayiy akwek topon ye kotepe kot alimnte ŋalecato, omnye kerkey ŋaleca oko tarit nye kwenye menonet okoy korir koret, oŋnkukweny mukuleywekwok kokelyet nyepo ye kayec koret.
61001020	Ntene nye pëlisyi kunyi, möce oŋnket kule puryo ci nye muce kuror wule yunto ŋorsyet nyepo silutekap Yiyintet.
61001021	Omnye puryo kot kumite workoyonti nye kicemwoy kenyis om cömisyet nyepo cito. Ntene kintoci Muyet Nyetilil piko ye kiŋolole lokoywek ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet.
61002001	Kuyu wulo kimite mpo keny workoyik ce mwiynec ce kipontokey piko, kuyunyoto mosukutok konetik cepo mwiynanet om wule omite akwek. Mosukusut cek konetisyet nye sutu arantayet nyewo. Mosukutuckey kutay Mokoryontet nye kisope cekto, kunyo mosukusutyikey kwarantakey cek nkit lakwar.
61002002	Kunyo mosukurup piko ce caŋ kapurto nyepo picoto miyotec, mosukuŋalale piko kwapi aret nyepo manta kukesac ŋalek ce oyiye akwek.
61002003	Om corokyinotet nyimwa kuye mosukunyor latik om wule omite akwek koneticutecu po mwiynan omnye komwowok ŋalek cepo koperperisyo pate. Kicemutyi cek musankut keny, kunyo mite ceyiytoy aranet nyimwa.
61002004	Kipuryo kot kusop Yiyintet malaykanik co kikwiye miyotyet, ntene kiwirta kupa tokol wule mite mata nye momise, wule kicerotyi wule mite menonet kukonye pesyet nyepo musankut.
61002005	Kipuryo kot kusop Yiyintet koret nyepo keny, ntene kikon peko ce kilum koret nyo kipo piko ce menket Yiyintet. Kisop yoto cito akenke, nyoto ku Nuwa nye kimwoytoy ŋalek cepo manta, wanak oko piko alak tisap.
61002006	Kimutyi Yiyintet musankut moŋosyek cepo Sotom oko Komora oŋnkwaranta kupele mata kwek aryantet pate. Kikwiy kuyunyoto sukuŋet kwek kaporunot om wule mite piko co menket Yiyintet kuyu wule mosiciyita cekto om letut.
61002007	Kisor Yiyintet Lot omnye ki cito nye topon nye kisenkere miyotyet nyepo sakwayanat nyepo piko ce kiwuryo.
61002008	Kiminye Lot wule mite picoto, kunyo kilime oŋnkukäs ŋalek tokol okoy kunerec mukuleynyi nye kitopon om ŋalek ce miyotec ce kikwiye picoto.
61002009	Kunyo nkete Yiyintet wule soruntoy piko cepo Yiyintet om wule mite syemutok, oŋnkunket wule mokuripto piko ce miyotec om wule mite toŋoŋutek okoy pesyet nyepo musankut.
61002010	Nto piko ce nyoru musankut nyewo kuco rupe corokyinotet nye samis nyepo porwonikwa oŋnkunyil kamukeywekap Yiyintet. Nyikon koromun koneticutecu mwiynot, oŋnkunyilysi nye puryo kot kuyweye cepo torot; cupe pate,
61002011	Nka mpo malaykanik co ponto swamet nye pële nyepo picutecu mwiynot kuce puryo kot kucupisyi ye cewosontyini om taytap Mokoryontet.
61002012	Kunyo kerkey picutecu oko tyoŋin cepo samiyita ce kicitany kule sicetece oŋnkyepakäce kupok. Cupe tukuk ce puryo kot konket cekto. Mosikyaranta cek kuyu tyoŋin cepo samiyta.
61002013	Mosukuyokune ŋalecato toŋoŋutek kupo toŋoŋutek cek kikon cekto. Ŋerekwek ce ponto cekto pate kuye kayiy ye pet kwen ŋolyo nye ŋerece corokyinotet nyepo porwonikwa. Konok kalilan oko sornon ye koyomisye akwek oko cekto, omnye ŋerekyini cek orosyek cepo mwiynanet ye yiye kuyunyoto.
61002014	Puryo kot kumöce kule nto cekäs kiy ake tokol, ntene möce kule cekäs pate koruk cemoronisyek. Puryo kot kupoku mucesta ye mokwiy miyotyet. Ntocini cek piko co moponto swamet kupa wule mite musatit! Kicinet mukuleywekwa kucäm corokyinotet. Kicup Yiyintet cekto!
61002015	Kikwasta aret nye rotat, kunyo kipotyi aret. Kirup pate aret nye kiwete Palam weritap Peori nyo kicöme pesanik ce kinyor om aret nyepo miyotyet.
61002016	Kunyo kicepolyi celel neto om miyotyonikyi. Kiŋalal sikiryet nyenyi nyo moŋolole, kuyu cito okoy kukerekta punmetyontit nyepo workoyontet.
61002017	Kerkey picu oko koŋik co kosune peko ce kiteny, kerkey oko polik ce wuse yomet. Kikonorci Yiyintet cekto otepto nyimwa om mwenet orit wule mite menonet.
61002018	Ŋolole cek ŋalek cesilekey oŋnkuperperisyi oŋnkwiye corokyinotet nyepo sakwayanatet nyepo porwonik sukuŋet kutec kunäm co kucec kule cemweye wule mite piko co purtoy kopurto nye masat.
61002019	Kurtocini cekto piko cut kule monyoru kalyet oŋnkurok yec ku mutworik cekto nkit cepo miyotyet, omnye mutworin cito nyepo tukuk co kipayta cito nyoto.
61002020	Kicilile piko miyotyonik ce mite koret kupunte ŋomnonet nyepo Mokoryontenyo oŋnku kosopintet Yesu Kristo; oŋnkuketyikey kupayta yec tukucoto picoto, kuporkey kule mosukuwur soponto nyepo picoto nyepo letut kupël soponto nye kipo tay.
61002021	Kitopon nto kipuryo kot konket cek kenyis aret nyepo manta kusir ye kinkoket cek oŋnkuweckey kutay ntarastit nyetilil nye kicikoci.
61002022	Tukuk ce kikwiyokis om wule mite cekto kuce poru kule po manta tyonkoconi mwowu kule, “Ketyinikey ŋokit kwam kuŋuŋntak ce keŋuŋu nkit.’’ Mwowu yec kule, “Ketitoykey nkururwet nye kociwun wokomilmile yec sakatyet.’’
61003001	Coronutekwani! Parwemwani nyitenyi nyepo oyeny nye kwosilwok akwek. Kwasyem om poronok tukway kule osowu kasoteywek cikwok cepo manta omnye kwasotwok ŋalecu.
61003002	Omöce ani asot akwek ŋalek co kiŋalale workoyik cetililec ikye keny oko ntarastit nyepo Mokoryontet oŋnku Kosopintet nyo kimwowok akwek kiyokik.
61003003	Nyepo tayta, möce oŋnket kule om pesyosyek cepo letut mosukutok piko alake ce poytoy soponwek cikwa corokyinotet nyepo porwonikwa. Mosukucasenekey akwek kucupok.
61003004	Mosukumwoy kule, “Kikurtoci neto cek kule mosaco. Ano yawut? Kipok mpo kukonyacek, kunyo mite kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo kiyunto kuceke kicitany koret!’’
61003005	Toye cek macäm ŋalek cepo manta kule kiŋalal Yiyintet ikye keny, yoto citany wulin po torot oko ŋony. Kitanyakay koret kucone wule mite peko om kwenutap peko.
61003006	Kunyo peko mpo yec kuce kiyin kwaranta koret nye kipo tay.
61003007	Ntene ŋolyontetap Yiyintet nyoto akenke kunye mite kuripe koret nyi mite yawut, sukuŋet kyarante koret mata nye loye. Cemite ceripe okoy pesyet nye mosicemutyine musankut piko co miyotec oŋnkyaranta.
61003008	Coronutekwani! Ntene monte ceyutye ŋolyontoni akenke kule, kerkey pesyet akenke oko kenyisyek elifut akenke om wule mite Mokoryontet, oŋnkukerkey kenyisyek alifut akenke oko pesyet akenke.
61003009	Puryo kot kwiye Yiyintet möt ŋolyo nye kikurto kuyu wulo sotitoy piko alake, ntene muytocini om wule omite akwek, omnye puryo kot kumöce kule kupot ci ake tokol, ntene möce kule kurenyenkey ci tokol kwasta miyotyonik.
61003010	Ntene mosukuco pesyetap Mokoryontet kuyu corin. Om pesyonoto kuye mosukupot wulin po torot om karumnta nyewo koromun. Mosukulayo kupotyo kokelik om torot om mata nye loye, oŋnkupot koret oko kiy ake tokol nye mite orit.
61003011	Kunyo ye kacaranta tukuk tokol ce mite koret kuyunyitenyi, mosoyeku akwek piko ceyune? Misyini kutililitu soponwekwok oŋnkoywey Yiyintet,
61003012	omite okonye pesyetap Yiyintet. Asyem koromun sukuŋet kuco lakwar. Pesyet nyoto kuye mosicepël wulin po torot oŋnkyaranta kuloy kupotyo kokelik om torot om mata nye loye.
61003013	Ntene cekonye acek ce kikurto Yiyintet, coto ku koret nyelel nyepo torot oko koret nyelel nyepo ŋony, wule mosukopurune toponiyet nyepo tililinto.
61003014	Kunyo coronutekwani, ye omite okonye pesyonoto, kumöce asyem opur otililitu nye moponte lelis om taytap Yiyintet oŋnkopurte kalyet oko neto.
61003015	Akäse muytocinotet nyepo Mokoryontet kuyu poroyinto nye kikonok akwek sukuŋet cisopok kuyu wulo kisilwok akwek yeyanyo Paulo kwiyisye ŋomnonet nye kiŋoŋnkyi Yiyintet.
61003016	Ŋalecutecu kuce mwowu neto om poronokyi tokol ye sile ŋalek ce nöme ŋolyontoni. Mite ŋalek cewuyec ce mite poronokyi. Ŋolole piko co perper ce puryo kot kukwilotin kwiyisye mwiynanet kuyu wulo mostoy cek mpo ŋalek alak cepo silutekap Yiyintet. Kunyo mokwarantakey cek nkit.
61003017	Ntene akwek coronutekwani, kicisowok akwek keny ŋalecutecu, kunyo oripkey sukuŋet mente kot kumasak piko co yirye ntarastinek okoy otay aret nyimwoŋ nye kwilat nyepo manta.
61003018	Ntene otosyikey onerye om poypoyet oko ŋomnonet nye oŋnket Mokoryontenyo oŋnku Kosopintet Yesu Kristo. Kopurune woyinto wule mite neto kuceke yawut oko okokoy okoy okokoy. Yunyoto.
62001001	Cesilwok acek ŋalek ce nöme ŋolyontet nyepo soponto nye kimite kuceke towunot. Kicelim oŋnkyekäs acek om konyekyacek kirotote, oŋnkyename yewuniyekyo.
62001002	Ciŋoŋ cipor soponto okoy cekäs acek, ce nöme soponto nye mopoku nye kiciporwec nye mitowune wule mite Papa.
62001003	Kunyo cemwowok acek akwek kito nye kicekäs oŋnkyelim, sukuŋet oyomekey akwek oko acek om koyomotet nye ceponte acek oko Papa oko Werinyi Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Cesilwok acek ŋalecu sukuŋet kuyemec ŋerekwek.
62001005	Kunyo ŋolyontet nye kicelim acek kucone wule mite Werinyi nye cemwowok acek kunyi kule, Yiyintet kunye lakweyet, puryo kot kumite menonet mpo kisic om wule mite neto.
62001006	Kunyo ye kacemwowu kule ceponte koyomotet oko Yiyintet oŋnkurok yec cemite wule mite menonet, kuporkey kule coperperisyi pate om ŋalek ce cemwowu oko yisyet nye kyiye.
62001007	Ntene ye kicipurte lakweyet, kuyu wulo ponto neto lakweyet kuye mosicipurte acek koyomotet kwacek nkit, yoto kuye mosukowunec korotikap Werinyi Yesu kunum miyotyonik tokol.
62001008	Ye kacemwowu acek kule moceponte miyotyo, kaciperperkey acek nkit oŋnkupuryo kot ceponte ŋalek cepo manta.
62001009	Ntene ye kacerenynkey cemwoci Yiyintet miyotyonikyo, mosukukalyec oŋnkuwunec om wule mite miyotyonik tokol, omnye Yiyintet kunye po manta oŋnkwiye ŋalek cepo manta ce toponec okokoy.
62001010	Ye kacemwowu kule mnakyiy kutoku kule kociperperisye oŋnkuporkey kule puryo kot kumitowune ŋolyontetap Yiyintet wule cemite acek.
62002001	Lekokwani, kosilwok ani ŋalecu sukuŋet mente kot ayiy miyotyo. Ntene ye kotepe kot kwiy citake miyotyo, ceponte Yesu Kristo nye mite kuyetyewec acek om wule mite Papa.
62002002	Yesu Kristo nkit kunye aret nye cikolyenec acek miyotyonikyo, nye puryo kot ku miyotyonik cicacek nkit pate, ntene oko mpo miyotyonik cepo koret tokol.
62002003	Ye kacerup ntarastinekap Yiyintet kuye sukuporkey kule cinket acek neto kupoyit manta.
62002004	Ye kotepe kot kumwoy citake kule, oŋnket Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kurupe cicoto ntarastinek cepo Yiyintet, kuporkey kule mwiyny cico oŋnkupuryo kot koponto ŋalek cepo manta.
62002005	Ntene ci ake tokol nye rupe ŋolyontet nyepo Yiyintet kunye cito nyo nye kicäm Yiyintet kuwoŋnkyi.
62002006	Ye komwoy citake kule opoye Yiyintet kumisyini kurup cicoto kopurto nye kipo Kristo.
62002007	Coronutekwani, puryo kot osilwok ani ntarastit nyelel, ntene ntarastini kunye po keny nye kyolim akwek kuceke keny. Ntarastit nyepo keny ku lokoywek co kyolim ikye.
62002008	Ntene yec ntarastit nyi osilwok ani kunye lel, nto ŋalek cepo manta ce mite ntarastini kunye ceköse kule mitowune wule mite Kristo oko wule omite akwek. Omnye mite kutile menonet kunyo mite koluwu yawut lakweyet.
62002009	Ye komwoy citake tokol kule oponte lakweyet oŋnkurok yec kusenkere cicoto yeyanyi kutokumite cito nyoto wule mite menonet okoy mpo pantanyi.
62002010	Ci ake tokol nye cöme yeyanyi kunye ponto nyo lakweyet oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto kiy nye muce kusokyi citake kwiy miyotyet.
62002011	Ntene mitowune menonet wule mite ci ake tokol nye senkere yeyanyi, wesetote cicoto menonet orit oŋnkupuryo kot konkete wule weti, omnye kikokor menonet konyek ceci.
62002012	Osilwok ani akwek lekokwani, omnye cikolyoy miyotyonikwok om kaynetap Kristo.
62002013	Osilwok ani akwek mpo Papa, omnye oŋnket akwek neto nye kimite kuceke towunot. Osilwok ani akwek oyiperik omnye kyopël akwek oyinot cekwol yitik!
62002014	Kosilwok ani kwek lekok omnye oŋnket akwek Papa. Kosilwok ani akwek mpo papa, omnye oŋnket akwek neto nye kimite kuceke towunot. Kosilwok ani akwek oyiperik, omnye oponte akwek swamet oŋnkumitowune Yiyintet wule omite akwek, kunyo kyopël akwek oyinot cekwol yitik.
62002015	Monte cecäm koret nto mpo tukuk ce mite koret. Ye kacäm citake koret, kupuryo kot kumitowune cömisyetap Papa wule mite neto nyoto.
62002016	Om kiy ake tokol nyepo koret, kuyu corokyinotet nyepo miyotyet, oko tukuk ce köse piko oŋnkumäc, oko tukuk tokol cepo koroni ce silekey piko, kuce puryo kukwone tukucoto mpo akenke wule mite Papa, ntene kwone pate koret.
62002017	Mite kupote koret oko kiy ake tokol nye corokyini piko. Ntene musukusop okokoy cito nye yiye yisyet nye möce Yiyintet.
62002018	Lekokwani, karik ye ŋete koret! Kicemwowok akwek kule musukuco puniyontet nyepo Kristo; kutok yawut punikap Kristo ce caŋ, kunyo cinketi kule karik ye ŋete koret.
62002019	Kipuryo kot kupo picu luket nyinyacek, nto kipure wule cemite acek, kunyo kipete cek wule cemite acek sukuŋet kuporkey kule puryo kot kupo cek luket nyinyacek.
62002020	Ntene kiŋapenak Kristo Muyet Nyetilil, kunyo oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta.
62002021	Kosilwok ani akwek nye puryo kot ku kule omnye monket akwek ŋalek cepo manta, ntene omnye oŋnket akwek ŋalecato po manta, oŋnkonket mpo kule puryo ŋolyo nyepo mwiynan nye muce kenyis kucone wule mite ŋalek cepo manta.
62002022	Kunyo ŋo nye mwiyn? Cito nyoto kunyo toye kumwowu kule Yesu kunye puryo kot ku Kristo. Cito nyoto kunye puniyontet nyepo Kristo. Toye cico Papa oko Werit.
62002023	Omnye ci ake tokol nye katay Werit kukatay mpo cicoto Papa. Nto ci ake tokol nye kacäm Werit, kupontokey cicoto mpo oko Papa.
62002024	Kunyo orip topon om mukuleywekwok lokoywek co kyolim akwek keny. Ye korip akwek ŋalek co kyolim kuceke keny, kuye mosopurte koyomotet oko Werit oko Papa.
62002025	Kito nye kikurtowec acek Kristo nkit ku soponto nye mopoku.
62002026	Kosilwok ani ŋalecu ce nöme piko co syem kule cemasak akwek.
62002027	Ntene akwek nkit kuce kiŋapenak Kristo Muyet Nyetilil. Ye tokopurune Muyet Nyetilil wule omite akwek, kupuryo kot omöce akwek citake nye kenetak. Omnye nete Muyet Nyetilil ŋolyo ake tokol, oŋnku ŋolyo nyepo manta ŋolyo ake tokol nye nete neto nye puryo mwiynan. Kunyo arup konetisyet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkopurune wule mite Kristo.
62002028	Kunyo lekokwani, opurune wule mite Kristo cekwilokisye om pesyet nye cone neto nye puryo kot ceponte kalilan nye cewunyekey.
62002029	Oŋnket akwek kule po manta Kristo, kunyo misyini oŋnket kule ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek ce toponec kunye lekwetap Yiyintet cito nyoto.
62003001	Akäs pa, kicämec acek Papa koromun! Cemosi koromun cömisyet nyenyi, sukuŋet cekurenec lekokyi. Kunyo ciku lekokyi cepo manta. Kunyi kito nye kisac sukuŋet menketec acek koret, omnye kipuryo kot konket koret Yiyintet.
62003002	Coronutekwani, ciku acek yawut lekokap Yiyintet, ntene puryo kot cipor kutok topon wule mosicipurte. Cinket acek kule pesyet nye toku Kristo kuye mosicekerekeyitu oko neto, omnye mosicekäs wule yunto neto nkit.
62003003	Ci ake tokol nye kosekey Kristo kunye misyini kutililkey kuyu wule tilil Kristo.
62003004	Ci ake tokol nye yiye miyotyet, kunye ponto lelisto nye kokwiri ntarastinekap Yiyintet, omnye ye kakyiy miyotyet kukerkey nye kokyiri ntarastit.
62003005	Oŋnket akwek kule kico Kristo, sukuŋet kunum miyotyonik cepo piko, oŋnkonket kule puryo kot kuponto neto miyotyo.
62003006	Kunyo puryo kot kwiye miyotyo ci ake tokol nye ponto soponto nyepo Kristo, ntene ci ake tokol nye kotosyikey kwiye miyotyet kunye tompo kot kukäs nto mpo konket cicoto neto.
62003007	Lekocu! Mente kot kumasak citake. Po manta ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek ce toponec.
62003008	Nto cito nye tosyinikey kwiye miyotyet kupo cito nyoto Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, omnye kikwiy Setani nyewo nyepo oyik miyotyet kuceke towunot. Kunyo kico Weritap Yiyintet wule mite neto cicoto.
62003009	Puryo kot kwiye miyotyet omnye kikwek lekwetap Yiyintet.
62003010	Ŋalek ce poru kupoyit manta pciyatet om wule mite lekok cepo Yiyintet oko cepo Setani nyewo nyepo oyik kucu kule, ci tokol nye puryo kot kwiye ŋalek cepo manta nto nye puryo kot kucöme yeyanyi kunye puryo kot ku lekwetap Yiyintet cito nyoto.
62003011	Lokoywek ce kyolim akwek kuceke keny kucu kule, misyini cecämnkey acek kwacek nkit.
62003012	Puryo kot kuroke cekerkeyitu acek oko Kain nye kipo oyinot cekwol yitik, omnye kipar mutakwam. Omne sukupar Kain mutakwam? Omnye kikwiy neto tukuk ce puryo kot kupo manta, ntene kwiy mutakwam tukuk ce kipo manta.
62003013	Kunyo mpo yeya, monte cikite ye kotepe kot kusenkerak koret.
62003014	Kicinket acek kule kicekwane met oŋnkyekwa wule mite soponto, cinket kuyunyoto omnye cecöme acek mpo yeyanyo. Ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kucömisyi, kuminye nyo wule mite met.
62003015	Porin ci tokol nye senkere yeyanyi, kunyo oŋnket akwek kule, puryo kot kuponto ci nye porin soponto nye mopoku.
62003016	Kito nye porwec cömisyet kunyi, kikoyto Yesu soponto nyenyi kumecec acek. Kunyo misyini cikoyte mpo acek soponwek cico cepokyi mpo yeya!
62003017	Ye mokoryo citake nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ oŋnkuköse yeyanyi nye moponto kiy oŋnkurok kutukyi yeyanyi patay, komuce cicoto kulene kumwoy kule ocöme Yiyintet om mukuleynyi?
62003018	Lekokwani, puryo kot kuroke kwek cömisyet nyinyecak ŋalek ce ceŋololi pate, ntene misyini kwek cömisyet nyepo manta nye poru yisyet nye kyiye.
62003019	Kunyo ye kakyiy yisyet nyeyunyitenyi kuye sicinket kule cepoye acek manta, oŋnkyekwilokisye om taytap Yiyintet.
62003020	Ye komutwec acek mukuleywekyo musankut, kunyo cinket kule nyewo Yiyintet kupël mukuleywek kyacek oŋnkunket kiy ake tokol.
62003021	Kunyo Coronutekwani, ye puryo kot kumutwec acek mukuleywekyo musankut, kuye ceponte titiret om taytap Yiyintet.
62003022	Oŋnkyenyoru acek kiy ake nye kucesom, omnye cerupe ntarastinyi oŋnkyiye ŋalek ce ŋerekyini neto.
62003023	Ntarastit nye kikonec kunyi kule ciyen acek kaynetap Werinyi Yesu Kristo oŋnkyecämnkey acek nkit kuyu wulo kimwowec neto.
62003024	Ye karup ci ake tokol ntarastitap Yiyintet kopurune Yiyintet wule mite neto. Cimuci acek cinket kulene kule mitowune Yiyintet wule cemite acek? Cinket omnye porwec Muyet Nyetilil nye kikonec neto.
62004001	Coronutekwani, monte ciyen ŋalek cepo piko tokol ce sutekey kule ceponte Muyet Nyetilil, ntene asyem okoy oŋnket kule cone Muyet nye ponto picoto wule mite Yiyintet. Omnye kuseretyi koret wulyo tokol workoyik cepo mwiynanet.
62004002	Ye sonket akwek kule cöne Muyet nyoto wule mite Yiyintet kuye kaŋalal cito kupor kule; kico Yesu koret kuyu cito.
62004003	Nto ci tokol nye kotoyis macäm kuyunyoto kunye puryo kot koponto cito nyoto Muyet nyepo Yiyintet oŋnkupuniyontet nyewo nyepo Kristo nyo kyolim akwek kule musukuco. Kunyo mite yawut koret.
62004004	Lekokwani, opoye akwek Yiyintet kunyo kyopël workoyik co mwiynec, omnye Yiyintet nyo mitowune wule omite akwek kunye ponto swamet nyewo kupël puniyontet nyewo nyepo Kristo nye mite koret.
62004005	Ŋolole workoyik cepo mwiynanet ŋalek cepo koret, kunyo limncini koret ŋalek, omnye po cekto koret.
62004006	Ntene cepoye acek Yiyintet. Limwec acek ci ake tokol nyepo Yiyintet. Puryo kot kulimwec acek ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye sicinket acek pciyatet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nyepo manta oko nyepo mwiynanet.
62004007	Coronutekwani! Akany cecamnkey acek kwacek nkit, omnye cone cömisyet wule mite Yiyintet. Lekwatap Yiyintet ci ake tokol nye ponto cömisyet oŋnkunket Yiyintet.
62004008	Puryo kot kunket cito nye moponto cömisyet Yiyintet, omnye Yiyintet kunye cömisyet,
62004009	Kiporwec Yiyintet cömisyet nyenyi, omnye kiyok Werinyi nye akenke kuco koret sukuŋet cenyoru acek soponto kupunune wule mite neto.
62004010	Cömisyet kunyi kule, kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kicecäm acek Yiyintet ntene omnye kicämec acek oŋnkuyok Werinyi sukuŋet kwek korosyontet nyepo miyotyonik cicacek.
62004011	Coronutekwani, ye kicämec acek Yiyintet kuyunyoto, kunyo misyini cecämnkey mpo acek kwacek nkit.
62004012	Puryo ci nye kikäs Yiyintet kenyis. Kunyo ye kacecämnkey acek kwacek nkit, kuye sukopurune Yiyintet wule cemite acek oŋnkwitita cömisyenyi om wule cemite acek.
62004013	Cinket kule cemitowune acek wule mite Yiyintet, oŋnkumitowune neto wule cemite acek, omnye kikonec Muyet Nyetilil.
62004014	Kicekäs acek kunyo cemwocini piko alak kule kiyok Papa Werinyi cokwek kosopintet nyepo koret.
62004015	Ye ketor citake tokol kumwoy kule Yesu kunye Weritap Yiyintet, kopurune Yiyintet wule mite cito nyoto oŋnkopurune cicoto wule mite Yiyintet.
62004016	Cinket acek nkit cömisyet nye ponto Yiyintet om wule cemite, kunyo kicecämec. Yiyintet ku cömisyet, nto ci tokol nye ponto cömisyet kunye mitowune cicoto wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkopurune Yiyintet wule mite cicoto.
62004017	Kikyiy kwitita kunyol cömisyet om wule cemite acek sukuŋet cetitir om pesyet nyepo musankut, omnye kerkey soponnwek cicacek om koroni oko nyepo Kristo.
62004018	Puryo kot kumite muyotet om wule mite cömisyet. Kwete cömisyet nye kinyol muyotet ake tokol. Kunyo puryo kot kunyolu cömisyet om wule mite cito nye muye, omnye sutu muyotet toŋoŋutek.
62004019	Cecömisyi acek, omnye kinyosyo Yiyintet kucämec acek.
62004020	Ye komwoy, citake kule, “Ocöme Yiyintet.’’ Oŋnkurok yec kusenker yeyanyi, kokwek cicoto mwiyn. Omnye puryo kot komuce neto kucäm Yiyintet nyo tompo kot kukase konyekyi ye puryo kot kucöme yeyanyi nye köse konyekyi.
62004021	Kunyo ntarastit nye kikonec acek Kristo kunyi kule, Misyini ci nye cöme Yiyintet kucäm mpo yeyanyi.
62005001	Lekwetap Yiyintet ci ake tokol nye yene kule Yesu kunye ŋapanet. Nto ci ake tokol nye cöme Papa kucöme mpo lekwenyi.
62005002	Aret nye sicinket kule cecöme acek lekokap Yiyintet kuye kacecäm Yiyintet oŋnkyerup ntarastinekyi.
62005003	Cömisyet nye cëcöme acek Yiyintet kunye poru kule cerupe ntarastinekyi, Puryo kot ku wuyec ntarastinekyi om wule cemite acek.
62005004	Omnye ci ake tokol nye lekwetap Yiyintet kunye kukupël koret. Cimuce acek kot cipël koret om koyenenyo nye ceponte.
62005005	Ŋo nye muce kupël koret? Cito nyoto kunye yene kule Yesu kunye Weritap Yiyintet.
62005006	Yesu kunye cito nye kico, kiconto peko cepo patisanenyi oko korotik cepo met nyenyi. Kipuryo kot kuconto peko nkit pate, ntene kiconto peko oko korotik. Kunyo Poru Muyet Nyetilil kule po manta ŋalecu.
62005007	Mite muncururwanik somoku.
62005008	Coto ku Muyet Nyetilil oko peko oko korotik, kunyo yicintos cutecu ku somok.
62005009	Ye cecäme acek kule manta ŋalek ce mwowu piko, ntene woyec kupëlis ŋalek ce mwowu Yiyintet. Kimwoy Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme Werinyi.
62005010	Kunyo ponto ci tokol nye cöme Yiyintet ŋalecu om moyenyi. Ntene ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kuyene Yiyintet kunye mwiyn, omnye puryo kot kucäm ŋalek ce kimwoy Yiyintet ce nöme Werinyi.
62005011	Ŋalek cepo Yiyintet cepo manta kucu kule, kikonec acek neto soponto nye mopoku, kunyo mitowune soponto nyoto wule mite Werinyi.
62005012	Ponto soponoto ci ake tokol nye kupoyit Werit oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto soponoto ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kupontokey Werit.
62005013	Osilwok ani ŋalecu akwek piko co cöme kaynetap Werit nyepo Yiyintet sukuŋet oŋnket kule ceponte soponto nye mopoku.
62005014	Cikenekey acek neto, omnye cinket kupoyit manta kule limwec ye kocesom kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo moktoy neto.
62005015	Nteye cinket acek kule limwec okokoy ye kacesom ku yoto ye cinketi mpo yec kule cenyoru kiy ake tokol nye kacesom acek neto.
62005016	Ye kakäs citake tokol kwiye yeyanyi miyotyet nye puryo kot kupo ŋokis, kuroke kusomnci Yiyintet sukuŋet kunyor cicoto soponto. Nöme ŋalecu piko co puryo kot kwiye miyotyet nyepo ŋokis. Mite miyotyet ye sutu met, kunyo puryo kot omwowok ani kule osom Yiyintet om miyotyet nyeyunyo.
62005017	Miyotyo ye kakyiy ŋolyo ake tokol nye miyat, ntene kumite miyotyet nye puryo kot kupo ŋokis.
62005018	Cinket acek kule puryo kot kumite lekwetap Yiyintet nye tosyinikey kwiye miyotyet, omnye ripe Yiyintet neto topon, oŋnkupuryo kot komuce kowurta oyinoto neto nyoto.
62005019	Cinket kule cepoye acek Yiyintet nka kot kupoytoy oyinoto cekwol yitik koret tokol.
62005020	Cinket kule kico Weritap Yiyintet, kunyo kikonec ŋomnonet sukuŋet cinket Yiyintet nyepo manta. Mitowune soponnwek cicacek wule mite Yiyintet nyepo manta oko wule mite Werinyi Yesu Kristo. Nyitenyi kunye Yiyintet nyepo manta, nyitenyi kunye soponto nye mopoku.
62005021	Lekokwani, oripkey akwek topon om wule mite yiyinwek cepo mwiynan!
63001001	Ani nyo Pontet, osilyini parwani Cepyosyet nye kikwey Yiyintet oko lekokyi ce ocöme ani kupoyit manta. Puryo kot ku ani nkit nye ocöme, ntene oŋnkucöme mpo piko tokol ce nkete ŋalek cepo manta.
63001002	Omnye mosukopurune ŋalek cepo manta wule cemite acek. Mosicipurte okokoy okoy okokoy.
63001003	Kante kukonec acek Yiyintet nye Papa oko Werinyi Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko cömisyet oko kalyet. Kante kopur soponnwek kyacek ŋaleca kupoyit manta om cömisyet.
63001004	Kyanyoru ani ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun yu kowo oŋnket kule purtoy lekok cekuk alake ŋalek cepo manta kuyu wulo kimwowec acek Papa.
63001005	Kunyo, cepyos puryo kot osiluŋ ani nyi yawut ntarastit nyelel, ntarastit nyitenyi kunye po keny nye mwowu kule misyini cecämnkey acek kwacek nkit.
63001006	Cömisyet nyi oŋolole ani kunye poru kule misyini cipurte acek kopurto kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekap Yiyintet. Ntarastit nye kyolim akwek kuceke keny kunyi mwowu kule, misyini opurte akwek tokol cömisyet.
63001007	Mite piko kaperperik ce caŋ ce kuseretyi koret, picoto kuce puryo kot kucöme kule kico Yesu Kristo kuyu cito. Cito nye mwowu kuyunyoto kunye perperisyi oŋnku puniyontet nyewo nyepo Kristo.
63001008	Kunyo oripkey akwek mente kupotwok tukuk cepo yisyet nye kyayiy sukuŋet onyoru musyaret nye yemok.
63001009	Ci ake tokol nye weti tay kot kukeyte konetisyet nyepo Kristo, kunye moponto cito nyoto Yiyintet. Nto ci nye ripe konetisyenyi kunye pontokey nyoto Papa oko Werit.
63001010	Kunyo ye kaco ci ake tokol wule omite akwek nye puryo kot kusutu konetisyet nyitenyi, monte cetoroc cico kuco korikwok, monte mpo cisupay.
63001011	Omnye ci ake tokol nye kesupay kunye yicintos oko neto om ŋalek ce miyotec ce yiye.
63001012	Oponte ani ŋalek ce caŋ ce omöce kule omwowok akwek, ntene puryo kot omoce kule osilunenok karatasit oko winet, ntene mosoco ani okoy kwoceŋalal kuyemec om ŋerekwek.
63001013	Kesupayiŋ lekokap cekwomet nye kikwey Yiyintet. Kesupayiŋ koromun.
64001001	Ani nyo Pontet, Osilyini parwani Kayo nye ocöme kupoyit manta
64001002	Arenyo corwenyu. Osome ani kule roke pur topon om kiy ake tokol, oŋnkosom kule roke purte nyi soponto nyepo porto kuyu wulo ponte soponto nye topon om mukuleyto nyeŋuŋ.
64001003	Kyaŋerec ani koromun omnye kukwa mpo yeya oŋnkukwomwoy kule ponte nyi koyenet nye kwilat nyepo ŋalek cepo manta. Omnye purtoy nyi ŋalek cepo manta.
64001004	Puryo ŋolyo nye ŋereco ani kupël ye kalim kule purtoy lekokwani kapurto nyepo manta.
64001005	Corwenyu, ponte nyi koyenet nyewo koromun om yisyet nye yicini mpo yeya, nko mpo toyek.
64001006	Kiŋalaleniŋ nyi cekto topon om wuli om taytap pikap Yiyintet. Kunyo kalye nyi cekto kutosyikey kupa tay om aret nye ŋerece Yiyintet.
64001007	Omnye kucäm cek kule cipe tay om yisyet nyepo Kristo nye puryo kot kumöce kule cenyoru kokolyoyisyet nye cone wule mite piko co puryo kot kuyen.
64001008	Kunyo cikalye acek piko ceyucutecu sukuŋet ciyomekey tokol oŋnkyiy yisyet nyepo manta.
64001009	Kyosilyi parwet pikap Yiyintet, ntene Tiotrepe nye möce kule oyiku kantoyintet nyimwa kunye puryo kot kulime ŋalek cicacek.
64001010	Kunyo ye kaco ani kuye mosoporwok ŋalek ce miyotec ce cikite cepo mwiynan ce ŋolonenec acek. Ntene puryo kot kwiy pate ŋalek coto, puryo mpo kot kutoroce mpo yeya ye kakwa, oŋnkukerektoy mpo yeya alak ce möce kule ceŋerekyi picoto oŋnkusyem kule cekwet picoto kupete wule mite pikap Yiyintet.
64001011	Corwenyu, mente arup kiy ake tokol nye miyat, ntene rup muste kiy nye topon. Ci ake tokol nye yiye ce toponec kunye po nyoto Yiyintet.
64001012	Ŋolole ci tokol topon Temetrio, poru mpo ŋalek cepo manta wule yunto neto. Cetosyini mpo acek kule topon neto, kunyo nketi kule cemwowu acek ŋalek cepo manta.
64001013	Oponte ŋalek ce caŋ ce omöce kule omwowok akwek, ntene puryo kot omöce kule oyiyisye kalamut oko winet.
64001014	Asoti ani kule mosakasiŋ lakwar, kunyo yoto kuye mosiceŋalal tukway.
64001015	Opurte kalyet, Kesupayiŋ coronutekuk ce mite wuli. Osupoywec coronutek cicacek tokol.
65001001	Cone parwani wule mite Yuta, nye mutworintetap Yesu Kristo oŋnku mutakwametitap Yakopo. Osilwok akwek piko co kikur Yiyintet, piko coto kuce kikopurto cömisyetap Yiyintet Papa oko ripset nyepo Yesu Kristo.
65001002	Kante opurte akwek kuyemak kokolyoyisyet oko kalyet oko cömisyet.
65001003	Coronutekwani, kwasyem koromun kule osilwok ŋalek ce nöme kosopotet nyo ceponte acek tokol okoy asot kule misyini otitirok akwek yawut sukuŋet oporyeci koyenotet nyo kikokoci Yiyintet kowoŋnkyi pikyi.
65001004	Omnye kukwa piko alake kucorkey okoy kwokowut wule omite akwek. Piko coto kuco wece lokoywek ce nöme poypoyetap Yiyintenyo sukuŋet kwiy ŋalekwa cepo sakwayanat oŋnkutay cekto Yesu Kristo nye konetintenyo oŋnku Mokoryontenyo nye akenke pate. Kiŋor silutekap Yiyintet ikye keny musankut nye mosukunyor cekto.
65001005	Amöce ani kule osotwok akwek ŋalek alak ce kyonket tokol. Ŋalecato kuco kisope Mokoryontet Yiyintet kusor piko kukwane Misiri oŋnkwaranta om letut piko co kipuryo kot kuyen neto.
65001006	Amöce ani mpo yec kule osotwok ŋalek ce nöme malaykanik co kipuryo kot kurip wule ŋete kamukeywek cikwa, yoto kwasta wule kiminye. Kirate Yiyintet cek nyororonik om wule mite menonet nyepo okokoy sukuŋet cewosontyi ye kopunto pesyet nyewo.
65001007	Asot pa Sotom oko Komora moŋosyek ce kilekitec, kuce kikwiy mpecek sakwayanatet; kunyo kinyor toŋoŋutek om wule mite mata nye momise sukuŋet kwek kasowunot om wule mite piko tokol.
65001008	Om aret nye kerkey mpo nyoto, kunye ponto piko cutecu ŋoŋutok ce wece cek sukuŋet kwiy miyotyet kowurta porwonik cikwa. Nyile kamukeywek cepo Yiyintet, cupe cek cewoyec ce mite torot.
65001009	Nka mpo malayket nyewo Mikael om tintenotet nye kiponto oko Setani nyewo nyepo oyik om ŋalek ce nöme kule ŋo nye mosut musto nyepo Moses. Kipuryo kot kusyem Mikael kule acup Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, ntene kimwoy pate kule, “Kuwosontyiŋ Yiyintet.’’
65001010	Ntene cupe picutecu tukuk ce puryo mpo kot konkete cek nkit, nto mpo tukuk co nket kuyu wulo nketitoy tyoŋik cepo samiyita, kuce tukuk coto ce wurtoy kwaranta cekto.
65001011	Mite picoto kwapi koromun! Kurup cek aret nyo kirupe Kain. Kukukoytokey cek nkit kurup aret nyepo leliswek kuyu wulo kikwiyta Palam. Kwesokyi cekto pesanik. Kutoyis kuyu wulo kitoyisyi Kora, kunyo kukwaran kuyu Kora.
65001012	Kerkey cek simnyontet nye kilekenit om omikwok cepo sakwetap koyomotet. Omisye cekto mesanikwok nye moponto kalilan. Sötekey cek nkit pate. Kerkey oko polik co sute yomet ntene onkupuryo kot kuropene. Kerkey ketik ce puryo kot kwiye omik, kuyu ketik cepo yo karik kwek kemey koret ce kicikor oŋnkuyom.
65001013	Kerkey cekto peko cepo ruretyet ce wuse yomet om ŋalekwa cepo kililan cetoku kuyu pukantet. Kerkey cekto oko kokelik ce mutukey ce kiyiytoci Yiyintet otepto nye mite wule mite menonet nye tuyi.
65001014	Enok nye mucokoretap Atam, pinta nyepo tisap nyepo Atam kunye kiŋor ŋalecu nöme cek kumwoy kule, “Akäs! Kaco Mokoryontet oko malaykanikyi ce tililec
65001015	ce caŋ cokuwosontyi piko tokol. Oŋnkumutyi musankut piko ce menkete Yiyintet ce ponto miyotyonik om yisyonutekwa ce miyotec ce kikwiy, oko om ŋalek tokol ce miyotec ce kiŋalale cekto neto kwapi.’’
65001016	Picutecu kuce ŋunyŋunye kwak oŋnkureny piko alak. Rupe pate corokyinotet nye miyat nyepo porwonik cikwa. Sutekey kuŋalal ŋalek cepo silotet oŋnkuperper piko alak kule sukuŋet cenyoru aret nye möce cekto nkit.
65001017	Ntene akwek coronutekwani, möce asot ŋalek co kimwowok kiyokikap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
65001018	Kimwowok kule, “Ye kopunto pesyosyek nyepo letut, mosukutok piko ce kencururok, piko coto kuce puryo kot kopunto tini, ntene rupe pate corokyinotet nyepo porwonik cikwa nkit.’’
65001019	Picutecu kuce sutu pciyatet. Kipayta picutecu corokyinotet nye kiceyito nye puryo kot kupo Muyet Nyetilil.
65001020	Ntene akwek coronutekwani, möce onerye akwek nkit om koyenet nye tilil koromun, oŋnkosom om swamet Muyet Nyetilil.
65001021	Misyini opurte akwek nkit cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkoken soponto nye mopoku nye mosukukonok Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo om kokolyoyisyenyi.
65001022	Mite piko alake ce mocömntoy topon, oporci piko coto poypoyet,
65001023	Oporci yec piko alak poypoyet nye oripkey, ntene asenker sirok cikwa ce kimolokonitu om miyotyonik cepo corokyinotet.
65001024	Kunyo om wule mite neto nyo muce kuripok akwek mente kot osute, oŋnkupartak oŋereci nye moponte lelis om taytap woyin nyi.
65001025	Om wule mite Yiyintet akenke kosopintenyo, kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo. Kopurune Woyinto oko koyweyisyet oko swamet oko kamukeywek om kenyisyek ce kitil oko yawut oko okokoy oko okokoy! Yunyoto.
66001001	Ŋalecu kuce ŋoŋutokap Yesu Kristo ce kikoci Yiyintet sukuŋet nyo kuŋoŋnkyi kuporci mutworikyi tukuk ce mosukwiyokis lakwar. Kimwoy Yesu ŋalecu omnye kiyok malaykenyi kuco wule mite mutworintenyi Yowana.
66001002	Yowana kunye mwowu ŋalek tokol ce kikäs. Ŋalecutecu kuce po manta ce nöme lokoywek ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet oko ŋalek cepo manta ce kiŋoŋ kupor Yesu Kristo.
66001003	Ponto kupeyoy nye sumone ŋalecu po workoyontini oŋnkuponto kupeyoy co lime oŋnkurup ŋalek ce mite kitapuni, omnye karik pesyet nye yitite ŋalecu.
66001004	Ani Yowana nye osilyini lukosyek tisap cepo co kikoyen ce mite koretap Asia. Kwek cikwok poypoyet oko kalyet ce kwone wule mite neto nye mite, oŋnku nye kimite, oŋnku nye mosukuco, oŋnku kwone wule mite mukuleywek tisapu ce mite ŋeceratap poytoyisyet om taytap Yiyintet.
66001005	Oŋnkukwone wule mite Yesu Kristo, nye muncururwet nyepo manta, oŋnku nye kipoyit tayta kotutune met, oŋnku nye poytoy kinkonik cepo koret. Kristo kunye kicämec oŋnkutyacec cekwane wule mite miyotyonik kyacek om korotikyi.
66001006	Kunyo kikonec ciku poytoyik ce tisik cepo Yiyintet Papanyi. Kopurune woyinto oko swamet wule mite Yesu Kristo okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto.
66001007	Akäs, mite kucontoykey polyok! Mosukukäs ci tokol neto oŋnkukäs mpo piko tokol co kipore neto ŋotit. Mosukumesyo kurire piko tokol neto. Kunyo Kuyuyit nyoto! Yunyoto.
66001008	Mwowu Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kule, “Oyiku ani nyepo tayta (omeka) oŋnkoyiku nyepo letut,’’ (olufa) nye mite oŋnku nye kimite, oŋnku nye mosukuco.
66001009	Ani nyo yeyamwoŋ Yowana nye ceyemntoy oko akwek toŋoŋutek oko muytocinotet nyo nyoru co po poytoyisyenyi nyewo om Kristo Yesu. Kyomite ani koret nye kikwen peko nyepo Patmo omnye kikyamwayte wuloto ŋolyontetap Yiyintet nyepo manta nye kuŋoŋ kopur Yesu.
66001010	Ye kipesyetap Mokoryontet kowuto anyoru ani swametap Muyetap Mokoryontet, yoto alim om pataymwani kutit nyewo nye kerkey kontit.
66001011	Nye kimwoy kule, “Silyi kitaput tukuk ce kekäs nyi, oŋnkikoyite kitaput kuwo wule mite luket nyepo piko co kikoyen cepo moŋosyecu tisap: Efeso, Simurna, Perkamani, Siyatira, Sortes, Filatelfia oko Laotikea.’’
66001012	Yoto owekyikey ani kule akäs cito nye kiŋololwo, akäs sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek.
66001013	Nto om kwenutap sokoticoto, kimite cito nye kerkey Weritap Cito nye kelac siret nye puntoy kerenkok, oŋnkurate teket nyenyi porowet nyepo Saput.
66001014	Kilel metit nyenyi kuyu siret nyelel piw. Kukerkey konyek ceci oko mata nye rekitite.
66001015	Kukerkey kerenkok ceci oko tayet nye kiciloci mata oŋnkyesit kulecec. Kikerkey polotet nyenyi oko karumnta nyepo peko ce caŋ ce sururtoy.
66001016	Kunäme yewunyi nyepo tay kokelik tisap, kucone kutit nyenyi rotwetap cok nye ŋatip koromun. Oŋnkulelit tokoyta nyenyi kuyu asista nyepo pet kwen.
66001017	Nteye kotoköse ani neto; yoto oputyi yepo kerenkokyi kuyunye kamey. Ntene kunämena yewunyi nyepo tay oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mente omuyi! Oyiku ani nyepo tayta oŋnko yiku nyepo letut.
66001018	Oyiku nye sopot! Kikyamey, ntene käs pa oyiku sopot kenyis okoy kenyis. Oponte kamukeywek cepo met oko kapkompic.
66001019	Kunyo sil yawut tukuk ce kwekäs, ce mite kwiyoktos yawut oko ce mosukutok om letut.
66001020	Kito nye wuŋat nye poru kokelik tisapu ce köse nyi ce mite yewumwani nyepo tay, oko sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek kucu kule; Kokelik tisap kuce malaykanik tisap cepo lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet tisap. Nto sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek, kuce lukosyek tisap cepo pikap Yiyintet.’’
66002001	“Ŋalek cepo malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Efeso silyi kule; “Kwone ŋalecu wule mite neto nyo nöme kokelik tisap om yewunyi nyepo tay, oŋnkuwesetote kwenutap sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek.
66002002	Oŋnket ani yisyonutekuk tokol, oŋnkonket swamet nyeŋuŋ, oko muytocinotet nyeŋuŋ. Oŋnketi kule puryo kot muytocini nyi piko co miyotec, oŋnkwesyem piko co kurekey kule ciku kiyokik oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot ku kiyokik cekto, okoy nyoru kule mwiynot pate.
66002003	Oŋnketi kule muytocini nyi oŋnkitaŋany kupo kaynemwani, ntene mopoku swamet.
66002004	Ntene ponte ŋolyontet nye onyercineniŋ kunyi kule, puryo icömo ani nyi yawut kuyu wulo kiyunte kunyo.
66002005	Kunyo möce sot co kiwurte! Oŋnkirenynkey iyiyisye kuyu wulo kiyunte kunyo. Nteye puryo kot renynkey mosaco ani oŋnkyonumu sokotyet nyeŋuŋ nyepo Saput nyo mite sokotik tisap co yoŋe tarinek.
66002006	Ntene ponte ŋolyontet akenke nye topon nyi kule senkeri tukuk ce yiye piko co rupe Nikolaitanik, kuyu wulo osenkeri mpo ani nkit.
66002007	“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kunye misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet! “Nto co koporyo kot kupëlis, mosokoci kwam omik cepo ketit nyepo soponto nye kipite mparetap Yiyintet.’’
66002008	“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Simurna silyi kule, “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nyepo tayta oŋnkupo letut, nye kime oŋnkusop yec.
66002009	Oŋnketi ani toŋoŋutek cekuk oko pananiyantit nyeŋuŋ, ntene yiku mokoryo kopoyit manta! Oŋnketi ŋalek ce miyotec ce ŋololeniŋ co kurekey kule ciku Yutayek, oŋnkurok yec kupuryo ku Yutayek cekto; ntene luket nyepo setanit!
66002010	Mente omuye mpo kisic om kiy ake tokol nye karik otaŋanye. Limnte! Mosukusyemak Setani nyewo nyepo oyik; kukertak mopusi alak om akwek, mosotaŋany kuwany pesyosyek taman. Otitir om swamet nka kot mpo koyek met, mosokonok ani soponto kwek kokotutyet nye kopëlisye.
66002011	“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kunye misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet! “Puryo kot kutoŋonye met nyepo oyeny piko co kiporyo kot kupëlis.’’
66002012	“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Perkamo, silyi kule, “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nyo ponto rotwetap cok nye ŋatip koromun.
66002013	Oŋnketi ani wule minye nyi, minye wule mite ŋeceretap poytoyisyetap Setanit. Ntene kipuryo kot taya om koyenet nye ponte om wule ani, nka mpo yo kicepoköce Antipa muncururwet nyimwani nye cikenekey nyo kicepakäce kayta nyewo wule minye Setanit.
66002014	Ntene oponte ani ŋalek tukusic ce osenkereniŋ: mite om akwek piko alak ce rupe konetisyetap Palam nye kinet sukuŋet kwiy pikap Israel miyotyet kwam omik ce kicesoci oyik kerkeyik oŋnkwiy sakwayanatet.
66002015	Kunyo mpenyi ponte piko alak ce rupe konetisyet nyepo Nikolaitanik.
66002016	Renynkey yaste miyotyonik cekuk! Nteye puryo, mosoaco lakwar okoy wule mite oŋnkoporye cekto oyiyisye ŋotipcet nyi cone kutimwani.
66002017	“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kumisyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet! “Mosokoci nye koporyo kot kupëlis Mana nye wuŋat. Mosokoci ci ake tokol om cekto rwantet nye miniŋ nyelel nye kicesil kaynet nyelel nye menkete ci tokol, nkete pate cito nyo kinyor.’’
66002018	“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Siyatira, silyi kule: “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite Weritap Yiyintet nyo loytos konyek ceci kuyu mata, nye lekecectos kerenkokyi kuyu tayet nye kacesit.
66002019	Oŋnketi ani ŋalekuk tokol ce iyiye nyi, oŋnketi cömisyet nyeŋuŋ, koyenet nyeŋuŋ, oko yisyet oko muytocinotet. Oŋnketi kule yiye yawut yisyonutek ce caŋ kusir ce kipo tay.
66002020	Ntene oponte ŋolyontet akenke nye osenkereniŋ kunyi kule, muytocini korkono cekure Yesepel, nye kurekey kule oyiku kiyokintetap Yiyintet. Neto kunye nete oŋnkumas pikwani okoy kwiy sakwayanatet.
66002021	Kwokoci neto poroyinto kurenynkey kwasta miyotyonikyi, ntene mocöme kule ayaste sakwayanatet.
66002022	Kunyo mosowirci neto kwiririt wule mosukutaŋany koromun oko piko co yiye sakwayanatet oko neto. Mosayiy ŋolyontoni tos pate ye karenynkey cekto kwasta miyotyonik ce kikwiye oko neto.
66002023	Mosapakäc mpo piko co rupoti neto, sukuŋet lukosyek tokol cepo pikap Yiyintet konket kule ani kunye oŋnketi kasoteywekap piko tokol oko tukuk ce möce. Mosokoci ci ake tokol om akwek kuyu wule tento yisyet nye kiyiy.
66002024	“Ntene akwek piko alak cepo Siyatira ce puryo kot orupe konetisyet nyoto. Akwek co puryo anetkey ŋalek ce kure alake kule, ‘Ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo Setanit.’ Komwowok kule puryo kot akonok nyikisinto ake.
66002025	Möce akwil koromun ŋalek co oponte yawut okoy opunu ani.
66002026	-
66002028	Co kepëlis oko co kakwil kwiy yisyonutekwani okoy pesyet nyepo letut, kuce mosokoci kupayta yemosyek, kuyu wulo kikono ani Papanyu kamukeywek. Mosukupoytoyis kwiyisye kipoket nyepo karnet oŋnkutitir cekto kuyu terenik cepo menonik. Mosokoci ani neto nyoto kokelyet tapoyantet nyepo kororn.
66002029	“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kunye misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet!’’
66003001	“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Sarte, silyi kule; “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nyo ponto mukuleywek tisap cepo Yiyintet oko kokelik tisap. Oŋnketi yisyonutek tokol ce yiye nyi, ponte kaynet nye toku kule yiku sopot oŋnkurok yec kimey!
66003002	Kunyo ŋet oŋnkinäm kwil ce teponte kutompo kupok kuwoŋnkey, omnye kwakäs kule puryo kot kunyolunot yisyet nyeŋuŋ om taytap Yiyintemwani.
66003003	Kunyo möce sot ŋalek co kicinetiŋ oko ce kilim, rip coto oŋnkirenynkey om miyotyonikuk. Ye puryo kot ŋet käste mosocontyiŋ kuyu corin, nye menketi sawet nye acone ani.
66003004	Ntene ponte om Sarte piko ce ŋeri ce tompo kot kowurta sirokwa konyinye sakatyet. Mosukupesetat coto oko ani kukakolac sirok ce lelac, omnye yeme kwiy kuyunyoto.
66003005	Cito nye kepëlis kunye mosicilokyi siret nyelel kuyunyoto. Nye puryo kot apuci anumu ani kaynokwa kukwane kitaput nyepo soponto. Mwosomwowu otoru om taytap Papamwani oko taytap malaykanik kule cikwani picoto.
66003006	“Kunyo nye ponte yitik ce limnte kunye misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet!’’
66003007	“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Filatelfia, silyi kule: “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nyo tilil oŋnkupo manta, nye ponto Funkuwet nye kipo Tauti. Yote neto ntene puryo nye muce kot kuker, Kere ntene puryo nye muce kuyat.
66003008	Oŋnketi yisyonutekuk tokol, oŋnket mpo kule ponte swamet nye kisic, ntene kwerup ŋalekwani oŋnkiyeno kunyo koyotuŋ kurket om tayŋuŋ nye memuce ci kot kuker.
66003009	Alimnte pa! Nto luket nyepo luket cepo Setanit, ce mwiynot ce sutekey kule ciku Yutayek oŋnkurok yec kumo Yutayek, mosokweru kukwa taymwoŋ oŋnkokutumwoŋ sukuŋet konket cekto tokol kule ocömok ani.
66003010	Omnye kwerip ntarastimwani muytoci, kunyo mosoripiŋ ani om wule mite syemutok, ce musukukwontyi koret tokol sukuŋet cesyem piko cepo koret.
66003011	Aconi ani lakwar. Kunyo kwil topon tukuk ce ponte, sukuŋet mente kot kunumuneniŋ citake kokotutyet nye pëlisye.
66003012	Mosokoci ani co kepëlis kwek tolocta nyepo kotap Yiyintemwani, puryo kot kukwone koyoto orit kenyis. Mososil ani porto nyenyi kaynetap Yiyintemwani, oŋnkosil kaynetap moŋetap Yiyintemwani, nyoto ku Yerusalem nyelel nye mosukucone torot wule mite Yiyintemwani. Mososil mpo porto nyenyi kaynemwani nyelel.
66003013	“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet.’’
66003014	“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Laotikea, silyi kule: “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nye cekure, ‘Yunyoto’. Nye ponto koyenet oŋnku muncururwet nyepo manta. Neto kunye towunot nyepo kiy ake tokol nye kitany Yiyintet.
66003015	Oŋnketi yisyonutekuk tokol, oŋnketi kule puryo kot yiku nyi kaytit oŋnku puryo kot yiku layat, kweroke yiku akenke om coto oyeny, nye yiku kaytit nto layat!
66003016	Ntene omnye yiku purkey pate, nye puryo kot yiku kaytit nto layat, kunyo mosaŋuŋuŋ!
66003017	Mwowu kule, ‘Oyiku mokoryo, amite topon, oponte tukuk tokol, kunyo puryo kiy nye omöce.’ Ntene menketi kule amite kwapi koromun! Yiku puren, nye möce cikalyiŋ, panan nye korat nye moponto sira.
66003018	Kunyo kakoniŋ ŋomnonet kule iyalena ani Saput nye kicepel kulelit topon, sukuŋet mokoren. Yal mpo sirok celelac sukuŋet lac kuyen porto nyeŋuŋ nyepo kalilan. Yal mpo sakityek siŋet yile konyek cekuk sikäste.
66003019	Osowu oŋnketi ani topon piko co acöme ani, kunyo titir, oŋnkirenynkey.
66003020	Limnte pa! Koyoŋe ani kurket oŋnkokonynkony, nteye kalim citake kutimwani oŋnkuyat kurket mosowut konyi oŋnkyomisye tukway.
66003021	Cito nye kepëlis kunye mosokoci kamukeywek cipure tukway ŋeceremwani nyepo poytoyisyet, kuyu wulo kyopëlisye ani okoy opure oko Papa, ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet.
66003022	“Kunyo, nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kumisyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet!’’
66004001	Nto om letutap coto ceŋoŋwo akäs kurket nye kayatakay om torot. Nto kutit nyo kikyalim kuŋololwo om tayta nyo kikerkey kontit kunye kimwowo kule, “Iloŋu co wuli, moporuŋ ani tukuk ce mokwiyokis cerupe ŋalecu.’’
66004002	Yoto pakenke kucontyo Muyet, akäs ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet om torot nye kimite kukepure cito ake.
66004003	Nyoto kipure ŋeceranato kunye kikerkey tokoyta nyenyi rwantet nye nyalil kwarra nye cekure Yaspo oko sarutyo, oŋnkomut ŋeceranato cekwalasyet nye kerkey oko rwantet nye nyalil nye cekure Sumariti.
66004004	Kimite mpo ŋecerok alak ce ki tiptem ok amwan ce kimut ŋeceranato. Kipure ŋecerocoto poyik tiptemu ok amwan ce kelac sirok ce lelac oŋnkulac kutonok cepo Sapunek.
66004005	Yoto kucone ŋeceranato po poytoyisyet kaweket nye wece oko karumnta oko tulotet. Kimite tarinek tisapu ce loytos om taytap ŋaceranato, coto ku mukuleywek tisap cepo Yiyintet.
66004006	Kimite taytap ŋeceranato nye kerkey oko ruretyet nyepo kilasit nye lekecece kuyu kitake nye cekure Kristalit. Nto komut ŋeceranato po poytoyisyet, om komoswokik tukway kimite yec tyoŋik tisapu ce soptos ce kiponto konyek ce caŋ ce kimite tay oko sekeronok.
66004007	Kikerkey tyonynto nyepo tayta oko Ŋetuny; kukerkey nyepo oyeny oko Yeyito; kuponto tyonynto nyepo somok metit nye kerkey nyepo cito. Kukerkey nyepo amwan oko Ploŋoniyet nye terertoy.
66004008	Kiponto tyoŋicoto amwanu kepepok lö ce kiponto konyek om kepepocoto saŋ oko orit. Kitume pet oko komoy nye memunye kumwowu kule: “Tilil, tilil, tilil, ku Mokoryontet Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, Nye kimite, nye mite yawut, Oŋnku nye mosukuco.’’
66004009	Kitume tyoŋicoto amwanu tumwonik cepo woyinto oko kakastayet oko koyweyisyet kutumncini neto nye kepure ŋeceret, nye sope okokoy. Nteye katum kuyunyoto.
66004010	Yoto kukutuny poyik tiptemu ok amwan co mite taytap neto nye kepure ŋeceret oŋnkusay neto nyo sope okokoy okoy okokoy. Wircini cekto yoto kutonokwa cepo Sapunek taytap ŋeceret kumwowu kule:
66004011	“Mokoryontet Yiyintet nyinyo! Kunye misyini ciyweye oŋnkyilaŋnta woyinto nyenyi oko swamet. Omnye kitany nyi tukuk tokol, kicitany oŋnkunyor soponto kuyu wulo kicämnta neto.’’
66005001	Yoto akäs kuponto kitaput om yewunyi nyepo tay neto nye kepure ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet nye kicesil orit oko saŋ oŋnkyitinye muwurunek tisap.
66005002	Akäs yoto malayket nyepo swamet nye kikurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nye yeme, nye muce kupetec muwurut oŋnkuŋany kitaput?’’
66005003	Ntene kipuryo ci mpo akenke om torot nto om koret, nto om kapkompic nye kimuc kot kuŋany kitaput oŋnkukäs orit.
66005004	Arir ani koromun omnye kipuryo mpo akenke nyepo latik nye kicenyor nye kaŋany kitaput oŋnkukäs orit.
66005005	Kumwowo pontet akenke kule, “Mente arir, käs pa! Ŋetunynto nye cone kotap Yuta, nye keseniyantetap Tauti nyewo, nye kakopëlis, kunye muce kupetec muwurunek tisap oŋnkuŋany kitaput.’’
66005006	Yoto akäs Lekwetap Kecir nye keyoŋe kwenutap ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet, nye kepur komut neto yoto tyoŋik ce soptos amwanu oko poyik. Kerkey Lekwap Kecir yoto nye kacetil kume. Kiponto kuyinok tisap oko konyek tisap, coto ku mukuleywek tisap cepo Yiyintet ce kikoyto kupa koret tokol.
66005007	Kuwo Lekwetap Kecir oŋnkunum kitaput kunumune yewutap tay nyepo neto nye kepure ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet.
66005008	Nteyu kowo kunumu, yoto kukutuny koputyi ŋony tyoŋik ce soptos amwanu oko poyik tiptemu ok amwan om taytap Lekwetap Kecir. Kiponto ci tokol om cekto pukantit oko pokulit nyepo Saput nye nyitat mwayta nye poŋu. Coto kuce somset cepo pikap Yiyintet.
66005009	Yoto kutum cekto tumnto nyelel nyi kule: “Misyiniŋ nyito numu kitaput oŋnkipetec muwurunekyi. Omnye kicetiliŋ, kunyo om korotikuk, kiyal nyi kukwa wule mite Yiyintet: piko cepo arosyek, yemosyek oko ŋelyepik.
66005010	Kikwey nyi cekto kwek Kinkonik cepo tisik, kuyici yisyet Yiyintenyo kunyo mokupoytoyis om koret.’’
66005011	Akaste yec, alim polotet nyepo malaykanik ce caŋ ce mociyite, Elifunek oko Elifunek. Kiyoŋe cekto komut ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet oko tyoŋik amwan ce soptos oko poyik.
66005012	Oŋnkutum om kutit nyewo kule: “ Lekwap Kecir nyo kicepoköce, kunye misyini kunyor poytoyisyet oko Mokoryontit, oko ŋomnonet oko kakastayet, oko swamet, woyinto oko kupeyok.’’
66005013	Alim yoto Tyoŋik tokol cepo torot, oko cepo koret, oko cepo ŋony, oko tyoŋik tokol cepo ruretyet, oko tyoŋik cepo koret tokol kumukul kutume kule: “Wule mite neto nyo kepure ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet, oko Lekwap Kecir, kupoyit kupeyok, oko koyweyisyet, oko woyinto, oko swamet okokoy oko okokoy!’’
66005014	Yoto kuwec tyoŋik amwanu ce soptos kumwoy kule, “Yunyoto!’’ Kuputyi poyik ŋony oŋnkusay.
66006001	Yoto akäs ani Lekwap Kecir kupetec muwurut nyepo tayta om muwurunek tisap, oŋnkalim tyonynto akenke om tyoŋik ce soptos amwan kupol om kutit nyewo kutul kuyu ilet kumwoy kule, “Co!’’
66006002	Akäs ani yoto yec Farasit nyelel, kiponto kiyaŋnta cito nye kiwete Farasinato, yoto cikoci cicoto kutwet; kuwo kuworenot nye kokopëlis oŋnkutosyikey kupëlis.
66006003	Kupetec Lekwap Kecir muwurut nyepo oyeny, alim ani yoto tyonynto nyepo oyeny kumwoy kule, “Co!’’
66006004	Kuco yec Farasit ake nye kyarra. Cikoci cito nye kuwete Farasinato kamukeywek kunum kalyet nye kimite koret, sukuŋet kuparkey piko kwicek nkit, oŋnkyikoci cicoto rotwetap cok nyewo.
66006005	Akäs kupetec Lekwap Kecir muwurut nyepo somok, alim kumwoy tyonynto nye po somok kule, “Co!’’ Nto opere akäs yoto akäs Farasit nye tuy. Kiponto cito nye kiwete Farasinato om yewunyi kilet nye cepimonisye.
66006006	Alim yoto kutit nye kerkey nye cone kwenutap tyoŋik amwan ce soptos nye kimwoy kule, “Litet akenke nyepo nkanuk om musyaret nyepo pesyet, nto litanik somok cepo nkanuk sayirinek kupo musyaret nyepo pesyosyek somok. Ntene mente awurte mwayta oko Finyonik!’’
66006007	Kupetec Lekwap Kecir muwurut nyepo amwan, yoto alim ani tyonynto nyepo amwan kumwoy kule, “Co!’’
66006008	Nto opere akäs yoto akäs Farasit nye tolelyo, nto cito nye kiwete Farasinato kunye cekure met, oŋnkarupe let kurikyi kapkompic. Cikoci cekto kamukeywek kupayta akenke om amwan nyepo piko cepo koret, sukuŋet kupakäce poryet oko rupet oko porwonik oko tyoŋikap samiyita cepo koret.
66006009	Kupetec Lekwap Kecir muwurut nyepo mut, akäs yoto ce kimite otepto nyetilil ŋony, mukuleywek cepo piko co kicepakäc omnye kimwaytat ŋolyontet oko ŋalek ce kiparta.
66006010	Kupol picoto kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, nyetilil oŋnkupo manta! Mesepur nyi okokoy pesyo ne ye semutyi musankut oŋnkipakäc pikap koret omnye kipakäcec acek?’’
66006011	Cikoci ci ake tokol om cekto siret nyelel, oŋnkyemwoci kopur komuny kuloyit kuminiŋ okoy kupunto coŋinto nyepo mutworik oko mpo yeya ce kerkey cekto ce mosicepakäc kuyu wulo kicopoköce cekto.
66006012	Akäs yec Lekwap Kecir kupetec muwurut nyepo lö.
66006013	Yoto kuriŋriŋ koret, kutuyit asista kuyu siret nye tuy mis, kusalakay arawet kwek koroti, kosuwune kokelik parak kuyu mokoyek ce mnoruryo ce kelucluc yomet.
66006014	Kupot koret wulin po torot kuyu kartasit nye kaciriny. Cinum cinate tulonok oko korosyek ce kikwen peko kukwane ye kimite.
66006015	Yoto kuŋet kinkonik cepo koret oko piko cewoyec oko cewoyec cepo poryet, oko piko ce mokoren oko piko ce ponto swamet, oko piko alak tokol, ce mutwor oko ce puryo kot ku mutwor. Kuwunynkey yoto picoto kuwuŋenkey tulonok oko kepenonik ce mite rwontok.
66006016	Kukurtoy kumwoci tulonok oko rwontok kule, “Olulcec acek awunyec mente kot kukäsenec konyek neto nyo kepure ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet oko nerekwekap Lekwap Kecir.
66006017	Omnye kopunto pesyemwa nyepo nerekwek, ŋo nye muce kuyoŋe tayta nyenyi?’’
66007001	Nto om letutap coto, yoto akäs ani malaykanik amwan ce keyoŋe toponutekap koret, ce kanäm kuyoŋnto yomotik amwan cepo koret, sukuŋet mente kukut yomet koret oko ruretyet, nto ket ake tokol.
66007002	Akäs malayket ake nye cone koŋasis wule cone asista kuponto muwurutap Yiyintet nye sope. Kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoci malaykanik amwan co kukukoci Yiyintet kamukeywek kowurta koret oko ruretyet.
66007003	Kumwoci kule, “Monte ciwurte koret nto ruretyet nto mpo ketik okoy ye kocikoci muwurut tokoywekap mutworik cepo Yiyintet.’’
66007004	Yoto cemwowo wule tento coŋinto nyepo piko co kucikoci muwurut tokoywekwa kucu kule, Piko elifunek pokol akenke oko artam ok amwan cepo werikap Israel ce kicekwere muwurut.
