66007005	Oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Yuta, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Rupen, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Kati,
66007006	oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Asyer, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Nafutali, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Manase,
66007007	oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap mpo Simiyon oko Elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap mpo Lefi, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Isakar,
66007008	oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap Isakar, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo mpo kotap Sapulon, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo kotap mpo Yosep, oko elifunek taman ok oyeny cepo mpo kotap Penyamin.
66007009	Nto om letutap ŋalecato, yoto akäs ani luket nyepo piko ce memuce ci kot koyit! Kwone piko coto yemosyek tokol, oko orosyek tokol oko piko tokol oko ŋelyepik tokol. Kimite cekto yoto kukeyoŋe taytap ŋeceret nyepo poytoyisyet oko taytap Lekwap Kecir nye kelac sirok ce lelac oŋnkunäme picoto sosik yewuniyekwa.
66007010	Kikurtoy om polotet nyewo kumwowu kule, “Cone kosopotet wule mite Yiyintenyo nye kepure ŋeceret, oŋnkucone wule mite Lekwap Kecir!’’
66007011	Kuyoŋe yoto komut ŋeceret malaykanik tokol oko poyik oko tyoŋik amwan ce soptos. Yoto koputyi ŋony om taytap ŋeceret oŋnkusay cekto Yiyintet,
66007012	kumwoy kule, “Yunyoto! Kupeyok oko woyinto oko swamet oko ŋomnonet, oko kakastayet, oko konyitotet, oko swamet kuce kupoyit coto tokol Yiyintenyo okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto!’’
66007013	Kuŋololwo yoto pontet akenke kutep kule, “ Ŋo picu kelac sirok ce lelac? Oŋnkukwone cekto ono?’’
66007014	Owekyi ani omwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, nyi nye nketi.’’ Kumwowo kule, “Picu kuce kipunune toŋoŋutek cewoyec koromun. Kunyo kisit sirokwa kulelakitu kusite korotikap Lekwap Kecir.
66007015	Mite yawut kukeyoŋe taytap ŋeceret nyepo Yiyintet sukwicini yisyet om konyi pet oko komoy. Kunyo ripe neto nyo kepure ŋeceret cekto.
66007016	Puryo kot kwome rupet kenyis oŋnkupuryo kot kwome melelya, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot kupele asista nye mwa.
66007017	Omnye Lekwap Kecir nyo mite kwenumwa kunye mesewontet nyimwa nye mosukuntoci okoy wule kosune peko cepo soponto. Mosukopuc Yiyintet lokik tokol ce mite konyek cikwa.’’
66008001	Nteyu kowo kupetec Lekwap Kecir muwurut nyepo tisap. Kusis kiy ake tokol yoto om torot kuwany kwenutap sawet akenke.
66008002	Nto om letut akäs ani malaykanik tisap co yoŋe taytap Yiyintet. Cikoci cekto yoto kontinek tisap.
66008003	Kuco yoto malayket ake cokuyoŋe yepo otepto nye cepele Korosek, kipontonu pokulit nyepo Saput nyepo Korosek ce poŋu. Cikoci neto korosek ce poŋu ce caŋ sukuŋet kuyomo oko somset cepo pikap Yiyintet oŋnkukoyito om otepto nye cepele Korosek nyepo saput nyo yoŋe taytap Yiyintet.
66008004	Kuŋet yoto yetit nyepo korosek ce poŋu oko somset nyepo pikap Yiyintet om yewutap malayket okoy kupunto wule mite Yiyintet.
66008005	Kunäm malayket pokulit nyepo Korosek ce poŋu oŋnkunyit orit mata, oŋnkunumune otepto nye pele Korosek kosuci koret, Yoto Kowec koret, oko karumnta nyewo, oŋnkutul ilet, oŋnkuriŋriŋ koret.
66008006	Yoto kuyiytakey malaykanik tisapu kule cekut kontinek tisap co koponto.
66008007	Kukut malayket nyepo tayta kontit nyenyi, kutumnkey koyantet oko mata nye kilinyokey oko korotik, oŋnkyewirci kosuci koret. Cepel Yoto kulay kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo koret oko kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo ketik, oko suswek tokol ce nyolilec.
66008008	Yoto kukut malayket nyepo oyeny kontit nyenyi, cewirta wokutyic ruretyet kitake nye kerkey tulwet nyewo nye kiloye,
66008009	kuwec kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo ruretyet kwek koroti oŋnkupok kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo tyoŋik tokol ce mite ruretyet oko raposyek nye mite ruretyet.
66008010	Yoto kukut malayket nyepo somok kontit nyenyi, kusuwune torot kokelyet nyewo nye loye kuyu tocit, kusuci kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo oyinosyek oko koŋwekap peko.
66008011	Cekure kaynetap kokelyanato, “Mwa sekeleyti.’’ Yoto kumwonekitu peko cepo kereryantet akenke om somok okoy kupakäc piko ce caŋ ce kaye peko ce komwonekitu.
66008012	Kukut malayket nyepo amwan kontit nyenyi, cipuryet kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo Asista, oko kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo arawet oko kereryantet akenke om somok cepo kokelik, yoto kupot komo kwiyisyi kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo kiy ake tokol. Kutuyit yoto kwek menon kuwany kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo pet oko kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo komoy.
66008013	Akäste ani yoto, oŋnkalim ploŋoniyet nye terertoy om parak sukupole om kutit nyewo kumwowu kule, “Mite kwapi! Mite kwapi! Mite kwapi piko ce mite koret, ye kakut malaykanik co somoku co karik kukut kontinek!’’
66009001	Yoto kukut malayket nyepo mut kontit nyenyi. Akäs ani kosuwune kokelyet torot kosuci koret. Cikoci kokelyanato funkuwet nyepo mwenet nye moponto ye ŋete.
66009002	Kuyat malayket mwenet nye moponte ye ŋete, kucone orit yetit nyewo nyepo oŋonyntit nyewo, kuker yetit nye cone mwenet orit kutuyit koret oko asista.
66009003	Yoto kuco koret talamwet kupunune yetit. Cikoci cekto swamet nye kerkey oko swamet nyepo keneyisyek cepo koret.
66009004	Cemwoci kule, “Monte ciwurte suswek oko ketik, nto kiy ake tokol nye pite. Möce cekto kowurta pate piko ce moponto muwurut nyepo pelutyetap Yiyintet om tokoywekwa.’’
66009005	Kipuryo kot cecömnci talamwet kupakäc piko, ntene kutaŋany pate kuwany orok mut. Kinyor cito nye kowut mwoninto nye kerkey yo kowut cito keneyontet.
66009006	Om orocoto mut, musukusyem picoto kule ceceny met, ntene monyoru. Musukumac kule cepoku ntene musukumweye met wule mite cekto.
66009007	Kukerkeyitu talamik oko Farasinek ce kaciyiyta kule kupa poryet, kiponto om metewok cikwa ce kerkey kutonok cepo Sapunek, kukerkey metewok cikwa oko cepo piko.
66009008	Kukerkey putek cikwa oko putek cepo koruk, oŋnkukerkey kelak cikwa cepo ŋetumwek.
66009009	Kiponto teketik cikwa karik ce kicekerekte, nto karumnta nyepo kepepok cikwa kuce kikerkey oko karumnta nyepo Farasinek ce caŋ ce cute karinek ce rwoye kupa poryet.
66009010	Kuponto sarurak ce wutisye ce kerkey keneyisyek, kuponto sarurak cikwa mwonet nye toŋonye piko kuwany orok mut.
66009011	Kiponto kinko nye poytoy cekto, nyoto ku malayket nyo ripe mwenet nye moponto wule ŋete. Cekure kaynenyi om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek ku “Apatoni’’ Nye cekure yec om ŋelyeptap Kirikik kule, “Apolyon’’ (nye poru kaynana kule “Orontoyintet’’)
66009012	Kutil yawut toŋoŋutek cepo tayta, koŋet toŋoŋutek oyenku ce mokukwa.
66009013	Yoto kukut malayket nyepo lö kontit nyenyi, Alim kutit nye cone toponutek amwan ce mite otepto nye cepele korosek nyepo Saput nye yoŋe taytap Yiyintet.
66009014	Kuŋalal kutit kumwoci malayket nyepo lö kule, “Tyakte malaykanik amwan co kicerotyi oyinet nyewo Efurate!’’
66009015	Cityakta yoto malaykanik amwan ce kikiceyiyta kule sukuŋet kupakäc piko cepo kereryantet akenke om somok cepo koret om sawanato om pesyonitenyi, om arawanitenyi oko kenyinitenyi.
66009016	Cemwowo ani wule tento coŋinto cepo sikarek, ce milioninek pokolwokik oyeny.
66009017	Yoto ceŋoŋwo ciporwo Farasinek oko piko ce kipete parak. Kiponto picoto loŋanikap teket cepo karik ce orornec kuyu mata, oŋnkworusec kuyu Sapiret oŋnkutolelyonec kuyu Salpur. Kikerkey metewokap Farasinek oko metewok cepo ŋetumwek. Kunyo kikwone metewok cikwa mata oko yetit oko nyolilyet.
66009018	Toŋoŋutek cutecu somok, mata, oko yetit oko Salpur ce kikwone kutuwakap Farasinek kuce kipakäc kereryantet akenke om somok nyepo piko cepo koret.
66009019	Omnye kimitowune swametap Farasinek kutuwak cikwa oko sarurak cikwa. Kikerkey sarurak cikwa erenok ce ponto metewok, kunyo kikwiyisye metewok coto kutaŋanye piko.
66009020	Piko tokol cepo koret ce kiŋet ce kipuryo kot kupakäc toŋoŋutek coto somoku, kuce kipuryo kot kurenynkey kwasta cekikwiye cekto, kipuryo kot kwasta komo kusoye oyik, oko kerkeyik cepo Sapunek, oko cepo karik ce lelac, cepo toyok, oko cepo rwontok oko cepo ketik, ce puryo kot kuköstoy nto kulimntoy, nto mpo kupesetoti.
66009021	Kipuryo mpo kot kurenynkey picoto om porisyet nye kikwiy, nto ponisyet, nto sakwayanatet, nto corsyet.
66010001	Yoto akäs ani malayket ake yec nyepo swamet kureku kucone torot, kikilac polyet oko cekwalasyet nye komut metinyi. Kikerkey metit nyenyi oko Asista, kukerkey kerenkokyi oko tolocik cepo mata.
66010002	Kiponto om yewunyi kitaput nye miniŋ nye tyakat nye silot. Kikoci kuyoŋe kerenkenyi nyepo tay ruretyet, kuyoŋe nyepo let koret.
66010003	Kutul kukurto om kutit nyewo nye ciye kuyu ŋetuny nye kotul. Nteyu kowo kukurto kuyunyoto, yoto kuyentyi kutul ilotik tisapu.
66010004	Nteyu kowo kutul ilotik, amäc ani kule osil. Ntene alim kutit nye kaŋalal kucone torot kumwowo kule, “Rip kuwoŋokis, mente kot osil ŋalek co komwoy ilotik tisapu.’’
66010005	Yoto malayket nyo koköse kukeyoŋe ruretyet oko koret kunömnci yewunyi nyepo tay torot,
66010006	oŋnkuwal Yiyintet nye sope okokoy nye kitany torot oko tukuk ce mite orit, oŋnkutany ruretyet oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit, kumwoy kule, “Komo kumite yec kule cililennkey!
66010007	Ntene ye kakut malayket nyepo tisap kontit nyenyi, yoto ye mosukoyitita Yiyintet yisyenyi nye wuŋat nye kiyiyta kuyu wulo kimwoci mutworikyi workoyik.’’
66010008	Yoto kuŋololwo yec kutit nye kyalim kucone torot kumwoy kule, “Iwo wenumu kitaput nye tyakat nyo mite yewutap malayket nyo katyic kerenket ake ruretyet, kutyic ake koret.’’
66010009	Awo ani wule mite malayket oŋnkosom kukono kitaput. Kumwowo yoto kule, “Oŋyi yam, mosukumwanit kat om moyeŋuŋ, ntene mosukwanyinyit om kutiŋuŋ kuyu kumnyatet.’’
66010010	Onumu ani kitaput nye kimite yewutap malayket oŋnkayam, kwanyinyit kuyu kumnyatet om kutimwani, ntene yu kawoluŋuyi kumwanit kat om moyet orit.
66010011	Cemwowo ani kule, “Misyini mwayte lokoywekap Yiyintet ce nöme yemosyek, oko piko oko ŋelyepik oko kinkonik.’’
66011001	Cekono yoto korokto nye kerkey tekantet nye cepimonisye oŋnkyemwowo kule, “Ŋet wepiman kotap Yiyintet oko otepto nye cepele korosek oŋnkiyit piko ce soye orit.
66011002	Ntene yaste mente apiman tekewut om saŋntap kotap Yiyintet, omnye kicikoci wuloto lamek ce mosukutyikta cekto moŋet Nyetilil kuwany orok artam ok oyeny.
66011003	Mosoyoku ani muncururwanikwani oyeny. Mosukulac sirok sarkatinek oŋnkumwayta lokoywekap Yiyintet kuwany pesyosyek elifut akenke oko pokolwokik oyeny ok tomonwokik lö.’’
66011004	Piko muncururwanik coto oyeny, ku ketik Seituninek oyeny oko sokotik oyeny cepo tarinek ce yoŋe taytap Mokoryontet nyepo koret.
66011005	Ye kasyem citake kule awurte cekto, mosukucone mata kutuwakwa oŋnkwaranta punik cikwa. Mosukupakäc kuyunyoto ci tokol nye kasyem kule awurte apakäc cekto.
66011006	Ponto picoto kamukeywek ce muce kuker koret parak nye memuce kot kuropen ropta om pesyosyek ce cemwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet. OŊnkuponto yec kamukeywek ce muce kuwec peko kwek korotik, oŋnkukoci kunäm koret porwonik wok alake tokol ye komöce cekto.
66011007	Nteye kakuwany cekto kumwayta lokoywek, mosukuco tyonynto nye cone mwenet nye moponto ye ŋete oŋnkuporye cekto, mosukupël tyonyoto cekto oŋnkupakäc kupok.
66011008	Mosukuseretyi muswek cikwa orustunwekap moŋet nyewo wule kicewuyitocine Mokoryontemwa murtowontet. Kaynet nyepo moŋonoto kuyu tyonkoc ku Sotom nto Misiri.
66011009	Mosukukäs piko cekwone yemosyek, pororyosyek, ŋelyepik oko piko tokol muswek cepo picoto kuwany pesyosyek somok ok kwenut, oŋnkupuryo kot kucöme kule cemuy muswecoto.
66011010	Mosukuŋerec piko cepo koret omnye kopok picoto oyenku. Mosukwam sakwet oŋnkukocinkey kokotutek, omnye kitaŋany koromun workoyik cutecu oyenku piko cepo koret.
66011011	Nto om letutap pesyosyek somok ok kwenut, mosukuco soponto nye cone wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkuco kowut porwonicoto, yoto kuŋetyo kuyoŋ, kunyo kupotpotenis piko ce kiköse picoto.
66011012	Kulim workoyik coto oyenku kutit nyewo nye cone torot nye komwoci kule, “Akwa torot yu!’’ Kupa cekto torot kupete polyet kuköse punik cikwa.
66011013	Pakenke yoto kuriŋriŋ koret, okoy kuturpup kwaran kereryantet nyepo akenke om taman nyepo moŋet oŋnkupok piko elifunek tisapu ce kipakäc koriŋriŋetap koret. Kumuyo kupotpotenis piko ce koŋet oŋnkukasta woyinto nyepo Yiyintet nyepo torot.
66011014	Kutil yawut taŋanynta nyepo oyeny, ntene käs pa! Mosukuco lakwar taŋanynta nyepo somok.
66011015	Yoto kukut malayket nyepo tisap kontit nyenyi, celim polotet om torot nye mwowu kule, “Kupoyit yawut poytoyisyet nyepo koret Mokoryontet oko Ŋapanenyi, kunyo mosukupoytoyis okokoy okoy okokoy!’’
66011016	Yoto poyik co tiptem ok amwan co pure ŋecerokwa cepo poytoyisyet om taytap Yiyintet,
66011017	Kukutuny oŋnkusay Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Cikostiŋ acek, Mokoryontet Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, nye kimite oŋnkumite yawut! Omnye yiyisyi swamet nyeŋuŋ nyewo. Kunyi kecec poytoyisye!
66011018	Kinerekis kinyer koromun piko cepo yemosyek, omnye kopunto pesyet kuco nyerunoteŋuŋ, oŋnkumutyi musankut piko co kipok, kopunto pesyet ceyokyi cikoci musyaret mutworikuk workoyik oko pikuk tokol, oko piko cewoyec oko ce minkec ceyweye kayneŋuŋ. Kopunte pesyet kyaranta co orontoy koret.’’
66011019	Yoto ceyat kotap Yiyintet om torot, kutok santukut nye cekonore kirotyet om kotap Yiyintet orit. Kowec yoto kaweket, oko karumnta, oko ilotik, oko koriŋriŋet, oko ropta nyewo nyepo koyantet.
66012001	Kutok yoto om torot pelutyet nyewo nyepo kakitat. Kutok korko nye kilac Asista, oko arawet nye katyike kerenkokyi, oŋnkulac om metinyi kutwet nye ponto kokelik taman ok oyeny.
66012002	Kikoyat lekwenyi, kurir om mwoninto nyepo lekwet nye kimöce kucämnkey.
66012003	Kutok yec pelutyet ake om torot. Om yoto kutok Cesosum nyewo koromun nye kyarra nye kiponto metewok tisap, oko kuynok taman oko kutonok tisap om metinyi.
66012004	Kwiyisye saruryenyi kopukto kokelik cepo torot cepo kereryantet akenke om somok kupa koret ŋony. Yoto kuyoŋe Cesosum taytap korket nyo kikirik kucämnkey kule saŋet ayam pakenke lekwet ye koceyi.
66012005	Kuyi korkonoto lekwet werit nye mosukupayta yemosyek tokol kwiyisye kipoket nyepo karnet. Ntene cesar lekwet cesut kuwo wule mite Yiyintet wule mite ŋecerenyi nyepo poytoyisyet.
66012006	Kumwey korkonoto okoy kitela wule kikwiytoci Yiyintet kule muce ceripune kuwany pesyosyek elifut akenke ok pokolwokik oyeny ok tomonwokik lö.
66012007	Yoto kucec poryet om torot, kuporye Mikael oko malaykanikyi tyonynto Cesosum nyewo, kutitir kuporye Cesosum oko malaykanikyi.
66012008	Ntene cipël Cesosum okoy komo kuponto oko malaykanikyi otepto om torot.
66012009	Cewir Cesosum nyewo kuco ŋony, nyoto ku Erenet nyepo keny nye cekure Setanit nyewo nyepo oyik nyo kiperper koret. Cewir kuco ŋony kupontokey oko malaykanikyi tokol.
66012010	Yoto alim ani polotet nyewo nye cone torot nye mwowu kule, “Kaco yawut kasopotet nyepo Yiyintet, kakupor yawut Yiyintet kamukeywekyi kuyu Kinko! Kakupor yawut Ŋapanenyi kamukeywekyi! Omnye kacewir kuco ŋony neto nyo wosontyi pet oko komoy mpo yeyanyo om wule mite Yiyintet.
66012011	Kwepëlis mpo yeyanyo kupël neto om korotikap Lekwetap Keciryet oko om ŋalek cepo manta ce kimwoy oŋnkucämnta kukoyto soponwekwa kupok.
66012012	Kunyo ŋerec nyi wuli po torot oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit! Ntene mite kwapi koromun koret oko ruretyet! Omnye kacontyok Setani nyewo nyepo oyik kuponto nerekwek ce caŋ, omnye nkete kule oponte pesyosyek ce ŋeri pate ce koŋet.’’
66012013	Nteyu kowo konket Cesosum kule kacewirco koret ŋony, yoto kucec kurup kuceny korket nyo koyiye lekwet werit.
66012014	Ntene cikoci korkonoto kepepok oyeny cepo ploŋoniyet nyewo sukuŋet kutererta kuwo otepto nyenyi om kitela wule mowoceripune kuwany kenyisyek somok ok orok lö wule memuce kunyor Cesosum.
66012015	Yoto kuwosune Cesosum kutinyi mukutyantet nyepo peko ce caŋ korupe korkonoto kule kusut.
66012016	Ntene kuco koret cokusor korkonoto, kuŋany kutit nyenyi oŋnkuye peko co kowosune Cesosum kutinyi.
66012017	Kunyerci Cesosum korkonoto, kunomen kuwo wokuporye kesenisyekap korkonoto cut alak oko piko tokol ce rupe ntarastinekap Yiyintet, ntene kukwilokis om koyenet nye kiporci Yesu Kristo.
66012018	Kuyoŋe Cesosum ruretyet tapan.
66013001	Yoto akäs ani tyonynto nye loŋune ruretyet nye kiponto kuynok taman oko metewok tisap. Kiponto kutonok ce kimite kuynok. Kimite kuynocoto kuynok alak ce miyotec ce kicesil cepo morisyo.
66013002	Tyonynto nye kyakäs ani kunye kikerkey oko melilyo. Kukerkey kerenkok cepo tyonynto nye cekure tuput, oŋnkukerkey metit nyepo ŋetunynto. Kukoci Cesosum tyonynto kamukeywek ce caŋ oko ŋecerenyi nyepo poytoyisyet.
66013003	Yoto Kukerkeyit nye ponto mwayet nyewo nye miyat nye mite metit ake nyepo tyonynto, ntene oŋnkisop mwayet nyoto miyat. Kukite koret tokol tyonyoto, oŋnkulimnci.
66013004	Kusay ci tokol Cesosum omnye kikoci kamukeywekyi tyonyoto. Kusay cekto tyonynto oŋnkutep kimwoy kule, “Ŋo nye kerkey oko tyonynto? Ŋo nye muce kuporye neto?’’
66013005	Yoto kyasta tyonyoto kuŋalal ŋalek ce miyotec cepo morisyo kucup Yiyintet, oŋnkyikoci kamukeywek kuwany orok artam ok oyeny.
66013006	Kuŋany kutit oŋnkucec kucup Yiyintet oŋnkumor kaynenyi oko otepto wule minye, oko piko tokol ce minye torot.
66013007	Kicecömnci mpo kuporye pikap Yiyintet okoy kupël, oŋnkyikoci kamukeywek kupayta piko cepo yemosyek tokol, oko arosyek tokol, oko ŋelyepik tokol.
66013008	Mosukusay piko tokol ce minye koret tyonyoto, tos pate piko co silotin kaynokwa kitaput nyepo soponto nyepo Lekwap Kecir. Kaynocoto kuce kicesil kuceke ye kicitany koret.
66013009	“Kunyo nye ponto yitik kumisyini Kulimnta!
66013010	Co kicemöce kule mosicenäm oŋnkyiwu kuce mosicenäm kuyunyoto. Nto co kicemöce kule mocepare rotwetap cok kuce mosicepare rotwetap cok kuyunyoto. Kunyo möce kule kumuytoci oŋnkuyene pikap Yiyintet om ŋalecutecu.’’
66013011	Yoto akäs ani tyonynto ake nye kicone ŋony. Kiponto kuynok oyeny ce kerkey cepo menkit keciryet oŋnkuŋalole kuyu Cesosum.
66013012	Kiponto nyoto kamukeywek ce caŋ cepo tyonynto nyo kipo tayta, kwiyisye yoto kamukeywek coto om tayta tyonynto nyin. Kuker koŋ om koret tokol oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit kule kusay tyonynto nyo kiponto mamitet nye miyat nyepo mwayet nye kisop.
66013013	Kwiy tyonynto nyoto po oyeny cepo kakitat ce woyec okoy kucone mata torot kuco ŋony om taytap piko tokol.
66013014	Kuperper yoto piko tokol ce minye koret kwiyisye tukuk cepo kakitat ce kicecömnci kwiy kuköse tyonynto nyepo tayta. Kumwoci tyonynto piko tokol cepo koret kwiy kerkeyinto nye ciyweye tyonynto nyo kicepore rotwetap cok oŋnkurok kusope.
66013015	Cecömnci tyonynto nyepo oyeny komuŋnkyi soponto kukerkeyit nyepo tyonynto nyepo tayta, okoy komuc kuŋalal kerkeyinto oŋnkupakäc piko tokol ce puryo kot kusoye kerkeyinto.
66013016	Kusimnci kukerci koŋ tyonyoto piko tokol, ce minkec, oko cewoyec, oko ce mokoren, oko ce ponon, ce mutwor, oko ce momutwor, cikoci cekto pelutyet nye kocikoci yewuniyek cepo tay nto tokoywek cikwa.
66013017	Kuyete ci ake tokol kwolyoyis nto kwolis kiy ake tokol, tos pate ci nyo kicikoci pelutyet, nyoto kunye kaynet nto nampetap kaynetap tyonyoto.
66013018	Möce ŋalecu ŋomnonet om yuteyu, möce cito nye ponto ŋomnonet kunket Nampet nyepo tyonynto, omnye nampet nyitenyi kunye po cito. Nampet nyoto kunye po pokolwokik lö ok tomonwokik lö ok lö
66014001	Yoto akäs ani Lekwap Kecir nye keyoŋe tulwetap Siyon parak. Kupontokey piko elifunek pokol akenke ok artam ok amwan ce kicesil kaynenyi oko nyepo kwan tokoywekap picoto tokol.
66014002	Alim kutit nye cone torot nye kerkey oko karumnta nyepo peko cepo kasururtit oko karumnta nyepo ilet nye wece. Kikerkey polotet nye kyalim oko tumnto nyepo piko ce pire kirancinekwa.
66014003	Kuyoŋ piko co elifunek pokol akenke ok artam ok amwan taytap ŋeceretap poytoyisyet oko tyoŋik amwan ce soptos oko poyik. Kutume tumnto nyelel nye memuce konetkey tumoto piko alake, tume pate cekto co elifunek pokol akenke ok artam ok amwan co kicirarac kukwane koret.
66014004	Picoto kuce kipuryo kot kowurtakey kwiy sakwayanat oko koruk, ce kiripkey kutililitu ce menket moron. Coto kuce rupoti pate Lekwap Kecir om wulyo tokol wule kowo. Coto kuce kikyal kicisop om wule mite piko kwek kupuswek cepo tayta cepo Yiyintet oko Lekwap Kecir.
66014005	Kitompo kot kuŋalal cekto kenyis mwiynan om kutuwakwa, ce moponto kenyis lelis.
66014006	Yoto akäs ani malayket ake yec nye terertoy om torot, kuponto lokoywek ce toponec ce mopoku ce möce kule omwoci piko cepo koret, piko, orosyek punonik, ŋelyepik, oko yemosyek.
66014007	Kukurto om kutit nyewo kule, “Aywey Yiyintet oŋnkokaste woyinto nyenyi! Omnye kopunto sawet kumut musankut. Osay neto nye kitany torot oko ŋony, ruretyet oko wule kosune peko!’’
66014008	Kuco kurup malayket nyepo oyeny malayket nyepo tayta, kumwowu kule, “Kalul! Kalul! Papulon nyewo! Nye kikoci yemosyek tokol kuye komek cepo mwonet nyepo sakwayanatet nyenyi!’’
66014009	Kurup malayket nyepo somok cut oyeny co kopo tay oŋnkupol kumwoy kule, “Ci ake tokol nye kasay tyonynto oko kerkeyinto nyenyi oŋnkucäm cikoci pelutyet tokoynyi nto yewunyi,
66014010	kunye mosukuye neto nyoto nkit komek cepo nerekwekap Yiyintet, ce koroŋnkyi cikompet nyepo nerekwekap Yiyintet ce mocetose peko. Kunye mosicitaŋanye nyoto mata oko rwontok ce loytos sulpur om taytap malaykanik ce tililec oko taytap Lekwap Kecir.
66014011	Mosukutusken kuweti parak yetit nye toŋonye cekto kenyis okoy kenyis. Picoto kuco kisoye tyonynto oko kerkeyinto nyenyi oŋnkyikoci pelutyet nyepo tyonyoto, ce puryo kot komunye pet oko komoy.’’
66014012	Mwowu ŋalecu kule kumuytoci pikap Yiyintet, coto kuco yweye ntarastinekap Yiyintet oŋnkuyene cekto Yesu.
66014013	Yoto alim ani kutit nye cone torot nye mwowu kule, “Sil ŋalecu; ŋerekotin kuponto kupeyoy kuceke yawut piko co poku kuponto Mokoryontet.’’ Komwoy Muyet Nyetilil kule, “Po manta! Ŋerekotin cekto mosukuŋerec om komuŋnto nyepo toŋoŋutekwa, omnye mosukurup yisyet nye kikwiy kupetakey cekto.’’
66014014	Yoto akäs ani okoy akäs polyet nyelel oko tyony nye kerkey cito nye kepure polyet, oŋnkuponto om metinyi kutwet nyepo Saput, oŋnkuponto mukotiyet nye ŋatip om yewunyi.
66014015	Kucone malayket ake kotap Yiyintet oŋnkukurci kumwoci om kutit nyewo kumwoci nye kepure polyet kule, “Yiyisye mukotiyeŋuŋ kisisye omnye kopunto pesyosyek korur koret möce kisisye!’’
66014016	Yoto kuwec malayket nyo kepure polyet mukotiyet kutokyi koret. Cekis yoto cepo koret.
66014017	Kucone yoto kotap Yiyintet om torot malayket ake yec, kiponto mpo nyoto mukotiyet nye ŋatip.
66014018	Kuco yec malayket nye cone otepto nyetilil, nyoto kunye ponto kamukeywek nye poytoy mata, oŋnkukurci om kutit nyewo malayket nyo ponto mukotiyet nye ŋatip kule, “Yiyisye mukotiyet nyeŋuŋ, yep matuntanik cepo sapipunek cepo koret omnye koruryo Sapipunek!’’
66014019	Yoto kuwec malayket mukotiyet nyenyi kutokyi koret, oŋnkuyep matuntanik cepo Sapipunek, oŋnkuwirci wule mite kito nye rurunye, nye nerekwekap Yiyintet.
66014020	Yoto ciruruny matuntanik cepo Sapipunek om kito nye cirurunye om saŋntap moŋet. Kukwane korotik kito nye cirurunye omik cepo Sapipunek ce kipuntoy koyinto nyepo kilomitanik pokolwokik somok, oŋnkupunto mitanik pokolwokik oyeny kuwo ŋony.
66015001	Yoto akäs ani kito ake nyepo kakitat nye mite torot, kiy nyewo nye cikite koromun. Kimite yoto malaykanik tisapu ce kiponto toŋoŋutek tisap cepo letut, coto kuce nerekwekap Yiyintet cepo letut.
66015002	Akäs yec kiy nye kerkey ruretyet nyepo kilasit nye ponto mata. Akäs mpo piko co kiporye kupël tyonynto oko kerkeynnyi oŋnkupël mpo neto nyo cekonu kaynenyi kyiyisye nampet. Kimite cekto kukeyoŋe tapantap ruretyet nyepo kilasit, kuponto kirancinek ce kikoci Yiyintet cekto.
66015003	Kitume tumntap Moses kiyokintetap Yiyintet oko tumntap Lekwap Kecir kumwowu kule: “Mokoryontet Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, po kakitat koromun yisyonutekuk! Kinko nyepo yemosyek tokol, toponec oŋnkupo manta orustunwekuk!
66015004	Mokoryontet, ŋo nye meyweyiŋ nyi? Ŋo nye metorore kayneŋuŋ? Yiku nyi tilil nkit. Mosukukwa yemosyek tokol kwokusayiŋ nyito, omnye kucekäs kutok yisyonutekuk cepo manta.’’
66015005	Nto om letutap ŋalecu, yoto akäs ani kotap Yiyintet om torot nye yatat, oko wemet nye poru wule purune Yiyintet orit.
66015006	Kukwane kotap Yiyintet orit malaykanik tisapu co ponto toŋoŋutek tisap. Kiloce cekto sukanik celelac celekecectos, oŋnkuponto misipinek cepo Sapunek ce korotyi teketikwa.
66015007	Yoto kuŋet tyonynto akenke om tyoŋik amwan ce soptos, kukoci malaykanik tisap pokulinek tisap cepo Sapunek ce kinyitotin orit nerekwekap Yiyintet nye sopot okokoy okoy okokoy.
66015008	Kunyiy kotap Yiyintet orit yetit nye cone wule mite woyinto oko swametap Yiyintet. Puryo ci nye kimuc kowut kotap Yiyintet orit okoy kupok toŋoŋutek tisapu co kisutu malaykanik tisapu.
66016001	Yoto alim ani kutit nyewo nye cone kotap Yiyintet orit nye kimwoci malaykanik tisap kule, “Ape wowosyi koret nerekwekap Yiyintet co mite pokulinek tisap!’’
66016002	Kuwo malayket nyepo tayta wokuwasta pokulit nyenyi kuwosyi koret, kunäm mwoyok ce mwonec ce miyotec piko tokol co kiponto pelutyet nyepo tyonynto oŋnkusoye kerkeyintap tyonyoto.
66016003	Kuwasta malayket nyepo oyeny pokulit nyenyi kuwosyi ruretyet, kwek ruretyet koroti, kukerkeyit korotik cepo cito nye kame. Kume kiy ake tokol nye kimite ruretyet.
66016004	Yoto kuwasta malayket nyepo somok pokulit nyenyi, kuwosyi oyinosyek oko wule kosune peko, kuweckey co kwek koroti.
66016005	Alim malayket nye ripe peko kumwowu kule, “Poye manta wule kemutite musankut nyeŋuŋ! Nyi Nyetilil! Nye mite yawut, Nye kimite ikye.
66016006	Omnye kiwasta cekto korotik cepo pikuk oko cepo workoyik, kunyo kekoci kuye korotik. Kanyor ce yeme!’’
66016007	Yoto alim kutit nye cone otepto nye cepele korosek kumwowu kule, “Mokoryontet Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol! Manta aŋnkupo manta wule mutitoy musankunek!’’
66016008	Yoto kuwasta malayket nyepo amwan pokulit nyenyi kuwosyi asista, kupel asista piko om mata nye kiloye koromun.
66016009	Kucup picoto kaynetap Yiyintet nyo poytoy toŋoŋutecutecu tokol. Ntene nye kipuryo kot kurenynkey cekto kwasta miyotyonikwa oŋnkukasta Yiyintet.
66016010	Kuwasta malayket nyepo mut pokulit nyenyi kuwosyi ŋeceretap tyonynto, kulum menonet poytoyisyet nyepo tyonynto. Kunyiy piko ŋelyepik om mwoninto,
66016011	kucup cekto Yiyintet nyepo torot om mwoninto oko om mwoyok ce kiponto. Ntene kipuryo kot kurenynkey om orustunwekwa ce miyotec ce kikwiy.
66016012	Yoto kuwasta malayket nyepo lö pokulit nyenyi kuwosyi oyinet nyewo Efurate. Kuteny peko ceci, kusotyi aret kinkonik ce kwone koŋasis.
66016013	Yoto akäs ani oyik ce miyotec somok ce kerkey mororocok ce kikwone kutitap Cesosum oko kutitap tyonynto oko kutitap workoyontet mwiyntet.
66016014	Cutecu kuce oyik ce miyotec ce yiye tukuk cepo kakitat. Oyik cutecu somok kuce peti wule mite kinkonik om koret tokol kumukul wokoruruce wanak kupo poryet nyewo om pesyet nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol.
66016015	“Alim pa! Aconi ani kuyu corin! Ŋerekat cito nye pure kukösu oŋnkulakat sirokyi, sukuŋet monte kot kuwesetot pöc oŋnkolilan om wule mite piko!’’
66016016	Yoto koruruc oyik kinkonik korurukyi otepto nye cekure om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek, “Arimuketon’’
66016017	Yoto kuwasta malayket nyepo tisap pokulit nyenyi kuwosyi parak, kucone kutit nyewo ŋeceret nye mite kotap Yiyintet orit kumwowu kule, “Kakyiy!’’
66016018	Yoto kowec ilotik, oŋnkorum, oŋnkutul, oŋnkoriŋriŋ koret koromun, nye kitompo kot koriŋriŋ koret kuyunyoto kuceke ye kitany Yiyintet cito. Koriŋriŋet nyitenyi nye miyat kupël tokol!
66016019	Kukerer moŋet nyewo kupciwunekey somok, kyaranta moŋosyek cepo piko cepo yemosyek alak. Kusot Yiyintet moŋetap Papulon nyewo, yoto kukoci kuye komek cepo cikompet nyepo nerekwekyi ce caŋ.
66016020	Kupotyo korosyek tokol co kikwen peko, oŋnkupotyo tulonok tokol.
66016021	Kosowune torot koyantet nye nyikis nye kipuntoy akenke kilonok konom kosuci piko. Kunyer kucup piko Yiyintet om toŋoŋutek cepo koyantet omnye kikoyantet nyoto nye miyat koromun.
66017001	Yoto kuco wule aomite ani malayket akenke om cut tisap co kiponto pokulinek tisap oŋnkumwowo kule, “Co, mosoporuŋ ani toŋoŋutek cepo korket cemoroniyontet nyewo, nyoto ku moŋet nye kicetec kulekite peko ce caŋ.
66017002	Kikwiy kinkonik cepo koret sakwayanatet oko cemoroniyontet nyewo, kupokit piko cepo koret omnye kiye komek cepo sakwayanatet nyenyi.’’
66017003	Yoto kunäma ani Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkukwero malayket okoy kitela, akäs korket nye kepure tyonynto nye arra. Kicesil porto nyenyi tokol kaynok ce miyotec. Kiponto tyonyoto metewok tisap oko kuynok taman.
66017004	Kiloce korkonoto sirok ce mur kworronec oŋnkyiyile Sapunek, oko rwontok ce piciyec oko lulunek. Kiponto om yewunyi cikompet nyepo Saput nye kinyitat orit tukuk ce miyotec, oko simnyontet nyepo sakwayanatenyi.
66017005	Kicesil tokoyta nyenyi kaynet nye poru ŋalek ce wuŋotin kule, “Papulon Nyewo. Kametitap cemoronisyek oko miyotyonik tokol cepo koret.’’
66017006	Akäs kupokite korkonoto korotik cepo pikap Yiyintet oko cepo piko ce kicepakäc omnye kiyen Yesu. Nteyu kowo akäs korkonoto akite koromun.
66017007	Ntene kumwowo malayket kule, “Omne sekite nyi? Mosoporuŋ ŋalek cewuŋotin ce nöme korket oko tyonynto nyo ponto metewok tisap oko kuynok taman, nyo wesetote korkonoto.
66017008	Kisope tyonyoto nyo keköse nyi, ntene kime yawut kimo kusope, kunyo karik kuloŋune mwenet nye moponto ye ŋete, oŋnkwokyaranta yec. Mosukokite koromun piko ce mite koret ye kakäs cekto tyonyoto. Picoto kuce tompo kot cesil kaynokwa om kitaput nyepo soponto kutompo kot citany koret. Omnye kisope tyonyoto, kunyo kimo kusope yawut, ntene mosukutok yec.
66017009	“Möce ŋalecu kasoteywek oko ŋomnonet. Metewok tisap kuce tulonok tisap co kepure korket,
66017010	oŋnku Kinkonik tisap. Om kinkonocoto, kipotyo mutu, kumite akenke, kutompo kot kuco ake, nteye kaco nyoto, mosukupur kuminiŋ pate,
66017011	Nto tyonynto nye kisope, ntene nye kimo kusopot yawut, kunye kinko nyoto nyepo sisit nye kipo co tisap cepo tayta oŋnku nye mowokyaranta.
66017012	“Nto kuynok taman co kikäs nyi kuce kinkonik ce tompo kot kupoytoyis. Ntene mosicikoci kamukeywek kwek kinkonok kupoytoyis oko tyonynto kuwany sawet akenke.
66017013	Ponto cutecu tokol ku taman kito akenke nye tyikyini, kule, kukoci cekto tyonynto swamet oko kamukeywek cikwa tokol.
66017014	Mosukuporye cekto Lekwap Kecir, mosukupëlis Lekwap Kecir oko pikyi co cekure kweyanik oko konomikyi ce kikoyen, kupël cekto, omnye Neto kunye Mokoryontet nyepo mokorenik oŋnku Kinko nyepo kinkonik.’’
66017015	Kumwowo ani malayket mpo yec kule, “Peko co kwekäs nyi kukepure Cemoroniyontet, kuce piko ce caŋ, yemosyek oko ŋelyepik.
66017016	Nto oko kuynok taman co kwekäs nyi oko tyonynto kuce mosukusenker Cemoroniyontet, mosukonemune kiy ake tokol nye ponto oŋnkupakakta kopur muncarata, mosukwam panyek ceci oŋnkwaranta kupele mata.
66017017	Omnye kikukoci Yiyintet mukuleywekwa kito nye kiyitita, sukuŋet kwiy kucömncin cekto kwek akenke oŋnkukoci tyonynto kamukeywek kupoytoyis okoy kupunto kupoyit manta ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
66017018	“Nto korket nye kwekäs nyi ku moŋet nyewo nye poytoy kinkonik cepo koret.’’
66018001	Om letutap ŋalecu, yoto akäs ani malayket ake nye reku kucone torot. Kiponto kamukeywek ce woyec koromun. Kukweny woyinto nyenyi koret tokol kumukul.
66018002	Kukurto om swamet nyewo kule, “Koturpup! Koturpup Papulon moŋet Nyewo. Kukwek kayta nye minye oyik ce miyotec ce cesenkere. Oŋnkuminye orit tukuk tokol ce somis oko toritek tokol ce cesenkere.
66018003	Omnye kiye kupokit yemosyek tokol komek ce mwonec cepo sakwayanatet nyenyi. Kikwiy kinkonik sakwayanatet oko neto, oŋnkwiy cekto kamonkesyentit nyepo koret kumokoren om sakwayanatet nyenyi nye moponto ye ŋete.’’
66018004	Yoto alim ani kutit ake nye cone torot, nye kimwoy kule, “Pikwani! Akwane wule mite neto, sukuŋet monte kot ayiy miyotyet oko neto. Monte kot onyoru toŋoŋutek ceci!
66018005	Omnye kicitul miyotyonikyi kwek tulwo nye kipunto torot, kunyo kukusot Yiyintet orustunwekyi co miyotec.
66018006	Oyici akwek neto kuyu wulo kikwiwok akwek, oyokyi aret oyeny kucaŋit om ce kikwiy. Anyit kunyiy cikompet nyenyi komek ce mwonec aret oyeny kupël co kikonok akwek neto.
66018007	Okoci neto toŋoŋutek oko mesyet ce caŋ ce oyecin cete sutetapkey oko soponto nyepo ŋerekwek ce miyotec ce kiponto, omnye mwowu kule, ‘Opuri ani kuyu kinko nye korko, puryo kot oyiku musuk, puryo kot omesyi kenyis!’
66018008	Kunyo om pesyet akenke, mosukunäm neto porwonik oko toŋoŋutek oko rupet. Omnye mosicepele mata kulay, omnye nyewo nyepo kamukeywek Yiyintet nye mosukumutyi musankut neto.’’
66018009	Kunyo mosukuriryo kinkonik cepo koret co kikwiye sakwayanatet oŋnkupur soponto nye topon oko neto, ye kakäs yetit nyepo mata nye pele moŋonoto.
66018010	Mosukuyoŋe cekto wule low, omnye keywey kunyokoritu toŋoŋutekyi oŋnkumwoy cekto kule, “Opo! Opo! Po kakitat! Mite kwapi Papulon moŋet nyewo nye tokunot! Kocewosontyiŋ cemutuŋ kulotiŋ musankut lakwar om sawet akenke pate!’’
66018011	Mosukuriryo oŋnkumesye kamonkesisyek cepo koret tokol neto, omnye komo kwole ci yec terekokwa.
66018012	Puryo nye tokwole Sapunek oko pesanik, oko rwontok ce piciyec, oko sirok celelac, oko sirok ce orornec oko sirok cepo ntororok, oko ce murwonec, oko terekok alak tokol cepo ketik ce motoku, oko tukuk tokol ce kicitanye kelekap Pelek, oko ketik cepo latik, oko toyok, oko karik, oko rwontok ce lelac.
66018013	Oko tukuk ce poŋu, oko ce citoye nkuyek, oko pupaninek, oko korosek ce poŋu, oko Miranik, oko Frankinek, oko komekap Sapipunek, oko mwayta oko pusyek oko nkanuk oko toka oko kecirek oko Farasinek oko Karinek oko mutworik, oko mpo soponwekap piko.
66018014	Kumwoci kamonkesisyek neto kule, “Kupotyo tukuk tokol co kwemöce nyi, kupot mpo mokoryontit oko ŋerekwek nye kemenyoru yec kenyis.’’
66018015	Mosukuyoŋe wule low kamonkesisyek co kikwiye kamonkesyantit oko neto om tukucutecu kuriryo oŋnkumesyi, kupole koromun omnye kanyokoritu om toŋoŋutekap korkonoto.
66018016	Kumwowu kule, “Opo! Opo! Mite kwapi koromun moŋet nyewo. Nye kiloce ikye sukanik, oko siret nye mur kwarra oko nye arra, nye kikasekey karik cepo Sapunek oko lulunek!
66018017	Kunyo kupote mokoryontiŋuŋ sawet akenke pate!’’ Kuyoŋe wule low piko tokol co poytoy raposyek, oko co pete raposyek, oko co sute raposyek, oko piko tokol co yiye kamonkesyantit om ruretyet.
66018018	Kupol cekto yo kowo kukäs yetit nye kacepele moŋonoto kumwoy kule, “Puryo moŋet ake nye kerkey oko moŋet nyewo nyitenyi!’’
66018019	Yoto kuwasta cekto tertit kuwosyi metewok cikwa, kuriryo kumwoy kule, “Opo! Opo! Mite kwapi koromun nyi moŋet nyewo! Omnye neto kunye kimokorene piko tokol ce ponto raposyek! Kunyo kupotye tukuk tokol ce kuponto sawet akenke pate!’’
66018020	Akante kuŋerec wulin po torot! Aŋerec akwek pikap Yiyintet kiyokik oko workoyik! Oŋerec om arantayet nyenyi kamutyi Yiyintet musankut alot akwek neto om ŋalek ce kikwiwok!
66018021	Yoto kunäm malayket nyepo swama rwantet nyewo nyete rwantetap paka oŋnkuwirci ruretyet orit kumwoy kule, “Mosowirci moŋet Papulon kuwo ruretyet om swamet kuyunyi nye komo kutoku yec kenyis!
66018022	Tumwonik cepo piko co pire kirancinek oko piko cepo tumwonik oko co kute kurerunek oko co kute kontinek kuce komo celime yec kenyis om wule mite nyi! Komo kutokune kenyis wule mite ci nye yiyisyi nye muswokin. Komo celime kenyis rwantetap paka nye ceŋoye om wule mite!
66018023	Komo ceköse kenyis tarit nye loye om wule mite, komo celime yec korko oko moron ce kemütkey ce ŋolole om wule mite. Piko cekuk cepo kamonkesyantit kuce kiwoyec om koret tokol, kuce kiperper pikap koret tokol kwiyisye ponisyet nyeŋuŋ!’’
66018024	Kicitaŋany Papulon omnye kicenyorta orit korotikap workoyik oko cepo pikap Yiyintet. Manta korotikap piko tokol ce kicepakäc om koret.
66019001	Nto om letut alim ani polotet nye kerkey polotet nyepo piko ce caŋ om torot ce kipole kule, “Cikaste Yiyintet! Po Kosopotet Yiyintet, oko Woyinto oko swamet!
66019002	Po manta wule mutitoy neto musankunek! Kacemut musankut kulot Cemoroniyontet nyewo nye kikowurta koret om sakwayanatet nyenyi, kwetaŋany Yiyintet neto omnye kipakäc neto mutworikap Yiyintet.’’
66019003	Kupol yec kumwoy kule, “Cikaste Yiyintet! Weti torot kenyis oko kenyis yetit nyepo moŋet nyewo.’’
66019004	Yoto kukutuny poyik tiptemu ok amwan oko tyoŋik amwan ce soptos ce mite taytap ŋeceret oŋnkusay cekto Yiyintet nye kepure ŋeceret kumwoy kule, “Yunyoto! Cikaste Yiyintet!’’
66019005	Yoto kucone kutit wule mite ŋeceret kumwoy kule, “Akaste Yiyintet, akwek mutworikyi tokol oko piko cewoyec oko ce minkec co yweye neto!’’
66019006	Yoto alim ani polotet nye kerkey nyepo piko ce caŋ, nye kerkey mpo peko cepo kasururtit, nye kerkey ilet nye kaciy. Alim kumwowu kule, “Cikaste Yiyintet! Omnye Mokoryontenyo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kunye Kinko!
66019007	Akente ceŋerec acek oŋnkyikaste cikoci woyinto, omnye kopunto pesyet nye mütisyi Lekwap Kecir, kunyo kuyiytakey cepto nye cimüte.
66019008	Kocikoci kulac siret nyelel nye topon koromun’’ (Siret suket nyelel ku yisyonutek ce toponec cepo manta cepo pikap Yiyintet).
66019009	Yoto kumwowo ani malayket kule, “Sil ŋalecu, Ŋerekotin nye ponto kupeyoy piko co kucekur kukwa sakwetap kamütisyet nyepo Lekwap Kecir.’’ Oŋnkutosyi malayket kumwoy kule, “Ŋalekap Yiyintet cutecu cepo manta.’’
66019010	Oputyi ani yepo kerenkokyi asay neto, ntene kumwowo kule, “Mente ayiy kuyunyi! Oyiku ani mutworin nye kerkey oko nyito oko mpo yeyaŋuŋ co nöme kukwil ŋalek cepo manta ce kiŋoŋ Yesu. Say Yiyintet!’’ Omnye ŋalek cepo manta ce ŋoŋu Yesu kuce kikoci workoyik kuŋalal kuŋorsyo.
66019011	Yoto akäs kuyatakay wulin po torot, okoy akäs Farasit nyelel. Cekure cito nye kiwete, Nyepo manta nye cikenekey. Yiyisye ŋalek cepo manta ye mute musankunek oŋnkuporye cepo manta.
66019012	Kerkey konyek ceci mata nye loye oŋnkuloce kutonok ce caŋ om metinyi. Kuponto kaynet nye kicesil nye puryo ci nye kikonket, neto nkit pate nye nkete.
66019013	Kiloce siret nye koy nye kiciyile korotik. Nto kaynetap nyoto kunyi, “Ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.’’
66019014	Kurup neto sikarek cepo luketap torot ce kipete Farasinek ce lelac oŋnkuloce sirok ce toponec ce lelac.
66019015	Cone kutit nyenyi rotetap cok nye ŋatip nye mosukupele yemosyek tokol. Mosukupayta kwiyisye korokto nyepo karnet. Mosukoruruny Finyonik kwiyisye kito nyo cirurunye Finyonik cepo nerekwekap Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol.
66019016	Kicesil siret nyenyi oko catit nyenyi kaynet kule, “Kinko nyepo kinkonik. Mokoryontet nyepo mokorenik.’’
66019017	Yoto akäs ani malayket nye keyoŋe Asista, kupol kukurto om kutit nyewo kukurci toritek ce kiterertoy om parak kule, “Akwa kworurukyikey sakwet nyewo nyepo Yiyintet!
66019018	Kwayam panyek cepo porwonik cepo kinkonik, oko cepo cewoyec cepo sikarek, oko cepo co coponto swamet, oko panyek cepo Farasinek oko cepo piko co pete, oko panyek cepo piko tokol co tokunotin oko co momutwor oko co mutwor oko cepo piko cewoyec oko ce minkec.’’
66019019	Yoto akäs ani tyonynto nyin ake oko kinkonik cepo koret oko sikarek cekwa ce keruruckey kule ceporye cito nyo wete Farasit oko sikarek ceci.
66019020	Cenäm tyonyoto kwek mopusyo wanak oko workoyontet nyepo mwiynan nye kikwiye tukuk ce cikite om taytap tyonyoto. (Kikwiyisyi tyonyoto tukucoto cikite sukuŋet kuperper piko co ponto pelutyet nyepo tyonyoto.) Cewirci kusoptos ruretyet nyepo mata nyepo rwontok ce loytos Sulfa.
66019021	Cepakäc sikarek cikwa cepare rotwetap cok nyo cone kutitap cito nye wete Farasit. Kwam toritek panyek cikwa.
66020001	Yoto akäs ani malayket nye reku kucone torot, nye kiponto om yewunyi Funkuwet nyepo mwenet nye moponto ye ŋete oŋnkuponto nyororet nyewo.
66020002	Kunäm malaykanato Cesosum nyoto ku Erenet nyepo keny nye cekure Setani nyewo nyepo oyik oŋnkurat kopur kuwany kenyisyek elifut akenke.
66020003	Kuwirci malayket kowute Cesosum mwenet nye moponto ye ŋete, oŋnkukerta orit kukoci pelutyet sukuŋet komo komuce kot kumas kuperper yemosyek okoy kupok kenyisyek elifut akenke. Mosicityac kopur kuminiŋ ye kapok kenyisyek coto.
66020004	Yoto akäs ŋecerok cepo kamukeywek oko piko ce kepure, ce kicikoci kamukeywek kumut musankunek. Akäs mpo yec mukuleywek cepo co kiceyep metewok omnye kimwoy kutor Yesu oŋnkumwoy kupor ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Kipuryo kot kusay picoto tyonynto nto mpo kerkeyinto nyenyi, oŋnkupuryo kot cepirci pelutyetap tyonynto tokoywek cikwa oko yewuniyek cikwa. Kotutune met cekto kusopco oŋnkupoytoyis oko Kristo kuwany kenyisyek elifut akenke.
66020005	(Kipuryo kot kotutune met piko cut alake okoy kupok kenyisyek elifut akenke) nyitenyi kunye kotutunetap met nyepo tayta.
66020006	Ŋerekotin ce ponto kupeyoy co nyoru kotutunetap met nyepo tayta. Puryo kot kuponto kamukeywek met nyepo oyeny om wule mite cekto coto, ntene mosukwek coto tisik cepo Yiyintet oko Kristo, oŋnkupoytoyis oko neto kuwany kenyisyek elifut akenke.
66020007	Nteye kapok kenyisyek elifut akenke, mosicityac Setanit kucone mopusi nyi.
66020008	Mosukuco saŋ, mosukucec kuperper yemosyek ce mite taponutek amwan cepo koret, coto ku Koku oko Makoku, mosukoruruc Setanit cekto kunäm poryet, mosukucaŋit cekto koromun cete ŋaynet nyepo ruretyet tapan.
66020009	Yoto kupa kuseretyi koret tokol oŋnkomut kayta nyepo pikap Yiyintet oko moŋetap Yiyintet nye topon. Ntene kucone mata torot oŋnkupël kwaranta cekto.
66020010	Cewirci yoto Setani nyewo oyik nyo kiperper cekto wule mite tampayayet nyepo mata nye kicepel kipiritit wule mite tyonynto oko workoyontet mwiyntet; mosukutaŋany cekto komoy oko pet okokoy okoy okokoy.
66020011	Yoto akäs ani Ŋeceret nyewo nyelel nyepo poytoyisyet oko cito nye kepure. Kumwey koret wuli po ŋony oko koret torot om tayta nyenyi, oŋnkupotyo nye komoceköse yec.
66020012	Akäs piko cewoyec oko ce minkec ce kipok ce keyoŋe tayta ŋeceret. Ceŋany kitapunek, yoto ceŋany mpo kitaput ake, Kitaput nyoto kunye po soponto, cemutyi musankut piko ce kipok kuyu wule yunto yisyonutekwa om ŋalek ce kicesil kitapunek.
66020013	Kukon ruretyet piko ce kipok ce kimite orit. Kukon met oko kapkompic piko ce kipok ce kimite orit. Cemutyi ci tokol musankut kuyu wule yunto yisyonutekyi.
66020014	Cewirta met oko kapkompic cewirci tampayayet nyepo mata. (Tampayayet nyepo mata kunye met nyepo oyeny.)
66020015	Ye puryo kot cenyorta kaynetap ci tokol nye kicesil kitaputap Soponto, cewirci nyo wule mite tampayayet nyepo mata.
66021001	Yoto akäs ani torot nyelel oko koret nyelel, omnye kupok koret wulin po torot oko koret wuli po ŋony cepo tayta. Kimo kumite yec ruretyet.
66021002	Akäs moŋet nyetilil Yerusalem nyelel kureku kucone torot wule mite Yiyintet, nye kicesat kunyol topon kukerkeyit korko nye kacimüt nye kacilac topon sukuŋet kutuyo oko santenyi.
66021003	Alim yoto kutit nye cone ŋeceretap kamukeywek kupol kumwoy kule, “Akäs pa! Kakukoci Yiyintet konyi kopure kwenutap piko, mosukumiŋis wule mite cekto, mosukwek pikyi, oŋnkwek neto Yiyintet nyimwa.
66021004	Mosukopuc Yiyintet lokik tokol ce mite konyekwa, komo kumite yec met, oŋnku komo kumite mesyet, nto mpo rirek, nto mwoninto, omnye kutil tukuk co kipo keny.’’
66021005	Kumwoy Neto nye kepure ŋeceretap kamukeywek kule, “Akäs pa! Kawec yawut kulelakitu tukuk tokol!’’ Kumwowo yec kule, “Sil ŋalecu, omnye po manta ŋalecu oŋnkyikenekey.’’
66021006	Kumwowo kule, “Kakwitita! Oyiku Omeka oko Alufa. Nyepo tayta oko nyepo Letut. Mosokoci ani ci ake tokol nye ome melelya peko ce puryo kot kwole ce kosune wule mite soponto.
66021007	Ci tokol nye kepëlis kunye mosikonti cutecu tokol, Mosoyeku ani Yiyintenyi oŋnkwek neto lekwemwani.
66021008	Ntene piko co nyokorec, co meyene, oko co ŋomntoyot, oko co kiwuryo, oko porik, oko co sakwoyone, oko co mwiynot tokol, oko co yiye sokeyek, oko co soye kerkeyik oko co perperisyi, otepto nyimwa ku tampayayet nye loye, oko mata, oko rwontok ce loytos Salfa, nyoto kunye met nyepo oyeny.’’
66021009	Yoto kuco wule omite ani malayket akenke om malaykanik tisap co ponto pokulinek tisap ce nyitotin porwonik tisapu cepo letut, oŋnkuŋololwo kumwoy kule, “Co yu! Mosoporuŋ Mureret korket nyepo Lekwap Kecir.’’
66021010	Kunäma yoto malayket Nyetilil oŋnkukwero okoy tulwet nye koy koromun. Kuporwo moŋet nyewo Nyetilil, nyoto ku Yerusalem nye kicone torot wule mite Yiyintet.
66021011	Kulekecec om Woyinto nyepo Yiyintet, kuyu rwantet nye piciy oŋnku kerkey rwantet nye lekecec Cespa, oŋnkutoku kuyu ciyoyit Krestol.
66021012	Kiponto moŋet totet nyewo nye kicetec komut oko kurkotik taman ok oyeny oko malaykanik taman ok oyeny ce ripe kurkoticoto. Kicesil kurkoticoto kaynok taman ok yeny cepo lekokap Israel co taman ok oyeny.
66021013	Kimite komoswokik tokol ku amwan kurkotik somoku. Kimite somoku koŋasis, kumite somoku tö, kumite somoku makentany, kumite somoku tinkey.
66021014	Kicetec totet nyepo moŋet kuyoŋe rwontok tolocik taman ok yeny ce kicesil kaynokap Kiyokik cepo Lekwap Kecir.
66021015	Kiponto malayket nye kiŋololwo korokto nyepo Saput nye cepimonisye wule tento moŋet oko kurkotik oko totet.
66021016	Kicetec moŋet kwek sukweya kwoyecin koyinto nyepo komoswokik tokol ku amwan. Kuyoyec malayket moŋonoto kwiyisye korokto nyenyi. Kipuntoy koyinto kilomitanik Elifunek oyeny oko pokolwokik oyeny. Kyoyecin koyinto oko poroyinto oko koyinto kuwo parak nyepo moŋet.
66021017	Kuyoyec malayket mpo moŋet, kipuntoy mitanik tomonwokik lö ok mut. Om koyoyeket nyepo cito.
66021018	Kicetece totetap moŋet rwontok ce lekecectos. Nto moŋet nkit kunye kicetece Saput nkit pate nye lekecece kuyu ciyoyit.
66021019	Tolocik ce kiyoŋe totet nyepo moŋet kuce kiciyile tokol rwontok ce piciyec wok ce caŋ. Tolcta nyepo tayta ku rwantet nye ararra Yasipi, nto nyepo oyeny ku cepo Sapiro, nto nyepo somok ku Kaluteton, nto nyepo amwan ku cepo Samarakito,
66021020	nto nyepo mut ku cepo sarntoniki, nto nyepo lö ku cepo sarutiyo, nto nyepo tisap ku cepo krisolito, nyepo sisit ku cepo Perulo, nyepo sokol ku cepo Topasiyo, nyepo taman ku cepo Krisopraso, nyepo taman ok akenke ku cepo Yakinto, nyepo taman ok oyeny ku cepo Ametusito.
66021021	Nto kurkotik taman ok oyeny ku cepo Lulunek taman ok oyeny. Kicitanye kurket ake tokol Lulunek. Nto aret nyewo nyepo moŋet kunye kicemale Sapunek pate nye kilekecec kuyu ciyoyit.
66021022	Kipuryo kot akäs kotap Yiyintet kumite moŋet, omnye Mokoryontet Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol oko Lekwap Kecir kunye kotap Yiyintet nyepo moŋonoto.
66021023	Puryo kot kumöce moŋonoto asis nto arawet nye keluci, omnye lucini pate woyinto nyepo Yiyintet, nto Lekwap Kecir kunye tarit nyenyi.
66021024	Mosukupesetate piko cepo koret lakweyet nyenyi, mosukusut kinkonik cepo koret mokoryontinekwa kukwa moŋonoto.
66021025	Puryo kot cekere kenyis kurkotik ceci pet oko komoy, omnye puryo kot kumite wuloto ye komoy.
66021026	Mosicesut woyinto oko mokoryontinek cepo pikap koret tokol kukwa moŋonoto.
66021027	Memuce kot kowut moŋonoto kiy ake tokol nye miyat, nto mpo ci nye yiye cepo kalilan, nto nye perperisyi. Piko pate ce kicesil kaynokwa kitaput nyepo soponto nyepo Lekwap Kecir ce wute moŋet orit.
66022001	Yoto kuporwo ani malayket oyinet nyepo peko cepo soponto nye kilekecece kuyu ciyoyit, ce kirotune ŋeceretap poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko nyepo Lekwap Kecir.
66022002	Kurot oyinet kupunte aret nyepo kwenutap moŋet. Kipite tapantap oyinet pitoni ketit nyepo Soponto nye yiye omik aret taman ok oyeny om kenyit akenke, nye yiy omik kila arawet akenke. Kyiyisye sokek ceci cisope piko cepo yemosyek.
66022003	Puryo kot cenyortoy moŋonoto kiy nye kicup Yiyintet. Mosukopurune moŋonoto ŋeceretap poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko nyepo Lekwap Kecir, musukusay mutworikyi neto.
66022004	Mosukukäs cekto tokoyta nyenyi, mosicesil kaynet nyenyi tokoytap picoto,
66022005	nye komo kumite yec menonet nyepo komoy, puryo kot kumöce cekto lakweyet nyepo tarit nto mpo nyepo asista, omnye mosukwek Mokoryontet Yiyintet lakweyet nyimwa. Mosukupoytoyis cekto okokoy okoy okokoy.
66022006	Yoto kumwowo ani malayket kule, “Ŋalecu kuce po manta ce cikenekey. Kunyo Yiyintet nyo kocini mukuleynyi workoyik kunye kokuyok malaykenyi cokuporci mutworintenyi ce mosukwiyokis lakwar.’’
66022007	Komwoy Yesu kule, “Alimnte! Aconi ani Lakwar, ŋerekotin nye ponto kupeyoy co ripe ŋalecu po ŋorsyet ce mite Kitapuni!’’
66022008	Ani Yowana kunye kyalim aŋnkakäs, tukucu tokol. Nteyu kowo alim, aŋnkakäs yoto oputyi yepo kerenkokap malayket nye kiporwo ani tukucutecu tokol aŋnkasay.
66022009	Ntene kumwowo kule, “Mente ayiy kuyunyo! Oyiku ani mutworin nye akerkeye nyito oko mpo yeyaŋuŋ workoyik oko piko tokol ce yiye ŋalek ce mite kitapuni orit. Say Yiyintet!’’
66022010	Kumwowo yec kule, “Mente orip iwuny kuwoŋokis ŋalek cepo ŋorsyet ce mite kitapuni, omnye karik pesyet nye kweyat.
66022011	Yaste kwiy miyotyet cito nyo yiye miyotyet, kutosyikey kusomisitu kasoteywek cepo cito nyo somisec kasoteywek, kutosyikey kutoponit cito nyo topon, oŋnkutosyikey kutililit cito nyo tilil.’’
66022012	Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Alimnte! Aconi ani lakwar, mosutu kokotutyemwani sokoci ci ake tokol kuyu wule yunto yisyet nye kikwiy.
66022013	Oyiku ani Alufa oko Omeka, nyepo tayta oko nyepo letut.’’
66022014	Ponto kupeyoy piko co site kutililitu sirokwa, omnye mosukunyor kamukeywek kwam matuntyantet nyepo ketit nyepo soponto, oŋnkunyor kamukeywek kowut kurkotik cepo moŋet.
66022015	Ntene mosukopurune moŋet saŋ ŋokik, co kimosokis, oko ponik, oko co sekwayane, oko porik, oko co soye kerkeyik, oko tokol co cöme oŋnkwiye mwiynanet.
66022016	“Ani Yesu nye koyoku malayket nyimwani sukuŋet kumwowok ŋalecu om wule mite pikap Yiyintet tokol. Oyiku ani mucukoret nyepo kotap Tauti. Oyiku kokelyet tapoyantet nyepo yo kayec koret.’’
66022017	Komwoy Muyet Nyetilil oko Mureret kule, “Co!’’ Möce kumwoy ci tokol nye lime ŋalecu kule, “Co!’’ Möce kuco ci tokol nye ponto melelya, ci tokol nye möce peko cepo soponto kumöce kunyor pöc pate nye puryo kot kwole mpo kisic.
66022018	Ani nyo Yowana kunye asowu ci ake tokol nye lime ŋalek cepo ŋorsyet ce mite kitapuni. Ci tokol nye kotosyi ŋolyontet ake wule mite ŋalecu, mosukutosyi Yiyintet toŋoŋutek cepo porwonik cu kicesil kitapuni.
66022019	Nteye kotepe kot kunum citake tokol ŋolyontet ake tokol om wule mite ŋalek cepo ŋorsyet ce mite kitapuni, musukunumune Yiyintet neto nyoto omik ce kotonyoru om ketit nyepo soponto, oko otepto nyenyi om moŋet Nyetilil nye cemwowu om kitapuni.
66022020	Cito nye mwowu ŋalecutecu tokol kunye mwowu kule, “Aconi ani Lakwar kupoyit manta!’’ Yunyoto Mokoryontet Yesu, Co!
66022021	Kopurune poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo wule mite pikap Yiyintet tokol.
